1b1(rnying rgyud): mu ga ga dadu / kak+ka/ s+t+rai la ya tan/ bod skad du/ phrad pa ka// las kyi rgyud/ rdo dza kI la la la phyug 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos par//
1b2(rnying rgyud): dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas btsun ma'i thug la bzhugs te/ rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang ba
1b3(rnying rgyud): dang / btsun mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang ba dang / yang srub dang / sum sbrul dang / mgyogs ma'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshon
1b4(rnying rgyud): d+hUtra shin tu gdug pa 'jig rten thams cad phung par byed pa/ mgo gsum pa lag pa drug pa/ drag po'i gtum tshig pa rnang por smra ba zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad phung bar
1b5(rnying rgyud): byed do// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad phung bar byed pa'i d+hu tri de bskul ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/
2a1(rnying rgyud): na su dus dun / rgyu sa du na mas su ga sa
2a2(rnying rgyud): 'od zer de dag kyang khro bo sna tshogs su gyur nas/ nu rba la rdo rje rtse dgu pa dang / rtse lnga ba dang / rdo rje rtsagrA ma dang / me dpung dang / dzi shUl dang / phur pa rnams 'bros nas nA dzadi nyid baphral te/ gsos
2a3(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung rus pa 'chos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba la bkod do// gzhan yang mi dge ba las grub pa'i dregs pa can/ dbang phyug chen po po mo dang / nyi zla tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang /
2a4(rnying rgyud): lha dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / gnod byin dang / 'byung ba'i bdag po dang/ pho mor bcas pa kha bub tu 'gyel nas/ khrag tu skyugs shing 'dod chenapo
2a5(rnying rgyud): 'bri nga/ dpa'i ma pa sa rje'i bang bdag legs na/ desas ma mang/ dpa' bcan pa'i 'brangs su yin// ci kri pa'i ga tan nas nyim thag pa'i/ nas
2b1(rnying rgyud): chen po 'od zer lcags kyu sta bus de dag bkug ste/ mthing nag bu gsum gyis phyogs mtshams gtams pa'i gzhal las khang gi na nyi zla pa d+hi'i steng du mo gyi chings su bsnol te/ zla ba tshogs kyi gdan du bting / b+h+rU~M zhes pa'i sgra dbugs dpung rngu
2b2(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pas/ khro bo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang bsdus pas/ khro bo chen po bcu yab yum stsal pa dang bcas par gyur te/ phyogs so so'i dregs pa so so'i gdan la bzhugs/ u tsuSh+ma chen mo ni nyid kyi sbal 'khril/
2b3(rnying rgyud): dzA'i skems dang sems byung nirnam par gi snro phrul ba 'o/ phyogs myong bams ni dge babacu'i du la gnas pa'i sems dang bcan/ dbang drug byed dbye brabu na nyid kyi ga na du gyur te/ srang chub chen po'i sems dang ga gyu /
2b4(rnying rgyud): phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khams gsum gyi sems can zhe sdang can rnams// thabs gang
2b5(rnying rgyud): gis 'dul ba bka' stsal du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khams gsum gyi sems can zhe sdang can 'dul ba'i thabs ni gnyis te/ zhi ba'i las dang drag po'i lus kyis mi 'dul ba ni gang yeng med de// rdo
2b6(rnying rgyud): la ya zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs pa zhi bar byed do// thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags zhi bar byed do// de nas rdo rje kI la ya rnam par rtog pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin
2b7(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par 'bon te/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud gru chad par khyams sgo dang bcas pa rang byung ste rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o// de'i tshe gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi skra bka' stsal pa/
3a1(rnying rgyud): n+tu/ hA/ da/ / sa shAH/ A// rnam tu
3a2(rnying rgyud): t+te/ swA tra// AM a r-iShaka// / dz+ra// na skyes ma mahA/ praM stag sa/ dz+nyAmA las mam to/ rdzab dang /
3a3(rnying rgyud): maiHmi d+ha ra Ni s+t+ri hA/ dzaHd+hu be pra be sha ya/ b+h+r-i ni sr-i daM thA ya rAH/ hUM buSh+Ta pra bi sha/ hU~M sa dzA / bau d+dang suM gai ri/ pr-i shrI aM rA kA ya AtA/ hoHgan d+he tsita haM/ ya Ni Ni mu kha d+h+waM/ b+he ra be mu kha tAM/ oM mri ta mu kha d+haM/ mA ra Na mu Sha d+h+waM/
3a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsibs pa ya ma dang // grwa rgyang sems dpa'i ya yum brgyad// byams pa de bzhi byin gnas pa// bzhinan bzhi tung dbang // thengs dang spong pa thams cad kyis// thims tshun pa rkyen par 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa rang na/
3a5(rnying rgyud): rtog pa la rab tu bkod// zhi ba chen po'i cho ga 'di// zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par bshad// zhi ba'i lha rnams rab gsal nas// zhi ba'i lha rnams spyan drangs shing // phyag 'tshal brtan bzhugs dngos gru nod// phyi nang tha byung bdud rtsi dang // gtor ma
3a6(rnying rgyud): drag kyang sbyin par bya// bstod pa'i mchog 'dis rab tu brtad// the bcom ldan mi brtso sru skul pa// da rnasems dpa' mapa' bdag nyid// nyon mongs thams cad ni mdzad pa// rdo rje su mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// ying bzhin nor bus dgos 'dod slongs/
3a7(rnying rgyud): ran chen sems dpa'i mdang bdag nyin// dargyal rnam rtog nyon mongs zhe// rin chen sumachog phyag 'tshal bstod// chags bral chags chen 'od dpag med// pad+ma sems dpa'i mngang bdag nyid// 'dod chags rnam rtog nyon mongs zhi// pad+ma'i sku mchog/
3b1(rnying rgyud): tu/ zu nas// mabyamams pa sa pa // ga na sa// sa gag 'a/ napa byangs sugs dpa ga tu dun nag na
3b2(rnying rgyud): dag ga ga la ban/ sa da gas // gang mas kyi gas rdzu nas// shAm sam mi sa/ dang
3b3(rnying rgyud): napa sa /
3b4(rnying rgyud): nan / / sa
3b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pade zhes mas pa// drug pa 'ad bsngon// mapa 'angam gshesags sa byes// na gad /
3b6(rnying rgyud): la 'a // ga thug rje 'da'o zhe// rdzunag dang drugs 'as pa// thom pa'i rtsom ga theb ca// su da kyil 'byor byeb bya/ 'dang cings brgyad du byung ba sa// zam par sbe na// sang rgyad byas sa rgya
3b7(rnying rgyud): dang// slob kyi rgyagasasu// drugs kyi kyi lamo// sngags sajug thud// du byong gdugs na // bu mi dkyil ba ga la byigasas// sngags kyi nga grub kyi/ brgya gas su bajugs
4a1(rnying rgyud): las sngags// phrin las sngags ni 'khrul 'khor ldan// dmigs pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'o// sgra yi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// mchod dang bstod pa rab tu bya// gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dra// brtas
4a2(rnying rgyud): brjod dag ni rab tu bya// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por ni// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu bsgral// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bsnyen bsgrub las rnams kun rdzogs shing // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun sgrol te// phrin las
4a3(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub// dbus dang phyogs mtshams gru gsum dgu// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor drag po'o// dbus kyi gru gsum phyi rol du// zla gam gsum la sngags rnams kyi// 'khrul 'khor gzugs su ldan pa ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor/
4a4(rnying rgyud): rab ldan pa'o// mu khyad dkar po thod phreng ldan// lci ba'i dkyil 'khor skya yi'o// ser po gru bzhi yon tan rgyas// byang shar sgo khyud gru gsum du// brnag pa'i gzugs ldan drag po ste// sgo bzhi rigs kyi kha dog ldan// 'bar 'phrog tum rngams rgyan dang
4a5(rnying rgyud): ldan// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las ye shes lnga'i// gzhal yas lhun gyis grub pa'o// gnas der phyin ci log lha rnams// bsgral na dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// sku yi dkyil 'khor lte ba la// le tshe dgu ldan
4a6(rnying rgyud): dbus gru gsum// dbus su khro bdag yab yum ste// shar du b+hud+d+ha kI la ya// lhor ni ra tA kI la ya// nub tu pad+ma kI la ya// byang du karma kI la ya// sangs rgyas snyan sogs yum dang ldan// phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi rtsibs brgyad la// shar du rnam
4a7(rnying rgyud): par rgyal ba ste// lho ru gshin rje'i gshed po'o// nub tu khro bo rta mchog dpal// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o// shar lhor khro bo dbyug sngon can// lho nub mi g.yo mgon po'o// nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub pa// byang shar khams gsum rnam par rgyal/
4b1(rnying rgyud): mdun du rgyab mdzad// rgyab tu blo ba stobs pa ce// rang dang yum dang sprul par ba A// shar skor bu shad mgocan+yate// wA la na ru b+haka mno// nus sbyin bya mgacan te// byang du khwa yamag canan// lung na khyams na thams cad // shAngang /
4b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro mtshogs de bzhin dgod// sra yi dkyil 'khor de bskyed na// dartsal can rnams tshar gcod de// ma rungs srin po chags rnams dang // phyogs skyong dregs pa tshogs rnams ni// khro rtsa lnga gdan du rab tu cing // der ni lharnams stan drang te// /
4b3(rnying rgyud): gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhe sdang bad+mad 'dul khro rgyal mi bzang sku// zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs sgyid la thob// shar phyogs gru gsum sdug nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya/
4b4(rnying rgyud): gti mug bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad // mi shes rmongs pa'i dgra bgegs snying la chog/ lho phyogs gru gsum ser nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// dargyal bdud 'dral khro rgyal mi bzad pra// daN+Dal dregs
4b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgra bgegs snying la kyob// nu'i phyogs gru gsum dmar nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// 'dod chags bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad skya// 'dod chags zhen 'dzin can gyi snying la rgyob/ byang phyogs su
4b6(rnying rgyud): gsum ljang nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// phrin las 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrag dog bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad sru// phrag dog dregs pa'i dgra bgegs snying la rgyob// gnyis med khro rgyal skul ldan sbyor ba'i// khro mo'i sur ston
4b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung lnga'i bdag mo rnams// gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// phyogs skyong dregs pa tshar gcod gdug pa kun 'dul mdzad// phyogs bcu'i khro rtsal yang yum gshegs
5a1(rnying rgyud): su gsal// hU~M bskal pa'i ma ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// tshangs pa tshar gtsang kyi zlum ma 'dul// lhagadon drag po ma lus tshar gcod pa// hUM mdzad kyi chen gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i ma ltar dbang nga
5a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// me lha'i gdon tshogs kun 'dul zhing // bdud dang srin po rdul du rlog/ khro rgyal dbyug pa sngon po gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gshin rje'i gdon chags kun 'dul zhing //
5a3(rnying rgyud): gdon rnams rdul du rlog/ khro rgyal gshin rdo'i gshed po gshegs su gsol// bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba'i grong dkyil nus// srin po'i tshogs rnams 'dul mdzad cing // bar gcod bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// Sho la mi g.yo mgon po
5a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// klu yi gdon tshogs 'dul mdzad cing // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// khro ba'i rgyal po rta mgrin gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/
5a5(rnying rgyud): d+ha d+hA'i tshogs rnams 'doms mdzad cing // bar du gcod pa'i gdon rnams 'dral mdzad pa'i// khro d+hal gzhan gyis mi thub gshegs su gso// bskal ba'i me sbyar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gnod sbyin gdon tshogs 'joms mdzad cing // gtam ladzegs pa
5a6(rnying rgyud): 'joms mdzad pa// lo rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gshegs su gsol// bskal pade me ltar 'bar ba'i klor dkyil nas// 'byung po'i gdon gyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad cing // dbang ldan gdon gyi tshogs rnams tshar gcod pa// khro tshul khams gsum
5a7(rnying rgyud): dam rgyal gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i grong dkyil nas// sa bdag gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul mdzod cing // sa gdon drag po ma lus tshar gcod pa'o// khro ba'i rgyal pa stobs chen gshegs su gsol// rdo rgyal bu la gnyis med la ji
5b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i lung// mu 'byen pa stsogs nan srin mo // sprul pa mag bdun du thabs yang skal bcas// bar garjod bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'doms mang dpa// mra 'byin 'khor bcwas ma skus gshegs su bsnol// 'grags 'dan sdom 'chang 'babs pa las
5b2(rnying rgyud): mdza ma// phri men chen mo ye shes sgom bzhi// gnodag dug 'khor tshogs ma lus kun 'dul phyir// 'khor dang bcas pa ma sras gshegs su gsol// spyan drangs rgya yid dkyil 'khor rnams// so so las kyi sngags rnams dang // dza
5b3(rnying rgyud): kyis ni// gnyis med don du bstim pa yin// des ni bar chad tshogs rnams kyang // rtag tu 'joms par byed pa ste// khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs can des// bar gcod tshogs rnams rab tu btul// zhe sdang chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa'i tshogs
5b4(rnying rgyud): rnams sgrol bar byed// ye shes thugs kyi phur pa yis// phyin ci log rnams tshar gcod 'gyur// rnam rtog las byung bgegs rnams la// drag po'i phrin las khro bo yis// rtag tu 'dul bar bshad pa yin// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste gsum
5b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // phur pa'i rgyu tshad gzugs bstan pa// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams dang // gser sogs ser po zangs sogs dmar// lcags sogs nag po dug shing dang // tsher ma can la sogs pa la// mgo bo rgya mdung ring me rjid//
5b6(rnying rgyud): sked pa rgya mdud smad zur drug/ rtse mo zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla gam dang ni zur gsum rtse// shing gi rtse brgya mdud de// rtse mo'i ngos su so so'i dpal// ri rab lcang gzhog brgyad ldan brjid// sor bzhi sor brgyad sor bcu gnyis// sor ni bco bkyang dag tu bya//
5b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzhi rnam shes tshogs brgyang dang // skye mchod bcu gnyis khams bco brgyad// gnas su dag par bya phyir tshad// tshad dang ldan pas log lta sgrol// bsnyen phur grub phur gdab phur dang // mngags phur la sogs de bzhin no// byang chub seman gyi
6a1(rnying rgyud): rlu ba sanag // das dang ma pa na// nam na// sna nga ny-ing ban// rgyu chubs nags bal// dam na da r+dz+dza gtugs pas// nga na ba gas pas/
6a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'grub bar byed// gdag cing snang sams ldan pa rnams// nges par 'joms pa da mis bshad// de dag byin gyis brlab par bya// drugs rdzas kyi rtog pa skye// mu gsung thugs kyi ga yis// snga dgan rgyud gyis brlag// rgya tu da
6a3(rnying rgyud): lani// rigs k+Sha'i kA la ya bsgom bya// zla brgyad rgyam da steng 'og \u0f7f// khro bo brgya ni rab tu bsgom// logs gsum brgyal zung gA su ma hU~M// rnal khyor lag pa g.yas g.yon la// dpa' bod pa tshob tu bsgom bya// de yis phur bu blan brlabs nas// gdung
6a4(rnying rgyud): rnams sgrol bar byed// sa ma ya s+thA zhes pas ni// dmachog dag dang ldan par bya// badz+ra ar+tha la~M zhes pas// rdo rdo zil lo gyur ba yin// sar+b+ba rI hU~M nas pas// thugs kyi phur burab tu gyur// byin rlabs de dang ldan pas ni// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bzlog/ nga
6a5(rnying rgyud): po'i las kyi phur bu yis// rnam par rtog pa kun sgrol ma// rtse mo dag la ba gnas pa// byang chub sems kyi gnas men no// phung bye dag la dbang bskur ba// gra gul tshol chen dud pas brlag/ thang dkar bste ma shing dgas byug/ oM ma ku N+Da la pra tal /
6a6(rnying rgyud): ra ta dz+wa la b+h+rUM/ khro ba dri'i phyugs kyis zung dkar bstim// byin brla ba tshul bzhin byas nas kyang // sgra gsung thugs kyis dbang btur ba'i// ye shes thugs kyi phung ba des// nyon mongs drug lngang ba rgyas te// zhon pa sbyin ci log la brtas// gnod gdug skyeng sa ches
6a7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa rnams// bsngal me ga na laganag/ bcom ldan thugs kyi sprul pa ya~M// rdorgyal pogs jigs pa'i \u0f7f// ma mchogs rnams pa jam ba// la gzugs na mi // mdu sa thams cad mas la// 'bral pa ga cags can myo/
6b1(rnying rgyud): shes thugs kyi khro ba ste// sna tshogs gzugs su rab tu ston// de yis gdug pa kun btul nas// thams cad bde la bkod mdzad pa// ye shes thugs kyi khro bo yin// khro ba'i gzugs can phur bu yas// gnyis med don la rab tu ba
6b2(rnying rgyud): tru tA 'jigs pa'i ngang tshul can// gdul phyir khro bo chen po'i skur// bstan teng rgyal btsam pa yin// de phyir ye shes khro bo ni// gdug pa ma lus kun sgrol mdzad// byang chub sems kyi phur bu ni// rnam par rtog pa kun 'joms byed// spang ba
6b3(rnying rgyud): dbyibs dang ni// skur gsal byin brlab byas pa yis// rnam rtog sgrol bar rab tu bshad// phur bu'i chu dang gzugs dang tshod dang su dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// khyi rlabs phur 'di dag kyang // thugs kyi dkyil 'khar dag
6b4(rnying rgyud): dgod// mchod sogs las kyi chag bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor las de dag/ nal 'byor stabs dang ldan pas bya// stod ldan rab tu mi g.yo bus// sra gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ram// yang na 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dar// gsol gdab gnang sbyin ma ma
6b5(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang // yon 'bul ci rigs sdom pa sbyin// der ni phur bu'i dbang bsgyur bya// chu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang // dril bu ming dang rgyal po byin// dur khrod ches kyi dbang rnams dang // nad dang gsang ba'i dbang mchog byin// nyon mongs thams cad dag par byed// rnam
6b6(rnying rgyud): par rtog pa kun 'joms pa// dbang gi las kyis byed pa yin// dang po dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yang // ci rigs pa yis gsol gdab cing // gnang ba yang ni de bzhin bya// khro ba yig 'bru phyag mtshan gyi// 'phro 'dus par du gcad pa bsapa// skye dang
6b7(rnying rgyud): khyad par lhag pa yi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // A ra d+ha pu we A bI smai khaM/ zhes/ mi 'phangs sems kyis ci 'byor dbul// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa yi// sdom pa dag ni sbyin byas te// sku gsung thugs kyi yig 'bru yis// de yi lus ngag yid
7a1(rnying rgyud): gsum bab// dam na thud de sdom pa bsgrag/ drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rigs kyi bu khyod 'jug par byas// su dang khyad par lhag pa yi// dam chog gnyen las khyod ma 'da'// khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ngad// nga yis ci ltar
7a2(rnying rgyud): bsgo ba bzhin// bu khyod kyis kyang bya dgos so// dkyil 'khor gsang ba ma mthong zhing // gsang ba dam pa ma mthong la// gsang ba dam pa smra ma byed// khyod kyis sems can srog ma gcod// ma byin len pa rdzun la sogs// mi dge'i las ni spang bar
7a3(rnying rgyud): gyis// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lha// sman lnga snying po lnga la sogs// gyi yi chu dbang rab tu sbyin// sna tshogs rin chen bum pas bya// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi ldan pa'i// rang byung rang gi bum pas bya// yab yum gsang ba'i snying ngemaldan// rang byung
7a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bum pas bya// rin chen so so'i skur byung ba'o// debu rgyan rab tu bya ba yin// me tog phreng dang cod pan dang // rgyan dang go cha de bzhin gdugs// rin chen las byas rdo rje dang // tshad ldan dril bus de dbang 'askur// ming dang chu dang dam tshig gsum// rdo
7a5(rnying rgyud): bu'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje brtul zhugs skyabs sbyin gyis// slob dpon dbang ni rab tu sbyin// ngan song gnas ni dbang gis 'joms// drag po'i rdzas dbang gdug bsgrol// rnga dang zhing chen thod pa dang // he sta'i g.yab mo gling bu dang // / khrag zhag thal ba'i thig le dang /
7a6(rnying rgyud): me dang stag sbrul grang ljags kyis// dbang bskur bas ni gdug pa 'dul// bza' bca' bgo btung 'dod yon 'phel// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze'i rigs// rigs can bu mo mtshan ldan ma// bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad
7a7(rnying rgyud): lon// saM h+la ga pur yod pa yin// bu mo mtshan ni 'di dag ldan// shartsi dkar zhing so tshags dam// sgra ni lcang lo g.yas su 'khyil// mig ni dkyus ring ut+pal 'dra// sprin mtshams par ni ma chad cing // brtul thugs spyod pa spyod nus pa// yang na mtshan
7b1(rnying rgyud): ldan du man// ut+pal bzhin du sdesangs ma// rab bka y-inya bzhil// gzung thabs bzhini 'gyur byed cing // rtog mad snying rje chos pa dang // dgran gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// dngas grub rtags kyi phyag rgya las// gsang ba'i man dag de dbang
7b2(rnying rgyud): bad// drod ga su me dang ni ldan rgyas pa'o// dbang gang ma makyog zhan la byin// bde bas myos la baN+Dal bar 'gyur// ma ga dbang bzlar de bzhinaH// shes rab ye shes de'i bslang ba// mtshan ldan shes rab dag man// chog sa yis dab
7b3(rnying rgyud): ba ba dang brnyem pa 'thas dgalas// me tog pa ni ba d+haH// dge 'du mchog tu dga'abru dang // byadan dga' nga bzhin dga' ban// rdo rje bangs kyi byang byug ma// bgrod byad man ga dag gas // dang po dga' ba 'das sun//
7b4(rnying rgyud): ba brgya dag la// da lA ra gyur byas te// gzung dang bzlog pa bzhin bya// nyaM'aM cig stong drug brgyan// mu chod sum dru gnyis ldan byas// dbya bu 'ang drug rngurtsa ba'i yin// pra ma thun ni drug tu ban// chen po thun pa 'i ldan brgyad yin// dag
7b5(rnying rgyud): gnas su dbugs dang ni// then rtsod rje da rtsi byas te// de bzhin dga' ba'i dus su ni// thun tshod nu tshad de bzhin bslab// bde ba gang skyes gnas der ni// man gdug kyang deng bstan bya// skad cig dus dang rnam la// nyi dang mtshan du bayin slab// rlab sa
7b6(rnying rgyud): sogs de pazhin slab// dadon men dag bcas pa ni// shes rab dbang bskur rab tu bshad// bzhi pa'i dbang ni bskur bya ste// rlung gi rang bzhin de shes shing // bol gzhol gyur la// rang bzhin pa de bskor phan tshun 'byung // gzung du med de brjo dang med// rtog pa
7b7(rnying rgyud): ban da bral ba yi// rang bzhin 'odags pa der gnas pa// cig sogs dang gi rang bzhin byed// rtog pa'i gcags 'arnams par byed// dbang gsum 'bras bu yin na// dbang bzhi ba tu ldan pa yis// klur rdzogs gnas na gnas 'akra/
8a1(rnying rgyud): kyi rnam rtog sbyang ba dang // bag chags dri ma bkru ba'i phyir// dbang bskur rab tu sbyin pa yin// dam tshig med pa phal rnams la// dbang dag sbyin par mi bya'o// slob dpon slob ma shi ma dzag/ mnar med gnas su nges par
8a2(rnying rgyud): lhung // dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snod dang sbyar te de dbang bskur// dam tshig nyams par ma gyur na// lam rnams rab tu bgrod byed par// dbang mchog 'di yis byed pa yin// dbang bskur dam pa 'di yis ni// gnod gdug sgrol bar
8a3(rnying rgyud): nus pa yin// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / gzhan yang dam tshig bstan bya ba// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig dag/ rtag tu bsrung bar bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// rtse ba'i
8a4(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dag tu shes// mi spang ba dang dang du blang // shes dang bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni// yan lag dam tshig yin par bshad// dam rdzas dag la longs spyod cing // rtog med dpa' ba'i go gon pa// dam tshig dag tu ngas bshad do// dam tshig dag la rab gnas pas/
8a5(rnying rgyud): las rnams thams cad 'grub pa yin// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen po ni// las kyi bya ba kun byed pa// drag po'i rdzas rnams ldan pa la// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun 'dul bya// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// drag po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtsam// sa brtag
8a6(rnying rgyud): gzung byin gyis brlab// dang po brtags pa'i gnas chen der// sngags mkhan bya ba kun byas te// sta gon gnas pa'i bya ba byas// mchod dang sdom pa gzung ba dang // dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro bya// so shing srung skud ku sha sbyin// sems bskyed rjer
8a7(rnying rgyud): ni chos bshad bya// lha rnams mchod pas mnyes byas la// 'bru dang sman dang snying po dang // rin chen kha rgyan mgul tshangs can// dri med dag pa'i bum pa la// tshul bzhin du ni bsnyen pa bya// dkyil 'khor sbyang rdul thig gdab pa// srad bu lnga dang ldan pa yis/
8b1(rnying rgyud): thig ni rab tu gdab pa ste// lha dang gnyis med gnas pa'i thig/ mchod byas ya shes thig ni gdab// gnyis pa gzugs brnyan cig gdab bo// tshangs thig dang po gdabab ste// tshangs zig gnyis pa de bzhin gdang // de bzhin phyogs ma
8b2(rnying rgyud): gdab// cha brgyad de gses bcu drug na// cha phran drug tu rtsa bzhir gdab// dbus pa'i phyi rol bcu drug bskor// phyi rol sgo dang rgyan dubya// dkyil 'khor thig de btab nas kyang // thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin// bu gsum nyi shu gnyig tu ba
8b3(rnying rgyud): gsum ni le'u tshe'i dkyil 'khor bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lor ldan// sku gsung thugs 'dus dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dam pa'o// sngon po la sogs tshon rnams ni// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis brlab// gzhung dang mthun
8b4(rnying rgyud): drag po'i rdzas rnams rab tu gsog/ lU dum bcad 'phro dum bu dang // sgal rtsib klad pa khrag dang mgo// gru gsum mthing nag gtor mar bcas// dug sogs drag po'i rdzas rnams bsngags// mkha' 'gro'i rdzas dang bcas pa ji// bsags te mtsha
8b5(rnying rgyud): yin// gdug pa'i rdzas dang sngags kyis ni// gnod cing gdug pa bsgral bar bya// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor ni// dug dang gdug pa'i rdzas kyis bskor// smug nag gzugs kyang de nang gzhug/ drag po'i thun rdzas der bsag bya// zangs kyi
8b6(rnying rgyud): lcags phye dang // drag po'i las kyi phur pas ni// gdug pa thams cad stsol ba yin// 'jig rten khams na thams cad kun// khro bo chen por gyur pa ste// nyon mongs thams cad sgrol bar mdzad// sngags kyi 'od zer drag po ni// tsha tsha'i 'od zer ltar 'gro zhing // gdu
8b7(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad 'dul ba yin// sngags dang phyag rgya rang ldan pas// khro bo'i lus ni thams cad kyang // ye shes me dang bcas pa bsgom// gdug pa bskal phyir bshad pa yin// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud pas/ dam tshig dang thig rdzas kyi le'u ste drug
9a1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas kho bo rnam par thul pas bcom ldan 'das la 'diskad ces gso to// drug po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bzlas brjod pasam pa skar bgyi// 'acom ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsa ba//
9a2(rnying rgyud): mongs ga/ zhom pa'i phyir// su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// brnam pa bya ba'i dam ni// mtshan ma can dang mtshan med de// rnam rtog pag chags spyod pa'i byer// mtshan med pa zlas bting 'dzin te// rang gi lus kyi gnas rnams su// 'khor mo bzhin
9a3(rnying rgyud): gnas// bde chen 'khor lor gyur ba ni// rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas// yi ge 'ang de bzhin ldan pa'o// longs spyod na ni bcu drug ste// yi ge 'ong de bzhin gnas pa yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni// rtsa dang yi ge brgyad du gnas// sru
9a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi// yi ge 'ang de bzhin gnas pa'o// dbyangs dang gsapa byed pi ge ni// mtshan dang dpe byad ring bzhin te// 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas su bya// drag po'i las kyi sngags rnams kyang/ 'khor lo la ni rab tu dgod// 'a'am dang shes rang sbyor bar/ khod pa'i
9a5(rnying rgyud): de// 'khor po 'arim pa rnams su gnas// yi ge dag tu der gzhug cing // bde ba dag kyang da' buM 'byed// rnam par rtog pa kun myong ba'i// 'od zer dag kyang kun tu sro// 'khor lo bzhi la gnas dang tu// dga'ang ni dag tu gnas pa na// rnam par rtog pa @
9a6(rnying rgyud): thabs 'di dag gis byed pa yin// las kyi rlung ni srog tu bshad// sems can gzugs su byed pa yin// byed pa'i rlung ni gnyis yin te// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis so// d+ha ni rnam lngar shes par bya// khyab byed thur du sel ba dang // me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i drung // srog
9a7(rnying rgyud): da kyin du 'gro ba'i rlung // rgya zhes rab tu bshad pa yin// 'bras bu'i drung ni nim lnga ste// rgyu dang rnam par rgyu ba dang // yang dag rgyu dang rab ca rgya// de bzhin nges pa chu ba'o// rlung ni rgya po dag gis// las ni rnam par byed pa ni// byed pa'i nga rjes pa
9b1(rnying rgyud): bshad// rlung ni bcu pa 'di rnams kyis// 'khor la gnas ni thams cang du// byang chub sems kyi 'bab byed// bde ba'ang de bzhin der bskyed de// steng gi 'ab ba zhes ni grags// byang chub sems kyi phung du ni// A l-i kI 'i dag par byug/
9b2(rnying rgyud): des ni nyon mongs sgrib pa rnams// thams cad sreg par byed pa yin// spyi bo 'di chen 'khor lo ste// rtsa chen yi ge'i gnas su bshad// kI la'i yi ge der brjod do// rtsa bran kun nas 'od zer ni// byang chub sems kyi phur bu rgya// bde chen gnas su zhi bar
9b3(rnying rgyud): bya// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste// chen po gsum dang kI la'i sngags// rab tu rku bar bshad pa yin// rtsa ni 'od zer rgyu ste// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yin// mgrin pa'i gnas su longs spyod spel// snying gar chos kyi 'khor lo// / byar thang
9b4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi phung bun+d+ha// snying gar dag ni der rgyas nas// thams cad ma lus 'gugs par byed// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// chen po nas ni kI la rgya// phra mo nas ni 'od zer rgyu// byang chub sems kyi phung bu 'phro// gnas der thams cad 'phrul ba ya
9b5(rnying rgyud): ya'i sgra sgrogs shing // gnas de dag tu rab tu rgyu// gnyis med sbyor ba bde ba las// blos med chen po'i 'od zer gyis// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsreg/ byang chub sems kyi phur bu 'di// 'khor lo bzhil rab tu gnas// 'phro ba zung gis rab tu byed/
9b6(rnying rgyud): 'di stong nam mkha' lta bu ste// las dang nyon mongs rnam rtog dag/ byang chub sems kyi me sbar bas// 'og nus g.yo ba rlung gis bskyod// des kyang me ni rab tu 'bar// bo la kAk+ko la sbyar te// steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba yin// des pa skyed bde ba dag 'a
9b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi phur pa'o// des ni 'khor lo rnam rgyas pa// dga' ba rnams su rab tu bshad// g.yas na kI la ya rgyub// g.yon na bi g+h+nAM chu ba gnyis// byang chub sems kyi yig 'bru ste// mi rtag bskyed phyir rtsanas rgya// 'od zer byang sems su
10a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas dag tu// 'od zer kha dog so so yis// phrin las rnam bzhe ba tu byed// mi gnas snying ga mgrin pa dang // kI la ya dang bi Sh+pe sngags// phrin las so so'i las sngags sbyar// gnas bzhi ba
10a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'od zer gyis// dga' ba bzhi ni rab bskyed de// mtshan ma'i ting 'dzin la brten nas// mtshan med me rtog ye shes bskyed// mtshon mar bcas pa'i bzlas pa yang // dreg po'i las kyi sngags kyis so// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba
10a3(rnying rgyud): byed// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//
10a4(rnying rgyud): yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul gyis bsgral pa dang // lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod/ bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM pa~M hUM hU~M phaT/ hUM laM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba pa~Md+d+he ba~M hU~M hU~M \u0f7f/
10a5(rnying rgyud): oM ti ta bar NA bA li kI la la/ sarba dr-i dzI dr-i hU~M d+ha Ta/ b+hag wA na pa N+Da kI li sA la ya/ sab pa tI 'i na / zla thai ba br-i n+da kI li kA la la/ sarba bits+tshi naH/ thabs dang shes rab ldan phyir ro// sa~M m+b+ha du ma Ta la ya/ sarba ba~M t+ta hU~M /
10a6(rnying rgyud): hUM kA ra d+ha ya/ hU~M kA hU~M ya/ bi dza la a/ nI la daM Sh+Ta a/ ya mAN+Daka a/ Ad+ya a tsa lA a/ ha ya gI wa a/ a par dzi ta a/ a mai ta kud+ha li aM/ trai lo kyaM bi dza yA a/ nyon mongs bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// lha rnams sngags 'dis skye med bsgom/
10a7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub par gcod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa nalas// zung zhig kyo ba zhig rnam par chings// gtogs shig thogs dang bral bar gyis// ring bar khug la snang chug cig/ thong cag rnam par gzing bar kyis// nga yi dbang du gyur mas
10b1(rnying rgyud): kya// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// bar brtan/ 'di'is thams cad mgomananal// bdud ci 'khyil ba'i las sngags kyis// thams cad bdus slob ba yin// TI ston bla Ta/ mig yo mgon po'i las sngags kyis// thams cadam
10b2(rnying rgyud): lus bcing ba yin// ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ khams gsum rnam rgyal las sngags kyis// thams cad ma lus sgrol bar byed// b+hin d+ha b+hi nad+ha hUM phaT/ rta mchog dpal gyi las sngags kyis// thams cad ma lus 'dzin par byed// gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ rnam
10b3(rnying rgyud): par rgyal ba'i las sngags kyis// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms par byed// ha na ha na hUM phaT/ khro rgyal thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// drag po las kyi thun sngags 'byung // ha sa ya ra ha sa ya ra hUM phaT/ A we sha ya A we sha ya hUM phaT/ shI g+h+raM A nA ya hU~M
10b4(rnying rgyud): dz+wal pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta ShA ya hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha ya b+hin d+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags drug las kyi 'khor lo 'dis// ma rungs pa rnams rnam par sgro la// thams cad ma lus rdul du rlong // khro rgyal 'dus pa'i dmod mo yin// 'khor lo dag ni bskor bya zhing /
10b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i gnas su gas de bya yin// gdug pa sngags kyi 'od zer kyis// bsgrub bya dag ni sgrol bar byed// sngags kyi 'od zer bskul nas ni// lus kyi rtsa rnams thams cad du// 'od zer dag ni rgyas byas te// stong grogs byed la sogs pa dpral// gdug pa'i
10b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams kun sgrol te// 'khrul 'khor dag tu rab tu bzlas// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// khro bo rnam rgyal ting 'dzin gyis// gdug pa 'dul phyir
10b7(rnying rgyud): gzi byin bskyed/ ha na ha na badz+ra/ gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bsngal ba'i phyir// khro rgyal dbyug sngon nyid 'dzin gyis// gdus pa bsreg phyir sngags 'di brjod// da ha da ha badz+ra/ zhe sdang can rnams tshar gcad phyir// khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed po yis// thams
11a1(rnying rgyud): zad gas dpyi ga byin bskyed// bcab cabarda/ ye shes thugs kyi phra men ma// shAn kha'i sngags kyis ni/ byin brlabs gzi byin bskyed pa yin// mtham thab dza/ ye shes tshogs kyi phung ma'o// bsos pa nas
11a2(rnying rgyud): sngags dag gis// gzi byin dag ni bskyed pa yin// dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ dza ya ba~M dzA ya~M badz+ra/ ye shes khro bo chen po yis// sngags 'dis gdug pa sgrol bar byed// a ta a ba 'dzeta/ mA ras na pra mdza na ye hU~M Ta/
11a3(rnying rgyud): gzi byin dag ni rab bskyed nas// rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa yin// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klar pa tshal pa brgya ru los// nyon cig bgegs dang thog 'dren rnams// nga yi bka
11a4(rnying rgyud): las 'da' ma byed// bdag nyid chen mo'i sngags 'di yis// gdug pa thams cad sgrol bar byed// hUM ma ma pa she ku ru ma tang ta kar i na/ d+ha d+hi ma ma karma shrI b+h+r-i kA ra ya/ sngags 'dis dug gsum sgrol byed cing // drag po'i las rnams byed par 'gyur// gdug cing
11a5(rnying rgyud): sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am gnod sbyin bdud kyang rung // ngal bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// hUM mdzad stobs chen khro ba yis// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad bskal// sngags don 'di dag rab ldan pas// bsgrub bya thams
11a6(rnying rgyud): cad sgrol bar byed// mtshan bcas bzlas pa de bshad de// bsgrub bya rtag tu sgrol ba yin// mtshan bcas phyi yi bzlas pa ni// snying gnas ni spro bya zhing // 'od zer gyis ni khams gsum bsgral// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// zhe sdang can rnams bsgral bar bya//
11a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i' bar gcod thams cad kyang // sngags kyi 'od zer drag pos bskal// gsang ba'i gnas nas spro bar bya// bsgrub bya dag ni der bskal te// nga rgyal bcas pa bcom nas kyang // ye shes phur ba'i 'od zer ni// bar mtshams med par bskor ba yin/
11b1(rnying rgyud): sngags bya 'ad ba de bas na// bsngal phying gakha sa drug kyang gtsung // las dang rtan mangs thams cad la// 'khrul 'a kho gtsang pas la lar ma bshad// de yis gdug pa can nor ste// lab nithams cad 'grub pa yang / pa byed pa
11b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung // me gas thugs kyi bud bulas// byang chub sems kyi nga nag// shan mangs thams cad bsreg par brnyem// khro ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis// gdug pa sngags kyis sgrags shing // zhe sdang dartsal la sogs 'dabs//
11b3(rnying rgyud): chen pos khams gsum sprul// sprul pa po nya bka' nyan gyis// de yi sdig sgrib sbyangs te bsgral// bzlas pa gnyis kyis las kun 'grub// de ltar thugs rjes bsrub bu bsgral/ phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ bskyed rdzogs mtshan bcas mtshan med
11b4(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa 'khor lo'i le'u ste 'dun pa'o// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bgegs dang log 'dren par gcod sogs// bsad cing 'ardeg sogs thabs gang lags// rdzas ni gang dang gang gis bgyi// rnam pa
11b5(rnying rgyud): bas de skad gsal// de skad gsol gas na bka' stsal ba// dngos grub par gcod byed la sags// bsad cing bcing ba'i las tshogs ni// sngags dang rdzas dang ldan par bya// ye shes thugs kyi phung bu yis// drag pa'i rdzogs nib tha bar bya// tshon
11b6(rnying rgyud): dra lngas mgo rkang bcing // ye shes thugs kyi bur bu dang // dug dang rdzas su bcas pa ni// btab pas thams nad gsod par 'gyur// bzlas pa gsum dang ldan pas ni// bar brtsong thams cad sbal bar byed// drag po'i las kyi thun btab na// daslang bya
11b7(rnying rgyud): dge ne 'chi bar 'gyur// sdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// thun btab bsreg pa'i las ni bya// las kyi sngags ni thams cad kyis// bar gtsad lag lha thams cad pa spel// pheM nya'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// b.rag cid thams cad cang tu 'ahral/
12a1(rnying rgyud): las kyi ma pa byab sa// rkyen srog dag ni barbaH// thams cad ma lus ni bya myo/ shin tu 'don dkar la 'tshod// zhi ba'i thab khung de byas te// khrag khrod cad duH// 'bras thaga'o thag da
12a2(rnying rgyud): gsum dang// mang dgas mdang nI ba ldan te// zhi ba'i rjes ni masras pasag/ me tog dka po tis dka dang // bzas chen ti 'i sogs dngul gyibs// / bsreg shing sngagang tshang rgyas te// yab shing mtho gang song bya//
12a3(rnying rgyud): nr-ishrI madri yis byug/ rilas lci ba'i myewA ne// sran pa kha dog dkar po ni// 'od zer dkar po'i phyi ma tshul lo// daskyes dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// bgrang phreng dril ba phyag na bsdams// nyi nu sa thams cad kyi mdzad pa// me lcags
12a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom ldan drangs la// pasgrims tezhal bsil bsreg zug bdun// phul teg pa dod zhi bar badz+ral// oM a k+Sha ye te b+h+yag bya/ latsun la kyi swA ng+ge/ de nas gtso bo ba sum dang // phyogs kyi khro bos rnams la// tshig song bzhi rdzogs pa
12a5(rnying rgyud): dang // bcwa rtsa brgyad kyis bsreg zug dbul// khyu bo bu po pAb yum la// brgya rtsa brgyad ni dbul bar bya// phra man sprul ba'i tshogs la bdun// ni rkyong la yang bdun 'phralaH// sa so'i sngags kyi gsham dag pa// 'ang zhu
12a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i gyur cig/ shAn+ti~M ku rba swA d+ha/ de bus bdug pa tshogs rnams ni// thams cadam lus zhi bar 'gyur// rgyas pa'i phas kyis sbyin phrag ni// gas na'i thab khrang khuda'i tshad// banos ta phyi rol gru bzhin bu// sreg shing bung shing khra da'i tshor/
12a7(rnying rgyud): matogs pargya dkar dang // ma dang sbeng ci Ti ma gsang// 'bras dang ngo brag la dogs te// rgyas pa'i tharnams sa so bam-in// rigs ma lha'i phre babyed de// sran pa 'don pa \u0f7f/ nga bzugs bca brgyad// dbya
12b1(rnying rgyud): gdanal bzhugs// bkrung brang dang ni sti blag 'don// ci 'dod dngos po rgyas mdzad pa'i// me lha gsal ba rnams spyan drangs la// bstims ta zhal bsil 'phrag zu 'bul// hral ta gang 'dod rgyas par btsal// a ya?pa? yaha bya ka b+ha/ ba han pa da/
12b2(rnying rgyud): dan+ya swA hA/ dang po gtso bo yab yum la// de 'og rigs lnga'i kI la ya// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsreg blug 'bul// khro bo khro mo nyi shu la// bsreg thug nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bul// phra men sprul pa sgo skyong dang // sras mchog dag pa bdun bdun 'bu
12b3(rnying rgyud): so so'i sngags kyi gshum dag la// 'di zhes bya ba rgyas gyur cig/ puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ tshe dang bsod nams la sogs te// gang 'dod thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// dbang gi las kyi sbyin sreg ni// kha dog dmar po'i sa gzhil// khu dong ma thu bzhi grag mar do//
12b4(rnying rgyud): phyi rol rgyar yang de bzhin bya// phyi rol kha dog nag po la// phyag rgya bzhi yis mtshan par bri// kha dog dmar po'i shing rnams la// zla gam khru do khru bzhi brtsig/ bud shing yam shing de bzhin no// 'bras thug 'o thug dmar por bya// me tog dmar po yungs mang dang /
12b5(rnying rgyud): sbyang ba'i bsreg rdzas rab tu 'bul// raM las me lha dmar por bskyed// spyan drangs bstims te zhal bsil la// sreg zug bdun phul dbang las bcol// oM ag+na ye hA bya ka bya dI bya di bya ye/ che ge mo bshang ku ru swA hA/ dang po dkon mchog gsum la mchod/
12b6(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba yab yum rigs lnga yi// kI lA ya la brgya rtsa brgyad// khro bo yab yum nyi shu brgyad// phra men sgo ba sras mchog la// bsreg zug bdun ni dbul bar bya// so so'i sngags kyi gsham dag la// 'di zhes bya ba dbang du sbas// bshang ku ru swA hA/ gang la bya
12b7(rnying rgyud): ba dang / du 'gyur// drag po'i las kyi sbyin sreg ni// sa gzhi kha dog nag po la// gu gsum khru gang thur du brko// phyi rol khru dong ma khru drug tshad// mdung dang ral gri dgra sta dang // mda' gzhu de bzhin mtshon gyis bskor// phyi rol brod pa me ri bri// shin tu gdug
13a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang rnams pa/ zhwagang grags pa byasas // da zhan mas shing la stsogs pas// byung rgyachags rgyu dang // ngasas m+b+ha nags// zag stan su // dug gis tog sa tshogs dang // ma gas
13a2(rnying rgyud): snardzogs dang // ti la nag zung rnag pa'i 'bru// raM las me nas pa skyed/ spyan sa kyim gling nas sil la// bkrag zug brgyan cul mngon spyod bco'o// oM a.A ya~M ta byes byas tan yi byed kyi cig so sa li phun+ta/ tsA pa ya bA rmA sa gas /
13a3(rnying rgyud): Am la la brgyam brgyad// zhwa ba b+hU te grag cig/ tha seMn pa'i tshogs rnams dang // sras cho ga tshogs la bdun pa / sa so'i dgas rdzog sham dgal// brdeg pa 'di lan mAr ya// brtsod nga sbyin sreg bcol ba bya// d+hag d+hang rdo rje 'dor
13a4(rnying rgyud): bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni bu 'byams kun/ khros pas lung byas padag par mdza // bdag par mthu ga yang meng // chags de'i rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni bu 'byams sun// chags pas srung la dbang mdzad de/ dbang
13a5(rnying rgyud): ma sbyar gang yang med// ngargyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// dpal dang ga zi brjid rtsen po rnams// yung tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzad// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams 'dir rab 'byams kun/
13a6(rnying rgyud): rlung tsam gyis ni ni mdzad de// zhi mdza grub la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas thag zang drim pa med// bran gyi dkyipa 'kho rjes mtshan// zhing ri byed zla chos 'dzin// rgyas pa nyid jog// dbang la bad mang pos mtshan// zhi brje rigs kyi
13a7(rnying rgyud): rgya bu sa/ du 'i / ni'i shin / sa/
13b1(rnying rgyud): yas gad// kyis da na gyis na// rnams nadapang sum sbyab // dngas na da/ bya cig rgyapa 'o// na dunam ra/ dadu /
13b2(rnying rgyud): nga bang dru bsra pa skyer/ dang gi phyi theg pa pa yin// gdidag tsug ba ga cad la/ 'i sbyin sre rta// 'am brjes pas rnangs pa tugs 'jug bzhin pas
13b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i le brgyad pado// / de nas yang dag pa shad byug/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs na// mas de dag kyang// da gsu ma dran pams
13b4(rnying rgyud): ga sas te// rbaba'i gdan pa rab tu bzhugs// grag sus gnas ni thams cad du// de gA'i bu ni rang du byed// tshogs de sa kya rigs pa'i ga rnags/ dag pa ngas mas na// rang da'i rten pa mdzas
13b5(rnying rgyud): kyi phung bu ni// gsa' banyid 'od zer tshul bzhin sngo// dgug gzhug la sogs sngags rnams kyis// bsla bya dag la las rdzogs bya// gsal ba gsum dang lda pa ring // ti 'dzi pa sgoms te ga dab par bya// de rdegasal ba 'gro// rI la mi sngags
13b6(rnying rgyud): bzlas nas// zhe sdang su ni ga srel gdang bya// kI la la stsogs sngags dang ni// lo N+Dal sngags dang bcas das ni// srugs par sgoms te khrus lung bya// skye chur khrus kyis rab dag nas// ga'i byin pa byed dag dpe rje ra mdza ye i dza te/ u
13b7(rnying rgyud): ta / sa ma sa // se ba la su sa/ sa sa sang / rnas sa /
14a1(rnying rgyud): la a ga tu/ sa cang blagatam ma/ 'adz+ras rnal san na/ bdag gis sgra gsung thugs thopa nas// bsgrub bya'i byung mar ga dgag bya// gnas bcud dag tu phur bra ga dang / drang ba'i don ni gcang pa'i phyir/
14a2(rnying rgyud): rabi D+han mgo re la// de bzhin tshogs rnams thams cad dran// gsal bar bsgoms la mnan te bsdams// rnam shes rten ni rtsed gcad byer// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas gdab par bya// d+hIn+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ snying la btab ste kun gzhi'i rten// dag bar bya
14a3(rnying rgyud): te bskal pa'o// khams gsum rnam rgyal sngags kyis che// dpung mgo gnyis su gdab par bya// zhe sdang rnam par dag phyir ro// hrIn+da b+hin hUM phaT/ dz+ha mchog dpal gyi dbyi gnyis la// gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ rnam par rgyal ba gsang bar gdab// skye rgyan da
14a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu gcod// han han thu phaT/ me g.yo mgon bas mchogs mang gdab// ban d+ha ban ta hU~M phaT/ brlab bya ba skal phyir rnam shes rten// byang rgya sgo ni dgag phyir gdab// han ta na badz+ra/ dahang ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra// su ru lu
14a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ dza ye bi da ye/ a dzi te/ a pa ra dzi te/ mig gnyis rna ba gnyis dang ni/ sna bug gnyis dang lce la gdab// mgrin pa snying ga khrag sbal dang // nyon mongs yid la rab tu gdab// gardza gadza ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ 'du zag
14a6(rnying rgyud): gcad phyir skye bor gdab// s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/ rten phur dbyung phyir mthil ba'o// gdab pa kun gyi gong du ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul dbrog phyir gdab// nyon mongs mnar ba'i sems can dag/ 'khor ba'i gnas nas drang ba'i phyir// rdorje phur bus dang
14a7(rnying rgyud): tu gdab// ngan song rgya ni nges tshar bcad// rgya mdung gnyis dang logs brgyad dang // dpal dang bcas pa'i 'od zer gyis// ngan song gsum ni der sbyang byed// phur bu'i 'od zer chen po des// bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub bya// sngags kyi 'od zer drag po
14b1(rnying rgyud): smos pas gzhan gyi sdig pa 'joms// bsdus pas bdag gi sdig pa 'joms// phur bu'i 'od zer de bsgoms shing // rnam rtog thams cad des grol byed// drag pa'i las ni thams cad kyang // snyid rjes zin pa'i zhe sdang gis/
14b2(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs gnas su dag byas bskal// thugs kar bzlas pa'i 'khor las bzla// sku gsung thugs su rab bzlas shing // bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub bya// sngags drug las kyi 'khor lo yis// gzas pa skad cig gcig gis sbal// phur bu'i
14b3(rnying rgyud): 'od zer char gyis ni// bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub bya// mkha' 'gro'i las kyi sngags kyis ni// nyon mongs gcod gdug tshar gcad bya// rdo rje 'khor langal gri dang // rgyagram dbug to mtshan tshe'i char// babs la mkhas pas gdug pa stsol// thugs
14b4(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// sngags kyi 'od zer drag po yis// ngan song gsum la sogs pa bskal// rtse med nam dga' ma la dgod// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu yis// rnam rtag mor gcod gnyis med dgang // yi ge 'bru lnga dazer
14b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud lnga'i las kyi sgo bkag nas// rnam shes hU~M du gsal gyur te// nyon mongs las kyi phung po dag/ rnam rtog thams cad rgyas pas ni// las dang nyon mongs des byas pas// sdug bsngal phung po sred len grangs// rnam rtog las las byung ba yi// srid pa'i phung
14b6(rnying rgyud): par rten bcas nas// ma rig 'du byed rnam shes chags// ming gzugs reg tshor rga shi'i lam// ngan song sdug bsngal des spyad phyir// lan chags dag gzhing sdig pa bshags// shes pa rten pastim sems bskyed skyabs// so so'i khro rgyal chen po dang // sprul pa'i/
14b7(rnying rgyud): yonya yig 'bru dang // 'od zer khro mo bum chu a yis bkrus// 'dod yon lnga yis tshim byas shing // khyad par sems bskyed dam tshig dpa'// rigs kyi lhar brtag de bskal lo// de dag srung phyir las kyi rgyud// nga yis nges par rab tu bshad// sems kyi phur bu thebs
15a1(rnying rgyud): pan// khams gsum bskal zhes 'ad// TI brtsa gtsug gyung // rnas nas dag rang ba nal/ da ma 'thor byar 'gru namangs byung po dag pa la// phu pa gad nga ci lta gas pa dag pa// khro lnga nying 'don
15a2(rnying rgyud): gsal bas ni// phung po lta gas la rnam shes sems// mi rtag na kyi lam la gau// gnyis mid don gyi rang bzhin la// dgod pa nyid du byab ste/ stong tang ngan la rab gnas pa// sdig pa thams cad de bcom te// byang chub sems kyi skur pa yin
15a3(rnying rgyud): khams gsum yang dag bskal// phur bu'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gros// de don rtogs na thebs pa yin// lus sems bral na 'khyams pa yin// phung po nga ri la bskangs byas la// de nas ye shes bum chus bkru// shes pa dag la chags pa yi// sngon gyi la
15a4(rnying rgyud): chags gang yod dang // log sung dag la lan chags bkar// bden pa'i bkar ba sgo drag pos bslad // sil bur byas te dkyil 'khor dgod// snying ni dbus su dgod par bya// mgo ni shar la glob lho// mtshan pa nub ste mkhal ma byang // mcher pa shar snyed bkad na
15a5(rnying rgyud): kyang // gtso bo yab yum rigs lnga yi// kI la ya lnga rim gyis dgod// mig gnyis shar dang shar lhor dgod// rna ba lho dang lha nub tu// lce ni nub du sna bug byang // mgrin pa byang du dgod par bya// byang shar lhan snga gsang ba'o// klad pa steng du dgod par bya/
15a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi sog pa shar du sti// dpung pa shar lho lag dar lho// g.yon gyi sog pa lho nub ste// dpung pa nub tu dgod par bya// lag nga nub byang dag tu'o// dpyi g.yas byang ste brla byang shar// rjengang 'og gi phyogs su ste// rkang g.yon pad+ma dang rje dar sted// dpyini shwa
15a7(rnying rgyud): lha'i mtshams su dgod// namatshong shar spad g.yas g.yon gyib// lho dang lho nub slad du dgod// brang chub nu ma gapas g.yon dang // tshang nga mjug tha byang shar 'god// lag mthil rkang mthil rje myar nga// ci rigs don gyis la sbyar// dgrag pa'i las kyang de bzhin
15b1(rnying rgyud): g+ha gyon po'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems can don na bya ba yin// de don rtogs na thebs pa yin// de lta'i las chad phrin las mchog/ phur bu phrin las kyi rgyud las/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phur bu gdab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa / de nas phur bu gsung
15b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// dmar nag le'u tshe'i dkyil 'khor la// drag po las kyi lha rnams dgod// dbus su rdo rje rtse dras ste// rdo rje'i nye khad kI la ya'i// sngags ni rab tu bsgrims te bri// phyogs bzhi'i ra ni bzhi rnams la// rigs bzhi kI la ya rnams kyi// snying po dag
15b3(rnying rgyud): kyang rab tu bri// so so'i le'u tshe dag la ni// drag po las kyi sngags rnams bri// mu khyud oM li sngags kyis bskor// pa ra bi d+h+wan sngags rnams ni// ha nad ha'i sngags bcas pa// le che dag la rab tu bri// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// ma mo'i sngags
15b4(rnying rgyud): ni bri bar bya// 'gugs byed sngags ni thams cad kyang // phyi rol mtshams su bri bar bya// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de bris la// der ni bzlas pa 'bad de brtsam// 'khrul 'khor gsang bar bzlas pa dang // sku gsung thugs su bzlas pa'o//
15b5(rnying rgyud): rol bzlas pa de byas pas// ma rungs pa rnams sgrol bar byed// drag po'i sngags ni bzlas pa yis// bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams 'grub// sgo dang brtsa ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de dbus kyi// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rtsa sngags la/
15b6(rnying rgyud): rtags mtshan ma byung bar du bzla// phyogs kyi kI la ya rnams kyi// sngags kyang de bzhin dran par bya// sngags de dag gi 'phro 'du yis// las dang nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// bsgrub bya'i lus la 'od zer 'phro// de yi sleb pa skyong bar byed// drag
15b7(rnying rgyud): po'i sngags dang las rnams ni// nyin mtshan du ni spro bar bya// gtso bo'i sku ru gsal byas te// spyi bo ljags dang snying ga nas// spros te g.yas rgyu g.yon rgyu dang // 'khor bar rgyu dang phra mor rgya// phur bu'i gzugs sogs yig 'bru spro// bcud bsdu
16a1(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru'i tshul du ban+d+ha// lus kyi 'khor ba'i gnas rnams su// yig 'bru phur bud spyo// sbyin sreg bzhi yang der bsgrub ste// mchod sprin bzhi yang der bsgrub bya// dgang gzar thugs gapar spang ba pas// gas/
16a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas su sbyin bsreg bya// der ni mchod pa bya ba ste// mchod pa gsum du shes par bya// gnas gsum dag tu mchod pa yis// nyon mongs rnam rtog pasreg bya'i phyir// khro rgyal rnams ni rtag tu mchod/ khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis//
16a3(rnying rgyud): ma rungs tshogs ni kun 'dul byed// thabs dang shes rab spyor byed cing // sprul ba'i mgo brnyan mang po 'gyed// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma pho nyer bcas// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad la// nyin dung mtshan du las byed 'gyur// 'od zer kun
16a4(rnying rgyud): nga // las dang nyon mongs thams cad bsreg/ 'jig ton kha mas ni thams cad du// khro bo sgrub pa phraman bcas// de pes thams cad khengs gyur te// mtshan chas tshogs rab tu 'gro// des ni gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun// skad rtseg yod kyis 'a
16a5(rnying rgyud): par mdzad// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor der bkod bya// mtshan bcas mtshan med bzlas pa bya// gnyis su bsgred dang gnyis med bstim/ bzlas brjod dbul zhing dngos grubablang // sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis// dngos
16a6(rnying rgyud): grub dag ni rab tu bsrub// bzlas pa'i drod tshad ldan pa yis// rgyud drug gnas nas drag pos bskal// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// nyon mongs dag ni rab tu bskal// las dang nyon mongs thams cad ni// thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis// ma lus par
16a7(rnying rgyud): bsreg par mdzad// ye shes me ni phyogs bcur 'gro// khro rgyal 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis/ stong nyid don la 'god par mdzad// ye shes me yis nyon mongs bsreg/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// ye shes me yis bsreg par 'gyur/
16b1(rnying rgyud): rtse ba'i skalas 'od cir 'gro// gsung gi 'od bar dadabang bsrung // ye shas thugs kyi byur bu yis// lus dang ldan mongs thams cad 'doms// byang chub sems kyi phung ba yis// gnyis med don la da bsgom bya// lus kyi gnas ni thams cad du/
16b2(rnying rgyud): zhen kyis panagatsa/ tugs nig/ shad nga sa / slong rdzu dzin dang// khrig nas sum byag/ gan shi pa na na/ pi byu byu pa nga/
16b3(rnying rgyud): de dag ni// las kyi sngags rnams der bkod cing // gnas der las rnams thams cad byed// shes rab thabs kyis srul byed cing // brda' yang de bzhin bskul ba yin// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ts+tshe hi/ rA ga yA mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a nu gA Na pA
16b4(rnying rgyud): rA we At+ma ko&haM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI dI ba ya ti hU~M phaT/ badz+ra sU ka ra mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra i Shu sa mu/ tri hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dzA ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi lA s+ya da~M hU~M phaT/ badz+ra pu k+Sha mu Sha hU~M/ badz+ra
16b5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha nI la da tratra~M/ da had ha hU~M phaT/ A~M badz+ra kro tAn+da dA nAM/ A~M tsa ma ra mu kha hUM/ oM badz+radz+ri N+Da muSh+NI trAM/ A bAd+d+ha kro t+ta ya man+ta ka hU~M/ patsa ba tsa hU~M phaT/ A~M badz+ra kro d+hi shwA sha na bat+ti hU~M/ A~M badz+ra ha da~M Na mu la N+ye/ A~M badz+ra u lu ka k+Shu Sh+T+rIn+tu/ A dz+dza
16b6(rnying rgyud): kr-id+ha ma gyim rje / bar rtab rgya / du klo mus ldan/ da na su ste/ 'dzub kagan m-i n+te/ bdag d+hUtu la gyis te/ thas sas Ta/ ba ti ba brjel rgya 'a/ slob ba d+d+he/ slobadz+ra thasnyas pa
16b7(rnying rgyud): minan ma ngasadas / ngas su gro khri // sa banga'i ha ba kyi/ ba du
17a1(rnying rgyud): ba m+b+hahA/ / na/ ma tha/ na tus na rgya
17a2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra maSh+NI Ni mu khA hUM/ oM badz+re d+hi ba~M rtsu ba hU~M/ A bad+d+he ma mr-i Sh+Ta ky-i ShaT+wA~M/ oM \u0f7fdz+nyA mA d+ha m+b+ha ba n+de/ badz+ra kI li k+She ma na ba hU~M ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ \u0f7fhU~M ba ho/ a u hrI ne hriH/ drug sum byed dam bskul cing // 'bud kyi sngags kyang de ba dang
17a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dar ni de zlas pas// bzla 'a bya'i tshogs rnams grol bar byed// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de bzhin yang // ring rang sti rnams gdan du bting // phung ba rtsen las kyi gud 'i ma/ gsung gi dkyi 'khor kyi le Ta b+ha banupa 'o// rdo
17a4(rnying rgyud): las rnams ni// drag po las kyi sngags kyis byed// sngags kyi tshogs ni thams cad kyang // A li kA li dag las byung // lha rnams so so'i snying po ni// sngags de dga' sa rab tu byung // dbyangs kyi yi ge bsrung la// ming yig se tshan lnga yis brgyan
17a5(rnying rgyud): sa pa gas // / /
17a6(rnying rgyud): dang po la// dbyangs kyi lage bzhings brgyan// man+ta lA yi gsum pa dang // aN+DaH/ yi nga ba'o// u Na mi gsum pa dang // aN+Da mA li gnyis pa la// sde tshan lnga yi gsum pas brgyan// wA pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gni gas
17a7(rnying rgyud): pa brtsan// rje tsan dang po' bzhibs mdzes// can zhi ba'i thang la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas brgyan// snga can bzhi pa'i sngabs btsun// rje tshan rtsa pa'i gsum pa la// rje man lnga pa'i sngangs brgyan// u.A N+Dal bzhi pa la// dkyis
17b1(rnying rgyud): sa na su san/ rna sa// smras
17b2(rnying rgyud): 'am/ mi nga la/ / gdum papas man/ 'di // na la/ ma ga gas
17b3(rnying rgyud): sa / sa / sa
17b4(rnying rgyud): sa ga / / ga
17b5(rnying rgyud): sa/ na
17b6(rnying rgyud): kyil mas / man la/ rgyas sa yu/ / /
18a1(rnying rgyud): gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// aHwA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+ta s+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mthas// snga tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la/
18a2(rnying rgyud): sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mdzes// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa dang // an+ta sA yi dang po'o// uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lta pas brgyan// uT Na yi
18a3(rnying rgyud): ba la// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni// nyis 'gyur dag tu bya ba yin// uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// skye tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos brgyan// dbyangs
18a4(rnying rgyud): yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// ar+haska yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes/
18a5(rnying rgyud): tshan pazhipa'i banapa la// dbyus kyi loge bzhings brgyan// mati yi gsum la// dbyangs kyi yig gcis par rdzan// ut+paN le gsum dul// yaHA ya dang po gyur// dang po yin dang ngol// dbyangs kyi lag gsum pas mdza/
18a6(rnying rgyud): Na li bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lji bas brgyan// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu ga sum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i ldabs brgyan// lnga pa la ni gsum pa dang // sde tsha ni gnyis pa'i gsum ngal// ar+has+dza yi gnyis
18a7(rnying rgyud): pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// ar+d+hawA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa'o// an+ta s+tha yi dang po dang // sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pa
18b1(rnying rgyud): la// rdzun mnapa dang pos brtan// rdza man da ba 'a sa'o// u N+Dal bzhang la// dbyangs thalag drug pas mdzes// sngaman lngaba' thabs brgyan// thAHna lngapa 'dang po dang // ldan na nyas pa drang ban// de dag tam 'brang dag can/
18b2(rnying rgyud): sud+d+ha Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i ldabs brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa da /
18b3(rnying rgyud): sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+ta sA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// Ut+pa Na yi dang po la//
18b4(rnying rgyud): sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// uSh+Ta Na yi dang po dang // sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa nyid// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas mdzes// ut+pa Na yi bzhi pa la/ dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas mdzes// sde tshan
18b5(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// // dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// ar+d+ha sA yi gnyis pas brgyad// dang po yi nI dang po la// ar+d+ha lA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyang
18b6(rnying rgyud): kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa'o// dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po dang // sde tshad lnga pa'i dang po dang // an+tawA yi gnyis pa la// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas mdzes// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni gsum pas
18b7(rnying rgyud): brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po'i// Ut+pa Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gis ni gsum pas mdzes// Ut+pa Na mi gnyis pa la// sde tsha
19a1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsa// gsum pa'i gnyis pas btsun// ded ga nyis 'gyur dag tu'o// usa? Na li bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde man lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // tre tron gsum pa'i dngad pos mngos// dbyangs kyi yed bcu gsum la// sde tsan lnga pa' ldabs bdun//
19a2(rnying rgyud): pa yi ni gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// at+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// uSh+mA Na yi gsum pa dang // sde tshan lnga pa'i gas
19a3(rnying rgyud): pa la// aT+TAs+tha yi dang pos brgyan// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas mdzes// at+ta wA yi dang po dang // sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ga gsum pas mdzes// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyang la yig gi ni drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga nga'i lngabs brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge btu gas ma la/
19a4(rnying rgyud): tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po yi// ar+thas+tha yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa'o//
19a5(rnying rgyud): sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// an+ta sA yi gnyis pa dang // dbyangs yig bcu gnyis pa yis mdzes// an+ta s+tha yi gsum pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde chen dang po'i dang po la// an+ta s+tha yi dang pos brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum
19a6(rnying rgyud): le// dbyangs kyi 'i gre gsum pas brgyan// sde tshon gnyis pa'i gsum pa dang // at+ma/ yi dang pang // uHNa le bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas mangs// sde chen lnga da'i lnga bas btsun// sngo man lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // sde na bzhi par
19a7(rnying rgyud): la// bzhi 'i ni bzhi pas brgyan// de dag nyis 'gyur dag bya// ut+paN+Da 'i bzhi pa la// dbyings kyi migadrug pas mdzes// hUM can lnga pa'i rdzabs brgyad// rje tsan lnga pa'i dang po dang // tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// dbyangs kyi yi geng
19b1(rnying rgyud): na sun dang na sa/ kun pag saso// s+ho// kun sa smra gyu// nas
19b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma sa sa sa /
19b3(rnying rgyud): dbyas kyi mi ge brgya ba rnam pa// rdza n+da pa'i skams brgyan// sA pa la na gagras pa dang / na nyis padugasapa la// a Sh+tsa sa gnyis pam pan pa da dam/ saH pa nyi sa ma // dbye kyi brgyagasam pa las
19b4(rnying rgyud): dzin sheb dzin pa// rjeg rje ba'ijib // ma na dul// dang mi lag sa sas// 'ang ba 'i sa padang/ smin mi rig she mi/ ga dgrangs
19b5(rnying rgyud): rdza ba'i sapas brnyan// rgyun mal gsum bu'i// na nga'i gnyis byas brten// byangs myig bcugasas pa 'i sem sa/ chen zhem pa paM ba~Mni/ de ga te rgya dag ci// tsu dam// chu kyi mig
19b6(rnying rgyud): dus sa da sa
19b7(rnying rgyud): sa/ / sun du sa/ sa/
20a1(rnying rgyud): log d+hag kyis mangs/ can lnga pa'i sgru la// sgrubs na zhubs brtan// uSh+Ta la bzhos la// dbyang sa kyi lo ga rnag pa brgyan// rnam sa 'an pa na// gabadun papa nas s+ho//
20a2(rnying rgyud): sngags dang las sngags bcas// de dag rim par rabatu pa yin// / dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// ar+d+ha s+thA yi gsum pa la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// At+mA Na pi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas
20a3(rnying rgyud): brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// ar+ham+b+ha yi gsum pa la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// A.a Na yi gsum pa la// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang pos brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga par ldan// sde tshan lnga pa'i bzhi pa dang // sde can pa zhi nga'i lnga pa'i/
20a4(rnying rgyud): tshan lnga pa'i lnga par ldan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yi sa brgyan// uSh+ma Na yi bzhi ba dang // sde tshan dang po'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pas brgyan// rje tshan bzhi de'i dang po dang // ar+tha s+tha yi dang po'o// sde chen lnga pa'i bzhi
20a5(rnying rgyud): na na sa / nas // gas pa dgags// ba 'du// 'dun
20a6(rnying rgyud): ldan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa yang // sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum par ldan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gsum pa la// an+ta s+tha yi dang pos brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas/
20a7(rnying rgyud): mdzes// ma ni gnyis pa'i dang pa la// gnyis pa 'i ni gnyis pas brtson// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mngos// tshon pa zhi ba'i ljang la// bzhib yi ni bzhings brgyan// de gnyis 'gyur dag tug// uSh+ma li bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi le
20b1(rnying rgyud): gapas mdzes// sde tshan rdza da'i lngapas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// sde tsan lnga pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lbu ba la// bzhi pa yi ni bzhi par ldan// de dag/
20b2(rnying rgyud): sa dbyur dag tu'o// Ut+pa Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni bdun pas
20b3(rnying rgyud): mdzes// Ub+da Na yi bzhi pa la// gsum pa yi ni lnga pas brgyan// de dag nyis 'gyur dag tu'o// uShA Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa ti dang
20b4(rnying rgyud): sa mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa la// bzhi pa yi ni lnga par ldan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pas brgyan// de da gnyis 'gyur dag tu'o// uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdze sa// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang /
20b5(rnying rgyud): rjetshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas mdzes// up+sa Na yi dang po dang // an+ta s+thA yaM dang po'o// de dag nyis 'gyur dag tu'o// Ud+da Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs
20b6(rnying rgyud): gapas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gsum par ldan// de dganyis 'gyur dag tu'o// ung+ga Na
20b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mangs// sde chen lde pa'i lngapas brgyad// sde can lngapa'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// drag po'i sngags kyi rim ni// las rnams kun la 'jug pa ste// khyangad pang las gsum dgal 'jug
21a1(rnying rgyud): AH Na le bzhi pa dang // mi gsum pa dang // aN+Dam+b+ha yi dang pa dang // mnyan yi gnyis paste// de dag nyis 'gyur dag dang ni// mA\u0f89\u0fa4 Na ma bzhi pa la// an+taSh+Ta yi gnyis pas brgyan// da la dbyangs yig 'azhibs
21a2(rnying rgyud): mdzes// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gsum pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i lnga pas brgyan// de la gsum pa'i gsum par ldan// um+baN li bzhi pa sa// dbyangs kyi yi ge zug pas mdzes// rje tshan lnga pa'i lhubs brtan// hUM tshan la/
21a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// khro ba chen po rnams kyi ni// nyon mongs gdug pa kun sgrol pa// sngags 'di dag gis byed pa yin// / dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dang // ar+d+has+tha yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcwa gcig mdzes//
21a4(rnying rgyud): u Na mi dang pa dang // ar+thastA yi dang pa'// de dag nyis 'gyur dag dang ni// ut+pa Na li bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde chen lnga pa'i thabs brgyan// sde chan la pa'i dang po dang // sde chen gsum pa'i dang pos mangs// ut+paN yi dang po la/
21a5(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yig gi ni bzhi pas mdzes// sde tshan dang po'i bzhi pa la// an+tas+tha yi bzhi pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa dang // the tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pa dang // at+tany+dza yi dang po'o// ASh+ma Na li bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug
21a6(rnying rgyud): pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga po'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// aSh+Tasta yi bzhi pa ldan// an+tany+dza yi gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas mdzes// sde tshan ma
21a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang po dang // ar+g+ha m+b+ha yi dang ba'o// At+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// rje tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // sde chen gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// rje tshan bzhi pa'i dang po dang // sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis
21b1(rnying rgyud): nga/ yang sum gags sa ngas/ un bad sa la smra su thu da na// blarmu ba panapa pa// dbyas byom chug da mangs sa pa mabyas sam/ nArnanA pa dang ba dang / rnaman gsum da bas nga
21b2(rnying rgyud): tsun snga pa'i bzhi la// dbyangs mig ga nigasum pa'i mngon// rje tsun pa ni pa'i ban pa'o// 'tshan pa zhipa'i gsum pas brgyan// an+taN+Da li bar// de dag nyis 'gyur dag dung ni// mU Na'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyil de drug pa mdzes//
21b3(rnying rgyud): pa nga / rjegasus pa pasargyas/ bdi la pa gtu 'das 'a tu'is rnams cid / da thugs rdzi cin dang// mam mo na bdag/ rgyan pan
21b4(rnying rgyud): dngag nyis 'byung dag dang ni// rje tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // rje tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i// ar+tha pA paM dkris pas brdzun// rje tshan bzhipa'i gsum pa dang // un ma na ste// de dag nyis 'gyur dag ni// rje mnal pa'i gsum pa dang //
21b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// ad+ha m+b+ha mi gnyis pas brgyan/ sde can lnga pa'i dang pa dang // tshan gnyis pa'i dang po ste// de dag nyis 'gyung dag dang ni// rje chen lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// man na mi gnyis pas btsun/ rje can 'a ba'i rdza
21b6(rnying rgyud): da // tha can 'a gakyis te// de dgakris 'byung dag // de mnas pa'i gsung pa dang / dmam pa gsumapa sa// martan mi gnyis pa jun/ de cod gnyis pa'i gsum pal/ na ma panipas brjod/ an du mi gsum pa ste// dedag
21b7(rnying rgyud): 'thu dag dang ni// man la pa'i gsum pa dang // rje tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// yad+ha d+ha mi gnas gas brtan// ur+thata ya gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yoge lde pas mangs// martan pa gnyis pa la/ dbyangs kyi'i ge mas rdzas// de da gnyis
22a1(rnying rgyud): dag dang ni// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// aR+tham+b+ha yi gnyis pas brgyan// sde tsan lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pas mdzes// an+d+ra s+tha yi gnyis pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni lnga pas
22a2(rnying rgyud): brgyan// de dag nyis 'gyur dag dang ni// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// ar+d+ha s+tha yi gnyis pas brgyan// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa dang // ar+d+has+tha yi dang po la// dbyangs yi ge bcu gcig pa yis mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa
22a3(rnying rgyud): gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas brgyan// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa dang // an+ta s+thA yi dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mdzes// dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mnos/
22a4(rnying rgyud): sde tsan babri pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis mdzes// dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po dang // sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po nyid// ar+d+has+tha yi gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas smras// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas bca
22a5(rnying rgyud): sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// the tshan dang po'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang po la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga bas brtan// sde tshan dang po'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis
22a6(rnying rgyud): sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pas brgyan// Any+tsal+la yi gnyis pa dang // At+pa Na yi gsum pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pa la// at+ta s+thA yi dang pos brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po la// a
22a7(rnying rgyud): yi gnyis pas smras// rje can lnga pa'i lnga ba dang // at+tam+b+ha yi gnyis pa la// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gsum pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i rdza ba la// dkangs yig gi ni gsum pas mdzes// uSh+ma Na li bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mangs/
22b1(rnying rgyud): tshan lnga pa'i ldabs brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i drang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// ut+pa Na li gsum pa dang // at+tam+b+ha yi gnyis pa la// a kA li bzhi pa byung // dbyang gA yi ge gnyis pa dang // sde tshan bzhi 'i
22b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // ar+has+tha mi dang po'o// ut+ma Na mi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga bas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang // sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mangs// / sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po dang // sde mni bzhi pa'i gnyis
22b3(rnying rgyud): pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas mdzes// at+mat+maSh+ma yi dang po'o// de dag nyis 'gyur dag dang ni// ud+de Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i rdza pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dngo po dang // sde tshan gdul pa'i dang pos mdzes// steng
22b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'og gi khro bo yis// khams gsum sgrol pa'i las sngags yin// / uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa 'o// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mngos// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde chen lnga pa'i lnga pa dang // lnga pa de yang nyis 'ja te// skye chen rdzapa 'i gsum pa da
22b5(rnying rgyud): ShA Na yi dang po la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas spras// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pas brgyan// ar+d+ha s+thA yi gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa dang // sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// sde tshan lnga
22b6(rnying rgyud): mas pan+dan// sde tshan gnyis pa'i lnga pa nyid// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas spras// an+ta s+thA yi gnyis pa dang // dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa nyid// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gsum pa la// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pas brgyad//
22b7(rnying rgyud): shi ba'i bzhi pa dang // sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mangs// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa dang // lnga pa'ing de bzhin nyis 'gyur te// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// at+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// u
23a1(rnying rgyud): dang pol// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brnyan// sde tshan dang po'i bzhi pa lA// aR+tha/ ye gnyis pas zlas// sde can pa'i skabs brdzun// bA can dang po'i dang po lnga// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas ga sa//
23a2(rnying rgyud): yi gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas mangs// aN+Das+tha yi dang po'o// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po ni// de dag yin par shes par bya// / sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa dang / sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas
23a3(rnying rgyud): brgyan// de dag bdun 'gyur dag tu bya// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// de dag bdun 'gyur shes par bya// uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas
23a4(rnying rgyud): brgyan// de dag bcu gcig 'gyur du bya// sde tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos brgyan// de dag sum 'gyur dag tu bya// uSh+mA Na yi bzhi pa ni// sum 'gyur dag tu bya ba yin// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa
23a5(rnying rgyud): brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// at+tam+b+ha yi gnyis pas brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// at+tam+b+ha yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yi mdzes// sde tshan gsum pa'i bzhi pa'o// sde tshan
23a6(rnying rgyud): dang po'i gnyis pa dang // Ut+mA Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// at+ta m+b+ha yi gsum pa dang // at+tasmA yi dang po ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'gyur du'o// sde tsa na dang po'i dang po la/
23a7(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yig gi ni bzhi pas mangs// ar+d+has+thA yi gsum pa dang // an+ta m+b+ha yi dang pa'o// de dag bco brgyad 'gyur du bya// sngags kyi btub 'di byas la// nyon mongs gdug sems thams cad bsgral// drag po las kyi sngags 'di ni// gdeng dang ldan pas badz+ra/
23b1(rnying rgyud): ba yin// de pyir sngags don rab tu bshad// phung ba byin las kyi rgyud las sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// khro bo khams gsum nam rgyal gyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di/ ska gsol// rdo rje rab tu kI la yA'i// sgrub pa'i las cing
23b2(rnying rgyud): pa dag/ thabs dang rdzas ni gang gis bgyi// bgrub pa'i tshad ni gang dag lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje phung bu'i sgrub gnas ni// brag ri srin po'i gdong pa 'dra // bu mthod dkyil lasrangam srog gnas// der ni sa gzung brtag la sogs//
23b3(rnying rgyud): na bas rnams thams cad bya// ras zis lugs su thugs sogs pa'i// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen pobya// mchod pa'i rdzas la sogs pa bshams// bum pa dag ni bcu dgul// rang rang zhwa yi phyag rgya bri// rang rang sngags kyang der bri'o// shra ShA
23b4(rnying rgyud): spyi 'ol// dri wa rin chen ljon shing dang // kha dog sA lnga 'angs kyis bcings// dri med bus pa de byas la// rang dang / kha dog bzhin du bsrur// yang na kun kyang dkar por bya// de dag la brten bsgrub par bya// su mi dkyil 'khor chen don// 'khor rtse bas
23b5(rnying rgyud): bar bcas// gru chang sgo bzhi chun dang ldan// ludra pra bcad 'phro phor pa dang // sha khrag zhing chen dur khrod rdzas// dkyil 'khor dag ni rab tu dgang // rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag stong // bdud rtsi dag kyang rab tu bsag/ yum chen rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'i// bum rgya
23b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gzug/ rnam lnga'i mchod pa de bzhin bya// bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod cing // lha yi tshegs rnams thams cad la// gtor ma lha grangs bzhin du 'bul// spyan drang mched dang bstod pa dang // gang 'dod las la gsol ba gdab// rtsa ba'i yab yum skur gsal bas// 'khod
23b7(rnying rgyud): lo bzhi yang gsal bar bya// A li kA li'i yi ge yang // rtsa yi gnas rnams kun tu dgod// rdo rje kI la ya yi sngags// 'khor lo'i rtsa gnas kun tu bsgom// drag po'i las kyi sngags rnams kyang // gsang ba'i mkha' la rab tu dgod// lha rnams so so'i las kyi sngags//
24a1(rnying rgyud): rang rang gnas srung god par bya// lus bsngags ni de bkod nas// bum pa'i nang du de bkod bya// rigs rdza kI la ma sogs pa'i// snying po dag kyang rab tu bgrang // ga khri bdun 'bras bgrangs nas kyang // gnams tha
24a2(rnying rgyud): dam bskul bar bya// khro bo chen po rnams la ni// he khri lnga stong bsnyen pa dang // drag po'i las kyi sngags rnams ni// bye ba sum 'bum bzlas pa yis// mngon sum pa yi rtags 'byung ste// sku gzugs bzhad dang bum pa dang // phung ba dag las 'ad 'a
24a3(rnying rgyud): srung ba ldeg 'phar wang ston 'byung // de skar ma byung bar du bsgrib// de rtags thon nas skab sngags bzlas// rtsa ba yab yum gsal byas te// kI lA ya lnga phyogs nas bskul// skye med ches kyi dbyings las ni// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog smin 'bya
24a4(rnying rgyud): zhing // rnam rtog 'khor bar 'khyams pa rnams// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// bde ba'i phung bu rgyas pa yis// so sos 'jigs pa'i bla klog pas// las dang nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// thog ma med nas bka' ba yis// las dang
24a5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa yi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// srid pa'i 'khor lor gyur pa yin// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// bde ba byang chub sems phung des// lus kyi rtsa rnams kun tu gang // dug gsum sdug bsngal deng stong mdzad// chag
24a6(rnying rgyud): sdang zhe na las byung ba yi// nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i gzugs// srid pa'i lam la gnas bcas pa// de dag rab tu 'don mdzad nas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// bde ba byang chub sems phur ni// lus kyi rtsa rnams kun rgyas gang // dug ga
24a7(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal des gzhom mdzad// chags dang zhini las byung ba yi// nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i gzugs// rdza srung sems can dag bya'i phyir// drangag dang shes rab myong ba yi// bde ba byang chub sems su des// lus kyi rtsar brkus sems bdi skyes// bde bas /
24b1(rnying rgyud): mongs sdug bsngal zhi// las dang nyon mongs 'brel 'byung ba'i// 'bras bu phung po sdug bsngal myong // rnam tog las dang lam la gnas// thabs dang shes rab spor ba yi// bde ba byang sems phur pas ni// lus kyi rtsa chus sems bde rnyed// bag chags phung po sdug
24b2(rnying rgyud): dardza pa'i// gtso bo yang yus gnyis med de// g.yas nas rgyu dang g.yon nas klu// dbus nas chu dang 'od zer rgyu// spyigatsug mgrin pa snying gar chu// mtshon char rgyu dang phung bur rgya// g.yas kyis gcod dang g.yon gyis gcod// gsobs mnan bakhrig gang
24b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod 'grub// phyogs kyi bum pa'i gnas rnams su// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun dbab// bum pa de dag chu rgyun gyis// bkang ste rnam par rtog pa bsreg/ lus kyi gnas ni thams cad du// phab pa'i 'od zer der spro bya// 'od zer tshogs ni thams cad kyang // kyang
24b4(rnying rgyud): grub sems su gnas pa ste// nam tog kun gyi gnyen por bshad// bde chen 'khor lo'i gnas su ni// zhi ba'i las ni sgrub pa yi// sngags kyi 'od zer thams cad kyang // bde chen rtsa ni kun tu spro// gnas der bde ba bskyed pas ni// bdag dang gzhan gyi nang stog
24b5(rnying rgyud): bya dang rlung dang byang chub sems// bde ba bskyed de de bsgom mo// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste// der ni rgyas pa'i las dag bya// sngags kyi 'od zer thams cad kyang // longs spyod gnas su rab tu spros// rlung dang rtsa dang byang chub sems// bde ba brgyad de
24b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom mo// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsreg/ tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur// snying gi chos kyi 'khor lor ni// dbang gi las ni bya ba ni// sngags kyi 'bru ni der bsgom pas// thams cad ma lus 'gugs par 'thur// rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub
24b7(rnying rgyud): sems// bde ba skyed byed deng bsgoms shig/ gnas de dag tu 'od zer 'phro// thams cad ma lus dbang du 'thur// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni// drag po'i las kyis bsad pa yin// sngags kyi 'od zer der bsgoms te// 'khor lo'i gnas
25a1(rnying rgyud): 'od zer spro// rtswa dang rlung dang byang chub sems// bde ba skyed byed rgya ru bsgom// sngags kyi 'od zer drag pos ni// sprul pa'i gnas su bsad pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas der ni// sngags kyi 'od zer gsal bsgoms la/
