25a2(rnying rgyud): blo dang brku bar bya ba yis// bde bdag la rten bcas shing // mi tog pa'ang der skye 'gyur// gseng bar bzlas dang mig yor 'gyur// skyo ba'i sprul pa'i phyag brgyan dang // yang sbrul dag ni 'byung bas ni// phung bu'i dngos gru ster bang 'gyur// sngang bcan/
25a3(rnying rgyud): rtags ni kun 'byung ste// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kyang // skad cig la ni thob par 'gyur// de thob bzlas pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi b+hA baM hUM hUM phaT/ de ni sgo yi bsnyen pa'o// de bzhin khro ba so sa'i sngags// las kyi sngags
25a4(rnying rgyud): kyang dus su bzla// bsnyen pa'i sngags kyis dngos grub 'thob// las kyi sngags kyis thams cad sgrol// las 'di rnal 'byor can gyis bya// khro bo chen po de dag gis// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams// bskal te byang chub lam la bkod// hud dug 'khor
25a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems can dang // lus sems bral te 'khyams pa dang // ngan 'gro'i sgo dgag bde lam bkod// / bro rgyal sku yi 'od zer gyis// steng 'og phyogs mtshams kun tu spro// der gnas sems can thams cad kyang // rang rang nyon mongs kun spyod byed//
25a6(rnying rgyud): grol ba'i lam la bkod nas kyang // sdug bsngal thams cad des 'joms byed// de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po yi// bsgrub pa dag ni byed dus su// dngos grub rtags ni byung dus su// the tshom med pa'i rtog pas blang // dngos grub chen po thob nas kyang // /
25a7(rnying rgyud): las rnams thams cad bya ba yin// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// de dag bsgrub par bya ba ni// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun phyogs su// dkyil 'khor gu gsum mthing nag bya// phyi rol zla gam gsum gyis bskor// dbus su khro rgyal hUM kA ra/
25b1(rnying rgyud): g.yon du khrom spu 'byin ma// g.yas su ngag gi mgo can de// rgyab tu smrig bu'i mgo can no// sha khrag sna tshogs las byas pa'i// gtor mab+han d+ha gang bzhag la// bdud rtsi lnga yang de ru thug/ sha chenA tshil med khrag rkyen dang // g.yang ga'i spyi thugs thod
25b2(rnying rgyud): pa'in// ljong rgyan dang rdzas rnams bsags// 'ur dkar skye tshe dug dang sbyar// zangs phye rdo gyi lpags phye dang // drag po'i rdzas rnams su gsum ste// hUM mdzad ding 'dzin la gnas pas// sngags 'di bgrang zhing 'phro 'du bya// oM badz+ra kro ta d+haM k+SharahUM/
25b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi 'bum lnga khri 'don par bya// phra man sngags 'dis las la gzhug// gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ bye ba sum khri bton byas na// pho nyas gang 'dod las rnams byed// sprul pas gang bsgo'i las rnams byed// rnal 'byor can la dngos grub 'bebs// de bzhin rje
25b4(rnying rgyud): po gzhan dag kyang // rang rang khro mo pho nya dang // bcas te bsgrubs na dngos grub thob// bsgo ba nyan cing las rnams byed// rnal 'byor dam ldan rtogs par bya// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ bskul pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
25b5(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje phur bu yis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor 'bri bar bya// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs 'bru// sman gyo rnam pa'i gtor ma ni// glang po'am shing rtas 'grongs pa'i tshad// brgya rtsa brgyad dam lha grangs bya// sha lnga khrag
25b6(rnying rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad// spyan gzigs 'dod yon sna tshogs brgyan// sna tshogs 'bru yi chang rnams bshad// rnal 'byor pho mo g.yas dang g.yon// lus ngag brdas mtshon so sos mchod// lha tshogs phyi nang gsang bas mchod// tshegs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe//
25b7(rnying rgyud): bla ma rdo rje slob dpon la// mtshan ldan gzungs ma phul nas ni// gtso bo rnams la de bzhin mchod// 'khor gyi rnal 'byor thams cad kyang // rang rang gzungs ma dag dang ni// lhan cig gnas te lha rnams mchod// mchod pa'i las byed dus panas mtshon//
26a1(rnying rgyud): gang zhig su ston pa la// de la nang mthel bstan dang bya// gang shig sbyin ma 'degs byed la// de la mdzub ni bstan par bya// gang zhig gyeni bskyod pa la// de la pa dra bstan bur b+ha// gang shig marlab ston pa la// del pa dang /
26a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin par bya// gang zhig brang ni ston pa la// de la nu ma ston par bya// gang zhig sor mo rnams ston la// de la lus ni bstan par bya// gang zhig ma ho zhes brjod na// kyem no zhes rab tu brjod// a ti mra to brjod pa la// pra ti swA ho brjod par bya// a
26a3(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pa la// pra ti dzaHzhes brjod par bya'o// sa ma ya stAM zhes brjod pa la// sa ma ya ho zhes brjod par bya// ra ho haM zhes brjod pa la// rA ga yA mi brjod par bya// kye zhes 'bod pa'i sgra sgrog na// a ho zhes pa'i lan yang sbyin// su ra sti zhes brjod pa la// bzang ning
26a4(rnying rgyud): btung ba rab tu sbyin// sa ma ya dzaHzhes brjod pa la// lha rnams mchod ces rab tu sbyin// dud ngur zhes brjod pa la// spang bar bya zhes rab tu brjod// de bzhin ngag gi sgra rnams kyang // dus 'di dag tu bya ba yin// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus 'di ru// rkang pa brkyang
26a5(rnying rgyud): bar mi bya zhing // phyi rol gtam yang rab tu spangs// mi bgad gsang ba'i ngag la gnas// lha yi grangs ni de bzhin du// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yang // lha rnams la ni rab tu 'bul// zhal zas tshogs la longs spyod cing // dpa' bo dpa' mo mnyam
26a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrud la// byang chubs sems kyi bde bas mchod// nyon mongs rnam par rtog pa yang // de yi 'od zer dag gis bsreg/ phyi rol bar chod byed rnams la// 'od zer dag gi bsreg par bya// brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa yis// tshogs kyi 'khor lo
26a7(rnying rgyud): bya ba yin// dam tshig med cing dang rgyung ngan// rtog pa can la tshogs 'khor gsang // dpa' bo pa' mo brtul zhugs ldan// dam tshig can gyis tshogs 'khor bya// rdo rje'i glu ni rab tu blangs// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la gtor ma sbyin// de don rab tu bshad
26b1(rnying rgyud): pa yin// bang bar rdo rje'i klu yis bskul// gre tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen por ni// dmachog ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// so sor rang rig gnyis 'khyud de// de bzhin lha rnams kun mchod cing // bdud rtsi lnga yang rtog med bzang // sha dang khrag ni 'thung na//
26b2(rnying rgyud): bza'// deng ni dam tshig can bzung zhing // dam tshig med dang nyams pa spang // brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa yis// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab tu bya// byang chub sems ldan gzung ma brten// gtsang dme mi blta brtul zhugs bskyed// lus ni mdzes pas
26b3(rnying rgyud): khrus byas brgyan// tshogs kyi mchod pa rab tu bya// mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za mo// ra ro ma dang khrag 'thung ma// sa zla sa 'og sa steng gi// las la grub pa'i mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gtor ma len cing las rnams byed// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro
26b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin byed// gnyis med mnya ma 'khyud bde ba yis// dpa' bo pa' mo mnyes gyur cig/ gnyis med bde ba rgyas gyur cig/ spro dang bsdu ba'i bde ba yis// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams tshim gyur cig/ bdud rtsi lnga dang zhal zas kyis// 'jig rten
26b5(rnying rgyud): 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams mnyes gyur cig/ glung ga blangs la dkyil 'khor bsdu// las dang nyon mongs rab tu 'joms// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las 'di la ni brtson par bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo
26b6(rnying rgyud): gsum// phyi nang gsang ba gsum zhes bya// dam tshig nyams pa skong ba'i phyir// nang gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya// tshogs bsags bsod nams bskyed dus phyi// mi rtog ye shes bskyed dus su// gsang ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya// cho gas 'khor de
26b7(rnying rgyud): gsum gang gis kyang // sgribaspyod rnam grol lam la 'god// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po 'dis// yab yum rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung dang // khro babu yab yum phra men tshogs// mchod pa dngos grub rang shugs 'byung // oM rgyal rtogs can ba
27a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// bzla bka' ldan ba sgrug na// khams gsum na na mangs can zla gyis// mcho ba dang thun mang dngas sub zag/ rdul pa nas pa kyis gachags// dregs pa'i thamad nams dbang ngu'ag// gan gang nan byung /
27a2(rnying rgyud): pa'aphel// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa sgrol// de phyir tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang // rab tu bya bar bshad pa yin// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i le'u steb su gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje phur bu yi// bsreg
27a3(rnying rgyud): dang mnan 'phang bstod par bya// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni// phung thong dum bu drug pa ru// khrag sna dug sna'i ming rus gzhug/ skye tshe yungs nag brab rdzas bzhag/ nas nag rdo nag zangs lcags phye// zer gyi rdzas su thams cad bsags// yang
27a4(rnying rgyud): na mda' yi zor yang bya// khwa dang srin bya pho rog dang // 'ug pa dag gi sgo bskyon de// smyug ma la ni khrag gis byugs// skyon med sor ni bcu gnyis pa// khrag dang dug gi byugs byas la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor der gzug bya// zangs nag zhing chen
27a5(rnying rgyud): spyi thugs bgo// drag po las kyi gzungs ma ni// nag mo gtum mo khro gnyer can// g.yon bzhag sgrol ba'i yum du brlabs// drag po'i las kyi phur pa yis// bsgrub bya dag la btab ste bsgral// so so'i rtsa sngags las sngags kyis// zor
27a6(rnying rgyud): mda' la ni rab tu bsgrub// phur bu phra mo bdun byas bsngags// sgo zlar phug ste mda' nang gzhug/ mtsho nyung drag rdzas bzlas la thug/ oM lo ha g+ha yag rdza gardza hU~M phaT/ s+pho Ta ya'i bar dag tu// mo ha g+ha yas mgo mnan 'grub// khrag gi nang gyis
27a7(rnying rgyud): mi gzugs la// nas nag rdo nag la sogs pa// drag po'i sngags 'di btab sti brab// hU~M mam pa shaM ku ru ma ta ta kar i nan nyi ma ma ka ma shI gAng kA ra ya/ las byed tshogs ni drag tu bskul// khro bo'i sprul pa de bzhin 'phrul// dod tshad ldan pas cho
27b1(rnying rgyud): 'phang // ma ma 'thor ni srod la ste// srin po'i zor ni tho ra dra 'phangs// zor lam phye la khro bas 'phangs// mda' dang tha~Md zer lhas kyang blta// bor ba zlog na bdun dgur bgyur// de nas drag tu bskul de 'phangs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/
27b2(rnying rgyud): skad cig nyid la sgrol bar 'gyur// rdo na ga'ur rdos 'phang bar bya// mda' 'phang mde'u'i me stag ni// g.yas su 'phro dang g.yon du 'phro// gang la log pa'i drod tshad bzung // khrag la de bzhin blta ba ste// lcags dang 'khyil dang 'phro ba'o// ltas kyi rnam pa de ngas
27b3(rnying rgyud): zhing // zor ni rab tu 'phang bar bya// zor thod bu pa dang log ltas ni// phyi rol rtags su shes par bya// las kun mtha' ni zor gyis bskul// phrin las rnam bzhis mnan bya ste// e las gru gsum dkyil 'khor bskyed// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig
27b4(rnying rgyud): rten khams ni thams cad kun// khro bor ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad thal ba rdal du zlo ga/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ baM las dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// bla gam dag tu bskyed par bya// 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni
27b5(rnying rgyud): rab 'byams kun// dbang gi khro bor ma gyur med// thams cad dbang du 'du bar mdzod// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya ba shaM ma na ho pa shaM ku ru swA hA/ ya las rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi dag ni bskyed bya ste// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten
27b6(rnying rgyud): khams ni thams cad kun// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar mdzod// IM badz+ra kI li kI la ya puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ ma las zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// thum po dag tu bskyed pa ste// gaN+DI mug rdo rje ga por bzlas pas// 'jig rtes bsta ni thams cad kus/ zhing /
27b7(rnying rgyud): gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus zhi bar mdzad// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA thA/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i zhabs kyis mnan// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs rta ga thA// khro bo'i tshogs kyi bres su bsngo// bza' ba'i me yi phung por bsregs// mi shes /
28a1(rnying rgyud): u/ yas dag zugs gasregs// na ng+yas pa dang ldan pa yis// gdug cing srung sesas ldan pa rnams// byang chu bsems nim skyes par// nam yang btang b.ras bya// khaTal yab sumasas bcas pa'o// grangs kyi blang
28a2(rnying rgyud): dunan/ brdal lam mi da sa/ ba gas pa'i gzugs ldad // stu rna ma tshugs rnams 'dul pa'i mcho// m+b+ha na da cing // mang cigs rnams 'dus// sadun rtswag tshod bdun
28a3(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor rnams yi rangs te// bstod pa'i mchog 'dis rab tu bstod// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// zhe sdang 'dul mdzad rdo rje gzhon+d+ra na'i sku// rnam par thar pa'i dbur ldan zhing // phyag drug phyag mtshan rgyad drug sgrol// zhabs bzhis
28a4(rnying rgyud): rU tra bskal zhing mnan// gdug pa 'dul mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs lnga/ khrag 'thung kI la ya// thams cad ma lus rdul du rnyog/ shin gyi kris pa'i gzugs can de// khro rgyal chen por phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs mtshams steng 'og kho bo la
28a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs// thams cad dbu gsum phyag drug ste// prA smad phur pas gnon tshogs 'dul// rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum la// rgod gshe chags pa 'jigs pa'i zhal// yang lpags ko rnon skul gsol// stag lpags 'bum gyi shas thabs can//
28a6(rnying rgyud): g.yang gzhi thong sbrul khrag zhag brgyan// phyag drug mtshon chas nyon mongs sgrol// khro mo dbang phyug sku la 'khril// 'jigs byed khro rgyal tshogs la bstod// sprul pa'i phra men tshogs bcas ni// phyogs bcu kun tu pho nyar 'gyed// bdud dang bar chod stsol
28a7(rnying rgyud): par mdzad// shin tu 'jigs pa'i phog rnams// lus ni ma nges sna tshogs spyon// cir yang 'gyur ba'i mtshon cha bsnams// marungs shal stod cing ba// sgrol byed tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan thugs kyi sprul ba ni// phyogs bcusanaka 'gying
28b1(rnying rgyud): par mdzad// rnam rtog zhan mangs thams cad 'jams// thams cad bad pa' lam la 'gad// rlung gtum rnams madrangs pas// sems can kun la gnod par byed// brtsam ldan thugs kyi phur sa?// de dag sbrul mdzad phyag 'tshal bstad/
28b2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed khro bo'i tshogs bcas kyis// phyogs skyong dregs pa tshar bcad de// sems can thams cad bde la bkod// 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces phyogs bcu'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / 'khor sprul pa'i phra min gyi tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang
28b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rjes su yi rang ngo // phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ zor mnan sreg dang bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // phur pa phrin las kyi rmad
28b4(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba rdzogs so// rdo rje phur bu'i las rgyud 'di// u rkyen mkha' 'gro'i gling dag nas// rje btsun pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// sems can doni du dgongs te byon// sngon gyi las 'phro 'brel pa yis// rong po ma gzhon pos 'o slob kyis// de las byung
28b5(rnying rgyud): bsod nams kyis// khams gsum nyid rjes sgrol bar shog/ 'dir phrin las kyi rgyud karma mA le rtsa ba'i rgyud rtog pa bcu gnyis pa'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma zab pa'i rgyud rnams 'dir gzhug par bya'o// sid+hi ra sku// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la
28b6(rnying rgyud): ma hA pa liM ta tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal thams cad mkhyen pas/ su trams cad kun tu
28b7(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byang du ldan nas/ thams cad kun tu mi bsgribs pas/ phyogs thams cad nas gsal bar gyur te/ lhan ne lhang nge ma bsgribs par gsal ba ste/ gsang sngags dam pa 'byung ba'i dus na byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa nyid du rnam par go
29a1(rnying rgyud): bar gyur ba ste/ 'ag man dam pa'i gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ rin pa che'i gzhal yas khang phyi dang nang med pa kun tu yang nang du snang ba na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang ba dang / gnyis su med par 'jugs rnasas tu
29a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngang gis rnam pa gsum gyi tshul du ston par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma lus pa// yang dag don rnams bstan pa'i phyir// thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po la// thams cad 'byung zhing rnam par 'du// nyon yongs spangs pa'i pha rol na// rgyal ba bya ba rdul tsam med// sem
29a3(rnying rgyud): nyid byang chub sems 'di yang // rgyal bar gyur pa'i snying po yin// stong pa'i chos nyid dam pa yin// snang ba ma 'gags lhun gyis grub// gnyis su med pa'i dam pa yin// 'khor ba'i bcud phyung bde gshegs rgyu// 'khor ba'i dri ma rang bzhin dang // rgyud dang lung dang man
29a4(rnying rgyud): ngag gsum// bstan cing go ste shin tu gsal// med pa ma yin snying po'i don// nam mkha'i snying po mtha' yas mchog/ nges med sems ni sna tshogs te// sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu snang // snang ba nyid du gzung du med// thams cad mchog gi snying po 'di// gzhan du rgyal bas chos
29a5(rnying rgyud): mi btsal// rang rig snying po ma rtogs na// btsal bas rgyal ba'i chos mi rnyed// 'khor ba med cing sangs rgyas med// lha yang med cing 'dre yang med// mtho ris med cing ngan song med// thams cad sems nyid rig pa'i klong // 'di ni gang yin pader gshegs rgyu//
29a6(rnying rgyud): de nyid ma spangs kun gyis grub// ma btsal ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub// kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen// rdo rje sems dpa'i don rnams ston// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// gnyis su med pa'i 'dul ba'i don// gu bzang dam pa lha yi lha// tshad ma gsum
29a7(rnying rgyud): ni nges bzung nas// nges gzhi don la yang dag 'bebs// gnyis su don tog gang 'dzin pa// gnyis med ngo bor yongs mi 'grub// drug dang bcu yis ma grub cing // bcu bdun rtsa gcig nges par 'grur// nges gzung med par don rtogs na// thob med 'bras
29b1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub mi dgos// rtsol med lam la bgrod me dgos// rim pasas la sbyang mi dgos// yang dag nyid du don rtogs pas// de ma rtogs pas 'bras bu med// bsgos med rtsol med snying po'i don// nyams su len pa'i dam pa'adra// nyam ma go pa
29b2(rnying rgyud): ngas pa 'dis// rtog pas 'bras bu gang bltas pa// de nyid rtog pa nyid du 'gyur// rtog pas bltas pa 'khor ba'i chu// rtog pa nyid kyang nges bzung bral// nges pa rtogs pa gang du 'dzin// ma nges rtog par gzung ba med// de phyir rtog pa'i ngas bzung
29b3(rnying rgyud): ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin bral// rgya las bskyed par snang mi snang // chu las bskyed par gyur pa na// rgya las bskyed par 'jigs par 'gyur// de la yang dag don mi dgos// gal te chu las ma grub na// dper na nam mkha' stong pa // chu che
29b4(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyis de mi 'jigs// ma rig tu mid stong pa la// ji ltar byas kyang dal ba'i chu// dper nanam mkha' stong pa la// rgyu dang rkyen du ma bstan kyang // sprin dang na bun khu drangs 'byung // de bzhin sems nyid stong pa la// rgya las bskyed dang ma brkyad
29b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i// don nyid yang dag bshad dka' yang // ma rig nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// nam mkha' sprin du ma shes shing // sprin nyid nam mkhar ma shes na// sprin dang nam mkha' tha dad med// sems nyid stong pa nam mkha' la// ma rig pa nyid sprin dang
29b6(rnying rgyud): 'dra// ma rig ye shes tha dad med// ma rig pa nyid yang dag lam// 'khor ba nyid kyang bde gshegs rgyu// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// dper na rin chen gser gling 'dra// rin chen gser gling phyin gyur na// dbyibs dang kha dog tha dad kyang // thams
29b7(rnying rgyud): cad gser gyi ngo bor gcig/ de bzhin sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang // mtshanas sna tshogs cir sngang yang // thams cad sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ bstan pa'i snying po dam pa 'di// 'di dang 'di ru bstan par ni// bder gshegs nyid kyis brjod par dka'//
30a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa ma nos pa// na/ dan ma sa / pa gyu/ kyang chub na nyid 'du/
30a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' nyid dang 'dra// dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun// 'byung yang nam mkha' nyid las 'byung // 'dus kyang nam mkha' nyid la 'dus// gleng gzhi byang chub sems nyid la// lta ba sgom pa dkyil 'khor dang // lha dang dam tshig la sogs pa//
30a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa dang ni bstod pa dang // thams cad byang chub sems las 'byung // 'dus kyang byang chub sems la 'dus// yang dag bstan pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// gnyis su gzung du ga la yod// des bzung bral ba'i chos nyid la/
30a4(rnying rgyud): dngos por bzung du ga la yod// mtha' dbus med pa'i chos nyid la// phyogs char bzung du ga la yod// snang stong gnyis su med pa la// snang zhes mtshan mar ga la 'dzin// stong zhes chad par ga la blta// de phyir snang stong gnyis su med// kun tu bzang po
30a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gzhi// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis brjod du med pa'i don bstan to// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i chung las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas mnyam pa'i rang gis yum gyi b+ha ga la bzhugs nas/ e ma ho mnyam
30a6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni// bstan pa'i snying po don gyis go// 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste// kun bzang nyid du rnam par grags// e ma 'di ltar ngo mtshar che// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rang las byung // mi btsal rang byung ngo mtshar rtse// ngo mtshar chen po lha yi sgra// ji ltar bltas pas 'grub par
30a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'di ni mtsha che// e ma 'di ni ngo mtshar che// skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings las// bstan pas go ba ngo mtshar che// don nyid brjod du med pa la// brjod pas go bo ngo mtshar che// mun pa lta bu'i gti mug la// mar me lta bu'i 'od byung nas// gti lhag phun sel char me
30b1(rnying rgyud): mun pa' rnams pa'i shes rab 'ang// di/ gdul byed pa dre gshegs 'byung // 'dul ba'i ngo' cir yang sdang // gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyar// Am 'di ltar ngo mtshar che// nam mkha' stong pa skye med la// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cing yang sbyin// da
30b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin skye med chos dbyings las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab// ston pa 'byung zhing 'khor rnams 'byung // thugs rje 'byung zhing byin rlab 'byung // dkyil 'khor 'byung zhing mchod pa 'byung // thams cad thams cad 'byung ba yin// thugs rje chen po'i
30b3(rnying rgyud): rlab kyis// bde ba chen po dbab tu gsol// e ma 'di ni gang 'byung ba// thugs rdo sbal pa chen po 'byung // 'gro ba 'dul ba bstan pa'i rtsi// gang gis 'dul ba de bzhin du// 'dral ba'i rol cir yang ston// yab la dgyes shing yum la chags// chags
30b4(rnying rgyud): mdangs kyis dgyes pa na// sems dang sems su 'dres pas na// sems nyid mi 'gyur brtan pa'i mchog/ dgyes pa chen pos dbab tu gsol// e ma mi 'gyur brtan pa la// 'gro ba kun gyi don gyi phyer// yab la 'khyud cing dges pa bskul// 'dod pas
30b5(rnying rgyud): g.yos shing rab tu 'dzum// brim bag bcas shing brtse ba skye// mchu 'gul gyi 'dril rab tu gdung // rtsa rnams rab tu rgyas mdzad de// bad+ma la ni bde ba dbab// e ma ston pa yum dang bcas// yum ni dges pas yab lha 'khyud// yab kyi bde ba chen po 'di/
30b6(rnying rgyud): yum gyis dges pas bskang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i rdo rje bde ba 'bebs// bde ba chen po 'di dag ni// yu ma la dbab kyi dges par mdzod// yab yum bde ba chen po 'di// dges pa chen pos dbab par mdzod// e ma oM AHhU~M phaT/ sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya
30b7(rnying rgyud): a na? mrag yAM mi/ a nu dAg la hUM/ dzu u hoH/ hUMhUMt+tha/ gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// bde ba chen po'i byin rlabs pas// thams cad dbang bskur sgrib sbyangs nas// nyon mongs sbyangs shing byang sems 'gro// drag po la sogs rnam pa'i yis// r-i
31a1(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba bzhin spos na// dkar dasar gnag dang ser ba dang // dus rnams kun tur basbyar nas// yang dag nyid du rnam par s+ho// 'di ni spangs rgyas byin brngubs yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dug// dus gsum sa
31a2(rnying rgyud): pa sh+lo// rban/ ga / chuH/ bsha bsanam/ sta pas ma bca/ rje / ma bzhib 'dres drag sbyid pa// de ni sangs rgyas ma thong // / ngan bcan ga //
31a3(rnying rgyud): bye chen po 'di lta bu// drag po ma pa'i rjen pan// de yis snying gsum dpa gra g.yos// yab snamams dang bcas pa rnams/ dran pa'idi ro trog por rdzogs/ the 'dzigs kyilas ste/ zhes ngas zhing ngo 'tshar pa'i ngo bor btu tsus dang / thams cad rab
31a4(rnying rgyud): nis na 'ad pa gyu/ mnyas pa da ges sa bya'o// dang sa ma na pa sa na sa/ nga ba pa 'a ba nyis pa'o// den pa sbyol ba 'i nga nga du laskams par drags das/ nan pa sa la ba nga pos
31a5(rnying rgyud): rnams// gab sbas lta ba'i don ma rtogs// khams gsum 'khor zhing sdug bsngal myong // shin tu mdungs srin por 'gyur// yi dwags srin po ma rungs pa// nad dang ma rungs sna tshogs 'byung // srin po gdug pa'i byin brlabs las// sems can thams cad
31a6(rnying rgyud): gdug par 'gyur// rang la rang nyid rab tu gdug/ rang gi rtog pas bltas pas na// me bzhin tshabs rab tu gdung // de yang rang rig rnam rtog yin// rang la rang gis 'tshig par byed// chu bzhin grang ba rang las 'byung // rang nyid ngang las sdug bsngal 'byung //
31a7(rnying rgyud): dmyal khams pa co brgyad sdug pa 'akyang // rang gi nam rtog paltas las byung // yi dgas pa kres sko sdug bsngal yang // dang de dang rtog nga ltas las zung // khyo bor rtser rtsug sdug bsngal yang // rang nin ma ton bltas las byung // de la sogs pa'i thug
31b1(rnying rgyud): na nan du rgyu tu tshun
31b2(rnying rgyud): na su
31b3(rnying rgyud): sa
32a1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa ma lus dbul ba kun// gtod ma chen po'i las rnams te// oM dzA kI Shi kI la ya/ ma hA ba li ta Shati/ dras drug gtor ma dbul byas la// ma 'dzin gtong bas gtongs ste// dras rnams kun tu btang ba dang /
32a2(rnying rgyud): dang zla bar btang ba dang // thams cad kun tu btang ba dang // dmachog chen po'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i// dus gsum bral ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// rtags dang mtshan ma stan pa dang /
32a3(rnying rgyud): la yA yi dngos grub stsol// oM bAdza kI li kI la ya/ sarbabi ts+tsha ba~M hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shad// srog gi go rje shang ba dang // sreng gi go dub sgom par bya// steng rjes
32a4(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// me ru 'bar ram 'od du 'byung // 'gul lam ldeg gam 'phyo ba'am// 'di rnams gang byung gtor ma 'grub// oM badz+ra kA li kI la ya/ mA ra ya yi ta
32a5(rnying rgyud): ts+yai/ gang yin phyogs su pang nas ni// srag cing gang ba ste khrag kyang gtor // khro bo byin po bdurnams la// gtor ma chen po 'di sa ste// A~M bar+b+ba mati sh+lekA k+Shi/ gardza ga dza hU~M phaT/ steng rdzogs khro bo d+ha kA ra// yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// tha men pag dang
32a6(rnying rgyud): zla bcas// mang chen sha dang thod khrag dang // so sa ni gtong sa dpal// A~M banan ta bI yar+tha/ gan ta na N+De3/ shang gi khyo bonas par rtsal// mAm chen rdo rje mda' snyems ma// gru sen zhag dang byargod bcas// song ge dkar rma
32a7(rnying rgyud): dbad nga / rkyen pa cwa ma nga/ rnam men pa'i gag dum/ / / gang tul ba ba byun rdzus mas// pa men gsag kyi ga nga // byud pa
32b1(rnying rgyud): dang // 'dzum byed gceng bu'i sha ye mchod pa 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya s+yAd+ha ka r+g+haM/ pa tsa ba tsahU~M phaT/ lho yi khro bo gshin rje gshed// yum chen khro mo dur khrod ma// phra men sha ba thug par bcas// gshog med 'phur dang mus dang // chags med sha zag
32b2(rnying rgyud): par 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ad+ya Ats+tsha la hUM/ bad+hU ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ lho nub khro bo me g.yo mgon// yA ma chen rdo rje gtun khung ma// phra len gzig dang khwa ru bcas// grol byed srin po'i sha khrag dang // ye 'bang shing gi bdag po dang // 'gro gyed stabs
32b3(rnying rgyud): 'bral sha khrag tu chod par 'bral// oM badz+ra krod+ha hA ya gr-I wa hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ nub kyi khro bo rta mgrin rgyal// yum chen rdo rje gtum mo dang // sprul pa byi la bu shud bcas// bus 'dzin pa d+ma'i khrag dag dang // 'byod byed sha yi mchod pa
32b4(rnying rgyud): 'bul// oM badz+ra kro g+ha.a par dze ta trA~M/ tISh+Thad+hIHhU~M phaT/ nub byung khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub dang // yum rjen rdo rje mda' skems ma// phra men khwa deng sbrang kur bcas// sgrib byed sha dang rdeg byed lag/ myos byed sha ya mchod pa dpral/
32b5(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta ku tA li hU~M phaT/ b+hain+da s+t+rai N+Da hU~M phaT/ byang gi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khril// yum can rdo rje thung 'byin ma// phra men seng ge pa wang bcas/ krod// skyed byed mo dang phrin byed lding // tri mu sha yi mchod pa 'bral// oM badz+ra kro d+hi tri log bi dzA ladz+ra/
32b6(rnying rgyud): byin d+ha ben t+ya hU~M phaT/ byang shar khro bo khams gsum rgyal// yum chen rdo rje bskyod ma dang // phra men dred dang sre mo'i mgo// dran byed shA dang 'gro byed rkang // nyal byed sha yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la rdo/ s+phoT bloT hU~M phaT/ 'og gi rdza
32b7(rnying rgyud): stobs paci// yum med rdo rje gsod ma dang // phra men dom dang byi ba'i mgo// gan byed su dang sdod byed pa/ 'joms byed sha yi mchod pa 'bral// bzhi tsan bcu yi g+ha yi tshogs// kr-i mngod thog 'bebs sgro 'dul rgyal// sred byed dbyug dang sgrol byed pa zhed/
33a1(rnying rgyud): has ra da ha nata//
33a2(rnying rgyud): gnod byed mgon dang dbang spud rta// 'phen byed gzhan dang gsod byed bdud// 'dzin byed khams dang 'bebs byed stobs// so so'i las rnams sgrub pa dang // so so sa b+hin rab tu sted/ ta thA ya ta ShA ya thAM phaT/ skor byed mer po
33a3(rnying rgyud): mchog ni// sku mdog gnag cing thob bsnams// rkang leb sha yi mchod pa 'bul// gang yin sgrol ba'i las la brtson// ha sa yar had na ya hU~M phaT/ 'bral byed chen mo'i lha mchog ni// sgra mdog mthing zhing gu gul bsnams// rmi ge b+hU ma sha yi mtsho dang
33a4(rnying rgyud): gang yin slob byed lha dang 'bral/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ 'gugs byed chen mo'i lha mchog ni// sku mdog dkar zhing lcags kyu 'dzin// dran byed snying gi mchod pa 'bul// shI g+h+raM A na ya hU~M phaT/ 'ching byed lha mchog chen mon// sku 'dog
33a5(rnying rgyud): zhing zhags pa bsdams// mkhal ma khrag gi gtor ma 'bul// dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hU~M phaT/ smyo byed lha mchog chen po ni// sku mdog dmar zhing drug rnams bsdams// 'du byed med pa'i mchod pa 'bul// bi da ya bi da ya hU~M phaT/ stobs pa'i lha mchog chen
33a6(rnying rgyud): ni// skya mdog sdang sngon gabs pa bsdams// don sring lnga lnga'i mchod pa 'bral// spu drug bslab pa drug tu brtan// nyams dru ga tags drug rab klag zas// bskyed dang sman drang mtshad pa 'bral// 'dab bstod la sogs de bzhin bya// bsgru ba dang bslab pa thon po dang /
33a7(rnying rgyud): phrin las rdzogs par shin tu bzang // dam can gsum la rim pa bzhin// nag spug snying dang ma bal ma dang // pad+ma'i khrag dang srin bya'i sha/ gcan gzan sha yi mchod pa 'bul// dza ye bi dza ye/ rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// nal bu'i sha dang dbang po'i sha
33a8(rnying rgyud): nag mo sha yi mchod pa 'bul// kati ka ye/ brten pa bran dang 'khor ltar bya// mar dang khrag dang 'o ma dang // spang ci chu lug lto ser dang // gzhong mgo sna skya mchod pa 'bul// adzi te a pa dzi ti/ rim pa nyid du de sbyar nas// bskyed dang spyan drang mchod pa
33b1(rnying rgyud): dang // 'dub bstod de bzhin mchod pa 'bul// bsgrub dang bslab pa chen po ni// yang dag nyid du de brten bya// d+hu ma ma ba shang ku ru mdam ga kar yin na/ daN+Di ma ma ka rba nan ting / nyid kyi bka' las 'da' ma byed// bka' na na gsung sdod bran ltar khrol/
33b2(rnying rgyud): las bzhi bse mo nyid la 'dus// bse mo'i rtags rnams rab tu brtags// mA ra sin phra mdza na ye hUM phaT/ thams cad las sngags yang dag pa// 'di dag pase mo nyid du bya// gang bslab pa yi rim pa la// dam can rnam gsum bka' bzhig nyadan// brad da
33b3(rnying rgyud): bka' nyan tshogs// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// dkar po'i snying dang skyes pa'i spring // rta dang 'dras dang gri yi sha// dkar po'i sha gsum mchod pa 'bul// shI
33b4(rnying rgyud): drug dang gcig dang bzhi rnams dang // zug la rdzas drug yang dag bshad// de bzhin yang dag shes par bya// de rnams kun gyi las rnams ni// bsad pa'i ling+ga brkyangs la bri// bstab pa'i ling+ga bam la dri// mnan pa'i ladra kyi nang gnyis// ga ring ba li
33b5(rnying rgyud): nas dang // bsad dang bstab pa brkyang ba la// phyi ma gnyis po 'khor lo drug/ bsad pa dag gi sngags rnams rje// the ba bu'i sngags rnams la sogs pa// thod pa'i gyi ris de bzhin bkod// rdo pa'i mtshon gyis lus la gzhug/ sdug na gzal kha rang du
33b6(rnying rgyud): bkod pa'i rim pa yang dag bsten// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa lung bu grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur bu'i lha// ye shes kho bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su// dang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar 'a
33b7(rnying rgyud): sri bza dpa // grwa yi dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang spring rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mngade nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir sgrol cig/ srid pa'i phung bu sgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub thang /
34a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ / / dun nan sa na dgas tu
34a2(rnying rgyud): tshig can pa dus labab// sprul bgyin pa 'das ya ba// ga na chen pa 'dus la dab// spyad sa pa 'dus la bab// 'don nyi byin mo dmyal bab// sa bdag rgyal po 'das sa pab// rkyed kyi pakyi gdus pa ba// ma byung ba
34a3(rnying rgyud): rgya ma bam pas rjed / des gsum thal pa'i gang nib // reg tu padag ga rnas sa lan// 'dug pa'i bya shA/ brgya dang ba ngag dpa // dang sa theng thog par banas
34a4(rnying rgyud): po'i byinarlapas skyes// srad tsam kyis ni du babyug nas// mad myed tshul bzhed ba/ la nas kyang // sdug pasnga la nyams byung ba ma // oM ng+ge nan/ mig stsal/ sa/ / hrIH/ sa/
34a5(rnying rgyud): da pa'i shes byu mas du sa pashin
34a6(rnying rgyud): sa ga pa dgal gyis// ring ba u Sh+Ta swa chus // ba mi rnam pa gcir mi myo/ nga'adi ba dbyur Tha// byu pa 'a zhan pa sa// bdi rje nan/ / //
34a7(rnying rgyud): rjes/ banatab sa/ bam mahrIpaH/ mtha mthan/ su ma dzu badz+ra/ tha / tshu dzum po'o// las gyi gas nas khris / dang ma shes so// ris pa bzhin thar brjod// skye zung /
34b1(rnying rgyud): sngon tham srasu gdag// ska pal na pang dag skar// chos nyid kyi 'den pas// gsang sngags sa byin kyis brlabazlas// sangs rgyas kyim tha// ma n+ya dus lab/ gnag na yang // dkar danas cas pa nga // nan pa zug pas ga
34b2(rnying rgyud): la// mtshon rtse gnyis dang dbyig drug zangs// gzhan gyi dngos po mtshon rnams la// bsgrub pa tshul bzhin byas nas ni// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang // dgra bgegs dbang po mngon sum bskal// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da'
34b3(rnying rgyud): byedang // stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// las sngags mtshon du bcas pas gdab// dam bu nyid du de bzhin 'gyur// drag po gugasum gtor ma la/
34b4(rnying rgyud): d+ha dur yi rtsa ba dang // lug mig grib skams byas pa dang // rtsa ba le ma 'bras bu dang // thams cad dug tu gyur pa kun// nag po dag tu yang dag bya// bsnyen bsgrub tshul du byas nas ni// me 'bar 'od du 'byung rtags ni// rim pa bzhan du yang dag spang // gdug
34b5(rnying rgyud): cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// las sdug dag la yang dag sbyar// nyon mongs 'khor ba gzhom pa'i phyir// gtan gtun mkha' dbyings yang dag bsam//
34b6(rnying rgyud): shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dpa' snying bsregs nas// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje sobs brdung byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par byos// kha rbaM kha rbaM kha waM/ hUM hUM d+haM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hU~M ny+tsa
34b7(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT/ khyad par chen po'i gtor ma ni// sha chen dam rdzas mchod pa dang // snying khrag dron mo ma lus dang // nyon mongs lnga po rtsad bcad cing // 'joms byed nad la gzhom byed phyir// sna lnga tshon gyis 'dab mas dgab// bsnyen pa nyid du yang dag ldan// klong drug
35a1(rnying rgyud): sngags drug lha drug dang // rdzas drug las rnams ma lus byA// bsnyen pasgrubarjod du gyur pa dang // nad rnams ma lus dbab par bya// des ni 'khor ba gting nas skams// nyon mongs 'joms par yang dag bshad// las rnams pa
35a2(rnying rgyud): lus grub bya'i phyir// sreg pa'i klong drug yang dag bstan// phrin las las rnams bya ba'i klong // 'dzab tshogs gnyis ni drag po'i rmong // bsreg cing mchod de bstab pa'i klong // dgug cing bstim dang gdab ste brdung ba'i grong // mnyes byed mchod pa 'bul ba'i klong //
35a3(rnying rgyud): gzir ga non khro bo'i stangs stabs klong // bsreg pa'i klong drug nyon mongs dag par bsreg/ thugs rje me yi byin brlabs yin// gdug pa me la rab tu bsngags// drag po me yi las bya'i phyir// klong drug las 'di rnam par bstan// phrin las bya ba las kyi klong //
35a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzab dang tshogs gnyis drag po'i klong // drag po sgrol ba dus kyi klong // tshig bshad drag po gyer gyi glong // drag po'i sngags rnams 'phang ba'i klong // dmod pa bral ba'i grong dang drug/ klong drug drag po 'phang ba'i klong // lam bstan zor gyi grong drug yin// lam rnams
35a5(rnying rgyud): yang dag 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs 'khor ba gnan pa'i phyir// gnan pa'i klong drug 'di lta ste// phrin las bya ba las kyi mong // 'dzub dang tshogs gnyis drag po'i grong // brgya dang brgyad ni gdab pa'i klong // khyad par bal tshon byad kyi klong // bskyed dang spyan
35a6(rnying rgyud): drang gtad pa'i klong // pho brang stang stabs gnan pa'i grong // klong drug gnan pa las kyi mchog/ las gsum phrin las mtshon pa'i phyir// 'di nyid drag po'i phrin las yang dag bstan// bya ba gsum du yang dag bstan// rnal 'byor gang zhig gtsor 'dzin pa//
35a7(rnying rgyud): gzhung dang ldan pa'i gtor ma la// stong pa chen po chos kyi mchog/ hU~M las sngags kyis gtso bor bsam// hUM gnyis 'khor gnyis rab tu bsam mo// dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa spyan drangs nas// hUM gsum bstim pa'i las rnams bya// gtor ma hUM gsum lha mo
35b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa sngags bzhugs la bstab sngags gdags// hi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis bstab// phrin las bcol ba'i las rnams bya// de bzhin du byas rdzas kyis mtshad// byang chung / sa ni rang bzhin ni// chags pa med pas zhe 'dod med// mnyam da
35b2(rnying rgyud): nyid du bzhag pas na// thams cad ye grub gtor ma yin// 'bras bu ye shes tshogs su 'gyur// tshogs bsag rim pa rnam pa gnyis// yang dag nyid du rnam par bshad// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ drag po gnor mas gdug pa brdul ba'i le'u
35b3(rnying rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ las kyi don bstan pa 'di lta bu/ dang po byang chub sems bskyed de// bum pa kha rgyan mgul chings bcas// ldan lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga/
35b4(rnying rgyud): sgros lnga snying po lnga dag dang // bgegs bslad dri yis yang dag bdug/ lha rnams bskyed pa'i rim pa yang dag bya// spyan drangs dbang bskur mchod par bsam// bskul dang 'dzab dang rim pa ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags rnams la// gdab pa'i sngags
35b5(rnying rgyud): kyis yang dag bsgrubs// gnyis pa bsdus shing bum par thim// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang // bum pa sku gsung thugs dbang bskur// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags rnams kyis// cis kyang mi tshug tshe dbang bskur// 'chi mer tsha yi dbang dang ldan// rab tu 'artan/
35b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur dbang dang ldan// bdud po brgya dbang phyug dang // brgyad mo gar gyi dbang phyug gagis// dpag bsam shing gi sbed pa la// 'dus byas bu ni bcu gcig byung // gnod sbyin bcu gcig rab tu thub// 'gro ba kun gyi don gyi'i phyir// dzad pabacu gcig mnan pa'i rdzas//
35b7(rnying rgyud): ga san pa'i tham y-i// gyur ga can na pa'is// dbus kyi shing ma pa ze// 'khar madruga'i rdzu zla// gnan pa'i yinang nan cu// ga gas parabatu ces// da ma shi gtus// bye pa
36a1(rnying rgyud): padang // gang yin gnan pa dag tu gnan// don rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// da yis 'gro ba rab tu mos// gdug pa can gyis zin pa la// 'bum mam lha sngags mang 'azlas twa// gang yin bstan pa'i sa de la// rtsa gsum
36a2(rnying rgyud): lce yi sngags bzlas la// ldag cing nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur// 'dag pa chu dag gang yang rung // mang du bzlas pas nad la bslan// nad rnams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phan pa'i sman la sngags btab la// gang yin nad la glan par bya// nang nub dus gsum dag
36a3(rnying rgyud): tu gdab// rdo rje'i lce yi nad rnams zhi// lha yi ting 'dzin rab tu gsal// des ni gnod pa'i nad rnams zhi// nad rnams ma lus zhi gyur na// gnas lnga bsrungs la bgegs rnams bskrad// bsrung ba'i rim pa rab tu 'byung // nyung dkar thal chen la bsngags te/
36a4(rnying rgyud): mor bzhi pa yi glang ma la// 'bru dgu sngogs rnams bri bya ste// gdug pa can gyi shing dag la// phung pa sor bzhi nyung dkar gdags// sa ya drug 'bum mang du bzlas// dus rnams kun tu srung ma bsku // dregs pa mchod cing chang phud gtor// mtho dor rdzas rnams
36a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu sra// lung dkar thal chen de bzhin sgra// bzlas nyung sbeng zhing mtha' ma bskor// de bzhin rab tu brjod par bya// byang chub sems ni rab tu ston// sangs kyis rnams kyi dgongs pa yang // 'khor btogs las yang dag thung // dus gsum byang chub sems las 'byug/
36a6(rnying rgyud): bskal ba stong du rab btsal kyang // sems nyid byang chub rnyed mi 'gyur/ gal te sems de rnyed 'gyur na// dngos po sbyong ba ga la 'gyur// yang dag bstan pa'i snying po 'di/ bstan pa'i snying po dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed mi 'gyur// rnyed par
36a7(rnying rgyud): kun pazang yongs ma gsungs// kun tu bzang po'i nga zhing las// bstan pa 'di dag brjod las 'das// de nyid brjod par sus gsungs pa// de ni brjod par bstan pa min// 'di dang 'di ru bstan pa ni// gsung ba'i jo bor brjod pa med// sus kyang gal
36b1(rnying rgyud): du/ sa// ma su gyu / nga // nga /
36b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'dzab dang chogs kyi dkyil 'khor dang // drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor dang // bsregs pa me yi dkyil 'bor dang // sanan pas yi dkyil 'khor dang // 'phyang bzod kyi dkyil 'khor dang // dbye ba rjes kyi dkyil nga
36b3(rnying rgyud): rgyag na mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // bsrung bya ba zlog pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'chi med ci'i dkyil thong dang // dkyil la khor bcu zhi pang dag brtan// thaM/ sra gsum bang po dkyi 'khor // yab sum dgyes pa'i thubabyung nas// bdug pa 'du zhing
36b4(rnying rgyud): ngam pa lan // ste shes drug gi phyag rgya can// zhabs pa'i du 'phrul bzhi 'i zhabs// yum dang gnyis su med par bzhugs// d+hi nga rgya rtse pag dang sdig pa'i may-i/ namargyal snyems ma rtag dang byargod mgo// dbyug ni gyu ga 'ag dang byingag // da
36b5(rnying rgyud): sa 'o ga 'ag pa ma// mig yo gnas bang gcig dang yi mgo/ tam be ga ma gyi sna rdza // gagaci kya zhes nyid ma kha ma/ nas kyi she bangam no// mas ma byed du ma go/
36b6(rnying rgyud): kyis sa/ na parnyan pa dam 'a/ zam gyid dpa pa dang zlas / ga dpar brjod na// bang ga dzin du 'dod hU~M// tha ba thartsal sa rgya// gas bcad / yin
36b7(rnying rgyud): rgyang na rdzams// glid pa bam pa'o// sgra rlung thugs dpa dang / drug ma mi mi dkyil 'thor na// mo ba napa pa dus/ mig gnas / pa nas rgyag tu
37a1(rnying rgyud): byed po nyi'i phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i phyag rgya dang // rung byed rdo ba'i phyag rgya dang // rdeg byed mtshan gyi phyag tu dang // gnan byung nga rab phyug rgya dang // sreg byed me yi phyag tu dang // 'phen byed por gyi rtsug cha dang // phyab rgya bu
37a2(rnying rgyud): yi rab bstan nas// skye med chos dbyings phyag rgyar 'dus// ka la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams// yi ge kun gyi rtsa bste// yig thams cad 'byung bar byed// mtshon byed yi ge'i mtshan nyid las// skye med ches dbyings rnam par dag/ skye ba med las thams cad byas/
37a3(rnying rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin// las rnams thams cad ma lus kun// yang dag nyid du bstan par byas// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ las thams cad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
37a4(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas ni rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// dur khrod ma mo tshogs pa'i sar// bdag po gang yinas rin btsal// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dur khrod rus pa'i phye mas gdab// da ma rdzas snga lngas chag chag gdang // mtshams bcad rim pa sa
37a5(rnying rgyud): nor bya// thig ni hU~M las yab yum bskyed// sa mA dza dang phyag rgya bzhis// spyan drang bstim par byas nas ni// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mchod pa 'bul// sa thig gnam thig gnyis su gdab// tshon la hU~M las nyid du bsam// rim pa gong bzhin shes par bya/
37a6(rnying rgyud): gu gsum bla gam mu khyud dang // gru chad sngam bu sgo bzhir bcas// dur khrod sna tshogs khrol ma btags// rdzas rnams ma lus rim par yang // dam can gsum gyi mthun rdzas bsags// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin rlabs pas// gtso bo bskyed dam mamo ni// gang byed rang
37a7(rnying rgyud): sngags 'khor bskyed nas// thams cad sngags kyis bya bar 'dus// sbrul bached cing bsnyen pang / phyi nang gsang gsum ga byed par// sngags kyi ris pa de bzhin bya// drod rtags brtan po byung ba dang // 'grub pa dag sang de bzhin bya// de yis gang 'drad byung /
37b1(rnying rgyud): phur ba lnga ni gdab bya ste// snying dang yan lag bzhi rnams dang // rang drang thun du bcas pa yi// las rnams ma lus rdzogs pa dang // gang yin me la bsreg byas nas// lha la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'bral// gang byas nyid la gtor ma 'bul// cho bstim ris pa
37b2(rnying rgyud): lha rdzas byas// dbab pa de bzhin shes par gyis// rkyang ba bcu gnyis sgrub pa yang // gtso bor dang las byed pa// sngags kyi bye brag yang dag ldan// tha ma snying po rab tu bstan// dregs pa dbang sdud yang dag pa// dkar po gsum gyi snying khrag la/
37b3(rnying rgyud): brten pa'i rdzas su yang dag bstan// gtso bo nyid ni yang dag bsam// 'bru dgu sngags kyi bsnyen pa drang // bsgrub bya dregs pa'i lha la gtad// snying dang dbang po lnga la gdab// tha ma las bstan yang dag bshad/ dug dang bzhi las sgrub pa la//
37b4(rnying rgyud): sngags drug rdzas drug lha drug dang // gtso bo nyid/ rab tu bskor// bzhi yi las su bstan pa ni// dbye dang bstab pa dor byas la// bzhi yi las kyi dmag dpon bsam// rim pa bzhin du shes bya ste// drug gi yan lag lnga rnams dang // snying dang
37b5(rnying rgyud): dngos ma bzhi la gdab// de bzhin rim pa grangs kyis sbyar// rtags thon bsgrub par yang dag bstan// nus brten 'brel yang dag ni// sha yi bya ba yang dag dang // zho dang 'o ma zangs bye dang // mal 'og dag tu zhag gsum mnan// d+ha dur dang ka na yis//
37b6(rnying rgyud): 'tsher byed shing dang slong byed gzhi// lnga gsum gcig tu gnan par bya// gdug pa'i mgo dang dug rnams dang // rdzas rnams bsres pa'i phye ma la// gang yin zhabs 'og nyid du mnan// chu glang dag la sngags btab la// chos brgyad nam langs dag la btung /
37b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i sha dang dmar byed khrag/ chang dang mthun par rab bskams la// mo la bsros la rab tu sbyin// dkar po gsum dang mar rting dang // dkar po phun dmar snying dag dang // de la sogs pa'i dkar po lnga// srog snying dam par rab pa lpags te// gang yinaHrten
38a1(rnying rgyud): dugaH// kas/ / dun pa / sa ma shA sa // smra // da mas kya la// ra nga pa
38a2(rnying rgyud): mnan// kra yis bzung ba'i thod pa rtsa/ gdug pa can gyi steng bcug sa// ming rus bcug pa yang dag mnan// de nas srung ba'i rdzas de ni// gdug pa sgra mi gnas su tha// sbron pa dag gi thod parba// gang yin ming zang bcug byas la// dkar po gas pa
38a3(rnying rgyud): sbyi ngamaH/ dgar po nyid kyi sngags brdugs// rdzogs pa'i zhing po kun zis pa// gnal dud pa ba/ bas la// sde ba'i rdzas nams rten b+ha// thod pa gang mi na gnas sum// ris kyis shi ba'i mas// deking khrag dang drangs kyo dang // ngag nams ma lus thugs
38a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa /
38a5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs te/ dam chog gnyen pongs bstan gyis// bstan pa go bar rab tugaces// snying pos chog rnams dam tshig te// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa te// bstan pa 'ad mtshig 'di dag ni// sa bzhi sa bus
38a6(rnying rgyud): rab tu brtan// ya~M dam dam pa mi phra shing // nyi ma rel la na gsum // dran pa nyid du rab tu bzung // sngags dang phyag rgya snying ba dang // 'di dag rab tu bstan pa yid// nyams pa lnga ni gzhi nas bzhag// gsum dang gra cig gis rtsa banyam sa// zlab pa bzhin dus
38a7(rnying rgyud): gas// med nga spyan mang ba brgyad de// la gang brgyal pa yin to// nga zhes parnams pa // 'das tha~Mng ba di// rdzag pa dang byag rgyal sogs dang // dpon pad byam dang// bzung ba'i ma pad pa daH// chags kyipas rnams
38b1(rnying rgyud): ste// 'ju gA la shes lham tshag // labar kyi dgas pa dang bzhin pang// su gsung thugs kyi lags rnams pa// bdud dang ma ma sprul ba'i gang // las kyi drag pa dang du zlal// g.yas pathab sa la ga yan pa yus// na dang ma'i byin na ba suras// gledangs ma byi ba
38b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung // hU~M lnga yab lngam lnga yum// sngags kyi rnam par bsam par bya// yab yum sku du gyur pa las// g.yas dang g.yon gyi mkhrig ma las// sngags kyis rab tu bskor byas la// bdag nyid yid dam lhar bas ma la// snod ni a dang bcud ni hUM// 'on tu dang 'i bsgom la/
38b3(rnying rgyud): bde ba sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis// rlung bskyong raM gyis me sbyar nas// a dang d+hi dang bcas pa zhu// bdud rtsi chen po nyid du gyur// g.yas dang g.yon du bsam pa yi// hUM dang a yi byin rlabs las// ma khrig ma sngags kyi 'khor lo las// yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa las// ba
38b4(rnying rgyud): dri min pa nyid du gyur// de bzhin tor mnyid la yang // snod dang brgyad curgya mo gyi// yang ni dang cishi du ltar// da thod pa nyid labasas// sngod dang badrud du gyur pa'is// rtswa mong 'khrug cing mtsho ltar 'khyil// yab sum thugs las thams cad 'thung //
38b5(rnying rgyud): hA sti'i las rnams ni// rnam par rgyal bar yang dag bshad// dang po rdzas rnams tshogs gyur na// stong pa nyid las rnam gsum gyis// hasti rab tu bsgom byas la// gtso bo'adabu yi gtsug tu bsam// sngags kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs// sngags rnams rab tu de shes pa//
38b6(rnying rgyud): 'i ba dz+reban+da/ han ta A+e / sngags song nyi pa 'bres / dzI ts+li pra bi // gas tan rnaM sam kyi sa/ hU~Ms mas cadag kyi sa// dbyeng pa dang ni byid dus la// che pa pa skad pa dang // thams ca pags pa shes /
38b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro lnga la las lnga ni// yang dag nyid du 'bru nyid thub// mkha' 'gro gsum ni mchod bya ste// rim pa don gyis gong du bstan// yid ma lhal rab mchod nas// mkha' 'gro rnam gsus spyan drangs la// thod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bstan// rang rang rtsa sngags gang yin la//
39a1(rnying rgyud): ba li tA yis gtor ma 'bul// gshegasas gsol dang srin las bcol// kum gyi mkha' 'gro mchod pa ni// gang yin thod par rdzas thug la// phab yum gnyis med bskyed byal// sngag kyi bya ba kun kyang bya// gtor ma a las byin bdun nas// mkhar 'gro rnam gsas sAb kyis mchod/ phrin las bcol la las gnyer gtang// ti
39a2(rnying rgyud): re la lan gsum btang // cibs ma las rnam grub par 'gyur// rdo phreng ba chen po gtong mi'i rgyud las/ dmachog sa kyi 'i bu ste/ dun po'o// / de nas rgyud gartad parab tu gsu te/ sangs rgyas kun gyis phyi mes ni// kun bya bzang por yin te// so sor ston pas gsungs pa bzhin// srung po rnams kyis rab bsdus nas// @
39a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi spyi mes ngas// rig can skyes bu khyod la gtad// gsang sngags brda' yis go bar gyis// las dang skal bar ldan pa dang // sbyangs dang las 'phror ldan na ni// shes pa rno la zos pa che// thogs pa med par rtsol ba des// des ni rgyud 'di rtogs par 'gyur// rdo rje phur ba chen
39a4(rnying rgyud): po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i chud rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ kI la yahi ta sa ma ya tI ta tan+ta/ bod skad du/ phung bu yak+Sha rba byed 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi rgud/ bcom
39a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa na/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor nyid las mi gzhan pa bzhis bskor te/ de'i dus su gdul gyi
39a6(rnying rgyud): chud gang la gzigs nas chos ston pa ni/ bskul ba mnyam par gnas pa zhes bya ba la/ dur khrod chen po rab tu rtsub mo zhes bya bar/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mo las bskyed pa'i srin po ma trang ka ru dra zhes bya ba/ yum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyas byed ces bya ba la/ 'khor
39a7(rnying rgyud): lho srin sde brgyad dang / lha chen po bcu dang / zho sdang gdug pa'i gcan gzan dug dang / 'dod chags gdug pa'i 'dab chags drug dang / gti mug gdug pa'i za gsod drug dang / mtsha sa sgor gyi mche ga shog gnyis dang / las mdzod kyi srin po lha ma dral drug dang /
39b1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sgom pa zhis bskor te/ sems can rnams la sna tshogs kyi gnod pa ni byed/ log pa'i lam la 'dug cing byang chub kyi sbu gu skes par byed do// phur bu za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas dus
39b2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya'i tshogs/ 'khor tshogs gadrug pa'i sdug bsngal la byams pa la// thugs rje thabs kyis drang bar mdzad du gsol/
39b3(rnying rgyud): ces ched du brjod pa las/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams bka' bgros te/ rta mchog thub pas btul yang ma thul te/ chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang la rtags kyi skur bzhengs te// des kyang mthul dam tshig la rbad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni khro bor
39b4(rnying rgyud): rab tu bzhengs te/ lha srin sde chen po brgyad gdul ba'i phyir/ 'jigs byed kyi skul dpal gyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan te/ zhe sdang gi bdud tho ma yor nag po gdul ba'i phyir/ thal chen gyi tshom bu dpral ba'i dme ba gsum ni btab/ 'dod chags mngos pa'i
39b5(rnying rgyud): bdud dmar mo gdul ba'i phyir/ mkhur ba sna dang gsum la rak+ta'i dme pa brtsegs ma ni btab/ gti mug dregs pa'i bdud 'phar ba mgo gsum pa skur skrag nag gtul ba'i phyir/ zhag gi dme ba gsum brtsegs ni thugs kar btab/ rdo rje gzhon nu dam pa
39b6(rnying rgyud): brtsegs pa des/ gza' nyi ma'i bu mo stag gi sha ma thabs can gdul ba'i phyir/ dpa' gtum za phyed stag gi sham thabs ni gsol/ klu bdud nag po si sha can gdul ba'i phyir/ rigs bzhi sbrul gyi chun pos ni thod pa dang yan lag brgyan/ 'byung po tshogs
39b7(rnying rgyud): bdag glang pA can gdul ba'i phyir/ theg pa mchog gi glang chen ko 'on ni brgyan/ srin po ma traka ru dgadul ba'i phyir/ zhing chen gyi g.yang bzhi ni gsol/ khams gsum srid gsum gyi bdud dga' ra ba dbang phyug gdul ba'i phyir/ thod pa tshar gsum ni
40a1(rnying rgyud): srul brgyan pas/ yum 'khong pa'i sdug bsngal smras byed gdul ba'i byed/ stong nyid dbyings las sdug bsngal rgyas 'debs pa// 'khor lo byas 'debs sul 'khril bar byed// 'khor lha srin rje brgyad 'dul bas dpa' zhes grags/ de 'don
40a2(rnying rgyud): rtags sku la brgyan pas na// dpal gyi chas brgyad ces su grags par bstan// srin po'i 'khor tshogs de rnams kyang // zas su sha za skom du khrag 'thung las su srog gcod pas// yak+Sha khrag 'thung srin por grags pa'o// chos kyi dbyings las 'jigs byed kyi srung bzhengs
40a3(rnying rgyud): nas/ dur khrod kyi chos brgyad kyis ni de ltar brgyan/ gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa ni/ g.yas kyi dang por rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa ni/ srin po gtso 'khor btul bas rgyas byed dpa' rtags so// g.yon gyi b+han d+ha rak+tas bkang ba'i nang na/ me tog mdangs dang ldan pa bzla l+la
40a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ 'khor ba'i 'dod chags kyi khrag zhal du gsol bas/ thabs shes rab bde ba chen pos rgyas 'debs pas/ rig pa rang rtags kyi phyag mtshan no// me dang kha T+wA~M ga dang phung ba 'dril ba ni/ phrin las don rtags kyi phyag mtshan no// za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/
40a5(rnying rgyud): ngagatso bo btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ kye badz+ra kI la ya/ sde brgyad lha/ srin brtul nas kyang // phyogs skyong lha chen bcu po rnams// thugs rjes ma lus gdul du gsol// shes
40a6(rnying rgyud): brjod nas/ yang yum gnyis su med pa las khro bo yab yum bcu bton nas btul te/ kun gdan du btings te rig pa rang rtags ni/ rdo rje dang b+haN+Da dmar gyis bkang ba'o// skye med 'dus ma byas ni rdo rje ste// srid rtswa sdug bsngal rak+ta zhal du gsol/
40a7(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod nas/ gnyis med bde chen skyong ba'i lam la bkod/ phyogs skyong bcu btul te phyag mtshan par mar bsnams// rgyal byed dpa' rtags zhes su de la grags// ri rab phur pa tha mar 'dril ba ni// phrin las don rtags 'byin pa'i phyag mtshanan//
40b1(rnying rgyud): ma la 'dun napa su su na sa dang / da/ ngas gas dang/ ga /
40b2(rnying rgyud): sa gi dang / gdus pa'i dam dang drugags te/ dngus ni la kyi mas bskyed/ ke nga bri sdigs su smras pa dang / dras pas par rgyas pa mdza d+he/ khrugs bskyed pa'i babyed pad+ma
40b3(rnying rgyud): rnams 'dul ba'i phyi khro ba rnams kyi sprul pa ma gakhon bskyeng de/ sngam drug dang stong ba mngad pas/ pe ye shes kyi mo blo yin pas sras byung byas/ sku gdug pa rtsal song du byung ste/ sprul ba'i phaman pa zhes grags so// rdzun
40b4(rnying rgyud): sa su khyen pa'i mi ga gan pa sgrus mas pa nga / ga gis mas nags da pa sa gas dag sa/ bathub thams pa
40b5(rnying rgyud): skyes gnan pa dang / s+yAng ki'i mgo na / snod sgom dbyings su dag pa'i ye shes dang / seng gA'i lhag na/ zhe byung skyon gyis spyi 'jigs pa'i ye shes dang / dom gyi sag na/ gdug gtu ma thams ca dbyams
40b6(rnying rgyud): bya'i stong pa'i ye shes dang / khyad par drug gis go sdang gnas su dag cad/ khyad pang du 'joms par byed pa'o// dkyil lakho de'i phyir ma lani/ 'dod chags sdug bsngal 'ad ba zags brgyad gnas te/ 'jug zhes gapar gyi ts+tsha
40b7(rnying rgyud): da dang / la ba'i 'og dang / 'jigs byed rgyam mtshig 'ayang ba'i thug pa dang / zla ga yogs pags grol pa pa dang / 'dos 'thung rgod nas 'da' kyi bri thad dang / thag can thams cad 'dul pa sor 'dang drug dang //
41a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ / de drug ni wam 'dod chags las bsnyen pa te/ 'dod chags kyi sdigs ma khrag/ khrag mthad mas pa ga shog pa te/ yum las gsod ze ga shog pa rnan zhes bya'o// de nasas 'dul ba'i phyir sbyor ba mdzad
41a2(rnying rgyud): pas/ thugs kyi sprul pa'i sras drug byung ste/ pha ye shes kyi khro bo yin pas lus lhar byung / 'dod chags 'dul ba'i byol song yin/ mgo byar byung ba'o// de la ni sprul pa'i phra me na ma zhes grags so// bu de drug la mkhyen pa'i
41a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes ni/ 'gro ba'i don la thogs pa med pa'i bya rgod mgo can dang / chos nyid mi 'gyur bya rog mgo can dang / mi shes mun pa gzigs pa'i 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / sdug bsngal dbyings su snyol ba'i khA ta dang / thabs dang shes rab
41a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba'i pu shud dang / nyon mongs dbyings su bsnol ba'i hor khra dang / ye shes khyad par drug gis 'dod chags gnas su dag/ khyad par 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o// dkyil 'khor de'i phyi rim na/ gti mug pa'i za gsod drug ste/
41a5(rnying rgyud): gti mug ngur phag khra mos sems can thams cad gsod par byed panyon mongs gtsor 'dzin gyi mche ba can dang / gti mug gi dug sha nag po ltas ngan don la 'dzin pa'i mche ba can dang / gti mug gi dug g.yag kham pa ro la rtogs pa'i mche ba can
41a6(rnying rgyud): dang / gti mug gi dug bya dmigs su nAg 'dzin thob pa'i gshog pa can dang / gti mug gi dug sre mo dug tsam che ba'i gshog pa can dang / gti mug gi dug byi ba hu la dga' ba'i las byed gshog pa can dang / de drug ni gnyis med gti
41a7(rnying rgyud): mug las bskyed pa ste/ gti mug gi snyigs ma sha mthar rgyas pa las byed mi shes pa ni/ yab dang yum las bskyed pa'o// de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir khro bo rnams kyi thugs las sprul pa mkha' nas bskyed de/ yum drug la sbyor ba mdzad de/
41b1(rnying rgyud): yu k+sha yin pas sras sgra song byung / mabyol song yin pas man byam stong druganas te/ de la sprul pa'i tha men ma zhes grags so// de drug la mkhyen pa'i ye shes na/ bAgan sa shas gsang dpe med pas nam rtog 'joms/ g.yang/
41b2(rnying rgyud): ni chos nyid 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don la 'joms/ sha ba ni ye shes byas pa'i mtshan ma'i bag chags 'joms/ dmi gas tha ni ye shes thogs med 'khor ba'i zhen pa 'doms/ sre mod ni nam tog bya rlag phye med dbyings su grol/ byi bzhi ci
41b3(rnying rgyud): sdang thams cad gzung 'dzin mtha' las grol/ ye shes khyad par drug gis gti phyug gnas su dag/ khyud par gti mug gasbyin po'o// dug gsum ma sgoms pa'i dred dang phrayang gnyis ni/ shar dang rub kyi mtha' na gnas te/ zhe sdang rus
41b4(rnying rgyud): mthal lha mche ba rgyas/ 'dod chags zag gi mtha' la byag shog ces/ gti mug shrI'i mtha' las bla mi shes/ de'i phyir drug gsas 'jams pa'i dred mo la shes bram mongs rtogs pa'i ye shes ma 'i la/ de ldang nus pa'i mtha'
41b5(rnying rgyud): brtse mo no/ 'dod chags khrag dgugazhan la snyan du te/ gti mug lam stong nyin par rgya mi shes/ drug gsum 'jom sa mdzad gshog tabs pa yang la/ mngag kun pa sel ba'i ye shes mnga' 'o// phur ba yak+Sha 'bar ba'i nAd las
41b6(rnying rgyud): chen po dang gdug pa'i dbyed brtul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lagan rdo mis/ badz+ra kI la yal 'di skad ces gsol / kye badz+ra kI la ya/ chen gdug par byed brtul nas
41b7(rnying rgyud): kyang // gtsug pa'i mi can rnam gsum 'khrugs pa las// thugs rje chen pos ma lus gangul du gsol// zhes brjod pas/ rab tu chub pa'i tshogs kyi drang khrod na/ phreng gi khyis 'dod chags dmar yu ma ni// sems can rnams kyi srog bzhang
42a1(rnying rgyud): 'grags/ dam sri lte phur nag mo ni/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog cing skem/ rgyas sri dA n+ting nag mo na/ sems can nas la nang gtong zhing srog gcod par byed pa la/ de gsum ni drug gsum gyi mthang na
42a2(rnying rgyud): kye sri can gsum yin te/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ thugs kyi yi ge 'bru gsum khar bcug pas/ shAn ma bzhi dang bdag nyid ma bzhi dang / rgyal mo bzhi 'khrungs te/ bu mo bcu gnyis pos kyang rang rtags srog gi snying po phul te/ ma
42a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes ni/ shA na mas thugs rje nyi ma'i 'od rgyas pa lta bu mkhyen/ bdag nyid mas sbyor ba lcags kyi cho tshwa lta bu mkhyen/ bse'i lha mos srog gi spu gri'i so lta bu mkhyen/ de rnams kyis kyang / dur khrod rab rtsub ma ru tse'i sgo 'gram der/
42a4(rnying rgyud): se na/ pra ma d+ha na ya hUM phaT/ ces rang rtags srog gi snying po rnams phul te/ bka' 'khor bsnang bar rang dmar nga gis bcas so// dpal chen pos gsang mtshan btags pa/ shA na mu kha dang / shA na ma sri ba dang / shA na ma rag dang / shwa Ta
42a5(rnying rgyud): las mkhan no/ bdag nyid ma re ma te dang / re ma de dang / re ma dza dang / re ma dzu'o// ba se dun+ti nag mo dang / bse ba ti nag mo dang / bse dun+te nag mo dang / tsha ba ko te nag mor btags so// phung pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i chud las/ gdug parje/
42a6(rnying rgyud): can btul ba dang / thul ba'i bu mo dam la btags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya// bdug pa'i sre can de ltar btul nas kyang
42a7(rnying rgyud): srin po'i tshogs bdag btul ba'i bka' 'khor rnams// phyir bla grub pa'i dngos grub ster 'gyur ba// thugs rje thabs kyi mdzad srol bstan du gsol// zhes brjod pas/ bar chad bsrung ba mtshams kyi las// rten du rung ba tshogs gsog lha// byin
42b1(rnying rgyud): kyis brdab pa dmadzas gsum// sru gsum sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bsgom// dpal cen yum lnga gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor nam gsum brten pa'i lha// dam can bcolnga bsgrub pa'i thogs// rgyal po'i las pa'i chog 'a zigs// 'di
42b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad stong khog yin gyi byang chub lam// che ba'i yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas sa// lha rnams bdud rtsis mchod pa dang // thugs dam bskang dang tshogs mtshams gcad cing bshags// dngos grub 'bru gsum blangs la mchod pa sbeng // dngos grub
42b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi mchod pa phul ba yang // dri ma dag pa lha la dri ba dang // slob mas gsol ba btab ste de la brlab// lha tshogs rnams ni gsal bar bskyed// spyan drangs te dbul bskang sogs rdzas rnams btegs la bya/ phung po bshig sa mchod
42b4(rnying rgyud): parnam gsum dbul// dngos grub blangs nas bcu gsum las tshogs rdzogs// nyi shu grub la mkhas na dngos grub las// dkyil 'khor bri dang mchod rdzas bkram// lhag ma byin brlab mgro na spyan drangs// las dang dbang bskus kha rdza btang /
42b5(rnying rgyud): thugs dam pa dang dang mchod mtshon bshags pa las// phrin las bcol la phur pas gdab// tha ma smon lam bro brdung kha bzhir bkru// las chan bcu gsum rdzogs pa lhag ma'i las// bdun la mkhas na tha ma mthu chen 'gyur// bcu bzhi ha
42b6(rnying rgyud): las kyi bzlas pa ste// sgrub pa'i las tshogs zhes ni ston pa'o// phung pa ba byed yak+ta 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor tshogs byang chub lam la sgrub pa'i le'u ste lta ba'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badz+re kA la ya la 'di skad ces gso
42b7(rnying rgyud): to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ 'khor tshogs byang chub bsgrub pa de lags na// mtshams spul dkyil 'khor tshogs bsags mi 'tshal lam// zhes 'dzod pas/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru kas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ phun sum tshogs ldan mnyam nyid du// phyi nang gas
43a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshams kyang bcad// phyi ni rgyal chen phyogs skyong gi// bcu bzhi mtho yis gcad par bya// nang ni las kyi mtshams gsum bcad// gsang bsgo gsum dam sri ma tAM mnan// bar mtshams las bcu rgyas pa'i
43a2(rnying rgyud): rim zhi// lus dag bsrung ba bdag nyid bsgom pa'i mtshams// bden pa bdar la bsgom pa las kyi mtshams// gnas bsrung ba ni gzhal yas khang gi mtshams// de yang mi shigs mtshon cha'i gur dang sa gzhi la// dmar nag dmar sla
43a3(rnying rgyud): me yI 'du 'phro 'khyil// ye shes khro bo bcu yang dbyings nas bzhengs// khrag 'thung rol pa'i lha ni nang na bzhugs// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus lhun gyis grub// mtshams kyi khang pa'i nang du ni// hi tha pad+ma'i gdan bshams te// sku gsung thugs
43a4(rnying rgyud): yon phrin las lnga'i// zhi khro lha rnams sngags kyis sprul// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab pa yang // gtor ma las rab kun gyi mchog/ las rnams kun gyi sbal 'gro// gzhong pa b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang // rdzas rnams lha yi rang bzhin las// rdorje
43a5(rnying rgyud): gram kha bcad de// rwal gsang ba'i yum bzhi gnas// gsang bdag dpal gyi zhabs kyis sbyang // thugs kyi 'od kyis lha rnams bskul// snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems// rta yi skyer zhugs lus kyi mkha'// gtor mar thim pas
43a6(rnying rgyud): dbyer med nA// sngags 'dis 'phrul la byin gyis brlab// ljo ba 'i tite jo ba la ba te gla ma sa ma ya/ bco brgyad gi shwa rtsa gcig byin pa dra bsngags// dbul ba'i sngags ni 'jug mched du 'arjod// bdud rtsi me shes lnga ldan pa// byin brlab gzung
43a7(rnying rgyud): nas byung ba'i rdzas// phul na ma slongs las gnyis rdzogs// zin badrab bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oMs p+la ba s+'u hrI ta hrISh+T+rI dz+dza/ dgug pa 'i byetshig cig tu// byin gyis bzla'as te dbu ba yin// blta chags pa'i rang bzhin no// dbang du 'dus shing la
43b1(rnying rgyud): rnams byed// rmad byung dam rdzas kun gyi mchog/ sngags 'di bzlas la byin gyis brlab// nga ra ga ti pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bcu pas byin brlab dbul bar bya// gtor ma lha yi maN+Dal la// bdud rtsi dkor pos te// ra lta chags shing dmar la dngas// byin brdab phul la
43b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i las// bskyed dang mchod dang bsgom bzlas rnams// mtshan ma dus dang grangs su bya// phung ba za byed yak+She 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mtshams bsrung tshogs bsags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / bsten pa bskyal ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang ga
43b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ bsnyen pa skyel ba'i rim pa de lags na// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mi 'tshal lam// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
43b4(rnying rgyud): dang po sa brtag pa slang zhing sbyang ba dang // byin gyis brlabs te bzung ba deng // sta gon mchod pa rgyas shes pas// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la 'jug/ mthing nag gru gsum nag po la// bla gam dmar po dbang gis spras// zlum po zhi ba dkar pos bskor//
43b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mthing nag la// gong ras dmar la 'od skor dkar// thod pa khra bos brgyan pa bri// rgyas pa'i gru chad ser po la// bar khyams phyogs mtshams sgo bzhi rigs// bcu drug cha las bgos pa yis// sgo yang brgyad kyi tshad du bya// sgo
43b6(rnying rgyud): rab bcu drug tshad// zhing gi ka ba de yi phyed// rtsigs pa tri dang pany+tsa e// yang na che ba'i yon tan rgyas// rin po che yi phung por bya// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // dbang drag thod pa'i khol mas brgyan pa bri// ye shes spos dang bral bas na// e ni DA ga kyang bas te/
43b7(rnying rgyud): ra bzod skam pha gu rlod// rdo rje phreng ba me 'od dmar// badz+ra yaSh+Ta mnyal// tsakra tri ti sa ma yA// thal mo drug bsnol bzhi sbyar la// blang zhing nam mkhar btegs par bya// pho brang rdo rje rwa brgyad la// rin chen lte ba phrin las bzhi// 'khor lo'i rtse mor ka rar rgyad// zhing chen 'dus
44a1(rnying rgyud): dz+ra/ TA / rgyan gyis smras// mchog me dngal btab zhing men san// klang chen du srin ti zlang bcas// steng gi ji ltar gnas gud par// 'og kyang de ltar gsal bar bri// pho brang mthol phyi rol dma'// ka skyegs lta bur gnas pa thI// gtso ba'i bdan/
44a2(rnying rgyud): dang bse mo'i thugs// thad kar gnas pa tsam du bsgom// nang gi dur khrod gzhal yas la// phyi ni rin chen gzhal yas khang // gsal ba rang bzhin med par bsgom// phur bu za byed 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun
44a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ pradz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ dkyil 'khor bri ba de lags na// lha rnams dgod pa mi 'tshal lam// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru kas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
44a4(rnying rgyud): med byang chub sems nyid las// ru dra lha chen gdan stengs su// rig pa hUM las khro bor bskyed// yu ma dang 'khril bas longs spyod rdzogs// phra thabs skul pa dug gsum 'joms// bar byams shA na bdag nyid bskyed// suM trAM hrI A bzhi las bskyed// sgo bzhir gsang ba'i
44a5(rnying rgyud): mo bzhi// yi ge hUM phaT ta las bskyed// bos la mchod pa'i las rnams bya// dbang dang byin brlabazlas nas kyang // bsgom bzlas bsgrub pa rdzogs pa dang // lo nyan ma gsum 'grags par ba// thugs rje sprul pa'i pho ha la// gzhi dang dngos po ngo bo phrin las gsum/ mgyogs
44a6(rnying rgyud): byed ye shes pho nyal// gzhi dang ngo bo phrin las dang // bka' nyan phrin las pho nya la// gzhi dngos phrin las dpung ldan na// 'gugs pa'i las la bsgrub par bya// de la gdab pa'i las brgyad bya// rig pa sems kyi phung pa de// skye med chos kyi dbyings la gad ba// byang chub sems
44a7(rnying rgyud): kyi phur pa de// yum gyi mkha' la gdab pa yin// tshad med snying rje'i phur pa de// khams gsum sdug bsngal chud la gdab// rdzas kyi phur pa dgra dang bgegs la gdab// dang po cho gso bus kyang bya// gnyis pa rnam rtog sgo lnga dgag/ tshogs brgyad dang po byin gyis brdab// rten
44b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis bcad dang 'khor rtsibs bcad/ phur pa' b+hed yak+ta 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gdab pa'i phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badz+ra kI la yA la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ lha dgod pa'i \u0f7f
44b2(rnying rgyud): las de las yin// gdab pa'i dgongs pa mthar phyin bstan du gsol// zhes brjod pa las/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru kas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// a b+hi tsar+ya'i dus la bab/ brnag pa'i las ni 'di nyid la'o// a ni chos dbyings skye ba med// su
44b3(rnying rgyud): dngos med kyi bden pa'o// b+hi ni gsang sngags byin gyis brlabs/ thugs rje 'gag med kyi phud pa shad/ brten te 'khor ba'i sgo yang dgag/ tsang ni gnyis su med pa ste// bdag dang phur ba gzas pa'o// rig pa rtsa bcud sha khrag drug/ gnyis med gcig pas
44b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas mthu// ya ni sku gsum rgya ma chad// byang chub sems ni rin po che// phyi ni kun gzhi nyon mongs yin// yid kyi rnam shes gsum du shar// nang ni he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs// gsang ba yab yum byang chub sems// dkar dmar gnyis su med dang gsum// rgya ma
44b5(rnying rgyud): chad na sgrib gsum byang // rtog pa bral na sems zhes bya// nyams su lon na rin po che// mtshon drug gong bu gyur pa la// mi blta don du bden bzhi bdar// da ltar bya ba'i dus la bab// lus kyi brnag pa rdeb pa yin// ngag gi brnag pa sngags bzlas bya// yid kyi brnag
44b6(rnying rgyud): pa rnam gsum po// drangs ma rnam gsum sbyang ba dang // dkar nag dri ma bkru pa dang // sems nyid rig pa'i dbyings 'byed na// brtag pa mtha' ru phyin pa'o// thugs rje gzhan du mi spro'i don// 'di nyid kho na'i dus la bab// phud pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gdab pa mthar phyin
44b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgongs pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya gdab pa'i dgongs pa mthar phyin pa de lags na/ dbang dang dngos grub blang ba mi 'tshal lam/
45a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ dngos gru babrang ba'i don rnams bka' sprul pa// ye shes sgra yi dngos grubade// don gyi gnas pa'i tshul du blang // rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma phrin las rgya gram de// gang la gnas pa de la blang // dam can byang chu/
45a2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub de// thob pa'i dus la brten te blang // rtse lnga me ri 'bar rtse dang // ti se'i gangs la nyi shar dang // 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma brdal// mthing nag sgrib rtse nyil dus su// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lnga yi
45a3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub blang // ting 'dzin lam pa'i dngos grub de// thob pa'i tshul la brten te blang // 'tsho ba zas kyi dngos grub de// thams cad rdzogs pa'i tshul du blang // de la dbang bskur bya ba yang // phyi ni bum pa'i dbang bskur te// bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag
45a4(rnying rgyud): gis bya// gsang ba a mr-i ta dang rdo rje tshe'o// phyi ni shes dbang ye shes ni// lhag pa'i byang chub sems so// nang gi bum pa'i dbang des lus dag pa ste// lha'i sku snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// nang gi gsang ba ni ngag dag par byed pa ste// rjel
45a5(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur sngags bklag pa'o// nang gi shes rab ye shes sa yid dag par byed pa ste/ sems las su rung ba'o// gsang ba'i bum pa'i dbang ni// 'khril te 'khyud cing bsrub pa'o// gsang ba'i gsang ba ni bde ba rtse la smin pa'o// gsang
45a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i shes rab ye shes ni// gnyis shor gnyis mnyam pa'o// phyag rgya ma yi rgyu 'khrungs na// rdo rje slob dpon bka' byung na// yi ge na yang skyed par chod// bla mas pad+ma mtshan ldan de// bu la gtad de sbyor bar bskul// bde ba'i ye shes byang chub sems/
45a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' nas blangs te rang brten nas// dbang dang dngos grub kha ru btung // de nas blangs te bu la bsgyur// mkhas dang gtsang sde med rtog na// grol zhing mi ldog bla ma yin// bu mo 'am chung ma mdza' bde mo// 'phangs pa bla ma de la dbul// dngos grub yon tan dam par 'gyur//
45b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'gram du longs spyod kyang // nya ma bag cha med par bya// mabyin btus na dmyal bar lhung // sems kyis thongs na sbyin pa'i mchog/ bla ma ye shes gter zhes bya// phud pa yak+ta 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dbang dang dngos grub bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu ba'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badz+ra kI la
45b2(rnying rgyud): yal 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ dbang dang dngos grub bstan pa de lags ni// hud dang dgongs pa'i khyad par bye zag rnams// phra mor byas te bstan par mi 'tshal lam// bye brag so sor bstan pa bka' stsal pa// rgya thug tsaldan dkar po dang // phrer pa yang na gra ba dang // sed ldeng
45b3(rnying rgyud): dpar mo dang // shir shing nag po tshor ma can// 'di brgyad phung pa'i rgyu yin te// yang na shing gi rgyu bstan pa// zhi rtse rgyas pa rtsa ba dbang // drag po sa yi gting la bya// dur khrod rus pa'i rgyud bstan pa// bya lur dkar po 'gugs byed pa// mgro glubs ni pa'i phung bar bshad// glang chen bzhon pa ser pol// dngos gyu rgyas
45b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phung bar bdad / rgod mchog gi bung de// dbang sdud las kyis phung par bshad// gcan gzan rkang gi phrad pa de// drag po las kyi phung bar bshad// dngul la zhi ba rgyas pa gser// dbang spyad dmar thabs zangs yin te// lnga bdun tsho glan drag po lcags// phur pa'i rgya chen bco brtsad po// mkhas pas rtse zag
45b5(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// chu la don gyi tshad bstan pa// skye ba rnam bzhi'i sgo bkag pa// tshad ni sor bzhi bstan pa yin// rnam shes brgyad kyi sgo bkag pas// rten 'brel bcu gnyis rgyu nu bcad phyir// 'bring tshad sor ni bcu gnyis bstan// khams chen bco brgyad rtsad bcad phyir// song ni bco brgyad ring tshad ldan// rna ma lnga'i
45b6(rnying rgyud): dgongs ldan par bar bya// phur ni rig pa'i ye shes te// pa ni sna tshogs dngos po'o// sna tshogs sems kyi cho 'phrul d+ha// rtogs na phur pa zhes su grag// dbyibs ni zlum po zhib la// rgyas pa rtse mo gru bzhi pa// dbang ni zla gam gsum du bshad// rgya mdud bcu ma gzhog brgyad dang ldan// de yi byin rlabs 'di bzhin no// sdug dang
45b7(rnying rgyud): dang ting 'dzin dang // lag pa'i 'du byed thabs shes rab// grub pas byin gyis brlab par bya// rig pa'i ye shes byang chub sems/ tshad med snying rjes gdab par bya// sgo bzhi don gyi tshad ma'o// phur pa yak+Sha 'bang ba'i rgyud las/ hU~Md don dado pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / phung pa yak+Sha 'bang bde rgyud rdzog so//
46a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya sarba d+ha ma ni nA Na ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i
46a2(rnying rgyud): dus na/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid/ thams cad so so ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/ mtha' dang dbus med pa 'og min gyi gnas/ drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas/ rgyu rin po che 'bar ba sna tshogs dang / 'jigs byed drag po'i rkyen mang po
46a3(rnying rgyud): bklubs pa/ rnam pa tha dad cing so so na gsal ba/ ngo bo gcig cing ye nas gsal ba na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i dbu gsum pa/ rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / a
46a4(rnying rgyud): dang / 'khor lo la sogs pa'i/ rigs dang / grangs dang / phrag d+ha dang // bdog la sogs pa'i dbong bzhugs so// de yang rigs kyi yab dang / yum dang / sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / khro bo dang // khro sgo dang bcas par bgrags so// de nas de bzhin
46a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo // de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni// ye shes chen pos dbang bsgyur zhing // dkyil 'khor thugs rjes 'gyur pa'i ngor/ rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brtan dag/ sra
46a6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi ngang las byung / yon tan phrin las de bzhin te// bde chen mchog gi gnas nyid do// zhes gsungs so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal
46a7(rnying rgyud): po/ ma lus pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes/ ma chags sum gyi dkyil 'khor na gnyis su med par bya ba dang // gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ rab tu drag po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos nyid ma g.yos
46b1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'i dbyings// ma bcos rang bzhin bde ba'i yum// rang bzhin sa g.yos dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul dang // phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// bde gshegs rgyal bas skyes pa'i gter// sus kyang dpag par dka' ba de//
46b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po bdag la gsal// zhes brjod pas ma chags yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par gyur to// gyur nas yum gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// chos nyid dbang bskur bde chen gtso// bde gshegs rgyal ba kun bzang yid// rang bzhin
46b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes drug yin te// kun bzang bde chen nyid kyi rgyan// bde chen thugs kyi rang bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi mchog/ skal med rnams la rang bzhin gsang // sku gsung thugs nas dbang mchog yin// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad gcig
46b4(rnying rgyud): gi rang bzhin du dbyer med par gyur pas/ nyid kyi ye shes las karma he ru ka'i ngo bong gyur nas yub po'i bdag gi trazla po// des bka'i lung go nas 'di skad ces gsol to// chos nyid ma bcos don 'di la// spos mes 'arjod med ye gnas la// skal med dre gas ches
46b5(rnying rgyud): de ltar gzung // gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin la// skal med 'thung brtsi lta bu// don 'di mi gnas bdag cag la// gnyis med rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes brjod pas/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bcos sems nyid rang bzhin la// ye shes brjod med ye ye
46b6(rnying rgyud): kAng // 'khrul pa'i bag chags phra mo 'dis// gzung 'dzin dngos po gnyis su der// byin ci log tu gol ba ste// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo las// thabs chen 'bar ba'i rol pa yis// bden pa gnyis kyi dang du bsgral// zhes gsungs pas/ karma he rukas khrag cung
46b7(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// ma bcos chos nyid rang bzhin las// rol pa'i sku ni ce ltar byung // yang dag 'den pas ci ltar bsgral// dngos su bskal ba'i yon tan ci// zhes gsol pas// khrag 'thung rgyal po badz+ra kI la yas/ ye shes med pa ma yin
47a1(rnying rgyud): brgya dang bcu gnyis cang /
47a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings nas shin tudrug po mi bzad pa'i sgra smyung nas/ theg can gsang ba'i bstan pa 'di// rgya cher thugs par gyur pa ni// mya ngan 'da' bar lung bstan te// 'bras bu chub par smon pa ni// rdul thal dri med bstan pa den
47a3(rnying rgyud): mchog gi zhing khams dag pa 'dir// snang bathob pa'i skal can la// don gyi bar bshad par bya'o// nga ne sdang ba 'dinu ba nas// chos kyi me long dam pa zhig/ nga 'das thing gi 'jig rten 'dir// 'byung ba'i dge slong skal chen pa// bstan pa'i nang byen pa
47a4(rnying rgyud): nas ni// kun dang mthun par grags 'gyur zhing // nga snang mi gnas de rjes na// lo ni brgyad cu rtsa gnyis na// gsang 'dus mya ngan 'das pa 'di// byang chub snying po can zhes pa'i// sa le gser gling bya ba ded/ las dang thugs rje mthun pa yis// chos
47a5(rnying rgyud): mig gcig 'byed 'gyur zhing // rigs ldan kun gyis thob gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ snying rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ kye ma ho sangs rgyas mang po'i tshogs// kun tu snang ngo rab tu 'dir// srid
