47a6(rnying rgyud): pa log pa'i gdug pa can// 'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs// sdug bsngal chen po yi dwags te// las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir 'byung // drag po rang gi dka' thub kyis// srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin// drag po ru dra'i dug dpal gyis//
47a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro rnams mthar rlogs 'joms byed 'di// gdul bar bya ba'i 'os mchog ste// snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus la// sdug bsngal las kyi rgyun bcad de// pade chen sa la bzhag pa'i rigs// zhes gsol to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/
47a8(rnying rgyud): blangs dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ nyid kyi ye shes rigs kyi khro bor sprul nas/ mi 'dul bar dgongs nas bka'i 'gro ba mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung snying pos bzos pa
47b1(rnying rgyud): kye ma'o 'dus pa'i tshogs chen dag/ 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ltar// da lta dus 'dir byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// khro bo'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu
47b2(rnying rgyud): drag gtum par 'gyur// shin tu kho drag gtum pa yis// 'o dod 'bod par ltung bar 'gyur// mi bzad chen pos sdug bsngal te// dug gsum mtha' la mngon zhen pa// ci lta ba yi thabs kyis gdul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das gti mug chen po'i
47b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis bgros pa/ shin tu gtum pa'i sems can 'di// ci ltar de dag bzhag gyur na// bag chags ngan pa'i chu rlabs kyis// bdud kyi tshogs su mngon 'phel nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyan gcod cing // bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur// de tshe mas
47b4(rnying rgyud): mun pa yis// 'gro ba ma rig 'khor bar 'khyams// dug nad rims nad phraman ma// gnod sbyin gdon dang log 'dren nyid// srid pa gsum po 'jig byed cing // dam tshig gtan po 'jal byed pa// ce lta ba yi thabs kyis 'bul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'ang
47b5(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon zung ba// las kyi gdug po'i rludzade// rgyal ba 'das pa'i sbyor ba yis// ci ltar khro drag gtum pa ltar// da lta tshe 'dir byung ba yis// dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ngo bo 'di// 'bar 'phro 'gug pa'i stong ba yis/
47b6(rnying rgyud): ci ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du 'os// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas kyang // khros pa'i sprin nag gtibs pa yis// mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bgros so// bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen pos babros pa/
47b7(rnying rgyud): gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// 'ams gsum ma yu
48a1(rnying rgyud): spos ci dgos// zhes bgros so/ bcom ldan 'das phrag dog chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las// log rtog phyin ci log pas bcings// dngos po rang dgar zhen pa yi// gdul dka' ma lus
48a2(rnying rgyud): da
48a3(rnying rgyud): rigs dang spen gang du gtogs// las skal spyod pa ci zhig byed// ma btul ba'i skyon nici// brtul na yon tan ci ltung 'brog/ ces brjod pas bka' stsal pa/ log pa'i sems can chen po de// legs pa'i rgya rkyen las mthung // nyes pa'i rnga rkyen las bya
48a4(rnying rgyud): ni gzung 'dzin tog las byang // rkyen kyang log par spyad las byung // 'bras bu nyon mongs lnga ru smin// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs can te// gdol pa can gyi 'byung por gtogs// las skal chags sdang spyod la zhen// ma btul ba yi skyon bstan na// lcang
48a5(rnying rgyud): mo yi srid pa brlag/ kha lo lag par bsgyur nas su// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab stongs te// 'khor ba ste chad du ltas la// sangs rgyas dman rigs su lus nas// don la mi phan skyon yod do// btul na yon tan dpag tu med// dug gsum rtsad gcod 'khor ba po
48a6(rnying rgyud): nas grub// 'khor ba chos nyid chen po 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing khams dag pas na// btul bas yon/ na chen po 'thob// ces brjod pas/ ka rba ge rukas shin tu bskul te/ e mgo dz+rarje la la// dus la bab pa'i bskal cen 'dir// las la bab pa'i sngags
48b1(rnying rgyud): rje yis// rnam par spen pa'i 'thung po 'di// bslal ba'ab zhig zugs rje'i mchog/ ces te bar bsgral bas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis/ sprul pa'i tshe 'phrul mdzad de/ ye shes kyi smin dam nag ni dbyung gA char sprin du gtibs pas/ 'ab rung /
48b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs su bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bden pa'i gzhung gis 'dung bar gzas pa na/ dru tra nug pos so gol lan gsum brdabs te/ bdag mi phul bar 'dul bar ngo mtshar gyes te/ gos tu mapyod kyis bdag thul ba ma lags te/ khyod pa
48b3(rnying rgyud): gnas su dka' thub kyi bde ba la gnas shig zer te mnyan to// de nas khro bo chen po rnams kyis/ rdo rje rta mchog gi tshogs su sprul nas/ khro bo ta mchog tshogs kyis thul bar bka' bsgo ba las/ dpal rta mgrin gyis gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bus srin po'i/
48b4(rnying rgyud): ma sring rnams dbang du bsdus nas/ 'dul ba'i 'khor khrims par byas nas yang khos mnyan te mthul lo// de nas yang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas/ ye shes kyi sprin 'gro ni nam mkha'i sprin bzhin gtibs nas/ gzugs kyi sku rags par bzhengs te/ spang ci
48b5(rnying rgyud): ci khams su ye shes kyi sbyin rnam par dag pas gzegs nas/ bdud drung dag po rtazhig/ srog chags kyi skams lings la spyod par gzigs nas/ sran rdzo baspu pa tshul dumathun par rjod dgos te/ rnam par rol tha~Mng bran tu brten pa'i tshul gyis/ drang 'dod
48b6(rnying rgyud): rta gdong gi tshogs la bka' bsgob/ rdo rje gdong gi tshogs kun song rab tu song la/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag la bdud kyi tshogs kun srog chags kyi skyams lings byed pa la so tshugs shig ces bka' bsgob las/ rdo rje rta'i rgyal pos 'jig rten gyi khams su tshe 'phrul
48b7(rnying rgyud): bstan nas/ 'jig rten pa'i ri bo ma la yag nam lcags yod pa'i rtse mo la so btsugs so/ der yum ral gcig ma dang bad+ma d+h+r-i gu ta gnyis bsnyems so// dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams su cho 'phrul gzugs kyi skur mngon par
49a1(rnying rgyud): bstan nas// kun rdzob chos dang mthun par/ 'jig rten khams su cho 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis bcags te/ srin po'i skams langs ngal gso ba'i bar du/ srin po'i gling khams su gshegs nas// nyon mongs pa'i 'ang mdza
49a2(rnying rgyud): de sdang gi rdzong la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgya mtsho la chags pa'i phyir/ srin po'i gling khams kyi phyi rol na/ khrag gi rgya mtshos bskor ba de dag dpal khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rak+ta bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul nas zhal du rngubs shing gsol to//
49a3(rnying rgyud): gtsang ba'i 'dam rdzabs kyis bskor ba de dag dri chen las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul nas zhal du rol lo// go ro tsa na dang rkang la sogs pa'i bcud 'khyil pa de dag byang chub sems las bdud rtsi sna chog su sprul nas zhal du gsol to// rnag dang chu seng gi Sha ba 'bab pa de dag
49a4(rnying rgyud): dri chu las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul nas gsol to// 'bru dang 'bu shin tu chi ba dang / lcags kyi sbrang ma la sogs pa kun dang / bsgral pa'i sha rus thang mar brdal ba de dag/ mAng sa las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul nas gsol to// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i
49a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs su bskal zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs su bskyed de/ srin po'i bu mo'i tshogs dang / chun mo dang gtum mo'i tshogs la sogs pa la/ ma chags thabs kyis sbyor ba mdzad pas/ sras 'phags pa'i lus la sems can gyi mgo btags pa mang po byung ste/ phag
49a6(rnying rgyud): smug gi mgo la sogs pa mang po srul to// de'i gnas ter dus kyi grong byer rtsod pa thegs pa'i zhing na/ srin po lo d+hA ba ni nyid ni/ 'khor ba smin pa'i drung por du/ nyon mongs pa smin pa'i chang gis bkang ste/ longs spyod cing gnas pa las/ 'jigs byed tshul po dang
49a7(rnying rgyud): la yas/ srin po'i gzugs su sprul nas/ e ma ho// bdag gi gtso min byin zhes te/ bam chen gyis waM las pab ste/ rje la dung po gri mtshozha la du bsgrubs pas/ kI la yas rlor to// gzhan yang ngos par bstsu'as shing rol to// de nas sang zhogs
49b1(rnying rgyud): yid mches nas bltas pas rang gi gtso bo bas bzhin bzang zhing mdangs 'bang bzhig tu mthong ste/ e mgo// bdag gi gtso bo gang lags pa de bas gzi byin che bar gyur zhed pa las/ k+Shi la yas srin skad thengs gsum gsungs pas yid ces par gyur/
49b2(rnying rgyud): ma na / dbug na san
49b3(rnying rgyud): mas kyis gshegs nas dgyes pa'i tshul du dgongs te khro bo rdo rje'i mdur gung blangs nas sman no// de'i dus na dpal kI la yas/ lhag pa'i byang chub sems kyi 'du 'phros/ yi ge AM gyi tshogs su sprul nas/ srin mo'i lhums sa tha ba'i dkyil 'khor/
49b4(rnying rgyud): 'khyil zhing gsal bar gyur te/ sras rdo rje srin po 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i tshe lugs can zhig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ srin mo'i lhums su bzhag go// de nas dpal kI la ya nyid kyis/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs rtser gyis la gshegs te/ dbyings
49b5(rnying rgyud): kye dang du mi dmigs par gyur // de nas srin po rang gi gnas sgra phrin pa dang / rang gi gnas kyi longs spyod kyang mi sdang / 'khor rnams kyang lal zer dbyer/ sgron ma mthong ba phag dang stag gi mgo can la sogs pas bskor te/ shin ta yid mi dga' zhing /
49b6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa chen po skyes nas/ e ma ho// bdag gi gnas 'di lta bu ci zhes pa las/ srin mos mdun bsus nas/ e me ho sdig pa dpa' bo de lta bu'i tshig 'khor gyi nang du gsung ngam/ tshod kyi dgongs pa ni bdag gis deng phan chad du bsgrub pa/ pa
49b7(rnying rgyud): khyams ni mi bde bani/ dpa' bo khrod kyi rigs mtshan pa gcig lags na/ rtse zhig 'khrul zhes spros pas/ phri/ po'i rang bzhin gyis srin mo'i gzugs mthong bas kyang / mdangs dang bkrag du ldan pas chags pa skyes te/ bdag gi rigs
50a1(rnying rgyud): pa gcig kyang ngas par 'byung ngam skam nas/ dga' ba 'dod pa'i sbyor ba la zhugs so// de nas 'dod pa zhi ba'i skabs su/ kI la yas srin mo las srin po DUt+yA skyes pa'i tshul bstan te/ rdzu \u0f7fsa skad byings gsum
50a2(rnying rgyud): bas/ dpal rngam pa'i skad du gyur nas/ srin po dang srin mo brgyal bar gyur to// brgyal ba sangs nas bltas pa na/ 'jigs byed badz+ra kI la ya dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa la/ rdo rje'i gshog pas nam mkha' khebs pa gcig tu byu
50a3(rnying rgyud): yab lha'i sprul pa de la/ yum gyi sprul pa bstan pa'i tshul du/ srin mo gro Sh+NI shwa d+hir gyur pas/ mtshan yang rdo rje srin mo zhes bya bar gsol to// de nas srin pos kyang rang gi sems bltas nas/ nga rgyal gyi dka' thub skyes nas/ srin de gaphru
50a4(rnying rgyud): te/ ru lu ru lu zhes brjod pas/ mgo gsum la lag pa drug pa/ rkang pa bzhi pa gcig tu gyur to// badz+ra kI la ya dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa de las/ khro bo dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ de la sogs pa tsha tshwa dang skar mnga' bzhin du
50a5(rnying rgyud): pas/ ngag gi sprul pa 'phrogs te/ bskal pa'i snying po A~M dang d+hi gi bar du ru lu bcug nas/ dpal chen po dag gis bzlas pas/ ngag gi dbang po nyams so// de nas yang ngag gi sprul pa byas te/ srin skad brjod pas/ mgo dgu lag bco brgyad pa gcig tu gyur
50a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du ngag gi sprul pa phrogs so// yang srin po'i ngag gi snying po bskul te/ ru lu ru lu zhes brjod pas/ mgo lnga yan lag bcu drug par gyur te/ de bzhin ngag gi nyes pa phrogs so// yang srin pos nga rgyal gyis che ba bskyed nas/ ngag gis snying po bskul lo//
50a7(rnying rgyud): srin skad brjod pas/ mgo nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa gcig tu gyur te/ de bzhin du sprul pa phrogs so// de bzhin du nga rgyal gyi sprul pa bkyes nas/ srin skad brjod pas/ lus che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa gcig tu gyur te/ rkang po mi
50b1(rnying rgyud): grobral du chug pa/ mag tha zad pa'i rtsa mor rig pa/ nad kyi bskal pa kha nas gtar bzhig tu gyur nas/ de la kIl las de bzhin dru dag gi sbrul bzlogs te/ nas 'ba'i mthu dang mnyam pa'i drug tu cing yang sangos pa'i gzugs pa smrar te/ nga/
50b2(rnying rgyud): gi dbang po phrogs pas/ skyes bu gang dag lce bcad pa bzhin du dbang po nyams pas/ lan blan zhing spobs pa'i thabs med nas/ 'bros par gzas na kI la yas sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas/ srin po de la dam tshig bskul bas/ sngon gyi dus na bka'
50b3(rnying rgyud): nos shing tha tshig gnyen po bsrungs shing ngam mnos pa rjes su dran nas/ rang gi srog gi dbang pos ma bzod ste/ mdun gyi phyogs pas cer gyis bltas pa las/ badz+ra kI la yas// TA T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya bstan pas/ gangs ri rung chad pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de na
50b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dbang gi phyag rgyas sked pa nas bzung nas/ zhal du med pas chubade sngon gyi dus na gsang ba'i bka' smad nor ba'i las kyi dbang gis/ nyon mongs pa'i thag pas bcings te/ nga rgyal gyi de'u chen po tshogs pa'i rgyas bskyed pa'i bag chags su gzhi lha bdus gci
50b5(rnying rgyud): sbyangs nas/ chos kyi pho brang mngon du mthong ste/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ye shes te/ skye ba bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam par lus blangs shing / sdig pa spyad pa kun kyang dran zhing / blta ba dang las log pa kun kyang shes nas
50b6(rnying rgyud): las dge sdig mi bslu ba ni rigs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po thabs cig tu bgros par gyur pa nyams su myangs/ de nas cung zad cig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snam du bton pa las/ shin tu mi dga' ba'i gdung ba skyes nas dus te
50b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ e mahong pa'i bzugs rje chung // shin tu bde ba'i gnas shig nas// snam du bton pa thugs rje chung // 'a'adas su mthi yis byin ma rung // gal te bka' las 'das grung ni// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus steng // rul mya gnas ni 'tsheg par
51a1(rnying rgyud): a gyur// ma dang sring mo tho mo rnams// 'bangs su dbul lo bka' la thogs// dbus su mchis pa'i skal med kyi// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog/ phud la 'tshal ba'i skal med kyis// lhag ma kha zlas bro la stsol// dang
51a2(rnying rgyud): lanan tan ma chung zhig/ ces shin tu sbeng ste gsol ba btab pas/ dpal chen pos dpal gyi brjid klu tshangs pa'i mgur bzhengs nas/ lung ni bstan/ kha T+wAM ga'i phyag tu yang bstan/ sa ma ya'i sgra yang bsgrags/ srin po nyid ni slar mi ldog pa'i sa
51a3(rnying rgyud): la bkod nas/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i zhing khams su/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar lung bstan nas/ srin po'i 'khor nye gnas mo rnams ni/ skyes dang byi mor bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs so// bran pho dang bran mo rnams ni/ bka' la
51a4(rnying rgyud): btags te dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' bskor la bzhag go// 'khor gyi gtso bo nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po/ lha chen po ma hA de ba la sogs pa rnams ni/ pho mo gyi cheng su bsnol nas gdan du bting ste/ lus kyis gdan byas pas/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa byang zhing //
51a5(rnying rgyud): bayod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed la/ rna bas chos thos pas shes pa'i rgyud grol te/ shes bya'i sgrib pa byang zhing ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhag go// srin po'i 'khor gdug pa can rnams ni ltag dang gzig la sogs/
51a6(rnying rgyud): pa rnams gdam rjir byin gyis brlabs nas bzhag go// srin po'i 'khor rnams slob bskyed pa'i phyir ni srin po chen po de ltar dga' ba de ltar spyod pa mdzad de/ keng rus kyi'i rab rtse mo la/ thod zas brdegs pa'i gzhal las khang gi mun / gachen gyi gzhes dang / lang ring /
51a7(rnying rgyud): dang / khrag gi rgya mtsho thod paskam rlon gyi phreng chun/ zhing che chung gi log dang / d+han d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba/ ba su ta'i bu zer/ thal chen gyi thig le/ zhag gi tshom bu// khrag gi zo ris/ zhing dang drang khrod kyi rgyan la sogs pas skra dang gzhal yang khang brgyad do// 'jo
51b1(rnying rgyud): kyis kyang srin pa'i 'khor dang mthun par skub te/ khro ga za mo mgo brtan rnams dang / rdo rje mtheg shog can la sogs gdug ba can mang pos bkor bar mdzad do// de ltar de dag g.yon tan bskrun pa de 'jig rten du grags so// phung bu mya ngan las 'das pa du
51b2(rnying rgyud): chen po las/ khro bo rang bzhin ngo bos bdud btul zhing rnam par shes pa mya ngan las bzlas pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang karma he rukas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to//
51b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i chu thugs rje dpyang thag chad pa'i sems can ngan pa'i ngang tshul can de la/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul bskrun pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// yang ngo mtshar ko zhes dmas nas/ tshigs su bcad nas zhus pa/ de yi rjes su bsgrub pa yi// rnal 'byor
51b4(rnying rgyud): gnas ni gang dang gang // dmigs dang rnal 'byor dgos ched ci// glu dang sgom thabs byin rlabs ci// brdeg dus dam tshig blta dmigs ci// yo byad rtags dang dgos ched ci// dbang dang dkyil 'khor phrin las ci// bsgrub na don dam kun rdzob gang // kI
51b5(rnying rgyud): la ya yis bshad du gsol// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// gnyis med gsal ba'i ngang nyid kyi// rnal 'byor don zhus ya mtshan che'o// gnas kyi dam pa bstan pa la// gzhung ldan bkra shis byin can dang // nyams dga' ba yi gnas dang bzhi'o//
51b6(rnying rgyud): drag po'i gnas kyi dam pa ru// dur khrod shing gcig rgya gram dang // gcan gzan mang po rgyu srang dang // gnam ni gri 'dus gru gsum// logs la tsher ma can gyi shing // gcan gzan gdug pa sna tshogs chu// rtsa bar mi rigs sna tshogs dur// yod pa mkhas pas
51b7(rnying rgyud): brtags te brtsam// de ni drag po bsgrub pa'i gnas so// dgongs pa'i don nyid mi gsal zhing // dam tshig nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel// blta ba log par 'dzin pa des// gnas der bya ba yongs ma gsungs// byas pa nyid na brda chad 'byung // de bas
52a1(rnying rgyud): gzhung dang mthun gnas sA// yun bsring bsgrub la khe bol med// dam tshig ma nyams gzhung bsrangs shing // ting 'dzin gsal ba'i blo can gyis// gnas kyi dam pa de dag tu// drag po'i las 'di byas gyur na// nges par
52a2(rnying rgyud): 'grub ste the tshom med// de lta bu yi gnas dag tu// byin rlabs mtshams bcad ma rungs bslad// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams bsgo ba dang // gzhung dang mthun par dkyil 'khor brtsig/ chag chag gad cings tshon brlab// tshon phye bkye zhing dkyil 'khor bri// tha ma
52a3(rnying rgyud): tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la// zhe sdang khro bo rI ma bzhin dgod// gzhan yang rim par mkhas pas dgod// de dag gnas kyi yon tan ni// myur bar bsgrub dang shug 'byung dang // ngan pa'i don gyis ngan pa bsgrub// don la/ khyad med nges par ni// ngan pa'i gnas rnams gang ma der// nges par 'grub par yang dag
52a4(rnying rgyud): bshad// bkra shis zhi ba'i gnas dag tu// yun bsring bsgrub kyang phung 'tshengs med// don gyi man ngag mdor bstan pas// rtogs pa'i tshad dang ting nge 'dzin// sbyar te bsgrub na chud mi za// myur bar thogs pa med par ni// gong du bstan pa'i gnas su gsungs// de ni brtag
52a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rting 'dzin gnas// zhes gsungs so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rnal 'byor pa'i bsgrub pa'i don zhus pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dmigs bstan pa ni// 'di skad bka' stsal to//
52a6(rnying rgyud): kun la bya bar lung las med// srog don bka' dam las kyi nyams// mtshan mas nyams par gyur pa dang // 'dod par 'gyur ba'i nyams dang bdun// bsgral ba'i dmigs kyi dam par bshad// de yi so so'i mtshan nyid ni// pha ma mkhan po slob ma gsod//
52a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje nang dme byed pa dag/ nams kyang dmyal bar ltung byed pas// bsgral pa'i dmigs ni dam pa yin// srog las nyams ra'i mtshan nyid do// slob dpon bka' bsku ngan dpya sems// sngags dang phyag tu rkun gcod dang // gsang ba'i man ngag spel byed na//
52b1(rnying rgyud): dwe yang bskyal ba'i dam pa yin// don las log pa'i mtshan nyid do// rgyu 'tshang 'dru zhing yag 'dogs// srung ba 'debs shing log par 'khrid// rtags kyi don 'dri log par 'dzin// de yang bskal ba'i dam pa yin// bka' las log pa'i mtshan nyid do// thAd+ya/
52b2(rnying rgyud): mi rung sna tshogs byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon par ston// sbyor sgrol phrin las 'chol par spyod// blta ba chos nyid rgyab tu 'dor// log pa'i spyod pa dang du len// nga rgyal gtum khro rang gang gtong // man ngag don bstan log par po// pha rol don la log
52b3(rnying rgyud): chos spyod// don ni phyin ci 'og la mkhas// bka' gzhung bong nas log par brtsam// spyod pas log pa mtha' dag byed// rU tra dngos ka de yin te// dngos su bsgral yang mi skyon no// dam las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid do// skye gnas gcig dang mi gcig
52b4(rnying rgyud): pas// sgrol ba'i mchod pa'i klor 'ongs nas// sngon ni mkhon 'gras med pa ru// brgal ba'i glag la bab mthong nas// nye sa med gzhan la gnad du 'dzugs// rgod cing bzhin bzlog zhe tshig smra// rang nor bor nas gzhan la bcu// bdag gis nyes pa ma
52b5(rnying rgyud): dran yang // dbrog sa med par bdag las 'phrog/ bdag gis bsgral bar ma bsams kyang // bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'dod pas// dbang med nan gyis bsgral bar bya'o// ya ga ga la mi che la 'tshol// phan mu med par bdag la 'tshe// las kyis nyams pa'i
52b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid do// de lta bu yi nyon mongs de// las kyis 'khor bas sdig med bshad// gnyis med don la phyogs char 'dzin// chos nyid don la spos khur gcod// thugs dam can gyi thugs las dkrugs// skye ba med pa'i don bshad kyang // mtshan ma can
52b7(rnying rgyud): gyi chos bzung nas// lha srin bran du ngas 'khol gyis// mthu dang rtsal 'gran su zhig byed// nyams su dpal dang ma mo byung // nga ni ye nas dpal chen yin// zer zhing gzhan la khro zhing 'tshe// de la bsgral ba lhung yang brtsam// mtsho rnams nyams
53a1(rnying rgyud): bya/ pa'i mtshan nyid de// mnyan pas ga zhing rtog med de// mthu chen mtshan mar 'dod pa yis// las kyi gco mtshan ma spod// me thong zhing che mthung kyis thogs/ rang gi ngo gdong zag gis byugs// dmar sdod dong ba tho
53a2(rnying rgyud): btags// don gyi spyod pa'i gzhung bor nas// bya ru mi rung las rnams byed// tho rtsor spyod cing dam mi bsrung // brlang po'i spyod pas bka' gzhung sdod// dus gsum sangs rgyas zhabs nas drangs// rnal 'byor sngags kyi ya gar song // 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i
53a3(rnying rgyud): ga pa dang 'gal// sha zan ma mo'i 'tshogs bkram// 'dod pa'i nod gyis snying thus nas// gsod par shes snang 'dod pas rgyal// gang du byur ba sngags 'chang 'joms// drug tu shes kyang lto ru bza'// gtan zhing btsun yang thabs kyis spod// thob
53a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod na gsang sngags chu// bza' du yod na rnal 'byor gyi// zas dang sgrub pa'i longs spyod ru// de dag bskal ba'i dmigs yin te// 'dod pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid do// bsgral na yon tan 'di rnams so// de dag bskal na rnal 'byor btsun// bdud rnams
53a5(rnying rgyud): btul bas bstan pa gnyen// med par bsgral na bar chad nyung // don bsgral ba'i yon tan yin// ma bsgral skyon rnams bstan pa la// dmyal khams 'phel zhing mtho rjes 'grib// gzhung spyod rnal 'byor sgyid lug nas// gsang sngags theg pa'i chos sgo
53a6(rnying rgyud): 'gag/ ces brjod pas bsgral ba'i don la shin tu dgyes par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgral ba'i dmigs kyi mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang gyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas/ don dang rtags rtogs
53a7(rnying rgyud): pas bsgrub dgos pa'i phyir/ don spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// 'di skad ces brjod do// yang dag don gyi nal 'byor ni// gnyis med blta ba gdeng du gyur// spyod pa rlabs chen thabs su spyod// phrin las tshogs med nying rjer skyong // dam
53b1(rnying rgyud): skyog na mangs drug lnga grol// sgrub pa gnyis med rgyal por bsgrub// shes rab rnam gsum dems su 'dzin// Ni nang bka' chung don lags la// theg pa'i mdagu 'asgrub pa'i lam// phyogs med 'alta ba gdang du 'jag// yongs su med pa'i bsgom pa la// dang /
53b2(rnying rgyud): tshig 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin no// don gyi man ngag bsgrub la gtong // tshogs med tshul can mkhas pa bsten// rdzas dang lag che rtags su 'chang // ngang tshul bzang la don gzhung spyod// ta na ga Na ldem po dag tu ston// phung ngo lha yi dkyil 'khor du// snyam 'dra
53b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul du bskum// sems ni chos nyid dang la gnas// las su bya ba'i don lamakhas// 'dza ba dang phyug rgya'i dang la gnas// nges par bsgrubs pas gdon miza// rjod kyi 'jig rten gtor gzhod du// rdzas kyi dngos po gter mar sbyar// rigs rdug
53b4(rnying rgyud): sems can dkyil 'khor mthon/ ci dgyis bka' nyan sprul pa 'gyed// bkar zhing dgug pa'i dmigs pa ni// drag shul thabs kyi pho nya ni// rdzu 'phrul shugs las thabs kyis 'gyed// rnam tog mtshan ma thabs kyis 'dul// mud la/
53b5(rnying rgyud): blo zhen ba sgrub la brtson// yi dam lha dang gnyis med na// de la bar chad 'byung mi srid// las su bya ba chud mi za// phrin las bye brag rnam par 'byed// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog yid kyis spang // gtsang sngo med par don du skyong // thang dor med par don bsrub/
53b6(rnying rgyud): na// ga la dmigs pa 'grub ces bshad// de lta bu yi don ldan zhing // chos brgyad nya shi mar ngo la// drag po'i dus tshad las su shes// drag po'i las la rab brtson na// las su bya ba'i las rnams ni// ma mo mkha' 'gro bka' nyan tshogs
53b7(rnying rgyud): de yis bko lag ci lang byed// dran dang nga bzhin byas pas nyan// de yis mngag na ci yang 'grug// de ltar bas na gzung bzhin 'grub// 'jig rten 'dir yang tshe longs spyod// legs pa ga rdzogs ngas 'azhir// yeng la bsam pa bzhin
54a1(rnying rgyud): 'grub// ci 'dod dang las 'byung bar 'gyur// bdag gzhan na gnod don gnyis 'grub// phan pa'i don ni jig nyen 'dir// sad sa gzang dang bar gyu'ababs// mi thugs smra mnyan 'ang gnod// spyod pa
54a2(rnying rgyud): na 'jig rten 'dir// sad ser shwa n+ya thog gtong dang // mi dang phrugs la nad gtang ba// de yi gtan tshigs sras shes pa// rnal 'byor de ni don dang ldan// zhes brjod do// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i glang chen po las/ ye nas yin pa'i don de la/
54a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa'i don la sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa lta ba'i nges pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang nyid kyi ye shes sems kyi phur bu bstan pa'i phyir/ cho 'phrul rang rtags kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ drag po mya ngan las
54a4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i phur bu'i rgyud 'di dag bka' stsal to// byang chub sems kyi phur bu ni// phur bu kun gyi rgyu ru grags// don gyi phur pa byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// 'khor ba ngan song mya ngan bzlog/ sdug bsngal byang chub mya ngan 'o// sem
54a5(rnying rgyud): can sangs rgyas mya ngan blo// yul ni dbyings su mya ngan blo// mkha' yi gtun khung dkyil 'khor du// rigs drug sems can mya ngan blo// byang chub sems kyi phud pa ni// sdang srid phur pa'i rgyu ru byung // 'byung ba'i rgya yang sems yin te// sems la lam gyung
54a6(rnying rgyud): chos med do// ma rtogs don ni 'di rnams so// lcags sa ma shing bu mchog dang rkang // gser dngul sgra 'phang bya ba sogs// tsher ma can gyi shing dag la// zhi rgyas dbang drag phung pa bya// de yi mtshan nyid gang yin pa// lcags sam nag po'i shing rna
54a7(rnying rgyud): ni// drag po las kyi phung pa'i rgyu// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams ni// yon tan byas pa'i phur pa'i rgyu'o// zangs sa ma dmar po'i shing rnams ni// gsung mchog dbang gi phur ba'i rgyu// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams ni// zhi 'chos nyid phur
54b1(rnying rgyud): shing shing d+hA mchog
54b2(rnying rgyud): 'o// de drag so so'i ngo bo ni// gnas sngags sa lcags blo zla gsum// mi rta bsad pa'i mtshon rtse bzhi// phal pa'i lcags dang lnga la ba// gzhan yang shing ni sgra mchog rkang // gdug pa can dang bkra mi shis// khrod dgu shi ba'i lugs mo yi
54b3(rnying rgyud): de la drag po'i phur bu bya'o// skyer ba dbyar pa sri shing dang // smrigs shing la sogs shing bu la// de la rgyas pa'i phur pa bya// 'khar ba ljon dmar seng ldeng dang // mdze mo gla dkar tsher ma can// de la dbang gi phur pa bya// tsan+dan dkar po shug pa 'jag/
54b4(rnying rgyud): skar bu shing rnams la// de la zhi ba'i phur ba bya'o// dbu la rgya mdud gzhal yas khang // pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi dang ldan// logs la sems ma bzhi bzhi gnas// rigs bzhi de la bzhi bzhi'o// dbus kyi lte ba khro rgyal gnas// khro so brgyad dang khro mo ba
54b5(rnying rgyud): gags gi la migs pa mi dbring da // rgyam dang gi ga das // rkyeSh+Ta dang ni la gyi/ kyi maphrul pa thamangal dang / ga na ma brgyad dmas dang // ngas can mas la sgom dadang // dag pa'i gdas cad da /
54b6(rnying rgyud): ha brgyad dang lcags kyu dgod// bur gsum logs la sgo ma gsum// dbu dang rtse ni yab yum gnyis// rdo rje gzhon nu bzhugs pa'i gnas// don la gzhal yas khang gi rtags// rgya mdud gnyis su bstan pa yang // thabs dang shes rang gnyis me
54b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// dbyings dang ye shes che ba'i rtags// rtse mo drag po zung gsum ni// ye shes rje gcig drag por bshad// jag po rgyas pa dbang dang zhi// dbyibs dang kha dog so sor bya// rtse mo zur gsum gu bzhi dang // blag ma bla mapo dag tu gzhog/ rangab tu mi
54b8(rnying rgyud): srun nags dag nas// tsher ma can gyi shing dag la// rtsa ba'i phyogs su rgya mdud bya// rtse mo'i ngos su phrin las ni// so so rang gi gzhung bzhin gzhog/ kha dog gong gi rigs su sbyar// bde gshegs sa bon lnga rnams kyis// byin gyis brlabs shing dbang yang bsngar/
55a1(rnying rgyud): ku gul bajug cing nyung dkar brdeg/ ra khyi'i khrag dang gsur chen gyis// so so'i snying po gdon bzhin byug/ byin brlab dbang bskur shin tu gces// don gyi spyad ni dam tshig bsrung // kun gyi rgyu ni byang chub sems// rgyud kyi rgyal pa rang
55a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pas// chu 'bras med par mya ngan 'das// rtogs pa'i don la gnyis med kyang // ma rtogs baphral ba'i don ched du// bka' las blang ba'i rgyu dag las// tshul dang ldan zhing legs par bya// rang gar byas na bka' las nyams// rnyed rtson byas mamin
55a3(rnying rgyud): rlabs chung // ngan dgur shoms na rtog par 'gyur// tshogs par bsog na gzhung dang mthun// bka' bzhin byas na byin rlabs che// mdor na rtogs pa gtso bor bya// rtogs pa'i don rnams mthar phyin na// rnam rtog las 'di bya ba min// de skad ces ni bka
55a4(rnying rgyud): la bas// bar 'i kyi 'ab gzhanams dang / su brgyang na la stsa 'angs par 'a pa yang // ra sna ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu chen lam/ tha pa'i glingang byung nga la ying rjod par brtan pa'i le' byud pa /
55a5(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ che ba'i chen po dang dag cing gsal ba'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum ye nas phur pa'i dang // srid gsum yi nas rnam dag cing // phur bu ye nas mang 'das
55a6(rnying rgyud): kyang // bden pa gnyis kyi mal gdags// rang bzhin bcos med don shes shing // che ba'i ye shes don shes na// chos nyid do 'or byin rlabs pa'o// gzhan yang byin gyis rlob pa ni// phyi rabs rnal 'byor mched rnams la// gnas ldang dpa' bo 'bru lnga dag
55a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khor rnams bgegs kyis mi tshugs par// rdo rje gshog par byed brlab pa'o// yo byad rdzas kying po la// ra~M yaM khaM gi 'brugasum gyis// bsreg gtor sbyang bu rim pa bzhin// tshogs che rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/
55b1(rnying rgyud): slo du ldas// kyin bag/ da nga // sa na bya // rdzangs sasanan// // rdzun na sa// dasi la na nga ca mams
55b2(rnying rgyud): da kyi byug nas brnyan/ bam pas ma dam/ chen bar pa'i dru ba 'ang// rkyen me ma lngas mam/ phyi 'i dre/ tshe bya zin cing dzin gyis tshigs la bdu byin// bdu sgrub kyang chag mi
55b3(rnying rgyud): ste/ pa pa na sto// da kyi na la
55b4(rnying rgyud): 'i da di la pal dang /
55b5(rnying rgyud): sa su nga// sa / ma
55b6(rnying rgyud): su su su
55b7(rnying rgyud): yor bzhag
56a1(rnying rgyud): as du su shA/ stsa / ma gas das/ sa mnanan / marna sa/
56a2(rnying rgyud): sa / du
56a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyasu ba dang bcas// lte bcibs dang ldan pa pa/ phyogs mnyams thab ba nga bcas// rgyamad 'ag ma'i gzhal gas la// gang ga sa mam par dang bas// gan ni brgyad dang nas mir bcas/ chung te sa gas ga gdong ba sa/ khurags
56a4(rnying rgyud): lagro ma'i tshogs// spyi dang rtsel lab yum gnyis// so so'i snying brjon tsam gyis// gzugs dang gnyis su med par bsam// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa dang // byi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// dam chog rjes su dran par bskul// gnyis su med par nan
56a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par// longs srod rdzogs sngar byin brlab pa'o// spreb man chang zur gsum la// re skad mthing nag zhal gsum po// ral pa kham nag k+Shi sa? ta// gyen du 'greng zhing srid rtse 'bar// brang gis 'gro dang zod tshon dang // stag dang klung chen zhing lpags kyis/
56a6(rnying rgyud): spu dang yan lag shin tu brgyan// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs shin tu rnams// ngur khrod rgyan brgyad me dpung na// gru gsum e yi nang du ni// sku phrad phyags phur gsum pa'o// sum cha nub nas g.yon la gzigs// phyag g.yas dang po rna ltag gdengs// 'og
56a7(rnying rgyud): rab gdon tshul mdzin// g.yon gyis rje rdzing rje la rdol// 'og ma phur ba 'debs pa'i tshul// brjid dpung 'joms shing ngan song sbyang // mthu dang rngu 'phrul gzhan pas che// rtag pa chen por bzhugs par bsam// sprul pa'i lu byin brda po //
56b1(rnying rgyud): zhed par / rtsem 'das su phaT bsam la// sku gsung thugs su drin gyis brtag/ ngos gsum gzhag zur gsum phaT// shin thugs la zhing 'gyur ba dang // sa so 'thab thams cad kyis// byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur te// rdza rA /
56b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil ma ra de dag nyid// phyogs bcur 'phros nas slar 'dus te// hU~M hUM phaT phaT sgra 'byin cing // sku'i bstim shing dbang rnams sbyin// de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyis// sngon chad stong grogs bya ba ru//
56b3(rnying rgyud): zhal gyis bzhes shing ngam bcas pas// de yi stongs dang grogs mdzad do// de yang bdag nyid chen po las// phur pa'ang bdag nyid chen po che// byin brlab dbang rnams bskur ba'i phyir// g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la// hU~M dang AHna shin tu gsal/
56b4(rnying rgyud): lcang mo mthe bang mdzub srin dang // mthe'u chung la sogs g.yas g.yon la// A~M hrI trA~M hrI AHla sogs// rim pa bzhin du gsal bkod la// swar sI zhes brjod pas/ thal mo mnyam par sbyor ro// oM badz+ra mad+hiwi d+h+waM/ sir mo cung zad po dz+wal bar \u0f7f/
56b5(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra \u0f7fd+haH/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol te bsngal// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ phrang gragrangs / cing par bcang // lag pa / gabartses la// mthe bong gnyis dang phrin lag dang // mthe 'u chung bar du phur ba gzhug/ mthob bsngal ladu'i bsgril// A dzadrA A be+e sha
56b6(rnying rgyud): ma/ phyogs bcu bde gshegs sbas dang bcas// zhe sang rjes su dran pa yis// srang 'ab tsam kyi sladang 'bon nas// bar mtshams med par phyar ba la// blta zhing bstim la ciHgyis brlang // sku gsung sngags sa dbang daphyur nas// sar kyi rgyab rdzos
56b7(rnying rgyud): bang mo gshib// bsgrengs pa'i bar du phur ba gzung // I badz+ra sa twa rAng tre/ de nas sor mo phrag phrag por byas te ting bas phur bu brdung / oM tarba ba phaT/ de nas sor mo rgyab bsnol te// mthe bong gshing pa'i chang par gzhug/ A+oM han tan ti zhwa tshal gyi
57a1(rnying rgyud): drug tu brjod cing dril byas la// bdag nyid spyod pa'i gzisbyin kun// phung pa'i skul ba zugs pas// rgong khams gang bar me skrag gro// dmigs pab pas cad dus grub pa'i// rkyen dang dbang man ldan kya // ma rag
57a2(rnying rgyud): la bzhugs gsol nas// brdeg cing badrug ste mchod pas mchod do// oM badz+ra yak+sha g+ho ta tsha ba pa b+hi phaT/ oM badz+ra bru~M bi tA lI ha na ha na hUM// sngags dang bcas pas brdeg cing badrug/ yid la brtag pa'i phrin las bcol// lhags la 'dra 'phro pa'i tshogs las
57a3(rnying rgyud): bskyed// dbyings nas / khro mo mngon phyung gi gi bzhad// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// zhe sdang bdud 'dul khro ma la brjid par ldan// rtsa ba rgya mdud rigs lnga'i sras dang bcas// lte ba Sh+To rgya la yab yum phyogs mtshams brgyad//
57a4(rnying rgyud): smyug dang gya rgod la sogs 'khor dang bcas// dbus kyi rgya mdud steng 'og khro rgyal dang // yA ma dang sprul pa bse mo go'u ra ldan// zur steng seng ha brgyang dang lcags kyus bstan// b+hur gsum logs la sgom 'jigs gzugs ldan// dbu zhabs dpa
57a5(rnying rgyud): chen rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum ldan// gnyis med don gyis sems kyi jo bor snang // yang na ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// sems ste rang bzhin cir yang sbyang // phur tha wa yi dkyil 'khor du// bsgom zhing byin gyis brdab pa na// mgo dang na ba ma nor pa/
57a6(rnying rgyud): rgya mdung gnyis dang zur brgyad dang // rlung gsu ma pa ru rab tu bzhog/ lcags dang gsem dang zangs dngul dang // tsher ma can gyi shing dag la// maung yang bcwo ba rkyang bzuganyis dang // brgyad dang lnga dang bzhi dang gcig/ nas gang tshad dang gang rung ra/
57a7(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rim par 'god// oM badz+ra l-I l-i kI la ya// hUM ga zhe'as// dzacoM/ khyer mAM sa'i drug gis byug/ brdeg cing bdug pa gong ma bzhin/ hU~M dang dza dang par la sogs// spro dang bsrub tshul bzhin gyi/
57b1(rnying rgyud): brlab pas ma chud nges par gzhag/ dbu yi rgya mdud chos kyi sku// gnyis pa longs spyod rdzogs pa skye// rtse mo sprul pa'i sku yin te// khro rgyal dpal chen yab yum dang // khro rgyal 'khor bcas rim bzhin mo// khro rgyal khrag 'thung sngags na
57b2(rnying rgyud): sdes// phur pa rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor la// yang dag brten pas byin gyis brlab// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// nges po'i snying po 'bru bkod de// de yang tsan ka tsa ma dgod// 'gro 'dra mang po'i rim pa yis// stong gsum 'jig rten phur pas ba
57b3(rnying rgyud): snying rjes bsgral ba'i dmigs pa la// raM yaM khaM gis rim par sbyangs// nam shes snying gi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub sems kyi rtsi btang ste// dkar nag mtshams kyi sring la ni// dge sdig las kyi shan gyi ste// rnam par rtog pa'i sdig blangs nas//
57b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i las kyi gdul skyang gis// nyon mongs dug gsum bcom nas kyang // rnam shes gser zhun lta bu de// yaM gis btegs nas phaT kyis 'phang // hUM gis bsdus pas mkha' la bstim// rigs des sras su nges par bya// oM AHb+h+rU~M gis byin brlabs te/
57b5(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs su gsal byas nas// ngan song sgo gsum shin tu gcad// nam tog bskal ba'i zhing bcur brlab// de yi rnam shes chos kyi sku// rnam dag gabyings kyi ngang du bsgom// don du rang sems mya ngan 'das// zhes brjod pas// ji ltang snang ba
57b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor sras mchog kI la yang gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las// phur pa'i rang bzhin dang / lha bkod cing byin gyis brlab pa dang / tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas yang rnal 'byor pas byas pa la don yod
57b7(rnying rgyud): rabya ba'i phyir// rab tu mi g.yo gang ma 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs nas/ g.yos shing 'das pa'i skyon dang // yon tan 'di dag bka' stsal to// ma g.yos rngam pa chos kyi dbyings// de la bdag rol ye shes mchog/ gnyis med chos zung na
58a1(rnying rgyud): bA che// che ba'i yon tan bas ma yas pas// ma bcos thig le nyid kyi ldan// longs spyod rdzogs sku mi zad gter// rdzu 'phrul thabs kyi 'od zer gyis// nyes pa 'joms shing legs pa skyobs// yongs la khyab cing ngon
58a2(rnying rgyud): pa med// bye brag sna tshogs cir yang ston// sprul pa'i sku ste kun la khyab pa'o// de yang dus gsum 'dus ma byas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje ste// rang bzhin med pas 'dus ma byas// dmigs med brtan pas rdo rje'i sku// g.yos pa med pa'i chos
58a3(rnying rgyud): nyid la// rang snang ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs// bcos med thig le chen por gnas// mngon par byang chub sku lastan pa'o// gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin la// gnyis su med cing phyogs char 'dzin// bya ba med la las rnams byed// des don
58a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub la log par mthong // srog dam bka' don las kyi nyams// mtshan mas nyams dang 'dod par 'gyur// nyams pa'i mtshan nyid bdun po de// nams kyang ngan song 'gro bas na// de dag don gyis ma bsgral na// nyams pa chen po'i rgyur 'gyur te//
58a5(rnying rgyud): bu lha yi dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya chen por grub par bsgral// don dam spros med thig ler bsgral// don du spyi dang / zad par gnyis// lhag pa'i dam tshig gsum du gsungs// spyi yi dam tshigatogs par bya// khyad par dam tshig bsrung bar bya// lhag pa'i dam
58a6(rnying rgyud): tshig gnas par bya'o// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum po dang // yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga bzung // don dam gnyis med ston pa'i sgro na ma la// blta log ngan sems rku 'thog brdeg la sogs// ngan du smra zhing gnod pa dngos mi bgyid// de dag dngos su byas na dmyal
58a7(rnying rgyud): bar gyi'o// bzlas brjod sngags dang snying ngo bar mi gcad// gsung gi dam tshig nyams na dmyal bar skye'o// don dam ga nyis med gzhan la spel mi bya// rang gas thabs kyis chod nas me rtogs pa// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pas de bzhin no// skyor sgrol
58b1(rnying rgyud): sbyin len dang chog brlang rdzun// nyon mongs rang gar sbyad pas ngan song rgyu'o// drug lnga ye shes lnga yi jo bo la// ma rig log par mthong nas spang bar byas// mi spang dmatshig nyams pas de bzhin no// dri men dri chud mar chen mA sa sems/ so so'i rnam par
58b2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa ma 'byongs te// nyon mongs lnga la chags pa'i ngo bor spyad// gnyis med don dang 'gal ba de bzhin no// phung po 'byung ba kha dog dbang po yul// gnyis med blta ba ngan pas so sor brtags// ye shes lnga yi don dang ma ldan pas// gnyis med don dang
58b3(rnying rgyud): 'gral bas de bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs dang pad+ma las// rigs kyi khyad par ye shes lngar snang ba// ye shes dmigs med don de ma rtogs pas// grub pa'i 'bras bu med pas dmyal bar bshad// spyi yi dam tshig de dag gzhung bsangs na// sa
58b4(rnying rgyud): kazhi chen po 'dra ste kun gyi rten// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ste 'dod pa 'byung // gcan gzan sing ge 'dra ste zil gyis gnon// don gyi rtsa bar 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin bsrung // 'bras bu yang dag nges par gdon mi za'o// gzhan yang khyad par dam chog d+ha
58b5(rnying rgyud): mang yang // mdo dang don du nyi shu'i don dang bstan// gcan gzan rgyal po seng ge gsad mi bya// za ma tog tu ngan pa'i dug mi byug/ rin po che yi lcug ma rtswa mi gcad// gangs kyi kun chu khol ma yang mi btung // padz+ra rgyas pa'i ze'u 'bru la mi phye// zug rdo la
58b6(rnying rgyud): snod du bcud mi blug/ ma brtags pa yi nor dang zas mi bsre// shel sgong dkar po rdzab tu bsgrub mi bya// sdod ngan nang du seng ge'i 'o mi bzho// yid bzhin nor bu thab tu bsreg mi bya// bya yi rgyal po khyung gi gshog mi bcag/ gnam lcags ngung mos sa la brda ba mi bya//
58b7(rnying rgyud): stag gzig rol pa'i zas kyi lhag mi bza'// rdo rje'i gtams pa'i brag rnams yongs me bshig/ rdo rje bas bskor ba'i go mi thal// mun pa sel ba'i sgron me yang mi gsad// rdo rje chu yi 'ol ka gcad mi bya// rgyal po rtags kyi phyag rgya sbyin mi bya// rdo rje'i ma bar bzang
59a1(rnying rgyud): gtams pa'i rmad mi bzlog/ rgyal mtshan rtser btags nor bu rin po che// 'dod par gyur pa'i mtshan mas dpog mi bya'o// gnyis med don gyi mya ngan 'das mod kyang // log par brtags pa'i dbang gis so sor snang // khwang
59a2(rnying rgyud): par bstan pa'i dam tshig don rnams te// dngos su nyams na ljon shing mes tshig bzhin// zur gyis nyams kyang grub pa'i 'bras bur ring // kun tu nyams na brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// gzhung du bsrungs na rang snang 'bras bur 'char// rgyun du bsrungs na don gyi
59a3(rnying rgyud): man ngag 'grub// lhag pa'i dam tshig don gyi gzhi ru sbyar// spyod pa rgyun dang rang bzhin lta ba gnyis// gal mdo nges pa lta ba nyams drod bzhi'o// spyod pa rgyan la dam tshig bzhir gnas so// gnyis kyi dgra sbrang gyos 'gyur dgra gzhom mo// gsang ba'i
59a4(rnying rgyud): brda bsrung le lo'i dgra spang ngo // rang bzhin lta ba'i dam tshig bzhir snang ngo // srid gsum yongs bsgral khams gsum zhing du blta'o// dug gsum rtsir bskur 'khor ba gnas bsgyur blta'o// gal mdo nges pa'i dam tshig gsum du snang // mkhre du
59a5(rnying rgyud): mnyams pa yi mdo// mthar phyin pa yi rtags dang gsum du bstan// ma nyams pa yi mdo la bzhi ru snang // rtsa lag zla dang zhar gyis ma nyams pa dang bzhi'o// mthar phyin rtags kyang de bzhin bzhi ru snang // dam can 'du zhing mthu rtsal che ba dang // zin
59a6(rnying rgyud): rlabs che zhing rig pa chags pa gnyis// yid 'ong 'byung zhing 'dod pa 'grub pa dang // mang pos 'asrung zhing grags pa thob pa bzhi'o// lbupa nyams drod dam tshig la bzhi'o// gdal ba chos nyid lta ba ye 'byams su'o// rig pa ye shes lta ba ye gsal
59a7(rnying rgyud): du'o// sprul pa phyag rgya'i lta ba ye gnas su'o// khyab pa snying rje'i / kha sum khyab pa'o// lhag pa'i dmatshi gdon lam gnas na// ci ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs kyang tshe chang bas// gnyis med rjod gyi ngo bong rtogs par bya'o// don dam pasgrub pa 'don du
59b1(rnying rgyud): bskyang // dam tshig ma nyams gzung yod na// 'di dag 'grub par 'byung bar ni// dpal chen khro bo'i rgyal pos bshad// nyams par 'gyur bas mi 'byung ste// slar la rang sems brlag par 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshe
59b2(rnying rgyud): do khro bo'i tshogs dang // sprul pa yang sbrul du bcas pa thams cad dam tshig dbye ba med pa// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub cing gnas par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig
59b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang 'gro ba ma lus pa dag par bskal ba dang / phyin ci log tu 'khyams pa rnams thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir// zhe sdang 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad bka' stsang
59b4(rnying rgyud): srog dam bka' don las kyi nyams// mtshan mas nyams dang 'dod gyur nyams// nyams pa'i mtshan nyid bdun po 'di// skye gnas gcig cing rgyu mthun yang // nyon mongs sems kyis log par khrid// bya ru mi rung las la brtson// lta ba gnyen po rtsal
59b5(rnying rgyud): par btang // spyod pa zab mo tho cor spyad// ta na ga Na phrin las 'tshol bar byas// tshig gi mtshan ma'am rjes su 'brangs// dam tshig gzu lums ras gcod byed// spyi dang lhag pa'i dam las 'das// myur bar mdar med par lhung bas// thugs rjes bskal
59b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i dus la bab// don dam gnyis med dang du bsgral// phung po yab la 'byung ba yum// mi dge log lha yab yum bcu// yan lag thar pa sloba'i dang // rnam shes dbang po dus dang yul// go'u rI ser ha'i tshogs su bsgral// phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor du//
59b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyar bskal ba'i dus la bab// dngos po mtshan ma'i rdzas dang rten// dngos med bskal pa'i dus la bab// kha dog dbyibs dang grangs dang ming // brjod med bskal ba'i dus la 'ang // dbang po yab la yul gzugs yum// mya ngan 'das par shin tu bskal//
60a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs med bskal ba'i dus la bab// gzhan yang brdeg pa'i dus bstan na// mda' 'phen sgrub mar ngo la// mig dmar phur bu gza' lhag gsum// dang ba'i dus su nus la bab// kla nag mar gyi ngo la 'dug/ gzung /
60a2(rnying rgyud): dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// phun sumachogs pa'i slob dpon gyis// rdzas dang lag cha mngon bsags la// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gzhung bzhin du// gnas shing bsgoms te bri bar bya'o// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi tshar byas nas// 'dzad
60a3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa 'bum du 'don// phog phyag brtan thabs kyis bkye// shin tu gas pa zhing zhugs par bsam// rab kyis mngon du grags par 'gyur// 'bring gis lid 'gul bar nus// 'phang dang ldeg dang 'tshag dang 'khrol// thams nyams dang rtags 'od
60a4(rnying rgyud): de tshe brdeg pa'i dus la bab// de med bar du dus tshod med// cho ga tshang bar gyur pa dang // rtags de mngon du byung ba dang // dus la bab par bshad pa yin// zhes brjod pas// don gnyis su med pa las/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis/ 'khor 'a rnams gnyis
60a5(rnying rgyud): snga med par bsgral ba dang // kun rdzob tu yid ches par byas nas/ nges pa'i don gcig tu go bar gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las// dus dang tshod bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang don thams cad
60a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med cing brjod yas 'das par bstan pa'i phyir/ thams cad mya ngan las 'das te/ nges pa'i don gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings kyi lta ba 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnam par dag pa yum gyi tshul// ma skyes mi 'gag thabs kyi sgra// rig
60a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rang byung bas// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdus// thabs kyi bdag por bdag gnas pas// 'gro kun zla med gnas su bsgral// chos sku rtsa ba sems yin pas// brtags shing don du rang sems bzang // sems kyi rtsa ba don rtogs shing //
60b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med klong du don mnyam dang // gsungs shing brjod pas bsnyen pa la// gnyis med don gsal ting 'dzin te// lus kyi bskul bskyod phyag rgya'o// phur ba byang chub sems kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// srid gsum 'gro ba'i gdung /
60b2(rnying rgyud): sha bcad// byang chub sems kyi phur ba yis// ma gdab bzhin du lhun gyis rdzogs// mnyam pa'i rgyal po reg pas gdab// phud pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi phur pa des// gzhan du gdab pa'i gnas med pas// gnyis med ma bcos chos
60b3(rnying rgyud): nyid la// rang rig byang chub sems kyis gdab// phur bu 'dzin chags mya ngan 'das// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dngos las 'das// dngos po kun bral phur ba yis// dngos po phyin ci log la gdab// don la gnyis med mya ngan 'das// gdab dang mi gdab
60b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis las 'das// phur pa skye ba med pa'i don// ma skyes brdal ba'i phur pa yis// dbyings la btab pas rig pa shar// sems la btab pas don dam rtogs// khyab gdal rang bzhin phur pa yis// snang srid kun la khyab par gdang // de ltar rtogs pa
60b5(rnying rgyud): thebs pa yin// mngon tu gyur na rtogs pa yin// tshig las 'das pas sangs rgyas yin// grangs las 'das pas brjod du med// rang bzhin phud pa'i don nyid ni// phur pa bla ma chen po'i don// phur pa chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// phur pa rig pa'i ye shes so//
60b6(rnying rgyud): phrang ni sde ba med pa'i dbyings// pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i don// gnyis su med par mya ngan 'das// thabs kyi rgyal po phur yin la// pa ni shes rab dga' ba'i don// gnyis med mnyam pas rdo rje'i mu// phud pas kun khyab nam mkha' 'dra// phur pas khyab/
60b7(rnying rgyud): gsal nyi zla 'dra// kun la snyoms pas jo bor snang // chos kyi chos nyid phur pa yin// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid pur pa yin// sems kyi sems nyid phung ba yin// rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi zla// ma nang ga nges pa'i don yang yin// gnyis med gsal bas
61a1(rnying rgyud): babyung ba rnye// gamang bsnga na byung// 'jal la ba/ dab ma na te// gad nas ni gang bar gnas// gus la bar brnam pas brgya ba sbyin// nyams 'gazung na bags pa'on// gnasus pa 'gyur ba sem
61a2(rnying rgyud): wA kyis togs na bas pa yin/ zhes dpas da pas bzlas pa thams ca/ byarab dbulas 'das pa'i drung du sangs rgyas par gyur to// ba sa myangan las 'das pa'i rnadu chen pa 'a
61a3(rnying rgyud): lbu ba chos nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud bstan pa'i lde'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod pa 'byung srid na/ dmigs pa bcas la bsgrub dgos pa'i phyir/ rdzas
61a4(rnying rgyud): bo 'di dag bsag par gsungs so// sngags pargyan gyi chas kyi rdzas// glang chen go non zhing gi shun// stag gi shamra bu sbrul gyi rgyan// thal chen zhag dang rags brgyan// rdeg po las kyi rdzas bsag pa// gzhung las 'byung ba'i phur bu ni// nag po rag
61a5(rnying rgyud): kyi b+ha bar shes// dag bgegs dbang du btu phyir ro// b+hu phu rgya gong gshog tu grags// rnab 'din dbung dang dgal ba'i phyir// byer bur gnan pa'i bu dbur thags// rnam bzhi'i sprin las bya ba'i phyir// mngag pa'i phung du mchog sur grags// 'dren cing la
61a6(rnying rgyud): par byed phyir ro// gdab par sna lnga'i lcags srir grags// nyon mongs mngon du bskal phyir ro// drag po 'i sgrub pa'i rdzas su bsngag/ dug dang gu gu la yungs kar gsum// gsung chen ra lci'i khrag dang gsum// phur bu gdug pa'i rdzas su bas ga/ rabs chang mo
61a7(rnying rgyud): thod pa dang // ra gyi dre'u mjo mon gyi thod// brtag par bya ba'i rdzas phubs pa// grog mkhar sa dang mi rungs// gangs kyi dum bu ngu tshe'i phub// rathug lug thug gcin gyis sku// lin khya ba'i rjes su bsag/ shun chen grog shog shog gsum// mi
61b1(rnying rgyud): rna' yin rbaN+Da/
61b2(rnying rgyud): bri ba'i rdzas srabs ga/ sman dang bu la?g tshwa gsum// rkyen bzlog spyan gyi rdzas su bsag/ b+haSh+Tha ga tur ma rak+Sha gsum// mchod pa slob pa'i rdzas sbu bsag/ dza gang rtse dang tshims byed gsum// kun tu rgyu dang ga lA b+hi lA// ka ta ri la \u0f88\u0f90 chos bdun// mdzu
61b3(rnying rgyud): zlargyas mngar gsum rdzas// bsgrub pa tshogs kyi rdzas srubs ga// dmar gyi ka/ zo ba grang // ma mo mkha' 'gro ba rten pa'i rdzas// shes rab can gyis bsag pa'i rdzas// mtshan ma dzis rnams tshotshogs pa dang // gzung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// gnyis med don to srub pos
61b4(rnying rgyud): dka' bzhinas tu pa tshub bzhin bya// gzhung las 'byung ba de byas na// rab kyis zla ba gcig gis 'grub// 'bring gis lo gcig par gyis 'grub// tha mas lo gsum tshun chad kyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par bshad// yan lag dbang po nyams la sogs//
61b5(rnying rgyud): lhog pa mu gzir dag/ ci ltar dmigs pa de bzhin 'ong // gzhan yang shwa dang ser ba dang // mi nad phrugs yams de bzhin no/ zhes brjod pas/ phyi rabs pa'i rnal 'byor bas las su bya ba'i rdzas dang rtags la mgo ma chongs zhing las kyi bya la rten yang
61b6(rnying rgyud): gyur to// phung bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rdzas dang rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yas/ rgyal bar dbang zin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzim pa rnams
61b7(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// mi 'gyur chos nyid phyag rgya las// ma btsal lha na rdzogs gsal ba'i rgyun// khro rgyal yab yum rol pa yis// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// 'dod pa'i spyi bor rgya mtshor 'khyil// sgo zhazhing bsdus la dkyil
61b8(rnying rgyud): 'kho dang gyur// 'dod pa'i rna bar gzhal yas khang // rat+na kI la dbus su'o// kho bo yab yum 'khor gyis bskor// trAM/ rat+na kI la ya yi tshogs mchog las// rat+na shrI 'khor dang bcas pa d+mo// bsdus pas don gyi gnas su thim// trA~M/ gsong ba gsang
62a1(rnying rgyud): mchog myang na 'das// du la sogs pa'i gsang ba kran// don du brtag cing mnyan pa las// dran la brtag par bya ba min// 'dod pa'i snying gang de bzhin nadu// badz+ra dz+wa la ma yo ba nyid// 'bar ba cwag chags mchog las// ShASh+ka
62a2(rnying rgyud): 'thung dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim// hUM rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi phur bzung // 'jigs byed khro rgyal mnyes mchod la// gnyis med khro rgyal kun dang sbyor// 'dod pa'i lag la de bzhin no// karma kI la ya yi ngo bo nyid// ha yi
62a3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i tshogs mchog las// karmA'i dkyil 'khor gsal spo ba stim// ha// byed ni las rab kI la yin// rnam bzhi'i phrin las kun byos shig/ 'dod pa'i lce la de bzhin te// pad+ma khrag 'thung kI la ya// 'bar ba hrIHyi tshogs mchog las// hrIHyi dkyi' 'khor
62a4(rnying rgyud): gsal 'phro thim// hrIHbye ba brgyad cu'i sgra dbyangs kyis// gang 'dod skyes bu tshim par gyis// shes rab don gyi dmigs dang sbyar// che chung don gyis so sor bsgrag/ yot+pa la 'tshal bar bsgrag ma yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lngal// 'jigs byed gzhal yas
62a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin te// rigs kyi khro bo'i ngo bo nyid// dbang po 'bru lnga'i 'gro 'du las// khrag 'thung wa dang khro phreng bsgom// hUM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dus kun tu// sku gsung thugs kyi phur bu bzung // phur bu'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// thams
62a6(rnying rgyud): cad kun la dbang rnams byin// bdud rtsi lnga dang phyag mtshan lnga// zhing chen bla re thal chen dang // rak+ta nag dang stag gi sham// rim pa bzhin du bsrung bar bya'o// ye shes phur pa dbu gsum pos// phyogs mtshams ma lus bgegs 'dul ba'i// ci ltar 'tshams pa
62a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du'o// wa~M kro ta bi dza ya a b+hi Shi ts+yai hUM phaT TuM kAr a b+hi b+hi hUM thu phaT/ pad+ma kuN+Da li a b+hi Sh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ dri za grul bum bden bral dang // chu lho gnod sbyin dbang ldan dang // hi zla sa bdag phyogs mtshams bcu// ci ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du thul// rta dang ma he sh+tsa
62b1(rnying rgyud): mchog dang // gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lor bcas// sleb dpon mnyes byad yon du 'bul// brgyali ka gos kyi mchog/ gcan gzan dang men gser dang gsu// b+hU rigs zo lcags gzi dang mchod// yul mkhar bu dang chung ma dang // lus dang rlung //
62b2(rnying rgyud): gis ma chags par// bla ma de la 'bul bar bya'o// gzhan yang dbu rgyan cad pan phreng // go cha rgyal mtshan zag rgya dang // gdugs dang bza' btung zlum pa dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur nas// dus 'di phan chad rdo rje'i sras// gnyen por gyur pa'i
62b3(rnying rgyud): tshul 'chang bas// nyon mongs ngan song med pa dang // tshe ring bde baphun sum tshogs// dpal chen po rgyal la sogs pa'i// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// lus sam phung por bcas pa yis// rig 'dzin sa la gnas par 'gyur// rig
62b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sa la gnas pa yis// bla med/ khre rgyal chen por 'gyur// 'khor lo rgyas 'dis la sogs pa'ang // nyid kyi byin gyis brlab par 'gyur// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun// dpa' chen dka' bzhin las rnams byed// bla ma mnyes par ma byas sam/
62b5(rnying rgyud): dbang gi rim pa ma thob par// nyan cing 'chad cing las byed pa// ngan song gsum du nges par ltung // rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa'i don// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo la// rabasnang ldan rdzogs ye gnas pa'i// thabs kyi rgyal/
62b6(rnying rgyud): por don rtogs na// dbang gi rgyal por bdag nyid rdzogs// chos rnams mya ngan 'das par rdzogs// gnyis med phur bu byang chub sems// mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku'o// bcos pa med pa'i chos nyid la// g.yos pa med pa'i chos nyid shar// gnyis med/
62b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal por dbang mchog thob// ces brjod pas/ thams cad dbang gi rgyal por mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste brgya bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang rang bzhin dang lhag pa'i
63a1(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi don sman gyis grub pa'i dngos su ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyams ngamathugs nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// dam pa'i don su mnyam gror byar// mya ngan 'das pa bzlam pa
63a2(rnying rgyud): bya// byang chub sems ni mngon sum gnas// mtshon du med pa'i zhing khams la// mnyam rdzogs chen por lhun bsgom zhing // bde chen byang chub brten par bzung // bya ba myed la las byed pa// mi gnas gnas pa med par bsgom// chos rnams rang bzhin nyid
63a3(rnying rgyud): stong // nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang // dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/
63a4(rnying rgyud): cad yon tan mchog gi gnas// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu gnyis// bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge hUM bcur 'dus// hUM gsum AHoM gsum du bsdus// gsum po de yang b+h+rUM ste thig ler 'dus// thig le spos med
63a5(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings dang du thim// mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod las 'das// mi gnas de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab// ma skyes chos kyi dbyings kyang brjod las 'das// ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med// 'gro med 'ong med gnas
63a6(rnying rgyud): yang med do// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rnam par 'phro// dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgya dgasal// dbyings las dbyings kyi ye shes sbyor bas na// byang chub sems tshogs dal
63a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor brjod mi lang // don dam gcig las ma g.yos kyang // don gyi gzhal yas dkyil 'khor gnyis// don nyid mgo drang bar zad// gzhal yas rang bzhin bzhi du gsal// chos nyid rang bzhin gzhal yas dang // gnyis med yum gyi gzhal
63b1(rnying rgyud): las drang // yid bzhin lha yi gzhal yas dang // 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gzhal yas sa// ci gar steng ba'i rdzas la brten// yigar \u0f7f'gyu 'du las// ri rtsis bsreg la gags gtur// yags 'brar ba 'khogs bkrus// rang dur
63b2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid nga drangadag/ 'byung ba shes rab smras kyi dbyings// rang bzhin dus gsum 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin chos dbyings gzhal gas so// ya~M She/ e ni mi dmigs don gyi 'o// yaM las brten pa'i snga bon byung // baM las su mu rdzas /
63b3(rnying rgyud): las rin chen bye ba yAs// laM las rin chen sna tshogs gling // b+h+rUM las yid bzhin gzhal yas khud// tA la'i skye shing tsong cong 'khril// yid bzhin rin chen pa zag gsal 'bar// wA lnga'i gaga' tshon smin du ma yas// rin chen gyen gyis shing
63b4(rnying rgyud): lpas// chun 'grangs dril bu zar tshags// Sh+ka ri rgyal mtshan 'ayan dang gdugs// rin chen gser gyi nang 'di// chags med brla kha stong rdzas// dri me do 'odags la ti zla badz+ral// mi 'jigs slob pa dang rdzu 'phrul dang // phrin las la sogs 'angs
63b5(rnying rgyud): byas// dkar dam ser dang ljang gu 'tshor// dbyibs dang kha dog dpag las 'das// gyi dang nang med tshogs dang thal// dmigs par snang bang dmigs smra med// gzhal yas yid bzhin lhun gyis grub// yid babrim n+ta y-i gzhan yas so// e ri
63b6(rnying rgyud): hUM bri sha'i bte/ mthing na ga zug sum ye yi dang // rlung nag 'tshabs mardo rje'i brag/ raH'i mtsho zham mu 'bab// sha chenas gzhi zhing chen rjod// gang dus ri rag zug zhags// rba n+de yang bas bta li// bir+b+ba mug nag shin tu 'bar// da
63b7(rnying rgyud): gseb nas sbrul nag rgya// sbrul gyi lce las me chen 'ab// dkar dmar spro ba de bzhin nu// mchog chen ka gdung zhing chen byas// gnam lcags thog gzer rgyan rnams rdzogs// ma he phreng rgod stag dang gzig/ gtum pa dom gyis sbas pa'o//
64a1(rnying rgyud): zla'i 'od kyis brgyan pa ste// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gzhal yas so// e karma rak+Sha rak+Shadz+wa la/ bai Sh+Ti k+Shadz+wa la/ keng ni ri ti dz+wa la/ baM kha ta li dI Sh+TaM/ raM a mr-i tArti/ tI ra baM/ 'byung chen lnga nyid yA ma lnga'i dang /
64a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin 'dus ma byas pa yum gyi klong // sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i rang bzhin lnga// yum chen lnga dang rang bzhin gnyis su med// gnyis med yum gyi rang bzhin brjod las 'dis// des ni rang bzhin ting 'dzin dang // lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'a
64a3(rnying rgyud): bstan// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gdod nas dag/ yid bzhin dkyil 'khor dbu la gsal// 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang // yum gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med// yang na dkyil 'khor dngos su ste// ma rig rmongs la bstan gyir te/
64a4(rnying rgyud): sems nyid drag po'i dkyil 'khor te// phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// mtho gang sor bzhi gang rung tshad// byas la dam rdzas chag chag gdab// tshon rtse brlab cing srad bus gdab// bri zhing phur bu rim bzhin dgod// yang na sa gzhi snyoms pa la/
64a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ste// sor bzhi 'dom gang tshad du bya// byin brlab thig gdab de bzhin te// so so'i gzhung dang mthun par bri// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam dmar pos bskor// tha ma rdo rje brag dang 'khor los bskor// bar khyams gnyis
64a6(rnying rgyud): dang sgo khyud ldan par bri// phur bu b+han d+ha gsal byed gtor mar bcas// so so'i gzhung dang mthun par dgod// hUM gru gsum mthing nag gzhal yas khang // zla ga ma dmar po dbang gi tshul// zlum po gru bzhi rgyas pa ste// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs
64a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad 'khrugs// dmar ser dbang rgyas mngon par bstan// sgo rigs mthing nag mi 'gyur rtags// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad nyid kyi gzhal yas khang du sangs rgyas te/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po
64b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor drug gi don nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dpal kI la yas/ tshe mtha' yas su sprul nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// mya ngan las la rtag bsdus te// tshe dbang chen po'i gnas dag ni// 'khor lo
64b2(rnying rgyud): gnam la pad+ma'i sa// dbyibs 'dra'i sa gzhi rab tu brtag/ ri bo chen po rab dben pa// yid 'ong me tog rgyas par bsgrub// yang na sdong gcig me reg dang // lung gsum mdo dang dur khrod gnas// 'bab chu chen po'i ngos su bslab// lha rnams nye
64b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // gdon rnams zhi bar bya ba dang // srid rtse'i nyes dmigs bsal ba'i phyir// phyi yi gtor ma btang nas ni// rab tu gsang ste dam rdzas bsag/ dur khrod bdag po ma traM ni// brjid pa'i stabs kyis gnan par bya// b+ha ga e yi dkyil 'khor la//
64b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i brag gis rab tu gtams// zla gam bzhi dang 'khor lo brgyad// gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan par bya// mchog chen phur pa rab bsngags te// sgo bzhi dag tu re re gzug/ khro bo'i phur pa mang po kun// grwa yi phyogs su spungs la gzhang // yang na rdzas dang
64b5(rnying rgyud): pa kun// snang ba'i 'od dang bcas par 'god// ting 'dzin ye shes gsal bya'i phyir// dmigs pa'i rten yang mngon par gzhag/ gzhan yang 'bru lnga snying po lnga// mngar gsum sbyar gsum nyung dkar sog/ rin chen bum par bsags te gzhang // ba
64b6(rnying rgyud): ba spyod pa mthar phyin cing // lung dang man ngag tshad mas brgyan// dad pa mi ldog dam tshig gnas// byang chub sems la rab gzhol te// byams dang snying rje ldan pas bsgrub// stong pa chen po'i ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog las las 'das// de ni mi 'gyur byang
64b7(rnying rgyud): chu bo sems// mkha' la de bzhin rol mo'i sku// a ye dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// bdag nyid chen po he ru ka/ che ba'i ye shes khyad par las// bad+ma badz+ra budz+ra'i 'khor// rat+na karma 'khor dang bcas// gzhal yas bum pa'i nang du bskyed// pad+ma kI
65a1(rnying rgyud): la ya A~M/ badz+ra kI la ya d+d+hi/ buSh+kak+Shi la ya oM/ rat+na kI la yA swA/ kam kI la yathA/ gzhan gyis mi thub gshin rje gshed// hA ya grI ba 'dod pa'i rgyal/ bdud rtsi 'khyil dang stobs pa che// mi g.yo mgon dang rnam par rgyal/
65a2(rnying rgyud): hUM mdzad khams gsum rgyal bar bstan/ hUM badz+ra kI li kI ya sarba big+h+nA na paM hUM phaT/ dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT/ A~M badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ bi dza yi ha na ha na hUM phaT/ nI la daN+Da da ha da ha hUM phaT/ yamAn+ta ka pa tsa pa tsa hU~M wA/ Ar+tha a tsa
65a3(rnying rgyud): tain+taHn+t+ra hU~M phaT/ hA ya grI ba hu yulu hu lpA hU~M phaT/ a pa dze ta tiHtiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ amr-i t-i ka d+ha'i sriT+Ta ts+tsha g+ha~M hU~M phaTe/ trai lo k+Sha bi dzi gI d+hiHSh+T+rIn+d+ra hUM phaT/ mahA ba la thoT bo hU~M Ta/ oM kaM tsaM ti gsang ba'i spyamA// ya mtshan byin rlabs chen po las/ 9
65a4(rnying rgyud): ma steg dang bya rgod mgo// ma lus 'khor bcas 'bar bar gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs las// pho nya dpung tshogs nyi shu ni// gcig la yang gsum gsum jug cur bstan// thams cad 'dzin cing len par byed// de ni rab tu mngag bya ba'o//
65a5(rnying rgyud): sle ba tsan gyi mthu chen te// bu mo lo grangs nyi shu la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gas la bkod nas// rnam gsum dag tu nan tan bya// rin chen sna lnga'i bum pa la// dzaHhU~M baM ho bzhis bkug la// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/ lus ngag yid la
65a6(rnying rgyud): bstim par bya// nr-i nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa'i mchog ni bzang po yis// tshe bzhag gnas ni de yin te// yang nas yang du bkug byas na// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang // dbyings su yang na sba bar bya'o// rdo rje'i go cha bsrung ba yis//
65a7(rnying rgyud): brtan zhing 'khor los gdab par bya// snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal po che dpag med par bsgom// sku mchog gangs ri 'chor ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang /
65b1(rnying rgyud): zam teg dang rin chen rdul// bum pa bzang lasags pa yis// gzhan la 'gro ba don byab// bsam gyis mi byab mtha' las macag// bgegs kyis nams mi sted na// cod dgamed kyang bag+saste// phyogs btsun ma ma pa'i khams bkad nas//
65b2(rnying rgyud): da drag po bton nas ni// thams cad ma lus phul bar bya// tshe dpag med pa'i dbang du bsgrub// tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang // tshe bsgrub dang ni bsgrub chen po// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// tshe yi dbang po chud
65b3(rnying rgyud): 'phel ma// dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phror gyur// phyag na rin chen gang ba yi// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs brgyan// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no// de las phan pa'i nas mthu med/
65b4(rnying rgyud): yi ge bzlas pa'i 'phrul chen ni// nam gsum tshul gyis ma gzugs par// sngags bzlas tshig par mi gcad// 'dis gsal brten pa'i mchog gis bya// mo oM oM moM oM/ hU~M hU~MSh+T+r-i Sh+T+r-iH/ s+t+waM swA swA swA swA/ A~M Sh+T+r-i I A~M mAM/
65b5(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM thAM/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dza dzo dza dz+ra dza/ A A A A A/ yu yu yu yu mu/ She She ke Ne She/ hUM hUM b+h+rUM hUM b+h+rUM/ a a a a a/ A~M tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bde gshegs lnga yang tshe dpag med/ sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs btu na
65b6(rnying rgyud): bri mis bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nos// 'gro lnga'i tshe rnams dbang du sdud// gshol dang gtun shing phyag rgya yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrug nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe 'gug ste/
65b7(rnying rgyud): snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams dgug ste// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang // bar sdang bgegs rnams rgyu ba la// dri tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i 'brul bstim nas ni// de nas
66a1(rnying rgyud): ge Sh+Tak+sha \u0f89\u0fa4 b+he// hU~M lI gnas par bstim pa zung / A badz+ra kAb tsa badz+rA d+hAH/ A sarba tathA ga ta thaMd ya a rti tiSh+Tha badz+ra swAH/ thag tu srung ba'i chog ste// 'bru lnga li ge 'brugacig sa// 'brug cig myi dmigs
66a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa /
66a3(rnying rgyud): cha lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gdod nas snying po byang chub
66a4(rnying rgyud): la// rnam rtog las kyis 'khor ba rnams// rnal 'byor dbang phyug thabs mkhas pas// 'khor ba'i dra ba bkrol nas ni// yab yum gnyis med mkha' la bskal// grub pa po yi las su ni// btul zhugs 'gyod de sbyor sgrol brtsam// de dag sngags kyi
66a5(rnying rgyud): mi gis mtham rung // gal khris byung bal gyur// mabyas napa drang ba thar// rab drugapa parnams kya gsu sa// rab ba da blan pa da nas ga nga shin pa cog/ ban dpa na ma
66a6(rnying rgyud): na ni// ma btab bzhin du lazhwa rnams 'grub// nyini mtshan gung la rab mngags nas// gzugs la phab ste bcings la bzhag/ bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs tshang ba dang // mtshan ma bzang po ltung ba na// ting 'dzin bsar te rab tu gdab// mgo dang tsi
66a7(rnying rgyud): lte ba dang // gsang gnas yan lag bzhi la gdab// bden pa da' nas yang dang yang // bu gsum e yi dkyil 'khor du// bcu gcig dang ni rtsa gcig gis// mnan cing gzing ba'ang de bzhin no// de nas rab tu dngos sub thang // gtor mtshob
66b1(rnying rgyud): gnas spa dgye// bsdu dang bsrung ba de bzhin te// rigs mi nub par bskyed par bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ bsgral bas rtag chang gnyis su med pa'i ngang du sangs rgyas nas mya ngan las 'das te/ skye med tshe'i ngo bor gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las
66b2(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ tshe bsgrub cing don bsgral ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po bstan pa la khro bo rngam pa'i tshig tu bsgrags nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// mya ngan las 'das snying po 'di// mtshan mas
66b3(rnying rgyud): btsal ba ma yin gyis// dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing // rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// mya ngan 'das 'di rnyed par 'gyur// drag po gtum po bsgrub pa ni// gnod gdug rnam gnyis bskal ba'i phyir// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// phun du
66b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa'i slob dpon gyis// byams dang snying rje sngon btang nas// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub par bya'o// gong gi phur bu'i rgyu dag la// ring bung mgo mjug tshad mnyam ste// sked pa rgya mdud drag po la// rtse mo chu srin kha nas dpung // bcu gcig badz+ra
66b5(rnying rgyud): gsum rtsa gcig pos// mkhas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gong ma de dang tshad gcig ste// mi brjed gzungs la gdags par bya// drag po'i bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor yum gyi dbyings 'dra la// zla gam gsum gyis mtha' bskor te//
66b6(rnying rgyud): rdzas la sogs pa dgram par bya'o// dbang drug 'dres pa'i gzugs can la// byin brlab dbang bskur gzi bskyed la// gdarda la bzhugs su gsol ba gdab// nye bar bya phyir bsnyen pa 'phrul// mi rtog kun sdang rgyu bsgoms te// sems
66b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chags gyur pas// mthing nag hU~M gi 'phro 'du las// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed nas ni// mi bzad 'bar ba rdo rje'i sku// phur bu khro bo'i 'khor gyis bskor// tha ga la ni ling+ga bzhag/ mtshon mi ming du bcas par bya'o//
67a1(rnying rgyud): zhal ni gang yang rung // lan gsum lan bdun tog bsgom zhing // mngon du byung ba'i rgyu 'bar te// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ltar gyur te// mi bskyod dab+h+rings las ma g.yos kyang // khams gsum gdug pa bskal ba'i phying/
67a2(rnying rgyud): mjir nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i mu thung nas// matri la sogs bskal bar bya'o// rdo rje baspu nya ga re las// zhu bo bye ba 'brum phyung nas// zhal nas drag po'i 'dzab kyang zlos// phyag na dbang drag phrang bu ji li// 'bas kyang drag pas
67a3(rnying rgyud): tshul du bzhugs// phon phyag brtan bka' nyan tshogs// yang sbal mang po mjug par mgyogs// rol pas dgra bgegs dbang du byung // de ni dpal sti phon ste// su la bsngo zhing rigs la bsregs// rgyal khams phrang bar byed pa dang // gnod sems log par
67a4(rnying rgyud): b+ha rnams// bdun chud gcod par the tshom med// bruM gis bskyes shing phaT kyis 'phang // zhal gyi rang sngags khri 'bum du// nam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nas su// 'gro lnga'i sems can thams cad kun// dbang med zhal duthim par 'gyur//
67a5(rnying rgyud): ni lhag par 'dzin// sku mdog dud ka la sogs dang // mtsho gtsigs khro gnyer klog stong 'jug/ zhal bgrang phyag rgya 'bar ba dang // gong la goms pa bsgom par bya'o// bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste// mtshan ma bzung nas rang sngags 'dod
67a6(rnying rgyud): mngan sum dbang pos bltar yod par// ril por bsdus nas dbyings su mchod// the tshom med par 'grub par nges// dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa// dpa' bos dogs pa yod pa'i phyid// kun la phan par tha bar shis// drag po las kyi dkyil
67a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'dir// dza \u0f7fmas drangs shing lan kyis bstim// drod cid rtags la phebs pa dang // mtshan ma ldan pa'i gtum po yis// rig pa 'i ting 'dzin pas pyas nas// drag po'i phyag tu bcas nas ni// bdun gsum bcad pa'i rtsa gcig pos// skad nang
67a8(rnying rgyud): ri la lu 'brung
67b1(rnying rgyud): bskor zhing gnas su gdab// khwa rgyal mang pos pho brang btab// gzugs kyi phung po lhag ma la// ma mo pho nyas sgrol zhing rol// sprul pa'i phra men za zhing ldag/ lU gzugs phral te zos bsams nas// mtshan ma ming du bsdus pa yang // ci ltar sngon
67b2(rnying rgyud): gyi de bzhin du// smon pa'i byang chub lam du gzhug/ mtshan ma'i bag chags der sbyangs so// dbyings la spro zhing a la bstim// ho// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad khro bo'i rang bzhin du gyur pas/ gdug pa can thams cad mya ngan las 'das par gyur /
67b3(rnying rgyud): phu bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyad chen po las/ khro bo gsang bzha bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang kI la yas/ lha babyang chub sems kyi chos nyid/ byang chub sems kyi phurang bu mya ngan las 'das shing /
67b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin byang chub sems su bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad brjod do// gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin te/ rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// 'dzin tog med pa'i phung pa la// dbyibs dang / kha dog mi gnas na// gzugs dang kha dag
67b5(rnying rgyud): grags// log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings// gnyis med don du byang chub sems// 'pho 'gyur med pa phrer ba'i don// mi dmigs nam mkha'i thong du bsgrub// ma bcos mnor dbyings las byung // de ni rang bzhin lhan grub pas// de la
67b6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi 'bras bu ni// khyu mchog 'bras bu ye ge dz+haiM// gnyis med don gyi lam bzang po// srid pa gsum nas bsdus nas ni// khams gsum kun las 'das par bsam// de nas bdag gi byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang bskur
67b7(rnying rgyud): zhing // bcom ldan 'das dang skal ba gcig/ byang chub sems ni mngon du bstan/ thog ma gzhal yas byang chub sems// doni rgyu 'bras ma bkag ces// brlab pa'i ye shes tshe gang pa'o// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed nam /
68a1(rnying rgyud): sku dang ldan par rab brgyan cing // khams gsum khro bos gang bar mdzad// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// sku yi tshogs kyis rab brgyan te// thugs la 'bar ba'i srog kyang zhugs// dbu la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
68a2(rnying rgyud): bsrungs// khro bo mang pos gzir byas nas// yul ni rnam par sgrol ba'i thugs// srid pa'i phur bu rtogs pa'i dang // srid pa gsum yang thabs zhes bya'o// de las phur bu byang chub sems// rang byung gzugs med kun la khyab// rgya 'bras gnyis med rgya
68a3(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das// khams gsum ye shes bskyed nas ni// rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i rtags// phur bu ye shes khro bo la// nyi zla ri rab phur bu'i rgyan// shin tu 'jigs pa'i ye shes kyis// mkha' gting med pa'i phung bu la// khro bo'i tshogs kyis rab brgyan cing //
68a4(rnying rgyud): rang krung ye shes shar ba'i phyir// khams gsum dbang du yang dag 'grub// khams gsum gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir// dag pa'i dbyings las mgayos par// tsha ma rngams gzi brjid glog ltar 'bar// khams gsum rtsa thag gcad pa'i phyir//
68a5(rnying rgyud): dpung gsum gyis khams bsregs shing // lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// spyan drang bzhugs gsol dbyer med bstim// nyes byed gsum gyi khams bsreg nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i phrin las bskul// khams gsum dus gcig
68a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur bas// rang byung sku ru rnam dag cing // rab tu srog gi gor shar nas// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gas la// dus gcig leb rgan 'bar bar smin// snying ga ste steng spyi bo nas// spyan drang bzhugs
68a7(rnying rgyud): gsol dbyer med bsgrim// yi ge 'bru gsum 'phro 'du las// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab bskur// hUM AM oM/ rnam par shes pa'i ye shes mchog/ rang byung phur bu mya ngan 'das// srog dang dbugs kyi byin rlabs ni// nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang nyid las/
68b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med don gyi spu phyung ba// byang chub sems kyi phung bu yis// skang srid chos kyi dbyings nyid du// ma btub bzhin du lhun gyis grub// snang sbed phur bur shar ba'i phyir// bdag dang lag pa'i mchog rnams la// gnyis med dbyings su myong ba'i phyir/
68b2(rnying rgyud): yum bzhi'i phyag rgyar byin brlabs te// lag tu blangs nas dril nas kyang // khams gsum snang ba'i dug rnams te// dag pa'i dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'dra yis// phur bu ri rab phyag rgya che// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku gsung thags/
68b3(rnying rgyud): zung phur bur byin gyis brlab// rab tu sdug bsngal bsal bar 'gyur// rdo rje rab tu ki la ya// dngos po byings su bskal pa'i phyir// drag tu gsor ti di la nas kyang // chos kun ye nas shar ba'i phyir// sems kyi yul ni rnam bskul te// ye shes sku yis/ thab gdal/
68b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha// snang srid phur bur shar bas na// mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku// tshes dbyings thig ler gsal ba'i phyir// ma lus phur pa thebs zhes bya'o// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo la// rdzogs nas dukang bsngal phyir ro//
68b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi khyad par gyis// nyon mongs dug lnga bsgral ba'i phyir// khams gsum gsong bas bsgral bar bya'o// nyon mongs ye shes gnas 'gyur zhing // srid gsum dbyings su bkru ba'i phyir// de nas a las rnam dag pas// srid pa gsum du
68b6(rnying rgyud): gsal 'chor nas// bdag dang phur bu byang chub sems// sems can lus la bstims byas te// blo zhing bsdus pas khrus byas nas// 'khor ba gsum ni mya ngan 'das// des na yul sems gnyis su med// gnyis med don gyi nges pa las// brgyad
68b7(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i ri rab kyis// dmigs su med pa'i chos dbyings la// mkha' yi gtun khung bder gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i dbyings dkyil du// g.yos pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// lha yang rung ste bsgral byas na// srid gsum phur pa thebs zhes
69a1(rnying rgyud): tha'o// snang srid ste 'gro sa pa'i gzugs// mthong man gcig tu sur bsta nas// ho zhes rab tu dga' ba yis// shin tu snying po 'di 'arjod do// d+hA rang byung mchog sems gus la gyi nga// mnyam nyid rdul las bdang na
69a2(rnying rgyud): bsgral// de bzhin kruM gis drangs nas kyang // phur bu gzi ldan thob gyur cig/ gnyis med chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// yul de'i sems ni hU~M du snang // 'od dang 'od zer phur bu las// bdag la 'dus pas tshe ru thim// gnyis med don gyis bskal ba'i phyir//
69a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gi rnam shes tshogs brgyad nas// gang zhig mnan pa'i mchog rnams la// rdo rje skur pa mang shA rabs// de yi tshogs brgyad dag par sbyang // khams gsum chos nyid gdar bcad phyir// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// khro bo 'bar ba'i gtsun cho ga kris//
69a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas// khams gsum ma lus bskal bar 'gyur// tog 'dzin med pa'i dbang phyug des// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos sngags par bskal// shin tu gsal nas dgyes bstar bas// za byed kun la bsgrub par mdzod// ha ha kyi
69a5(rnying rgyud): pas dgyes par rol// hU~M kruM bgyis pas dbang du bsdus// / ba kha bgyis pas lhag ma bzhes// bdag dang gsum du ldan nas kyang // byang chub sems kyi dbang spros pas// phung po rdul du bshig nas kyang // sha khrag khams gsum gang bar dmigs/
69a6(rnying rgyud): hUM gis rab tu nam mkha' gang // phuT kyis kun tu gtor byas te// rdo rje ye shes tshon gang gis// khams gsum rang tu gang nas 'dus// khams gsum byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro ba ma lus don bya'i phyir// ljang gu las kyi sa bon te// dmar po
69a7(rnying rgyud): srog gi sa bon yin// mthing nag ge ru ka yi thugs// spros pas thig les nam mkha' gang// thams cad 'dus pas shin tu brjid// grub nas sems kyi phur batshol// khams gsum dur khrod khrag yin te// thugs rje chags pas bskal ba'i phyir// srid pa
69b1(rnying rgyud): gdar sha bcad nas kyang // spyod pa rnam pa bcu dang ldan// byang chub sems ky-i ga las bcad// grub mtha' 'di la 'jig mtha' med// de ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// myang na 'das na rtag pa'o// sgrib pa med pas mthar sbyin te// btsal du byed pas ye nas zug/
