69b2(rnying rgyud): snang srid dang ni 'dzin tog rnams// bsam pa las ni mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten kun las 'das pas na// 'dzin dang rtog pa rnam spang ba'i// byang chub sems ni skad cig ma// lhan ne por yang bdag nyid sbyor// 'jig rten kun las grub pa'i rgyan// mi nub
69b3(rnying rgyud): pa rtag kyang yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i mkha' la nub// nub mtha' med par shin tu spags// yid ni chos nyid mya ngan 'das// rnam shes hUM du mya ngan 'das// hU~M nyid byang chub sems kyi gzhi// byang chub sems kyi phur pa ru// srid gsum ma lus mya ngan 'das// zhes
69b4(rnying rgyud): brjod pas// snang zhing sred pas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad/ ye nas phung bu byung chub kyi sems su lhan gyis grub cing mya ngan las 'das par sbyor to// phung bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ phung bu brang chub sems su 'thub pa'i le'u ste bco bcad
69b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas badz+ra kI la yas bsgrub pa'i don yod par bya ba'i phyir// mngags pa las kyi phonya 'di dag gsungs so// dbu dgu blag 'thung za byed pa// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor du// dgug dang bcing dang sdom la brtson// nyid kyi thugs kyi
69b6(rnying rgyud): skal pa las// ci bgyis bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// gang la mngags pa grub par byed// dbyings nas bkug nas mkha' la bstim// hUM gis bsdus nas mkha' la bzhag/ yaM gis btegs la phaT kyis 'phang // de yang dpal gyi pho nya ste// zhugs
69b7(rnying rgyud): yon tan bas ma yas kyang // don gyi po nya dbyings las 'gyed// thabs kyi pho nya yu ma las 'gyed// sprul pa'i do nya las la 'gyor// de yang bskul tshig drag po yis// gnyis med don gyis mngags par bya'o// dri chen phra byin phag dang smig thang
70a1(rnying rgyud): bcas// rnam rgyal skems ma stag dang bya rgod mgo// dbyug sngon sbeng mo g.yag dang bya rog bcas// gshin rje dur khrod sha ba thug par bcas// mi g.yo gtun khung gzig dang khA ta'i mgo// ta mgrin gtum mo kyi
70a2(rnying rgyud): shud bcas// gzhan gyis mi thub mda' snyems spyang ku khra mgor bcas// bdud rtsi rlung 'byin seng ge pha wang bcas// khams gsum gsod ma dred dang sre mo bcas// ma hA ba la bskyod ma do ma dang byi bar bcas// nyes byed ma lus mkha' la 'aco
70a3(rnying rgyud): gti mug mun khung gtan nas bcom// zhe sdang rtse mo rtul du sod// 'dod chags rgya mtsho gting nas skoms// phrag dog 'tshu bsam gtan chun chod// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum gyis// bskal pa brgya khrir me sbar te// stong khams rngams pa'i
70a4(rnying rgyud): zhal gdangs nas// dug gsum bsgral mdzad phrin las kyis// gdug pa'i tshogs dang gnod sbyin cha lugs can// rdo rje srid pa'i zhal gyis mtshan ma'i dngos po kun// dbang po kun 'byung don snying zhal du 'dren// 'gal byed tshogs kyi snying la rngam pa'i phyid/
70a5(rnying rgyud): drag po'i phrin las btang snyoms yal bar mi gtang ngo // drag pos bdud dpung 'doms shing tshar gcod dang // bdud dang mu stegs gtan nas brlag pa dang // gang zhig log par blta ba'i dgra bo dang // gnod byed 'byung po gtan nas tshar gcad phyir// log
70a6(rnying rgyud): par sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba rnams// phrin lngas drag po'i thugs rjes gtad mi b+ha'o// bdag nyid zhe sdang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sgra// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brgyad bskum tshul// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na brjid par bzhugs// mthing nag gci
70a7(rnying rgyud): ngal ba 'bar ba can// zhal mdog phyogs pazhing gzigs pa'i thugs ka nas// hU~M hUM hUM zhes sgra sgrogs rab 'bros pas// lcags kyi gzo ma rkang gsum rab bsgom ste// de yi thugs rje rdo rje drag po des// dgra bgegs de yi lus dang byad bzhin rnams//
70b1(rnying rgyud): mngon snum sa ler gsal bar dmigs pa yi// rkang pa'i mthil du yi ge tri nag bsam// lcags kyi gze ma rkang pa'i mthil btsug pas// mkhal ma mcher pa glo bsnying bkrus nas// spyi bo'i gtsug tu thal gyis byung bar bsam// lcags kyi gze ma rkang
70b2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis// ngos gsum du ni hUM gsum gzhag/ zur gsum du ni phaT gsum gzhag/ rtse mo gsum la dri gsum gzhag/ rtse gsum rim par 'jug par bsam// dgra bgegs zil gyis mnan nas kyang // dug gsum rtsad nas gcad par bsam//
70b3(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum de// sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo de// skra ne b+hud+d+ha he ru ka/ gsung ni pad+ma he ru ka/ thugs ni badz+ra he ru ka/ gze ma'i dbus su dur khrod kyi// gzhal yas khab gcig bsam par bya'o// de yi dbus su dgra bo'i gzugs// bcas te
70b4(rnying rgyud): le gsal bsam la// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum las// re re la'ang gsum gsum dgus// 'tshor dogs med par dgug par bsam// hUM/ lcags kyi gzem mgo dgu pa// mgo dgu rkang gsum stong gsum gang // shin tu mi bzad 'jigs su
70b5(rnying rgyud): rung // 'khrugs byed 'bar ba'i nga ro sgrogs// zhal mdog gcig tu ma nges te// khro rgyal 'jigs byed hUM sgra can// phyag mtshan 'jigs pa'i char phab nas// hA la phaT kyi sgra 'byin cing // khams gsum gdug pa ma lus bsreg/ gnod byed dgra bgegs
70b6(rnying rgyud): 'ching bar byed// dgra dang 'byung po sreg pa'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo las// lcags kyi gze ma mgo dgur sprul// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og nas// dmigs pa bzhin du dgra bgegs/ bug/ dam bcas bzhin du dgra bo sgo
70b7(rnying rgyud): bcol ba bzhin du thod khrag spyos// rdul phran bzhin du rngog gyur cig/ dang por gnod pa'i dgra bo de// ming dang rus dang gzugs bris la// rtsigs pa'i logs la dgram par bya'o// lha phyag stong btsal dgra bo yi// ming nas phyung nas btsal lo tsas
71a1(rnying rgyud): byas laphyag gis gnang ba skur rang// de nas rdul langs kyi nyis// tshig gis dngang yang gnag par nang// gzugs kyi pa mardzogs pasgyur// mul dgazhag gsam gzhug par byag// thags myong nas thung
71a2(rnying rgyud): gdon// kI la ya dang sum b+ha ni// bzlas nas brdungs na rmi lAm dang // ltas ngan bzlog cing phebs par 'gyur// gzugs dang ming rus de phyung la// dge bo ng+ge yi gshang gci'am// thubs ma chung rjes bor ba'i sar// brdabe na stabs bkrol
71a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// yang na de las sa blangs la// rI khI'i khrag gis smras pa la// dgra yi gzugs bya ming rus bri// gzugs gnyis byas la lho sbyar te// tshon gyis bcing la rabs chad dang // mdze can dag gi thod nang du// ngag dang khyi lu dgu gul
71a4(rnying rgyud): dang // zhung dkar ske tshe lu zis bdug/ de nas srog gi snying po dang // dgra bo'i ming gnyis bsres la gdon// dgra bo tA mA ra yaM/ nr-i sha ku ru yaM/ kha so dbang dril yaM/ thod khrag spyos shig tsit+ta gu gul nan// snying khrag spos shig tsakra Sha kha re//
71a5(rnying rgyud): shes smros shig shon ma// 'dod chags spos shig su krib raM// gzugs phung shig cig su ni kri// yan lag chings shig dza lo ni \u0f7fdz+dza// de skad brjod la gzugs la bsdu// de nas mnyes dbang bajug la// bskul ba'i zhing bcu zhegacod do// ngan song
71a6(rnying rgyud): gtan sring 'thams pa'i sdug bsngal tshogs// theg ma'i dus nas ngan mong 'khor bar byung // ming ge sdig pa'i las la nongs pa'i phyir// shes ldan ye shes rgyal gnas yongs mi 'gyur// mnyam nyid pang las g.yo ba med padra// dug gsus rmongs pa'i
71a7(rnying rgyud): yon tig rang las byung // sgra mang thabs la mkhas pa'i sangs rgyas dang // thugs rjes rjes su ston pa'i slob pon dang // gsang sa tshig gis bzlas pa'i dasatshig can// bsas me na pa'i sngags 'chang dam cig gis// rjes su rlabs pa'i smon lam
71b1(rnying rgyud): stobs kyis// sku gsung thugs su lus ngag bstan pa'i phyir// shed las skyes pa'i shed bu rigs ngan rjod// gtan srid nges pa'i rtsa ba gcig pu la// ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs// srid par phan 'dogs khyod kyi dpal mgon du// tha/
71b2(rnying rgyud): pA'i lam sna 'dren pa yin pas// dga' dang gus pa'i sems kyis gas byos la// gnod sems m+b+hi yod ba sl-id gyis la// tshe srog lus por dgyu sor rlom// rnam shes nyes pa yod par dran thos la// nyes pa gtsor zhig gdung ba'i mdzi ma /
71b3(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i thabs ldan mnga' bar bcad pa'i bka'// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir// khyod kyi ma rig dur sa btsal ba ni// zhe sdang dbang gis chags pa'i skyon spangs kyang // gzung 'dzin dam par thar pa'i lam ma rnyed// btsal bas rnyed med
71b4(rnying rgyud): yon tan mongs pa'i dur// zhe sdang dbang gis bdag gzhan gnyis su mthong // bdag med tha med thar lam ma rnyed de// tsha grang dmyal ba'i gnas su zab pa'i phyir// thar bar mi 'gyur zhes te khyod rang nyes// ngan song gsum por khyod kyang mi gtong gis/
71b5(rnying rgyud): lus sems gnyis 'brel 'di la ma chags shig/ lha dang mgon ba tsan kun dang dpral ba'i phyir// gu gul nyur dkar bu zi ldong ras dang // sha chen snam che na ga sbyar dud btang la// sdig chen ma rtogs kha 'khor nyon mongs pa// sngon rdzi las/
71b6(rnying rgyud): dAn mi zad de bcad pas// dus zad tshe 'phos de lam chags par// sdug bsngal mi zad nyon mongs shes par byas// khro na la mi bzad rgyal po hUM sgra can// gdug pa'i mtshon cha char ltar 'ab pa yis// rang dbang med par rab tu 'jig par 'gyur// de bas
71b7(rnying rgyud): sdig can 'di la ma 'khor bar// ngas spras skyes bu nga yi tshe gnyon la// rang gi gnas tshol bag dang ldan par byos// de ltar rten dang dpral nas kyang // mda' 'phen zla ba mar ngol// nag po'i chas su rab zhugs nas// sngar shi'i ro gos khrag can la/
72a1(rnying rgyud): chas gos bya ba'i rgyun shis// nag pa'i kun chas lnga gon la// byang chub sems ni sngon btang ste// drag pa'i phrin las nub bdun bsdud// de nas lugs kyi gzom nyid// snga nas don dang mthun pa rba// mi ta bsud pa'i
72a2(rnying rgyud): rtsel// phrang bu so brgyad gcig rdzas la// gong bzhin byin gyis brlab par byos// gzhan yang phung bu lta tshogs la// snying po so sor bzlas shing rjel// bsnyen pa rdzogs sa nas 'grag 'dren na// ming dus gzugs la sngags banas //
72a3(rnying rgyud): kyi gzem rkang gsum gyi// sngags 'di rab tu drag tu bzlas// oM s+t+waM d+h+waM hU~M ka de pur pa de swA hA/ hrI nan rtsa dA nAn/ he ru me b+h+yo ku ka ra ri swA hA/ he ru swa ni yu ka s+sa me s+ye swA hA/ e lig shi ka/ shig he rba ti da pa ma me shan he re lig shan/ lI sha she ts+tsha
72a4(rnying rgyud): swAhA/ shi shi b+h+yo wa~M/ sngags de re re btab pas su// lcags kyi gzem gling gsum de// gcig ni mi phyin slar mi byin// rtse gcig sems kyi rang bzhin no// brgyad kyis rnam shes tshogs brgyad dag/ dbang po yul dus gnyis med don// mya ngan 'das pa'i
72a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bsgral// byang chub ma bkag yun du bye// don mthun pa yi dkyil 'khor du// rigs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// skal dang ldan pa'i sems can la// dbang po lnga mi gnas lnga ru// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// nyon mongs lnga yi ngo bo la// ye shes
72a6(rnying rgyud): lha yi phra bkod pas// gnyis med dbyings kyi mkha' la nub// don gyi 'bras bu thig ler gsal// log tog rgyu 'bras thal bar brlags// chags sdang dngos po gtan nas brtags// gzung 'dzin gnyis ni 'tshod med bzung // phyogs ris sa mtshams dbyings su dag
72a7(rnying rgyud): pho nya mang pos stong gsum bkang// ma spos sems su yi nas dag/ 'gru / byed mang po gcig tu dri la// 'gyur med dbyings kyi ngang du 'dres// zhes brjod pas/ jo ti'i tshogs de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i nga du/ ye nas gnas pa'i don de bzhin du mya ngan
72a8(rnying rgyud): sa~M d+h+r-ika ge cing ba zhe \u0f7f/ pre Na Sha tsanaH/ he rje me mo ki ri ny+dza/ 9 bi pra// rgyu'i
72b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las// banyas rnam shes ye shes su spangs shid / mngags par bya ba'i thabs bskrun pa'i leT ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang badz+ra kI la yas/ rngon chos nyid / ba'i dang las /
72b2(rnying rgyud): g.yos par/ sku yang shin tu drag po mi bzad pa'i skur 'thon nas/ dregs pa gdon gdug can drag po'i phrin las kyis bskal la/ phung po 'dod pa'i longs spyod du sgrub pa'i phyir/ rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems sngon du btang nas// 'di skad ces brjod do// skye med
72b3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin ni// rang bzhin med pas bskal ba'i zhing // mtshan ma med pas bsad pa'i rigs// dngos po med pas gtub pa'i rdzas// rang bzhin don la bcos med bzhag/ dngos po gzung 'dzin 'dres pa bskal// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog ri gyis
72b4(rnying rgyud): bsreg/ gti mug muni khams e yis sbyangs// 'dod chags bse rtsi khi gis bkru// nga rgyal brag ri laM gyis gzhig/ phrag dog 'tshub ma yi gis bud// dngos gzhi dug gsum rtsad nas bcad// gong du bstan pa'i gnas dag tu// rdzas dang gtor
72b5(rnying rgyud): me de bzhin du// phyi mtshams bcad cing las rnams bcol// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// chag chag gdab cing sa tshon rlabs// thig gdab bri zhing tshon ci bkye// dkyil 'khor yum gyi dbyings 'dra la// dbus su mthing nag gru gsum la//
72b6(rnying rgyud): tha mu thA ga ma dmang pos bskor// rdo rje brag gis yongs su bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// bsgral pa'i me 'od 'bar bas bskor// de yi phyi ri mthong pa'i mkhar// grwa chad bzhi dang par khams gnyis// sgo khyad bzhi dang nag pos bskor/
72b7(rnying rgyud): rgyan bye brag tshong bas brgyan// lcags sam gdug pa'i shing rnams la// phur bu tshad dang ldan pa rnams// de bzhin gyin gyis brlab par bya// bdug brdeg zug cing cod pa na gdags// thAn+ta dum bu gsum ma la// u mtshon kyis 'de bas bklags
73a1(rnying rgyud): 8byaH/ gnas pa shams// sprul pa'i bur bu mang po kun// dbus nas dgod cing graru spungs// dzas rnams tshogs nas rim bzhin dgo// d+hu dbyas nas dpal ldan 'bar ba'i grwa// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gdu
73a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rgyas 'debs sku la 'khril// bde chen sangs rgyas dbul brgyan// khrag 'thung rol pa'i thug las sprul// sprul pa'i phra men phyogs bcur 'gyed// phyogs kyi gdon rnams zhabs kyis gnon// nyon mongs gdug pa mkha' la grol// rdeg 'i
73a3(rnying rgyud): phrin+na las dus bab// 'bar ba'i gdan la rim bzhin bzhugs// hU~M hU~M hUM hUM hrIHhUM hU~M hU~M Sh+TatrAM trAM/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ ha he he he he he he he/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ de bzhin rdzas kyi ngo bo dgod// chos rnams dag pa'i rang bzhin yang // ting 'dzin spyad kyir dmags
73a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom// chos rnams ma bcos rang bzhin dang // mi dmigs dron dam byung chub sems// don dam gnyis med tog las 'das// brjod med thos bral chos kyi dbyings// mra bcos dang las ma g.yos kyang // dpag med ye shes che ba ni// mAng la ba nga /
73a5(rnying rgyud): d+yong+ka snang bstad// rang bzhin grong dus le gsal// nam mapa'i rang bzhin dngas pa la// yon tan zad par snang bskad// nams 'i da kyil nas thigs pa shad// sems kyi rang bzhin tu du bsgom// e ka mung \u0f7f/ bi kai haM raM/ skr-iSha ta li ti Sh+TI ma ya tAM/
73a6(rnying rgyud): la pa/ sa dun na / oM bsas nga gapa sa la 'thong // / do nganas 'i mamachod ga// benas mi // zung ces rna las thub pa'i gagayul sa na//
73a7(rnying rgyud): shed mo sor ma 'das kyang // ye nas me bcos byam chen rje yidang // brjod med smos pas 'thor lo rgyas 'deb spong // maba'asan mdzin chen 'bar ba'i gsal yan ni// rnam ma pa'i mtha' gar kun tu thab// ye shes 'bar pa'i gzhal yas ni// tshogs
73b1(rnying rgyud): bcu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med kun tu sbyang // du khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// zhing chen gcal bkram rmad du byas// b+haN+DA 'bang ba'i gzhal yas ni// gnam lugs gzer btab rgyan rnams rdzogs// g+hags ma 'bar ba'i gzhal/
73b2(rnying rgyud): yu 'dra// zag ma dmar po dbang gi tshul// zlum po gri bzhi rgyas pa ste// 'od zer dpung sdug stong phrag gang // 'bar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rba// ma hed wa sti brjo ltabang // d+hi zla gu la zlum gra gdon dang // gnod kyi rgya la sogs phyogs skyong brgya
73b3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed gdan du lci ba stsol khang/ oM byA kr-i t+ta trA~Mk+ShA s+t+wa~M/ gardza gadza hU~M phaT/ oM bidz+ri kr-i twa~M d+hi bya ya ti dz+nyA phaH/ badz+ra s+'u kar gruSha he/ badz+ra aH samya/ khAT+Ti/ oM ba kro ti bi dza ya r+the/ han ha na han hU~M phaT/ oM bad+hA kro d+hi wA se k+Shi trA~M phaT/
73b4(rnying rgyud): pa ba stsa / oM badzim nasad+d+he/ ga na / de shA ba/ ma / ga / oMSh+Ta oM t+ta ya/ tsa la/ na
73b5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra hi ri Na mu kha te/ badz+ra A luka mu khI hi/ oM badra kr-id+hA Ar+tha a tsa la hUM/ b+han+d+hab+han+na b+han+da hU~M phaT/ oM bad kro trA~M mA~M sa~M Sh+T+r-i hU~M phaT/ badz+ra di bI mu kha te/ badz+ra kA kA mu ShI he/ oM badz+ra g+ho ta ha ya g+ni wa b+hI/ hu waT+Ta wa hu l+le swA~M phaT/ oM ba kro tI tsany+dza
73b6(rnying rgyud): phaT/ badz+ra pe TA la rmA ba be/ badz+ra bak+Sha tI m+b+ha Shi te/ A~M badz+ra a pa dza~M/ Sh+kaM/ kai tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ oM badza kr-i t+ti sa b+hA ti Sh+TAM phaT/ badz+ra shwan mra kha he/ badz+ra sa tri Thi te/ oM badz+ra kota a.u mr-i ta kut+tA li hU~M phaT/ b+h+yoba~M d+d+ho t+ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra la~M Ni sad+d+ha
73b7(rnying rgyud): badza si ta mu te/ badz+ra ti la sbyi te// oM bad kr-i kri los bang la sa/ ts+tsha t+ma / 'dzis tI sa sl-is/ badz+ran kAs Shate/ 'dzin su la mra Sh+Ti ne/ 'adz+ra kroka ma thA ba la hUM/ gros tho sngo hA/
74a1(rnying rgyud): tI thAngs/ ba y-i/ la/ ba 'aM/ k+sham+b+ha hA/ Ab la ke la ya/ oM ts+tshaH/ srog ga gang+gA shang bya dang // shAg go bsgom par bya'o// 'byugs sa dbus can rdobs la// ye shes pa'i sa dbang bgrang // kyang
74a2(rnying rgyud): yak+Shi NI hUM phaT/ badz+ra b+hai re be hUM phaT/ badz+ra a mr-i ta hU~M phaT/ badz+ra mA ra NI hU~M phaT/ dbang bskur byin brlabs de bzhin no// ma bcos gdod nas dag pa'i dbyings nyid las// ma g.yos rang bzhin gsal ba'i ye shes shar// gnyis med khyad par che bas sku
74a3(rnying rgyud): ru bstan// dus gsum skye shi med pas rdo rje ste// dus gsum 'dus ma byas shing skye shi med// de nyid spros med 'khor lo rgyas 'debs klong // gnyis med byang chub thugs kyi sa bon las// sgril ma hUM gi 'od zer tshogs bcas rnams// yum gyi mkha'
74a4(rnying rgyud): la spos gang 'dus pa las// phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur cing hUM brjod pas// sku gsung thugs kyi khro bos phyogs mtshams gang // yab yum sprul par bcas te de bzhin no// thu chen dbu gsum dkar dmar sngo pa'i zhal// rdo rje tho ba mda' gzhu spu gri bsnams// rnam
74a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal dbu gsum sngo ser dkar ba'i zhal// rdo rje tri shUl dung chen 'khor lo bsnams// dbyug sngon dbu gsum ldang dmar sngo ba'i zhal/ rdo rje dbyug to rin chen ti ra bsnams// gshin rje dbu gsum ldang nag sngo ba'i zhal// thod dbyug 'khor lo rdo rje tir
74a6(rnying rgyud): bskams// mig yo dbu gsum ldang sngon sdug pa'i zhal// rdo rje zhags pa gshol dang gtun shing bsdams// rta mgrin dbu gsum dkar sdo dmar ba'i zhal// sbrul nag rdo rje su gri ti ra bsnams// gzhan gyis mi thub dkar dmar ser ba'i zhal/
74a7(rnying rgyud): ro rje ter than tang yab bsdams// bdud rtsi dbugasum dkar sngo skrag pa'i zhal// rdo rje gyal ma dbug to spu gre bsdams// khams gsum rnam rgyal dbug sum dkar sngozhal// rdo rje mda'i gzhu dung dmar tir bsdams// stobs chen dbu gsum dmar
74b1(rnying rgyud): na gdung pa'i zhal// rdo rje zhags pa gshol dang gtun shing bsdams// sgra 'byin mda' skems rdo rdorje sder mo gsum// du khrod gtun khung rdo rje sder mo drug/ mda' skems rlung 'byin rdo rje gsod byed dgu// spyod byed la sogs rgyan rnams de bzhin te//
74b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin g.yas na dril bu bsnams// g.yon gyis de bzhin dung chen stob par mdzad// phrag dang smrig bu stag dang bya rgod dang // g.yag dang bya rog sha ba 'ug pa dang // gzig dang / Tha ta byi la bu shrad dang / srang mo khwa dang seng gal wang dang /
74b3(rnying rgyud): dang sre maM dom dang byi bar bcas// rgyan dang mdog ni yab kyi rdo za ste// phyag mtshan yab kyis nyid kyi rtags su ste// sprul pa'i don gyis rtags kyi ngo bor bsdams// gtso bo thugs kyi ye shes rnam bzhi yis// ma rig rmongs pas bcing
74b4(rnying rgyud): can rnams// don dam gnyis med dang du bskal ba dang // sme shi rtsa nas gtsang byir d+hik+Shar// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs rang bzhin 'dus ma byas// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin las// gnyis med me ba 'khyad par bstang pa
74b5(rnying rgyud): pa don byin sgra byin ma// spyod pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod// thugs rje'i thugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spyod// thabs dang shes rab pyod pas mtha' gnyis grangs// de phyi the mdzad gnyis mdzad shAn te/ chen pa layus gzhis
74b6(rnying rgyud): rgyab las// sprul pa yang sprul tshogs bzlas de 'azhin no// wAg mthong ye shes chos dbyings rten gyis brgyan// thugs rje sngon lam 'khor ba gdug slol rmongs// rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang spro med par ral// de kyir ma byed/ man lA kar ge// @
74b7(rnying rgyud): dbang mad spang das// bsamadang mim ma chog kyis khye cing / thog byos byed pa// tham ci rtso med pa ni mthams so// la legs / da pos
75a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis ma spangs rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs// de dag don las rgyal bas rnam par rgyal// ye shes thugs rjes zin pas bsam mi khyab// thugs rje shes pas zin pas srid las 'das// gnyis la mi gnas mthe' bral dbu mar bstan//
75a2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes byed lA se ki// thugs rjes sdug bsngal mi bzod las 'das pas// yal bar mi gtong brtson 'grus shugs kyi brtan// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mtha' gtug sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed pa grA ma// yid g.yo las can
75a3(rnying rgyud): kyi 'gyur ba ni// ye shes dbang gis 'gro la thugs rje g.yo// don mdzad ye shes 'od 'byung dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir tshul khrims ldan ma'i gr-id+ha ma// khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes chen po des// 'khor ba'i bag chags nyer len 'joms par byed/
75a4(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal dregs las zhen pa'i nyon mongs de// 'gyur med dang las g.yos pa med pas na// de phyir ye shes dbyer med dbyug sngon can// rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid zin// thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor bar mi gtong zhing // shes rab thabs
75a5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyus 'dzin par byed// gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes byed tA tA bI// sdang mig thugs rjes mi 'gyur zhe la gnon// mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med mthu dpung 'joms// tsham rngams ral bsigs gdangs spras 'jig rten 'gengs// de byir 'bur
75a6(rnying rgyud): med phra men tsa ma ra// bsam pa'i dngos pos 'dod la 'dun pa 'dzin// dbyings nyid mnyam pas ye shes mkhyen pas gzigs// thugs rje 'dun pas 'khor ba'i bag chags za// de phyir za byed tro Na mu kha he// khro bdag ye shes mnyam pa'i rgyal po
75a7(rnying rgyud): yis// 'chi bdag bdun dang gshin rje tshar gcod cing // de yi rang bzhin de nyid yin pa'i phyir// de phyir khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// ye shes mtshan sdug zugs rje khro 'byung zhing // sprul pas 'gro sgrol sku dang ye shes 'byung // shes snying
75b1(rnying rgyud): ma skyes dbu mar rig pa ste// khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes mdzad stan swa// rtog pa'i dgra spangs drag po'i dgongs par gnas// 'khrul skyon dri ma shes bya'i rdzas tshor yang // 'gro don dus la bab na thugs rjes 'jug/ de phyir 'jug byed ha ri Na mu kha he/
75b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur// ye shes dbyings rtogs 'grangs pas nyin mo nyal// 'gro ldang rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldang // ye shes thugs rjes 'grangs pa'i u lu ma// khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes mthar mi g.yo//
75b3(rnying rgyud): yi rang bzhin gang yin dbyer med pa// dngos por ma spos rang bzhin don gyis khyab// kun la khyab pa'i phyir na mi g.yo mgron// mtshan ma thabs kyi tho bas dbyings su brdungs// thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms// rmongs pa ye
75b4(rnying rgyud): shes snying rjes mi gtong bas// mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu sa la// chos dbyings gnas la rtog pa'i skyon sel cing // thugs rjes spu gris skul pa bsam mi khyab// dug gsum zad phyir sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad
75b5(rnying rgyud): lham// brnag pa'i dngos la ting 'dzin rtse gcig sgyur// mnyam nyid mthu rtsal dbyings la ma g.yos pas// rtog pa'i spyod yul bral bas mi mthong ste// de phyir phra men mgyogs byed pre ta lI// khro bdag rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyis// mya ngan 'das dang //
75b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i chos thams cad// de yi rang bzhin ma 'dris par 'dus pas// de ldir khro bo'i rgyal po rta mchog dpal// rdo rje gtum mos mtshan ma'i dngos po 'joms// ye shes rngam tshul srid pa thal bar rtog/ de nyid mi rtog mtha' bral dbu mar brjid// ha ya
75b7(rnying rgyud): gI wa mnyas byed dza ya ti// yang bgazon chags 'gro don thabs dang ldan// mi 'dul zil bub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs// dus la mi 'da' brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// de byer mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i pin+da li// las 'bras bden la yid ches dang
76a1(rnying rgyud): ba gyur// mnyam nyid dbyings sa ma shes thags kyis mamags// theganas dan gyis zhag mang gtan gas rlud// dekyir mchogs rnyed pa sbed TI/ ba ga rmugs sa sngags cad mdulas// dam sa kyang na la mtshan mas
76a2(rnying rgyud): yangs mi byug// thugs rjes 'gadun nam nganam pal// bad+ma dang minapas shin bad/ 9// rang bzhin dang sbyin gzhan gyis mi ma pa'// thags sa nyid ba'i legs yin// dbyings la mi shes thags rjes gtan du rje// mdzangs
76a3(rnying rgyud): mchen po 'dzin ston pa'i// gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes mdzadas n+tat+ti// dbyings lce la shes zhugs pas shes zlag// dbyings nyid shes bzhugs pas nyon mangs za// gnyis med ye shes thags rjes 'byur ba za// de phyir ni byed gan su // ye shes thugs
76a4(rnying rgyud): rjes chos kyi dbyings la 'dzin// lhag mthong ye shes dbyings la mnyam 'gyur 'dzin// zhog nas che bas 'dzin pas mi 'phrog ste// de byer 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid parjir// khro bdag grags kyi ye shes ye nas grub// b+hA ba grub pa'i ye shes chos dbyings su/
76a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i chos can bdud dang 'drab la// ye shes thugs rje ldan gyi rtsi btang zhing // ye shes kun la khyab pa'i dbyings su 'khyil// de pyi khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi 'khyil// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings nyid rig pa'i sgra// dbyings rig ye shes gnyis
76a6(rnying rgyud): la nyan pa'i sgra// de las bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin ma// bdud ni 'khyil pa mnyes mdzad sa b+hA ma~M ta// rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul// phrin las cal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// sgo shing sgra glog mu stegs
76a7(rnying rgyud): joms/ byi rtsal 'amags 'a gyis kyid sa rgyas/ 'jim pa'i ngas pa ma brje dran pa byed// dbyings dang migs min ma nyid mi brjed drun// ting dzin 'tham phrag lhag mthong sa so gas la// de byer bu 'byin phun na
76b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi ye shes chen po des// dus gsum mi 'gyur sems kyi rang bzhin ni// gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su rab rtogs pas// khams gsum mya ngan 'das pa'i ngang du rgyal// de phyir khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar bstan// bdag tu blta ba
76b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma kun 'joms shing // za byed mche bas skye shi rtsad nas gcod// sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pas// khams gsum rnam rgyal mnyes mdzad ma ra NI// dbyings la ye shes shar zhing thugs rje mi// mthing nag chen pos drag po'i rlung
76b3(rnying rgyud): pa// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ma mgyogs dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir rmi byed phra men tak+Shu mu kha he// chos rnams dbye ba med par gyur pa ni// mnyam dang mi mthun log lha myos byed cing // rig pa skyed phyir sems nyid the tshom gcod// de phyir gsod
76b4(rnying rgyud): byed phra men na ku la// khro bdag ye shes thugs de rnam dag pas// thams cad dbyer med dbyings kyi ngang du stobs// mtha' gnyis zil gyis gnon pas brjod du med// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo stobs po che// thugs dam dbang gis rnam dgra dbyings nas
76b5(rnying rgyud): bskul// thugs rje'i zhugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// gnyis med mchod 'bul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs// ma hA ba la mnyes mdzad tsun+da ya hUM// lhag mthong ye shes stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon// tshwa ma rngams ral bsigs
76b6(rnying rgyud): gadrangs skyes stong gsum 'gengs// las sku ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan// de phyir stobs ldan phra men rik+Shaka/ gsum 'dus bcas pa rig pa gyur pa ni// phrin las bye thag mang po ci mdzad kyang // phyag rgya bzhi ni la bskyed dbyings su mkhyen//
76b7(rnying rgyud): de phyir 'phrog byed phra men U Di ka/ 'khor ba rdo rjes gcod pas mya ngan 'das// chos sku rdo rjes brjod pas mya ngan 'das// brjod med brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral// de phyir brjod med badz+ra yak+Sha NI// chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po 'joms// ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin
77a1(rnying rgyud): rtog pa bsregs// phyag mtshan rdo rje drag pos lha bdud 'joms// de phyir don la brjod med snyir po// 'chi med bdud rtsis yul sems skye 'gag med// de nyid don de ye shes thugs rje 'byung // gnyis med bdud rtsi'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// de phyir bdud
77a2(rnying rgyud): rtse mchog gi ye shes a mr-i ta// ye shes smos med yon tan rgya mtsho 'grub// thugs rjes 'phrog cing 'jig rten dbang du sdud// ye shes thugs rjes mnyam nyid dbyings su sdud// de phyir phra men rlag byed mA ra NI// cho ga rnam gsum las kyi 'phro'adra las/
77a3(rnying rgyud): skrabaskyed gsal gang ba byin brla bla dbang bskur nas// don gyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings su bstan// snang srid don gyi ngang du rang gnas pas// snang srid las kyi dkyil 'khor bdag gis bskyed// ces brjod pas/ ci ltar snang zhing srid pa thams cad
77a4(rnying rgyud): dpal khrag 'thung gi rang bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyad chen po las/ drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed cing che ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas dpa' khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/
77a5(rnying rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag bya ba'i phyir/ drag po'i dzin lngas su bdag bya zhing / dngos grubazod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhes 'gro ba ma reg pa'i don du/ drag po gtum po'i phrin las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do//
77a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ sred bu rdo rje phyur bu'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad par// sku yi dbyig tu bdag sur cig
77a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thigs// yon tan phrin las rmang po che// nga nyid du ni bdag gyur cig/ phyag rgya'i rgyal por bdag bskyod cig/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba la// thabs kyi spong bas 'gro don pa// khams dang sing ces gang 'angal ba
77b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin na pa 'dir stsol cig/ srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pastan// thugs kyi ye shes phur du yis// khams gsum gdar shA bcad pa dang // sred pa'i myur bya sgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos bra/
77b2(rnying rgyud): blang ba'i phyir// ma bcos thig le chos dbyings las// 'gyur med sku gcig gnas pa de// ye shes khro bor gshegs su gsol// drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyon mongs gdug pa bskal ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas
77b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen gyi// gro 'du las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // nyon mongs phung po bskal pa dang // rnam shes hU~M du gdon pa'i phyir// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol/
77b4(rnying rgyud): drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// gnod gdug rnam gnyis bskal pa'i phyir// gang gi pho nya mang po des// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// gang dmigs gnas nas 'gugs par bsam// dpal chen kI la ya yi spyan snga
77b5(rnying rgyud): ru// rnal 'byor kun gyi las bya zhes// khas blangs dam bcas ji bzhin du// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// mthu rtsal phyung ba'i dus la bab// byung
77b6(rnying rgyud): chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // gnyis med don du bsgrub pa ni// khams gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams// khro bo pho nya'i byin
77b7(rnying rgyud): rlabs las// lugs kyi grwa rgod skar ltar 'khrugs// sprul pa'i phyag brnyan klog bzhin 'bya// ma mo mkha' 'gro khwa ljang 'dzum// khro bo mang po thog ltar 'bab// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis// yung
78a1(rnying rgyud): tsam sa n-i 'dri 'phrul// mdon sto nas b+h+ya byadang // was dag rgyal bag+sa/ sunas byung // rnam shes nga ba babyung shes// zla rnams samyong ba mdzod// namangapa do 'dung du/
78a2(rnying rgyud): gnas nus khrag la zil gyis gnon// oM laM/ hUM yaM/ s+the na yan na/ oM ha thA la/ d+hI hrIHbokr-i/ snying po sngags kyis bkug pa do// ri rab 'og tu zil gyis mnan// ming dang mtshan mar bcas po de// khrog 'thung yab yum zhal du bsgrub/ gnyis myed
78a3(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i byin rlab las// hUM chen po dang snas mchog bskyed// de yis ri rab rming nas mnan// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ badz+ra hU~M ka ra hUM/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ phyag rgya chen po rnam bzhi yis// dgug cing bcings la dam du sdom/
78a4(rnying rgyud): sems ma 'khrugs par dbang du bsdu// hU~M gis bsdus la phaT kyis gtor// hU~M kAr dang kI la ya// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis dbus bsdus la// chos nyid a yi ngang du sbar// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ sarba bis+thA na/ badz+ra kI la ya/ hUM phaT/ badz+ra
78a5(rnying rgyud): hUM/ khro bo'i tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor do// phaT gyis spros pas dgral bstim// gzi ba krag dbang rnams mngon du thog/ tsar gyis byung ste la la bsdu// bdag gi thugs kar dbang bsla rabs// sgro med tshe yi dngos grub thob/ phaT aH/
78a6(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin phur pa ste// rtse gcig ma yengs 'grub pa'i rtags// ting 'dzin lta ba ma khrol na// dngos su bsgral bas don mi 'grub// don gyi 'bras bu ngan song rgyu// don nyid gnyis med dbyings su bsgral// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i thar pas gdab/
78a7(rnying rgyud): ces brjod pas/ 'jigs byed khro bo'i tshogs kyis thams cad dmigs su med par mya ngan las bsgral lo// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las// bdag nyid che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed de/ dbang nod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis phrar ba gdab pa'i
78b1(rnying rgyud): ga // nas pang shAg rnas pas/ 'ag pa'i yin pas sdes dmigs pa das / demangon pa ma du sprul / na mangs pa gzugs pa/ banyas dpang bamangon sam chu bzlab da/ mas pad
78b2(rnying rgyud): do/ skal ngan las kyis ma nang ba de// rnal 'byor don la bar gcod byas// gnyis med bsgral bas mi 'dul bas// mngon spyod bsgral ba'i las byas la// gang gis gzugs la ming dus bris// gshin rje'i phyogs su las rnams bya//
78b3(rnying rgyud): khru gang brkos la rgya sol gdab// thod pa mda' gzhu zhags pa dang // rtsang dang dug rdzas tshang bas bskor// mnyes zhal lce kun la bcol// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas las 'di bya'o// bdag nyid dbang gi rgyan gyis brgyan// dam can bsnyen nas
78b4(rnying rgyud): bkye// gzugs bsdu ba yi las bsdu ba// dam tshig chen po'i dus la brab// rnal 'byor don srub dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// pho nya phyag brnyan tshogs bcas kyis/
78b5(rnying rgyud): zung zhig chings shig rnam par sdoms// gtogs shig grogs dang phral bar gyis// ring bar khug la sbyor chu gcig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// las kyi pho nya mang po kun// gzugs la bsdu ba'i las byung gis// sngon chad dam bcas
78b6(rnying rgyud): ci bzhin du// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// rnam shes dbang po gzugs la bskyas// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril zla phyag rgya bzhi bcas la// bsdu ba'i dngos po 'di brjod cing // dbang pos
78b7(rnying rgyud): na sum mthong bar bas ma// shI g+h+raM A na ya hUM Ta/ ta lA la ka pA la hU~M phaT/ ha sa ya na ha ran hU~M phaT/ dz+wa la pa yadz+wa la~M pa ya hU~M phaT/ A be sha la tA khe shi ye hUM phaT/ b+hin b+hid+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ khrag 'thung jo bo'i tshogs kyis// tsam
79a1(rnying rgyud): mongs pa'i sems gzugs la bsdus pas/ bdag po dbang pos mngon sum du mthong nas rnam par shes pa'i sems/ mya ngan las 'das par bya ba'i phyir ro// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i hud chen po las
79a2(rnying rgyud): gzugs la rnam shes dbab cing bsdu pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang kI la yas/ de drag po sngags dang khro tshogs kyis phur pas gdab cing bsgral ba'i phyir/ sdang ba zhe la bzhag/ thugs rjes nyon mongs pa'i zhe sdang
79a3(rnying rgyud): nus g.yos nas/ shin tu gtum pa'i nga ro dang // gdangs skad drag po'i phrin las kyis gtum tshig 'di skad brjod do// hUM drag po 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gtum rngam 'khrugs pa'i ngo bo las// phonya myug brtan tshogs rnams kyis/
79a4(rnying rgyud): shes gzugs la bsdus pa de// nyon mongs 'bras bu 'phel byed pas// thabs kyis 'dul ba'i skabs med kyis// dmigs kyis mngon sum bsgral bar bya// mthing nagacod pa na phur pa la// khro bo'i tshogs su de bzhin de// bdug parje
79a5(rnying rgyud): byug la brlabs shing bskur// glang la lan gsum sku gsung thugs// khams gsum phur pas dus gcig bsgral// dang la pho nya'i phur pas gdab// de nas sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// thabs dang dgos ched lnga ru yod// dam tshig chen po'i du
79a6(rnying rgyud): la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i de bzhin te// dbus nas phur pa bzhi blang la// khro bdag yab yum hUM kar// sgra 'byin ma ste yab yum bzhis// drag po'i gnas su rim bzhin gdag/ shin tu
79a7(rnying rgyud): bzad hUM sgra can// gdug pa'i tshogs bcas ma lus kyis// dngos su btab nas zhig par bsam// don gyis btab pas mkha' la bton// yum gyi gser zhun lta bu'i sems// hUM gis bsdus pas bdag la bstim/ lus ngag yi
79b1(rnying rgyud): gsum sku gsung thugs// dus gsum 'gyur med tshe yi dngos// che ba'i yon tan mthar phyin bsam// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang thob pas// don gyi gnas kyang thob par bsam// dran pa'i gzhil des btab nas// nyon mongs rtsa thag nges gcod pa/
79b2(rnying rgyud): sems nyid ye shes chen por bskyed// dbang po'i yul la des btab pas// dran pa nyams nas dbang po 'phrog/ rnam shes mi gnas gnas su bsgral// don dam gnyis med mkha' la bskal// bstod cing phrin las drag po rol// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang
79b3(rnying rgyud): gcod// srog gi go ru shar ba de// dmigs par bya ba'i don rnams la// snying gI go ru k+Shi la ya// hU~M tsit+ta tsit+ta hUM phaT// a dzi te a pa ra dzi ta hUM phaT// taM ga te hUM phaT/ dza ye bi dza ye hUM phaT/ bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// khyed kyi phrin las dus la
79b4(rnying rgyud): rab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na badz+ra/ g+han b+han+da badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ ha na ha na badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ ma ra pra marda na ye hUM phaT/ pa ra bid+d+hA na mu ru mu ru hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+NA pA ya gr-ih+NA pA ya hUM phaT/
79b5(rnying rgyud): suM ru su ru badz+ra/ d+hir+m+ma bid+d+ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ rim gyis 'jug la de bzhin to// gnyis med mkha' la bsgral ba yin// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ma lus par thebs nas/ phung po dngos su bsgral te rnam par shes pa mya ngan ya sa 'das
79b6(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// phur bu pa~M dA nI las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ phur ba dngos su gdab rnying rnam shes mya ngan las bzla ba'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas yang drag po'i phrin las mtshon gyis brdeg cing gtub pa'i phyir/ 'di skad
79b7(rnying rgyud): sa pa sgrol ba'i phung ngos// sprul po phyag 'thun las bya'o// 'di yang ma keng 'dzin dang // sngags dang babs dang dgos chad do// d+hi zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// pho nya rol pa'i las bya bas// dam tshig chen pa'i dus la ba/
80a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsang pa'i bka' las ni// sdig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen chum chen po dang // martson chen ldan po 'bar ba yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya chu khos// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed // de ni po nyas sa
80a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // bka' rnams nyan par byed pa'o// khro bo gdug pa'i mtshon dpal gyis// nyon mongs mnan pa'i phung po de// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gris gtub// mgo snying lha gzugs ma lus rnams// dngos gzhi med par brlag par bsam/
80a3(rnying rgyud): gtub dang bka' nyan snying po dang // de dang der ni de bzhin no// ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma b+hU ma/ dz+nyA na kar i daM/ daN+Di ma ma shIg+h+raM karma kA ra ya/ rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo yis// g.yon gyis mnan la g.yas kyis so// spyi bo ske dang phung po rnams// de 'di
80a4(rnying rgyud): yis de bzhin gtub// ma rig nyon mongs rgya dral nas// yang dag gnas la des bkod na// 'gyur med sku thob de dgongs nas// ming gis mi byar mi gtub po// zhes brjod pas/ nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes lnga'i dang du mya ngan las 'das so//
80a5(rnying rgyud): phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mtshon gyis gtub pa'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang kI la yas/ de'i mthu dang nu 'phral phyir mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad brjod do// de yang pho nya'i ting nge
80a6(rnying rgyud): dang // sngags dang thabs dang dgos ched do// sgraphung po lcug mag go la// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gnyis med par// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i dus la bab// yang dag don spyod rnal 'byor la// gdug cing ldang sems ldan pa rnams// lha yang rung ste bdud kyang ru
80a7(rnying rgyud): ngal bar chod byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// yab kyi lonyan byed gyis// de yi mtha rnams 'phrog par bsam// yum gyi pho nya 'jigs byed kyis// de la nu 'phrul 'phrog par rol// sa bsal na ya hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phan+da/
80b1(rnying rgyud): ngas 'dabang sam yas pas// nga'i ma rdza 'du rnams// sa sus sa tur la thugs pazlas// bdag ldad yi'ang 'das pas// mthu dang na 'phrul ldan pa' thabs// thabs kyi 'bra 'damang polas// bdag la thabs sa su sa du nga
80b2(rnying rgyud): mthu dang rje 'phrul rnams// gon mi nus pa'i ngogs pa'o// zhes brjod pas gdon gyi rigs de dag gis mthu dang rje 'phrul sngon mi nus par gyur to// phum bu mya na las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las// maN+Da dang rdzu 'phrul thogs nas phyis s+hon/
80b3(rnying rgyud): mi nus par zla ba'i khrel sa sgrub // / de nas yang kI la yas/ drug po phrin las kyis/ gzhan rdzogs 'bar ba shA / nyon mongs drug ma'i gzhi zhe nga 'bra' ba smin pa'i phung po'i thed do la de mi gnas par bsgral to/
80b4(rnying rgyud): stob pa'i phyir 'di skad rtsod do// hU~M gu gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i klong// bcos med yum sti mkha' klod du// yab kyi ye shes tho tshogs kyis// nyon mongs ma cas rten 'pho ba'i// lhag ma ma lus smrar bton gyis// ngamachog rten po'i dus
80b5(rnying rgyud): dag/ dza// mang po sag tun du brdung // brtad dang bskab dang dbyings su bskal// snying po rim bzhin sngags bzlas pas// gnyis med mkha' lagadon par bya'o// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// khro bdag dbul chen 'bar ba
80b6(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'alas 'das pa'i sdig chen rnams// khas khyedres dam bcas man 'bor bas/ rang gi gad mar dang myur te/ de'i ming ba la snying ba sregs nas// lus dag rdul phran bzhin du rdzogs// khro mo 'bang ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje thobs brdung
80b7(rnying rgyud): lha yang drung ste bstsal bar bya'o// Sha hri tha~M tha~M/ N+Di dra phaT / 'thar cho na ldan ga tum don zhing med migs dbyings su bsngal/ dkar nag mtshams nas su 'ged la// zhi ga cig kI la yas// blang
81a1(rnying rgyud): phur bu'i bur gyu // gzung 'dzin nam tog tu gcod pa'i// sgra med byang chub sems su bstun// zhes da// Nas tad ngan rgyas byin pa rnabasas// gsang sngags che ba'i byin brlabasas// sangs rgyas kyi /
81a2(rnying rgyud): nus mtha yis/ ats+tshin myo dus la bab pa'o// gnag pa de kho na la'o// bad kI li kI la~M/ gnag pa de kho na la'o// kI li trai li zhes bco bca du nag gi mtshams su'o// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyang chen po las/ @
81a3(rnying rgyud): phrin las kyis gtun tshogs su bdungs shing / chos nyid 'den pa'i don gyi phur pas/ nyon mongs brtsad nas bcad nas/ byang chub kyi sems su bu'i rang bzhin du mya ngan las bzla ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas la
81a4(rnying rgyud): layas bsgral ba de dag don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dgos tshad su mchog shin tu legs par bstan cing / bsgral ba'i gnas kyi man ngag 'di skang brjod do// de dag bsgrub pa'i dam pa ni// kun gyi rtsab ma yin te// gnyis med don ldan skyes bu des// gnod sa
81a5(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis ma bsgral na// nges par ngan song 'khor bar ltung // ci phyir nges pa'i las la sgrib// nges pa'i don por log par gol// blta ba ngarda pas ngas chod byas// spyod pa rtsing pas bri tsor byas// dam tshig nyams pas gzu sums byas// gzhung las gol bas
81a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dral// mnyes pa ni dgra par 'joms// deng las mkhas la skur pa 'drebs// de la drag po'i las byas na// ma ngan 'das pa'i yon tan thob// ma mo mkha' 'gro bran bzhin 'khol// tshe ring bde baphun sumatshogs// dgra dang 'byung po rdul du rdzog
81a7(rnying rgyud): mthu chen lha srin de bzhin te// ci bgyis bka' zhan bsgo banyan// 'di dang pha ro la gnyis su yang // bsam pa 'grub cing mtho sa sog/ bdag dang gnyis med byang chub sems// gnyis med chos srur dbyer med pas// 'anas gsum po sgo bkag nas/
81b1(rnying rgyud): tIrtis med mkha' la de bskal na// don dang mthun pas da mtshig skyong // smyig chen bsgral na las ngan 'chad// dam nyams bsgral na bka' gzhung bcan// log rtog bskal na dkyil 'khor gtan// gnod gdug bskal na bar chad nyung // gzhan
81b2(rnying rgyud): n+ma tan brjod las 'das// 'bras blangs par chud mig// khro bdag chen po thabs mkhas pas// bskal ba'i las rnams bya bar bshad// dang pi sbring rjes bzhi brgya la// tshad med rnam pa'i skyon du gtong // de nas bapral ba'i drang po'o// gnyis na
81b3(rnying rgyud): lhayi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag don gyis sbyang bar bya// nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med// rnam dag phung po lnga yis bsdus// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer brjo/
81b4(rnying rgyud): pasgral pa'i rnam shes hUM du gsal// de nyid byang chub sems kyi rtags// dpal chen rdo rje nyid kyi sgra// ma lus dbyer maud 'dus ma byas// gnyis med don gyi de bzhin no// I badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi s+thAn po hU~M phaT/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'bru gsum po/
81b5(rnying rgyud): gis bsdus la phaT kyis 'phang // mkha' la bton la rdo rjer ro// rtse lnga 'bar ba'i sgra ru gsal// mi 'gyur sku yi ngo bor gyur// hUM hUM d+h+waM/ phaT phaT phaT/ b+huMSh+TAM/ phaT phaT/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra ces brjod pas/ thams cad mya ngan las 'das nas sku mchog de
81b6(rnying rgyud): kyimi skyer bar skye hA// ba na la nga smra rje sbyin pa sa/ so hU~M nga sa kyi sems c-is k+shi nga bzhin sbyi pa'i ti ba 'i / de nas pa ni ste ldugs// hU~M N+DIl shid kyi chags
81b7(rnying rgyud): yongs su myong ba 'di gsungs so// e mgo// phyogs brgyangs gsum cir yang snang // chang chub shing kyis// smos med thig ler gnas pa las// gzung 'dzin las kyis rnam par zin// rgyas kyi sgom bsam yas kyang //
82a1(rnying rgyud): sa// sa ga na lda ma sa/ su kra/ ga sa // sa
82a2(rnying rgyud): dag nas mas rjo / da par yang gas dang ga/ k+sha ma sapa/ da' mapa rnamam pa/ nga 'a da nad da da gas
82a3(rnying rgyud): las nas sa sa/ la/ byung chu shems // rnyed pas// ma da mamam can kyang byed pa sa sa nas/ thugs sugs sa
82a4(rnying rgyud): las 'das par gyur te/ ka mra he drug yang nyid kyi thugs kar bgrus// thim par gyur // / thar tha 'bram sde rtsa ba'i rmad chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ yongs su gtad pa'i na du khyer brgyad pa'o//
82a5(rnying rgyud): phur bu mya ngan las da
82a6(rnying rgyud): na sa nga/ sa na/ rang ga /
82a7(rnying rgyud): nga na da pa/ / sas ga
82a8(rnying rgyud): sa kyi ga sa
82b1(rnying rgyud): gyen la sogs par bzhengs nas yang pad+ma skyong dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang / sgo bzhi yang bzla'i sgo dang / rta babs dang / them skas dang / rgyun la sogs pas brgyan pa na/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dang / mu tig gi rang bzhin dkaras
82b2(rnying rgyud): 'tsher ba dang / byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sku dang phyag mtshan du rdzogs pa'i rigs lnga yab yum du bcas pa/ sems dpa' dang sems ma sgeg pa'i tshogs su bcas pa/ 'byung ba bzhi'i sgo bar bcas pa dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas kyang
82b3(rnying rgyud): chub thig les/ kun tu bltas sam gzigs pas/ dug lngas gdung bar gzigs te/ thugs rje'i dbang gis mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs so// de las sangs rgyas spyan dang / mA ma kI dang / na bza' dkar mo dang / dam tshig sgrol ma dang /
82b4(rnying rgyud): kun tu babang mo rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// kye gzu mkhan gzu bo chen po ston pa'i dpal// khams gsum zug rngus zin pa'i nad pa la// brags rje'i spyan gyis yang dag gzigs gyur la// 'tsho ba'i sman gyis nad pa'i sman pa mdzod//
82b5(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i mchog de mnyam par bzhag pa las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdag ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// 'phral la rgyas pa ma yin te// ngas bstan lung 'di nyan 'dod na// nyan pa
82b6(rnying rgyud): po yi blo la rtogs// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e maho bcom ldan mngon sangs rgyas// khams gsum thugs rjes drongs mdzod la// mdzad pa'i don gyis thams cad sgrol// de ltar mdzad na
82b7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig yin// zhes gsol to// de nas dgyes pa chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // da ltar nga yi bstan pa 'di// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//
83a1(rnying rgyud): nadun su na na/ na ldan tu/ na sa su// dam pa nas ga chu
83a2(rnying rgyud): su /
83a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dkris pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drug/ dgyes pa chen po'i phrin lus te// gang zhig gdung ba'i nad kyis zin// gso ba'i sbyin pa khyod cid de// nad rnams kun gyi ldan pa mdzod// ji sngags
83a4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang byang chub sems kyi thig le dgyes pa chen po des/ phrin las la mngon par dang ste/ zhub po'i don gyis zhu bzod pa skyed pa'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' kun gyi rgyan// rdo rje sems dpa
83a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' gtso// khyod kyis zhus pa la mtshan che// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ bcom ldan 'das lnga li rang ba dang dga' ba dang ngom pa bskyed de/ yang 'di skad zhus so// kye mA he rin rjen phung po khyod// 'gro ba kun bskyed yid
83a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin tshul// chos rnams phung po pa bad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ thig le byang chub kyi sems kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis na// phyi dang nang dang gsang po dang /
83a7(rnying rgyud): mthar thug rang bzhin don dam mo// phye'i chung dang nang ga zung // gsang nga'i drung dang 'ayang drugazung // de nams dngos pa zar ba'i rlung // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang gi drung // drag po mthar byas bzhu ba'i mchog/ gastangs chen thobatu chug ste// rus sbal 'gros dang meng
83b1(rnying rgyud): ge'i blta// stag gi mchongs pa pho rog sogs// dal dang 'brel pa'i rlung rnams dgog/ rlung zhes bya ba'i las rnams ni// nam mkha' dngas pa'i khug rna 'am// rlan phog pa yi rlangs pa'am// drod phog pa yi chu thigs bzhin// gang la gang zhig gnas pa
83b2(rnying rgyud): de// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// de nyid dul bar gyur pa yis// nam mkha' nyid la nam mkha' thim// dal ba'i rlung rnams dgag pa'i thabs// bltas pas mthong ba ma yin te// sems kyis sems la blta ba'o// de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa/
83b3(rnying rgyud): mthong ba med na mthong ba'i mchog/ de ni lci ba'i blta bde// ltas pa de nyid lta ba'i mchog/ shes pa chen po'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin shes rab snying rje ni// theg pa chen po kun gyi rgyan yang yin// blta ba kun gyi mchog kyang yin// chos rnams kun gyi
83b4(rnying rgyud): snying po yin// zhes gsungs nas/ bden pa gnyis kyi mtha' la bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi thig le la zhus pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po// rlung zhes bya ba'i chu dang rkyen// thabs
83b5(rnying rgyud): dang rang bzhin 'brel ba rnams// gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol dang / grangs dang gnas dang sten pa rnams// 'byung ba'i khungs dang 'dug pa rnams// gang lags bcom ldan bka' stsol dang // zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das
83b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi thig les/ yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyud rnams kun gyi nad nyid nas// smras pa bden pa mchog yin te/ glu ni 'byung ba bzhi yin la// rkyen ni phrin las rnam pa bzhi// thabs ni 'byung 'jug gnas dang gsum// 'dre
83b7(rnying rgyud): pad la dang brel ba'i rlung // rlung zhes bya bas las kun byed// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// grangs ni rnam pa gang yin pa// ti khri tshig stong drug brgya'o// chos dang longs spyod 'khor lo rnams// gnas dang rten pa kho na'o//
84a1(rnying rgyud): na 'ams gsum gnas pa dugs ram// rtswa gsum gnas pa rtan// 'byung bal dngas su 'dug pa'o// longs spyod kyib gasto nams kyis/ smyan mas ma dag tan pa 'bas// gags sas/ da /
84a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las rlung bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le byang chub kyi sems dgyes pa chen po des/
84a3(rnying rgyud): chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de la rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa/ kye ma byung chub rdo rje la// mnyam gzhag ting nge 'dzin la gnas// rtog ge pa yi bsam pa yis// mnyam bzhan chos sku las bzhengs nas// rtsa yi la sa rnam
84a4(rnying rgyud): bshad par gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'byangs mda' ni mchong ma dang // spyi khyer ma dang dga' byed ma// rgyan chen dang ni sems ma rnams// stong phrag 'dun
84a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis la// sa rnams chu rnams me rnams dang // rlung dang nam mkha' rten rnams dang // brgya rtsa brgya dang brgyad cu gnyis// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu drug dang // bdun dang gsum du gang gyur pa// mdu pa thams cad srong byed pa// 'khor lo kun gyi dra ba krong
84a6(rnying rgyud): mchog/ ces gsungs so// de rnams dkyil 'khor gang yin la// 'khor lo kun gyi rnam pa ni// ji snyed rnam pa mang po yang // bdag po rnam pa bzhi la 'dus// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dang // bde ba chos
84a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dang // sbal ba grags pa'i 'khor lo dang // gtso bo rnams kyi 'khor lo bstan// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa satwa kyas mdud pa'i rgyud las rtswa'i rang bzhin rang bzhin
84b1(rnying rgyud): skyobs kyang /
84b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u skye gsum pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dgyes pa chen po mchog/ sems can dga' ba skyed pa'i phyir// gsang ba mthar thug gtum mo rnams// dgyes pa
84b3(rnying rgyud): pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des/ 'khor ba'i skyo bas 'khor yug chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so/
84b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i bdag/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' che// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' kun// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa rnams// gtum mo gtum mo 'dod pa la// gtum mo'i tshogs
84b5(rnying rgyud): rnams bshad par bya'o// phyi yi gtum mor gang gsungs pa// kun 'dus 'brel pa'i gtum mo yin// phyi yi mchog tu gang gsungs pa// 'bar 'dzin dang po'i gtum mo yin// nang gi mchog tu gang gsungs pa// 'khor lo srog shing gtum mo yin/
84b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mchog tu gang gsungs pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i gtum mo yin// de rnams mchog tu gang gsungs pa// sems rnams chos rnams lta ba yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas/ dgyes pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol
84b7(rnying rgyud): to// de ltar thams cad lags pa na// bye brag rnam grongs bstan du gsol// zhes zhus te/ phyi yi gtum mo gang lags dang // nang gi gtum mo gang lags dang // gsang ba'i gtum mo gang lags dang // mthar thug gtum mo gang lags rnams// bye brag
84b8(rnying rgyud): de ltar bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang dgyes pa chen pos/ srog mo'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// bde ba'i don la mnal lo// de las bzhengs nas 'di skad gsungs so// gang zhig sha dang lus rnams
85a1(rnying rgyud): la// 'am pa rnam pa 'di yin te// 'tham phrag khri dang 'bram stong dang // de dang shi'i tshig gang pod// thams cad parda 'dabam bde// yig as bzhin yin// gleng rdum tshogs kyi gsum mngon// sam brda jug
85a2(rnying rgyud): dzu pa yi ga/ de yang dadra 'dab bzhi la// g.yas pa dpa' bo thobs yi ge/ g.yon pa shes rab ma'i yi ge// dbus su yi ge a rnams so// gsang ba'i gsum mor gang gsungs pa// char yang rlung gi gnas na yod// de gsu ni rdzob kyi bdud 'ate/
85a3(rnying rgyud): la lo byin rlabs kyis// khab lta bu bzhu ba tul byed// 'jog pa'i gtum mo gang bar byed// de hri thams cad 'bebs 'gyur te/ badz+retra paT s+ho/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi rtsa rnams dang // dbus kyi rtsa yi 'gros rnams// rgyud pa'i sgonas g.yas pa de// 'phe'as/
85a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo nas g.yon pa'o// 'dzin pa'i sa ni rnam bzhi ste// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// srog gi go dra shar ba dang // snying gi dbus su bsgom par bya'o// gang zhig de ltar rnam phye bas
85a5(rnying rgyud): gtum mo'i tshogs rnams rab tu bshad// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'di gaspangs so// bskyed pa'i rdzogs par gsungs pa ni// 'khor lo bzhi yi mtshan nyid de// sprul pa'i 'khor lo drug cu bzhir// sprul pa'i yig 'bru dkar po 'dod// so/ de ltar
85a6(rnying rgyud): sna yin pas// chos kyi 'khor lo 'ang ba ma brgyad// dbus su thugs kyi snying po ste// chos kyi yig 'bumathing ga'o// hUM/ phyogs bani yal la mtshams bzhi gram/ Sh+T+r-itraM hrI ha/ me ya~M b+h+r-i ti/ mongs spyod 'khor lo 'dab bcu drug/ dbus su langs spyod pa/
85a7(rnying rgyud): gser// a/ 'dab ma'i phyogs bzhir 'byung ba bzhi/ Ar+tha thA/ bde chen 'khor 'jug cu gnyis// sa bon la pazhes gnas pa'o// haM/ mi zhigs pa'i 'og tu brnyas// de ni 'dzag pa'i gtumatho zhes// sbas pa yang dag mchog yin na// de ltar gtu/
85b1(rnying rgyud): myor bye bra de// grangs srung snying dzad pa yang // rkyenang gsang ba gsum du bstan// mthar thug gtum mo gang yin pa// de ni rang byung ye shes te// thig la chen pa yi kye gtum mo yin// dasbya ga dus ma'i bye brag na// rnal 'byor rnams kyis shes par
85b2(rnying rgyud): gyis/ zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/ gtum mo'i cho gas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas
85b3(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen po'i thig le byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes brjod nus/ bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gang lags/ zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thab tu 'di/
85b4(rnying rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// steng dang 'og gi tshul gyis ni// rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rtswa ni bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yod// rtse yigatso ba'i rgyad dang ni// steng dang rig dang bcu po ni// khro bo bcu yi rang bzhin no// dbus kyi cha chen gang yid pa/
85b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan dbus kyi gtso bo'o// de ltar rnal 'byor pa yi lus// yi ge a ni sdom gnas pa'o// chos nyid rtsa dang ye shes rtsa// rang rgyud rtsa dang pon tan rtsa// thabs dang shes rab rtsa rnams ni// hUM chen la sogs khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin du dgad/
85b6(rnying rgyud): dang gnas// de ltar rten rnams gang yin la// sgra 'byin la sogs bcu rnams gnas// de ltar bcu po gang yin la// phra men lo mo sgom gnas// de yi rtan la mo rnams so// sgo ba bzhi po ga yin pa// pu shud mgo can la sogs pa'o// de ltar rnal
85b7(rnying rgyud): gang shes pa// bskyed pa rim pa rdzogs pa ste// thabs ldan rnams kyis de shes na// rdzogs pa nang gi dkyil mkhor yin// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ci mu dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud
86a1(rnying rgyud): las/ rdzogs pa nang ga dkyil 'khor bstan 'arje liT stelnga ba'o// / de nas pang rdo rje sems dpas/ dgyes pa chen po la 'di skad byas so// kye ma 'odaba'ang thags na can// sangs byas bya 'angon bu// lanas
86a2(rnying rgyud): gang la bgyi// mdud pa zhes ni ji lta bu// thams cad ces ni gang lang gyi// zhes zhus pas/ dgyes pa chen po thika le byang chub kyi sems kyis smras pa/ sems can thams cad 'di gyur cing // dga' ba thams cad bskyed par bya'o// thams cad rang bzhin byang chub sa
86a3(rnying rgyud): tshad med pa de ni sngon du btung // bden pa gnyis kyi zag gis// brjod las 'das pa sangs rgyas yin// grangs las 'das pa gnas gzhan yin// dpe las 'das pa mtshon du med// spros pa nye ba zhi pa ni// sangs rgyas dngos po kho na'o// tres na sangs rgyas mdun
86a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// med pa ma yin logs min// rtag pa mayin chad pa min// 'ong ba ma yin 'gro ba min/ yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min// de ltar rnam pa sran shes na// thams cad thams cad mdud pa yin// bden pa gnyis kyi che brag la// shes shing rig pa ye shes
86a5(rnying rgyud): yin// rig pa mchog gi gnas yin no// de nyid pa bya ye shes te// man+ta pa zhes ni de la bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ the brag sangs rgyas ji snyed pa// bslus pas sangs rgyas rnam pas// dra la mdud pa gang yin pa// su
86a6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje marjon// bcom ldan rdzo gzhon du len// ye shes mdug pa ji skad pa// ra byung yi shes mdud pa yin// dzA skad bye brag ji snyed pa// don dam smos bral mdud pa yin// de ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // rlung gi bye brag ri snyed pa// mi shigs kyi
86a7(rnying rgyud): pa yin// rtsa yi bye brag ji snyed pa// kun 'dir ma'i mdud pa yin// sems nyid bye brag ji snyed pa// dga' ba dang po'i mdud pa yin// phung po'i bye brag ji snyed pa// rnam par shes pa mdud pa yin// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ gang laci byas mang /
86b1(rnying rgyud): zhesag sa sam/ 'anas par 'dug mas da na 'a dud pad 'o// // spyanan smras nga du // 'ar gyu ga nadang/
86b2(rnying rgyud): thanapa dU du// marnam
86b3(rnying rgyud): sa gas/ dag mdun sa/
86b4(rnying rgyud): rnams ci u dgasang dang nam migs thams cad 'dus sa sasu mas/ sre panas dpa rnam nga dugs/ dan pa'i rnamams pa rgyan pa
86b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas+ho// sangs rgyas rnams cad kyis ngas rgyab// dpa' sa sa pan da // dpe gi ri ma ldan po sadus nas// kyim pachen pa nyid po 'phrul dab ga ting pe na la rnams par zhugs so// de napa 'ad
86b6(rnying rgyud): bka' stsa te// sems can pas pa pa'i da bang gsun// dang gang pos te dang // ri 'i nga ba la rnams padin// pad dang dus dang da gas// 'i dbang dang nang shi la// gsang ba'i dab da mas kyi dang // ma wAr ga
86b7(rnying rgyud): ni/ drim pa ba dang sa pa 'dra/ gas sa ga pa dang / debaden pani badzi pe sa so// cisho lnga me ni/ gsams pa 'ju pa thod// dam sa bya gas 'du par
87a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ gsang dbang ste// rtswa yi rigs la zhes rab bang // de bzhin nul po bzhi pa ste// dem pa de bzhin shes parabya// gal te munan gcig kyang na// grang la dmyigs pa de bzhin bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang das sems dang/
87a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig dkar po'i me tog gis mchod cing / bskor ba lan du mar byas/ phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol te// rnal 'byor gcig gi don byed na// gsang ba dang ni gsang chen dang // ye shes snying po'i dor
87a3(rnying rgyud): chen dang // de bzhin bzhi pa ji ltar bsgyur// de nas yang dgyes pa chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yan lag lus ni bshan pa ste// dra ba can la bum pa sbyin// dag gi las ni bram ni ste// 'jig rten can la gsang ba sten// sems mi
87a4(rnying rgyud): re ste// na cig kyis la shes ra bde bang // yon tan zin pas rgyal po ste// kunAg cog sa la bzhi pa bkur// zhes gsungs so// de nas pang 'di skad ces ched du brjod pa 'di brjod na// bum pa'i dbang zhes bya ba la// bdag pa'i dbang da dpa'
87a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dab zhes byab la// lus dang leg 'bru'i sgor ba dang // rtsa dang lag 'bru'i blor ba dang // chung dang sdig 'bru'i steng ba dang // sems dang yig 'dru'i sbyong ba dang // b+ha pang gang dag rgyang bar gyi// gas bad ni dam pang // shes pa
87a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbang zhes pa// shes rab ma yin mtshan nyid de// lus kyi ri bo dgon pa 'dra// ri bran tsa tse tu lis sbas// chu mig bkod ma dgra dang stan// spos dang ldan pa'i dri dang bcas// rtsi shing nags tshal spos kyis brgyan// lo grangs bcu gas cu
87a7(rnying rgyud): dang / bcu dang ti shur shes par bya// mig ni dkar nag byed pa dang // smin ma phral dbyas ring dang // sna rtse drang zhing sbed pa za// ring thung ma yin tshad ma'i lus// srad dang stospyong ni ldan par mnam// 'draHba la ge sar ring // dums zhing na rtse dkar/
87b1(rnying rgyud): ngag ni 'jam la gzhon nu 'dra// dad pa che la mang du thos// de lta bu ni yongs su bzung // 'byung ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyis// bslu ba rnam bzhi'i don dang mthun// de la dga' ba lus kyis skye// bde chen 'khor lo'i rang bzhin ni// rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub sems//
87b2(rnying rgyud): kha ba lta bu'i rang bzhin de// mkhas pas spyan drang gnyis med pastim// dga' bzhi lus kyis bskyed pa yin// mtha' gnyis mi 'gro ba yi dbang // sprul pa'i 'khor lor phyin pa'i tshe// dga' ba dang po zhes su bshad// rdo rje'i 'chang gzung nang du phyin pa'i tshe//
87b3(rnying rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba zhes su bshad// bum pa'i nang du phyin pa'i tshe// rang bzhin dga' ba zhes bya'o// de las 'das na bral ba ste// srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// se shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs
87b4(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de/ bum pa'i dam tshig gang yin pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa brtag pa dang // rmongs pa rnams la mi bya ste// snod
87b5(rnying rgyud): lo ka gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi 'jig rten lha yi mchog/ de ni bum pa'i dam tshig yin// gang zhig gsang ba ston pa la// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di yin te// bud med shes rab rang bzhin te// tsaN+Da li la rtag tu bsgom// zas lnga rtag tu bza' bar bya// spyad
87b6(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i mchog yin no// ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ni// mo rnams kun la spyad pa dang // dga' ba rtag tu bsten par bya// sems kyang d+hU tir blta bar bya// ye shes snying po'i dam tshig go// de lta bu dang mi ldan ni// dbang dang dam tshig kun las 'das//
87b7(rnying rgyud): bsgru kyang 'grub par 'i 'gyur te// sngags pas pa pa gang pang med// sngags po sngags pa zhes bya ba// rtsi ba dang ni nganal ga dang // khyad pa da ma tshig gang yin dang // shin tu dbang gi mchog dang // rtsa dang drung gi dam tshig dang // byang chub sems kyi gzhag pa rnams
88a1(rnying rgyud): gang zhig bzhag pasngags pa yin// de lamachagagi dngos srub babs// myur du na med pa thob// de ltar tha ma lung ldan la// gser sa sogs pa ra lo b+had dang // rang gi lus dang nod gyi dbyig/ mgrong mo rnams brgyan pa dang // grang dang /
88a2(rnying rgyud): grong khyer bcas pa rnams// dmigs pa med pa'i sems nis ni// de dang mnyam pa kho nar dbral// de ltar 'brel byed slob ma la// bla ma phung rngan das kyang ni// bzhi pa'i don nyid sbyin par \u0f7f// tshes dpa la ma dang thabs rnams dang // rang bzhin de ni ma
88a3(rnying rgyud): yul// rnam pa drug po bsgrims la gtad// de ni bsam pa'i khog yin pas// gang zhig de la mi gnas na// dmus long la ma mkhan byed pa ste// gyu na 'bras bu 'byin mi nus// de ltar gang la mi gnas na// sa phan ma yis tshig pa bzhin// tA
88a4(rnying rgyud): go bcad bzhin// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/ dbang gi seng gzhi dang / dbang
88a5(rnying rgyud): gnas dang dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas dgyes pa chen po das 'bur lkog las rdo rje'i lam du byon nas/ de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas/ de nas thugs kyi 'khor lar phyin te/ piskor ba la
88a6(rnying rgyud): gsum mtshan nas de nas longs spyod gyi mkhor lor phyin te// yang bskor ba lan gsum mdzad/ de nas bde ba chen por bskor ba lan gsum mdzad/ de nas 'bal dzin dang po nas byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le de 'og min rdo rje'i dbyings su 'od zer gyi tshul du gshes
88a7(rnying rgyud): nas der bya ba la gang dgu dang bcas nas kI la ya chen po dag la gsum phyag drug zhabs pa ni dugarjod kyi mas dang ldan par bzhengs te/ longs spyod kyi 'khor dam pa rigs lnga la ba yum la sogs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsamato// rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa yis/
88b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byong thabs ldan rnams kyis ni// bskyed pa'i rim pa mang nas bcigs/ zhes gsungs so// de nas seng ge nas par bya/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs sa// dngas pa med las dngos por grags// dang pa rnams ldan/
88b2(rnying rgyud): ding sa med pa'o// derjes pa chog/ dngos po ste// ri rje gangs cag ga pa'i rtse'am// drug dang mu 'thab dur rjod da mau// snong gcig shing ngam bganag gam// yang na nyams dga'i gnas su bya'o// saM pi ronams med pa rba// snron gyims rnams cing dru te/
88b3(rnying rgyud): mnyakha da kyi gra gu ba'i brtsegs// sbyang nu'i chag chag gam ye/ con dang rmad du sbyin kyis brlabs// gnam thigs zig ga gleng thig gsum// bye brags sor zhes par // shes rab ma 'is theg srung brdung // mtshams dang sna gtsum bani dang/
88b4(rnying rgyud): chen rnam pa pargyad du btab// 'khor lo tsobs brgyad ai ru bcas// zlag ma gsum dang rtsibs dang bcas// bar khyams sgo khyams gnyis su btang // blo rgyun la phu brgya babs dang // dra ba dra phyed dra ba dang // rgyan gyi rnam pa thams cad bya'o// 'bar ba'i 'cho kyis
88b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad la// rnam par tshul ba la sogs pa// shar nas brtsam ste dgod par bya// dbus kyi e la bdud 'dul te// mdun chub galas g.yon sta zur bashrI// steng 'ogakhro bo phra men bzhi// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o// de la 'khor lo'i gong ras las/
88b6(rnying rgyud): chen byin po dgod par bya// blag ma la ni sras mchog gsum// khyams la ko'u seng spel mar dgod// sgo bzhir srung ma bcu gnyis dgod// lcags ril ni dbang phyug sa// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // byin gyis brlabs pa'i zung bdun// bye brad pa
88b7(rnying rgyud): sor shes par bya// dang po chos srur byin brlabs dang // de nas srul skur byin gyis brlabs// de nas longs spur byin pa rlams dang / sbrul su mngon kyang chung // denas byin brlabs dpang 'askur bya'o// mtshams kyi phur pa mda' gsol ba'i//
89a1(rnying rgyud): lung ba brgya ba kyis 'grus// sgrub pa'i tha ba rigal// dang ma ca nga na ring tu sa// spyan drang bzhugs gsol gnyis rnyeng bstis// rdzugyu 'dug brdeg pa'i las rnams bya// denasaman+tal skye gad//
89a2(rnying rgyud): 'du las kyi bsnyen pa yis// yungs kar nyid la sngags bzlas la// gzungs zag 'a ze na la bstim par bya// stong tshi ga mchod pabar bar bya/ zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'jus pa
89a3(rnying rgyud): spangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud lngas/ dkyil 'khor bca' gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya chen pos ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dbu ma chen po'i rang bzhin te// sus kyang mtho bang
89a4(rnying rgyud): mi nus te// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs pas// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // de yi phyir na rang bzhin med// med las med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung // yod dam med pa gnyis med pas// rtog med dbu ma zhes bya'o// de yi rang bzhin yo
89a5(rnying rgyud): brjod pa'i rang bzhin ci yang med// dbang po'i yul du gang gyur pa// de dag tshad ma ma yin no// chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid ni// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// rtag dang chad pa yod min te// mthong ba'i blos ni bslad pa yin// de dag rtogs na 'khor
89a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs// mya ngan 'das pa rlom sems med// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// g.yo dang mi g.yo rnam par dag/ gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par dag/ spros pa med cing rnam par dag/ brjod med rnam par mi rtog pa'ang // chos rnams kun gyi snga rnams
89a7(rnying rgyud): yi ge med pa'i gsung mchog ste// sgra yig rnam par spangs nas ni// sems kyi rgyu ba phra ba 'gag/ de ni rang bzhin lta ba zhes// shes rab blo yis mthong bar gyis// blun po rnams kyis mi mthong ste// mthong ba rnams ni mngon sangs rgyas// gang zhig/
89b1(rnying rgyud): ngo slab par 'dod pa yis// smos pa'i mtha' la shes par gyis// de skar ma ngan par rdugs nas ni// sangs rgyas smad du ma tshal cig/ gal blun pas tsho la byed na// glang po'i rjes ni so la ba ste// gang btud nas byung ma tsha// rang la ra byung ba dbananang/
89b2(rnying rgyud): rang krung gzhan du tshol ba ltar/ zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las// spros pa rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang
89b3(rnying rgyud): snying po sngags kyi rim pas dkyil 'khor gsal ba rabaskyed pa 'di// rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor 'dri ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ don thams cad dru
89b4(rnying rgyud): su chud na sa brjod pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas gzhal yas rdzogs pa la// 'khor ba'i lte ba gang yin la// nyi ma zla ba ku ber dang // bkral sogs gad ni stengs su// zhe sdang khro bo'i rang bzhin ste// 'jigs byed rdo rje gzhon nu
89b5(rnying rgyud): ni// zhal gsum ba la phyag drug ste// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// rtsa ba'i zhal ni mthing nag la// dang po rtse dgu me dpung 'brar// bar ma rtse rje dz+haMka/ tha ma ri rab phyung 'dril// su rgod glang chen ko rlon dang // su s+yAd stag gi dam ngas
89b6(rnying rgyud): can// me dpung g.yon pa rig ma 'khyud// dbul zod phreng skam po dang // zod rlon rnams kyis do shal byas// maM yi rus pa'i rgyan dang bcas// phyag dang snyan cha la sogs pa// thad gis 'gro ba chen pos brgyan// dom dred pa gas pas dkris
89b7(rnying rgyud): pra dang // mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba nyid// smin ma slar mig kyang ser// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags kyang 'dril// thor khrag 'thung zhing ha har bzhad// zhing la 'bru tshugs bltas nas ni// zhal nas khrag 'bab ha hi bzhang// zhag gi thig le
90a1(rnying rgyud): tshom ra byas// rdul ba ga tu sgyum can pa dang // 'jigs pa ga parabyud// rgyun rnas pa las// rgyub nam / sems dpa'ags mgyu mgasas// skyong gar mgos ma /
90a2(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha// skye de nas 'dod na chen po yis// gas shi nga dz+rar+d+has madz+nyA nAs/ sbyang chub rnams kyi 'dug/ gas ba'i myo sa rnaMm pa / ma mas kyi sbyin dgalas// ba'i kyil lab ba smras rgyad na// thugs gnas
90a3(rnying rgyud): dkyi la rmis c-i bzhugs/ badz+ra swa mA s+yA kro d+ha dz+dza sa/ a.Am+b+ha ma~M ts+tsha na Sh+ya d+hA hUM/ gnag rdza d+h+waMs/ ljo dz+ra ma tati ya d+d+he/ tan tan dz+nyA \u0f7f/ oM ba d+hi n+ya d+hakA\u0f89\u0fa4/ btsam gyi / mas gyi ya hrI wAd+ha/
90a4(rnying rgyud): d+hi a ta k+Shat+sAli b+h+yAM/ d+hI d+h+waMsa?/ oM bad kr-i t+ta nAM ladatad+h+waM/ de nyid ta r+ts+tsha.au n+dasa? d+his a tsi lat+taM/ ban d+ha benan d+hI phaT/ au badz+ra kro d+ha a pa do&d+h+waM/ tid+hi tISh+Tha b+h+rUM phaT/ oM badz+raT d+ha tra lo \u0f7f bi dza yaMn+ta/ byin ta bon d+ha s+thA \u0f7f/
90a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba l-in+te/ Ti trUM phaT/ sar+b+ba mo gi h+Na ha oM phaT+Ta mA~M ny+dzi/ de nas yang 'di da rnam ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// snying tshugs hU~M badzad kA nI// zhal g.yas se shing ga yin pa dmar// dbus napa rmA ni dka dum/ dang paganyis na /
90a6(rnying rgyud): ma 'byung// 'tshar la lamig yi sripa te/ 'onan dzig ston pa'ig ta rnyings chen pa dag ni// gi ye me dag man par dbus panag/ dang po ga su gyus la// g.yas pakyi thal 'jig na// min pas rin nan pan brnam pa//
90a7(rnying rgyud): tshul ba dag ba ste// g.yas g.yon gzhag cing dmar po'i mdog// rang gi ge ma mas brgyad// dathug ba dkar por la khrigams// de chen bcwag yin na 'dzin// shar gyi rtsibs su gzhag par bya// phyogs gzhin rje 'jams pa ni// zhal g.yas /
90b1(rnying rgyud): glanag cing g.yon pa dmar// man la dbus ni sa nyid// rdzugag las rang gi rig ma 'khyun// g.yas bzod par mgrel// g.yon pa din chen badz+ra'o// n+ya sgyogs nus smin dbyas kyi zhal// dmang bag yas dkar rdzo bag pan// b+hagag nyis gas //
90b2(rnying rgyud): la// bad+mad ni la gagasas// dbo mo'i rten yon ni// bdu ci kyil la rgyas ldang // galas dang g.yo nid// ra ma byin te ni gnas// rgyud cing mgram la zla 'dzin// cwa yin pa ste/
