91b1(rnying rgyud): padang // s+yAng srid pyag rgya'i mcha dang dang // rin chen sna bdun mchod pa dang // kun tu bzung po'i mchod pa dang // lha mo bzhi yi mchod pa dang // mchod pa'i phyir na spyan drung dang // phyag rgya chen por banas bcas la// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil dakhor nas/
91b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // yang sbrul sum sprul skar ltar 'khrugs// gIci ga la gsum gsum drug cur sprul// sprul pa rnams kyang spyan drung ngo // oM ts+yai he b+ha ga wAn/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ A gad tA ya/ A gad ta ya/
91b3(rnying rgyud): be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+hA ya/ ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/ sarba DA ki nI hri da ya hU~M phaT// de bzhin mchod pa sna tshogs pa// ka ni lka la sogs pa 'bul// de bzhin mchod pa blan med// sangs rgyas dngos grung thob bya'i rjer// rgyal ba thams
91b4(rnying rgyud): cad mchod par bya// bdug pa me tog mar me dang // dri chab bshos gtsang yi gar 'ong // tsha ba gsum dang sbyang ba yis// a ka ru yi dog pa rnams/ dkyil 'khor kun la mchod par bya// de nas nang gi mchod pa 'bul// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ste// oM
91b5(rnying rgyud): AHhUM ma hA sa ma ya/ ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis// gdol pa'i khang pa mes bsregs nas// dkar po gangs kyi rnam pa yang // ci 'dod las rnams 'dod pa 'grub// de bzhin las rnams thams cad do// thugs rje chen po 'byung bar byed// bad
91b6(rnying rgyud): dang sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// rig mar sbyar ba'i mchod pa yis// sbyod sgrol thams cad mchod par 'bul/ de nas dmar gyi// ar+g+has mchod// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen pa'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// dur lo
91b7(rnying rgyud): mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar d+hing ti rar bcas// dmar gyi a d+ha n+ya mtshor bskyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs la 'bul// ma lus gshegs nas ba rnams su gsol// nal 'byor mgon po bdag nyid kyang // chas kyang rab tu gdags byas te//
92a1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa thams cad nag por dbul// de yis dngos grub las rnams 'grub// ces bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/
92a2(rnying rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kI la ya/ bdag nyid chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdag dang
92a3(rnying rgyud): gnas dang dus dag dang // bzlas pa dang ni gzugs rnams dang // de ltar rdzas kyi rnam pa dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // de bzhin sgrub dang sgrub pa che// bad gdon dang ni gzhan don dang // rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i phrin las so// gzhan yang yang pa 'di
92a4(rnying rgyud): bstan bya// nyes pa'i don gnyer rnal 'byor la// tshe srog bar du gcod byed la// gdab pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang // lte ba'i dkyil du gdab par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sras mchog dang // de bzhin dpal gyi phu rabs gdag
92a5(rnying rgyud): gang la bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la// zheng gi las mgro ga'i shun// rayi khrag gis ming bris la// gzugs kyi snying ga dag tu bgran// shar lto mtshams su 'brug byung rgya// kha khyer rnam pa gsum dang ldan// til zag po la gzha byas la// gan tal dag cu gnas
92a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// lho nub mgo la byang shar dang // lar nug skyil ma'i byang du gzhug/ drag po'i phyung ba dag la btod// mngag gzhug las rnams gzhol ba'i phyir// ma mo mkha' 'gro srung ma la// mchod pa rdzogs dang ba logs// dbug pa gsum gyis rab tu dgug
92a7(rnying rgyud): gdab pa gsum gyis mos pa bya// khro bo cu bzhi'i sbyor ba yis// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// yi ge dza ni kha brgyad pa// 'od zer lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag/ de yis drangs sam bkug nas na// gzugs sa ma ri mo de la bstim/ phyag rgya bzhi dang sngags/
92b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi yis// dbug pa dang ni bsdam pa dang // de bzhin bcing dang dag dag bya// dzadz+nyA b+h+yo// ba a kra shang 'a/ macub s+ho// pra ba shas nA~M/ a be ga pa Am+b+ha/ yang nagazugs parnyan 'di ltar \u0f7f// thal ba nyim lan mdang // d+hA8
92b2(rnying rgyud): dru tshe srub ma'i lo// phug mgrog mkharas rnams la// rak+ta bdud rtsis smras nas kyang // spug nag snying gar ming dus gdags// bkug nas phebs par gyur pa dang // gu phul tshil chen bdug pa dang // phyi ma gsum gyi sbyor ba bya// nag po drug pas byas pa
92b3(rnying rgyud): yis// gtor ma rnams kyang za ru gzhug/ zla men dang ni mgyogs ma la// ba liM byin la las rnams bcol// kun tu mgyogs par song nas ni// glo snying 'dren cing dbang po thogs// myos tsam du du rab byas nas// bstod pa byas la gnyis med bstim/
92b4(rnying rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i bzlas pa bya// bdag gi las kyi ting 'dzin zhugs// steng gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de nas bzlas pa'i snying po bsam// hUM yig rnam par bsams nas ni// phurab khro bo ce 'dra bas// phyogs bcu dag tu don byas nas// 'gro don dam rnams
92b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs mdzad de// slar 'dus phur pa nyid la brim// 'bum phrag gcig gam sa ya'am// bcwa rtsa brgyad dam snod rdza brgyad// dazlas te stong tsheg mchod pa bya// de nas sprul bar 'ad kyi// gnyis med 'dres pa'i ying+ga la// dbug dang rab tu gzi bar bya//
92b6(rnying rgyud): gtsug ra mda' bzlog par bya// oM hU~M maM s+t+wa~M d+hanan/ myo ha thA la/ b+ha ga d+hAn/ shrI badz+ra dz+rAkA phaT/ badz+ra r+g+haM ma~M kI la ya/ dza dz+rIM ba hoH/ sarba rba b+han/ kA ya d+hI N+Di t+te badz+rA nI le kI la ya hUM phaT/ d+h+r-i k+ShA ra hUM/ a a a/ dzaHhrAM \u0f7fhoH/ A bai sha ya ya/
92b7(rnying rgyud): khro bas mngon spyod rab byaste// khro bos ni na kyi brdu nas ni// g.yas pa'i thabs brjig byas te// mngan spyod kyang rab tu btag// sngags ni 'dig de brjod par bya // min banyis man taM tha ma hA Ne badz+reH/ b+ha d+ha b+ha ta la pA te la/ sarba dudad+ha na paH/

94a3(rnying rgyud): can gyis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// sems can kun gyi rang bzhin ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// kun la khyab pa'i nam mkha'o// de ma mthong bas de mi mthong // snying po chos kyi don la ni// rtog ge ba yis mi rnyed de// 'ga'

94a6(rnying rgyud): phyir/ brtag pa dang po 'di khyed kyis yang dag par chongs shig/ dad pa dang ldan pa rnams la blos shig/ skye bo mchod pa la dga' ba/ 'dod chags che ba rnams la/ tshul bzhin du bshad pa'i dbang skur la bshad pa byos shig/ ce sa gsungs so// de nas 'khor
94a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis/ ston pas gsungs pa la mngon par yi rang ba dang dga' ba skyes te// rin po che sna lnga la sogs pa me tog si lams mchod de/ mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba dang / lha rnams kyis phyag btsal nas/
94b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas thugs rje rin pa che// sems can rnams la thugs bcu'i phyir// tog pa dang po 'di bka' stsal// thugs rje yini rgyun chen po// bka' stsal gsung ston thug rje che// bdag cag rnams kyis bcad par bya// 'grob rnams la san ga bras/
94b2(rnying rgyud): bgyi// skye bo rnams pa dbang bskur brtsi// grong dang grong khyeng grong rdul la// dz+nyAn de bzhin du bzong ba kyi// zhes gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir rnams la yang dag pa gzigs nas/ ci yang mi gsang ba de bzhin nyid dumanal la/
94b3(rnying rgyud): de dadu la ga san kyib dang/ drugags sa bsudrugasus bu gapa sa rus pa sa rgyam ma da rgyalas/ brgyad ba ba sa sug ba
94b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / brtag pa dang pa yongs su rdzogs so// rgya ga kyis ldan pa na ga r+b+ha dang / zong byed kyi blang bar tsanas biskye cing gtan la phab pa // rgya ga ma du/ Sh+Tak+Sha tan d+ha d+hA taH/ zod skad du/ rlud kyi rnam
94b5(rnying rgyud): bo d+h+r-i kA ra'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rdul po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi tshogs/ 'og min chos kyi dbyangs kyi po zang na/ mtha' da de dbus med pa'i rnam
94b6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi 'byung gnas glu gsum e'i dkyil 'khor 'byam pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ yab yum gnyis su med par lhun gyis sbyor ba la bzhugs te/ 'khod mche ba can gyi tshogs dang / gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang / mgo brtan gyi tshogs mtha' dab pa
94b7(rnying rgyud): bad+mo / rang bzhin gyi lhun gyis grub par bzhugs so// de nas mag brten gyi tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thag 'thung gi rgyal thal/ phyi nang gi mchod pas mnyes par byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol// / e ma gsang ba'i dkyil
95a1(rnying rgyud): dus gaskam 'dra'abral mad par bzhugs/ gces med la shes pa mchog smras/ de yi sngags rnams paslangs lags// zas na dasal ba nams// bcom ldan ma gan rgyas bgan dug stso/
95a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'adz+ra la yas// kar+dz+nyA na // mitshig gas na nas// phrag mag sbyig bu ma rnams pa// gsung gis 'di da da paka' la to// mi ma'i dkyil la'i dam pa rnams// nga yis pagan kyis matan pa skyes// brjo ma gan gnyis da ga /
95a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan pa ni// dang po gzhung dang mthun pa yi// sa phyogs de dang de nyid du// rnal 'byor dam pa de gnas pas// rang gi snying gar b+h+rUM bsam+ba la// de las 'od 'phros sangs rgyas mthong // mchod 'dul la sogs gzhung bzhin tu// rje
95a4(rnying rgyud): d+hA tA yis sbyangs// de rjes gzhal yas la sogs pa'i// rgyan dang ldan pa de mthong nas// 'khor lo rtsibs pazhing khyud bcas// bu chang bzhi yis rnam par mdzes// ti mthu ba'i gdan stengs su// hU~M chen yang yum 'khor tshogs dbab// sa bon 'gad pa/
95a5(rnying rgyud): gsol bar brtag/ drod gsher las skyes yin pa zhi// mkhas pas brtags te shes par gyis// de nas gtso bo'i sems de yis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams bkug ste// bstim pas dbang yad rdzogs par ldan// de la gyinang mtshon pas mtshad/
95a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don dam yang dag ste// de yis las rnams brtsam par rtse/ rgyud kyi rgyal po d+hika 'i rgyud las/ snod bzhi'i le'u ste dang po la// de nas yang 'di snad ga su te/ b+h+rUM ny+dza yi dkyi la khor ni// blag sa da mang po'i dkyil 'khor la// ma pa'i/
95a7(rnying rgyud): spun chog gsil ba ni// rdzogs pakras pa yis gsal bar byur// sru gsung bugs kyi rdo rdzo bsam// bzlas pa'i log 'bru yang dag dgod// shes rab gsal nga'i yi ga yis// bum pa dmar po 'od dang bcas// da yi bldan ma shwAka/ mthes pa dang
95b1(rnying rgyud): na sma smra// su na
95b2(rnying rgyud): na
95b3(rnying rgyud): sa
96a1(rnying rgyud): mor bsam byas la// steng du chu yid dkyil 'khor bas ma// oM badz+ra ny+dza la kI la yas rba bag+h+nAn ba trA phaT/ hwA mal ba shas dum ta nyakar ad d+hati ma ma karma b+h+rU~Mb+hA kAr la/ A baM sha la mA pra sha ya dz+nyA Ta/ ma rasen bu mdzan d+ha phaT/
96a2(rnying rgyud): dpyid brag bum la brten sngags bzlas// khab khwa 'byung rlung debar gsum// de nams byung na 'grib par 'gyur// dzod bad+ha me banam stang nas// lha rnams bsams pas gaH ba'i thugs la gnas// sgrag bye ba bsam byas la// rgyang rtsal ser pa dge
96a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar bsam// oM badz+ra kI li kI la la che ge mo'i lo thog la/ shiM tri ka ra ka ra kar te li A be sha la A be sha ya hUM phaT/ oM ma ma ba shrI ku ru ma ti ha ka ra i de/ d+ha ti ma ma karma a dzi ti/ a pa ra dzi ta dza ye bi dza yaM/ ka tang ka ye mA ra senA pra mar d+ha ni ye hU~M phaT/
96a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i khrag dang snyed sgra dang // gu gu la gsum po thod par thub// seng ldeng bur ba yungs kar phur la gdags// rtags ni thod par mi 'bar ro// gong ma'i rtags ni ma byung na// sngags drug dam can dbugs lani// po dang mo yi log min bzlas// rdo rje gas ngapag
96a5(rnying rgyud): ba// de nas dpyid zla tha chung la// khrag skam 'bras bu gsum po dang // gtor ma dum gcig maud kun bsre// thod par byug la yul der phyin// ku gul dud btang bden pa bdar// thod pa chu meg nang du sla'o// phur pa dkyil du gdab par bya'o// rdzas
96a6(rnying rgyud): gsum yang gtor byas la// gar 'bebs rtsed la byin// zag la thab bya dbang yang gad+hag// ston zla gsum pa'i cer byo// ri ce mthong nas bapral ba b+ha// mgrub ston zlar ba dag// 'bring po sbyin la rab tu shis/ ma thebs pa la gzhi nas sogs
96a7(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po hUM kA ra'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro mas ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// phur ni byang chub sems su gcig gyur pa// pha ni sems kyis ma khyab med pa ste// phur ni rdo rje gzhon
96b1(rnying rgyud): n+ya nyid la bya// pani khro bo rnams la bya ba'o// srang ni skye ba med la bya// pa ni thams cad 'gag pa med// pur ni rig pa byang chub sems// pa ni thams cad der 'grub pas// phur ni thams cad byang chub sems// pa ni thams can kun tu khyab// buran
96b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad gtso ba'i mchod// pa ni thams cad 'khor gyi tshul// bur ni thams cad skye ba med// pa ni rol pa 'gag pa med// phur ni byang chub sems su gcig/ pa ni thams cad de du 'grub// tshos nyid du thams cad chud// bskul po chos kyi dbyings pa dang
96b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i phu rab nyon mongs log par 'thams pa rnams la gdab/ gsang ba byang chub sems kyi thar pa ni// rtog chog rdud pyir yum gyi mkha' lagra dab/ mtshan marnas kyi ltung bani// bskal byer dgra bgags gtes la gdab/ rgyud kyi rgyal po/ ba d+hak+Sha ra
96b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ phur ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan khrag 'byung gi rgyal po da'i/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so// de nas phag gi mgo can dang // sdig pu'i mgo can la sogs pas// gsol pa
96b5(rnying rgyud): gdab pa'i phyir 'di skad de// sem gsang ba bdag nyid gtso// sku gsung thugs ni rabazab pas// rgya mtsho lta bu'i ngang tshul can// skye med don ldan khyod la bstod// gsang sngags bdag po khyod la bstod// theg pa'i rang bzhin khyong la bstod// thams cad
96b6(rnying rgyud): mda' ba dad khyod la bstod// rol pa'i bdag nyid khyod la bskyod// phrin las mnga' bdag khyod la bstod// bdud 'dul khro rgyal khyod la bstod// dpe ljang chen po khyod la bstod// zil gnon chen po khyod la bstod// ces de rnams shin tu dges ras
96b7(rnying rgyud): dgas pa'ider byung ste de snyed ces brtad do// rgyu kyi rgyal ba mo'i rjeb ra'i rgyud las/ rgyu gtad pa'i ma stes pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal gzu'i nu nga gyu rdzogs so// gang spad du/ smra nga sa d+ha bang la N+DI/ bad dang
97a1(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal ba khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung gargyal po laphyag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'byung gi gral ba/ khro bo rnam par rgyal bA/ mahA
97a2(rnying rgyud): dbus med pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang lhun gyis grub pa na/ yum dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so/ de'i tshe stag gi mig can dang / bya rgod kyi mgo can dang / mgo banan gyi tshogs kyis yab gtso bo la zhus pa/ gnas kyi mtshan nyid
97a3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// rdzas kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhes dris pas/ ba
97a4(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnas kyi mtshan nyid ri nag po// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid gru gsum e// 'khor gyi mtshan nyid rang las mi gzhan pa// rdzas kyi mtshan nyid rgyu bzhi'o// sngags kyi
97a5(rnying rgyud): nyid las sngags spel// bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid mar brgyad la// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye khrag 'bung gsang ba'i bdapa// sku gsung thugs kyi
97a6(rnying rgyud): bdag chen po// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa la// dkyil 'khor nyams su ji ltar blang // thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos gzhi bslab na ji ltar smra'o// ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'ang
97a7(rnying rgyud): 'thung gi rgyal po rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig mgo brnyan phra thabs tshogs// rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang po las la sbyor ba'i dus// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya// de zas drag po'i las la d+har
97b1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin med pa'i rjes 'jug go// phyag rgya gsum gyis bskyed par bya'o// 'byung ba rim brtsegs tshul bzhin bsgom// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'brung
97b2(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal pos/ dbang gi rim pa 'di gsungs so// gnam dang sa gzhi brtag pa dang // sa bsrung cha gsum gtor ma gtong // phyi mtshams bcad cing nang mtshams bapung // rgyal po'i tshul gyis bsnyen pa bya// sta gon sa cho ga sgrib pa sbyangs// tshems
97b3(rnying rgyud): shing 'dor zhing srung skud gdags// ye shes dbab cing lus la lha bzung ngo // de nas dbang gi yon yang dbul// de nas yang ni skud pa ni// dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga bsgrubs// slob dpon dkyil 'khor dpag tshad bzhi// rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor
97b4(rnying rgyud): rgyang grags bzhi// sngags pa'i dkyil 'khor khru brgya'o// dge slong dkyil 'khor lnga bcu'o// rje rigs dkyil 'khor bcu drug pa'o// dmangs kyi dkyil 'khor khru brgyad pa'i// gnam thigs thig byang chub sems// thig gdab rim pa tshul bzhin
97b5(rnying rgyud): bya// rin chen sna lnga'i tshe na rtse la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i yig 'bru dgod// ye shes lnga ru byin brlabs te// pho brang dkyil 'khor lhun grub dang // tA ra Na yis brgyan pa bri// slob ma gzhug cing dri lan zhu// yi dam dbog dang dam tshig dbob//
97b6(rnying rgyud): gsang mtshan dbog cing dam chu blud// snying po dbab cing phyag rgya bstan// gser thur spyan dpyi dkyil 'khor bstan// gzugs brnyan bstan cing chos kyi bka' rnams sgrogs// 'jug pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin no// dbang gi las rnams bsgrub pa ni// dang
97b7(rnying rgyud): lnga don gyi bar du 'gro// lha dbang rgyal po'i tshul du gzung // phan pa'i dbang bcu lus la brgyan// rtags kyi dbang rnams lus la bskyed// gsang ba'i dbang ni gsung la bsrung// shes rab ye shes dbang ni thugs la dran// phyag rgya'i dbang ni lus la gzhug
98a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas gnang chen po lus la bskur// dmachog chos rnams de cu bshad// ces gsungs so// khro bo rnam par rgyal bar khyud las/ dbang gi le ru TI gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das zaka 'thung gi rnam du
98a2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mtha' la rdo rje yi// rtse gsum kha khyer yod pas mtshan// tha ma 'khor los kun nas sbas// de yi dbus su nyi zla gas la// ro yi phung po'i steng du ni// sa bon gsal bar yongasu rdzogs
98a3(rnying rgyud): pas// sgor skyes rim pa la gnas pa// sku rdzogs 'od dang bcas par ni// lha ni gsal ba'i ngang tshul can// yongs su rdzogs par de mthong nas// sku gsung zags las yang dag spos// bde gshegs 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas// mchod dbul
98a4(rnying rgyud): de dus mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // dus der las la sbyar ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su ni// yaM las rlung lha dud kha bskyed// sha ba'i khri la bzhugs nas ni// mchod dbul ye shes rlung lnga dgug/ bstims la rlung lha'i snying pi ba zas/
98a5(rnying rgyud): sa mi btangs yis dbab// snron dmar zhugs pas n+ya gram bcing // de steng ma las nyi dkyil 'khor// de steng hUM las yongs gsapa brgyad// rdon sngon po kha bzhi pa// gsal ba'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// maM las ri rab mo skyes bskor// de
98a6(rnying rgyud): po bsam par bya// phyag na rdo rje hU~M las bskyed// de yis rlung lha rab gzer bas// rlung gi sbyor ba rgyun chad 'gyur// seng lden phur ba sor brgyad la// sras mchog dam par de dbang bskur// bzlas pa byems ya rab zlas// sras pa 'od par
98b1(rnying rgyud): gtums// theg pa'i drug pa rnams byung ba dang // dang gzugs byas so btun cad// rkang ba g.yas pa'i 'ogatsugazug/ gdun yang brlag par 'gyur// rlus can pa da bad+hag+san// das pa ldan na thod par byed // kha ba nam par sa
98b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud mas/ las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas srungs kar rgyal po bsgrub ste/ thod pa mtshan nag cig na du/ yung se kar phyog mchog gzhung ba ma / srung sa kar rdzob chen por byung /
98b3(rnying rgyud): skabs su rtswa sngags nyi su gci la// rba be sha la gA togs la bzlas// blangs pa kho bo chen po'o// gang la btab kya sogs med pas ma// bto pa N+DI na rdzogs kyis mdzod// gzhon yang rnal khyo / na
98b4(rnying rgyud): yungs kar lud kyang // dbang po lnga cu lungs kar thugs// dri chu bor drug pang gcin gsum// mung byas gcus shing sngags kyang bzlam// gzhan pas rlol pa gtsug song te// dgral ba ben ba rgyud garjod// bshegs la bta ban rdum du chag
98b5(rnying rgyud): na
98b6(rnying rgyud): 'breg dang pral nag pa drug// de rnams cad pa na thugs// na mAr+tha lachogag zung bad bya// 'dab byin pas su k+kA ma la/ \u0f7f la sa sregs gdangs// pa med banas la// dri zas zan la rdzi pas jug/ thal ba la
98b7(rnying rgyud): ngas 'a sa da / na // marnam gyu//
99a1(rnying rgyud): ka thal chen lpags bzlas te// phrin pas rnam pa bzhi yi ni// phur ba sar bzhi'i tshad duH// shing byang bul 'bru dku za// bsnyen pa skya dang mthun par bya// ser ba bsrung ba'i nyan mo la// srad ma bskul zhing gzu dbang gzud
99a2(rnying rgyud): yul lha mchod cing gser skyems btang // yungs kar thal chen gong ma'i rdzas// phu rab byang bu ser ma thos bskor// yungs kar bsgreng zhing phur bus gdab// mod la klog pa 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las
99a3(rnying rgyud): ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de la karma he ru ka dang / stag gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can dang / phra men gyi tshogs rnams shin tu dges nas/ zhab bzhad cing mgrin gcig tu
99a4(rnying rgyud): nas// gdug pa 'dul bar khyad par 'phags// khro bo mkha' 'gro bdag cag 'khor// tshogs pa rnams la gsungs lags na// sngar ni bde gshegs gang gis gsungs// phyis ni bder gshegs gang gsung 'gyur// da lta 'di nyid gnas lags na//
99a5(rnying rgyud): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal bas/ karma he ru ka la sogs te 'khor gyi tshogs kyi tshigs gsan nas gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra// sems can kun la tu A byed cing //
99a6(rnying rgyud): gsum snyoms pa'i pha ma yin// zab mo khong du 'chang byed yin// bde ba slad kyi lung ston yin// gdug pa slad kyi tshar gcod yin// ye shes sprul pa'i sku mchog yin// gsang gsum 'dus pa'i thugs mchog yin// zhes gsugs so// rgyud kyi
99a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / phya ga skad du/ krod+ha nI lad t+yAtar+tha/ bod skad du/ khro ba dbyug pasngon pa rgyud/ dpal khrag
99b1(rnying rgyud): 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad ba dag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dbyug pa sngon po/ 'og mi na gnas kyi gzhal yas+ya na/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rang bzhin gyis gsal ba'i gzhal las khang na/ yum dang gnyis du/
99b2(rnying rgyud): med par bzhugs te/ karma he ru ka dang g.yag gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po rang bzhin can// mchog gi las rnams thams cad mkhyen// 'di ni rjes sgrub rnal 'byor pas/
99b3(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi khyad par mi 'tshal lam// gnas rnams rim pa ji ltar lags// khrag 'thung rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba gas na nas ni// khrag 'thung dpa' bo mthu chen gyis// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gnas kyi khyad pa
99b4(rnying rgyud): ngas bstan gyis// spyir ni drag po'i gnas rnams ni// dur khrod gnas sam shing gcig dung // ma mo'i gnas dang the'u rang gnas// lha 'dre 'du ba'i lam rgya gram// sa srin ma mo du ma 'grogs// mi rnams phung ba'i khang stong dang // dug shing skyes
99b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas rnams la// gdug pa skul la sogs pa'i tshang // mang por bcas shing 'du ba dang // ral pa 'dra ba'i gnas su ni// rdo rje drag po bskul ba'i gnas// nags chen po ni gang na bar// rnal 'byor mig gis bltas pa yi// lha mi yongs la grags
99b6(rnying rgyud): pa'am// chu mig lkugs pa klu yi mig/ rgyalam gang gsum 'byung po'i srang // phyogs las grub pa'i dgra'am bgegs// me dpung gru gsum mdungs pa// ba tshwa zhu chu dmyal ba'i chu// gnod sbyin mang po 'du ba'i sa// srin po khros pa'i gdong mdangs
99b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra// gdug pa chu srin kha gdangs 'dra// dred mo ral pa'i gseb nang du// drag po'i las su bya ba yin// me tog mar mo'i gling yod dang // ri ni rin chen spungs pa 'dra// skyed mos tshal dang dpag pos mo shing // ngang ba bung ba'i sgra sgrogs pa/
100a1(rnying rgyud): skad sman gyini sna tshogs sgrogs// snying ba mchog gi 'bru snu can// gnam ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dra// sa na pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dra// gnas kyi dbyibs lags kha shar bltas// lung ba ran cing mdzes par ni// las
100a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bya ba gzhung yang brtsam// bkra shis don 'grub gnas yin pas// dbang dang dkrug pa'i gnas su bstan// nags ni tsher ma gdug pa yod// stag dang dom dang gzigs rnams dang // sbrul gajug gnas pa'i nags 'dab dang // gnam ni ral gri 'dra
100a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // mdang yis phug dang gris bsha' 'dra// sa ni zur gsum 'joms pa'i dbyibs// sa 'khos me dpung 'bar ba 'dra// logs la du ba'i ri mo yod// nyams dang ldan pas btsal byas na// des par myur du 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo
100a4(rnying rgyud): dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ dkyil 'khor gyi las bstan te/ dbyug pa sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba la/
100a5(rnying rgyud): pa gsum dang dbyug pas brgyan// dbus su ro yi phung po la// skad cig gis ni gsal bar blta// mche gtsigs rkan rde ba dbyug pa len// hUM gi rang sku thams cad spogs// cha ga gang dbus su bzhag pa ni// ra sog g.yas pa'i dkyil gnas su/
100a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan byas la bzhag par bya// de la shes pa rab bstims la// dbus su lugs kyi phur gdab la// gzhag par bya ba yin par bshad// AM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn/
100a7(rnying rgyud): bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT// sbyor ba de yis rab sbyar na// gang yin gnas su dgug par byed// de nas las la sbyar nas ni// lcags kyi bur pa lnga btab na// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// gdug pa can la lta ci smos// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i
100b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ dam tshig nyams pa bsgral pa'i don bstan te// dam tshig nyams dang 'khus pa dang // dam las log cing chos la rgol/
100b2(rnying rgyud): dam med dkyil 'khor ma mthong dang // sems can yongs la 'tshe ba dang // dkon mchog sku dgra yongs la sdang // dam med tshogs kyi spyang ki byed// chos la rtog cing mtshang la rgol// kha la chos byed snying rje med// khrag 'thung rgyal pos bskal
100b3(rnying rgyud): par gsungs// drag po'i gsang sngags drag bzlas shing // bzlas pa bya zhing dug me gtong // tshil chen zhun dmar rtsi sbyar la// mchog gi rkang gis dkrug bya zhing // legs par 'dres par gyur pa dang // phog cing dkrugs te bzlas pa bya// rke
100b4(rnying rgyud): rjes shog shog ming byang la// de la rab tu byug byas te// dam tshig nyams pa de la bstims// sras kyi phur pa de la gdab// bsgral ba'i zhing du de gtogs so// btab ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig
100b5(rnying rgyud): nyams pa bsgral ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ phyugs nad bsrung bar bya ste/ sman sna lnga dang dri sna tshogs// phur pa yungs kar gu gul dang // mchod cing gzhung bsrang ldan mchod bya/
100b6(rnying rgyud): 'bru dgu bzlas shing drag sngags gdags// a rdi te a pa rA dzi te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ ka tang kA ye/ srung ma gsum gyi sngags rnams gced// zla ba zug tu bzlas pa bya// phyugs la sman thud ngur pa gdags// bcom ldan dbyug sngon sungs shig bya/
100b7(rnying rgyud): yungs kar sngags kyi phur ba gdags// phyugs nad bsrung ba 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las/ phyugs nad bsrung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ karma he ru ka dang /
101a1(rnying rgyud): na da/ tu sug dusmra / na ga ga/
101a2(rnying rgyud): cag rnams kyis ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang // khrag 'thung rgyal pos 'khor gyi tshig/ gsan nas gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra// sems can
101a3(rnying rgyud): kun la phan byed yin// mkha' mnyam pa yi pha ma yin// de yang 'di ltar gnas par rgyas// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs sug tud pa'i leT ste lnga ba'o// / khro bo byug pa sngon po'i rgyu rdzogs so//
101a4(rnying rgyud): thug ga dadu / kro d+ha ya m+b+han+ta ka tan+ta/ bod skad du/ kho bo gshin rje'i gshen po'i rgyud/ dpal ya mAn ti ka la rtse gu'atshal lo// 'di srid bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
101a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin bzhugs gnas chen po ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po yum deng gnyis su med par bde ba chen po'i drang la bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor ba ma ti ru ka dang / shra ba'i mgo can dang / thug pa'i mgo can dang / mgo brtan gyi tshogs
101a6(rnying rgyud): gyis bcom ldan 'das thag 'jung gi rgyal po la/ mnyam pa nyid kyi nga las bzhengs nas/ sems can gyi don la bskul te 'di skad ces gams to// e maho// bcom ldan rdo rje'i nga nyid las// gajug pa'i log/ rtog gdul sbrang du// sngon gyi smon lam
101a7(rnying rgyud): cher dgong so// nga rje chen po bdag la ston// zhes bskul bas/ dpal thag 'thung gi rgyal pos bskul bar mkhyen nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bzheng ban sa/ gshang can gyi tshogs thams cad la khyab pa'i sgong rje chen por skyed de//
101b1(rnying rgyud): bapad+ma dag pa yi yang
101b2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho 'khor gyi tshogs// rin chen byang chub sems chen po// khros pa'i sku rnams bskyed pa'i rgyu// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// khros pa'i sems su grub mdzod cig/ ho// zhes rnam par bskul lo//
101b3(rnying rgyud): yang de'i tshe dregs pa'i tshogs dang mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyi ma dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad g.yems pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// de nas yang khro mo'i rgyal mo byang chub sems la yab kyis bskul ba gru 'dis bskul lo// hUM pha dang ma dang dge' ba'i grong /
101b4(rnying rgyud): gdug pa sgrol ba'i byang chub sems// gdod nas dag pa'i gzhal yas su// khros pa'i cho gas rnams 'byung ba'i dbyings// ho zhes rnam par bskul lo// de nas yang de'i tshe khrag 'thung gi rgyal po'i tshogs yum la chags pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to//
101b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bde ba'i dpal rtag tu lhan cig tu bzhugs so// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas brag 'thung gi rgyal po des// gshin rje'i gshed po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// gshin
101b6(rnying rgyud): gshed po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba la// zur gsum be con sngon pos brgyan// de yi dbus su bsam bya ba// gro ga shin shun gang yin la// thar nur ldag 'di yis ni// rang byung me tog dang sbyar nas// gzugs brlan song
101b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i tshad du bri// de yi dbus su rab bzhag pa// de yi snying ga'i gnas su ni// sa bon bsam la sku bskyed de// rdo rje'i cho ga gsum gyis bskyed// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku de la// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang yang basbyor// byin gyis brlab pa'i
101b8(rnying rgyud): sngags dag la// gsang ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// rang bzhin gnas su de bzhugs par// yongs su bltas la sngags la sbyar// sras kyi dam par rab bskyed la// byin brlabs dbang yang bsrung ba
102a1(rnying rgyud): yod// dug dang mangs pa yang thug/ sngag+sa d+hA na pa gtsug pa yod// dag sa gags pa dz+nyAn 'ang rdog/ zhabs gags du da kyis ma sa/ ba du sbyor bzlas pa // zang gadzu ga ma mang spya lda//
102a2(rnying rgyud): dur khrod ras ma blangs nas ni// dug dang ma rungs pa yis byung // ma de ra yi shing bu la// pad+ma'i snod du ngad bas bsags// de la bsre shing zho yis sbyangs// dur khrod rkang gi smyu gus bri// rnga mo bong bu'i gzugs bris la// de stengs 'bad cing 'theb
102a3(rnying rgyud): paM bri// de la gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas// de yi rtsog pa'i rmang du bzlas// brgya rtsa brgyad du them pa dang // sa brkos bcu ga la mi mngon sba// de yis dbye bar gdon mi zo// dur khrod ro ras sa maM rlung // de dag 'khor lor ba bris la// 'khor lo
102a4(rnying rgyud): dbus su gzugs brgyan bri// rnga mo ske ring rtsal dang bcas// de yi rmig pa bzhi rnams la// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed// de steng dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag/ bzlas pa khri phrag gcig byas la// them pa'i 'og tu sbas gyur na// danas
102a5(rnying rgyud): las 'pho ba nges par 'grub// dgug pa rlung gi lcags kyu ste// thang gcig yud la 'gugs par byed// khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung rgyal po das
102a6(rnying rgyud): tshe sgrub pa'i don 'di gsungs so// rin chen sna lnga'i bum pa ru// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// spos lnga snying po lnga ru gsu.a// sgo bzhi phyi la hUM bzhi bri// rta mgrin rgyal por mnga' gsol la// nang brug bum pa'i kha rgyan bcas// spos dang gu phul dung
102a7(rnying rgyud): bas bdug/ dkar gsum mang ragasum ril bu bye// sku gsung thugs la thi ma par bstim// mtshams bcad bgags bskrad gsungs thag gzungs// lha bskyed 'dzab bya mchod pa dngul// spyan gas na dbab cing su gsung bugs la bstim// sngags
102b1(rnying rgyud): sa // sa smra/ du/ s+ho// / smya su dunan / na sus sa// su gas /

102b3(rnying rgyud): su
102b4(rnying rgyud): sa su su
103a1(rnying rgyud): kA ga man/ na dunatha na da/ pa da / rgyan dpag nas pa gnasas pa nga nga pa zugasas/ na nga/
103a2(rnying rgyud): rbag dang / gzig gi mgoca dang / khAt+ta mgo can dang / mgro ba rten gyi tshogs grangs med pa/ byed par gyi gyi blan rnam pa bsam gyis mi ma med bzugs so// gdug pa'i 'khor grangs med pa'i rlung nas/ phrin las kyi mnga' bdag/ kho /
103a3(rnying rgyud): kas/ yum gtun lung ma dang / rol pa'i ngang tshul bcud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas mate// oM mab+ho// sbyor bya'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags// khro bo'i nga ro ji ltar lags// brna' yi phyag rgya ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/
103a4(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ gas pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// e ma ho dang bzhin thos pa yis// 'od dang 'bangar po 'gros pa yis// sangs rgyas dus gsum drag por bskul// de nyid ma bcos byang chub sems/
103a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i ngang tshul shar// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig skyes// khros pa'i phyag rgya bskyed rim bsgom// 'ardar yi phyag rgya phyag mtshan rnams// zhes gsungs so// khro bo mi ga yo mgon po'i rgyud las/ gleng ga ne'i le'u ste dang po'o//
103a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'byung gi rgyal po pos dgye ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// me g.yo mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// phrug na ga gru gsum gdangs pa la// rtse mor me yi phung po 'bar// logs la pad+ma 'dab gsum pa// de la dbus su
103a7(rnying rgyud): bsam pa ni// me ri 'bar ba'i dbus sugs ma// nyi ma zlab 'od dang bcas// de yi steng dus bon las// rang 'od sngags kyi sa gsal bar 'bar// de yi su ni mi thung gzugs// shin tu lding la mthang bag chags// 'jigs pa rngam pa 'i zhal
103b1(rnying rgyud): gdangs nying// rgan sra bdeb pas zad cing brtsal// gdus pa'i sdugs rnams rab tu zlos// de 'dre'i bu nyid dgasal ba las// yags sems dpa'i ting 'dzin pa smra// seM gling pung brtson gang la// dbang ba skang blun brlab bla gul bdug
103b2(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa stong zag zug tu bzlas// byas pas mtshan ma bzang po mthong // las la sbyar ba shes par bya// de ba nag po gang dang gang // de la gzugs brtan byas nas ni// ming dang rus ni snying gar gzhug/ de lo shes pa rab bstims la// lug
103b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang // de la gdab pa'i las kyang bya// des ni nges par rlag par 'gyur// gdug pa'i sems dang bcas nas ni// snying ga'i 'od zer drag po yis// rab tu thos nas bskul ba'i tshe// lha klu gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro rnams/
103b4(rnying rgyud): bdag gis bcol ba'i las rnams kun// gang yin gnas su phyin par 'gro// gdug pa'i rdzas ni thams cad la// zla ba gza' yis zin dus su// mtshon gyis dba' bya sha zag dang // 'dre 'bros thang chu de rnams d+har// mes rog shing shun nang du
103b5(rnying rgyud): gtum// gsang sngags khri phrag gsum bzlas nas// de bstan mod la bred cing brgyal// 'jig rten khams su 'byer bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud las/ dbye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
103b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des// bud med bu med pa la bu bslang ba ni// phyi mchod phrar dgod tshul bzhin bya// bum pa spos bdug rgyan gyis brgyan// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga snying po lnga yang rmugs//
103b7(rnying rgyud): grang dkyil du bum pa bzhag/ phur ba dgod cing lha tshogs bskyed// phur pa byin brlab gzung bzhin bya// lcags sA lnga yi phur pa la// byin rlab bdun byas dbus su dgod// bsnyen pa'i phur ba spyi dang mthun// 'dab kyi dus su yungs kar

104a2(rnying rgyud): pan dang/ bam ba mas dang bzungs/ bzu na du mdu/ kyi na/ 'do napa 'i'i rdzog / dems 'dzun pa 'i rgya me med/ chong kyin mi dzin pa'i dpas
104a3(rnying rgyud): skye sa pan/ nas na sa ba da dag gags pag gas
104a4(rnying rgyud): mod pa mang bcu la// wa dbu dgug pa kyi ma dbang dubasu// tshigs mtshad thabs sa drug gzug ni da pa ma \u0f7f/ nini zuga'ab da gsum yang bcwas/ zung skyem gyi ga tumanan/
104a5(rnying rgyud): brim pa'i 'og g+ham n+ta// mig la mgon pa'i phu rdzas pa dang / don rtsa tham par zad// phrin las rnam pazhi blo yang brdun// rlobo sa ning bzhag ces// de ltung ba sa na'i grub par 'gyur// cho sa myig mo mya gan po'i slad pas/

104a7(rnying rgyud): gsangab mad du byung ba'i cho ji 'byung lags/ zab mo'i don ji ltar 'gyur lags/ gdug pa'i tshogs mi ltar 'dul lags/ zhes gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'bru gi rgyal pos gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyan par/
104b1(rnying rgyud): brnabs par tshul mthun bzung // gsang sngags theg pa 'byung bar dgan// u dum thar de bzhin no// sngar gyi sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis// gsang sngags 'bras bu'i 'tshar la brjor// dril dus da pya srung na// tsasu kyar gsung
104b2(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// de lta rgyal po dza la gsungs// gsang ba'i bdag po 'dis gsungs so// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor rnams dgyes nas gsang ba'i bdag po khrag 'thung gi rgyal po 'jigs pa'i ngo can tshogs kyi bdag po lags so
104b3(rnying rgyud): gyes so// khro bo mig yo mgon po'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ kro ta ha ya gr-I wa rA dza d+han+ta/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal
104b4(rnying rgyud): mgrin gyi rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi lo brang na// gru gsum e'i dkyil 'khor 'byams pa na/ btsun mo'i b+ha ga d+harmad+hA hUM chos kyi 'byung ba da /
104b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba can gyi zhing khams de na/ yum dang gnyis su med par ldan gyis sbyor ba la/ pad+ma he ru ka dang byi la'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can dang / mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o//
104b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje'i ngang nyid las// gdug pa log lta gdul slad du// sngon gyi smon lam cher dgongs te// snying rje chen po bdag la ston// zhes bskul bas/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ sku gsung thugs su chud/
104b7(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs de nyid kyi ngang las/ smon lam gyi dbang gis rol pa'i cho 'phrul mang po byung ste/ rnam par gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rang bzhin gyi ngang la bzhugs so// de'i tshe yang 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// oM
105a1(rnying rgyud): rnab sa ga sun dang/ rnam da // mangs sus pa san do// gas// sa ngas na ga
105a2(rnying rgyud): bsgram bu su nA// ba la du zags sre pa sa dun stanas/ pa sa/ ni cigs dpang du rdzu nas da pa du cigad
105a3(rnying rgyud): gleng bzhi'i lebu dang 'o// / de nas khrig 'byu rgyal po das/ rgyamagrin gyi ting nge 'dzin 'digasungs so// mgrin rgyal gyi'i dkyil rdzu na// dbang nag zug sum bar grug// migs gas ma thags gsumabyasa'i
105a4(rnying rgyud): thod pa'ijigs ga sum yang dgod// phyi ma rda 'dab brgyad pa// dbusu su kyu yi rgyal po bsam// nr-i stengs pon gsul bltas la// 'od nyi'i thos pa'i spyod pa ma mo// da rdzogs na yis rab tshu // mau sa rdzogs pa'i du
105a5(rnying rgyud): gsa' gyur// donas me zhes rjem dran pas/ thug sung blags su byin gyis 'drib so// mchod cing khyim pa zlas na ni// sras patsog pangs ma'i bu mchogs// dbyung bcur na 'anapas kyang na ni// bdag cad bdun na gnas pa dag gi
105a6(rnying rgyud): skye bor dri sngags bkod nas ni// bzlas pa 'i sdugag ste/ NaH// do nas las la myur du gyur// thos pa'i sems kyis blangs pa ni// grog ma rgyal po'i mkhar sa rlung // sdong po ning gcig zang chub // gzugs partan sang ba rgyad tshad duH/
105a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i khang brgyun ni// de la dgug cing bakhyis pa yin// de nas drur pa gad pa pa gyim// sangs rgyas nyin kyang 'dag par 'gyur// sems can pal pa sgos ci dgos// bum pa bzang po bsti byas pa// nang du bdud rtsi wa yang thug
