106a2(rnying rgyud): mahA a hr-iH/ mag+nas the ta swAH/ skyonam na tu TIg ta man nanan pa Sh+Ta thA mad / in maHsa rba twa thAg// rjed ma tu na ts+tshin padza Sh+T+rI h+Na Ta swA oM(\u0f7f/ oMs ca drug hrIni bAdz+rahrI thA thA a / ba Sh+tsa shA
106a3(rnying rgyud): n+te/ ba dz+nyAD+ha ga/ 'ad+moH hoH/ ma/ A ma~M/ hUM/ ni/ mA~M hA rbA ya Sh+Ta s+'u n+tun/ \u0f7f\u0f7f/ hrI hrIts+tsha)/ pa m+b+hal// oM badz+ra TI mr-i snrel pa/ a Ats+tsha ba g+h+nArmA/ kA la ga cu
106a4(rnying rgyud): parje tha phaT/ oM ba dz+ra ShA d+hA ma~M/ chen man na 'ang d+hu Ta/ ban d+hi bin d+ha d+hA badz+rA d+hA rbe/ mi me pa du / nyen tan brda zlapa Ta/ oM dza~M pA ta Tha la badz+ra pa de/ gas la the brje d+ha Ta/ shA m+bi An ya badz+ra rjengs/
106a5(rnying rgyud): yi rnam pa pa badz+ra hrI wa/ A ba~M sha la ma bani pa badz+rad+ha yaM/ hrIn tu la sbyin na sa rmA wi/ data rnal/ bca rgya / mnya mthas rnasaT/ rnam dz+wal ba rdzas su ma rdzaH/ mangs su /
106a6(rnying rgyud): ngala'i ba/ datA mAng san tham rnyan pa 'dzis / ma pa ga sarnam mi nate// sem saH/ ba stan pa badzed+hA pa/ / ra tha sa d+hArdzas
106a7(rnying rgyud): rjelardul pa badrug gdum pa 'i la/ sa su / srinab du / na kyi smra/ sangs skyes// mkha'i mgagazhan du // ta mtsha rgya por rgyasapa/ gyibadum
106b1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dpal khrag 'thung gisas bdag bsrung ba bstan te// gang nus gnod pa'i sa phyogs nas// sa blang sprul ba'i gzugs byab te// de la ma rtsi lan tshwa dang // skye tsho khrug sam gzugs byas la/ shog bur thal pa'i gzugs thos ma/
106b2(rnying rgyud): de yi mtha' la 'khor lo rtsibs drug ze// de la gab pa'i sngags drug zi// mgo bo yan lag 'bru dgus bskor// 'dams su m+b+ha ras na bri// snying gar srung ma gsum gyi ldab+ha bris la// g.yas su hUM la g.yon du bar// mtha' ma
106b3(rnying rgyud): kyis bskor// sachog sngon 'gro mtshams gcad bya// bsnyen bsgrub gnan sreg 'phang dang gdab// sgrub pa chen po'i bka' bzhin bya'o// gnod tshabs chung la rang sngags bsrungs// gnod tshabs chen gdab las bya// de ltar byas na tho mom ma
106b4(rnying rgyud): rta mgrin rgyal po'i rgyud las/ sa bdag bsung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag 'thung gi rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa'i don bstan te/ lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba la// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu
106b5(rnying rgyud): bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo bcu drug po// longs spyod 'khor lo rgyabs chen po// bcu drub chal mnyam par bsgom// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni// so gnyis par ni rab tu bshad// g.yas pa'i rtsa ni byang chub sems// g.yo pa'o/
106b6(rnying rgyud): ni mi mthong bab// dbyas ni ma/ sa bta// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lol// ming g.yog po gnyis dgod// chos dang longs spyod 'a khor mo la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dgon// lte ba shes rab 'dzi phrul// sa zung
106b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' ma A// ma bsgoms rol bsgoms pas dmar// dz+wa lar gyis me sbaras// dpa' dang bzlog pa chung bzhin bya// gas pa'i dpa chen de ru bskur// shes rab ye shes dbang rnams ni// dga' ba bzhi le nyams kyang stsa
107a1(rnying rgyud): ga ga/ ma sa na/ na sa / sa sa
107a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po la/ kar+tha he chug la sogs te/ 'byor rnams kyis rgyas pa// em ho// brtsod pa'i ris pa ji ltar lags// rdzogs pa'i ris pa ji ltar lags// sngags kyi mtshan nyid de lta lags// mnyam pa'i maman na 'i ste lags/ donapa
107a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskyed pa'i rim pa hU~M las so// rdzogs pa'o rim pa a la bsku// sngags kyi mtshan nyid bzhi ru bye// mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dngal bzhag/ ces gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams dkyi nas/
107a4(rnying rgyud): dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bstod do// mngon rdzogs rgyal po yab la bstod// khrag 'thung snying rje rgyal la bstod// gsung mchog rgyal po khyod la bstod// ma dpung chas brgyad khyod la bstod// ces bstod do// khro bon
107a5(rnying rgyud): mgrin gyi rgyud las/ kyang yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / khro bo rta mgrin gyi rgyud rdzogs so// / cha gang smad du/ kro d+had+ha a bad+hi ta tad+ha/ bod skad du/ khro bo rgyal thog dz+nyAn gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud/ thun
107a6(rnying rgyud): thung 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rngam pa'i rgyal po/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ gsang ba mchog gis dgyed pa'i gnas dur khrod chen po
107a7(rnying rgyud): keng rus kyi gzhal pas khang / ru dra bskol ba'i gdan stengs na/ yum dang gnyis su med par phyag rgya'i rol pa mdzad de/ karma he ru ka dang / skyang ki'i mgo can dang / kha'i mgo can dang / mgo ba rtan gyi tshogs mtha' dag gis/ gtso bo la 'di skad
107b1(rnying rgyud): sa gsol to// e ma ho/ 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i snying rje ni// thugs rje smon lam mtha' yi dbang // ma bsgribs gsal ba'i ngang nyid las// sku mchog 'bar ba bstan du gsol// zhes rnam par bskul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das khyas
107b2(rnying rgyud): 'thung gi rgyal po nges/ cho 'phrul dbang gi snying rdo'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te// skad cig la gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin sprul te 'gro ba sems can gyi don la bzhengs so/ de nas yang de'i tshe/ 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gso
107b3(rnying rgyud): to// as // thabs kyi stematshug gsang ba'i dang // rnam pa'i phra mchog brgyad du gsol// 'gro ba 'dzin parab tu dgongs// zhes gsapa to// de nas bcom ldan 'das thag ng+tha gi bral bas/ sdug sung thugs ma chud da nga byer kya nga/
107b4(rnying rgyud): las gdug pa rnams cadang rje du/ rje'i dIng gas kyi ba'i byang du lanas/ nas mam den ma ngon// de'i tshe gdug pa'i tshogs thas ca dab tu rjengs par shA / de nas yang sri ci de'i thal pa'i dang sa tshu
107b5(rnying rgyud): gyis dkyil 'khor brtan pa gsungs sa// dz+nyAn bzhin gyis mi thuzla pa'i rgyu la sa/ gleng gaga' ledu mal// denapa la zag byung gi rtul ba ga// gad kyis mi nub pa 'i kyil nga ba tan// gzhan byas ma
107b6(rnying rgyud): yid rdzu // da / /
107b7(rnying rgyud): byu / ma/ na / sa ga
108a1(rnying rgyud): bkra par bya ba dang // de las mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // de nas las la sbyar bar bya// dur khrod g.yam pa g.yas phyogs blangs// mtshan ma ming dang bcas pa bri// rgyas chen ske nas btags la bzhag/ de la dgug
108a2(rnying rgyud): gzhug bya ba yin// khug nas las la sbyar bar bya// de yis bsad pa yud kyis ni// mod la nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi dus su bskul bar bya// phur pa dril te phyogs bcur gtad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rngon
108a3(rnying rgyud): thugs dam zhal bzhes pa// drag po'i las rnams bya ba ni// nyid kyi zhal bzhes ma 'da' bar// gdug can sgrol ba'i dus la bab// de skad bskul bas rang dbang med// drag po'i las kyis gsod par byed// log par bar du gcod pa yis/
108a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung po'i gdon rnams brdung bar bya// ngur khrod g.yam pa'i nang logs su// bse shing zho can gzugs zas la// rgya gra ma lam du de mnan na// gdon dang 'byung pos tshugs mi 'gyur// 'di ni las kyi mchog ces bya'o// khro bo gzhan gyis mi
108a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khyor dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ phyogs kyi gdon bsrung ba gsungs te// phyugs kyi gdon rnams bsrung ba yang // de'u lhag thung nu can thams cad la// gang lag
108a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyogs gzugs bya// ming yang bris la snying gar gzhug/ gdon ni srug nag khams 'am// thal ba'am ni ga rung la// gzugs rnams rab tu bya bar gsungs// bsnyen bsrub tshul bzhin tshogs kyi sa mchod// gdas las drag
108a7(rnying rgyud): rab tu ces// mnan theg sa ga ma pa na gyur// na pa gyu ba com med// bgagan kyis mi thub pa rgyun las/ phan rgya pon skyegasum pa/ de nas pangabatsam ldan 'das
108b1(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul bstan pa'i las gsungs te// wa dang sbyang ka'i gzugs byas la// 'bru sna bdun la bya bar gsungs// dan snying gang nang khog tu gzhug/ gang yin pa yi spu yi sa smras// lhas ngan drag pa'i spro ba'i gtsug/ btsun sgru bcwam
108b2(rnying rgyud): chen po// gong du bstan pa bsnyen pa'o// ngo gang mchod pa skabs kyis sbyar// sgrub pa gnyis pa 'bru dgug ces// dz+wa la pa ya mtha' la gdag ste// dgra la ltas ngan dbab par bsam// bstod pa'i gzhug lan po'i las// rtags da
108b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// dgra phyogs bstan cing smon lam gangab// dgra yi phyogs su khwa bstan la// dgra yi khang pa'i rmang du gzhug/ de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud las
108b4(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul ltas ngan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de la 'khor rnams kyis 'diska ces zhus so// e ma he// bskal ba'i don phyir ji ltar lags// dam tshigadon rnams ji ltar lag sa~M/
108b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos// phyag rgya bcings grol gyi gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// gal te ngan song gsu
108b6(rnying rgyud): po nas// thar bar gyur kyang rlu trar skyes// sems can 'tshe zhing srog gcod pas// dam tshig blangs te bsgral bar bya'o// las kyi 'khor ba yin par bshad// gsang ba zab mo'i mdo 'di ni// gnag par bya ba'i spyod kyang dkon// zhes gsung
108b7(rnying rgyud): so// kho bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha kuN+Da li a mr-i ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo bdud rtsi
109a1(rnying rgyud): 'khyil ba'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po yis/ 'og min gyi gnas gzhi mtha' dang dbus med pa/
109a2(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur ba'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ yum dang gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i ngang la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ karma he ru ka dang / seng ge'i mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can dang / mgo brnyan gyi tshogs dang yum 'thor byed
109a3(rnying rgyud): mas 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma ho// gsang ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba yis// gdug pa 'joms pa'i drag po 'di// rol pa'i gdangs sgra 'jigs pa'i sku// khros pa'i sku mchog bdag la ston// zhes rnam par bskul bas/ bco ldan
109a4(rnying rgyud): 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ bskul ba thugs su chud de/ 'od zer gyi ngang la gdug pa can thams cad bsgral nas/ cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rgyud las/
109a5(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// ldang nag gru gsum 'bar ba yi// mtha' ma mtshon cha'i 'khor
109a6(rnying rgyud): lo bskor// rab tu 'od dang ldan par bri// de yi dbus ska bas ma bya ba// rlung gi gdan nyid bsam par bya// de yi steng du nyi zla'i gdan// de steng brdzus skyes rim pa yis// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rab rdzogs par// de la dkyil 'khor rab bcug
109a7(rnying rgyud): desas thams cad ldan par 'gyur// drung gi pung patshan gang ba// rab rdzogs kyang chub sems las phyung // byang chub sems kyis de dpar bskur// bzlas pazi zag ga cig tubya// de nas rtag pa ma mal// byang chub sems ni yab tu
109b1(rnying rgyud): rlung myun margyagasas dang // thas lags pa'i gnas sum/ dul gad bar byas na na// dam par dmigs pa dag na/ shA// rnam gsum sangs rgyam drog bad du// mas ca kun yang bad// ngagags nas donanapas na/
109b2(rnying rgyud): sas/ ga ma mal// de'i byung dag gas rnyan// 'arnas pa 'i ga / pa shi ma rjod// las byed da sa 'i ga na
109b3(rnying rgyud): sa smra/ gnasas // kyi/ nas
109b4(rnying rgyud): sa no// da dug nas
109b5(rnying rgyud): rgyam pas/ 'di slom pa 'ad drugs s+ho/ dkyil la khring badz+ra 'dab brgyad la// dbus sa sngags pa bdag pa dag // 'dab brgyad ma ma'i sgra rnams nang// dmasus pa mtshan bkyil la bskyeb/
109b6(rnying rgyud): gas // da da/ das na// ma la sa/ na pas
109b7(rnying rgyud): ba sani du rgya rgyud las grags// ci ba rgyan la yan lag nying/ na cul/ ba'i brgyad deng ma drug brgyad// la gargyal ba'i dgangs pas na//
110a1(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// bdud rtsi chen po'i ril bu bya// bsnyen bsgrub gsum gyi ril bu sbyang // gsang sngags gzhug la a mr-i ta// sngags rnams rab tu bzlas pa gces// de nas rnal 'byor dngos grub blang // ril bu cha
110a2(rnying rgyud): po bza' bar bya// bcud len dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bdar la zhi khro'i lha la gtor// bdud rtsi mchog sgrub ces bya'o// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de na
110a3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ gtor ma gtong ba 'di gsungs te// rin chen snod du gtor bsags la// raM yaM khaM gis bsreg sbyang bya// gtor ma stong pa nyid du bsam// gtor ma'i nang du hUM gcig bsam// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis
110a4(rnying rgyud): khro bor bsam// hUM gnyis khro bcu sras dang bcas// hUM las mi bzad phur pa drug/ dzaHhUM baM hoHspyan yang drangs// mgron gyi lha rnams spyan dngas shing // hUM hUM hU~M gis bstim par bya// oM AHhU~M gsum gyis byin brlabs la// 'dod
110a5(rnying rgyud): yon drug gi lha mor bsam// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mgo drangs la// badz+ra ye k+Shas dbul bar bya// phrin las bcol ba'i tshig gis bskul// dngos grub bar chad blud pa'i bgegs// gdug cing thang sems ldan pa rnams// lus ngag du
110a6(rnying rgyud): phran bzhin du rdzogs/ thab mo brdab cing phrin las bcol// de ltar rtag tu byas pa na// mkha' 'gro rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ gtor ma'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
110a7(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ sems kyi don bstan te// sems ni gyos kyi dbyings nyid las// cir yang snang bcir yang med// chos nyid yang dag rdo rje 'dra// ma bcos chos nyid mnyam pa nyid// me rtogs pa yi sems can la// gli
110b1(rnying rgyud): da drag da// mA pa lasagasas na// bya chu byang na / byang na rgyas tha bdun thang drung ma // rtags pa nabs sa dbang can pa// zang nubasams byed cagasu// gathadran
110b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems// rtogs na rang dbang chen pa thob// 'dus pa thams cad mi rtag pa'o// 'dod na chos kyi dbyings su 'dod kyang dadu 'dzin// chags na su dang la shes gnyis la chags kyang 'dod chags kyu// zhen na sna dang ye shes gnyis la rjed kyang
110b3(rnying rgyud): 'kho // byang chub sems rang bzhin de/ chags pa med la ni 'dod med// mnyam pa snying du bzhag pa ste/ nga na kyi gyur kor ma/ sems rnams thams cad tsam nyid do// nyon mongs 'dud pa phyi zhes kyi// bdun rnas
110b4(rnying rgyud): kyang del gyi// thams cad chos nyi gnas// chos kyi dbyings pas g.yos pa med// oM ba'adun kyi 'grel pa'i rgyud las/ lta bu'i du snyel ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ kan he r+yas la sogs
110b5(rnying rgyud): t+ye// 'khor rnams dgyes nas 'di skad ces nus so// e maho zhag 'thung rgyal po legs so lags so// ji ltar khyod kyis bstan bzhin du// khyed kyi thugs rje'i sbyin rlob kyis// bdag pa rab tu bshad pa'o// mngag 'khor ba'idonadu
110b6(rnying rgyud): ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung brtan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI ma yang/ kang tsuga'i tshig gis nanas/ 'di na dngos bka' stsal to// em ho// badra ba slad ma'i lung ston phyin// gdug bskyar kyi tsho ga cod par/
110b7(rnying rgyud): gas sgrub pa'i su rgyag phra/ spang med pa khyen pa'i thugs pa rgyan pan// zhes bka sum / rdzang du ci khrel ba'i gyud pa / pangs mthu chug pa'o// /
111a1(rnying rgyud): rgyag skad du/ kr-id+ha trai lo k+Sha bi na ya t+tAH/ bod skad du/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'a sngam mo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom
111a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das khros pa'i mnga' bdag tu gyur pa'i rgyal po/ 'jigs pa'i sku phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas/ khros pa'i gsung drag po'i gdangs sbas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rang bzhin yongs su
111a3(rnying rgyud): dge par bzhugs te/ 'og min gyi gnas zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang na/ rtag tu yum dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor karma he ru ka dang / dred mo'i mgo can dang / sre mo'i mgo can dang /
111a4(rnying rgyud): mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma ho// de nyid ma bcos byang chub sems// de nyid gsal ba'i ngang du shar// gzhug pa'i mi rnams lhan ne'o// khros pa'i bdag po mi gnas pa'i// thams cad don dam byang chub
111a5(rnying rgyud): sems// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos bskul bar thugs su chud de/ lan 'di gsungs so// e ma ho// rmad du byung ba gsang ba'i bka'// gsang ba bdag la gos pa med// ga pung dri
111a6(rnying rgyud): ldan rgyun mi gcod// ces gsungs so// de'i tshe log pa'i nga rgyal can mi mad bu mo'i chog su thams cad chegs pa'i sems skyes par gyur to// de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal po spyir sbrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te cho 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor thugs la bton
111a7(rnying rgyud): nam 'i ma pa'i don mdzad do// rje ga khams gsum rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i be'u ste dang tho'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gartsol bas/ phrin las kyi kyil 'khor 'dagasum mo// khams gsul namargyam
111b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag gu gsum mi bzad pa// rab tu 'bar ba'i me yis bskor// so bzhi nang du brkos gyur pa// de yi nang du bzhag pa'i rdzas// dpag bsam shang la blangs nas ni// rab tugatubacing sngags mang bzlas//
111b2(rnying rgyud): de nas srog mkhar sa dang bsre// bong bu'i bdud rtsis gzugs sbrus te// shing shun ming rus gis bris la// snying gar blan te bzlas pas 'grub// de yi steng du bsam pa'i lha// sa bon 'od las de skyes par// mkhas pas shes par bya
111b3(rnying rgyud): pa yin// de la thams cad rdzogs par bya// rabs chad rkang gi phur pa la// bzlas pa khri phrag gsum du bya// de nas mtshan ma mthong ba dang // gdab pa'i las rnams bya ba ni// de nas gtubs dang bsdu ba brdung la// kun la de bzhin
111b4(rnying rgyud): sa // 'di kyis gas pa sa pa byer// thig sasamanam par sgrul pa'i spyad pa/ dkyi ma kyi yin sa pa'i/ de nas ldan 'das rnapa 'a ga rnam po dang / gsud ba'i 'an
111b5(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// zhing chen ras ma'i dum bu la// rtsibs drug 'khor lo sngags drug bri// tshil chen dud pas snag tsha bya// lag zur dag gis stug ku bya// bri ba'i dus ni nyi mtshungs dang zla ba ta// yang na srin dugs 'og song // de yi dus
111b6(rnying rgyud): su bri bar bya// gro gzhing shun ras dag la// dgra bo'i ming byung bye bar bya// dpral bar dus la snying gar ming // g.yas su dril g.yon du paT// 'doms su m+bA ra la zhes bris// yan lag bzhi la 'byung chen bzhi// tha ma 'bru dkri
111b7(rnying rgyud): bskor bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su bcug nas ni// mon pa pho mo'i thod pa ru// 'khor lo'i sngags drug gong ma bzhin// thod pa ga'u la sbyar du// dgra yi ming dang 'khor lo gzug/ seng ldeng phur pa sor bzhi la// mi byung 'khor po
111b8(rnying rgyud): srugapa gyur
112a1(rnying rgyud): dbus su gdab// gu gsum e yi dkyil 'khor du// dbus sug lub sbyar bzhag/ g.yon du 'gugs pa'i dkyil 'khor zla// g.yas su gsang ba'i mA ra ya// lcags kyu can gyis dgug byas la/
112a2(rnying rgyud): phur ngag gis gdab par bya// rtsa sngags pas sngags rab tu ga ces// sngags drug 'phyong gi 'khor lo bskor// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba dang // zla ba bdun gyis 'grub par byed// gang le btab kyang thogs pa med// ces gsungs so//
112a3(rnying rgyud): khro gro khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ srog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ bla dang lha 'dre rgyu ba'i don bstan te// shab zla ba srod la rgyu// lug dang lhan
112a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis nam phyed rgya// phag gi bla ni tha rangs rgya// byi ba nyi ma'i rtse la rgyu// rta ni nyi ma phyed na rgyu// ra ni nyi ma nub na rgyu// g.yag dang glang ni sa sros rgyu// 'tsho bar byed pa yul lha ste// skyob par byed pa dgra lha'o// 'gegs par byed
112a5(rnying rgyud): pa ma sman yin// 'go ba ban po na srung ma yin// srung bar byed pa srog lha'o// tho rangs lha 'dre rgyal po rgyu// nyi ma'i rtse la dkra lha rgya// nyin phyed dros nas dmag dpon rgyu// sa rnams tshab tshub btsan yang rgya// srod kyi dus su bdud
112a6(rnying rgyud): kyang rgyu/ nam gyi gung la gshin rje rgya// nam phyed dus su ma mo rgyu// rgyu za'i dus su drag sngags brdeg/ las sbyor dag ni brtsam par bya// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ lha 'dra dang bla rgya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
112a7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ drag sngags kyi don 'di bstan to// a ni swa yi snying po ste// lus ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ka ni gsung gi snying po ste// ngag ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// tsa ni thugs
112b1(rnying rgyud): du na rurgyu rgyun du na rgyun na tu na /
112b2(rnying rgyud): sa
112b3(rnying rgyud): su
113a1(rnying rgyud): sngags bsdu zhing bsdu// bskyed pa rgyun gyi sngags su bsgom// bskul ba rbad dang bzlas dang gsum// don gyi yi ge bsdu ba'o// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas pang ba/
113a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des// bu mo dkug pa'i las bstan te// gnas khang tshul dang ldan pa ru// dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad bris byas la// rdzas dgram phur pa dgod nas ni// bsten phur dag la zhag bdun bzlas// rang gi sprin dgra
113a3(rnying rgyud): dag tu ni// tsan+dan lte gus 'khor lo drug kyang bri// 'khor lo drug la sngags drug bri// dbus kyi lte bar 'byung gu bri// mtha' ma khro bcur shes par bya'o// rnal 'byor rang nyid bsgom pa'i dus// lag pa g.yas pa bri bar gsungs// rang nyid 'a
113a4(rnying rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal bsgom// bsgrub pa bon pa'i nang bar de// kha ru spo ni so cha mur// mya ngan med kyi grib ma la// rtsa sngags gzhug la sngags drug bzlas// 'bru dgu don gyi mgo la dril// lha dang klu yi bu mo dang // 'khor lo mthong tshad kam du 'ong //
113a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang bskur spyod pa brtsam// phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ bu mo dgug pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag
113a6(rnying rgyud): 'thung gi rgyal po de la/ karma he ru ka dang / dr-i shok+Shi mgo can dang / sre mo'i mgo can dang / mgo brnyan gyi tshogs dgyes nas gsungs gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ji ltar khrag 'thung rgyal po lags// ji ltar khro bo'i rgyal po lags/
113a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar dus gsum rgyal po lags// ji ltar chos nyid rgyal po lags// zhes gsol pas/ 'khor rnams la khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga ni 'khor ba zhal du rngub// nga ni dus gsum rtsad nas gcod// nga ni log tog tshang
113b1(rnying rgyud): gcod cing // da ni dus gsum 'gyur ba med// ces gsungs pas 'khor rnams dgos nas lags so zhes bya ba byin nas/ slar mnyam pa'i ngang la thim mo// khro ba~M khams gsum rnam par rgyal po'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i lo'u sde bdun par//
113b2(rnying rgyud): rdzab khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / mak+Shar skad du/ kro d+ha ma hA ba wa tAn+ta/ be ska dang / khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'bru 'arol ba'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos padus gcig ni/
113b3(rnying rgyud): 'brung rol pa'i rgyal po/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ phyi nang med pa'i zhal thal le gzigs pa'i gzhal yas khadu pa tha nyag gdan sbyangs na/ rin po rje rnam pa lnga sbas pa'i phyogs bzhinas ye shes bzhi'i sgo shing rdzing / da
113b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i tshogs thams cad kyang rol par mdzad cing bzugs parje gnas de na yum dang gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad cing bzhugs so// 'khyor kan ha~M ga dang/ dem kyi man rgyan dang / byi ba mgo can dang / mgab gyi tshogs kyi sa
113b5(rnying rgyud): zhusas// 'khor ma mtshan rnyed klung gsung lags// rngam pa'i yin las gang gsung lags// gdug pa lag stegadu sa rmad du// snying rje chen pos bdag la ston// zhes gsolangs// de nas bcom ldan 'das tha 'thung gi rgyal po dang/
113b6(rnying rgyud): dugang byarnams cad la khob pa'i spyan gyis sa stong byu ngag gtsigasas// denas sun la pa gang te/ mnyes mtho ba'i byar tshul te/ gdug pan gyi ga rnams pa phreng rnam pa dmigs so// ga pa saldan ma la ya na pa po
113b7(rnying rgyud): gtogs so// sa sargyas dang byang chubs mas phyogs rnams pa ma pa zinas / nas 'grobs nas can gyi don pa khor rnams kyis bskul ba 'atub rgyanas dkyil khor kyi las pa sa pa // rdzam mas po rgyud ma'o/
114a1(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas yang dpal khrag 'byung gi rgyal pos/ dkyil 'khor gyi don gsungs te// stobs po che yi dkyil 'khor ni// las pa rdo rje rgya gram la// kha dog stan po 'od dang bcas// dmi ste bkra
114a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi la// mthing nag gu gsum 'bar ba bri// pad+ma kha dog lnga dang ldan// rdo rje ra ba'i bar du bri// de yi nang du bsam bya ba// sbrang rtsi'i snyigs ma las gzugs bya// gro ga shing shun gang dang gang // dur khrod ro yi khrag gis ni// ming dang rus
114a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis bris nas ni// dpral bar ming ni bstan par bya// steng gar gru gsum rab brus la// de ru gzugs dang rus su bcas// bcug la bzhag par bya ba yin// de yi steng du bsam pa'i lha// sa Shog las ni skur bzhengs la// rdo rje cho ga gsu
114a4(rnying rgyud): gyis gsal// lu ni sngon po 'bar bas 'khrigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs kyang gnyis// phyag g.yas rdo rje chen po 'bar// g.yon pa sdig pa'i 'dzub mo ston// skra ser kye na 'khyil skul gyis brgyan// spyan bzlog gsum gzigs na
114a5(rnying rgyud): nas// smin mar ba btegs a gcom 'bar// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// ye shes me dpung rang nyid bsgom// de yi sbyor ba rab btang nas// dgug ste gzugs la phabs nas ni// sing ldeng zhur pa sor brgyad la// sngon dmar sdud pas sprem
114a6(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ bsung ba'i lha dang phye phral la// sngags kyi 'od zer ma rungs pas// gzung lung rab tu 'jigs par bsam// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs las byung // bzlas grangs khri phrag gsum du bzlas// dus dus su ni phur bas bsdigs// grangs dar thogs
114a7(rnying rgyud): la sngags bzlas la// gzugs brgyan de la brdeg par bya// thugs kyis bon 'od zer gyis// las gang byed pa nyid du brtag/ dus bzhi dkrug cing bstim pa bya// mtshan ma bzang po b+h+ri ba dang // gnas lnga dag tug dab par bya// na gyis gtu
114b1(rnying rgyud): zhal du bstabs// de yis las la nges par ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// sems can tshabs gdung ba la// nang pa'i rgyun rnams rab dbab na// gzhal yas gsal ba'i dbus su bad// de steng nyi ma zla ba bsam// thabs dang shes rab
114b2(rnying rgyud): yi sogs la// de gnyis dbus su bsam bya ba// sbrul gyi chun po'i gdan du bsam// de steng bdag po'i gzugs bsam te// de ltas 'od 'phros slar 'dus pas// bdag po'i dngos gzhi rab zhu ste// mi shigs don ldan nyid du btag/ de
114b3(rnying rgyud): las 'phros 'od slar 'dus pas// chos dbyings gzugs brnyan nyid du ste// de la sngags 'di sku ltar byung // oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ma hA ba la hUM/ gsang sngags brjod pas sku ru gyur// dbu gsum phyag drug rgyan dang ldan// g.yas pa dkar la g.yo
114b4(rnying rgyud): pa dmar// dbus ma dud kha lta bu ste// g.yas g.yon rdo rje b+ha d+hA'o// bar ma tho ba lcags kyu'o// tha ma 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bsnams// thugs ka'i hUM las 'bar bar bskyed// sgra'am grib ma'i tshul du bsam// de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
114b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya// ting 'dzin sems las 'od 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba spyan drangs te// bdag gi gtsug tu bzhugs par brtag/ de la bskor na lan gsum bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// de rjes dbang
114b6(rnying rgyud): rnams tshang bar nod// de nas rang bzhin gnas su gshegs// thabs dang shes rab khyad par las// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar baphyed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dud// ka ra b+hi ra'i phur bu'o// sbrul brgyan phur bu'i gdan lnga bzhugs//
114b7(rnying rgyud): sa bon rnams kyis rnam par mtshan// sgo bzhi gzhan la de bzhin yin// yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis// bskyed pa'i sngags kyis rab bskul nas// yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje g.yab mos g.yab nas ni// ye shes dkyil 'khor
115a1(rnying rgyud): spyan yang drangs// dgug dang gzug dang bstim pa ste// brtan par byas la mchod rdzogs bya// bstod pa byas la bzlas par gzhug/ sgying ga'i b+h+rUM las 'od 'phros pas// 'og gi klu rnams bkug nas ni// bdag gi zhabs ldan/
115a2(rnying rgyud): tshud par bsam// de la bzlas pa'i snying po 'di'o// oM wo Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ nA gtal phaT/ nA ga r+b+ha gdun dun/ hr-id ya phaT/ de ltar sngags 'di khri phrag gcig/ rab tu drug par 'di bzlas na// klu rnams rab tu zhig 'gyur te// char
115a3(rnying rgyud): rgyun rnams 'bebs par brtag/ de yi mtshan ma bstan pa ni// nyams zug rdzo dod 'bod pa'am// snrel gcod skams pa mthong ba dang // de nas lngas la skur bar bya'o// chu mig gnyen po'i khar song la// klu rnams sna tshogs gtor ma
115a4(rnying rgyud): bai shams// de la ba dmar 'o ma sbeng // d+hI/ ston pa nga yi bka' bsgo yis// gru chen brgyad la sogs pa yi// bsu rig drug 'dir 'dus shig/ so so'i gnas nas bskul bar bsam// bdag gi thang kar 'dus nas ni// ji ltar
115a5(rnying rgyud): zhes zer bar bsam// nga yi gtor ma 'di long la// sems can tsha bas gdung ba la// tshor pa'i rgyun rnams dbab tu gsol// gtor ba sngos tshig bshad 'di yang brjod// gal te char pa mi 'bebs na// kar bI ri'i rgya lugs gis// gzugs
115a6(rnying rgyud): phung thal ba bzhin du ni// brtag par 'gyur te gdon mi zla// nA ga tsi t+ta sa ma yau s+t+waM/ sngags kyis gnad la bor ba yis// char gyi rgyun rnams nges par 'beb// gal te mar pa ma ster na// ngur khrod ras ma blangs nas su// rang brang me togs
115a7(rnying rgyud): bus kyug/ ldong ngos ser pos 'khor lo bri// 'khor lo'i dbus su stobs chen bri// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon rgya lcags// sngags rnams bzlas zhing klu la thab// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sngags 'di'o//
115b1(rnying rgyud): por s+pho Ta tha mar phaT// de ltar yi ge brgya pa yis// 'og gi 'khor lo'i yi ge bskul// 'og gi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus// gru gzugs dbu gsum sbrul mgo drug/ g.yas pa ut+pal g.yon pa pad// 'khor lo pad+ma'i rtsibs dag la//
115b2(rnying rgyud): Ne gyis mgro byas la phaT gyi gzhug/ de ltar yi ge bcu drug dang // rang phreng sa bon de rnams kyis// 'od kyi klu rnams bsreg par bsam// dang pos dgug dang gnyis pas bstim// thams gzer te lcags kyis ze ba// de ltar byas na
115b3(rnying rgyud): sman// shin tu skrag cing spangs 'gyur te// rgya mtsho'i rlabs nas char gyi rgyan// shin tu brlabs nas phebs par byed// de yis 'od par gdon mi za// gtor ma bsngos la 'khor lo bkra// padamarar dkar 'o mas gso// klu sman
115b4(rnying rgyud): sa lu rnams gso/ gal te chur pa tshwa gyur na// 'khor lo steng ma'i steng 'jug pa// 'og gi sngags rnams gzhug nas bzlog/ sngags des cha pa'achang bang nges// bsdu bar byas la rang lha nyid// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid /
115b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// drag po'i dkyil 'khor rab gsal bri// thun dang rol mo dpag bsam shing // 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// rgyal mtshan la sogs rgyan rnams kyis// gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la brgyan// las 'di kun gyi mchog
115b6(rnying rgyud): dam pa// rnal 'byor dam pas nyams blangs na// las gang bya bar thogs pa med// dmatshig ldan pa'i mi rnams kyis// byas la 'bras bu 'od ces bya// khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor dang char pa dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
115b7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'byung gi rgyal po das/ spangs 'brar gzhom pa'i don 'di bstan tA dag ted stobs po rnga du bsam// lce la rdo rdo rtsa gsum bsgom// nad po'i lus la ldog par bya// 'bru dgu'i zhabs pa T+wAMg gdags/
116a1(rnying rgyud): rdzog/ nad rnams thams can pa sas// kun 'ag bcang bang dus ta// // / ma / gas nam mthod// na
116a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad na par bsam// mabriskapas pathaM rna las/ sbyangs 'byung gzhim pa'i phre skye gsus / denas sa spyan 'dus theg nabs ma rten pa 'di na gsungs // bdudu can ga
116a3(rnying rgyud): lcug dad+ha/ bdud mo bad+mag kyi dbang phyug ma gnyis la thug cig gyis te/ rdul ba zung ba'i ts+tsha hU~M/ blon po phung ba'i phung ste/ thul mi zung snang ste/ dam / sa~M / rgos/ rgya sa/ dza / rnam 'byor ba'i dam mi/ gan dz+ra/
116a4(rnying rgyud): zung ba'i lungs ni// mon nam tor mo sti rings sam// mon byang phyugs kyi thod pacu// chos 'khor dbus skya gnan par bya// blon po phung ba'i phung min// smye'u 'aman rje rjod badra// mdun ma 'dzus sar gnan par bya// yul mi phung ba'i phung srini// ma
116a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal rje'u'i thod parba// grong gi dbus suganan par bya// yang na yul gyi mdo nyid do// dgra sri nAg ya gzod pa dra// drag thun mtshams su gnan par bya'o// dam dri khyi sbyang tha~Md badra// glong gi dbus skra gnan par bya'o// blo se pagra gcod par// them paH/
116a6(rnying rgyud): 'og tu gnan par bya// chung sa phrag gu'i thod pa ru// mal gyi 'og tu gnan par bya// du sr-i skra dang gru mthod dam// yang na sre mo'i thod pa ra// dung kyi 'dabs su gnan par bya// rnal 'byor dam sri mi dang kye// phag zong la sogs pa la ni// mchod rten nang du gnan par bya/
116a7(rnying rgyud): gon slor du lug thod dadra// raba'i dbus su gnan par bya'o// de rnams gang byed thong pa ci// 'khor brtsi bas drug bris pa la// dbus su da bri'o// dgral byed na dri yang bri// rtsi ba ba drug la yang sngags drug bri// mtha' mkhro bcu'i sngags kyis slong // dpung bya
116b1(rnying rgyud): lte dar gzugs bris la// snying gar rus la dpral bar ming // yan lag bzhi la yig 'bru bzhi// mA ra ya yis mtha' ma bskor// shog bu la yang de bzhin ze'o// snron dmar dkri zhing re bas gtum// bsnyen bsgrub gdab las tshul
116b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin bya// zor dang hom dang mnan pa dang // tha mas las su grub pa yin// gang du byed par gru gsum bri// e yi tshogs kyis gzhal yas bskyed// stobs po che yi thugs ka nas// dzaHlas lcags kyus bkug cing be nyi ma/
116b3(rnying rgyud): thod pa de ru sbas nas ni// stobs po che yi phur gyis gdab// rgya snum mnan cing las bzhis brdung // gang las byas kyang the tshom med// khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud las/ sri mnan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas
116b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi chul po la/ karma he ru ka dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / byi ba'i mgo can dang / 'khor mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bstod do// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag nyid gtso/
116b5(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rab zab pa// rgya mtsho lta bu'i ngang tshul can// zil gnon chen po khyod la bstod// ces gsol pas/ de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ni bcom ldan nga dang 'dra// khyod ni khrag 'thung
116b6(rnying rgyud): ra dang mnyam// sems can kun la phan byed yin// khams gsum snyoms pa'i pha ma yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams dges nas sku gsung thugs la btud do// de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga ni mnyam pa'i ngangal 'jog/ de tshe gsung ba'i/
116b7(rnying rgyud): lung chen yang // rgyal po dza zhes khang stengs su// gsang sngags rgyud rnams 'byung 'gyur gyi// shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la// dbus 'gyur tshal du dar bar 'gyur// jo bo stazla po che'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// khro bo stab po che'i rgyud khri btsu rol pa'i rgyud chen po rdo sla so//
117a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yaH/ rgyag spyad dang / 'adz+rak+kol la ma kur d+hi byAny+tsa san da na maSh+Ta tar+tha/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje myur ba mo lo gsal ba'i spu mi rig satshod la kho lo rtsibs kyi rgyud/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal ma// da dang /
117a2(rnying rgyud): bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min gsang ba'i b+ha ga na bzhugs so// nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor khro bo dang khro mo rnams dang gdul bya drag po'i khro bo rnams dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// thun mong du gyur pa'i rgyud
117a3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang bshad kyi gsal bar smos so// / de des ma'ongs pa 'i dul bya rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ tshwag za ba stobs po zhes/ bcom ldan 'das lags pa'i mchod bstod byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsosote// kyem pa dag shegs bcom
117a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das// ma 'ongs sems can don byir du// gdug pa drag po'i gdul bya la// drag shul thabs kyis 'dul thabs gsungs// lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams// gcig la gcig smod drag sngags 'gran// yang dag chos bor log chos sgrub/
117a5(rnying rgyud): nichos kyi ma snod kya // 'i y-i ska / phe Sh+T+r-i drug sugs gyur lags// sems can don gyi dugasapa// zhes thus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdag 'dul gyi rgyu 'dzin pa snyoms par thugs
117a6(rnying rgyud): sa/ yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs spros pas/ 'jig rten shin tu g.yo zhing 'gul ldeg par gyur nas/ dregs pa can rnams shin tu brgyal nas gnas pa rnams dbugs phyung ste gnas pa la/ so so'i 'khor lo dang / drag sngags gsal ba'i
117a7(rnying rgyud): sul rnams pa thugasu// thu mom ni ma ga ni zhi'i brgyan pas/ slo ni'i sus sbos dang / gang ba'i labang 'ithum ze'i 'i sed sa/ de nas bkyis can das
117b1(rnying rgyud): rje gzhon nus 'khor rnams kyi don rtogs par rab tu mkhyen nas/ gsang ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bshad pa// e ma rdo rje khro bo che// bstan pa tha ma'i sems can rnams// yang dag don por log chos spyod// dge ba sgrib la sdig pa 'phel// de tshe chos kyi
117b2(rnying rgyud): me long bshad// gleng gzhi rnam gsum ngon gyi khog dbu ba yin// mtshan nyid bzhi ni rgyud don shan 'byed yin// phur bu rgyu bzhis gang zag bzhi mthar dbyung // sgrub gzhung gsum gyis las kyi gzhung bsrang bya/ thams cad 'dus pa'i sngags kyis
117b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes lha ni gnad la dbab/ ngan sngags zas yi ge drug gsum bco brgyad kyis/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams mngon sum dag tu bkol// srog gi don po gsum gyis dmigs pa'i gnad gsum bkrol// bsgral lugs rnam pa drug gis brlag
117b4(rnying rgyud): na /
117b5(rnying rgyud): gcod nag po yin// rin chen 'bru thus ste mas bcas 'khor lo ste// lhag par gcod cing 'khor bas 'khor lo yin// yig 'bru grangs su gtugs pas rtsibs kyi rgyun// rdo rje phur pa me long gsal baM'i mu gri reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs byud
117b6(rnying rgyud): las/ thugs kyi me long gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag gas don mo long bshad// gsang sngags mnan bsrung mthu 'phrog lnga// gsang ba'i man ngag dag gi snga ma 'grub na// gsang 'kho bo bti
117b7(rnying rgyud): gyur gsang sngags bzlas// sgrub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas pa'i long med ni// gsang bskol 'jo ma'i sngags la 'jug/ gsang sngags gcig kyang ma 'grub bgegs gnod na// gsarab phur ba'i gsang sngags bzlas pa bya// lnga bsgrub
118a1(rnying rgyud): shi ci 'di rnams brda rnying zhig yin nam mdzes
118a2(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas pa'i long med na// gsung ba gting man nas bshig slal sngags 'ams// gsang po shi tsi t+pa yid me phur gyis// ye shes khro phyur gnyis kyi nus pa bcings// gsang ba shi ci gsung gi
118a3(rnying rgyud): da phur gyis// ye shes pad+ma ga sung gi gsung yang bcings// gsang ba shi ci thugs kyi dme phur gyis// ye shes phyag na rdo rje'i mgu lang thog/ gsang ba zhi ci yon tan phung ba yis// ye shes ma gshin gnyis kyi byad kyang sdom// das
118a4(rnying rgyud): pa shi tsi byin las phur pa yis// 'jig rten mya stegs dregs pa'i mthu yang dbrog/ gsang ba gting 'gyur gsum dang phyag rgya gnyis// gsang ba gzhan gtA' bskul phyir rangab rtags so// gsung gi me long su gri rig gcod yin// rdo rje phur/
118a5(rnying rgyud): ba me long gsang ba'i spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs kyi rgyud las/ gsung gi me long ste le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag gsang ba'i spu gri'i me long bshad/ gsang ba'i bsnyen pa bsgrub la gnas pa yis// mchog
118a6(rnying rgyud): di rnal 'byor gzhung dang ldan pa yis// gsang sngags rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa gsum du bya// las byed 'khor gyi bsnyen pa bzhir bya// ye shes bsnyen pa nye bsnyen gnas bya la// gsang ba'i bslab pa bsgrub rtson gnas pa'i sa// 'jig gi phrag che gnon
118a7(rnying rgyud): par btang ba dang // gzhan gyi gnod bya phan par bting ba dang // gzhan gyi sbyor ba kun dang bsdeb pa dang // dus ngan rnal 'byor nang 'thab byed pa'i tshe// rlung gi shi ci zlog pur shes par bya// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bcu dang dug lnga dang // b+ha thun
118a8(rnying rgyud): drag ba rdzun du 'dabs pa dang // 'byong brgyad las bzhi kun gyi gzug la gdags// emra rjes te krugs stsol zhing drugatang// ye shes nyid shing dru gtang ba dang // dam can rdzas dang ma byad tshogs par bya// las gzhang myu /
118b1(rnying rgyud): 'ba' dasarnams pas / rnams 'das byu gan sa/ do sgrurnab sa yong gsal bu ma thi gag nga na pas rta pas/ 'a dkyi la dun pa sh+lau// denas pang dbya na rnams byag // /
118b2(rnying rgyud): gtang 'phrul dang thams rnams rang byung ba// drag sngags tshad ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// gsang ba bsten bsgrub rnam pa bzhi dag gis// 'dus pa bzhi yi gtso 'khor bskyen cing bsrub// ye shes bcus bsdus drangs ma'i 'dus pa bzhi// dab /
118b3(rnying rgyud): bsrub rgya'i phung po dbyings su sdud// kun gyi rnam shes srog 'phrog 'khor lo bzhis// mu stegs log lta'i rnam shes 'phrog par byed// sring dang dmatshan snying phrog rtad+hi bzhis// dgra bgegs nyams pa'i snying khrag mngon du sug/ drug
118b4(rnying rgyud): ngani rtags 'dres pa'i stong ba bzhes// nam shes pa rnams nga grol bar byed// drug pa'i sngags shU brgyad na// gas pa'i mi ge kha~M lo srog gi khor la dang // gsang sngags chog gi can pa srog su yang tig dang /
118b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'bring dang ba mra sil bu dang // gsang ba'i sngags la las kyi phrin las bzhis// thams cad 'dus dang khro bo 'dus pa dang // ma mo 'dus pa gling rnams ngan sngags 'dus// bskyed dang bzlas dang gdab pa bcu gcig 'gyur// ye shes bcwa
118b6(rnying rgyud): brjod dngos grub sgrol dang bzhis// chos nyid yi ge phyag rgya ngan sngags tshul// gdab dang mnan dang bsreg dang 'phang ba dang // ngan sngags rdzim yig bzhi bcu rtse bzhi ste// 'di yis gsang sngags phrar ba'i las rnams rdzogs// drang
118b7(rnying rgyud): dang byin rlabs rtags dang mtshan ma dang // gsang ba chen po'i yan lag shes byas na// gang bsgrub las kyi 'bram bu myang bar nges/ rdo rje phur pa me long gsang pa'i sku bri rig gcod 'khor lo'i rtsibs chud las/ drag sngags
119a1(rnying rgyud): rnam gyi 'i'u salapa sa// de nas gsang ba sbyig nad dkrol bshad pa// gsang bsla bsgra drag po bsan pa dang // gsang byug sung bskub drag pa bstan pa dang // gas ngazugs bskya rdza/
119a2(rnying rgyud): po bstan pa dang // 'khrul 'khor las dang drag po sngags bsrub dang // rnal ma dgug dang drag sngags bzlog pa dang // bas byang sngags drug po mo mtha' brtul bcas// bse byang rab 'bring tha ma'i sngags rnams dang // dbapa dang sbal pa mngond 'tsha
119a3(rnying rgyud): dang // mdze ba srung ser ba gcod dang gter bsrub dang // las rnams gang bstan bskrun gnyis su 'dra// thun mong las dang mchog dang mtha' ru dbyung // 'dir ni sdom dang man ngag gas pa 'dus// las gzhan thun mong rgyud rnams sun na
119a4(rnying rgyud): gsal// blta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dang dem tshig dang / sgrub pa phrin las rim pa gsang ba dang // sa dpal ma rnams 'dir ni rgyas ma bshad// de dag thun mang rgyud du shes par bya// rdo rje phurang pa me mor gsal ba spr-i gi reg gcod 'a
119a5(rnying rgyud): la rtsibs rgyud las/ man ngag spyi bshad sdom gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rgyud 'di bzung byas smra ba ste// ded dang shes rab snying rje brtson dgrus ldan// bla ma la gus dang ldan pa rtson 'grus che// snying rje dang ldan
119a6(rnying rgyud): ba rang la rdzogs// wa dang seng ge lta bur gcig pur gnas// de las ldog la rgyud don ra gsang // yon tan kun ldan rgyud 'di rab tugasang / zhes gsungs pas 'khor rnams rab tu yi rang / dka' bcom ldan
119a7(rnying rgyud): 'das la bstod de/ gsungs pa'i mngon pa rab tu myed de// rdorje phu tham la dgas la ba'i pra gri reg gcod 'tsha las na las/ yongs su gtad pa'i la'u ste bdun pa pa// phu ba ma mo gas pa'i wa~M ga

124a7(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan dngos po yin// de nas ya yi don la dpyad// dpyad pas dus rtags ji ltar 'byung // ye shes paskyed pa 'od dgas la yin// lam dang 'azod pa'i 'bras bu'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/
124b1(rnying rgyud): yAl gsol pa/ e mkhyod la yang gsol pa// mgyi kho na la mchog/ rje btsun dpa' bo khyod nyid la// de lta bu yin la 'byor la// lam ni rnam pa du ra grags// dpa' ba khyod kyis bshad dru gsol// zhes gsal to// de nas yang
124b2(rnying rgyud): kI la yas bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho khyod kyis dri ba legs// gang phyir khyod kyis drib legs// dang por gang zag rnal 'byor la// thog mar dbang gis lam yang bgrod// de nas shes rab grol ba'i lam// de yang dngos gzhi 'di yin pas//
124b3(rnying rgyud): gzas pa bskal ba ma dngos grub blang // dngos grub rnam pa gnyis su brtag/ dbang rnams rim par bskur nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos po ci 'dod sbyin// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs snar
124b4(rnying rgyud): ba las byung ba'i phyir/ chud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten steng byed las/ lam gyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i lce'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
124b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan mgon gyi dpal// gang zag bsam pa'i dbang gis na// sgra yi dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya chen po des/ dkyil 'khor mngon par grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
124b6(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu phyag rgya rdzogs par bzhengs te bka' stsal to// ma mthong rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi dpes mtshon te// sa 'am stegs bu che 'am chung // gnas khang dag dang lcer byar
124b7(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin pa y-i thig rnams kyis// 'a bar lo rtsibs brgyad dkyil 'khor lo// dang por sgrol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// de nas sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor bya// de nas gnan pa'i dkyil 'khor bya/ na shes rab chung ba dang /

125b1(rnying rgyud): gsol// gal te slob mar dbang bsgyur na// akA r+pa dang drAr+tha ka/ dri dang stan dang mngar dang 'bru// mar dang na rnams thug la bzhag/ bar bar tshogs kyul bar la na// bza'adung bca' dang btung brgya tshogs// mang nyid tu
125b2(rnying rgyud): bsag par bya// bskal ba zin nas dbang bskur na// rim par stegs bu bcig par bya// mdo mdo bsnyen pa bsnyen chen la// mdo mdor bsgrub pa bsgrub chen no// mdo mdor stong pa'i chog bya// de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// @
125b3(rnying rgyud): tsa brgyad nam stong cu brgyad// ci nus rnal 'byor pa yis bya// de ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs snang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ 'jig rten sdang byed las ma'i kyi
125b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor basbyin pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo// zhes gsol to//
125b5(rnying rgyud): de nas dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// grags ma thag tu sgra mtshan por sku bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bdag po dus la bab nad nyon cig/ rnal 'byor dpa' bos bslab nga
125b6(rnying rgyud): na// dang po res sbyangs bgrangs spyan dang // dbang po'i las rnams stsal bya// de ltar las rnams kun rig bya// yang bka' stsal ba/ gnyis pa phyi nang gnyis kyis sbyang // gsum pa mtshams lnga la sogs bya// bzhi pa chos spod
125b7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa bcu// lngab 'jig ted gti sa gtang // rnal 'byor dang 'dis las rnams kyang // dbang po dang ni bskrad pa dang // bcol ba dang ni dkrug pa // dang po na drangs rab bsngags pa/ ma \u0f7fhaM thAg sa
126a1(rnying rgyud): b+hi r+N+Na la b+hi m+b+ha ma/ arba ti d+ha wa sa sa nA~M/ brjod pa gsum gyis spyan yang dang // zhal dbye ba yi sngags kyang brjod// oM prAd+d+hAHnA~M/ zhes mchod pa 'aslab bo// phrin las 'dis las bcom
126a2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// oM sa ma ya pra tIg+h+nAts+tsha/ de nas ts+tshin las bcol ba'i sngags la/ sA ba drug gsu ma phye ma gsam// khrag gsum sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni// che g.yo la ston par bya// de bzhin bkug la zar gzhug sngags//

126b1(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i bdug pas zhus pa/ s+thA sa zlab la yas// dkyil 'khor na da smya gtug/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshA nga gsol// zhes gsam te/ bka' snyam pa// slob pa pad+hA can dag gis// dkyil pador canab tan

126b3(rnying rgyud): nas// dbus pakyis ma man mA la// zhan nan cig thaMng gdag// yang na cig ring ts+tsha ga na // gnyis dang mi ma d+ha // rgom cad mas brgyag nas// ya na drug ci ga dpa rdzo to// rtags kyis ma me de/ na

126b6(rnying rgyud): pa chen gyis rab bkang hU~M// ni 'dod pas rnams partag pa rtse/ mya 'angs mal khyer da stod// rjes gzungs so// gzhal las de la ga na rnams snang // gding byed nga sbeng zhi // mig pa sdig lag na
126b7(rnying rgyud): sogs// sgal nagasang gi shigasas shig/ khwa dang 'ag padu byang tshogs// 'dab chags ba rtags pa sngags// gas 'angs pa pa lpags pas byas pa'i// brim pa pabang po l-I yang sa/ mi dang ldan du

127b1(rnying rgyud): gtang bsan// rba brgyad zlar brgyad 'bar bar bskor// dbus su bcom ldan mas byu sa// rga la lugs pa d+ma thAg yi// 'bar bar latham // b+h+ya m+WA byas la dgong// dpa ba dang gsos/

127b3(rnying rgyud): de yi phyi rim par khyams la// dmar po'i tshon gyis rab bkang ste// g.yas dang g.yon du dgod par bya// de bzhin sgo la sgo ba bzhi// bso mo bzhi ni dgod par bya// lpags ril ni dbang phyug ma// bdun bdun srid mi 'bos pa
127b4(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ skad pa rgya mdzud rtsi mo pal// na bzhi pa'i lugs sa n+ya// tshon gyi kha dog so so ni// mkhas pa nyid kyis nan tan gyi// re re reg pa yang // shi pa nyid kyis bcos par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/

129b3(rnying rgyud): bo spel mar bkod// de yi phyi rim lugs di la// me ri hom gyi thab tu bya// de nas lha dgod 'di gsungs so// pho byang gru gsum nag po la// thabs chen bdud 'dul yab yum dgod// zla gram gsum la sras gsum po/

130a1(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// nga rgyal drag po mtshon gyis gzhom// phu rung lha du byas pa ste// b+hag pa gsum gyis dang yang blud// bdug pa gsum gyis dpal yang bskyed// de b+ha bA yi sgras mchog ni// blangs
130a2(rnying rgyud): bgrang bar mi bya ste// gcig dang du mkho na'o// yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni grang la thogs pa lags/ grangs ni rnam pa du tsa ma yod// dgos ched ci yi don du byung // dngos kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// zhe ba gso

130a4(rnying rgyud): la sku gsung thugs kyi sras// sprul pa rdo rje gzhon nu ljags// ming ni de la thogs pa lags// de yi skugasung thugs kyi sras// 'dus pa gsum gyi sras mchog lags// ming ni de las thogs pa lag // dang po grangs kyi rnam pa
130a5(rnying rgyud): gcig dang du ma bas ma yas pas// dang po kho na gcig tu bstan// dgos pa'i tshe dang tshul bstan nas// lnga dang bdun dang nyi shu gcig/ gsum dang bcu gcig drug rngu bzhi// brgyad rwa lnga dang brgya rtsa brgyad// stong rtsa brgya dang mkhril so
130a6(rnying rgyud): bye ba tu gyur sa la'i grangs// sras mchog nyi zer shar ba yang // 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang gis na// brjod kyis mi lang grangs las 'das// rtog ge pa ni rmongs pa'i phyir// brjod du med par yis sba// dgos pa dang ni dgongs pa dang // ma
130a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang ni lha rnams dang // 'brel ba dang ni 'brel byed kyis// dgos ched grangs kyi tshul dang ni// brdeg pa'i dmigs la dgongs pa'o// dngos kyi mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// stong ni khro bo chen po la// smad ni so so'i dpal dang ldan// brang sa
130b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba chen po yis// lha dang tshigs ni brgyan pa ste// phur pas 'debs shing thobs brdeg/ zhe sdang rang ga ma dang ldan// de ni dngos kyi mtshan nyid do// yang bka' stsal pa/ rkyen+da ni dz+haiM las byu'ab ste// de yi rgyan yang kI lA ya// kI la ya yi
130b2(rnying rgyud): mda' zam gyis// gdug pa rnam gnyis sgrol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba ste/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ sras mchog kI la ya bstan pa'i le'u
130b3(rnying rgyud): ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i badrag pos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor ba la phan pa'i phyir// ba liM mchod pa'i gtor ma 'di// lngas rab kun gyi gtor ma ste// cho ga bzang po bshad du gsol// zhes
130b4(rnying rgyud): nas/ kI la ya mchod pa'i phrin las rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de la phyi'i lha mo dang / nang gi lha mo dang / gsang ba'i lha mo la sogs pas/ mchod pa yang phyi nang gsang ba gsum du sbyar nas
130b5(rnying rgyud): mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ gsol ba btab nas zhu bar spobs te/ e mra sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang // lha rnams 'go bar bya ba dang // dam
130b6(rnying rgyud): tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir// nang dang phyi yi ga tor ma rnams// ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa ltar// rang gi 'byor pa'i rjes mthun par// nan tan gyis ni mchod pa dbul// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
130b7(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// de rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// rgyan du'am yang na zla ba gcig/ de bzhin lo gcig khyud skor dang // bcu gcig dang ni bco lnga dang // brgyad rnams su na khyad par dbul// mdzes
131a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ pa'am mdapa' pas rnams s+ho// 'gas par ngas kun pasgrums/ rnas mye ma pa ga du/ bdu mi rnyog gis bstan pas// mtha' 'as la sogs pa shA nga/ gcig
131a2(rnying rgyud): byed do bsogs// bzlas brjod la sogs so byung ldan// ma mchog tu mdzes pa dang // snying po rtsoms byed pachog smin te// dri'i me dam po nyid du 'dod// snyan pa'i sgrang blangs thung ba dang // thA btsun po shi tu mngo/ 'a
131a3(rnying rgyud): su yang dag bshad// ga ga ma nyid du // rig ma la sogs dag pas byung // mdzad pa yin pa bzhid// dang gnang ba sa/ nadang can pa la sogs ston/ ji tug la sogs te/
131a4(rnying rgyud): par bshad// sa gsungs so// de nas sdigs mkhan byas gyus te// sngags maben ba na byas / nyams dka' ba mi gnasasu 'dug/ rlu kyi phyogs sul bltas la// nyid ni da gzhag par \u0f7f// grags stso
131a5(rnying rgyud): paca / ngas nga ga ngas / / dgas ga zhen na/ ga dung pa ga
131a6(rnying rgyud): I kro d+hI tha d+his nang bru~M g+hota la y-i dz+nyAT+Ta/ sngags rig pas ni sngags 'di yis// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// dri nga ldan pa'i chunyid kyis// de nas ngas rnams btab byas la// rdo rje chudang ji chen po// nyi zla dang ning ming chen stod/ rdorje
131a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ldarnams / brjor sbyong du gzhug parag/ chubadags pon kyis spyos to// de la 'odi srung bsgom par bya// sos sa hU~M/ sabon lnga po tha sangs su// rnal 'byor ba las lnga gzhag s+ho// dmi 'a tu /
131b1(rnying rgyud): rgyug dgang byang ma nas// dus ni pas tag paras// ba'i blon pas mungs to// da sprul pa ma man ma'i mig/ nang kyi stod drugasasu smra/ gas ni sngags kyi 'ju'adi mag nga du ma /
131b2(rnying rgyud): pad+mas mtshon pa'i b+hag/ sa bon zla ba dbus gyur pa// sbom po dbang po gnyis kyi bar// sngags rig pas ni bsam byas pas// bdag gi ltar ni bsgom pa yis// de yang rdzas la gdab par bya// rnam pa gnyis kyi rdzas rnams byung /
131b3(rnying rgyud): snying po phyag rgya sngags kyi lha// spyan drang mchod pa ci rigs bya// yang dag tshigs bcad 'di brjod bya// sangs rgyas yab yum sras dang bcas// gnyen dang gnyen 'dun g.yog 'khor bcas// 'dus pa'i lha tshogs kyis
131b4(rnying rgyud): bskor nas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes mdzad cing // gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// stod las sbyar bas rtag tu de nyid dam par 'byung // nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar 'gro// blangs nas bde 'gro bde bar gshegs pa
131b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad// dpal chen rdo rje sems dpa' de ni bdag/ AM chos su'i rang bzhin dag pas na// bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs dam dbyings mchog rang nyid ni// sems can 'brums klas ma
131b6(rnying rgyud): lus kun// sku mchog bsgrub phyir sbyor bas ni// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas// sku yi dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ AM rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig rjes su bsrung // ye shes sems dpa' nye ba nyid du spyod// dgongs pa'i dam pa bdag
131b7(rnying rgyud): la bstan par dgongs// thugs rje'i dbyig gis bdag la chags par mdzod// byams pa'i mchog gis bdag la bde bar sbyongs// phun sum tshogs pa ldan pas bdag la bde bar sbyongs// byin rlabs mchog gis bdag la byin gyis rlobs//
132a1(rnying rgyud): grub pa 'phrul gyis bdag la dngos grubaskol// las rnams kun la bdag gi sems nyid bde bar 'gyur// de nas sngags mkhan mnyam gzhag ste// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas sngags pa kha
132a2(rnying rgyud): pa yis// da ni sngags dang phyag rgya yis// lha yi 'dun pa bskyed par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag pa yis// brjid pa mtha' nas gang bya zhing // rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// oM AHdruM
132a3(rnying rgyud): kA mA le/ mA l+ye badz+ra a mr-i te ha rA na prat+tits+tsha b+ha ga wAn/ dzaHhUM bAM hoH/ a la la tro AH/ ban paM be du su to// tI pu pa da mu sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi tu sa ma yota mu/ sarba ma hA su la sid+d+hi b+da/ A~M hUM/ oM e sA tra pe ma hu/ sa ma ya b+hak+Sha pri l+ra
132a4(rnying rgyud): dzaHhUM baM hoH// A~M prA tIts+tsha/ de nas rang gis bzlas byas nas/ tshigs bcung 'di ni brjod par bya// bla ma rnams la sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas kun drang mnyam sbyor bas// sdom pa li ni gang gnas pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
132a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor rnams// de dag khros nas khrag chen po// khyod kyi snying nas drangs te 'thung // i dan+te na rA kan ba ri hri da ye/ sa ma d+hi nAM sa ma ya yak+Sha na da s+t+ri
132a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra/ a mo to kAN/ oM badz+ra a mr-i ta A ha rob+da shas man+ta hU~M hrIHtrA~M/ de nas yang dag 'di brjod do// de nas kun la phud sprugs nas// he ru ka dpal 'khor bcas rnams// dam tshig phud la dbang ba rnams// mchod sbyin he ru pa
132a7(rnying rgyud): bsgom ste// de yi rgyan dang sngags ldan pa// snying ga mgrin pa spyi bor ni// gnas gsum tshul bzhin bsrung byas te// rdo rje thal mo mdzub mo gnyis// mdun gyi zad kar mdud par bya// gud mo mthe bong gnyis rtse sbyar// gzhan ma rnam
132b1(rnying rgyud): 'di lar btang // oM hrI d+d+ha mdza baH/ pa/ a ko r+tha ma/ za we sha yA pra we sha sa/ b+hanaN+Da ya b+han d+hu pa/ d+hash+tsa ma dz+dzag / mnyam mata la/ san+ta b+hA dz+nyA nA n+naH/ rgyud ma d+hinaH/ kya sgrags dang rgya tu /
132b2(rnying rgyud): gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs bcas bsnams su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhug pa// hU~M a~M la la ho// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mar 'phrul// dam tshig
132b3(rnying rgyud): bdag la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las tshul bar mdzod// ma lus pa dag bsnams su gsol// nyon mongs thams cad gsal bar mdzod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba'i cho ga rdzogs nas ni//
132b4(rnying rgyud): lhag ma dag la 'jug par bya// de nas btung dang zas la sogs// zos pa'i lhag mi phud bsres la// lhag ma'i dam la gnas pa rnams// mchod phyir sngags mkhan bsgom pa dang // bsrung dang spyan drang mchod pa dang // dam tshig
132b5(rnying rgyud): sdigs dang phyag rgya dang // bzhugs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya dag/ gong nas 'byung ba bzhin byas te// brtul zhugs rtogs pa'i lha mo yis// 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags bzlas la// yang dag mchod pa dbul bar bya// oM bud+d+haHk+ki nI pra tI
133a1(rnying rgyud): sa rgya ga sa na 'jug/ gas sa sa/
133a2(rnying rgyud): hA/ sam+b+ha ya thAk+Sha d+ha/ ru lu murba d+hi ts+yaidz+dza/ dza~M ts+tsha baM ts+tshaH/ prad+d+haH/ rdo rje bcings pa gnyis sbyi te// rgyo ba ste ma tha chung k+tel te// mdzu mi gnyis ni skyed nas ni// bai srim sa bris las ni tham ma cud byed// btung ba
133a3(rnying rgyud): ye tshul bya'o// k+ki m+bi Aka N+Da ba/ wa we sha ya thA we shA / b+han d+ha ma thun ta ya/ mo hA la ma~M h+ya yas rbab N+DI nan/ hr-id hU~M / d+d+ho ha~M/ ma \u0f7f/ dpal nagyi n+ti'i sakus dang phyag rgya'o// don la
133a4(rnying rgyud): sbyar te/ sgrom po gnyis ni da bus su bcug/ lhag ma 'khor lo'i tshul duH// bde ba dang ni bad+ma'i bdag/ ny-id las ni bya ni// sbom po gnyis ni btugs byas te// bcug pa ni d+ha gnong byig tu // dngos grub chen po la
133a5(rnying rgyud): ga ga hA
133a6(rnying rgyud): rta mgrin gyi sngags dang phyag naspro// d+ha y-i rgyal po'i sa bo n+da ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gan te// muthe bong dang ni smin+da lag // sngags pas de bsgom par du hrIH// thugs ma khyen cig tu 'di btab nas// gtor ma bdag nyid byin
133a7(rnying rgyud): bairlabs te// sngags 'di rjes su brjod bya dang // ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsom// A hU~M su k+Sha bcwas N+Di t+ta/ rmA dzuphaT/ sngags kyi rgyal por rnams kyis// mdzad pa'i tshi gardzogs par smras// ga
133b1(rnying rgyud): pas rtsoms byed pa// rgyud rnams kun gyi rgya mtsha ste// til mar thigs pas kun la khyab// thams cad kun nas bsdus pa 'di// rgyud mchog 'di rung yis smras// byung rnams bsdus pa'i man+t+ra ngag 'dre// rgyud 'di'i nang du smras pa'o//
133b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ rgyud thams cad kyi gtor ma'i man ngag/ las thams cad kyi rgyal po'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang das
133b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya ni// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ chu rnams kun la rab gnas ni// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams sam// zangs sum dpar po
133b4(rnying rgyud): rnams dang // dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams sam// ljags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// rab gnas byan ji ltar bya// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir// khyod kyis zhus pa nga yis bshad
133b5(rnying rgyud): legs par nyan pa'i 'khod rnams dang // rnal 'byor dpa' bo'i don ched du// lung bstan lung ma bstan pa yi// mkhas par bslab pa'i bzo mkhan ni// shes rab rnam pa du mar sbyangs// skyed pa lo mig bcu pa dang // nyal po sbal ba'i shing
133b6(rnying rgyud): dag la// phrin las rnam bzhi'i sngags bzlas shing // phyogs bzhi rgyas par bzhog par bya// gri kha lho byang shar rub bstan// kha ni 'dzab dang mi 'bral bas// sor brgyad bcu gnyis bco brgyad drug/ sems can rnams dang tshul bstan nas//
133b7(rnying rgyud): mtheb gong 'og tu rgya mdud bya// sor bzhi thum gzhogs 'og ma yang // gong ma bzhin du shes par bya// dpal ni chu srin la nas dbyung // tshig bzhi kun la sbrul gyis brgyan// rtse mo zur bzhi dpal dang bcas// de bzhin lugs mkhan mangs
134a1(rnying rgyud): pas kyang // sra tshil dag la gzugs byas la// dka ba'i shing la zhi ba'i gzugs// rtse mo gnam la bstan la gzhag/ phrin las sngags kyang de bzhin bzlas// lugs pa yang ni bzhin te// de bzhin
134a2(rnying rgyud): dngul la bya ba'o// mdzo mo glang gal dmar po'i shing // thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir// gri kha dpa' bo'i ngos su bzhog/ zangs sam 'dzin dmar de bzhin te// lugs ma mkhas pas de bzhin bya// shir shing nag po la sogs pa'i/
134a3(rnying rgyud): po tsher ma can gyi shing // mkhas pas gri kha phar bstun la// sa lcags gnam lcags khro chu las// mi rta mang po bsad pa dang // de bzhin dang thag phal pa'i lcags// de ni mgarab mkhas pas bya// goms shing mkhas par bslab pa yi/
134a4(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi bzo bos de ltar bya// zhi ba shar la dbang ni nub// rgyas pa lho la drag po byung // slob dpon sngags mkhan de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/
134a5(rnying rgyud): pa rab gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor yang dag bsam gtan las// yi dam rgyun du bya ba dang // srub pa mjug tu gdags pa dang /
134a6(rnying rgyud): sngags la yid ches bskyed pa'i phyir// yang snying man ngag bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ hom khung 'brub khung kha khyer gsum dang ldan// kha la thod pa tshar gsum btang // bang rim la ni rdo rje ste// phyi la me ri yang dag btang //
134a7(rnying rgyud): du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ni// mu khyud rdo rje ra bar ldan// lte ba la ni yaM dang raM// de nas phur pa byin brlabs dbang bskur te// rgya mdu dang po chos kyi sku// bar ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// zur gsum yongs spyod rdzogs pa la// sbrul
134b1(rnying rgyud): nga gaganas smra/ byal mapa nyan ma mardzogs pa na// srang dag pa da na sa/ sa kyang man gyis smras// na dru sa pa sa thugs kyi snyam/ nadung+yas sngagasu da zhen sa ba nas las
134b2(rnying rgyud): ya dzaH/ lha tshogs thams cad spyan+da yang drungs// dral zhing dbab la brtan par bzhugs// ji ltar dri ltar de bzhin bstim// badz+ra kI li kI la yAn maHyAno// phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga'o// badz+ra bI li kI la~M yan ma
134b3(rnying rgyud): de ni brang dag brjod pa'o// oM badz+rak+Shi li kI lA yA/ ma hA ra mA A nI/ mud+d+ha paSh+Ta a mr-i ta Sh+Tha ti/ ma hA bo d+hinISh+T+rI Sh+Tha te/ mahA go ro tsan khAny+dzi/ sngags kyi mchod pa yang dag ste// sku rnams rtsabartsab la// btags la lha rnams tshim par bya/
134b4(rnying rgyud): rgyun gyi sngags rnams brjod pa ste// oM badz+ra'i lI k+Shi la yA/ sa ba hrI pa d+mo pa Ta/ bdun 'bum grag suni zin bur bya// de nas yang snying rab tu bzlas// nyung dkar nyung nag tsho gsum// lugs bye zangs byardo gyi gsum/
134b5(rnying rgyud): tshol chen sgra rmi la gsum// de rnams dgu ka'i spong ba yis// gnas gsum dag tu shin tu brjog// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ pa bid d+han/ ye tsal che ge mo mA dA ya rbad/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad hU~M phaT/ sems
134b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// 'phro 'du yang ni de bzhin no// gzhal yas khang ni gong ma yi// rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa dbul// bza' brtu la bzhon nus ni// dus gsum bder gshegs mchod pa dbul// thab rdzas dga' lag
134b7(rnying rgyud): bzlas // sa la ba bangs sa lag/ rkyong ma ma thun 'dang ma// rdzog rgya chen po gsum yinangs// byang chub semasa'i sum pa'i phying// sems nga bral ba byu'o// 'khor los yan lag gcod pa dang //
135a1(rnying rgyud): sdom pa dang // ye dang ni TI bak+kum shing bsreg/ gang gis zab pa'i rdzas rnams la// yang skying bzlas shing gdab par bya// phur pa dbang dang ldan pa pyad// yang nas yang du bdug par bya// de ni rdzu
135a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'jug pa'o// sngags mkhan brtan par bya ba'i phyir// yi ge btu pa'i las rnams kyang // rnam par snang mdzad la sogs te// rdo rje can dang mtshams sbyar nas// dbyangs dang gsal ba'i yi ge la// yang snying gsal bar gsul bdag/
135a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yis// mtha' yas mchog gi yi ge rnams// btus pas sngags mkhan drag par 'gyur// rgyud rnams kun gyi sngags rnams kun// sngags mkhan mkhas pas btu bar bya// shad dang tshig bar ma
135a4(rnying rgyud): nor bar// g.yal dang sbrid pas bar ma bcad// gnyid chang le lo spangs la bya// yang dag don gyi bzlas pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ phur pa'i yang
135a5(rnying rgyud): snying bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos kI la ya la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das don thams cad 'grub par bya ba'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs
135a6(rnying rgyud): pas bshad du gsol// rjes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid bde ba chen po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu mi g.yo ba'i sbyar bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa/ chos su ltung ba'i dngos po
135a7(rnying rgyud): kun// yo nas snang ba ma yin te// las dang bsam pa'i dbang gis na// dngos po gcig la so sor mthong // gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// thams cad med mthong med mthong ba// mthong ba
135b1(rnying rgyud): medan mthong ba yin// kha dog dbyabs dang dring thang dang // tha skad brjod pa klan dang bral// bral ba yang dag lam mi mchog/ de ni sangs rgyas dngos pa yin// sngags dang phyag Na byu ba myug/ dngas po kun nas bsam pa yin// bang /
135b2(rnying rgyud): du med pa'i sems kyang yin// de ni rtsa ba sems kyi mchog/ tshig dang yi ge dpe las 'das// g+hi yi dngos po yang dag yin// nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar mthong // de ni dngos gzhi yang dag yin// thams dang snying rje rtsa ba che
135b3(rnying rgyud): bsdu ba'i dngos po gzhag tu med// mtshan dang dpe byed pa lta ru med// mchod dang bstod pa bshags su med// bsgom par bya ba bsgom du med/ sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// des na dngos po dngos med par// bsgom pa thams cad
135b4(rnying rgyud): du med// sangs mas byu ba brjod du med// de bzhin num mkha' mtshon pa'i dpe// nam mkha' la yang nam mkha' med// nam mkha' gzhal du med pa la// chos nyid dpa dragazhag tu med// bsam pa'i dngos po kun las 'das//
135b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor tshig lus 'das// dam tshig bsnyen pa bsrub las 'das// gzhal yas gzhal du med par 'das// lha tshogs dkyil 'khor mtha' las 'das// brjod pa'i tha snyad dpe las 'das
135b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad thams cad kun las 'das// byang chub sems ni rang bzhin 'das// phung po khams dang skye mchen 'das// sems dang sems su snang las 'das// chos dang chos su snang las 'das// stong pa nyid ni stong las 'das// de bzhi
135b7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang mtha' las 'das// chos kyi dbyings las 'das pa yang // bsam du med pa'i dang du 'das// yum dang yul can gnyis su med// chos dang chos can gnyis su med// tshing ba rig shes gnyis su med// zla brgya na gnyis su med/
136a1(rnying rgyud): b+ha dang sgong gnyis sa mad// mtshams dang ba srung paganyis su med// rlu dang nang du 'dug pa med// nyin momatshan mo gnyis sa med// skyes pa byud myed gnyis sa med// g.yas dang g.yon pa gnyisas med/
136a2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// me dang du ba gnyis su med// kun rdzob don dam gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ chos thams
136a3(rnying rgyud): cad rang bzhin gyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye kye sangs rgyas sa ru mngon nas gsungs// gsungs pa'i don de ji ltar lags// lam dngas
136a4(rnying rgyud): la brten pa'i phyir// gang zag dbang po rab 'bring gi// phun tshun nus pa'i dbang rnams shod// ces gsol to// sbyin pa'i lam du bsten bral// phan dang nus pa ngas bshad kyis// nyan pa po yi blo la rtogs// dang po shes rab rnam pa gsum//
136a5(rnying rgyud): mkhas shing mang por skrangs pa yis// zag pa phyogs ni med pa 'i// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid shes// sngags ma khanamakhas pa de las ni// dang pos yi las rnams b+ha// phyi nang gnyis kyis spangs la// sa la stegs bu bajig par bya// dkyil
136a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor tsha na mnyam pa la// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// le'u tshe re bskor bar bya// phyogs bzhir phyag rgya ma nor bzhag/ rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang // las kyi phyogs su gya gram bzhag/ tshon gyi kha dog phyogs da
136a7(rnying rgyud): bstan// bum pa bzang po lnga rnams su// rin po che la bya bar bshad// dkar po dang ni ser po dang // dmar po sngon po de bzhin ljang // bum pa kha dog nges par bya// 'tshar ma nyams ras dgal// sngags kyi rgyal pos gdab par bya// tA la
136b1(rnying rgyud): shug dkar po yis// brgyan yang na bya ba'o// yab dang yum dang shes rab thabs// sbyor mtshams byang chub sems kyis ni// bum pa'i nang du byang chub sems// gang la grang bas dgang bar bya// tIng 'dzin dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// rang /
136b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan yang drangs// ye shes bdud rtsi chu rgyun dbab// so so'i las dang mtshan ma'o// stegs bu stegs bu bsham par bya// lha rnams ro bstan dam tshig bslag/ ltas dang rmi lam nga lta ru gzhug/ dag gi nyes pa
136b3(rnying rgyud): bsal ba'i phyir// so shing byin la so rtsa brud// phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub brtags// srung ba'i lha mos byin brlabs pa'i// bsrung spyad dpung pa g.yas g.yon gdags// snod du 'ung dang mi rung ba// brtags shing bsdams shing
136b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin par bya'o// lus kyi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// bum pa gang ba so so'i dbang // ming dang bum pa phreng ba dang // cod pan dril bu rdo rje'i dbang // me tog rnams ni phan pa'i dbang nga 'dod// b+han d+ha phrar pa la sogs ji snyed pa/
136b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang ni yin par 'dod// de ltar ljags mkhan rgyal po mkhas pa yis// ngag gi dbang gi rdzas rnams brten par 'dod// phyag rgya yum mchog pad+ma'i snod chen de// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze'i rigs dang ni// gal te
136b6(rnying rgyud): gdol pa'i bu mo grags mo rgyal// rdo rje be'u ltar gzhibs te lus ni gdan du bya// de bzhin gsar pa'i dbang ni sbyin par bya// bsam gtan dngos po sgrub pa'i phyir// shes rab ma yi dbang yang sbyin// rdo rje rigs dang parda'i rigs// las kyi
136b7(rnying rgyud): rigs dang rin chen rigs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyis// bu mo bcu gnyis bco lnga dang / nyi shu rtsa gnyis sum du lnga// yang na rtse lnga bcu drug go// mang por thos la dad pa yod// theg pa'i sgo yang mang du shes// pad+ma \u0f7f
137a1(rnying rgyud): bu mod// lus la bde ba ji snyed pa// dga' ba bzhi dang rab tu ldan// bde ba 'dzin pa shin tu mkhas// pap+pa pra yi gdong pa la// byang chub sems ni thig lerU gnas// dang por gnas pa'i man ngag 'di//
137a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub lam du bde bar 'gro// de ltar goms shing reg pa ni// bzhi pa'i dbang nyid yin par 'dod// lam bgrod pa yi rim pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten sngang byed las/ lam gyi dbu
137a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ drag po snying gzer gdab pa'i phyir// phur pa'i mda' za mA dzi la ru gdags// zhes gsol pas/ kI la ya
137a4(rnying rgyud): drag po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'bar ba chen po'i sku khro bo chen po rgyan dang ldan par bzhengs nas/ bka' stsal pa/ bum pa'i hU~M las hU~M brgyud de// hU~M las hU~M brgyad de bzhin hUM// spug po gur 'dra ye shes
137a5(rnying rgyud): sems// kI la ya yi bzlas pa la// mA rA ya yi las kyi sngags// gcig la gcig brgyad mda' zam gdags// phar 'phros pas ni gzas pa bskyal// chur 'dus bdun tshe gsum la 'dus// dbade bskur byin rlabs lhag par
137a6(rnying rgyud): bzang // dkar nag mtshams su thal phyung ste// sku gsung thugs su gzi ma dngas bskyed// bsten pa dus kyi drag po'o// bsten pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po// dus bzhi dus su bzlas pa ni// ji bzhin pa
137a7(rnying rgyud): yi bzlas pa yi// yang gcig bsnyen pa rab tu bya// me tog tshom bu rab tu dgram// sbams pa'i phur bu rab tu dgod// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan yang drangs// spyan drang bzhugs
137b1(rnying rgyud): dang mchod pa dang // brjod cing gshegs la len las rnams// bsnyen pa'i dus kyi / 'khor la// sngags mkhan gyis nin n+ya tanabya// de nas bsnyen pa pa tu byas te/ nga bzhin pa ma spyod pacur// de bgan gshegs pa zam /
137b2(rnying rgyud): gyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten sdang byed las/ sras mchog gi 'a ba kyi la rje ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang steng ba rgya sngags kyi rim pa zhus pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ dkyi lta 'khor la ni dgel 'khor te/

138b3(rnying rgyud): byas la/ dzahUMb b+h+yoH/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya~M/ sarba bi g+h+nAn baM d+h+r-i phaT/ dIpA tsaH ban d+ha yi ban d+hA ya/ to sha ya to shA ya/ bid+d+hA na sa ya bid+h+wa na sa ya/ e d+h+ye hi/ b+ha gA sAn prad+d+hak+She tri staM b+ha ka l+yA d+h+r-i dzaT/ zheng gzing ba bya//
138b4(rnying rgyud): daMny-id las rdo rjernal mo snying gar bzhag la/ oMng+gad+b+ha shI he hi bud+d+ha krod+d+hi sha R+tsis+t+wa~M/ A~M badz+ra a mu ka shwa ra ya na maHoM badz+ra shrI rAg si mA y+YA yA na meH/ oM shrI badz+ra ba T+wA~Mg badz+wa le yA ya na mo.oM 'dzi g+hA N+De pra tsa la yA ya na paH/
138b5(rnying rgyud): byaho/ pra tAM dz+dza ho/ ta thA ga ta ban+da naM ka ro lA ma~Mde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ snying po sngags kyi le'u sti badz+ra bairgyad pa'o// / dri nas yang gaskyeng ba'i bdang /
138b6(rnying rgyud): blos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang zag 'asam pa'i dbang gas na/ thabs dang zlog pa'i mtshan nyid gang // tsa ma Na na 'das kyis bshad dug so la/ ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdang chen po zhes bya ba
138b7(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin pa sgoms par zhugs so// de nas bka stsal pa/ ma drangs pa la phur ba gang ba pa dang / thod pa la sogs sanan pa dang / zor kha 'phang ba'i dus ngas pa shad par bya'o// de bzhin du zla ba bcu gnyis lo gcig la dbang phrag conapa
139a1(rnying rgyud): rma ga dang nag pa dang lha ma um gnyis zlab yab rnaganyis la sna mas la 'debs shing thal pa'i ngas/ zlas na gru pa'i las rnams thabs pa'angs/ dayang byung ba rang da
139a2(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis la/ 'khor ba tan ma rnams dang bcas nas nyal te/ dus de ringag po'i las gang byas kyang thebs so// de bzhin du 'bring po'i bcu drag la/ 'khor bajud pazhi dang bcas pas nyal bas rdebs so// de bsnyen
139a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis la/ 'khor ma bdud dang bcas pas nyal bas thabs so// de bzhin du dbyar zlar ba'i chos brgyad la/ 'kho gza' chen po dang bcas nas nyal bas the byas so// de bzhin du 'bring po'i chos bco lnga lA/ 'khor chud pu dang
139a4(rnying rgyud): nas nyal bas thebs so// de bzhin du durbang la ya la yum dang ma mo thams cad lta mo la yengs pas las me b+ha'o// de bzhin du ston zla ra ba'i nyi shug sa ma la 'khor ma mo yongs dang bcas pas nyul bas thebs so// de bzhin du 'bring po'i chos bcu
139a5(rnying rgyud): bdun nas gnam stong gi par du/ 'khor byas/ radang bcas pas nyal bas thebs so// de bzhin du ba chung gi chos bzung nas sbyong bar du// 'khor lnga chen po brgyad gyis byas nas nyal bas thabs so// de bzhin du dgun zur ba'i chog brdza sur
139a6(rnying rgyud): bad+ha drug gi bar du/ 'khor gnod sbyin dang bcas nas nyul bas thebs so// de bzhin du 'bring mo'i nyi shu gnyis nas stong gi bar du/ 'kho ga shin rje dang bcas nas nyal bas thebs so// / de bzhin du chung gi nyi shwa gnyis la rgya srin yongs su

140b1(rnying rgyud): lpagasang ba'i lam myur ba zhus pa/ kye bcom spyan 'ang sa shin tugs dpa'i lam 'dab shad du gsol// zhes pas shin tu gsang pa'i ting nga 'dzin la sems par blugs te/ shin tugasang pa don 'di lta bla gsung sas/ jug

140b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// bdag gi de nyid kho na ste// byin brlab dbang bskur bya ba ni// 'khor lo bzhi dang sdom pa bzhi// rang nyid byin gyis brlab byas na// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// sngags mkhan mkhas pa gang yin
140b4(rnying rgyud): gyen du rgyu dang thur du chu// rnam pa bcu po gnyis su 'gyur// srog dang rdol ba las byung ba// rim brlung gi de kho na// sngags la dmigs pa zhes bya ba// sngags kyi de nyid kho na'o// de nas bdag gi de kho nyid// nam mkha' khams
