141b5(rnying rgyud): bas// mi rtog ye shes skye bar byed// lus ngag yid kyi sto ba yis// dang po sngags kyi drong tshad ni// 'dar ba dang ni spug dang 'phar// bar snang dag lnga 'phur bar byed// de nyid thabs kyi man ngag ni// b+hing nod skyabs ni rabazhin sa//
141b6(rnying rgyud): khams kyi zas dang rnam bral nas// ngal bar rgyab 'byung bar byed// de nas gzugs kyi mthong ba'i chos// sdig rgyu ste bu'i rnam pa dang // ba lta bu'i rnam pa dang // srin bu ma khyer 'dra ba dang // mar mo'i tshul dang nam mkha' bzhin/
141b7(rnying rgyud): 'odags la zung 'jug bad ba che// ye shes bde ba de nyid las// zla badrug dang bcu gnyis dang // bco brgyad bcu drug sum cu gnyis// de bzhin sgri ba gcig gis 'grub// gal te des kyang ma 'grub na// ston pa'i tshul gyis bslab
142a1(rnying rgyud): par bya// 'phags pa'i thugs rje ma byung yang // rang rig ye shes blo ldanan// mi tshe gcig gis 'grub par nges// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyis// rnam par grol ba'i lam du grags// 2
142a2(rnying rgyud): mchog rgyal ba mngon pa 'di// nyan dang 'chang drang klog pa dang // de bzhin yi ge 'bri ma chod drang // kha ton sbyin pa bsgom pa rnams// rnal 'byor rab kyi skal ba ste// ngan song gsum las rnam par byar// d+ha mthun 'bras bu deng bzhag
142a3(rnying rgyud): nas// skye bas mthong ba'i gang zag la// sred pa tha mar skye bar 'gyur// grang gis 'di la mnyam gzhag na// sa rnams kyi ni ming yang med// rnam par shes pa ye shes mchog/ rngub mo'i don rnams mi thong byar te// sug su
142a4(rnying rgyud): bde ba mngon byang chub// mya ngan mi 'da' mi bkri drang // 'di las gshegs pa'i gnas med do// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyang // chos kyi sku las yongs mi 'da'// chos su'i yon tan chen po ni// gang zhig rkyal
142a5(rnying rgyud): zhing gi khyon// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ lam gas ba'i man ngag gi dngos grub bstan pa'i le'u m+me nyi rgyu rje gnyis pa'o// /
142a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'jig rten dag gi mirnams gyis// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mthong mi 'gyur// de bzhin nyid la sogs pa yang // bltas nas mthong ba ma yin te// so so'i las kyis de ltar rje sdong/
142a7(rnying rgyud): gal te nyid mthong na ni// de nyid rgyal ba dam par// nga yang lus kyang ma mthong ste// nga mthong zung bsku yis mthong // de yis nga ni mthong mi 'gyur// rang nges ye shes bya ba ni// sems can kun la mnyam par gnas// de
142b1(rnying rgyud): mthong na mthong ba yin// mis kyang mi la mthong ba med// de bzhin lta la sogs pas byung // sangs rgyas gang yang mthong ba med// stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// sems la sems kyis bltas
142b2(rnying rgyud): pas na// mthong ba med na mthong ba'i mchog/ de yi bsgom pa bsgom pa min// bsgom du med na sgom pa'i mchog/ de bzhin brjod du yod ma yin// brjod du med na brjod pa'i mchog/ de bzhin pa lta bu yod ma yin// blta ru med na
142b3(rnying rgyud): lta ba'i mchog/ de bzhin bsam du yod ma yin// bsam du med na bsam pa'i mchog// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba// mtshan dang dpe byad med pa yin// ngag dang gsung dbyangs med pa yin// tshig dang tha skad med po yin/
142b4(rnying rgyud): sems dang dran rtog med pa yin// thugs dang bsam du med pa yin// las dang dkyil 'khor med pa yin// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa med// zung dang zung du 'jug pa med// don dam kun rdzob bya ba med// thabs dang shes rab bya ba med//

148a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la gnod pa'i bdud btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kIl la chen pos// rnam par rtog pa med pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas
148a2(rnying rgyud): lha srin sde brgyad breng sngangs nas/ rnal 'byor pa la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / srog dang mdangs 'phrog pa rnams phyis mi phyed par khas blangs so// gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ dpal bAdz+nya kI la ya chen pos bka' bsnol dang zhes zhus pas/
148a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i badrag po khyod legs so// khas len mi shes sam/ gsang ba'i bdag po khas len pa ni 'di rnams so// lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto daphye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang /
148a4(rnying rgyud): yi dwags dang dri za dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / skem byed dag brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyis khas blangs so// rgyu 'bras ma rtogs pas de ltar snang ngo // rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba las/ dam
148a5(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya chen pos/ don dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro mo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du mdzad nas/ gnas drug nas 'od zer bye ba drug cu bkye'o// ded kye
148a6(rnying rgyud): bas 'od zer rigs lnga'i tshogs la phog/ rigs lnga'i yang gnas drug tu 'phros pas gnas gang nas/ de'i 'od zer yang gcig nas gcig la 'dus pas/ yi ge 'i tshogs dpag tu med par gyur to// gyur ma thag tu yi ga 'dus pas 'od zer
148a7(rnying rgyud): yang 'dus nas// yi ge hU~M gcig tu 'dus so// de nas yang rigs lnga'i tshogs las 'od zer yang nas yang du 'gros 'dus pas sgra phrin las rnam bzhi'i sngags/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAn ba~M hUM hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas spa 'dus so//
148b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus nas 'dus ma thag tu dpal rdo rje gzhon nu zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi/ dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ khro bo thams cad 'jus pabs kyang gA'i mdungs che ba ni phyug rgya gsumu 'dus pa ste/ khro bo dngos po yang drag pa'i
148b2(rnying rgyud): shin tu brjid pa'o// gsang bu'i yang gsang ba'i khro bo chen po ste/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po yang yin no// thugs kyi snying po yang yin no// sku'i snying po yang yin no// yon tan gyi snying po yang yin no//
148b3(rnying rgyud): las kyi snying po yang yin no// de'i phyir rgyud 'dir gsungs pa/ 'brel ba'i phyir na gsungs pa ste// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu la// 'brel ba'i phyir na rgyud rjes bya//
148b4(rnying rgyud): ces grags pa 'brel pa ste// gcig la gcig 'brel rgyud kyi don// rab 'brel de ni rnam gsum ste// des na rgyud du grags pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba las/ don drim pa'i dang las chung du grags pa/ dpal rdo rje gzhin du rigs lnga'i
148b5(rnying rgyud): su dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa las phyag rgya'i gzugs su bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ badz+ra kI la ya chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye dpa' bo chen po hU~M kA ra la sogs pa'i
148b6(rnying rgyud): chen po 'dri rnams ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ sus bskyed pa lags/ su zhig 'dul ba lags/ gang las grub pa lags/ ye shes gang gi ngo bo lags/ rnam pa 'dag pa gang lags/ nyon mongs pa gang stong pa lags/ rdo rje phred ba
148b7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba ji lta bu lags/ gang las rnam par dag pa lags/ de skad zhus pa dang / padz+ra kI le yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so gsang ba'i bdag/ ma 'ongs don du zhus pa legs so// nga yis bshad kyi khyod kyis
149a1(rnying rgyud): na du du smra /
149a2(rnying rgyud): sa
149a3(rnying rgyud): su
149b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhugs ma thagaH/ sgyu mchen mo 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma dang gnyis su med par 'brel lo// dI nas yab yum chags pa yang dag pa'i bad bachen pos bskul nas gnyis su zad
149b2(rnying rgyud): par gyur te/ 'khor lo'i chu hU~M baM \u0f7flab yum bde bar gyur to// de yang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhunas/ rdo rje'i bu ga la gnas pa de/ yum gyi mkha' la phab nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'od zer dkar dmar gyi rnam pa ma
149b3(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i gnas su mang du 'phros pas/ de las yi ge'i tshogs dum du mas granas de dag gung byar byas s+ho// ga ma thag tu zhu nas/ yab kyi gas bar 'dus so// yum gyi mkha' la dkar+Na dmar 'dril lo// de la yum gyi
149b4(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM zhes pa bed+ha phyung ngo // de nas dngos po rdo rje gzhon nu ste/ kI la ya rnon pos 'di snyed ces brjod do// sta~M badz+ra kr-in T+Tik+Sha NA~M/ gardza gArba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra oM na~M bi dA yad+h+waM/ ha na tan hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mA ra ka d+hI/ btsa pAH
149b5(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha dA ya grI wa hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+rA kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/ tsin+ta tsin+ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dar+b+ha hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+tha a tsa la hU~M/ b+han+ta b+han+ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a paM ra dzi ta trUM/ tita ti/
149b6(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ b+hin+ta b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ de nas dur khrod kyi rgyal po'i chas kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ a ho su kha bcom ldan 'das/
149b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad khyod la 'dud// khro bcu'i mtshan nyid khyod kyis bshad du gsol// legs so khri rgyal gsang ba'i bdag/ legs so khro rgyal kun gyi gtso// legs so chos rnams kun gyi rgyu// legs so gdug pa 'angal ba'i bdud
150a1(rnying rgyud): na smram su smras/
150a2(rnying rgyud): ma da gsang pa'i bdag pos smras pa de bshad do// d+hi la las bka stsal pa/ gtamagarnam par dag pa 'o// hrI kA yi me ga dang // g.yas pas shing gi yin pang ma // ba'i nam da/
150a3(rnying rgyud): dpung rig ma babyud// 'khor lor la zig yas pa te// rin zin bdag yon na'o// stobs pom myem chen nyid kyang // g.yas dkeng g.yon dmar rtsazhalaganag/ dang po me dpung rig mang khud// g.yas bani bral dum thi don/
150a4(rnying rgyud): parin chen 'ad+ma // rnam par rgyal ba dkar ba ste// g.yas pa gtsug cing g.yon pa dmar// dang po med byung rig ma 'khyud// g.yas pa dbyu gtoral gri la// rin chen badz+ra g.yon pa ste// zhe sdang rnam pa bdag pa'o// shad gyi rtsub
150a5(rnying rgyud): sdugagag rnaMH/ n+da pa rnam par dag nA~M// sogs gshin rjem par byed hrI/ dang po mi pung rig ma byud// g.yas pa kun gcing g.yon pa dmapa/ sa pad+hi zhes ni sa rab rtse// gasres pacoM ba ma zil/ @
150a6(rnying rgyud): na chen badra'o// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ni// chub phyogs rtamagrin rgyal po che// g.yas pa dkar la gu ya~Mn+da pa po// rtsa ba'i zhal ni dmangab ste// dang po me dpung rig ma 'jud// pad+ma dang ni ral gri g.yas// 'khor lo rin
150a7(rnying rgyud): na g.yon dun/ khrag dag rnam par dag pa ni// bang la rgyal pan la dbus ldang // g.yas dang g.yon ni dag nga nga // dang po mang byung rig pa blang // g.yas ba catha ma pa mi sa// 'ayo pa 'a /
150b1(rnying rgyud): byang phyogs gdan la btung bskum bzhugs// zhe sung ma 'dun dag byeng bya// me 'i phyogs su dbyug sngon can// g.yas dang g.yon ni dag dang mar// dang po me byung drug ma 'byung // ug la dbus kyis sa du mar// g.yas rlung da /
150b2(rnying rgyud): ral gyi ste// g.yon na rin tshon pad+ma'o// nga rgyal cha 'dzin mig yo mgon// bden bral phyogs na yang dag gnas// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ser ba'i zhal// dang po me dpung rig ma la byud// 'khor po ral gri g.yas nano// rin chen pa
150b3(rnying rgyud): g.yon na'o// 'dod chags cha 'dzin gzhan mi thub// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// skra dang dbu ni dmar ldang la// dang po me dpung rig ma 'khyud// rdo rje ral gri g.yas nA'o// rin chen pad+ma g.yon na'o// rlung lha'i mtshasu
150b4(rnying rgyud): yang dag gnas// phrag dog cha ni dag byed pa// dbang po'i grwar ni gzhag bya ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhal gsum pa// zhal g.yas dkar la g.yon pa dmar// sku dang dbu ni ljang s+ya la// dang po me dpung rig ma 'khyud// lugs kyu
150b5(rnying rgyud): ral gri rin chen pad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag tu bsnams// gti mug tsha ni dag byed pa// khro bo chen po stobs chen yang // yang dag nyid du 'og tu gsungs// thams cad rdo rje'i go cha ste// khro mo rnams kyi rigs dang mdog/ so so'i kha
150b6(rnying rgyud): dog ji bzhin no// rang de'i lag cha lag na bsnams// zhes gsungs nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba las/ khro bo rnams kyi zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de
150b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya chen po de/ cho 'phrul snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de rnams kyi sprul pa sbyor ba mo bdag po rnams dga' bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo dam pa dpal rdo rje sla 'byin ma dang /
151a1(rnying rgyud): rngornams sa dang / dong dum dadu bdag mo dang / de dganam mo dang / dang bsgral byed pa dang / sder mo dang / rdortag tun byung ma dang / don mdu nga snyems ma dang / rjegasong ma dang / don brtsod ma dang / ga
151a2(rnying rgyud): su med par bzhugs pa de rnams kyi sprul pa yang / byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar las grub pa'i phra men ma ste/ phag gi mgo can dang / stag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / bye la'i mgo can dang / seng ge'i mgo
151a3(rnying rgyud): dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / gzig gi mgo can+da dang / spyang ki'i mgo nan dang / dred kyi mgo n+dan dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / smig bu'i mgo n+dan dang / bya rgod kyi mgo can dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / pu
151a4(rnying rgyud): kyi mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can dang / khwa ta'i mgo can dang / khwa'i mgo can dang / ske mo'i mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can la sogs pa rnams dang / yang sbrul dang / sum sprul la sogs
151a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis dpal rdo rje gzhon nu de la bskor bas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por bzhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la cho 'phrul 'byung ba 'di ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol ba dang / kA la yas ba
151a6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa/ legs so gsang ba'i bdag po khyed// gang gi don du khyed kyis zhus// zhes bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ gdug rtsub rnams la phan don du// khyod kyis bka' stsol bdag gis nyan// zhes pas
151a7(rnying rgyud): trail la chen pos zhe sdang gi 'dzum gyis thams cad du bltas pas/ kI la ya'i ag chom la sogs pa ba spu'i bug thams cad nas/ rdorje phur bu'i sprul pa dpag tu med pe 'phros pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
151b1(rnying rgyud): 'dul/ g.yos/ ldeg/ rabang+ga/ ches ches/ rba d+ha/ thag zug gi sgra chen pos bdud d+ha tral sogs pa thams cad dus gcig tu brgyal nus/ gan bubaN+Da 'gyel nas khrag tu sngags so// de nas de dag mi dus pazhi nga
151b2(rnying rgyud): langs nas/ gcig gis gcig la dris pas/ sus kyang ma shes so// der de dag thams cad the tshom gyi dbar tshud nas/ 'di su'i mthu yin/ su'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sus btang ba yin/ 'dri 'u cag gis su la 'dri/ 'di
151b3(rnying rgyud): yIswa lu cag la gnod pa chen po byed pa mIn nam/ zhes gcig gis gcig la dris pus/ de rnams la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal phyag na rdo rje'i skur sprul nas/ lhag g.yas pa gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa bsdams te/
151b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni de'i mthu'o// 'di ni nga'i byin gyis brlabs so// 'di ni ngas btang po yin no// 'di ni khyed kyi bdud yin pas/ khyod kyang bstan pa la gnod pa ma byed cig/ ces bsgo bas/ srin po de rnams kyis bsnyad nas/ gal te khyod pas
151b5(rnying rgyud): lhag gzhan pa su yod dris pas/ gsang ba'i bdagra bos bka' stsal pa/ rabs kyang lhag pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sras mchog tu gyur pa dpal rdo rje gzhon nu bya ba ni/ chos drabs kya'i lhag pa yin no// zhes pas/
151b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis sbas pa/ kye la ma mthong 'jigs pa'i rje btson khyod/ khyod pas lhag pa yod na ni/ bdagra cag rnams ni brgyal nas 'chi// zhes smras pas/ baspu langs nas gan bub tu song ngo // de nas rdo rje gzhon nus phrin las
151b7(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhi'i sngags brjod pas/ gcig dang gnyis ma yin pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams bcibs kyang 'gul zhing g.yo ba'i ba spu'i bug nas/ bye bdud phyur tsam gyi khro bo'i sprul pa yang sprul byung ngo // de rnams kyis 'jig rten

152b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rjes la// dkyil 'khor shes rab bsgom par bya// de'i dbus sus ng+yas rgyas rnams// man ga ni bzhin rdzogs bral// rtag rgya bzhi yi nus btub pasmra// thug po b+ha 'dral shes sems// rangags pa'i sngags kyis ba dan/
152b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi bye brag las// yan lag bzhi ni rab tu 'brel// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bskyed byas la// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni ldan pa la// bdag gi de nyid rim gyi rlung // rlung gi de nyid yang dag 'jug/ dang por bdag nyid byin brlabs pas/
152b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun+da dang ldan pa yin// thabs kyi khyad par las byung ba'i// 'khor lo rnams ni rab tu dmigs// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// pad+ma'i 'dab ma lngas byung ba'i// sa bon yi ge rnams kyis brgyan
152b4(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis yin// mgrin pa pad+ma bcu drug ni// 'phags pa'i lam dang yan lag go// snying ga'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad ni// bden pa bzhi yi mtshan nyid yin// lte ba'i pad+ma drug cu bzhi// gzugs
152b5(rnying rgyud): gyi sku la mtshan bzang po// 'khor lo'i rnam pa kun la ni// dbyangs kyi yi ges gang bar byas// lte ba la ni yi ge haM// de nyid 'gog pa mya ngan 'das// dang po bde ba chen po'i sgra// de ltar thob byed 'jug pa la// bum pa'i dbang ni drang po
152b6(rnying rgyud): ste// lam gyi 'bras bu'i tshul 'chang ba'i// rigs bzhi'i sa bon phyogs dag tu// rag gi lam gyi lte bar hrI// de nyid las su gsungs pa'i dbang // longs spyod rdzogs pas longs spyod su// des ni chung sde mtha' dag gi// 'gug
152b7(rnying rgyud): pa sel ba'i dbang yin no// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yin te// bden pa bzhi yi rang bzhin can// thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig pas// lte ba'i steng du yi ge hUM// thabs dang shes rab mtha' dag sdud// de nyid rnam pa kun 'byung ba// chos
153a1(rnying rgyud): kyi sku yi bdag nyid las// gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang // thun mong mtshan dang ldan pa yis// rnam pa gnyis su gyur pas na// phyogs mtshams dag ni rigs rnams kyis// sa bon nyid kyis mtshan
153a2(rnying rgyud): pa lnga// lte bar IM yig rnam par bsam// sdug bsngal bdag nyid ldan pas na// sprul pas don mdzad rnam par dag/ bzhi pa'i don nyid yin pa'i dbang // drang po mdo rgyud nyan pa'i dbang // bum pa'i dbang du yang dgra gsungs//
153a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa dam rdzas brten pa'i dbang // gsang ba'i dbang du yang dag gsungs// gsum pa nyams su myong ba'i dbang // shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// bzhi pa de rnams smin pa'i dbang // bden pa bzhi yi bye brag gis/
153a4(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes rnams ldan pa'o// de ltar rdzogs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// yan lag bzhi yi rang bzhin dang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs dang // cho 'phrul bzhi rnams ldan pas na// dgos don 'brel bar rab grub pa'o// rim pa gnyis dang
153a5(rnying rgyud): rab ldan zhing // brjod bya thams cad 'dus pa yin// lus kyi rtsa ni ji snyed pa// sum brgya drug cud ldan pa la// bdag po bcu drug bstan pa yin// de nyid gsum gyi bdag po lha// thabs dang shes rab bde chen rtsa// de ni rnam pa gsum
153a6(rnying rgyud): du 'du// bdud rtsi lnga yi dngas mabs// bdud rtsi lnga ni 'byung bar byed// de nyid bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ro// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin dang // kha dog lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// gyen dang thur du rgyu ba'i rlung // srog dang rtsol ba zhes bshad de//
153a7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa bcu pa gnyis su 'gyur// de yi 'byung ba'i rim pa yin// gsang ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// sngags kyi de nyid yang dag 'jug/ zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas pas// sems la dmigs pa thob byed de// gang du bslab par/
153b1(rnying rgyud): mtha'o// sngags kyi steng gang yin pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyis shes par byas// gang las sangs rgyas gnas gyur pa// de nyid gsang ba dam pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin// thun po rnams kyis mi mdza sa/
153b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams kyis de shes nas// yang dag don la zhugs pa yin// stong nyid ngo bor ye gnas na// tshad med bzhi yang zil gyis gnon/ 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni// ye shes chen po thob par byed// phyag rgya bzhi dang la
153b3(rnying rgyud): lag bzhi// de ltar chos kyi sku dang ni// thun mong mchog tu gsungs pa yin// de nyid sa bon bdag nyid pas// phra mo'i thig ler gnas par byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub chen po bla na med// sku gsung thugs//
153b4(rnying rgyud): su bdag sbyor bas// sngags la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// sngags la dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyis// stong nyid ye shes thob par byed// de bzhin gsang sngags sgom pa pos// brade chen 'khor lor rgyan bzhu nas// rim pa bzhin
153b5(rnying rgyud): du babs gyur te// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dag/ sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang // pad+ma rmag kha sbyor bas// tshangs pa'i bug kha srub nas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni thig le nyid du bzhag/ yang
153b6(rnying rgyud): na sngags la dmigs pa yi sa// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin drag/ gsang ba'i gnas su zhu bar byed// 'od zer rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi// byang chub sems ni zhu mdzad de// mi rtog ye shes skye bar byed// lus dang ngag dang sems
153b7(rnying rgyud): rnams ni// sngags la dmigs pa'i mtshan ma dag/ 'dar zhing skrag pa 'phar ba dang // bar snang dag la 'phyo bar byed// de nyid zhi bar gyur pa dang // khams kyi zas dang rnam bral te// bying rgod dbugs ni rab zhi nas// dal bar chub
154a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung gyur te// de nas drod tshad dang po ni// b+hig p+ta lta bu mthong ba dang // dru ba lta bu mthong ba dang // srin bu lta bu'i mtshan ma dang // mar me lta bu'i mtshan ma dang // nam mkha' bzhin du dngas pa ni/
154a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs na chos sku bde ba che// ye shes su mchog de nyid las// zla ba drug dang bcu gnyis dang // bco brgyad dag gis 'grub par 'gyur// gang tshe des kyang ma grub na// drag shul tshul gyis bsrub par bya// zhes sgyu mtshon po/ bdag
154a3(rnying rgyud): gis gsungs so// ji ltar blo ni dman gyur kyang // mi tshe 'di yis 'grub pa yin// gdon mi za bar the tshom med// ces smras pa'o// sgyu ma chen po'i thabs mchog ste// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// skyed pa'i zhing du rnam par grags/
154a4(rnying rgyud): dam pa gsang chen gyi rgyang chen po rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba las/ gsang ba'i man ngag mchog gi thabs chen po las man ngag gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das a la la nyo dpa' bo chen po

154a7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid bya ba ci lags/ ye shes bya ba gang las grub pa lags/ 'dus byas kyi dngos po gang lags/ 'dus ma byas kyi dngos po gang lags/ rdo rje bya ba gang lags/ phur pa bya ba ci lags/ de rnams kyi dngos po ci lags//

154b2(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so gsang ba'i bdag/ chos can rnam pa kun kyang nga // gzugs dang kha dog rnam pa nga// dbyibs dang ring bung rnam pa nga // kun rdzob

154b4(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cadang // chos kyi sku las ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas bya ba gud na med// mdor na gzugs su rnam gnyis ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang tsam mo// mtshan dang dpe byad 'dul ba'i chos// las dang dkyil
154b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor spros pa yis// rmongs pa 'dul ba'i dbang du bstan// mdor na ma dag sems can la// sangs rgyas sa dang myal ba'i gnas// sngo sor bstun kyang mthong ba med// 'dod cing chags pa'i sems can ni// yang dag don gyi
154b6(rnying rgyud): chos bsgrubs kyang // lha gnas gsum las yongs mi 'da'// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid do// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi yin no// de rdzogs rang byung ye shes ni// btsal mi dgos par rang la gnas/
154b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs na mngon sangs rgyas pa yin// sangs rgyas gzhan la dag mi lus// ma rtogs pa yi sems can ni// dmus long nyi ma lta bu yin// sems can sangs rgyas rgyu yin te// bya ba tsal med na 'khor ba'i rgyu// dper na ngo ma mar

155a2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor thams cad kyang // skas kyi rim pa ji bzhin du// sa dang lam la mi gnas na// sangs rgyas bya ba thob mi 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor thabs ldan gyis// bsal pa mang po dum ru// skas kyi rim pa bzhin dri bzod/
155a3(rnying rgyud): tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // lam dang sa la brtan byas nas// byung chub myur du thob pa yin// myur ma mdzad dang shAkya thug// ma 'ongs byams pa'ang de bzhin te// dper na dpa' bos mda' 'phangs pa// sa la lding ba'i gan

159a7(rnying rgyud): sadzubaban ba rgya / bang gA'i snyil la/ byan/ ba drug sem zhes byin kyis / de ba bzhin du brgyan par gyur// dril 'byong dbyin pa leg pa la// thabs dang she
159b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor te// yab skam pa rdzam sbyor ba la ste// 'bar lcogs pa bang bsrung do// bzhin pa thebs pa dang // bdun bum grangasan parjo me dkyis// d+ha ba'i skal brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i thugs ngam byung bskal ga
159b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' du phyin pa'i bsnyen pa'o// de nas yang kI la yas rang bzhin gyi bstod pa 'di gsungs so// khams gsum gdug pa bskal ba'i phyir// skyed gsum phur bu'i rtogs pa'i dab// tsham rngams gzi byin glog ltar 'bar// lag tu
159b3(rnying rgyud): titedril nas kyang // yum bzhi'i phyag rgyas bye na brlabs nas// dril bas khams gsum sgrol bar 'gyur// sring pa gsum yang gsal 'tsher na// khro bo'i phur pras rab brgyan te// khams gsum dbang du yang dag sdung // sang
159b4(rnying rgyud): pa gsum yang thabs shes bya// bskyod pa med pa'i ri rab kyis// mkha' yig tum zung bde bcu// lha yang rung ste myos brgyal nas// byang chub sems kyi phur bu yis// ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis rdzogs// mnyam pa'i rgyal
159b5(rnying rgyud): pos spags te bsgral// 'dzin chags thams cad rnam par grol// 'di ni byang chub sems kyi mthu// mA lus phur pa thebs shes bya// dpa' bo chen pos btul nas ni// shin du bsgral nas dgyes bstar te// zla byed kun la
159b6(rnying rgyud): bstab par mdzad// / gab+ha kha/ ta ha ha/ kha dr-i khA hi/ bsgrub pa dang bskyod pa 'di ni phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o// khro tshul 'jigs byed badz+ra kI la ya// sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad sde bo'i rgya mdud ni// srid
159b7(rnying rgyud): gsum ma lus dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa// ma skyes lhun gyis grub par gzi byin bskyed// rked brgya mdung bur drug ye shes drug/ chu srin kha dang sbrul gyi chun pos brgyan// ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang // 'byung ba yum
160a1(rnying rgyud): gyi sums sug tu byin paskyed// bur ba ni lcogs bzhi bro mo brgyad kyis ni// rnam shes tshogs brgyad dung khrod brgyad du sgrol// sdug bsngal brgyang poganas su bskyal nas kyang // bcu drug tom pa'i pho nyar ga
160a2(rnying rgyud): byin+ya bu skyed// rtse mo zlang gsum sku gsung thugs kyi drang // drug gsum 'khror ba'i btson go dul nas// lus ngag yid gsum bag chags gtan sbyangs nas// sa gsum zil gyis mnan pa'i gzi byin bskyed// maM bcom ldan gyis grub
160a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i kI la ya// zhi bas spa bkod rgyas pas zil gyis gnon// dbang gis mngon sum drag pos tshad gcod pa// gang la dmigs pa'i dgra bgegs drug par byed// kI lA ya yis mchod pa bzhes su gsol// zhes gsunges so//
160a4(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba las/ byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bstod pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kI la yi'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig gsang bdag phyag rdo rje
160a5(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba'i rdzas mchog dam pa la// rten 'brel nus pa'i rdzas mchog gis// btab na shin tu rlag par 'gyur// des na byug bdug brdeg dang gsum// gzhung lus 'byung ba dang yis smras// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas bstod pa'i
160a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po 'dis ched du brjod do// dIp+ta tsakra phur pa'i lha// dmar po gcer bu ral pa can// kun kyang khro bo chen po la// zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa skye// ral gri'i sgra la phur pa'i so// lte ba yan chad tshwas rnams ni// na bzang rdo
160a7(rnying rgyud): rje go chas gtams// lte ba man chad ches rnams ni// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// lcags kyi phur ba zur gsum pa// btab na lha yang rlag pa'i phyir// gnod byed bgegs
160b1(rnying rgyud): la smos ci dgos// kIl lamar yang Ta/ thug bdug brdeg pa'i sgo nas bskyod pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das spel pa'i bdag pangs/ sangs rgyas pacu gzugs kyis brtan pa/ spu mgon kun gyigan por byung ba/
160b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi mes por gyur pa/ sems can kun gyi sman par gyur pa de la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu/ dbyangs gcig gi blo nas bstod pa// zug rngu med pa'i sku gzugs pa// dur khrod
160b3(rnying rgyud): dpe byad kyis// sku yi dpa' bo khyod nyid la// su 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsung pa med pa'i nga ro yis// brjod pa thams cad sngags kyi tshogs// ha dang he dang b+h+yo dang rnga/ AM daM nga AHhUM gang gsungs pas//
160b4(rnying rgyud): 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs kyis ma bsams gcig kyang med// chos can chos nyid 'byed pa mkhyen// ri bo'i rdul dang rgya mtsho'i thigs// mya ngan 'das mkhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes gsol pas/ 'khor
160b5(rnying rgyud): la gzigs nas// ci yang mi gsung bar sku gsung thugs kyi dang la mi snang bar gyur to// de nas phyag na po rjes gsol pa/ bru cag khong 'dus pa rnams kyis/ kI la las gsungs pa 'di bcad bar bya'o// mchod pa la sogs 'brams
160b6(rnying rgyud): cad bya'o// ma 'ongs pa la phan par bya'o// de ltar byas na dus ma yin par 'jigs pa thams cad dang sems can rnams dpral lo// zhes gsungs nas 'khor rnams kyang mi snang bar gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyang rnam par rgyal ba'i
160b7(rnying rgyud): rtog pa/ bshad pa dang bshad pa'i man ngag/ thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa las kyang thun mong ma yin pa/ khyad par dang khyad par ma yin pa las kyang khyad par de/ dam pa gsang chen gyi rgyud rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba/ rnam par rgyal ba'i
161a1(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / rdzogs so// rgyagar gyi mkhan po dz+nyAn gar+b+ha dang / bod kyi lo sgrub parje por tsa nus bskur ba las/ khrus spyang gas bcad kyus phab pal// / si
161a2(rnying rgyud): rgya grar skad du/ badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA phyog tAn+tu kI la ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ phur ba rdo rje bkod pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/ dpal he dru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
161a3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rje tog min gyi gnas/ gru gsum mthi dra nag dbar ba mtha' dang dbus med pa/ yum gyi rta gar bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyang nga gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid/ byang chub
161a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ 'khor gyi tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas pas zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po bdag cag rnams la theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi don gcig tu zhu zhes
161a5(rnying rgyud): gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis zhus pa legs so// 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi don 'di ngas bshad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
161a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje khyod kyis nyon cig/ de lnga grub pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor byas/ yang dag pa'i don 'di shes par bya ste/ dam tshig dang / lha ba dang / spyod pa'i sgo nas/ thams cad bde ba chen po'i don la dgod par
161a7(rnying rgyud): bya'o// de la phur pa'i dam tshig ni/ skab mnyam par rtogs pa dang / spyod pa ci la yang mi snyoms shing // thabs kyis po la phan bzhed pa// de ni mtshig mchog tu gsungs// nga las 'das na ltung bar 'gyur
161b1(rnying rgyud): sa thung sgrogs na/ nam// nga gyu // 'a snang na// byangs ma tha'adas nga // sanas banam // ma ma ga pa
161b2(rnying rgyud): dbyer med mnyam pa de// de yi nga du thams cad 'dus// phurang pa zhes ni yang dag bshad// btsal du med pa'i chos nyid la// bsgom du med pa'i 'bras bu shwar// thams cad rang byung 'gag pa med// rgya dang rten la ma ltos
161b3(rnying rgyud): spros med dang byung ldan gyis grub// cu rkyen gnyis las mya ngan 'das// gdod nas ma bac+doMs ye nas grub// dus gsum dbyer med gcig par blta// srid pa gsum ni rang gi rkyen// byams gsum spos med dbyangs sug
161b4(rnying rgyud): tsad ye nus dpyir mi pas// slong gsumangs gsus tes 'thudzum// rang byung bye med dbyings su gcig/ de ni lba ba'i mchog yin te// lta ba de las 'das gyur na// 'khrul pas lum ni rnyed med byed// de la phur ba spyod nga ni/

161b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i dod rnams 'grub par bsam// sa 'du ba bar du ga rten pa daH// dasgrub pa'i rtags ni byung babyed// gang pa dasdigs pa'i dbo pa// gdab pa'i las rnams byas nas ni// rnam shes dbyings su yang dag thar// zhag ma lngal brta
161b7(rnying rgyud): bya// gzir mnan las rnams byas nas ni// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// de ni thob pa'i spyod pa'o// de la phur pa'i dmatshig ni// bsgrub pa de ni gtso byung // dam tshig don mnyams na// lba ba nyams kyang lhung ma 'gyur/
162a1(rnying rgyud): ba de dag mnyams na// stong pa nyams kyang ya ming // spyod pa de dag ma nyams na// dmigs pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su gsung thugs kyi rdza bkod pa'i rgyud lang / bldang
162a2(rnying rgyud): dang spyod pa mchog gi lde'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ phur ba khyud par gyi le'u ste 'di gsungs so// ma nor ma bcos chos nyid de/ brtul ba'i bsam pa kun las dngas// @
162a3(rnying rgyud): cad dbyed med mnyam pa'i dang // de bzhin nyid las byung bar 'phags// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid las// khyab dang ma khyab gnyis med de// kun tu srung las byung bar 'phags// btsal ba med pa'i chos nyid las// ma bskyod par na rnams cad thung /
162a4(rnying rgyud): d+h+ya tid las ni khyad par 'phags// btsal du med pa'i chos nyid las// bslab tu med pa'i 'bras bur shar// phu sa bkod ces de la bya// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid ni// phyogs dang ris la mi gnas shing // mtha' dang dazlas pa mi dmigs cing //
162a5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid le nas 'gyur ba med// grwazhal las khang las khya par 'phags// dbye med pa'i sems nyid rtse/ phung po kham pa dang rtse mched rnams// phyin sa byed me rdzogs sangs rgyas// phu pa dri la zhes de la bya// med migs pasum 'das
162a6(rnying rgyud): med dang // ma bcos smos pa med pa'i dkyil// sred med yongs la khyab pa'i 'khor// 'gyur med don rtogs mnyam pa'i dang // mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor las khyad daphags// dngos po med pa'i ye shes kyis// mtshan mang nga ba dbyings su/
162a7(rnying rgyud): gur pa bkod ces del bya'o// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes ni// btsal zhing bsam pas ma bskyed do// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa pa ni// sman drang don las khyad par 'phags// spros pa med pa'i chos nyid dang // btsal du med pa'i sem

162b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs ming bas ma 'das brjid dmed// bsnyen pa jal pas byung par 'bugs// dmigasas me pa'i sems nyid kyis/ thams paming rjo brtson dun// nya kyi'as byed par 'gas// khams pa la

163a3(rnying rgyud): btab// btab pa nyid na 'khor ba'i ming yang med// ma bcos ldan gyis grub pa'i dbyings nyid la// ye shes rig pa'i phur pa lenas btab// btab pa nyid na dngos po mtshan ma med// snang srid byang chub snying po'i ling+ga la// kun du bzang po'i rol pa'i
163a4(rnying rgyud): btab// btab pa nyid na sems tog yid las 'das// dngos par snang ba'i shes rab ledu la// rang byung thugs kyi rgyal po'i phung ba btab// btabang nyid na brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// de phyir dbyer med don rtogs mnyam pa'i dang // bya btsal med
163a5(rnying rgyud): par bzhag pas rba pa gad ba ces b+ha// de la chos nyid phur pa ni// chos can grangs yang ming tshigs shing // pa bcos dang du thams cad 'dus// phung ba zhes ni dal b+ha// de la sems nyid war pa ni// rtse mcheg thams lam gnas shing // rang byung
163a6(rnying rgyud): duthams cad 'das// srang pa zhes ni del bya// de la rnamam pa'i bung pa ni// mjog rtsib pa gnas shed// khwab gdal nga du thams cad 'dres// phung ba gis rji di la byang// de gsum dbyed med mya ngan 'das// dngos po mtshan mad mi snang zhing // bsam pa
163a7(rnying rgyud): myangan 'das// thams cad panas mnyamanyid las// klu dang 'bras burang bye med// btad 'dogs na lakhrul ba yin// mthang yang sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// de la grang bu'i man ngag ni// rba tad dgal mi gnas shing // btsal med
163b1(rnying rgyud): dngos po med// thams cad dbyed med byings su gcig/ 'khrul pa'i b+ha skad med yang med// bdag nyid phur pa'i rang bzhin las// gzhan du 'dogs pa 'khrul pa'i lam// grangs kyis bgrang drug la yod// chos nyid gcig tu gnus pa la//

163b5(rnying rgyud): 'das// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog nyid la gdab// phur ba dngos po kun dang bral// dngos med sems kyi phur pa yis// dngos po phyin ci log la gdab// gdab dang mi gang ba brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// phur pa skye ba med pa'i don// skye med
163b6(rnying rgyud): sre mos kyi phur pa yis// sems la btab pas rig pa shad// dbyings la btab pas lhun gyis grub// gnyis su med pa brdal ba'i dang // khyab gang la chen po'i phur pa yis// snad srid kun la khyab par gnas// de ltar rtogs na thebs pa
163b7(rnying rgyud): yin// mngon du gyur na rtogs pa yin/ tshig las 'das na sangs rgyas yin// grangs las 'das na brjod du med// gcig dang gnyis su dbye ru med// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ byang chub sems kyi
164a1(rnying rgyud): 'ang ste bzhe so/ smradenas pacog spyan 'das 'a gas ny-i pa rtsal panas pa nas dra ba dran na gyu nas stongs bu bags pa/ dgas soso/ thar pa'i dang bzhin pasams/ tham kyi kyi
164a2(rnying rgyud): zhes b+ha// pa ni tha ma chen por bstan// phur ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// ba ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// phur ni sgrib med pa yin// pra ni 'gag pa med pa yin// gnyis su med pa phur pa'i ngang // wA ni thabs kyi rgyal po yin// ba ni shes rab
164a3(rnying rgyud): yum gyi don// gnyis su med pa rdo DI'i dang // phur ba rnam mkhwa'i mtha' dang mnyam// phur pa byub gang la nyizla 'dra// kun la snyoms pa'i ngo bor snang // phur pa chos kyi chos nyid phyin// phur panam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin// phur pa sems kyi sems
164a4(rnying rgyud): nyid yin// phur ba rgyud kyi rgyal po yin// phur pa lung gi bla ma yin// phur pA man ngag nges pa'i don// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyang par bya// gang la dmigs pa'i ngo bo la// pho nya skad tshogs sprin ltar gtibs// dkar nag mtshams nas drangs nas ni

164a7(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed rgyal po'i sngang rdorje rtsa yi don la sgoms par zhugs nas/ baphyang ldan ma dang ro mchog ma// spyi byer 'phyang ldan shes rab ma// nga mchog ma ni thabs kyi ngos// spyi byed ma ni bus na gnas// rnam tog mi phyed phra gzugs ma// byang chub
164b1(rnying rgyud): si myas ni skye 'gyur te// gnas shing gzung 'dzin bral ba yis// mi bskyod rgyubs 'byung ldan ma// raka rgya bas ro mchog ma'o// shes rab thug pa ni// sri khyer mar ni dab tug sungs// mi phyed ma dang ga gzugs ma// bzang mo g.yas nA

164b4(rnying rgyud): spangs// yid na thams cad thabs nyid kyis// dngos po mtshan nyid rnams kyis brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa yi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
164b5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rdzasas dang lam gyi rim pa 'di gsungs so// de nas rjes su rnal 'byor pas// lam 'di dag lu god par bya// tshogs lam myong sa ma mthong ba'i lam// bsgrim lam dang nI rnam grol lam+b+ha// bcu gcig kun d+ha'o
164b6(rnying rgyud): sa// bcu gnyis pad+ma can gyis// 'khor po tshogs chen bcu gsum pa// kun bzung po cu bzhi pa ru grags// dang po'i sa ni rig 'dzin te// gnyis pa tshe la dbang rig 'dzin// kun rdzob phyag rgya'i drig 'dzin te// rtogs pa ldan grub rig 'dzin sgo
164b7(rnying rgyud): phra pa'i rang bzhin don rtogs pa// rigs dag tu ni rnam par bshad// las byas sgron gyi tshogs kyis so// las bdun byas pas spyod pa'o// de nyid bsgom pas mthong ba dang // 'byung ba lnga dang lha yi gnas// gdan dang bcos pa bskyed par bcwo /
165a1(rnying rgyud): sgog nyid ye shes rgyur byas pas// bdud bzhalas ni rnam par grol// dkyil 'khor gsum la stsogs mtshan nyid// phung por ma grub pa dang 'od// gong bu gnas dang 'chi bdag dang // ye shes nyon mongs med par sbyangs/
165a2(rnying rgyud): snadang srid dregs pa can dang ni// mi sdang bar bcas lha bdud bcom// nyes ldan srog gi dbang po dang // bdud bzhi drug dang sdong bde// gnas skabs dag la rab tu grags// dus dang grangs dang mtshan me'o// bsnyen pa drug tu yin par bshad/
165a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa las/ sa dang lAm gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes mi rtog pa'i don la snyoms par zhugs te/ stang srid drug cu rtsa
165a4(rnying rgyud): gsul bsgom// ye shes chos nyid yon tan su// srug srang thugs kyi rang bzhin 'dus// ya ba yum gnyis ni rang bzhin gnas// yum yang hUM 'dus ting 'dzin // sam+b+ha sad pa'i rtse dbus tr-i drangs la// ye shes snga bkag srogaHbrgyas/
165a5(rnying rgyud): rang nyid rtsa rgyu nang brgyad de// shangs kyi rlung sbom b+he la bton// sor bzhi phar 'phros tshur 'dus te// 'dus pa nyi zla'i dbus su 'od// a yi tshul du gnas bya'o// hU~M ldan oM gyis tshur 'dus pas// srid gsum 'gro ba dang sdang bzhin// sbyinang
165a6(rnying rgyud): skrod bcud de nyid de// sems dang yid dang rnam shes nyid// de nyid las ni 'khrul nas btags// rnam rtog bag chags spang pa'i phyir// bdag dang phud pa gzhal yas khang // byang chub sems ni gsum du bshad// dang por bdag gi byang chub sems//
165a7(rnying rgyud): ga'i pad+ma A bas ma ste// phar 'phros thams cad 'ong dubya// a ni mar me'i rtse ljar 'bar// gzung ba zla ba'i 'od ldar te// 'dzin pa'i rtsa rnams shin tu dmigs// yang yang de la yid kyis bsgom// 'phro bar gyur na spos te bsgom// bying par gyur//
165b1(rnying rgyud): na bzlas pa bya// gzung 'dzin 'gags pas shes rab gsal// nyi ma'i 'od zer tshul lta bur// de ni phur bu byang chub sems// a ni rang bzhin 'gag 'gyur te// a tshul mi dmigs nam mkha' ste// rang bzhin gsal la rtog pa med// gzung
165b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin shes kyis 'gags gyur na// gzhal yas byang chub sems zhes bya// gzhal yas phur pa bdag gis ni// byang chub sems ni srubacas pa'i// gnyid logasad pa ci bzhin du// ye shes rang bzhin skur grub pa'i// longs spyod
165b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs skur 'gyur zhes bya// ye shes rlung ste rlung 'od zer// snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor te// gzhal yas spru la yang des 'grub ste// ye shes pa dang rdo rje 'dzin// bcu gsum bgrod pa de yin te// de las sprul pa rim bzhin bkye// de bzhin
165b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyud las/ sa dang lam gyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes sras rigs kyi khro bo 'di ston te/ gru gsum mching
165b5(rnying rgyud): nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor na/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad sku mdog mthing nag la/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku smad phur bu'i tshul du/ zur gsum du bzhugs pa/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos shing / kI la ya mthing nag tu 'phros pas/
165b6(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang dmyal ba'i gnas thams cad stong shing zad par mdzad de/ zhe sdang thams cad dang rdo rje'i rigs su sangs rgyas par gyur to// shar zlu ma la 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi khro bo thams cad sku mdog spug nagazhal gsum
165b7(rnying rgyud): phyag drug pa/ smad drag po'i rang bzhin zur gsum du gnas pa/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos shi / kI la ya spug nag tu 'phros pas/ gti mug gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad stongs par mdzad de/ gti mug can thams cad de bzhin
166a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs su sangs rgyas par gyur to// sto sog kha gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rin po che'i rigs kyi khro bo thams cad su mdog ser nag/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ smad drag po'i rang bzhin phur bu zur gsum
166a2(rnying rgyud): du gnas pa/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos shing / kI la ya ser nag tu 'phros pas/ nga rgyal can gyi tshogs thams cad zad cing stongs par mdzad de/ nga rgyal can thams cad rin po che'i rigs su sangs rgyas par gyur to// nub zla ga ma gdengs pa'i
166a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du/ pad+ma rigs kyi khro bo thams cad su mdog dmar nag/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa s+ye/ su smad drag po'i rang bzhin phur ba zur gsum pa ste/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos shing / kI la ya dmar nag tu 'phros pas/ 'dod chags
166a4(rnying rgyud): kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad stongs shing zad par mdzad de/ 'dod chags can thams cad pad+ma'i rigs su sangs rgyas par gyur to// byang gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ las kyi rigs kyi khro bo thams cad su mdog ldang nag/ zha' gsum
166a5(rnying rgyud): phyag drug pa/ sru smad drag po'i rang bzhin phur pa zur gsum par gnas pa/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos shing / kI la ya ljang nag tu 'phros te/ phrag dog gis nyen pa'i sems can tham cad rtsad bcad ste/ phrag dog gi gnas stong tre/ phrag dog can thams cad pas
166a6(rnying rgyud): kyi rig su sangs rgyas par gyur to// sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur to// hrIHk+ta'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khyil ba nas/ keng rus ri rab chen po brtsegs pa'i steng // rdo rje brag che na gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// dur khrod chen po
166a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sus kyang ma byas ye nas tshad las 'das// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// dregs pa lha chen bsnol ba'i khri stengs su// nyi zla'i gdan bshams pad+ma ge sar bcas// 'jigs byed dpal chen tshogs
166b1(rnying rgyud): bcas bzhugs pa ni// ye shes tshad med sprul pa'i thabs mnga' bas// gang mo su gang la de bzhin slar snang zhing // ci la cis 'dul de bzhin cha lugs ston// thugs mtshan sna tshogs mtshon cha'i char 'bebs shing // gsung gi kI la ya yi sa sgrogs
166b2(rnying rgyud): 'brug stong ldir// rdzi bskyod stan thog me stag tshwa tsha 'phro// zhal gdang sa mche gtsigs dug gsum zhal du rngubs// mngag pa'i pho nya 'gug byed glog stong 'gyu// phrin las rnam bzhis log pa'i dgra bgegs 'joms// sbal pa'i phanyas
166b3(rnying rgyud): brjod dpung zil gyis gnon// drag po'i phrin las lhun gyis grub par mdzod// de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje gzhon nu/ dbu gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ zhabs rnam pa bzhir ldan pa/ g.yas ljang nag/ g.yon dmar nag/ dbus
166b4(rnying rgyud): mthing nag tu bzhugs pa/ g.yas dang po na rdo rje rje dgu pa bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na me dpung 'bar ba bsnams pa/ g.yas bar man rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang sta re dang tho ba thogs pa/ g.yon par ma na khaT+wAM dang thod dbyug deng lcags kyu'o// g.yas
166b5(rnying rgyud): tha mun phur pa/ g.yon tha ma na rbod gtong phra men gyi tshogs rnams te/ bya rgod dang / khyung dang / 'ug pa dang / pho rog dang / khwa bsdams pa'o// zhabs bzhi la gnyis brkyang gnyis bskum ste/ do skabs su bzhugs so// phu la bskul ba'i
166b6(rnying rgyud): me ri dang / glang po che'i ko rlon dang / sdug gi sham thabs dang / zhing chen gyi pags pa dang / thal ba'i tshom bu dang / zhag gi zo ris dang / khrag gi thig le'o// sbrul rigs lngas brgyan te/ rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs
166b7(rnying rgyud): dang / dmangs rigs dang / gdol pa'i rigs so// thugs rje chags pas khrag gi rgya mtsho la gsol ba'o// yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud pa/ g.yon b+han d+ha rak+Shas bkang ba
167a1(rnying rgyud): yab kyi nam ga/ sbrul dra thong chus kyis brgyan pa/ drog la / dpung can dang / mthur chu dang / stan cadang / sa mdas parnyan te/ thabs dang shas dbuganyis su mad pa d+ma bzugs so// de zhin gzha
167a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan rdo rje bkod pa'i chud las/ rigs kyi khro bo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/ zhe sdang rdo rjes chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te yab yum gnyis su
167a3(rnying rgyud): med par chags pa'i don la bskul te/ y-ib kyis bskul ba sa ma yA ho// yum gyis bskul ba snga ma ya s+t+rai rA go ha~M/ rA ga yA mi/ yab yum gnyis su med par gyur te/ padz+ra yo gI sa ma ya pra be shA yA phaT/ yab kyi byang chub sems yum gyi mkhar bang
167a4(rnying rgyud): te/ yum yang byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du gyur te/ lan cig 'bros pas khro bo 'tshol pa'i rang bzhin du gyur to// hU~M trA~M d+hi bi shwa kro b+hadz+wa la maN+Dal ta la ha la hrI phaT/ ces brjod pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams lhag gis khengs par
167a5(rnying rgyud): to// dur khrod kyi bdag po marbaM ka rU tra dang / a kar sha rU tha/ khathang ka ru tra rU tra la sogs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i kha log par bltas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bskal zhing rtsad bcad do// slar de dag thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga la bsdus te/ 'od
167a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ des phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can thams cad bsgral te/ de'i steng du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'thon te/ shar phyogs su khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum mda' bsnyems ma gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa zhabs bzhi
167a7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa'o// dur khrod chas kyis brgyan pa/ brgya byin gyi gdan la brgyad bskum du bzhugs pa'o// lho phyogs su khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po dang / yum dur khrod kyi bdag mo gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa'o// zhabs bzhi dang ldan pa/
167b1(rnying rgyud): sbal dung tha~Md rgyas kyis brgyan pa'o// na thob chog dpa la dang / gakya mig+sa snyasas / dbyag sa maHgadrug pa/ zhabs rnam pa stan pag// tshul drang tha~Md rgyas sa brtan pa'o// byang dus ba bdud cu 'phrul dang sa
167b2(rnying rgyud): mdzo rlung byin ma gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o// sgal dur khong chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// shar skyong khro ba byug pa sngon po dang / yumardo rdo sder mo gnyis su gyur te/ dbug sum phyag drug pa/ zha
167b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o// sbal dur khrod zas kyis brgyan pa'o// lho nub tu khro bo migayo mgon po dang / yum rdo rje gtun khung ma gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhi rlung lha pho mo brdzis pa/ sra la d+har khrod kyi chas brgyad
167b4(rnying rgyud): kyis brgyan pa'o// nub byang mtshams su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / yum rdo rje mda' bsnyem ma gnyis su gyur te/ dbugasum phyag drug pa/ zhabs pa ni rlung lnga pho mo 'i rdzis pa/ srul du ljid kyi chas brgyad kyis 'argyan pa'o// byang shar
167b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje gsod ma gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhi dbang ldan pho mo brdzis pa/ sbrul dur khyod chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// steng gi phyogs su khro bodz+ra kar dang / yu mdze
167b6(rnying rgyud): sgra 'byin ma gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhis nyi zla brdzis pa/ srul dur khrod chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'og gi phyogs su khro bo stobs po che dang / yum rdo rje snod byed mA gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa/
167b7(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhisas bdag brdzis pa/ srul dur khrod ches brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// yab kyi sbrul pa stag gi mgo can dang // g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / gzig gi mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can dang / spyang shi'i mgo can dang / se
168a1(rnying rgyud): ge'i mgocan dang / dos phyi mgo can dang / phrag gis gorgyan dang / dred kyi mgon s+ho// yu gyi sprul pa/ bya rgod kyi mgacan dang / bya gagi mgocan dung / thug par mgo can dang / khwa'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgos

168a3(rnying rgyud): hUM/ hUM hUM hUM d+hI hUM hUM hUM hU~M d+hI hUM/ zhes gsungs te nyid kyi mdun du 'khod ste/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la yA sarba big na nu ba~M hUM phaT/ ces gsungs pas/ sras mchog de dag dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ sgra smad zur gsum du gar te/ mdun na bka' sdod pa

168b5(rnying rgyud): AM badz+ra kro ta nI la daN+Da hU~M/ s+yAd ha da ha hU~M/ A~M badz+ra kro d+hi ta na bad+hi tra~M/ A~M b+hadz+ra kro ta ya mAn tA kA hUM pa tsar+dz+dza tsu hU~M/ A~M badz+ra kro d+hI sh+ma shwa na pa tI hU~M/ A~M badz+ra kro ta Ar+ya a tsa lA/ bi na d+ha b+han d+ha hU~M/ A~M badz+ra kro d+hI mu sa lI hU~M/ A~M badz+ra kro d+ha tA ya grI wa hUM hu lu hu lu Sh+Ta/
168b6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro d+hi tsaN+Da lI d+h+waM/ oM badz+ra kro ta A pa ri dzi tAn+d+hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI shA b+he tI hU~M/ A~M badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li druM/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi sa b+ha mi ta hUM/ A~M badz+ra kro d+ha tri lo kya bi dza ya hU~M bin d+ha bin d+hi d+h+waM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hid+b+ha d+ya mA ra Na hUM/
168b7(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+phoT s+pho Ta hUM/ A~M badz+ra krod+d+hi tsun+da ya ti hUM/ oM badz+ra sU ki ra mu khadz+ra dzAH/ badz+ra hUM ka shwa hu ka dza dzaH/ badz+ra b+hA g+h+ra mu kha dzaH/ badz+ra gr-i d+ha mr-i kha dza dziH/ badz+ra tsa ma ra mu kha dza dzaH/ badz+ra kha khyA mu khadza dzaH/ badz+ra ha ri Na mu khadz+ra da~MH/ badz+ra

170a2(rnying rgyud): bcen pan nas padz+ras// deskye bal bu bas // ngas smra gas ba/ ma pa banyi sus dug/ gshes / na ji ba da sa pa'i rnye 'i dugs /
170a3(rnying rgyud): 'byu dgis byed kyi rgyas pa ny-i dzis/ drug por sbyin sreg na sa stos byang gas te/ 'degasungs / de la byong byed ni// gam pa'o// dus su sa smram grag // gakye su ma cig so sod// rnga 'a rgyam mang rnams
170a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi sdes rnam par bcan// rdzi rje ma'i khor lo rdzi byas brgyad la// bA byams dngan gro zhing bsdus// phyi ma mthing dag me sa bskod// gdug bcan gyi ni rnams la// drag pa'i phyogs kyis btab nas su// dbus kyi gru gsum na du zhag// da mngon to dang ltung ga da /
170a5(rnying rgyud): du tod 'grogs pa du shong// gags mying la sogasapa// rag ni sadum du ma rang ni// spyan d+ha na zhag par byag// tsho du nim rji / sa kyi bya/ sprin gdu ma mas babyed// du ma na sa gdug/
170a6(rnying rgyud): brnams pa ste/ sman dung bskyed dang gnyi myed pa stim// las bcwol shin lasardzogs par bya// b+hAl sA la shes dbyel 'did byed// dbus su la m+bu bsum bskyed// 'dod mo dag 'a tho brnya byed// dris macig ga'i phyogs babyed pa// byams pa mchogs la bar dor//
170a7(rnying rgyud): ni nga phyug mdo// rang bathon kyil 'khong kun gyus pa// bkris dang mchang brjod pa sogs kyi// phrin las bcol ngang spyod pa dang // sngon ma da gsol shegs pabya// rdug ma ga kyi la yo // mi mchog gis// lung bshe sa chu sa
170b1(rnying rgyud): batheg pang me 'i gzhal las su// 'gro ba don du spyan 'dren na// byin gyis rlob b+h+ri gshegs sugs pa// da dzub ho// m-i ba tI li kI la las dza'i ldan pa d+hi paT praT+Ta s+thAs d+ha sa A gA r+b+ha la prA ba shu la pra be+e shu ya d+ha sh+'u ya two sha ya ya na ni d+hu bces spyan drungs so// oM ba mA ma/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa/
170b2(rnying rgyud): dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gaspyang thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ ngas gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di la/ rnal 'byor gang zhig dang
170b3(rnying rgyud): mos pa// dngos grub chen po rnyed nas kyang // rig 'dzin rgyal po'i sa thob nas// bcu gcig kun du 'od la bgrod// ngas gsung pa yi byed 'di la// gang zhig sbyar pa 'debs pa de// dus min pa du ni tshe zad nas// rludrung nag por skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje dmyal bar lhung nas kyang // bA pa'i dus med 'o nga
170b4(rnying rgyud): 'bod// slan chad sdom zhes smra bar byed// rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud 'di la// mi dang spong ba'i sems can de// gshin rje'i zhags pas bzung nas kyang // bdud kyis bla ma la btab nas ni// smyo 'bog nad dang brgyal ba dang // khrag gi nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// gsang sngag rgyud 'dri dag la yang // rnal
170b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor gang zhig dang mos pa// 'jig rten 'di yi yon tan yang // yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bzhin// 'jig rten phyi ma'i dngos grub kyang // su gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// thar pa bde ba'i 'bras bu yin// rig 'dri na sa la gdon mi za// skye 'grag med pa'i dngos grub kyis// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dngos
170b6(rnying rgyud): phung thob// dum tshig ga tsung mas rnyed par 'gyur// dge ba'i don la dga' ba dang // theg pa chen po lhur len cing // rdo rje slob dpon mchod byed pa// de ni dam chog mchog tu gsung // snying rje'i sems dang 'bral mi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo bkod pa'i rgyud las/ rjes su
170b7(rnying rgyud): gdams pa'i le'u ste pacwo lnga pa'o// // phur ba rdo rje bkod pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma thod phreng rtsal dang / lo tsA ba dpal gyi ye shes kyis bsgyur te/ mnga' bdag khri srong lde'u btsan gyi thugs dam du bzhag pa'o//
171a1(rnying rgyud): gsadus/ tu sa nga/ bskasas sa dang sa bya sa
171a2(rnying rgyud): ldad bdag gis thos pa dras gci na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sra nga gsung dang thug su ma rang bzhin yung kyai rtag la/ brjod bye kyang mil du'i yang shAn
171a3(rnying rgyud): gyis kyang mi yang pa 'i rgyal bzhing gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas dang 'khor gyi sas dasatshas pa dang thabs ceg tu rgyal ba mthang byin pa'i bzhugs phral/ byadu chen po'i rnam par byar pa'i nga bying seMn bzugs pa la 'odas te/ de bzhin ga shegs
171a4(rnying rgyud): kying 'dzin na par rol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtin gdo rnam par la pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgya 'dzi rnam pa ma pa dang / de bzhin ga sheg grus dza rnam par das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zag
171a5(rnying rgyud): doji rnam par rol pa dang / dri dag la sogs pan mam pa' dang myanyam pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa sa lus pa rnams da thabs cig tu bzhugs pa n+ti/ 'dim ste/ dbe kyil kyi go bzhid du sangs na sa zums cad kyis mkha dbyings yongs su tu
171a6(rnying rgyud): ra gyu s+ho// sa sa rgya gyi zhing ga rdul mam nyid sems dang khyod rdzogs du ma nga thabs cig tu bsngags pa de 'din rje/ rtsalas po 'i rjernam par ngos pa da/ sa rgyas yongs ji rnam par dal pa dang / rtsal snyas tshangs par spong pa
171a7(rnying rgyud): yang mi 'du/ rgyab ma ba 'angs ma 'o ba / tshal thas de 'i tshigs kyi gyi ma mibri pa rub myo bas kyi mi ming 'o 'a du ngadu
171b1(rnying rgyud): sras zhi pa'i tshig phun sum tshogs pa'i rdo rje rnam par rol pa dang / rgyal sa su gzung 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i rdorje rnam par rol pa dang / rgal sas bden pa'i bdud rtsi thob pa'i ngorjernam par rol pa dang / rgyal bas yang dag pa'i shes rab che pos du
171b2(rnying rgyud): brtas pa'i rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i tshogs te/ de dag ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dri ma kun tu dag pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rjes kun tu bstings pa'o// gzhan yang rdo rje gzhon nu'i rje tshan mang pos rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje tshogs dang gzhan yang rnal 'a
171b3(rnying rgyud): deng rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i tshogs dang / 'di ltar rlig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'khor dang sras btsun mor bcas pa'i sprin gyi tshogs mtha' yas pas rnam par 'khrigs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
171b4(rnying rgyud): yongs su 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po la/ rdo rje'i dam tshig gi mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis kun tu mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum sangs rgyas tha
171b5(rnying rgyud): cad kyi// ye shes rtse mor gyur pa las// dus gsum zhing du spros pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rol pa'i tshe// ye shes rtse mo las byung ba'i// bskal ba'i dam tshig bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed
171b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang phyug chen po 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyi nang nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdzogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i nan dang bcas te rang gi stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
171b7(rnying rgyud): g.yas phyogs nas lan du mar bskor te/ mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
172a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa 'i mdzad na/ du ring de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa mdzad pa'i don ci lags zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jig byed kyi dbang phyug chen
172a2(rnying rgyud): pos/ lag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje 'chang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rtse mo zhes bya ba/ gsang sngags kyi dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba zhes bya ba bshad par gsol ba btang
172a3(rnying rgyud): ste/ di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rgyas par ma bshad/ ma 'ongs pa na yang 'chad par dkon pa'i theg pa chen po 'di bshad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang skrag par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpang gzhan
172a4(rnying rgyud): rnams dang / 'khor phal po che ci spos/ de'i phyi dang ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i phyir/ rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyang the tshom skye ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'di nyid kyis gdul bar bya ba'i dus kyi phyir ro// zhes gsungs so//
172a5(rnying rgyud): nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis kun tu mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni las kyi mchog go// 'di ni dus la bab pa'o// theg pa 'di ni rdo rje'i
172a6(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po rnams kyi mchog go// gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba'i yang gsang ba'o// thabs 'di ni thabs kyi mchog go// rol pa chen po'i yang rol pa chen po ste/ bdag cag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / rmad du gyur pa dang / the tshom thams
172a7(rnying rgyud): cad dgum pa'i spang nyid du slo bar mchi ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de yongs su bshad du gsol// zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du bshad par gsol ba btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung nga gsung dang
172b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po zhing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la rdo rje'i spyan gyi 'od zer gyis dag par mdzad do// 'di
172b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'od zer 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba'i ded dpon las mthu mnyam pa brtson par gyur to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzigs nas don gnyis 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyis reg
172b3(rnying rgyud): par mdzad do// de dag kyang thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje rnam par che ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snod du byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sprul pa'i tshogs dpa'akhor du bcas pa la gzigs nas/ kun tu bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i
172b4(rnying rgyud): zer gyis reg par mdzad do// de dag kyang tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de nas gti mug gnas kyi theg pa rnams la gzigs nas/ theg pa chen po ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyis rig par mdzad nas/ de dag thams
172b5(rnying rgyud): cad kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba thob par gyur to// de nas 'gro ba drug gi grong khyer pa rnams la gzigs nas/ lam gcig pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyis reg par mdzad pas/ de dag kyang reg na dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob
172b6(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag pos/ rdo rje 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhe sdang gtan du gsod pa'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // hUM de nas bcom
172b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag pos/ 'khor lo 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gti mug gtan du gsod pa'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // AM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i
173a1(rnying rgyud): bdag pos/ drin po che 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i rkang nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ngaN+Dalag tun dun sod pa'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo na rnams las phyung // wA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sa
173a2(rnying rgyud): bdag pos/ padz+ra rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'dod chags gtan du gsod pa'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // AM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag pos/
173a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phrag dog gtan du gsod pa'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // d+hU/ 'di dag gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas kyi
173a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs du ma la/ 'di lta ste/ la la ni zha ba'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni rgyas pa'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni dbang gi rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni drag po'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni rdo rje'i rigs lta bu/ la la ni drin po che'i rigs lta bu/ la la ni pad+ma'i rigs
173a5(rnying rgyud): lta bu/ la la ne las kyi rigs lta bu/ la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lta bu/ la la ni yab kyi rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni yum gyi rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni sras kyi rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni 'khor gyi rang bzhin lta bu/
173a6(rnying rgyud): lA la ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni chom bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dang bzhin lta buM/ la la ni sangs rgyas gcig gi rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni legs pa'i blo gros kyi rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni rdo rje 'gro ba'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni 'khor lo 'gro/
173a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i nga bzhin na bu/ la la ni rin po che 'gro ba'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni ba dra 'dro ba'i dang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni tham 'phro ba'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni su yi rang bzhin lta bu/ lal ni gsung gi dang bzhin sa bu/ la la ni thugs kyi rang bzhin lta bu/ la la ni mchod rten gyi rang
173b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin lta bu/ la la ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta ba/ la la ni thig le'i rang bzhin lta bu/ la pa ni 'od zer gyi rang bzhin lta bu/ de ltar thams cad kyi rang bzhin lta bu srid pa bsum yongs su gtams pa ni 'di ltar/ dper na yungs dbu mar /
173b2(rnying rgyud): ba'am/ til gyi gang bu bzhin du cho 'phrul chen po des rnam par gtams par gyur/ rgyas par gyung / yongs su khyab par gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag pos/ 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs pa'i mod la 'jig rten thams cad
173b3(rnying rgyud): g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ dur rdur / rab tu 'ur 'ur / kun tu rab tu 'ur rung / che mchim/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu cher chem/ shig shig/ rab tu shig shing // kun tu rab tu shig shig/
173b4(rnying rgyud): gtor / rab tu gtor gtor/ kun tu rab tu gtor ro// de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i stong khams nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa dbang phyug tsho ba/ gzi brjid cher 'bar ba/ degs pas rgyags pa thams cad brgyal bar gyur
173b5(rnying rgyud): nas/ 'di ltar myos pa dang / dang ngas pa dang / skrag pa dang / spu zing ba dang / 'gyel ba dang / brgyal ba dang / mig gdangs pa dang / sbar mo 'thams pa dang / dbugs su bas nas ma 'thon pa dang / lus la rdul 'bab pa dang /
173b6(rnying rgyud): skams pa dang / byed pas brgyal ba la sogs pa'i bar du ste/ de dag nyon mongs pa cha phra bar byas nas byin gyi dra brlabs te dbang thob par byas nas/ rdo rje'i theg pa'i snod du byin gyis brlabs te/ gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ming so sor btags nas rnal
173b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor gyi gral du bkod do// de bzhin du 'gro ba drug po ma lus pa yang rdo rje'i theg pa'i snod du byin gyis brlabs pa'i bar du'o// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po las/ gsung gi cho 'phrul rdo rje'i rnal 'byor a la la zhes thags pa'i ya mtshan
174a1(rnying rgyud): kyisma na ma mkha' mthongs na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi spyod yul du grags par mdzad do// ngan song gi sde gnas la sogs pa thams cad kyang rnam par grol nas rdo na'i rnal dbyang rtsa ba la phur dzad do// nganam
174a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pa'i sprul pa dang bcas pa rnams chos bzhin du langs nas/ cho ga bzhin du mchod de 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi sa bon sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rol pa 'di/ sangs
174a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis thams cad du gsungs kyang / cho 'phrul chen po dang / byin rlabs chen po dang / mthu chen por 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'di ltar cho 'phrul thams cad pa
174a4(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pas/ rdo rje dam tshig gis don tu chen po babyes so// bdag cag kyang mngon par 'dud do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pas 'di skad ces mgrin gcig tu gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas chen
174a5(rnying rgyud): po'i sgra// thog ma med pa'i 'khor lo yis// bla ma med pa'i 'khor lo gcod// gti mug chen po a la la// e mgo bde gshegs gsang ba'i gsung // thog ma med pa'i pad+ma yis// tha ma med pa'i pad+ma skem// 'dod chags chen po
174a6(rnying rgyud): a la la// e ma ho bcom ldan rgyal ba'i thugs// thog ma med pa'i rdo rje yis// tha ma med pa'i rdo rje 'joms// zhe sdang chen po a la la// i mdo sangs rgyas yon tan rdzogs// thog ma med pa'i rin chen gyis// tha ma med pa'i rin chen 'dren// nga rgyal chen po a la la// e
174a7(rnying rgyud): maho bcom ldan mdzad pa che// thog ma med pa'i sna tshogs kyis// tha ma med pa'i sna tshogs 'joms// phrag dog chen po a la la// byang chub sems kyi rol pa che// thams cad rgyal phyag 'tshal lo// 'bras bu che la mngon par 'dud// kun bdag
174b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse ma zhes bya ba de rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rdong nus mkha'i zla gros gas rab rnam par bkod pa zhes kya de
174b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje khro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje thos pas zhe sdang ga
174b3(rnying rgyud): sngon po 'bar ba ni// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang // snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che khro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs
174b4(rnying rgyud): khros pas nga rgyal gcod// 'od chen sngon po 'bar ba ni// nam mkha'i dkyil nas rigs pa shAr// lte ba'i go ru bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo khro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs
174b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo khros pas gti mug gcod// 'od chen nag po 'bar ba ni// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// klad pa'i go ru bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma khro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsu
174b6(rnying rgyud): so// pad+ma khros pas 'dod chags gcod// 'od chen dmar po 'bar ba ni// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shad// mgrin pa'i go ru bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs khro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
174b7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// sna tshogs khros pas phrag dog gcod// 'od chen ldang gu 'bar ba ni// nam mapa'i dkyil nas thigs pa shad// rkang pa'i go ru bsgom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba zhes kya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
175a1(rnying rgyud): na ba byugs nas/ 'di ska nas gsungs so// brdzang rje dmatshig ni// thesnang margyu po ting 'don te/ rdul 'byor chen po'i dzini yis/ na mongs rtags dpar bya// gtim gdang 'dam chog ni// tu
175a2(rnying rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin te// rnal 'byor chen po'i 'khor lo yis// gti mug 'khong le gsad par bya// nga rgyal rdo rje'i dam tshig ni// nga rgyal chen po'i ting 'dzin te// rnal 'byor chen po'i rin chen gyis// nyon mongs nga rgyal gsad par bya// 'dod chag
175a3(rnying rgyud): chen po'i ting 'dzin te// 'dod chags rnal 'byor chen po yis// nyon mongs 'dod chags gsad par bya// phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig ni// phrag dog chen po'i ting 'dzin te// rnal 'byor rdo rje rgya gram gyis// nyon mongs phrag dog gsad par bya// de nas
175a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byams pas bskal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// byams pas bskal ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer
175a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das snying rjes bskal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// snying rjes bskal pa'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas nas// rnam par
175a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' bas bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nus/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dga' bas bskal ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad tsang mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes
175a7(rnying rgyud): gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rje bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das btang snyoms kyi bsgral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// btang snyoms bskal ba'i dam chog ni// gsad cing

175b2(rnying rgyud): dzajigazhon nu'i rig 'don nga // 'khor lo gzhon nu dag 'dzin dang // rin chen pa 'dzin // badz+rag kun nung ga 'dzin dupa// las kyi gzhon nu'i 'dzin la sogs pa du sa'i tshogs kyis/ mig
175b3(rnying rgyud): lahA wAs te/ rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar nas 'di skyed ces gsol to// de nas rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ste// dang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro ba mi bzad pa/

176a1(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams g.yo bar gyur to// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rnga ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rjer grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phyur ba yin/
176a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes khro bor 'grub par mdzod// de nas 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'khor lo gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa 'khor lor 'grub mdzad cig/ srid pa 'khor po zhur
176a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha// ye shes khro bor 'grub par mdzod// de nas rin po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// rin chen gzhon nu'i reg 'dzin rnams// srid pa rin chen 'grub mdzod cig/ srid pa/
176a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bor 'grub par mdzod// de nas pad+ma'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs du ma'i 'khor gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// pad ma gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa pad mar 'grub mdzod cig/
176a5(rnying rgyud): srid pa pad ma phud pa'i lha// ye shes khro bor 'grub par mdzod// de nas ral gri'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sna tshogs gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa ral grid
176a6(rnying rgyud): 'grub mdzod cig/ srid pa ral gri phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bor 'grub par mdzod// de nas rig 'dzin dang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje de bzhin

176b1(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM aN+Da ya tI rab/ ya mA ya ti ba/ ku ba dA ya ti rab/ a r+tha ye tI dang / d+hid+har+d+ha ya tA ba/ bA ya be ti ba/ I sha nA ya te rab/ swa d+ya \u0f7fN+Da ya tI rang /
176b2(rnying rgyud): pa ta ye ti baM/ badz+ra dza~M dzaM/ rdo rje brag gis rnam par bkod pa'i phyi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ma hA de wa tI ra baM/ dargyab rnam par bcag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'di dag gsungs pa'i mod la ni// khams gcig gi bdag po dang / khams/

177a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// badz+ra kro d+hA ya mthug hU~M/ bcab tsa pa na tha mtshol dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mag ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms pas byags das
177a2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// skye badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+tha a tsi la hU~M/ bani d+hi phan d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje phye ba la rnam par dbang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das te skad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
177a3(rnying rgyud): 'di sad ces gsungs so// badz+ra bo d+ha nya la grI badz+raM/ chu wA hra lA b+h+rU~M phaT/ rdo rje chos la dbang ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa kun tu 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs nas/

177a5(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ ts+tshin da ts+tshind hU~M phaT/ rdo rje las la dbang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par thal ba'i ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
177a6(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas// 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM badz+ra gr-i d+ha trai l-i kye ba~M dza ya hUM/ d+hi nad b+hin hU~M phaT/ rdo rje'i sems smon lam bde ba dam pa la kun tu rol pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rtobs/

180a2(rnying rgyud): nas kya ting nga 'ang to// de nas bcom ldan das deni sde slong gi mi shes 'byung bzhes byab ti 'dini ma rnams par nugs nas/ 'ad da ces gas son// brdzun pa las cing / de rjeg so sa'i gang 'byo ba zhes bya ba 'ang 'dos /
