180a4(rnying rgyud): drirnam byung ba'i// de ltar gyis 'jug rnam gnyis te// rdo rje mthu li rgyal gyis ni// sprul pa las kyang sprul pa 'phel// ji bzhin dkyil 'khor ma yin pa// thams cad yod par mi srid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ye shes 'gro ba zhes bya
180a5(rnying rgyud): ze'i 'dzin pa na par bzhed nas/ rdo rje 'grags pa zhes bye ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// badz+ra ma hA shang \u0f7f/ rdo byams pa chen po'i ting nga 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das don cing ba zhes
180a6(rnying rgyud): za ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// badz+ra pA shatrUM/ rdo rje snyid rje chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di
180a7(rnying rgyud): sring ces gsungs so// badz+ra mr-i rba ba~M/ rdo rje dga' ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// da nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// badz+ra ka te hoH// rdo rje bta
180b1(rnying rgyud): snyoms chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor phan chad nas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor tshun chad du// dkyil 'khor kun gyi thun mong pa// cung zad dag gi khyad par gyis// sangs rgyas yul du grags pa yis// gang
180b2(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa la thob pa che// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mthu chen pos nam mkha'i dbyangs dang / rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang 'khor lo dang / rgya gram la sogs pas sgra phyung nas tshigs su bcad pas/ 'drar ring
180b3(rnying rgyud): khro bo rnams la gsol ba btab pa/ srid pa phur bur bslab pa dang / dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos
180b4(rnying rgyud): grub stsol// ces bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bas/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang 'khor lo dang / rgya gram dang phur bu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid me tog gi char du babs par gyur/ sa'i dkyil 'khor yang g.yo bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/
180b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rig 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du ma'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu 'bar ba'i khro bo rnams la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// srid pa phur bur bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo
180b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la pa yi dngos grub sgrol// ces brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ rang bzhin gyi gnas thabs dang shes rab kyi
180b7(rnying rgyud): dngos po dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bde ba chen po las byung ba'i bdag nyid/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo/ yab sras btsun mo dang bcas pa rnams g.yo bar mdzad par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /
181a1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po 'dzum pa mdza pang gyur to// de'atsha 'khor du nas gsang ba'i bdug pa deni thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'khor de'i nang nas langasaH/ de bzhin ga shes
181a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad la rdo rje'i mchod pa chen po byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ de ring bcom ldan 'das 'dzum par mdzad pa'i don ci lags/ sa
181a3(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// lag na rdo rje 'chang 'di lta ste/ 'di na 'dus pa'i tshogs ni du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i rig 'dzin 'ba' zhig go// / de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ la la ni klu yi rig 'dzin
181a4(rnying rgyud): la la ni gsung gi rig 'dzin/ la le ni thugs kyi rig 'dzin/ la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin/ la la ning skar gyi rig 'dzin/ la la ni ma 'ongs pa'i rig 'dzin/ la la rdo rdo rje'i rig 'dzin/ laM la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig
181a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin/ la la ni rin po che'i rig 'dzin/ la la ni pad+ma'i rig 'dzin/ la la ni las kyi rig 'dzin/ la la ni rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'don/ la lA ni rdo rje hU~M chen po'i rig 'dzin/ la pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i reg 'dzin/ la la ni rdo rje dbus pa
181a6(rnying rgyud): sngon po'i rig 'dzin/ la la ni rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed kyi rig 'dzin/ la lan rdo rje mi g.yo mgon gyi rig 'dzin/ la la ni rdo rje rta skad kyi reg 'dzin/ la la ni rdo rje pha rol gyis mi thub pa'i rig 'dzin/ la la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi thig le'i dge 'dzin/ la lu ni rdo rje
181a7(rnying rgyud): khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin/ la la ni rdo rje stobs po che'i rig 'dzin no// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos rig 'dzin gyi tshogs kyis/ rang rang gi rnal 'byor gyi dam tshig rnams la gsol ba btab po// de nas rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'din
181b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu gsal ba btab pa/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i dam mig gis// srid pa war bur bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos su bzung ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs sugasal// khwa na tshan gshegs nas kyang // rtag dang mtshan ma
181b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// ces gsol ba btab pas/ de nyid kyi mod la srid pa thams cad rdo rje gzhon nu'i ye shes skad cig ma'i bdag nyid du 'di man chad kyi yur bur shar to// de nas hUM na po'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces
181b3(rnying rgyud): gsol ba btab po// rdo rje hUM gi dam tshig gis// srid pa phur bur bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la pa yi dngos
181b4(rnying rgyud): grub stsol// ces gsol ba btab pas/ de nyid kyi mod la srid pa thams cad rdo rje rje chen po'i ye shes skad cig ma'i bdag nyid kyi phur bur shar to// de nas rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// rdo rje rnam
181b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig gis// srid pa phur bur bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// ces brjod pas
181b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid kyi mod la srid pa thams cad rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes skad cig ma'i bdag nyid kyi phur bur shar to// de nas rdo rje dbyug pa chen po'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// rdo rje dbyug rgyal dam tshig gis// srid pa
181b7(rnying rgyud): blar bur bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub byung ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// ces brjod pas/ de nyid kyi mod la

182a4(rnying rgyud): dam tshag gis// sri pa thang byang bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang sa thu bla ba byu// ye shes thab gshegs su gsal// chu ba zan pa ga shegs rnas // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // snre la la yi dngas bu bsgom// thimi badza dang
182a5(rnying rgyud): nganyid kyi mod la srid pa thams cad rdorje mig yo ba'i ye shes skad cig ma dug nyi ge thung bar shad // de nas kyi ta na kyi shes ska jig ma'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams pashin gcig tu 'di skad rjes gsol ba btab ba~M// de na
182a6(rnying rgyud): gas// sred pa phur bur bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro ba gshegs su gsol// khro ba chen pogashegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la la yi dngos grub rtsol// rjes brjod papa/
182a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid kyi mod la sring pa thams cad rdo rje rje skad kyi ye shes skad cig me'i zur bu'i bdag nyid du sha to// de nas rdo rje pha ros kyis mi thub pa'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// ji jig zhan rgyal nga mchog gis// hrI
182b1(rnying rgyud): pa thung bung sgrub pa dang // dbang dang nga mthu thung ba byed// ye shes thab gshegs su gsal// da tsun gshugs dus byung // rtags dang nus bstan pa dang // tshal la la ngas pa 'astsal/ rdzas brdud pas/ nga nyan rtsa da na/
182b2(rnying rgyud): srid pa thams cid rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phur ba'i ye shes skad cig ma'i bdag nyid du shad to// de nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i thig la'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs dums mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol babatabya'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dam tshig bris// srid par
182b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// ces brjod pas/ de nyid kyi so ma srid pa thams cad
182b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bdud ci'i thig le'i phur pa'i ye shes skad cig ma'i bdag nyid du shar to// de nas rdo rje khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs rngams 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// khams gsum rnam rgyal dam chol gris// sred pa
182b5(rnying rgyud): bur bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos pab byung ba'i phyir// ye shes mo po gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nus kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // nI la la yi dngos gru' stsol// ces brjod pas/ de nyid kyi mod la srid
182b6(rnying rgyud): thams cing rdo ma khams gsasum pa'i bdud rtsi'i phung ba ye shes skad cig ma'i bdag nyid du sha to// de nas rdo rje stobs po che'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// rdo stobs kyi mtshogagis// sred pa phung bur bsgrub pa

183b7(rnying rgyud): mi mas par thugs nis/ ba dun cang pa gnas pa zhes bya ba gsang thugs 'don du spang gsung dang zugs rnarnams las byung // sarba An ma b+h+yabaT/ ta thA ma ta ma dz+dzaH/ mthe'athag pa zhes thab ting 'dzinan// danas
184a1(rnying rgyud): btsam ldan 'das ngan ba tus drang zad pa dang / nga ma pa gdang sa byugs thab shing ba da pa sgoms do lathags nas/ yeshes kyi thAng bsgrubanal pa gsang sngags 'disha skang gzung da zla dang tus pas rgyan /
184a2(rnying rgyud): baN+Di la zh-i / hrInAM/ bawa Ta phaT/ badz+ra la k+Sha kr-i m+ba ga / gagag/ b+he dzAH/ phaT 'thasas/ lus dag gtan na namya pa gnam pa zhes pa pa'i ting dzinate// denas bcwo ldan 'das thams cad rang bzhin gyi ga gas
184a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ brnag pa chen po'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kA li kI la la/ kI li kI la ya/ kIlI kI lA ya/ kI li kI la ya/ kI li kI la ya/ kI li r-I la ya/ tI'aM rnaM la
184a4(rnying rgyud): ya/ kA li kI la ya/ kI li kI la la/ k+ShI laM kI lA yA/ k+ShI li kI la ya/ kI la k+Shi la ya/ k+ShI li k+ShI la ya/ k+Shi li k+ShI lay+YA/ k+ShI l-i kA la ya/ kI li kI la ya/ k+Shi li kI la ya/ kI li k+She pa ya/ k+She 'i k+She la ya/ k+Shi pi k+She la ya/ kI li k+Shi la
184a5(rnying rgyud): ya/ rnam par gzhom pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i do na gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas/ skyo ba dang bsdu ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams pas
184a6(rnying rgyud): brang Sh+T+rIk+Sh+Na hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ mngon stong chen pos rnam par bsad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi bdag po rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gsum dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gas sngags
184a7(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams pas byung ngo // oM AHtrAM/ thams cad su dang gsung thugs rdo rje rnams rang grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus so so'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs du la'i 'khor du bcas pa rnams kyis phyogs brgya
184b1(rnying rgyud): gcigaga'ab rab 'thab la mngan myong byigasal ba mam na gcig tu sangs nas thams cad byachags lugasal ba btab par// thang chub ma ga zus mas 'grad kya// dus gsus bangs cu gdung 'thob // dag 'angad ba dag cag nams pan// /
184b2(rnying rgyud): cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgags// bdud dang bar drugacong pa'i bgegs// dngos thab 'phrog cing 'tsha ba rnams// chu ba can pa'i byon rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bklag nas// mngon stong tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // las ngag dung
184b3(rnying rgyud): bdag nas kyang // thug bsngal rnams su myong bar mdzad// de nas so so'i rig 'dzin rnams// rang rang gi rigs du ma dang bcas te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsal ba 'de bsas// de nas nga rnga phrar ba'i rig 'dzin rnams pas/ rang gidags
184b4(rnying rgyud): ces gsol ba btab po/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // rdo rje phur bu'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang 'gegs// bdud dang bar dgacod pa yi// dngos zab 'tshig ce
184b5(rnying rgyud): blarnams// kun can pa'i byin rlabs kyis// lung tsam gyis na di rabajug nas// mngan kyang tshul bzhin bsngal ba dang // lus ngag du la ban gnas kyang // drug pa pa la gams snakyang bar 'dzad// de na sa 'khor lo 'phrar ba'i ngag 'dzin rnams
184b6(rnying rgyud): gyis/ rang gis rigs rnams la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab ba// byang chub ma chag tu sems bzhud cing // 'khar lo phur ba'i gdang 'tshab pa'o// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dag dang bgegs// bdud da dashA nga
184b7(rnying rgyud): gtsad pa yi// dngos kra'i 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// khro bo chen po byin rlabs kyis// yung tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul dubashig nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su drang bar mdzod/
185a1(rnying rgyud): de nas rin po che'i phur ba'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis/ rang gi rigs la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab // byang chub mchag tu sems bskyad cing // ngan chen phrang bya'i gtung 'thob pa'i// rig 'dzin dag cag rnams pan/
185a2(rnying rgyud): gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon myod tshul bzhin brgal ba dang // yum dag rdul du
185a3(rnying rgyud): bshig nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// de nas pad+ma'i phur bu'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis/ rang gi rigs la 'di skad ces gsol ba btang ngo // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // pad+ma phu bu'i gzung 'a tsho ba pa'i// reg 'dzin bdag
185a4(rnying rgyud): cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin barmal ba dang //
185a5(rnying rgyud): lus ngag rdul dub rlag nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// de nas phrin las phur pa'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis// rang gi rigs la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // phrin las phu bu'i gdung 'tsho ba
185a6(rnying rgyud): rnams// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsas kyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin
185a7(rnying rgyud): bskal ba dang // lus ngag rdul du brlag nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// de nas phyogs bcu'i khro bo'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis/ rang rang gi rigs la 'di skad ces mngon spyod kyi gsal ba bta po// da yang rje zan po'i ngag 'dzin rnams kyis//
185b1(rnying rgyud): rang gi rigs pa 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// byang chub mchog tu sems bzud cing // dza d+ha rgyal gdung 'jo ba pa'o// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams ldan// gnod cing gadrug pa 'das dang bgags// badrad dang bar dug cad pa'o// dngas ba
185b2(rnying rgyud): cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang // zug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin mtshogs
185b3(rnying rgyud): du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas/ rang gi rigs kyi lha la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // rdo rje rnam rgyal gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang
185b4(rnying rgyud): bar du gcod pa yi// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// khro ba chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul du brlag nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su rkyong bar mdzod//
185b5(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje dbyug pa chen po'i rig 'dzin du ma'i tshogs kyis/ rang gi rigs kyi lha la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // rdo rje dbyug chen gdung 'tsho ba pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams pa ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i
185b6(rnying rgyud): dkrung nga bgrags// bdud dang bar du gcod pa yi// dngos khyab 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir khug pa// mngon myod tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // lus ngag dul du bshig nas kyang // stug pasngal nya
185b7(rnying rgyud): su myong bar mdzod// de nas rdo rjegashin rje'i rgyal gyis rig 'dzin gyi tshogs du ma dang bcas pas/ rang gi rigs kyi lha la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // rdo rje gshin kyal gdung 'tsho ba pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag
186a1(rnying rgyud): cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgags// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos grub 'phrog cang 'cha ba rnams// khra bra man po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkrug nas/
186a2(rnying rgyud): mngon spyod rgyal bzhin bskul ba dang // lus ngag rdul rngub shig nas kyang // drug brdal nyams su myong bar mdzod// de nas rdon mi gas pa'i rigs kyi tshogs du ma dang bcas pas rang gi rigs kyi lhal 'di skad ces gsol btab pa// thang zab mag
186a3(rnying rgyud): sems bapyang cing // mig ya rdo rje'i gdung 'tshob pa'o// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa yi// dngos sug 'phrog ci nga che rnams// wa rba chun pong byed rlabs kyis/
186a4(rnying rgyud): yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // lus ngag rdul du ba shig nas kyang // skrag bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// de nas rdo rje rta skad kyi tshogs du ma dang bcas pas/ rang gi rigs kyi lha la 'di skad ces gsol
186a5(rnying rgyud): ba btab po// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // rdo rje ta skad gdung 'tsho ba pa'i// reg 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgags// bdud dang bar dra gcod pa dang // dngos kyab thog ci dang tshang rnams// khro bo
186a6(rnying rgyud): chan pa'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// de nas rdo rje gzhan las rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs du ma dang bcas pa
186a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis/ rang gi rigs kyi lha la 'di skad ces gsal ba btab po// byang chub mchag khrisems paskyed cing // rdo rjem tha ma gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin padag cag rnam papa ni// gnod cing gdug pa gra dang gags// bdu ga pa bca
186b1(rnying rgyud): dang bsgrub kyang brgya mas/ napa thun pas byas// u sa thas na 'dar ba nas// man kyang rngub san bsgral ba dang// sgyus dag da la nub shu zlus kyang // sdug pa gagasas rgya ba nga da// da
186b2(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi thin ma'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs du ma dang bcas pas// rangags rigs kyi wA la 'di skad ces gsal ba btab hU~M// byang chub mchog tu mams brgyad cid// rdo rje bdud cing gdung 'thob pa'aM// reg 'dzin bdag cag rnams pa ni// ni rnaM
186b3(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i dgra dang gags// bdud dang bar dragatsad pa yi// dngas grub 'phrog cang 'argya ba rnams// khwa ba rgyan po'i byin nabs kyis// ud tsam gyis ni 'dir bcag nas// mngan skyong rgyal bzhin bskal ba dang // was gzul du bshag nas kyi/
186b4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal nyams su myang bar mdzod// de nas rdo rje khams gsus rnam par sprul ba'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs d+ha ma dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu rang gi rigs kyi sbrul 'di skad ces gsal ba btub bo// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // khams gas
186b5(rnying rgyud): rnams rgyal gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa yi// dngos grub 'brog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni
186b6(rnying rgyud): 'dir bkrug nas// mngan tung tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // lum ga rdul d+ha brlas nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su srung ba mdzad// danas tabs bca' rig 'dzin du ma dang brgyas pas/ rang gi rigs kyi ltal 'di pang ces gsol ba btabapa/

191b2(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams/ gang gis bon pa mo tsam las bdag/ dge ra'i sngon la medam pas gzungs mabyas pa rnye pa/ mi dge pa'i ma shas gnyen gyi dbang du thil bas gal te pha rol gyi nyon mong so pa rgyas pas/ sang sa kyi na kyi

191b5(rnying rgyud): brgya du mos// nan cig bgags dang yig 'dran tshigs// da sde bkang bas ride margyad// ces gzung po po// de na kyi'i kho bo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das lab cang ba sbom gyis brgyad nas 'di na ces dpa to// kyang ba rje maldan
191b6(rnying rgyud): 'das rdu la srung ma tsherma ma rgyas nag dang bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'da' bar byed pa rnams/ bdag cag gis nur byung ngad pa chen thos paskal bar ma kyi na/ dag nyid du bcom ldan 'das la 'grus pa lags so// de nas bcomaldan
191b7(rnying rgyud): na ldan pa nyings pa sa rdzu sa/

192a4(rnying rgyud): los// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i khro ba mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// la
192a5(rnying rgyud): logasang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal ba brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'dra' ma byed// ces gsungs so// de nas rigs
192a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi khro bos phyogs thams cad nas/ thams cad dbang du bsdus pa'i tshe marngams chen po'i phyir gsang bsngags kyi brgyal chen po skyes par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus reg 'dzin la sogs pa'i tshogs sam 'dis
192a7(rnying rgyud): skad gsol to// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// sgra'i ma gnod sbyin bdud kyang rung // ngal bar chod byed pa rnams// mthu dang cu 'phrul med par thos// zhes brjod pa'i mod la/ rdo rje khro bo la sogs pa thams cad kyis bsrub pa'i gzis rjid kyi
192b1(rnying rgyud): byams// kun dun 'a sa sas gas sang/ yan du su ma rnanapapa/ thas dang ca zung pa sas // denas sa tan 'dasasmrapa gagang nas pa das pa na batha' ba na sus
192b2(rnying rgyud): gsang 'ang ga kyi tang 'a ni 'i rnams par 'gas nas/ rdarda thobag dngas pas rnam par ldan pa zhes pa 'did nyid kyi skad gsang dang thugs de rnams pas snang // rdza ma shig dorje ba ba gastan// bka' du dag
192b3(rnying rgyud): mdapas snyi bzag nas// sus gdul can bzhi rdzogs// tham 'ab ba'igatu 'dug// mun pa bdang byas nas// lhayang du rjem da byur // zhes gzungs pa / despang ga las rnams ning man du
192b4(rnying rgyud): kyis garten du rgyan bcad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i mkha' gsang rnam par dge pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rin po che 'o gtun lung ba sad pa dang // rkyen po che'i the'u gra dngas pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi spa gA
192b5(rnying rgyud): dang thugs rje rnams las byung ngo // chungs shig rin chen 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can nanas// rin chen med pa ma snang bsres nas// lhas ngagardul phran bzhin du rdzogs// khro bo 'bar bajig tun zung // rin ched
192b6(rnying rgyud): thobs btung byas na// lho yang rung nyi brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa'i mod la/ brgyal gyi las rnams rin po che'i mngon spyod kyi stobs kyis gtan du rgyun bcad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma'i mkha' gsang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i
192b7(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin pasgoms par zhugs nas/ pad+ma'i gtun khung bgrang pa dang / pad+ma'i tho ba gdengs pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // rdungs shig pad+ma 'bar ba ji ga tun// bka' las 'da' khyod sdigacan rnams/
193a1(rnying rgyud): pa gas pa kus// ga na rdzunas/ klu sa ga nga// ma du na/ // /
193a2(rnying rgyud): ne pad+ma'i mngon spyod kyi stobs kyis gtad du kun bzang // de nas bcom ldan 'das phrin las chen po'i mkha' gsong rnam par dag pa nas rba ba'i rang 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phrin las chen po'i gtan khang bzad pa dang / las can pa
193a3(rnying rgyud): gdengs pa zhes byab 'di nyid kyi ska dang gsang dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // rdungs shig las rab 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da'abyeng sdig can rnams// las rab med pa la snying bsreg nas// lus dgardul phran bzhin du rtogs// khrom
193a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// las rab thabs bdud byas na// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa'i mad la/ phrag dog gi las thams cad phyin las mngon spyod kyi stobs kyis gtan du tshun bcad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
193a5(rnying rgyud): gyis 'khor lo'i mkha' gsang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor lo'i gtun khung bgrad pa dang / 'khor lo'i thob gdengs pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // rdungs shi
193a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// 'khor lo me dpal snying bskyeganas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rdzogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung dri// 'khor la thabs brdung byas nas// lha yang drung
193a7(rnying rgyud): brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsangs pa'i yo la/ gti mug gi les thams cad lakhong po ze ma myud kyis gtan du rgyun pa cad par su // rdo tsha dras na/ tham mi cadags sngags kyi mthumar pos byin byas brlabs sa// nganam
193b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs yongs su gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'jonapa snyoms par zhugs // / pa padu nan pas
193b2(rnying rgyud): gyi sram nyid do// la la ni 'khor lo 'bar ba'ims nyid do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bdug cag gis kyang theg pa med po 'di dus gsum du gzung bar bgyi'o// zhes gso nas/ thams cad kyis rjes
193b3(rnying rgyud): sra yi rang ba'i spobs pa chen po yongs su bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa me bzad pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor chen po'i dkyil 'khor
193b4(rnying rgyud): nas// rdo rje 'dra 'phro'i 'od zer gyis// thams cad dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// bcu drug zig gi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshad du bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor pad mo'i mdog/ rdo rje can gyi rgyan gyis mdzes// thogs dang
193b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi 'khor lo la// 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa ste// thun mong gi ni chog rnams// tha da dkyil 'khor drag po'i dbyibs// 'bar ba'i rgyan gyi chog ni// phyi dang nang go cho ga ste// rdo rje can gyis brtag par bya// sems can chen po'i lags
193b6(rnying rgyud): ni// 'bar ba'i gdam tha yang dag gzhug/ rdo rje nyim dbus gnas sa// sa pan 'od kyin+ya mor gzhag/ thug 'bring chen pa'i rang bzhin ni// rigs kyi rgya ga bzhinas// thams cad sram dang mtshungs pa'i can// mkhas pas 'bar ba'i dgra hU~M/
193b7(rnying rgyud): gle/ dgazhan yangs khas pas brtag pa ni// dbrag sum rgyag rgyagagabs drug gzhag pa lagags gdang // rdo brag pa sogs pa gnon// 'brir ba'i rgya kyis rnam par ba // blam brgya mang bcas pan// 'a

194a7(rnying rgyud): sa sa 'du rgya pa
194b1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// srid pa dbu ma 'a byas ga sas// ska ma la gas bug par bya// btud dpabs sa tha la// ra babyung mthams kyal grang ga/ brjod pa'i shes ba b+hagad+ha// stong nga du chub la gas ga// gsang pa bras sa pa pa // 'dag
194b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes dkrug par bya// rdzing ma dang ni bcas pa yang // chog gnyis pa bsdus pa ma// sprul pa'i bo nya thams cad ni// ba spu'i bug kun tu dgug/ phreng mo 'bang ma la sogs kyang // thams cad gnas su yang dgang gag/ de nas mabs pas 'a
194b3(rnying rgyud): na// dkyil 'khor gyi ni gcod ni// kun tu tI 'dzin rab gnas pa// rnon can gyi chog s+ho// stod lam kun tu brtan par bya// s+thA ye brtsal rab gsal ba// brjed pa med pa'i dran pas ni// 'bad pa med pa'i tshogs chen la// mkhas pas
194b4(rnying rgyud): tig tu bsam par bya// bsgrub gnyis kyi cho ga yas// rna la 'byung chog rdzogs pa yin// gang zhig bslab po shes na// chog rdzogs pa ma yin te// lam gyi thos pa yis ni// sangs rgyas yul du ma ba N+Da langs// rtul ba'i sras su song pa
194b5(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// de nas de'i tshe 'i dus na// rnal babyor gyi dbang phyug chen po rig 'dzin gyi tshogs du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ma 'ongs pa'i
194b6(rnying rgyud): tshugardzogs pa 'tshal ba'i rdul 'byor ba rnams rin po che ba zhid du bsgru bar ba sti'o// zhes gsol nas/ rdo rje/ wA ba la sogs pas yongs su bltas nas/ rdo rje can gyi thugs kyar sngags par dbar te// 'jigs pa de bzhi gshegs pa
194b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad byal nas kyi mo'i byung kyi rgyal po las/ rnam par brtag pa med po sbyong ba yongs su bkod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed kyi dbang phrag chen pa/ de ba ni dgashegs pa thams cad/
195a1(rnying rgyud): kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos/ 'byung ba mngon khyod kyi rnam par rol pas 'gyings pa/ mi bzad pa'i 'khor lo rnam par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rlung nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/ mthu pa rnam par bag dang
195a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // shin tu khro zhing gdug pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// ces gsungs pas de'i mod la/ sangs
195a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas mthas rnal 'byor gyi 'khor thams cad N+DIl 'khor gyi rang bzhin du 'byung bar gyur to// ji ltar snang ba'i yul thams cad na rdo rje 'bar ba'i thob shA stag ste/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams 'khrigs par gyur pa dang / bdud ma mags pa thams gang
195a4(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa dang / de nas rnal 'byor gyi tshogs thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi rang bzhin la/ so sor gsol ba btab po// hU~M khrol khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa// rdo rje khro bcom
195a5(rnying rgyud): 'das// khro zhi che la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas rin po che'i khro bo'i chogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// hUM khro la khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro ba nye bar zhi mdzad pa// rin chen khro bo bcom ldan 'das// khro zhe che la phyag 'tsha
195a6(rnying rgyud): la// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas pad+ma'i khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// hUM khro la khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa// pad+ma'i khro bo bcom ldan 'das// khro zhi che la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsol to//
195a7(rnying rgyud): de nas las chen po'i khro ba'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// hUM khro la khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa// phrin las khro bo bcom ldan 'das// khro zhi che la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsol to// de nas sangs rgyas chen po
195b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis 'dig daces gsal to// nu kro la zhes pa'i rgyal ba yis// khyo ny+dza bar na mdzad pa// sangs cas khrab bcom ldan 'das// b+h+yon rgya la ga 'tshal la// zhes gsal to// de 'a chang 'dus na/ sangs byas sras dang bcas da/
195b2(rnying rgyud): rnams/ rang rang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba dang rgyal ba'i zhing gi bcud gang rnal 'byor chen po bas mgyis mi khyab pa rnams kyang 'dus/ rig 'dzin gyi khra bo'i tshogs pad+ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams kyang kun tu ngam pa la sogs pa rlob //
195b3(rnying rgyud): theg pa yongs su skyong bar 'tshal ba'i bdag po/ gang dam tshig gis byin gyis ma brlabs pa de dag kyang / mngon par 'dun pa'i sgo nas mgrin gcig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ rdo rje gar gyis mchod de/ 'di skad ces gsol
195b4(rnying rgyud): to// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gti mug sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ma
195b5(rnying rgyud): par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i gnas nas thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i gnas nas/ rin po che'i 'od zeng
195b6(rnying rgyud): kun tu mnyam la zhes bya ba myang ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad den chen chen por byin gyis brlabs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis pargya chen po'i gnas nas/ pad+ma chen po'i 'od zer kun la chags pa rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba phyung ste/ dkyil
195b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor thams cad pad+ma chen por byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las chen po'i gnas nas/ phrin las chen po'i 'od zer kun la 'jug pa zhes bya ba phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad phrin las chen po'i bdag nyid du byin gyis
196a1(rnying rgyud): brlabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khar la chen po'i gnas nas/ 'khor la'i 'od zer 'phro bas gcod pa zhes bya ba 'ang gyung ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khor la chen po'i bdag nyid du zin gis brdabs so// de dang
196a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das le zhes kyi rtse mo kun tu 'grub zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ce gsungs so// khag 'a thung thugs la gnas pa yil// ye shes rtse mo mchog nyid do// d+h+r-igs mangs ni 'angs ra//
196a3(rnying rgyud): las su bstan// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs du ma'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rtse mo phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba zhes bkye ba/ bdag cag gis mngon par pa'i pha
196a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rdo rje rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la nyams par zhugs nas/ 'di nyid kyis dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // de nas gzugs dang byin pa ma
196a5(rnying rgyud): dang // bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang // dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid de// phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste// btab na gang 'dod de sbyin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i mig gis bltas te/ 'di la
196a6(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i 'dus na sems can gyi ris 'khor ba'i mtsho chen po sangs rgyas kyi sras su bgyi ba dang / dngos grub kyi bdag pos gtan du gsang pa'i slad du/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis ma/ phung chen po 'ang rnams kyis sor
196a7(rnying rgyud): sbyong ba gang lags pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas sman gdags pa'i slang du/ bshad du gsol zhes pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang kun tu rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las
196b1(rnying rgyud): bang na gangag/ rnam gyu ba nga nas// na ma pa bya// dbar bya thA gas// ga pa shAgasal pas pang/ su rnamag dun/ zhag d+ha bgan tas
196b2(rnying rgyud): losogs mtshan mtshad// mgron byibs ni mnod par// bcwa ga nyis dang na so brgyad rdzogs// ji ltar ma khas pas de bzhin na// ma mdzang sa ra tshad dgal// 'bar ba di ni nang bcad la// byang ni rje snang bar gnan ste// rab
196b3(rnying rgyud): brjed pa dang // nyi ma 'bram pazhin rnam par 'tshor// nam mkha' kun langs par grub// zhi gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor mongs// rnam pa brgyad du yang dag nas// dbangags madrag po'i tshed dang ldan// tshig pa'i pi dbyangs brgyang mangs/
196b4(rnying rgyud): phra ba nyid// rnam par thar pa'i mngon spyod de// sum du rtsa lnga thun mong gi// chog nyid du mkhas pas brtag/ ye shes rtse mo'i gzhi yis ni// ye shes rtse mo'i rnal 'byor chad// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag pa dang rtsug
196b5(rnying rgyud): phran sum rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugasate/ nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rje las b+hin gyis rlobs pa 'di phyung ngo // rdzas surnal 'byor chen po yis// bsgom par bya ba 'khrul ba ste// rtsa dang byed pa spangs pa yis// rnam par
196b6(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin ni// mkhas pas 'bad pa med par bya// chos kyi sku mchog bdud rtsi yis// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin ma bzhin du// thams cad ma lus gso par bya// de nas mkhas pas 'bad pa yang // rdorje n+ya mdung gzhal yas sa// dbus mnyamapa yi tswa
196b7(rnying rgyud): na// khrag 'thung chen po'i gang nal bzhag/ khams gsum kun las rnam par rgyal// gshin rje'i rgyal mchog nyid dang ni// dpal ldan pa skad bzhad pa dang // rdo rje stobs kyi ye shes rnams// shar wA nub byang dbus gnas sra// btsun po'i tshogs
197a1(rnying rgyud): 'and // sam 'byung bdun man// thas grangs par rnam par tu/ 'ab dang byas pa stsal 'a'ang ba// na pa gags byungs na da gnas pa// / da
197a2(rnying rgyud): bskul bar bya// gnyis su med par rol pa dang // rgyan rnams kun du rdzogs pa ni// bad ba can po'i skamachog ste// longs spyod can pa rdzogs pa'i sra// bad brtson po'i ral pa yis// gnyis su med par zlos pa'o// rtag pa can po'i gsung drung
197a3(rnying rgyud): yang kyi cho ga mdzad pa'o// rjes surnal 'byor rgyan pa yas// mkhas pas dran bcom gyis kyang // rnal 'byor rol pa ster ba te// rtsol ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad da mang snang ba yin// snang ba ma pa'i rang bzhin no//
197a4(rnying rgyud): spyod yul lo// de nas dpal ldan sras kyi mchog/ yang dag byin gyis brlab pa ni// zugs las 'phros pas thugs kyi sras// gsang sngags yang dag bstan pa ni// oM badz+ra kI le kI la ya sa ma ya n+tang / 'di ni yang dag par snang ba'i sngags ma/
197a5(rnying rgyud): dag brjod pa tsam gyis na// 'bar ba'i sras rnams rnam par brtas// sku yi phyed tshal man chod la// 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'khrugs pa dang // mthing nag rngam pa'i rang bzhin can// kun tu thal byung 'bar ba'i sgra// 'bar ba'i dbu gsum rnam par brjid
197a6(rnying rgyud): dbu mra kham pa zur gsum dbyibs// srid pa gsum gyi rnal du 'bar// phreng gis 'gro ba chen po yis// lus dang yan lag nyid lag mdzes// zod pa rnams ni yang dag tshe// khro rgyal rgyan na spang mig bzang // nyi zla 'bar ba'i ldan gyis mdzes// g.yon gyi
197a7(rnying rgyud): ra dag sdang gnon// mtha gtsogs rab tu rnam pa'i sgra// sku me phyogs mtshams thams cad du// dra khrod 'bar ba'i me rtag 'gro// sku smad 'bar ba'i mngon myod ni// rnal 'gyur mdun gyi mkha' la dzas// yum gyi mkha' la sum cha nub// 'bar ba'i phyag/
197b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi mangs pan// ltar bdag pa'i tang can// g.yas thA 'ag mdza rjon// ring bgrang paganan pa'i thabs// g.yon pa'i dang ga' rlag/ rngardza sa la snyan rnam par ma// chags pa'i khams ni pham par byas// bdud kyang mang rnams yangs su ga
197b2(rnying rgyud): mgur bzur gsum pa// rnam par 'debs shing gzas pa'i thabs// ngan song gsum ni rnam par 'jig/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas khro bo dang // sku gsung thugs kyi khrob rnams// bu ma gcig rngu bkrus pa'o// thams cad che bar gyur pa ste// khro chen rnam
197b3(rnying rgyud): par rgyal gyur pa'i// gzi brjid chen po bsam par bya// rtag pa chen po rang bzhin dang // skal pa las kyang sprul pa 'byung // 'bar ba mthu yi shugs kyis 'tshwa// dus gsum kun tu snang ba ste/ rigs rnams kun la spang ba ni// klan ci ye she
197b4(rnying rgyud): pa yin// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sprul ba ni// yang dag kun tu mkhas pas brtag/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin thams cad ni// bar mtshams med pa'i ting 'dzin te// rnal 'byor chog pa lhab \u0f7f'i mchog/ rnam par snang mdzad che la ni// rnal 'a
197b5(rnying rgyud): da lag dbus ma ste// ji ltar rdo rje'i pho brang ni// sbom po la yang de bzhin no// nying lag go ni dang 'og la// rin po che yi 'od zer bzhag/ gang gi tha lag de la ni// pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhan bsam// mthar gyis gnas pa'i nying lag ni// zab ma
197b6(rnying rgyud): yaM ge rnam par mdzes// kun kyang chu shel steng na mdzes// 'bar ba pas kyang cher 'brang te// rtag tu mnyam pa'i 'od byer 'dzin// 'od zer ma mor bzhag par bya// de nas snang mdzad dang po ste// su ra ta yi rang bzhin yas// b+he zhes brjod pas thal mo d+har
197b7(rnying rgyud): nyam pa'i thal mgyur nas kya// rnam par snang mdzad mgor bdan ste// rdordza sa nangal lon// gas rnam par mangs par bya// gnyis sa mang pa'i gyur ba ni// sar macung zad ba sgrol ba yin// ngardzog sa ma brlab bsnol ba// rnam par byangam
198a1(rnying rgyud): rbab bzhin la// rnam par snang mdzad mgor bzhag ste// badz+ra ba datu rmugs nas// byang chub sems sa/ na dbang bar bya// de nas sakhas pa'i dam gan// sa ma yaHzhes rnam par badzad// thugs da mnyam pa ba
198a2(rnying rgyud): 'bad pa'i phur bu blang bar bya// lag pa'i bar du mnyam gnas pa// lag pa'i ting pa phye nas kyang // mno bong srid lag mthe chung gis// bar du thar pa yang dag gzhug/ mthe bong gis ni drung zad rdul// rnam par snang mdzad mgor bzhen te/
198a3(rnying rgyud): yu~Ms+t+waM// A oMs yang dag mdzes par bya// byang chub sems sbed 'bru las// rdzogs badra ngas gsum padag shegs las// yab sumams dang bcas pa kyang // mkha' mnyam khrob 'bar ba'i rtse// ni lce chen po rnaMs //
198a4(rnying rgyud): khyi bo rnams// bar mtshams med pa'i 'gro 'dra yis// phrar ba'i sbal bsgra zhing bstim// bdag nyid zad pa'i rang bzhin la// bar mtshams med par rnam par gnas// de nas phung pa'i bdag nyid la// yang na phung nga gsung thugs kyis// bad
198a5(rnying rgyud): zed por byed rtsis brlab// dbang bsgreng ba ni brtag par Sh+Ta// ting lag tub bskal grang zag shibs// de nas phur pa dam bzung ba// de nas dgang bar slob pa la// rigs ltung byin gyis brlab pa bsten// rdo rje dang ni 'khor la dang // rid cad
198a6(rnying rgyud): mchog gas bon mkhas pas brtags nas ni// rang gi gnas su bsam par bya// nga la yon tan chen pos kyang // mkhas pas shin tu 'bar bar bsgom// bsam gyis mi khyab dang bzhin ces// bsam gyis mo khyab gnas pa'o// de nas pa khas
198a7(rnying rgyud): btag pa // 'ber pa'i sgra dang gsung thugs te// spyi bo'i gtsug tu bas ma ni// dri med sgra yi sabon bzhag/ dbu ma'i tshad du mkhas pas bya// rnam dag gsung gis bor bzhag/ ye shes rtse mo'i cha nyid la/ blo meng thugs kyi yig
198b1(rnying rgyud): na na/ rnams pang sa pa// smrams// rgyug gas sas/ spya na/ rgyus ngas / na nga
198b2(rnying rgyud): gsu kun gyi ba // 'ab babs kyang char 'ab bas// nal 'byod tshogs kyis pasgru ba \u0f7f// 'jigs pa de bzhi gshegs pa thams da kyi la gas kyi mo zhes tha pa'i rlung kyitshal pon byoms// blo ba tshogs kyid kyis brlabs shing dbang bsngang
198b3(rnying rgyud): pA'i le kyi gnyis pa'o// / de nas pang dag pa shang byug+sa/ thugs kyi legs cig ga par/ de ma bas pas brtag par gyi// reg brgya 'phrul te// d+has nus mo rang bzhin na// ngas dang gra sa pa'i// rnam
198b4(rnying rgyud): gyi gnas sra bdag/ 'byung babs kyang rgyas 'ab ga// dpa' thos rigs kyis btag pa bya// yongs sa brtag pa'i dang 'dzin // thugs pa sa shes kyi mal// rang bzhidag cigag bdag tung las// gzhan du 'das pa pa yid no// nganas
198b5(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya ba ni// so so ngam mo tho ba rnams// rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// de nyid phyogs brgyar 'phros pa las// bas ma gyis mkhyab dang la mkhas// nam mkha' khyab pa song nas ni// skad la 'dus pa'i ste skad kyang // hU~M da pa
198b6(rnying rgyud): klu len nang // de nyid skul rnam par bstim// phyogs bcu'i khro ba ma smram pa// bdag nyid can pad la gnas// de nas 'gro ba 'don brtson pa// chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs pa yi// spyan gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdul 'byor bzung dang /
198b7(rnying rgyud): dam bcas pa'o// lus la 'jug ci rdzogs mdzad pa// byin rdzapas 'phel bar mtsha med// 'bar ba bas gang chang 'bang ga/ bdag nyid khrag 'thung zi ba brtag// bdag nyitad chen po'i phung ba ni// mkhas pas rtag byer thos badrus
199a1(rnying rgyud): yi cho ga bstan pa ni// thabs kyi phyag rgya dbus gnas su// ma las nyid kyil hU~M gis mdzes// shes rab phyag rgya'i dbus gnas su// a las zla dkyil dbus gnas 'bar// rnam par snang mang da mgor bzhag nas// de nas ma
199a2(rnying rgyud): pas brtag pa ni// phur bu dz+ri hU~M phaT brjod pas// de nyid bdag nyid chen por snang // de yi 'og tu brtag pa na// lag pa'i sor mo rgyab tu bsngol// mtho bong gshibs pa'i dbus gnas su// phur bu chen po bzhag nas kyang // rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
199a3(rnying rgyud): la// ta na gnyis kyi rang bzhin la// dI p+ta tsakra'i bdag nyid ste// b+h+rUM phaT mnyam par sbyor bas 'grub// de nas dril ba'i rang bzhin dang // gzi byin bsgrub brtan pa brtag/ bdag nyid chen po'i dargyal gyis// rnam par dril zhing bslu ba ni// @
199a4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i byang chub sems// phur pa chen po'i sprul bsdu// de yi gzi byin chen po ni// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rang bzhin ni// 'bar ba mchog gi zer 'phro zhing // dbang chen dbang 'dras dbang gi mchog/ mdun gyi mkha' la ma N+Da ma bzhag pa// a ya
199a5(rnying rgyud): nan dru des gnas pa// 'bar pa'i bdun lardzun gyis mdzes// bstan pa chen por yongs su brtaka/ de nas yang dag pashad byag// mkhas pas cung dkar rgyal por brtag/ bag gis byin rlabs mtha yis s+ho// tha ba'i rang bzhin mtshan pa dang /
199a6(rnying rgyud): dang byed pa'i dngos po ste// rnal 'byor sems kyi rnal 'byor gyis// dug dang bdud rtsi'i dngos po ltar// don gnyis rnam par spang pa'o// rgyun mi 'chad par mkhas pa yis// sku la rnam par bsnun pa ni// rnal 'byor cho ga dang po yin// de nas dpa' bo'i cho ga
199a7(rnying rgyud): ni// gru gul chen po brtag par bya// de bzhin don gnyis 'grub par byed// 'phags pa khro bos ji snyed pa// gzi mdades phun sum tshogs pa dang // dga' ba chen po thob par byed// mchod pa mchog ni mchog la sogs// khro bo mchod pa mchog pa
199b1(rnying rgyud): bsrub bya gsang par bya ba ni// rnam par myos pa la sogs te// gsad pa'i mchog ste mchod pa mchog/ brnag pa'i phrin las du ma'i tshogs// thams cad mkhas pas brtag pa ni// 'di ni zin brlab rtsoga'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
199b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor du 'jug pa'i la me phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // las mchog chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// 'dag rdzid chenapo
199b3(rnying rgyud): brtag dur bya// snying gar bsam par bya ba ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sa bon mthing nag bzhag/ snying po brtag par bya ba ni// rnam par sdang mdzad mgor bzhag ste// rdo rje phur bu'i rang bzhin brtag/ de nas bslab bya'i dang
199b4(rnying rgyud): gsod pa'i cho ga mnyam sbyor bas// hUM phaT yang dag gzhag par bya// de nas sa ya brjod pas ni// bdag nyid chen po kho nar ngas// ji ltar khri phrag rnams kyis kyang // 'bar ba'i gzugs brtan mthong bar 'gyur// 'bum phrag 'bum phrag nges pas ni
199b5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i phyag 'tshal kho nar nges// ji ltar khri phrag nges pas ni// gadrug pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// stor phrag gcig gi sang 'byas kyang // thams cad dregs par 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar brgya phrag kho nas kyang // skabs kyi las rnams 'grub par
199b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'di ni 'bum phrag bye ba brjod pas kyang // tshe rabs gzhan gyi rig 'dzin tu// gang gis tshig tsam mos pas gyur// de la mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams byams// gang gis sa ya bcwa yis ni// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin las// rnam pa gzhan du ma
199b7(rnying rgyud): nges so// mkhas pas grangs la brtags pas kyang // dgos pa'i rang bzhin thob pa // de ltar brtag pa'i rang bzhin ni// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i nyin byed kyis// phyag tu chen po thob par 'gyur// las rnams kyin kyi mtshan nyid kyang // mos pa dab
200a1(rnying rgyud): 'gag pa med// mkhas pas brtags ni kyil bshad// nang gi rang bzhin bstan pa las// gyi yi rtags kyang mthong bar 'gyur// sra dang gsung dang thugs kyi rtags// sbrul dang yang sbrul la khan gyi chags// phra ma'i yang rnams
200a2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// rtags dang ldan pa'i sbyor bayini// mkhas pas las rnams grub par 'gyur// gyur bar gtong bar 'dod pa yis// bsdu ba'i gnas ni snying ga ste// ji ltar bsla ba'i cho ga la// sangs rgyas gshegs su gsol bal bas// 'dir dbus
200a3(rnying rgyud): phran sum rdzogs// de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon spyod kyi mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rdo rje zhes kyab la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // sngags pas sa lcogs gang yin der// bsad pa'i gnas ni bdag gisaH// khro ba'i phra
200a4(rnying rgyud): thugs nyid kyis// thams cad dregs par byas nas ni// phyogs bcu phrar rabs byin brlabs te// bdag nyid chen po'i ngadargyal gyis// ci rigs pa yis mtshams bsrungs// las rnams ltas ni mnyes byas te// de nas zhi ba'i lha mchod cing // grangs kyi chag rdzogs pa
200a5(rnying rgyud): dang // sra gsum dur khrod rtse mo 'o// zhing de thal ba khrag dang bcas// b+hu tshel na na srab ma tsho'o// khre dang du tshe'i phub ma dang // grog mkhar bong bu'i bdud kyi sogs// til nag la sogs gang yin no// mkhas pas bdud rnams pam par b+ha// yang na mor gnas pa dang /
200a6(rnying rgyud): krug nag gzugs kyi snying khar bstan// drar khyod nas sogs dbus gnas su// hUM baT gyor ba'i dbus gnas ste// bslab pa'i dus ni rnam par gzhag/ 'bar ba'i 'gram du gan rgyal du// gzhan rdol ni thor cog bstan// 'bar ba'i snying gar gnas pa// sram
200a7(rnying rgyud): b+hi ni la sogs pa yi// mkhas pa'i cho ga dang ba yin// chu hU~M hoH// oM badz+ra ang kuM shA la?/ ga zhig hU~M \u0f7f/ 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // lcags kyu thogs pa'i grangs med gzugs// brgyad mar ni zlos pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bsgrub bya'i steng lag
200b1(rnying rgyud): na/ na na na na sa smra
200b2(rnying rgyud): sa
200b3(rnying rgyud): sa/
200b4(rnying rgyud): da pa ma/ na so// shAn dal sa pas
200b5(rnying rgyud): pa gas smra
200b6(rnying rgyud): sa dang na na /
201a1(rnying rgyud): cing thal phyung ste// rnam par gzir ba'i 'og tu ni// mkhas pas brtsam par bya ba yin// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba yi// phan tshun sor mo rgyab tu bsnol// gung mo bsgreng bas steng du mnan// phur pa'i lha dang dgra bgegs ming /
201a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhes// gsang sngags 'di ni gsum du bzlas// oM badz+ra satwa sa mA ya hUM phaT/ sems ma'i rdo rje gsang sngags rgyas// dpa' bos gang dang gang bsgo ba'i// dngos po thams cad brtan pa dang // thams cad 'drang ba ma yin zhing // 'bras
201a3(rnying rgyud): bu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pas 'bad pa ni// rdo rje stobs kyi phyag rgya yis// bdag gi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba nyan cing bran bzhin bya// oM badz+ra ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+ta/ bi na d+ha bin d+ha
201a4(rnying rgyud): g+han b+ha na/ sarba ni hUM hUM phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gsang sngags kyis// las rnams gzi brjid ldan par bsgom// yung dkar dang ni gu gul gyis// yang ni rnam par bsnun pa yin// de nas dpa' bo'i brtag pa ni// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor gyis// lha min rnam
201a5(rnying rgyud): par gzir nas kyang // mche ba'i phyag rgya'i sngags 'di brtag/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha yak+Sha kro d+ha ma hA khA khA khA ha ha ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ rnam par brtag pa chen por bya// de nas dpa' bo'i brtag pa ni// lag gnyis be con gdengs pa'i spyan// rnam par bgra pa'i rang bzhi
201a6(rnying rgyud): brtag/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma ta pa swA hA/ pa tsaM bi d+hA na sa ya tsat+ti laM b+hod ra/ u tsur+tha kro d+ha hUM phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam rtsa gcig 'bum// mkhas pas gsal bar brtag par bya// brdeg gadrug las bcol gzi brjed bskyed// skye gtsug hUM dang sum
201a7(rnying rgyud): las ni// gya bram don yod grub par brtag/ oM badz+ra su pa hU~M trA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ lnga dgul kho rol tu gram brtag/ yo byad nag por rnam sbyar te// mngon khyod gtor ma bkrug ste sbyin// u hU~M ba~M hoH/ a h+ye ti b+ha ga bAn/ bi b+hA ya k+Sha ra~M rje dz+haiM rbal
201b1(rnying rgyud): tu / smras/ sa na
201b2(rnying rgyud): nam su sa sad rar // / dus pa
201b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa sa chu bshad pa// den 'dos 'da'as rtso cini nid 'i ni ni 'i mi ma rnams pa gas te/ ding bye kyi sgra nga gsang da su
201b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
201b5(rnying rgyud): snyams par thugs/ nyid kyi sru dang gsung dang thug pa rnamasas// nga dag thams da rjon nanam// semamapas de rnas pa ma shes zhing pas nga / 'dzin nga na 'i sams byangs pa// sa thag zha
201b6(rnying rgyud): nam smra
201b7(rnying rgyud): byed ma ga shes bya byugasu sa su
202a1(rnying rgyud): pa'adini ma babang pa'i bshad pa nas bya ba'i nga 'don pa snyoms pa shAgasatu/ dbul 'bar thams cad thung ba tu cad pa 'di nyid kyi sra dang gas dang thug su rnams las byung na nyan gas tad maH/ mang can pa rnam par rab
202a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das smon mchen po rnam par brjod pa zhes bu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thug sa te/ 'bar na med pa'i bdag nyid chen pa'adi nyid kyi smra dang gsu dang thugs da rnams las byung // yon cigam
202a3(rnying rgyud): mug chen po rnam par rom pa zhes byaba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bad pa'i spobs pa can du mchogs panas kya 'i ti dzin pa snyoms par thag te/ 'dab chen pa'i myugs tshim par bye ba 'dadi nyid kyi thu gsung thugs rdorje rnams las byung //
202a4(rnying rgyud): sri mdza pa te/ dargyal chen po rnam par ral pa zhes bya ba'i zhin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun gdung ba nas rgyam nga badzin ma rnams pa gyu te/ phyogs zen gyi yongs su nyam pa pa pa zhis kyi dzi da kyi sru dang gsung dang thag
202a5(rnying rgyud): las byung // kye+e ta sag mnyab n+tu/ 'dod chags can pa rnam par rol bzhes bya ba'i ting nge yin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mang dpa rnam par la pa zhes bya ba'i/ 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ ben la sa thams cad 'byung ba zhes pa mang nang kyi skra dang
202a6(rnying rgyud): gsung da thugs rnams las byung // mau sa man+tag hA/ phag don chen po dam par rnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting pa dzin to// so gted 'dzin rnam par dpa'// rdo rdi 'bar pa'i rang bzhinate// thams cad rjerje'i dmyal chis// zhesdang gtan tu'i ba gyi
202a7(rnying rgyud): sdug na dzin rnam par ngas sa// 'amajam pa ba zhin te// thams cad ni mang mo dang rgyal gyis// gnyi sag gtum / ma nig nyid 'dzi rnam par rigs// rin man par pa' rang bzhin te// thams cad rinaman rgyal sa
202b1(rnying rgyud): gtan du thu bar bya// dam nan/ ma na rnam par na// 'ad cags 'bar ba'i rang bzhin ka/ thams cad pada' thal ces// 'dang cags gtan zhib sa// wang nan tang 'don rnab par gtsigs// zan dga' bar ba'irang bzhin// thams cad ma
202b2(rnying rgyud): ngargyal gyis// phrag dog gtan du zhi bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i gtos dang mnyam pa thams cad ni kun tu 'thor zhing / 'jig rten na dbang che ba thams cad baspu 'khrugs pa dang / mig mchims rgyas
202b3(rnying rgyud): dang / lus drab pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo 'bar ba'i sprin phung la zhum pa'i brgya la tshul gyis bu smad dang / 'khor du bcas pas thal mo sbyor ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// khro la khros pas
202b4(rnying rgyud): khro bo che// sna tshogs du ma'i khro bo'i sprin// 'bar ba gcig las rnam par byung // de bzhin gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// sna tshogs du ma'i gzugs mchog ni// khro bo bcwa yi rang bzhin che// gcig ni du mar 'phel mdzad pas// du ma rnams la bdag cag
202b5(rnying rgyud): mchod// kye mkhro bo'i sprin lung che// mtha' yas sdig pa gsod mdzad pa// mngon spyod sgrol ba'i rang bzhin pas// bdag gi sdig pa gsod par mdzod// e ma to dpa' bo dpa' bo che// ma lus kun gyi rgyal po nyid// snying rje khros pas khro bo che// khams
202b6(rnying rgyud): gsum rgyal po a la la// e ma ho sdigs pa'i bsdig mdzub can// bsdig pa'i spyod la sogs pas brjid// mngon spyod khyod kyi sku dang mtshams// 'bar ba'i tshogs la bdag cag 'dud// e ma ho dpal chen gdug pa sgrol// 'jig rten phyogs bcu
202b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan rnams kyi// dregs pa mtha' dag bsngal slad du// dpa' bos shin tu 'phro bar mdzad// e ma khrag 'thung khrag chen 'thung // bdag cag khrag la rngam pa rnams// khyod ltar khrag chen 'tshal slad du// dur khrod dgyes phyir gtso bo mdzod// e ma ho ya mtshan
203a1(rnying rgyud): rmad kyi sra// gtum pa chen po de bzhin du// bdag cag brjod pa sogs nus kyang // mtha' yas myur du ma lus so// e ma ho jigs byed 'jigs pa che// sangs rgyas chen po rgyas gyur cig/ dam chos chen po rgyas gyur cig/ dan dang nga
203a2(rnying rgyud): dus na/ gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad ni rang gi 'khor dang bcas par bka' la gnas shing kun kyang dam tshig gi 'khor du rnam par bkod do// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos spobs par brjod nas/ khro bo'i sprin thams cad dang 'dra bar mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lapor
203a3(rnying rgyud): gyi tshogs du ma la 'di lta ste/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i rig 'dzin dang // rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i gdul bya dang / rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i skyes bu dang / rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i zhing khams
203a4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang 'khor lo rnam par rol pa'i rig 'dzin dang / 'khor lo rnam par rol pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ 'khor lo rnam par rol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'khor lo rnam par rol pa'i gdul bya dang / 'khor lo rnam par rol pa'i skyes bu dang /
203a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rnam par rol pa'i zhing khams la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang rin po che rnam par rol pa'i rig 'dzin dang / rin po che rnam par rol pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rin po che rnam par rol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / rin po che rnam par rol pa'i gdul bya dang / rin po che
203a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par rol pa'i skyes bu dang / rin po che rnam par rol pa'i zhing khams la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang pad ma rnam par rol pa'i rig 'dzin dang / pad ma rnam par rol pa'i rnal 'byor dang / pad+ma rnam par rol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / pad+ma rnam par rol pa'i
203a7(rnying rgyud): gdul bya dang / pad+ma rnam par rol pa'i skyes bu dang / pad+ma rnam par rol pa'i zhing khams la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang phrin las rnam par rol pa'i rig 'dzin dang / phrin las rnam par rol pa'i rnal 'byor dang / phrin las rnam par rol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /
203b1(rnying rgyud): sbyis sarnam par rnam pa'i gdu' bya dang / zin pas rnam par sa pa'i sa padang / bdas sa rnam par dam pa na tum myadags sas// dadabu'angs pa rtson du / gas dunas su da gas thas sadu tu 'di bad ma tu dudu nga
203b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i tshogs du mas mgrin gcig tu mngon par brjod pa/ rdo rje rdorje chen po ste// rdo rje bzang po kun tu rgyal// zhe sdang gsod pa'i rdorje che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje nyid la'o// rdo rdo rdo rje chen po ste// rdo rje 'khor lo bla na med// 'khor lo rdo rje mnyam pa ste// rdo rje 'kho
203b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal bstod// rdo rdo rje chen po ste// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rin chen rdo rje mnyam du che// rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rdo rdo rje chen po ste// rdo rje pad+ma bla na med// phan rdo na mnyam pa me// phyag 'tshal rdo rje padz+ra la'o// rdon rdorje chen po ste// rgya phra mdza
203b4(rnying rgyud): med// rgya gram rdo rje mnyam pa che// rdo rje rgya gram phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i rig 'dzin 'chol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas 'khor lo'i tshogs du mas mgrin gcig tu mngon par brjod pa/ 'khor lo bzang po kun tu rgyal// gti mug gsod pa'i 'khor
203b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo ste// phyag 'tshal 'khor lo nyid la'o// 'khor lo 'khor lo chen po ste// 'khor lo rdo rje bla na med// rdo rje 'khor lo mnyam pa che// 'khor lo rdo rjer phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor lo 'khor lo chen po ste// rin chen 'khor lo bla na med// ri
203b6(rnying rgyud): chen 'khor lo mnyam pa che// 'khor lo rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor lo 'khor lo chen po ste// 'khor lo pad+ma bla na med// pad+ma 'khor lo mnyam pa che// 'khor lo pad+mar phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor lo 'khor lo chen po ste// 'khor lo rgya gram bla na med//
203b7(rnying rgyud): graphram 'khor lo mnyam pa che// phyag 'tshal 'khor lo rgya gram la'o// 'khor lo'i rig 'dzin 'chol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rin po che'i tsho gas du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces mngon par brjod pa/ rin chen bzang po kun tu rkyal// nga rgyal gsod pa'i
204a1(rnying rgyud): zhin// sas na kun// / na na/ kyang ma/ nam ldan // / nacan / rnam gnanags na rgyag ma// can da /
204a2(rnying rgyud): na'atsha mthun med// mamang ma cin mam // rini cin mthor pa lhag 'a rgyal brgyad/ byon can chen poste/ na man ma// brjen tshun nyam pas// rgyag tshal gyi nam go/ nor pa na /
204a3(rnying rgyud): bamata dang// ma ma can sham pate// rtag 'cha la ri can na thamasa'o// rin ma ci'i rigs 'tshal ba zhes bya ma nyid padzin to/ danas pa'i rig kyi tshogasarnams ma men gcig na 'di dang kyis mngon par 'arjod pa/ brlab po kyi rgya/ dang /
204a4(rnying rgyud): chags gsod pa'i pad+ma che// sangs rgyas kun gyi pad+ma ste// phyag 'tshal pad+ma nyid la'o// pad+ma chen po pad+ma che// rdo rje pad+ma bla na med// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam pa che// pad+ma rdo rjer phyag 'tshal banyid// pad+ma chen po pa che// pad+ma 'khor lo blan med// 'khor lo pad+ma mnyam pa/
204a5(rnying rgyud): bdun mami rgyag 'tshal bstod// ba tshan po ma// padz+ra ni can pa med// den chen pa mnyam // pad+ha na can phyag 'tshal bstong // pad min pa ngakye// bzla pas thun med// chatham pa mnyam pa'o// bdams lacag la sgom
204a6(rnying rgyud): sa rtsom banas cag / denas mamabyacha pa du ma mdzo ga ci na 'din ma mang ba 'a / tsamam pa ma // bgadags da rnam // bas ma la
204a7(rnying rgyud): ra // mya #/
204b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu bram rgya gram che// rgya gram rin chen bla na med// rin chen rgya tha ma mnyam pa che// rgya gram rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje rgya gram rgya gram che// rgya gram pad+ma bla na med// pad+ma kya gram mnyam pa che// rgya gram pad+mar phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje rgya gram rigs 'tshal ba
204b2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen pos/ nam mkha' rdo rje kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ rdo rje kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya
204b3(rnying rgyud): 'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i ro kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa rI hUM/ 'khor
204b4(rnying rgyud): yo kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa'i rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yang dag pa'i rgyal sras 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa
204b5(rnying rgyud): rI hUM phaT/ yon tan chen po kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i rdo rje kun tu bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'gag pa med pa'i rnam par rol pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thag rdo rje rnams las
204b6(rnying rgyud): phyung ngo // oM pad+ma kro d+he shwa rI hU~M phaT/ chu skyes kun tu 'byung ba zhe/ ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phrin las thams cad yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ las kyi rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang /
204b7(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM a mo b+ha kar ma gro d+hI shA na hU~M phaT/ las kyi rdo rje kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun 'byung ba// rgyal ba'i yum rnams mkhas pas brtag/ yan lag chog mabs pa yis// rtsa ba yi ni dbyings
205a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// mkhas pas nan tan 'bad par bya// sngon du bstan pa'i chog la// gang dag mkhas pa yin te// bya dang byed pa bas ma mkhab// rdo rje 'byung ba'i brgya man+ta// mkhas pas rdo rje mig gis blta/ ji ltar
205a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'byung ba yang / de ltar 'khor lo mig gis blta// gang dag rin chen 'byung ba'i ma// dpa' bo rin chen mig gis blta// pad+ma 'byung ba pad+ma'i yum// sgeg mo pad+ma'i mig gis blta// gang dag las mchog 'byung ba'i yum//
205a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs las mchog mig gis blta/ de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na yang / sangs rgyas sras chen gyis 'bad pa yongs su grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyi mthus 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje rgyal sras bskyed mdzad nas// lhums nas rdo rje rgyal sras gtso//
205a4(rnying rgyud): srid rdo rje'i sras byung nas// rdo rje yum mchog phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo'i rgyal sras bskyed mdzad nas// lhums nas 'khor lo'i rgyal sras gtso// ji srid 'khor lo'i sras byung nas// 'khor lo'i yum mchog phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal sras pa snyed mdzad/
205a5(rnying rgyud): nas// lhums nas rin chen rtul sras gtso// ri srid rin chen sras byung nas// rin chen yum mchog phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma'i rgyal sras bskyed mdzad nas// lhums nas pad+ma'i rgyal sras gtso// ji srid pad ma'i sras byung nas// pad+ma'i yum mchog phyag 'tshal lo// las kyi rgyal
205a6(rnying rgyud): sras bskyed mdzad nas// lhums nas las kyi rgyal sras gtso// ji srid las mchog sras byung nas// las mchog yum la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes rdo rje'i glu dang / rin po che dang / phrin las chen po'i glu blang ba la sogs pas yongs su bstod pa byas so// de nas
205a7(rnying rgyud): yum rnams so so rang rang gi lhums nas rgyal sras thogs pa med pa'i rigs rnams bltams par gyur te/ 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi phyogs la sogs pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin thams cad gang bar gnas pa ni/ khab rtse'i gnas gcig tsam yang med par ji ltar nyungs
205b1(rnying rgyud): 'bramar gyis btams pa dang 'diltar tes kyigang tha na dums phyogs dums ma cad 'ahrag sate/ 'byung ba'ims sbyin tshogs gas ma gtabs pa dang / 'a sa gas par gyur 'dra/ sus rnams kyang da dang das sadas par
205b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par rol cing kun tu rtse bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po gsor bugs ma kyis rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dzarje snying po bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi suM dang gsung dang tsun
205b3(rnying rgyud): rnams las byung // oM sarba ta thA gta tsit+ta badz+ras thA la A t+ma / thugs kyi rdorjed khon nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khang mchen pa yongs su 'dod chags dang rnam par thal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzi pa snyoms
205b4(rnying rgyud): nas/ rdo rje rnam par brtog pa'i gas sngags 'di gsungs so// sa sa khrag tu k+Sha la 'dzis wa spa te/ su do rnam par brtag pa zhes pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa rgya chen po rtog pazad pa zhes bya ba'i ting de dzin la snyoms par
205b5(rnying rgyud): thugs nas/ 'gag pa med pa'i byin rlabs can pa 'di nyid kyi srung nga gsung dang thugs donan ma las byung // sa satartag d+hA sa dru te/ gsang gdanadam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i nga 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes
205b6(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyal mtshan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnams par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa'i gsang sngag sa rje zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rnams las byung ba// oMs rba thA ga ta a na? rAg badz+ras b+hawa Atra ko&ta?/ yum
205b7(rnying rgyud): mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya gra ma chen po the tshom med pa'i ye shes rdo rje blo thos zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba dang / 'dra ba'i gseng sngags 'di nyid kyi mu dang gsu
206a1(rnying rgyud): ma jug nga na na na sa nanan nan
206a2(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin phran su mtshogs pa 'khor rnams kyi spyod yul du mdzad do// de yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la las ni rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thom 'o// la las ni rnam par me g.yong zhes zla ba'i steng rje 'dzin na pag/ pa bye
206a3(rnying rgyud): yang dag par gamo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nab po// la las ni kun tu 'bar ba zhes zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni kun tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na za sa// la las ni rnam par rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rtsapa bo// la las nangong
206a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mthu 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thon go// la las ni rtse mo la rnam par rol pa zhes zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin tho go// lalas/
206a5(rnying rgyud): ni bdag gi 'bad pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni gzhan rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni mthunyams par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thom go// la las ni gsang sngags kyi mthu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
206a6(rnying rgyud): yalas ni dug rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rjong no// li las lam mnan pa zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni mi zad pa'i byud zhes bya ba'i ti
206a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin thob bo// la las ni sems kyi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa// la las ni phyag rgya ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// galag ni kun tu rgyal ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni klan tu 'grong zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
206b1(rnying rgyud): la las ni bgrang pa mad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nanan// la las ni snod brgyad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni rdo man par ma zhes zhes bya ba'i ting pa 'dzin zab bo// la las nim mang po chen po'i ye shes shes bya
206b2(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni rin po che'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni pad+ma chen po'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni rgya gram chen po'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni kun tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting
206b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin thob bo// la las ni thams cad rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni dbang mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni rdo rje mngon spyod rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni dpa' bo chen po zhes pa ba'i rkang
206b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin thob bo// la las ni sgeg pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzob bo// la las ni 'jigs pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni rgod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzob bo//
206b5(rnying rgyud): las ni rnam pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob po// la las ni zhi ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la la ni
206b6(rnying rgyud): legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni phyag rgya chen po zhes tha ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni thams cad rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// la las ni phyogs dang bcas
206b7(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de ltar de dag gi 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rjes su rnam 'byor la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin dang / 'khor phal po che'i tshogs rnams kyang thams cad dam pa'i tshogs chen po'i
207a1(rnying rgyud): na sa / gnan na / da sa nas padang/ sa /
207a2(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag go/ dpal rdorje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen pos/ gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rdo rje mnyam par gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs das/ gzung ba ma
207a3(rnying rgyud): skyed rnam par gtsigs pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // ya mA n+ta kr-ita/ gzung 'dzin rnam par spang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par zab pas rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting
207a4(rnying rgyud): thugs nas/ nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las/ snyoms par byed pa'i gsang sngags 'di byung ngo // matan ba~M ta/ shes rab mthar byed rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen pas rnam par ros pa nga
207a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ pad+ma chen po'i rigs las byin gyis rlobs bzhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sa dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // pad+mA nA kr-ita/ taskad kyi rol pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bam ldan
207a6(rnying rgyud): 'das thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bgegs mthar byed 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnon rnams las phyung ngo // bi g+h+nAn ta bita/ las kyi bdud kyis rnam par myos pa zhes bya ba'i ting
207a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang zugs kyi tshul mi dmigs pa mnyam pa'i rngon te/ thams cad kun gyi sgor gnas pa// thun mong chen po zhes kyang bya// de nas tham mi bachen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs nas// ting
207b1(rnying rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las dgug pa mngon par grub pa'i ye shes 'di phyung ngo // dza rdo rje lcags kyu rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
207b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las gzhug pa mngon par grub pa'i ye shes 'di phyung ngo // hUM/ rin po che bcings pa'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' bas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
207b3(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas/ pad+ma'i bsdam pa mngon par grub pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // baM/ pad+ma lcags sgrog rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das btang snyoms chen pos rnam par rol pa zhe
207b4(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ las chen po'i dril bu mngon par grub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // hoH/ btang snyoms chen po'i dril bu rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mtha
207b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten chen po de 'gyur bas dkyil 'khor chen por snang ngo // gtso bo dang 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'khor lo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rang gi btsun mo dang mnyam du 'khril te/ shin tu 'o byed cing snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
207b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug chen po mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnam par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'bar ba chen po'i zhing khams phun sum tshogs pa 'di
207b7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dkyil 'khor dpa' bos rab tu bya// mdzes pa'i thig skad mkhas pas bya// sor mo nyis brgya rtsa bcu brgyad// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor tshad du bya// ngo bo bzhi dang zung bzhi dang // sgo bzhi dang ni 'khor lo bzhi/
208a1(rnying rgyud): ga bya da ma sa / rdzun+d+ha da su
208a2(rnying rgyud): grangs dang sham pa yi// rtse ba 'thob dbus su zhag/ rtsi bas brgyad pa ni 'bar bste// mdun du yang dag gnas par bya// rdojimangs pa de ltar ro// 'od zer du mami paci// rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya// dang ni nga yin to// ba na /
208a3(rnying rgyud): cad rung gi rgyan gyis gzhag par bya// be tson thob pad rgya tha ma// ji ltar phyogs phyogs de bzhin no// de dag chu lugs rdzogs pa ni// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rnam gnyis te// gang dag suM me do dang skos// gnas pa rnaM
208a4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni kyi'i dbyes mthor te// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ni rgyas dbang mdzin spyod// 'di ni 'di ltar kun tu 'gyur// mkhas pas gang la gang mos pa// lhag par 'dug pa'i dkyil 'khor btag/ shes rab cad kyis sngar bad+ma shid // ma
208a5(rnying rgyud): glang chen lcags bya ltas// gang la gang des rigs sa btag/ 'das dang ma'ongs nya rnams kyi// rigs ni bas par sems gyis bsgyur// 'di ni ga tso ba'i las zin to// gnang bathob par bya ba yang // rang mos dkyil las brtan // phyogs bzung pa da
208a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil na ma le/ 'thus tharnams mnan na// skadang na ca sngag sa// sdug par mam pa 'arnayis 'dzad/ na gyid gargya zhesamakhas pa dug/ da
208a7(rnying rgyud): bramang sa rnas par// gdas nga byed rgyam sa mtshogs// mangs pas spyi mi rigs sbyar ba // 'khar byed ma thasems las babyed// gang te rjod dang mi gnas pa// 'kho ba la sogs snga ma tha'// cigs pa'i phyogs pa dod// gang nyin kyi
208b1(rnying rgyud): la byang // ma thamapas du ma'i lakhor dag zhug/ 'bar pa'i gtsu po mag 'gag// na ma'i las la srabs pa las// 'khar bsan ba brtag par bya// thun na ma las la yang // 'bar ba brtsod pan mangs par na// 'don 'tha bdi kyi mtho // cu
208b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor thams cad 'di las 'thos// 'di ni 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di la 'dra// 'di ni gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di la gnas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//
208b3(rnying rgyud): pade de da gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi kyi mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mas dang zhin na shegs pa thams sgra dang ga dang thugs rdo rje'i rang shin gyi rnam par ga pa zin panas rgya pa'i len ste ni pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
208b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag gi/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po sa sor rtog pa'i shes rab chen po rje ma med pa'i stobs kyis bdud sreg par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rnam par mnal bar gyur to//
208b5(rnying rgyud): de nas de 'i ma de'i dus na/ rig 'dzin chen pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pasamam ldan 'das la mngon par brta zhing tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab pa/ kye ma sangs rgyas mang brje// cho 'phrul chen po stonam pa// @
208b6(rnying rgyud): chen po'i myu gu las// 'bras zas nom bshad du gsol// sprul pa las kyang sprul pa che// sras kyi dam pa khro bo mchog/ gdug sa maze brnon sngo can// 'bar ba'i sprin phrang ba zhad du gsol// gadrug pa 'asreg par bkri ba dang // slob dpon spod pa gsod pa dang /
208b7(rnying rgyud): tan bzhinadu/ na / mapa// da nas bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pasaca srang gsung dang thugs kyi badzin pan/ rang bzhin gyis 'bar ba'i zu tu nan pa zhes bya mid 'din sa nyams par thugs na/
209a1(rnying rgyud): sreg pa zhes bya ba'i rnamapa phrul pa gas pa 'dib sha dang// nam/ sa man kA la ga na/ klog sa wA khyAta/ sarba rba thAnas grangs ka/ ma mas pa par shrap+na shad+hAH/ mthar mal ca byar sdug/ ma// Ag /
209a2(rnying rgyud): sarba duSh+TA na pra b+hA a pa ts+tsha dai Ne/ ma hA bi g+h+nAn bek+Sh+ya ta ka/ bai kr-i tA nAn/ sarba b+hU tad+ha laM ka ra/ an+d+ra an+maha sa nA da ne/ dzA b+ha tsama? naM ba san ku ru ku dr-i/ sarba kad+hANits+tshi ts+tshaH/ sarba man tAn d+hin da sbyind/ par mAdz+nyA naM A~M kartA ya/ A kar+N+Na ya/ sarba
209a3(rnying rgyud): b+hUtrUn ma tha mtha/ nai rba tha na tha thas rba duSh+TA na~M pra be sha ya/ za be sha ma/ maN+Dal maH/ bi bswa ta ba~M tAn ta kar ku ru kur+tha/ ma ma sarba k+ShArbaM/ da ha da ta/ parbabaH/ mA bi lama?/ swa bi laH/ sa ma ya ma nu s+phA ra hA traM phaT phaT/ ma @
209a4(rnying rgyud): nA sha ya/ ka ra ka ra beg+h+nAn/ sarbA sha pa ri pU ra ka/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ kiny+tsa rA ya se/ ma ma sarba Ar+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/ 'di dag gsungs pa'i mang la ni// rdo rje mthu ldan sangs rgyas kyis// ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa kun// thams cad 'jigs shing 'jigs
209a5(rnying rgyud): pa che// myur du bsregs shing shin tu brtul// ba sgra gzings par gyur pa dang // mig ni mchi mas rab tu 'khrugs// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dran cing // 'bar ba'i tshe la gnod pa tsam// khro bo'i nang nas khros pa gtso// mig sman mdog bzhin
209a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu 'chor// 'chi bdag gsod mdzad gshin rje'i rgyal// gtum pa che la mngon par gus// zhes gsungs so// de yi mod la 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas su// nyi ma la ni zhabs bapaskyed ste// rang gi sa bas rnam par brgyan//
209a7(rnying rgyud): rirab cig pa'i 'od bzhin du// mig dmar bzlog pas gtan du 'jigs// mche ba rnol ring ba gtsigs// sku yi rdo rje mchod pan brgyan// ral gri la sogs mtshon bsnams shing // 'bar ba dur khrod dbus na 'jigs// 'jigs pa'i 'khor gyis kun
209b1(rnying rgyud): bskor// dur khrod sems can 'du zhing 'khrug/ dpa' bos kun tu spyad ba ni// rdo rje can dag nyed du spad// 'bar ba drag po'i dkyil 'khor la// thab pachen pos bgos pa'i gzugs// thad pa srungs med rigs can la// mnan nam bas dpa'i chog 'a// gas /
209b2(rnying rgyud): sngags rjes su dran byas nas// gsum mam bdun ni brjod nas ni// bdud ni kun tu rtsir 'gyur bstan// gal te dpa' bo'i las rnams la// myur du zhi bar 'dod na yang // yu ma ni zhi ba'i gsang sngags dang // ting nge 'dzin gyis grol bar bya// g.yas pa pi ni phan tshun
209b3(rnying rgyud): te// sor mo bsdus pa'i dbus gnas pa// kun tu bzlas pardeg pa'i stabs// gzhan ni yum gyi ngos bzhag ste// dbu ma'i tshad du 'gying ba ste// dpa' bo rngam pa'i phyag rgya yin// gshin rje'i gshed kyi ye shes sdang ba brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'phag
