209b4(rnying rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gshin rje'i gshed 'byung ba rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das brtan pa'i rdo rje dam tshig rnam par 'gro ba zhes
209b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bdud rtsi'i thig le'i dam tshig gi rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badz+rA tAM/ na mo dzadz+ra krod+hA ya/ ma hA de Sh+To kA Ta b+hi ra bA ya/ a si mus la par shu pA sha hak+Sha
209b6(rnying rgyud): ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN li/ kha kha khA hi ShA ti/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha banata/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza garba/ s+pho Ta la k+Sho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAn/ bi nA la kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa tI dzI baM ta an ta ka rA ya swA hA/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang /
209b7(rnying rgyud): mthu dang ldan pa'i bde gshegs rnams// shin tu 'dar zhing dngangs par gyur// rab tu 'jigs pa skyes nas kyang // 'bar 'chel bstong par byed// mi 'tshong yi g.yung drung ste// zag pa med pa'i bdud rtsi che// smod cing 'jigs pa zer 'gyur ba// bgegs
210a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal 'joms laphyag 'chal btod// gnag la gsus pa 'thung ba ni// mabargyad rdorje'i cad pan can// 'dra dang 'dra ba'i phrin rnams 'khrugs// ma yi nang la bra rang bya// dzang can yang rtsod 'gyu ba/ ngos po gaganasas /
210a2(rnying rgyud): lag gnyis rdo rje dbus bstan te// rkang gnyis gshibs te drag tu mchongs// 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin rnam brtag ste// bdud rtsi rgyal gyi phyag rgya yin// las rnams thams cad bsam pas 'grub// du gzhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// 'phags
210a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag
210a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa'i zhugs te/ khro bo rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badz+rA NI/ oM hUM dzi na ri Tin+da hAM hUM phaT yaT hA
210a5(rnying rgyud): hA/ 'di nyid gsungs pa'i mod la ni// sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po rnams// 'jigs shing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// bstod pa sna tshogs rnam pa yin// begegs kyi mthu rnams zlog byed cing // sangs kyis rnams kyis dbang bsrung ba// gzhan gyis ma
210a6(rnying rgyud): ba gzhan las rgyal// rdo rje'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma 'bar ba zhabs kyis mnan// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas bde// srul gyi rgyan can 'jigs par blta// rA ga'i mdog bzhin kun tu 'tsher// rdo rje thugs cod pan can// drag pa'i sgra 'byin 'bar
210a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro// thabs kyi phyogs ni sred du brkyang // shes rab phyogs ni phyogs bcur phyag/ gzhan las rgyal gyi phyag rgya yin// dpa' bos gsang ba'i gnas su 'bad// 'byung po che rnams sreg par byed// dpa' bo na rdo rje tshom med// 'di la dpag par mi bya'o// rnam par
210b1(rnying rgyud): gas pacan pa bdag pa nas byang ba ma// 'phags pa bzhan gshegs bsas cad ma shes kyabya mags nub shAd kyi rgyal pacan poladu/ gzhan kyis mthab pa gas bya pa'i la khyab du pa// / nganas pa sadun
210b2(rnying rgyud): de bi zhi nagashags pa thams cad kyi sru dang gsung dang bugs kyi bdag pa/ dpal do 'jigs byed can po/ 'ad chags rdo rnarnam par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par grags nas/ ta nad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ched po 'di nyid kyi sra dang ga
210b3(rnying rgyud): dang bugs rnams las byung ngo // oM d+hi hrAM b+h+rUM/ ta dral bi rdul/ sarba bI Sh+Nak+Sha ta ka ba/ dz+wa la tA/ bilba/ lin/ ar+tha ASh+TaSh+Tas/ kas ri thobs/ badz+ra zlar nir+m+mar+b+han/ tsal ta/ ba srah+maN+Da la/ naM shas sa p+ta da d+he ta/ d+ha ra d+hi N+yer/
210b4(rnying rgyud): NamaT+Ta sa rdzas a pa ma~MH/ ba las ba~M ma~M/ A r+thag Na g+hAtat+t+wa tag d+hA r+b+haShi ta/ bud+d+ha bad+ha/ hwA ya shrI ba/ khAd khang/ pa ben hU~M/ hU~Mb d+han/ btab ta/ sid+d+hi skr-i ga/ a be sha la/ a ba~M sha ya/ sarba d+ha bi shA rIH/ sarba br-ig 'a
210b5(rnying rgyud): thub badzadaSh+T+rA ka las/ me duSh+Ta sarbaSh+Ta/ rban d+hAn/ mthamam/ bza' na/ gac+doMs pa tha ma/ mnamaH/ ban d+ha banaH/ pra d+hiH si n+dan/ dz+nyAn gamasas pa/ rgya ma sle ba sa Ta/ bad+hAl pa/ bad+hU mja ma/ badz+ran rdza
210b6(rnying rgyud): dr-i d+ha ya Ta/ ba lda ya sa?/ bad+hA ltar na/ tan pa phaT/ pa sa rtan nams/ d+hil kyi b+ha ma ka rA la paT/ sarbaka rdzam / brda su las rnas sna ma / d+hab+h+yadz+dza pas / gsang sngags gsungs pa'i mod pa ni/
210b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams// shin tu 'jigs can ma mas byas nas// rdornardzas lab cad pabyed// 'di nags man pa dbyung // rdza pas khams gsum drug 'a mo// ma bza 'ams can pa saphyag tshal// rnams byas gnang
211a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'dam palab gas/ da bdas gag// sa bang 'dum byed// dpa ma dub dpa 'a/ ma gyu sa // nga sa 'ang ba bsgrub par bya// nan pa dbu ma mo/ drung dadu/
211a2(rnying rgyud): ta mi rgyal po gdangs pa'iH// khams gsum dug rnams ni bar byed// mkhas pas thams cad pas kyang 'grub// drug sa rji nga'i bar byed de zhes bya ba'i ting nga nga // 'phags par nag shegs tha kyi rnam ldanas tha ba'i ku kyi pa
211a3(rnying rgyud): sa d+ha'i tshul pa rnam par ba sgru ba 'thung ba zhes thab ladri te bcad par// da nas pa ma ldan 'das da pa'i rnyan shegs pa napas kyang gyi srang nga gsang dang grags kyi 'dug na/ dpal lags kyang kyi dbang thug ca pa lang can pa
211a4(rnying rgyud): nyid lag gi 'ad 'gres pa zhes byaba'i ting nga 'dzin la rnams par zhugs nas/ dzadza dathug pa can po'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sradang gi sang dang thugs rdo rje rnams las rdzu/ d+hamaHsarbA thA ya thAg d+ha parjo / A ma h+ye hi rtag wAn/ naM la badz+rad ta/ rbA T+Ta /
211a5(rnying rgyud): larba wa wadz+dza/ gral sa? wa/ grA pa sa pra lA pa ya/ gamus mthag tan/ bA u ba ga/ b+hUt+man b+h+yAMma?/ 8!/ da dang / rkyen tan/ bac+doM baH/ btabi ta brdA la/ pAt+sa yA hA tA yaM/ marba maH/ ma pa yi man+ta pa ya/ sarbakAr+b+ba/
211a6(rnying rgyud): mA bA la R+tha Sh+Ta ma/ ma d+hi ma~M maH/ rba d+hi mar+tha/ ming pa shAm rba d+har/ pri la maHhaM ga d+han/ sarba bid+h+waH/ sarba badz+nyAn/ sarba pad+hAH/ sarba mAl ka dzaH/ sarba wi hrI mA/ de 'di na san sa tA ma ha ni na g+hu 9\u0f7f/ mjamadza med ma/
211a7(rnying rgyud): mar+b+ha/ rje pa'i rna la la/ dril bad rnam/ tra r+tha/ sih+nA bi d+hes kaM/ drA sha sa d+hu shAs/ rAdz+dza/ / da / bAr+thas/ d+hIH/ bar ts+tsha/ A m+bu/ gas ma ma sa na gyu sa/
211b1(rnying rgyud): d+ha ra ba tsan+ti/ tsa mA ra ma Ni/ ni kran tar+tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha daha/ pa tsa baH/ sarba traH/ kra ru kArba/ phaT phaT d+haSh+Ta/ kri tAn twA ya/ dab ra Shi/ bi dA ba kA ya/ ha na badz+ra da t+ta nAswA hA/ nga bzhin 'di ni gsungs pas kyang // sangs rgyas grags ca
211b2(rnying rgyud): stobs bzang pa// rnam par bred cing dadwangs par 'gyur// dbyug pa che la bstod pa 'bad// las las byung ba las kyi lha// khro chen dbyug pa'i gdengs ka can// 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// phyag 'tshal gsod bdag khyod la 'dug
211b3(rnying rgyud): gnag la skam pa'i khro bo ni// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrug par byas// thugs kyi rdo rje cod pan can// las rnams kun la gsod par brtson// thabs kyi tsam po tha ma'i cha// de yi dbus gnas srid du brkyang // rdo rje dbyug pa'i rgya chen yin// myur du shing
211b4(rnying rgyud): bya ba rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'byung ba'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
211b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po ye shes 'phro ba chen po phung po bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs kyi gsang sngags
211b6(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sru dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM kA ya thA ga tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM d+hI d+h+waM d+h+waM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM u gra sh+'u la pA Ni/ hUM b+h+rUM dz+dza/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti ner da rA/ hUM hUM b+h+rUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ AM mahA ba lA sa
211b7(rnying rgyud): staH// 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas tshogs can 'jigs gyur nas// rab tu 'ad rabs bstod par byed// rdzu rnga rje stobs kyi mchog/ gang gis dran na gla rnams 'jigs// de phyir char gyi rgyan 'bebs shing // bzhes la mdzad sgobs la
212a1(rnying rgyud): bas dang// sakhas pas nam mkha' dnga'i dbus/ nyis 'ad ba dbus rnam bsamatha// 'bar ba'i 'dra'athoskal 'bar// thugs kyi tsang ban sa// las kyiskal bar btag par bya// thur dra nang mthil mnyam
212a2(rnying rgyud): gnas shing // lag pa so sor gar la brtson// stobs chen 'chang ba'i dmyal na// rdorje rtogs kyi phyag tu yin// mnyam gnas mkhas pas 'bad par bya// phyi ral gyi las brtag pa zhes tha ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
212a3(rnying rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rdordza rje stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sra dang gsung dang thugs
212a4(rnying rgyud): sbas thos par thogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las tasti rgyal po'i gsang sngags 'di phyung ngo // namaHsa ma k+ShA pa bI gtso bad+hAH/ TAkrI n+d+ras/ 'di ni gsungs pa'i mad lan// dbang
212a5(rnying rgyud): zlag chen po mtha' yas rnams// 'jigs pa zan po skyes nas 'dud// khro bo'i rgyal po 'gugs chen po// kun rnams rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin ni// nyi ma bya ba brgya'i 'od// thugs kyi dra cod pan 'dud// l-in tang pas mnan nas kyang // lha chen rang bzhin 'dus
212a6(rnying rgyud): rabya// thal mo mnyam gnas 'bras su yang // gsang ba'i dbang po sgrub na 'ong // rnam par dag pa chen po'i brtag pa norje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse ma zhes bya ba'i rgyud kye rgyal po chen pa las/
212a7(rnying rgyud): 'i rgyal po chen po ta k+Shi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i brtag pa rdorje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po/
212b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i stobs kyis kun tu'abar ba 'grib mad sa bya ba'i tingang lan la rnams par thugs nas/ mig yo ba'i do babyung ba zhes bya ba 'i gas sngags 'di nyid kyi srung ngagasang dang thags rnams las byung nga// namangs san ny+dza la dzag ga te/ a mA ka/
212b2(rnying rgyud): naT Tata/ man+t+ra maHbo ta bo ta/ hAtaha ta/ mo ta ya mo ha ya/ ha sa has/ han tan/ kaMH/ A baM sha/ A baM pa// ma hA ma pA laka/ \u0f7ftiNi/ khang khang/ daMb+h+yAM/ sAr la m+bA ra la/ swadz+nyA na b+ha/ tad+hakaM/ sa l+r-i kr-i rbe/ kau ki ni/ ma
212b3(rnying rgyud): bi Sha ma/ badz+ra s+phoT yaM s+pho Ta ya/ d+h+r-in+da thAM/ tri ba li ta raMg na r+haka/ aM aM maM hA ha haM/ a tsa la tsisi/ kroT pa rboT maN+DaMH/ a sa man+ta k+ShAH/ ma hA ba la sha ta ya/ ba ra mAn+te/ I AM tAM tAM maM shu d+hin tu lo ka turl-iH/ badz+ri na mi r+d+ha kra a rba hata/ ba laM b+h+raHdz+wa la ya tAH/ a
212b4(rnying rgyud): sarba.A hA/ 'di dag gsungs pa'i mad la ni// dpa' bo rnams kyang 'dar zhing bstod// rtse ma'o bde gshegs spyod yul las// mi g.yo rdo rje rnam par 'jig/ 'jig rten sreg par mdzad pa ste// spyan zlar ral gri bskams la 'dud// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus
212b5(rnying rgyud): gnas su// khro chen 'jigs shing 'chog pa brtag/ thugs kyi rdo rje cod pan brgyan// shes rab kyis ni bsgrub bya 'dzin// thabs kyis cod pan gdengs par byed// rnam par brtag pa chen po 'di// mi g.yo rgyal gyi rgya chen yin// dpa' bos bsgom na las rnams
212b6(rnying rgyud): 'grub// thogs pa med par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'phagrub mi g.yo bar rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes 'thung ba brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bad+ha
212b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po/ rdorje dgongs pa rnam par 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
213a1(rnying rgyud): bar zhugs nas// khro bo gnod mdzes rnam par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // sum b+ha ni sum thA b+h+rUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-i b+hA trAM/ gr-ih+NA ba ya/ gr-i h+NA ba ya k+Sha/ A na ya ha d+ha ga tA na
213a2(rnying rgyud): rAdza hU~M phaT/ 'di ni gsungs pa'i mad la ni// 'bar ba rnams kyang bstod par byed// dpa' bo ma lce rab 'bar sku// rdo rje'i 'du 'gro sprin 'khrugs pa// gnon cing 'gugs pa'i las sogs ma// thugs kyi cad pan phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'
213a3(rnying rgyud): gnas su// rdo rje stobs kyis 'dug nas kyang // rab tu brtson par byed pa yis// mkhas pas gang yang 'grub par nges// gzhan du rnam par dpyad mi dgos// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
213a4(rnying rgyud): las/ 'phags pa sum b+ha rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs/
213a5(rnying rgyud): byad kyi dbang phyug chen pos/ zab mo rnam par bkod pa'i rdo rje rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ hUM chen po rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku deng gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo //
213a6(rnying rgyud): mamra na hUM kAr oM AHtrAM/ 'di dag gsungs pa'i mod la ni// grags pa chen po mtha' yas kyis// rnam par bstod pa smos pa yi ni// rdo rje b+h+rUM ste hUM ga mchog/ d+h+waM gI rang bzhin mkha' dang mnyam// gdug pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par 'bar//
213a7(rnying rgyud): 'phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' dbus lag mthil sbyar te bslang // rkang pa brkyang bsku mdong thabs 'dor// rdo rje'i stangs stabs gar nyid kyis// gom pa legs par 'jog byed pa// rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya yin// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas su// nyi ma'i
213b1(rnying rgyud): snying du mkhas pas brtag/ thams cad las rnams grub par 'gyur// rtog pa med pa'i mkhas pas 'bad// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyil shes kyi rtsa mags bya ba'i rgyu
213b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen po las/ 'phags pa hUM chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcwa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gzung dang thugs ni bdag /
213b3(rnying rgyud): dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po rnam par dkar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// AM badz+ra ma hA krota ba dza ya/ ma hA se ma ya/ oM A
213b4(rnying rgyud): ni gsungs pa'i mang la ni// dpa' bo rnams kyang 'dar zhing spangs// rab tu 'dud pa'i bstad pa byas// rnam par rgyal ba kun las rgyal// 'bar ba'i khro chen gdug pa 'dul// nges pa'i chog rdzogs pa'i spyir// dpa'i mtshan chel phyag 'tshal bstod/
213b5(rnying rgyud): rab kyi ni rkang pa yis// thabs la rnam par 'khyud pas ni// lag gi rdo rje gang byed cing // rdo rje thal mo brdab pa ni// rnam par rgyal pa'i phyag rgya yin// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// 'bar ba'i zhabs kyis mnan nas kyang // gom pa'i dbang du gyur bar
213b6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa chen po'i las rnams kyang // khro bos mi 'grub gang yang med// mkhas pas rang sems brtan par bya// 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya
213b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba 'phrul pa'i ye shes kyi rtse mo 'byung ba brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung da thugs kyi bdag //
214a1(rnying rgyud): dpal rdo na 'jigs kyang dbang phyug chen po/ yang dag pa'id na 'jigs pa med pa'i kun/ dbye sa pa zhes zlab tang de 'dzin la snyoms par thags nas/ bgrags 'jigs par byed pa gzo bo khams gsum las rnam par rgyal bar
214a2(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags kyi 'byung ba brtag pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma nA Tod+ha rje mo s+ya hU~M sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM AHhUM hUM hUM/ 'di dag gsungs pa'i mod la ni// dpa' bo rnams kyi tshogs dang bcas// thams cad gras bcas
214a3(rnying rgyud): bstod par sbyar// 'jig rten 'dir ni 'jigs pa rnams// thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas chen gzas pa'i gzugs// bdag cag khams gsum kyal la skyabs// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas sa// 'bar ba nyid kyi steng na 'dzi/
214a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis bzhag/ dpa' 'a the tshom med pa'i rgya// blo yis rnam par brtag par bya// las rnams 'grub par tha tshom med// zhal gsum phyag drag zhabs bzhi'am// yang na gnyis par brtag pa'o// rgyan ni kun gyis sul bcan/
214a5(rnying rgyud): lus dang ga dang yid kyis kyang // rtag tu mnyam sbyor mkhas pas 'khrag// klung dag thun dang song ba dang // g+hi yi las rnas 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di ni dkyil 'khor che// rgyud rnams kun gyi cho ga'o// rgyud rnams kun gyi cho gar bsgrub// 'phags pa khams gsul la sa
214a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs 'byung ba brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'phags pa khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'phrul pa'i brtag pa zhes bya
214a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po la shes kyi rtse mo 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par grags
214b1(rnying rgyud): so// de nas mtha da'i nang nas/ gsang ba'i bdag pa lag na rnga rnga thugs pa med pa zhes bya ba rang gi 'khor du ma dang bcas pas/ brda' dang mgrin gcig tu rdo rje'i mchod pa chen po 'bar bar byas te/ tshogs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin
214b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa la gsol ba btab po// theg pa'i theg mchog gsang ba bla med che// 'bras bu kun bzang rdo rje'i stobs rdzogs pa// ye shes rtse mo bla med kun 'byung nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bshad du gsol// bla med rdo rje zab mo'i tog spangs te//
214b3(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i dngos po tha mi dang // gang la blang dor med kyang bdud gzhom phyir// ye shes phur pa'i rtse mo bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par 'phro ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phrin las du ma la 'jug pa'i phun sa
214b4(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las rab mchog dang 'khor lo che// sras mchog phur pa'i rang bzhin ni// 'bar ba'i khro bo la sogs pa// bcu drug las kyi dbye ba yis// rnam pa bdun du bshad bya ste// zhe
214b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas dbang dang mngon myod ni// mkhas pas 'bad par bya ba yin// gang la dngos grub blang ba'i dus// ngan sngags gcad dang phyag rgya gcad// bgegs bsrad rang gi rig pa gso// lnga ni yan lag zog shes// bsgrub bya gsad phyir dgug pa dang // nyams par
214b6(rnying rgyud): bya ste gsang ba dang // 'bar ba 'bod cing rgod pa dang // bsgrub byang chub sems nyid dang // brde ga nas gnan par bya ba dang // bdun gyis gsad pa'i las la sbyar// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'phrar ba kun tu 'phro ba'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
214b7(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo brtag pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // oM rban+da kA li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn tsa hU~M hU~M phaT/ shAn+ta ku ru hUM swa hA/ rdo rjezhi pa'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sa rba ba g+h+nAn rban+d+ra
215a1(rnying rgyud): phaT/ br-ish+mi ku rba sAhA/ rdorje rgyas pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// oM ban kI li kI la yas rba bag+h+nAn ba hU~M hUM phaT/ ba shang kurba g+haH/ rdo rje dbang gi rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM badz+ra
215a2(rnying rgyud): la ya sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM hUM phaT/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje mngon spyod kyi rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas chen po'i phur pa kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor lore khro bo brtag
215a3(rnying rgyud): pa 'di nyid kyis sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM bud d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA na ba~M hUM phaT/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ 'khor lo'i zhi ba rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM bud d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba bi b+hAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ puSh+TiM ku ru
215a4(rnying rgyud): hA// 'khor lo rgyas pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM prad d+ha kI li kI la~M ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ pa shaM ku ru swA hA/ 'khor lo'i dbang du bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM bud d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba bi Sh+TA na ba~M hUM hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya hA
215a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'khor lo mngon spyod kyi rnam par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phur bu kun tu 'byung ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rin po che'i khro bo brtag pa 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams
215a6(rnying rgyud): las phyung ngo // oM rat+nakI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAnA pa~M hUM hUM phaT/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ rin po che zhi ba'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM rat+na kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bid+d+he hUM phaT/ praSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rin po che rgyas pa'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba
215a7(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin to// A~M rat+na kI li kI la ya/ sarbaM bi g+h+nAn paM hUM hU~M phaT/ ba shar ku ru swA hA/ rin po che'i dbang gi rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM rat+na kI li kI la ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAn ba hUM hUM phaT/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rin po che'i mngon spyod kyi brtag pa zhes
215b1(rnying rgyud): na na rnam na smra na na gan na /
215b2(rnying rgyud): brta des par sdug // la/ ba/ ma tug /
215b3(rnying rgyud): ni phres sbyaH/ bang bye rnam par brtag pa shes byaba'i nying mad// / bcwa sngagasas la/ san badz+nyAnan d+ha d+hA me/ maSh+Ta ya/ pa ma na rjong brtag pa zhes cab cing s+ho// de nas pabacom ldan dpalas kyi ming 'brar
215b4(rnying rgyud): nas rgya sto mi ni marnams pa zugs dang/ pas ma thob rtag shes tha pa nyid kyi dang gsang grags rnams sa byung / kA mA~M kA la pa/ ba na mal sas/ las kyi'i brnag pa
215b5(rnying rgyud): ma tha ngon// brdug la gamal/ sa d+han bad+hAhral/ ga rus \u0f7f/ las kyi rgyas pa rnam par brtag shes zlapa ting ngos// gnags sel pas nan kyirgya sa/ byag sa sa/ las dpa dam pa pa
215b6(rnying rgyud): to// shog nyim pa/ sar bsdad sa kyibarjes/ lham thamag tu dam par bajug pa nas kya ga pa/ danam batsham ldan 'das tshugs pa da pan kyis kyis ston ma thoms par thags nas/ dang da
215b7(rnying rgyud): nga / dkyi smang nga gsung nga rmugs rdo rje rnams sas myong // oM badz+ra k+Shis snrel mo/ sarba bi dz+nyAn na hU~M hrI/ a ka ra/ ma a ka ra/ ma thA baH/ rdorje dbyug pa'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba ti // oM pradz+hatre+e la kI la las 'i dz+dza h+nA \u0f7f/
216a1(rnying rgyud): na/ / sa byu // / sa / su smra pa shA yangag
216a2(rnying rgyud): na sa sa pa da / da
216a3(rnying rgyud): na
216a4(rnying rgyud): phaT/ dzi bai tAn ta kA ra ya hUM phaT/
216a5(rnying rgyud): dang rgya thal min pa'i rnams pa thab dzin to// oM tha ky-il snrel las na bden pa dz+ra d+ha paT/ ngabadu tu spangs rgyas chen pa'i 'phral gyis nyams par byab 'ja
216a6(rnying rgyud): sa/
216a7(rnying rgyud): nabya ga
216b1(rnying rgyud): gas// na
216b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa ma pa rteg gnas so// hrI/ ma sa/ ma ma / nas/
216b3(rnying rgyud): rnam sa kyimin pa da 'i peper btig gi ngon te// de sa bu ma dzi pabyas mnyes par byed mi she pa 'ini sa gyims pa snyus / da ga su dang gsung dang dge sa don rnams sa
216b4(rnying rgyud): dzi'i sa nyaMm la lang ba rnyan bri ngab/ byugasas/ tir/ rgyad/ mo gaN+Di te ti/ rnardzam drA b+had rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// man+ta d+hA kim kAl las na DU Tirje hA pazla/ b+ha kA /
216b5(rnying rgyud): hU~M / nga ma na ma spyod rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// A rad+hi k+Shi sa~M kI lA la sa rba ba g+h+nAn ba hU~M hU~M phaH/ \u0f7f/ oMHk+ki/ oM / ranA ma me nad rnam
216b6(rnying rgyud): brtag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM ba p+pa kI li kI la ya sarbi bi g+h+nAn bi b+h+rUM hUM phaT/ me b+ha ka mAM s+ya/ rba d+hi ra/ oMn+yaiti/ A~M/ ga kha khA ti/ Sh+Te hi/ pad+ma chen mo'i mdu skyod kun tu brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// A~M ka mab+hi li kI la ya/ sarba bi Sh+TAn
217a1(rnying rgyud): brnam pa/ mnyag mAH// mas sa/ te/ rArnas nan ma du jugs nas kyang tu ga / da dus mtha 'das rnam sa ma dpa spangs sa gtug gnas tham pa ma sems par dra
217a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems yang dag par bsgrub zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn prar+g+haM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par brtag pa'i snying nge
217a3(rnying rgyud): n+d+ha 'i'i hrI ltas/ sadza'i Sh+Ta di skyesas d+h+we/ baT baT TA/ byang su'i m+b+hi sems 'a'ar bo bzla bzhes bya ba rnam par brtag pa'i ting po srid to// mi hADI sti ma pa/ sarba badz+ran buM sa/ b+heT+Te/ baT baD+ha Ta/ byang chu kyi sems
217a4(rnying rgyud): bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM pad+ma lI li kI li yai/ sarba big+h+nAn bi hUM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ byang chub kyi sems pad+ma bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM ka ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAn bits+tsha hU~M phaT/ hUM hU~M hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ byang chu
217a5(rnying rgyud): sems rdo rje las kyi sazla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bzad pa'i kun tu 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'bar ba chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra
217a6(rnying rgyud): kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra a gA ni dz+wa la s+phA ra NA ma hA pU dza khA hi hUM hU~M phaT/ rdo rje'i me kun tu brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM bud d+ha kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM hUM phaT/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi dz+wa la s+pha ra Na ma hA pu dza lA ni hU~M hUM phaT/ 'khor
217a7(rnying rgyud): lo'i me kun tu brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// A~M rat+na kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi hUM hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na ab+hi dz+wa la s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza khA ni hUM hUM phaT/ rin po che'i me kun tu brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nA na ba~M hUM hUM phaT/
217b1(rnying rgyud): oM sa ldat+pa la slaraHma hA pA pa pa/ bad+ma'i mthan brtag pa nas can tu 'dun/ oM kam k+Shi l-i kAl la/ sarba d+hA rnasas/ oM/ mas na la thar/ ma thug tu tu bya/ rdo rje las ma kun du byurtag pa zhes byaba'i ting du ma
217b2(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par brtag pa chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bsgrub bya gnon pa rnam par 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ san bi \u0f88\u0f90
217b3(rnying rgyud): phaT/ sarba sha truM che ge mo a mu kaM badz+ra rU pa che ge mo rU pa staM b+ha ya hUM hUM hUM hUM/ rdo rje gnon pa'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM bud d+ha kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ sarba sha hUM che ge mo a mu kaM tsakra rU pa che ge mo rU pa s+t+waM b+ha ye/
217b4(rnying rgyud): oM oM oM oM/ 'khor los gnon pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'don to// oM rat+na kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ sarba sha/ bru~M che ge mo a mra ke/ rat+na rU pa che gau mo staM b+ha ya/ dzaM dzaM traM traM/ rin po che'i gnon pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya
217b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i ti nge 'dzin to// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM hUM phaT/ sarba sha dz+yaM che ge mo a mu ka pad+ma d+hU pa che ge mo rU pa staM b+hA ya/ a a a a/ pad+ma'i gnon pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM karma kI li kI la ya/ sarba
217b6(rnying rgyud): bid+d+hAn hrid+h+we hUM phaT/ sarba sha d+hi ni ge mo a mra ke kaN nApa che ga mo ste b+h+yo la hrI thA hrA thA/ rdo rje'i lus chen pos gnon bzhis kyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'bar ba'i smon mas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin la rto
217b7(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas/ rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub dbab pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra kA ya wA ka tsit+ta sarba sid+d+hi hrI hUM hUM/ rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam par brtag
218a1(rnying rgyud): zhes ca / // da d+hag pa sngalas/ sarba wAn pa d+hAs/ oMn s+yA la phywas/ sa mas / ba rgyu sa thab rnam par brtag pa zhes tha tu/ nam
218a2(rnying rgyud): la ya/ sarba big+h+nAnA badz+dza hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na kA ya wAka tsi ta sarba sid+d+hi dza dz+dza dza/ rin po che'i dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAn ba~M hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kA ya wAka tsit+ta sarba sid+d+hi hri hri hi/ pad+ma chen po
218a3(rnying rgyud): brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// A~M karma kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAnA baM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma kA ya wAka tsit+ta sarba sid+d+hi ha ha ha/ rdo rje'i las chen po'i dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes kun gcod pa thogs pa
218a4(rnying rgyud): med par 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig sngags ngan pa thams cad gcod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM hUM hUM phaT/ sarba bitA na/ sarba mU la
218a5(rnying rgyud): ka ra mA Ni/ ts+tshi na da ts+tshi na da/ ma na tra suM b+hA ni/ bi nA sha nA ya/ biSh+Ta nAM/ ts+tshe da ka hUM/ rdo rje'i mthu chen pos pha rol gyi rig pa ngan pa rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM prad+d+ha kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nA nA baM hUM hUM phaT/ sarba bi b+han/
218a6(rnying rgyud): sarba man trA Ni/ sarba mU la ka ra mA Ni/ ts+tshi na di ts+tshin da/ man d+hA Ni/ bi nA sha nA ya phaT/ bi d+hA na/ ts+tshe da ka hUM/ 'khor lo'i mthu chen pos pha rol gyi rig pa dran pa rnam par skrod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM rat+na kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+na na baMt+yaM
218a7(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ sarba bib+hAn/ sarba ma no d+hIH/ sarba mU la kar pA Ni/ dzI kr-i dz+ham+ba/ sa rba man d+hA ni be nA gnA piT biT+Tan/ s+yod kaM hUM/ rin po che'i mthu chen pos pha rol gyi rig pa ngan pa rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba bi ny+dzan
218b1(rnying rgyud): smra /
218b2(rnying rgyud): la ya/ sarba bi s+thA na ba~M hUM hU~M phaT/ sarba bi d+h+wan/ sarba man trA Ni/ sarba mU la karmA Ni/ ts+tshin da ts+tshind/ man tA sum b+hi ni/ bi nA sha nA ya phaT/ bid+d+hA nAM/ ts+tshed ka hUM/ rdo rje las chen po'i mthus pha rol gyi rig pa ngan pa rnam par smod paM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
218b3(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shrIs kyi rang bzhin rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i don la snyoms par zhugs nas/ pha rol gyi phyag rgya rnam par gcod pa 'di nyid kyi sra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung ngo // oM dzadz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba bid+h+wan ba hU~M hU~M phaT/
218b4(rnying rgyud): pA ra muR+tha na/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i mthu chen pos pha rol gyi phyag rgya ngan pa gzhig pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM bu dz+nyA kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hU~M phaT/ pa ra mu d+hA na/ ts+tshin di ts+tshi na da hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo'i mthu chen pos
218b5(rnying rgyud): rol gyi phyag rgya ngan pa gzhig pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM ra~Mt+na kI li kI la ya/ sarba pa~M g+h+nA nA bi d+de hUM phaT/ pa ra mrad+han/ skyon da ts+tshin da hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rin po rgya'i mthus pha rol gyi phyag rgya ngan pa gzhog pa'i brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting
218b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin to// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ pa ra mu d+ha na/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da hUM phaT/ pad+ma chen po'i mthus pha rol gyi phyag rgya ngan pa gzhig pa'i rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM ka rma kI li kI la ya/ sarba bi s+thAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ @
218b7(rnying rgyud): ramra d+hA na/ na de rten da hU~M phaT/ rdo rje las chen po'i mthus pha rol gyi phyag rgya ngan pa gzhig pa rnam par btag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'byung ba phran sum tshogs pa zhes phra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par khrigs nas/ rang /
219a1(rnying rgyud): reg pa gas tha'ad nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung // oM bar+tha mA me k+She la pa/ sarba ba g+h+nAn tsa d+g+ha thA baT/ ya ma bi d+d+han+te/ kai Sh+Taka ma rbA stAr ya/ rdo rje'i bdebs bdag gi rig pa bskyed pa'i rnam par brtag ngan
219a2(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM prad+d+ha kI li kI la ya/ sarba bi s+thAnA br-i hUM hUM phaT/ ma ma bid+yAn+d+ha sha~MSh+Tha ka ma nu s+phA rA ya/ 'khor lo'i bde bas bdag gi rig pa bskyed pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM rat+na kI le kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bri hU~M hU~M phaT
219a3(rnying rgyud): ma ma bid+ha nAM shiSh+Tha ka ma nu s+pha ra ya/ rin po che'i bde bas bdag gi rig pa bskyed pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn paM hUM hUM phaT/ ma ma bid+yA nAM shiSh+Ta ka ma nu s+pha ra ya/ pad+ma bde ba chen pos bdag gi reg pa 'gyed
219a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM karma kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ ma ma bid+h+wa nI shiSh+Ta ka ma nu s+pha ra ya/ rdo rje'i las chen po'i ba de bas bdag gi rig pa bskyed pa rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan
219a5(rnying rgyud): 'das 'jig rten skrag par byed pa'i 'khor lo rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin me snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'byung po 'dul ba'i brtag pa 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las sbyang ngo // oM bdwai kI li kI la ya/ sarba Sh+Than ban+de hUM phaT/
219a6(rnying rgyud): sar+that+tataSh+Tha laM kar/ sarba tha te Ta pra tig toSh+Tha bA 'adz+ra sarba bI Am tI'i tshogs rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// maM Ta r+d+hak+Shai li kI la ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAn ba drA hUM phaT/ sarba thAta thA la ka ra sa rbas teSha ma te ta to b+ha ba badz+ra sarba bi tA /
219a7(rnying rgyud): o'i mtshon pas rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzinato// mo ran+d+hak+tili kI la la/ sarba bi dz+nyAn hri hUM hUM phaT/ sarba b+hUta b+ha la~M ka ra/ sarba gra te tha pra tig to b+ha ba be dza sarba bi dz+nyAn/ rin po che'i mtshan pas rnam par gnos pa rnam par brtag pa zhes
219b1(rnying rgyud): rdzam ma can / mo ban kIl la la/ san brtan dz+haMSh+Ta / sarbab+hat+yASh+Ta pa kas sa pa sa N+Di ta/ bubangs na gyirgyu/ parlamatshan pas rnam par gnam pa brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ngang ra // tuna'i k+kol ba dran
219b2(rnying rgyud): big+h+nAn paM hUM hUM phaT/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra sa rba gra he Sh+Ta pra ti ta to b+ha ba badz+ra sa rba bit+taM/ rdo rje las kyi rnam par gzhom pa brtag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par dag pa'i cho g.yis// sbyor ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bdag dang gzhan don song 'di/
219b3(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi du ma ste// dri ma'i las la rnam par 'grub// bdag med pa yi du ma spangs// du ma mo gsham bu bzhin brtag/ du mas gdul phyir bsam mi khyab// tha dad las rnams rigs yin to// rna
219b4(rnying rgyud): pa lnga ru mkhas pas bshad// sgo dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas las rnams shes par bya// rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dang // rin chen pad+ma rgya gram brtag/ 'bar ba dbu gsum phyag drug gam// dbu dgra bco brgyad yang na gcig/ mkhas pas
219b5(rnying rgyud): sems dang rigs su brtag/ gang la mos pa'i las rnams kyis// las rnams thogs pa med par 'gyur// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rigs lnga'i phur pa yongs su bshad/
219b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po/ dpal 'jigs byed kyi dbang phyug chen po/ rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs thogs pa med par las kyi 'khor lo
219b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo chen po rnams kyi rig pa dang ting nge 'dzin 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dzo ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dat+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM/
220a1(rnying rgyud): sa / sa smra ma du tu
220a2(rnying rgyud): sa AH/ ba shang man+d+ham+b+haH/ mA nga sa b+h+rUM hA/ Ak+Shar+yA Sha ma b+his/ da bi d+ha taka/ pA ts+tsha \u0f7f/ sAram+bAr ny+dza auH/ / d+harbadaH/ badz+ra d+d+ha maswA/ d+has/ te/ a c-i ga gzhan/ oM (ng+ga/
220a3(rnying rgyud): hU~M hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra pu mo hU~M sa ma yaM m+me/ sarba biSh+TaM/ sarba bid+hA ni/ sarba man d+hANi/ sarba mA la kar mA Ni/ dz+nyAn da ts+tshi nang / min tANe/ bin+ta sha rA ya phaT/ bid+yAn/ ts+tshe ra ka d+haM/ par pra dAn/ dA s+phon da/ hU~M phaT/ mamra
220a4(rnying rgyud): bin+d+ha nAM/ shiSh+Ta ka me nu sma ra ya/ sarba gra ha ShA pra te he to b+ha ba badz+ra sarba~M big+h+nAM/ rdo rje khro bo'i rig pa thams cad las kyi 'khor ba zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'bar ba'i me lce kun tu 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
220a5(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo chen po rnams kyi phyag rgya brtag pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dkar// dbus dkar g.yas sngo ljang ser g.yon// dang po rdo rje dung chen te// par ma
220a6(rnying rgyud): sum 'khor lo 'chang // tir bya rgod tha mar 'dzin// brag gi steng na brgya byin gnon// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs kyang drug/ rdo rje'i gshog pa rnam par gdengs// 'bar ba 'khyil pa la sogs te// rdo rjer kun rnams rnam par rdzogs par brtag/ 'brug
220a7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa rdzu sgra ste// g.yas dkar ga yon ni dam bya ste// rdorje drung chen dbyug pa maM// ti dajug pa khwa yis mdzes// 'bar ba zhabs drug drang srong gnon// rkyen rnams rdzogs par brtag par bya// gshin rje'i rgyal ni phu po// / rdza su lha nag ga ma
220b1(rnying rgyud): dgra/ dang khas pa dang byug mas pa rnams// ta byang ga nam mangs// 'ag ga na gas pa ba // mag pa lta nan bar // dran pa zlaganagagapan pa ga// b+ha ga la thagags pas brtan// 'an sa dang ru
220b2(rnying rgyud): bden bral btsir bar mdzad pa ste// rkyen rnams rdzogs par yang dag bstan// rtaska dmang po g.yas dkar po// g.yon na tan pa rnam par mdzes// dud grag zhugs pa pa gra can// tA~M ra mkha' ldir tha mang mongs// drug gi steng na zhabs pargyang 'byud// rdorje rgyal
220b3(rnying rgyud): por brtag/ gzhan las rgyal ba dmar skya ste// ser po ljang gu g.yon gyi zhal// dung khrag dpag mda' ja yab can// ti gyeg yang dag 'dzin// rlung gi steng na zhabs brtags te// 'bar ba'i rgyan rnams tshang bar brtag/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ldang nag mdog/
220b4(rnying rgyud): sar po dud kha g.yon gyi zhal// dung khrag dbyug to rgya la ma ste// tir dbyug pa pu shud can// gsus pa 'phyang ba rnam par 'ardzis// 'bar ba chen po rnam par blta/ khams gsum kun las rgyal ba ni// gser gyi mdog 'dra ka yas dkar te// g.yon gyi dbun
220b5(rnying rgyud): ljang bu'o// de bzhin phyag rgya gzhag cid dkrol// dpa' bos nan tan bya ba yin// gang dag rang gi rig pa nyams// gso zhing bskyed par bya ba'i las// rig pa 'dzin pas myur du 'bad// khams gsum pa yi 'byung ba rnams// gang dag gyur du gtses pa
220b6(rnying rgyud): rnams// dpa' bo chen pos myur bu sgrol// yan lag gi ni cho ga la// mkhas pas snying rje'i stobs kyis gsol// slob dpon smod par byed pa dang // gang gi bstan pa sgrib byed dang // sems can du mar 'tshe ba laM// shes rab snying rjer ldan pa yi// ma
220b7(rnying rgyud): yin myur dradu nyams par bya// / brdzi ba dang gang dgang yin te/ rang bzhin gnas nas dgug pa dang // dgrag nas nyams dang rang gnas su// grang 'di sngon du 'grob yin// rdo rjegasang pa'i tshobs mchog gis// gas dab dra mthad dpa// / gang leg
221a1(rnying rgyud): gdunan da/ du/ / sus sag/ na/
221a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i kun bcad cing // gang gi dus ni dag par bstabs// sems ni mkhas pas rdzogs payi// byang chub sems su bsdubar bya// gzugs brtan rten du skyong bani// dum bu da nga ni tshal pa dang // de bzhin pa yi gzugs rnams ni// rtsa dang shing la gnas pa dang /
221a3(rnying rgyud): bong ba sngo bas gos pa'am// gang dag bsreg par 'os pa yi// shing leb la sogs bris pa'i gzugs// mkhas pas 'bad ste bsreg par bya// zur gsum thab kyi grwa gsum du// rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas te// 'bar ba'i kho bos brgyan par bsam// phung
221a4(rnying rgyud): la ni drag pos dkris// tsher ma'i shing la me sbar te// 'bar ba 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas// tsha ba'i mar dang lan tshwa dang // gyi tshe dug dang khrag sgra dang // lcags kyi lding ros dam rdzas dang // sol phyes bgos pa'i dam rdzas rnams// gsang sngags bzlas
221a5(rnying rgyud): par rab 'bad ste// gang gi gzugs ming rus bsreg na// myur du las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pas 'bad pa yang // bsregs pa'i thal ba la sogs pa// thams cad gnan par bya ba ni// las rnams ma grub par du bzhag/ las rnams grub
221a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mod la ni// myur du zhi ba'i las la 'bad// 'di ni las rnams thams cad kyi// 'khor los myur ba'i rgyal po'o// gang dag the tshom dmigs pa ni// ji ltar ri bong dra bzhin du// 'di yi 'bras bu de bzhin te// 'di la rnam par dpyad mi dgos//
221a7(rnying rgyud): gang la be tsom med pa'i blo// rgyal po rang la smod pa bzhin// thams cad 'grub par byas pa yin// 'di ni srub pa thams cad kyi// mkhas pas mig dang snying du bshad// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi
221b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal brgyan dulas/ lcags 'dum pa las kyal ba la rnam par brtag pa zhes bya ba'i 'bu b+ha bco brgyad pa // denas da tsha 'i byas na/ 'khor na nang na com ldan 'das kyis mthunubs rje bad nyi mgyis pa ba ba dang
221b2(rnying rgyud): phyagan tshogs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'khor de'i nang nas langs te/ ra zhi 'khor dum rje dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas phyogs nas panor tam chad dngang chags kyis yang dag par nand nas/ 'di da ce ga ma ldan 'das
221b3(rnying rgyud): shul mchis pa'i rang gi mthus snyems pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / rnam par thar pa la yongs suganod tsa / sku dum la yang gtso ba mchog par da ba'i ma pon 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / 'ga' ni sangs rgyas kyi ba// napa 'dan
221b4(rnying rgyud): dri la ming kyi ches pas kun tu 'khrugs nas/ slob dpon la thod pa dag byed pa rnams dang / 'di ltar gan dpa ba gyi ba'i rma bos pa mtshag pa'i bdud dang / su rtags la sogs pas brtan pa nyams par bgyid pa dang / 'gro ba kun rdu la thams pang
221b5(rnying rgyud): babyed pa'i mi dge pa'i gnyen po rnams/ myur drugasad pa'i las khon lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsang sngags kyi mdun pa bshad du nas pa zhes brjod nas/ lanub cu bani rnying du/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor nas rang gi d+han la 'khod
221b6(rnying rgyud): danam bcom ldan 'das dang de na gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang gsung dmun gyi bdan pa/ dpa 'dag sa rgyad kyi dang tsun can snas 'di na gas// gas ra bdag pa 'di lta ste/ sem
221b7(rnying rgyud): sa pa 'phrul yin na/ 'di rdzun na gyi mthunan pam na cu tsun / 'din bya chu mas dpa' la da 'i brnam // rig 'dzin gzhan na rgya na byung bal mags par byung bam/ dargyangan tun kyim
222a1(rnying rgyud): gsod par mi bya yis cung zhig sdod cig ces gsungs so// de nas yang lag na na rje thogs pa med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sngon pa sangs rgyas kyis kyang yongs su ma bshad/ 8
222a2(rnying rgyud): 'ongs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsung bar mi 'gyur ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can nyon mongs pa 'phel ba'i slad du ste/ gang na gdul ba mchis par ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin
222a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad du'o// 'di lta'i dus na/ sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa nyung ba dang / nag po'i rigs mthu mngon par byas pa'i dbang gis na/ kyai bcom ldan 'das dus la bab po// las
222a4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni las kye mchog ste/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis ma brlabs na/ skad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ nor bu lon pa'i mi rgya mtsho las thar du nya ba na gru zhig pa bzhin mchis te/ kye bcom ldan 'das ljon shing gi sdong po mas tshig pa bzhin du gnas par gyur
222a5(rnying rgyud): partags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// la gan rdo rje 'di ltas myod de'i dus labab par shes na/ 'dir 'dus pa rnams kyi rnal mdu/ khyod kyis thogs pa med per 'byung ba'i rdo rngo ga cha rnam par sra bzhes dra ba la
222a6(rnying rgyud): stongs par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu ben pos ting nge 'dzin thob par byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyod spobs paskyed cig/ de nas lag ni de rjes 'khor rnams pa 'di skad du ban zhing / rang gi rdorje thogs pa med par kun tu 'dren zhing / bcom ldan
222a7(rnying rgyud): ngas la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// kye bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma sangs rgyas ya mtshan che// sngags kyi mthu rnams bstan du gsol// gdug pa myur du gsod pa dang // nyon mongs 'khor ba btan du 'chi 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
222b1(rnying rgyud): stsol// 'di na zha ba sa mdzes pas// sangs rgyas nAg sud+g+ha lAdu ljang// zhu bsang 'dul bar 'gyur ba// khobs khro bzhi pa mdzad// sa pas rang bzhin gsod mdzad pa'i// khro ba'i phyag rgya gdangs nas kyang // thugs rje'i skar mas 'dzin pa dam/
222b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes mche bas gcod pa'i slad// shes rab chen po'i rang bzhin la// gnyis med tig tu gsod pa'i phyir// sangs kyis chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang / rgya gram
222b3(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par mdod de/ rdo rje mtshon cha'i bu lug kun tu thogs pa med pa 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sder mo 'bung ba zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA kA tsiN+Da badz+ran na//
222b4(rnying rgyud): A~MHg+hag+hA ta yag+hA ta ya/ lhas ldan pa sarba dudz+nyA na phaT/ badz+ra kI le k+Shi la ya/ sadzam+b+ha paM phaT/ tra~M dza~MH/ badz+ra kI'i kI la la/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA ba ya ti/ kA ya thA gaHbadz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje ser mos kun tu gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin /
222b5(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ga spangs pa'i mod la ni// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bsam gyes mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin pas/ rdo rje mtshon pa'i 'tshub mtho ga kun nas langs te/ bdud la sogs pa gang dag gsad par 'os pa thams cad/ ma bkug pa bzhin du rdo rje'i 'tsha ba las thub ci
222b6(rnying rgyud): aHka'i dog pa bzhin du rnam par 'gas te/ rdo rje'i mtshon pa ste tshogs pa dang / sgra brabs ma gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis/ mngon spyod chen pos bsgrub par ze ba'i phung po chu tshul bzhin du/ de cig ma de nyid la zad par byas so// dpal lag na rda rdu la sogs
222b7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyang / lus brib nas brtsal zhing khrag du sgrogs par gyur to// de nas lag ni rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di ga ces gas ma te// rtse bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khams gsum na du cha/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la mthu phun sum tshogs
