247a1(rnying rgyud): bran su kha bzhi nyid gsal// dzaHdzaHbya ba bzhi nyid las// sa bdag bzhi ni gsal ba'i don// b+h+yo zhes pa ni bzhi las kyang // bdag nyid bzhi ru rab tu bsam// b+h+yo zhes nyi shu rtsa brgyad las// dbang phyug ma ni bsam
247a2(rnying rgyud): byAbyas la// dbus su zla gam sgo can la// bcom ldan bdud 'phrul lab yum dgod// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rdo rje dang // sku gsum ldan pa'i thod pa dang // dbus kyi glu gsum thod pas brgyan// rgyas 'debs ma yi steng nyid du// gru gsum la
247a3(rnying rgyud): ni sras mchog gsum// khro bo 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// mthing ga'i steng du dgod par bya// rtsibs mtshan la ni phra men ma// gong ma bzhin du mthing ga la// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bsam// de nas slob ma gzud par bya// de bzhin
247a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbam pa zab mo las/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya'i bdag po de/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
247a5(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas/ karma he ru ka la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa// de dag rnams ni rgyu yi don// da ni rab tu bshad bya la// rang gi gsal ba'i ting 'dzin ni// sbyor pa dang po rjes su sbyor// shin tu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang // las kyi rgyal ba mtshig dag
247a6(rnying rgyud): dang // dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dag go// ting 'dzin rim pa de rnams dang // rnal 'byor rim pa'i sgo dag dang // rnal 'byor dang ni rnal 'byor che// rjes su rnal 'byor shin rnal 'byor// de rlung stong pa'i 'phyos ni// kun gzhi'i rnam shes
247a7(rnying rgyud): yin pa ste// langs kyang de la bstim yang kho// gzhan la bstim pa ma yin te// gnas pa de nyid kho na la'o// bstim pa rlung gi man ngag go// de nas gnyis pa'i rlung de ni// phyi nang lus dang shes pa la// gnas pa rlung gi gnas yin te/
247b1(rnying rgyud): g.yas g.yon ring po dal ba rnams// ting 'dzin da la bsgrib mi bsrib// sems kyis sems la brtag pa na// phur pa byang chub sems su mthong // de yang rlung gi cha bas te// gdab par bya ba yod ma yin// rlung zhes pas na las du dbyed//
247b2(rnying rgyud): shes de yi bzhon pa'i rta// kha btsum lce yi dbus su ni// rlung gi 'khor lo tshon gang ba// tshom bu'am dung rgya'i tshul du bsam// de nas cha snyoms srang mnga' 'dra// sems kyi skad cig rim pa brgyad// de gol rim pa lam gyi mchod/
247b3(rnying rgyud): par thar pa'i lam yang ston// mi 'jigs pa yang de kho na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ rlung skyo bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyis gsol pa// kI la ya yi bdag po
247b4(rnying rgyud): rU tra dang 'dra ba sgral dmigs la// ming dang gzugs la brten lags sam// chos nyid tsam du bas ma lags sam// rang ga'i dngos po bsgral lags sam// 'on te thams cad rang bzhin bzhag/ kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// nyon cing
247b5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed he ru ka/ rU tra dang 'dra ba sngal dmigs de// kun tshogs sgo nas bsgral bar bya// dang po de ltar byas pa dang // nub gsum pa la 'jug par bya// ming rus lo dang zla ba dag/ khrag chen gyis ni bris nas ni// chu tso srub po rkang rjes sa/
247b6(rnying rgyud): yang nan+do phye dug la bya// de ltar ling+ga byas la ni// me ngos 'brub khung kha khyer sum brtseg can// nyi shu rtsa brgyad srin mo 'gros// yang na 'grub khung phyogs ngan sang // rang ga'i dngos po ma yin te// rnam shes li ng+gang khug pa'o// de yang bdag
247b7(rnying rgyud): bya'i drong ldan// the tshom med dang yang dag gzhung // dam la gnas dang le lo spang // 'di rnams 'grub pa'i rgyu ru grags// yang na bya ba thams cad spang // rdzas tshogs dgra rnams med da du// shes rab rnam gsum ldan par bya// de nas phur
248a1(rnying rgyud): rim pa ni// dong gzhon nu zab ban// bsgrub phur dngos grub spyod pa'o// grwa men srung ma'i phur pa ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi po nya lin+ta// des kyang gdab par bya ba min// prA gsung thugs las byung ba yi// sras
248a2(rnying rgyud): mchog kI la ya gsum ni// gdab pa'i phur pa dam pa ste// gru gul tshil chen dag dang ni// ge ro tsa na'i dud pas bdug/ dbyings dang lhu mas su gzi byin bskyed// nag po dug gtor byas la ni// skyes kyang dang po las na dbang // 'jig kyang
248a3(rnying rgyud): las kyis 'jig/ oM las bskyed pa hU~M nyid ni// bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags nyid do// da ni bzlas pa rgyun gyi sngags// rab tu ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor de// legs par goms shing 'dris pa dang // shin tu brjod la rab tu bzlas// 'di ni smras pa
248a4(rnying rgyud): zab mo yi// nges pa'i drag sngags bstan par bya// hung dkar nyid la bsngags byas la// snying ga lte ba gsang ba ru// nyi ma dros dang dmar thag chad// shin tu dag par bzlas pa bya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ mA ra ya che ge mo phaT phaT// snying
248a5(rnying rgyud): la sarba big+h+nAn paM d+hI mA ra ya che ge mo phaT phaT// lte ba la d+hip+ta tsakra tiSh+Tha mA ra ya che ge mo phaT phaT/ gsang ba la/ 'di ni sngags mchog rgyal po ste// khro bo phra men kun gyi sngags// zhe sdang rdo rje bsam byas la// me dpung 'bar ba'i rang rtags
248a6(rnying rgyud): can// me dpung e la sum cha nub// 'jigs su rung ba'i sras gsum gyi// sngags ni kI li kI la ya// a ko Ta ni bzla bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ sras kI la ya bton pa'i le'u ste zug
248a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas kI la ya'i bdag po de rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bka' stsal pa/ sngags pa rgyan gyi chos kyi rtags// glang chen ko rlon zhing gi shun// zil chen zhag dang rak+tas brgyan/
248b1(rnying rgyud): stag gi sham bur sbrul gyi chun// 'di dag 'jigs pa'i dpa' bo'i chas// rnam rgyal la sogs go rim bzhin// shar stong nub smad gnyis su ni// steng 'og khro bo snga ma bzhin// rtsibs mtshan la nI tha men ma// tha na la sogs re ma ti// ya b+hin lcags kyu shar
248b2(rnying rgyud): du dgod// shA na mu kha re ma ti// de byin zhags pa lho ru dgod// sr-ig mu kha rem du// bse phyin lcags glog nub tu ste// pr-i ka mu kha re mdzaH// phag byin dril bu nub nyid du// de ltar srung ma bcu gnyis dang // rgo ma bzhi ni sbal mar dgod// de nas sras mchog kI la ya
248b3(rnying rgyud): lag tu blang ste gdab par bya// de yang a ko Ta yis so// de nas gdab pa zin pa dang // dgra bgegs gang yin phyogs ngan du// ling+ga de ni bsreg par bya// de nas shin tu rnal 'byor bsam// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo//
248b4(rnying rgyud): las/ lus ngan bsgral ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// kI la ya yi dbang dam pa// de ring khyod kyis rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ badz+ra kI la ya bdag po de/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i
248b5(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rigs kyi he ru ka/ sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis na// dpang mchog ces ni rab grags pa// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // de la dbye ba gsum gsum dang // yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig
248b6(rnying rgyud): dbang ka/ bzhi bcu phur pa re re la// dbang ni bskur du yod pa de// de la dbang mchog bzhi ru bshad// bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang // shes rab ye shes bde chen dang // shin tu rnal 'byor bzhi pa'o// de ltar mkhas pas gang rtogs pa//
248b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi phur pa'o// 'khor gyis gsol pa// de don rgyas par bka' stsapa 'tshal// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin snang ba'i mi dag le// bslab na chags pa'i srung ma ni// bcu gnyis dag tu shes pa la// shwan
249a1(rnying rgyud): gas // la gas rnas// sogs nas / u / ga / da sa // khyo dun na/
249a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi tshan gsum po rtag tu ni// bsten cing ba lin sbyin par bya// de yis dngos grub myur ba'o// dbang mchog bzhi yi bskur bya ba/ bum pa byed pa'i mkhan po des// rgya mdung nyid ni bum pa'o// phrin las rnam bzhi dbang du sa pa// dka
249a3(rnying rgyud): dmar dang nag dang ser// de lta bu yi dbang nyid ni// phyi yi dbang du 'gro ba'o// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs gdung rgyad 'dzin// btsun mo de las khro bo bcu// bton pa nang gi dbang nyid do// yum nyid mkha' nas sras gsum po// rta gang dbang
249a4(rnying rgyud): gzi byin bskyed// de ni gsang ba'i dbang du 'gro// dbang mchog bka' stsal nyan pa la// phan dang nus pa gang 'dod sbyin// gal te dam tshig med pa la// byin na glang skar mtshon btags 'dra// byang chub sems kyi bsti gnas sa//
249a5(rnying rgyud): lus la 'khor lo bcu yi bgo// stong na lnga ste spa na lnga// 'di ltar khro bo bcu bkod pa// de bzhin dbang po lnga dag la// phra men zung re dgod pa dang // rkang lag bzhi le badz+ra drug po// rim pa bzhin du bzhi bzhi gnas// de ni dang
249a6(rnying rgyud): dbang dam pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi btsun mo yi// mkhang nas thams cad bton pa ni// gsang ba'i dbang du gzhag par bya// shin tu mi dmigs bzhi pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes pa zab mo las/ dbang
249a7(rnying rgyud): gi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'khor la bos nas/ dbyings zab mo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bka' stsal pa/ thams cad thams cad med mthong ba// dkyil 'khor khro tshul ma lus pa// ma
249b1(rnying rgyud): rmongs la bstan pa'o// yang dag dran na spyong pa ste// mtshan ma'i bug chags spangs pa'o// sems las mas kyis bltas bstan// mthungs med pa mthong ba mchog// don bas don dog yanan// zad par gshegs pas ma gzigs
249b2(rnying rgyud): de ni sla bar slob ste// dga' ba shin tu mthong bar dka'// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ shin tu rnal 'byor bston pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / sbas pa zab mo mdung rtse'i chung rdzogs so//
249b3(rnying rgyud): gya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang / bod kyi ba na de be ro tsA nas bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya shak+ti a gra rA ga tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa mdung rtse dmar po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
249b4(rnying rgyud): gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad pa dag gis thos pa dus gi cig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang na/ rdo rje srin po'i lha tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe nyid las mi gzhan pa'i
249b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor karma he ru kas 'di skad zhus so// kye bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa sems can rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci la spyod/ las gang sprin bka' phul du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po 'jig rten srid pa'i
249b6(rnying rgyud): gyad// chags pa gnas pa zhig pa las// bar du ljongs par gyur pa'i tshe// de yang snod chags bcud chags mnyam// de dus lha yi sprul pa ni// bag tsam rlan 'dus gnas pa las// bya rgod dar ma gcig tu srid// gsher la rlon tsam
249b7(rnying rgyud): gyur pa las// stag chen dang ma gcig tu srid// de ni srid pa'i sprul pa'o// bya yi tshong 'chi' ba'i gnas/ shar thogs shel gyi brag pa dkar po ri mtho sa gtsang bar// bya dang stag gi lus gnyis ni// ma 'phrad yid kyis chags pas bshos/
250a1(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i sgo nga bdun dang chu bur gnyis su srid/ sgo bdun po ni/ shel sgong dkar po dang / dngul sgong skya bo dang / lcags spong nag po dang / gsar sgong ser po dang / zangs sgong dmar po dang / g.yu sgong sngo
250a2(rnying rgyud): po dang / mchong sgong smug po dang bdun no// chu bur gnyis la yid ma ches nas/ mchus brtol bas/ bud med bzang sdug la 'od chags pa bdun byung bas/ bya 'drogs tshang bor ro// bud med bdun gyis ni/ sgong de tshags byas so//
250a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i khyang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bud med bdun las/ gcig gis shel sgong dkar po brtol bas/ de nas mi dkar mdung tsam la dpral ba na mig gcig yod pa byang / bud med gcig gis dngul sgo
250a4(rnying rgyud): brtol bas/ mi skya bo ra'i mgo can byung / bud med gcig gis lcags sgong nag po brtol bas/ mi nag po lag pa dgu pa byung / bud med gcig gis gser sgong ser po brtol bas/ mi ser po mig dmar can byung / bud med gcig/
250a5(rnying rgyud): gis g.yu sgong sngon po brtol bas/ mi sngon po sbal ba'i mgo can myang / bud med gcig gis zangs sgong dmar po bcol bas/ mi dmar por gyes kham pa zhon pa gcig byung / bud med gcig gis mchod sgod smug po brtol bas/ bud med
250a6(rnying rgyud): ka la bzhin bzad sdug la 'od chags pa zung / gcig nag tshe dpral na mig gcig kha na so gcig/ zad na nu gcig yod pa byung / gcig gcan gzan gyi mgo can du myong ngo // byung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
250a7(rnying rgyud): nas mi dkar po mig gcig pa gang / bud med nag mo mig gcig ma gnyis mchis pa las/ bu dgu mnga' gzhu dang mdung thogs pa dang / bu bco brgyad sgye'u ser can bco brgyad byung ngo // mi s+ya bo ra'i mgo can dang / bud med kyi'i mgo can
250b1(rnying rgyud): rgyagaci
250b2(rnying rgyud): mchis pa las/ byis pa spel ma gnyis bcu/ byis pa thal 'a mgocan nyes pacwa/ byis pa pong bu'i mgacan nyis bcwa/ skyes pa lu gsags nyis na // mi nag po la ga dang po dang / ba ma dang gang mo gzugs sa
250b3(rnying rgyud): bu khye'u gnyis bu mo gsum ste lnga byung ngo // mi ser po mig dmar can dang / bud med bzang mo gcig ces pas/ phre'u gnyis bu mo gsum ste lnga byung ngo // chu 'ur gcig brtol ba las/ bud med dkar mo dpral na mig gcig yod pa/
250b4(rnying rgyud): bud med ser mo ral gcig gnam du bsgred pa/ bud med dmar mo lcags kyu thogs pa/ bud med sngon mo dbyug to thogs pa bzhi byung ste/ rtses pa dang skyes lugs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas mi dkar po bu spad bcas pas/
250b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can thams cad la gnod pa sna tshogs byas/ srog gcod pa dang / sha za ba dang / khrag 'thung ba dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / dbugs rngub pa la sogs pa bkren zhing dbul ba rnams byed par 'gyur ro/
250b6(rnying rgyud): gas ba ba gshegs pa'i lhan gyis ma bzod nas/ thugs rdo ldes pa zhibs bden pa'i chos gsungs pas rgyal bar ma gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das dpal do gzhon du \u0f89\u0fa4 skal te/ gal gsum phrag drag zhangs bzhas
250b7(rnying rgyud): su bzhugs so// sa mdog sngon po/ phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje rtse dgu bsdams/ bar pa rtse lnga bsnams/ g.yon dang po me dpung 'bar ba bsnams/ bar pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams/ tha ma gnyis re rab phur pa 'dril pa/ ske nyi khri chag
250b8(rnying rgyud): sa / ma co / yadrag rung gi / ga drug so/ sa mas gnag sa
251a1(rnying rgyud): rab tsam du bzhengs/ zhal bar snang tsam du gdangs te gsol nas/ 'phongs su bton pas/ gdod bred nas lus 'dar yang yod/ mig sngo thig thig byung nas/ bde bar gshegs pa khyed rang la snrubs su mchi'o//
251a2(rnying rgyud): bdag ma bkum thugs rjes gzung du gsol// bdag gi bu skad 'khor du bzhes su gsol// bdag gi sgra mdog dkar po 'di bzhes la zhal g.yas dkar ba ston par mdzod cig/ der b+ha ga wAn gyis bkad stsal pa// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i dgra/
251a3(rnying rgyud): gdug cing phung sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// shI g+h+raM A na ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs pas/ khos srog gi snying po/ sa ri sa nya ri sa dzaH/ zhes phul lo// bu dgra dang 'tsho brgyad chung ma nag ma tsha phul na
251a4(rnying rgyud): dbang dang byin rlabs zhus so// gsang gsol dbab gcad kyi las bya bar khas blangs/ ming btags pa/ rgyal po blo gros spyan gcig pa dang / chung ma la bdag nyid chen mor ming btags so// des thod pa'i phreng ba yang phul lo// bu dgra la
251a5(rnying rgyud): 'gong po spun dgur ming btags so// bu bco brgyad la yul blon bco brgyad du btags so// mi ring skya bo ra'i mgo can dang / chung ma khyi'i mgo can gnyis kyis/ bu stod tsho deng nas sems can thams cad la gnod par med pa la/ bcom
251a6(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis gzigs nas 'di ma byed byas pas ma thul/ skya'i tsha ma rngam+bu bstan/ yang zhal du rngub pas/ 'dar zhing mig rig rig tu gyur te/ zhus pa bdag gi bu smad 'khor du bzhes/ bdag gi gos glang chen gyi ko rlon 'di pa zhes la rgyan du
251a7(rnying rgyud): mdzod/ ces phul/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i dgra// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rings par khug la smar tshug cig/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya zhes gsungs pas/ los srog gis
251b1(rnying rgyud): snying po/ kar tri dzaHya tre/ zhes phral lo// gas dag so dbab gcad kyi las bya bar khas blangs so// ming gnam the dkar po ra'i mgo can du ming btags so// chung mas zhing gi ga yang gzhi phul lo/ gA na mra khar ming btags so// bu tshol
251b2(rnying rgyud): tha brang stong tshor ming btags so// mi nag po lag dgu 'khor bcas kyis grir gsod pa'i las byed pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma byed gsungs pas/ kho ma thul/ sku tsham rnams ri rab tsam zhal bar spang du gdangs nas gsol bas gdod byed
251b3(rnying rgyud): nas/ 'dar zhing mig rig rig byas nas/ sku mdog nag po 'di yang 'bul/ zhal dbus mthing nag ston par mdzod/ bdag gi chung ma 'di sbyor ba'i yum drA ba zhes su gsol/ bu tsha yang 'khor du 'bul lo zhes phul pas/ bcom ldan
251b4(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// khos srog gi snying po te bai b+h+yo zhes phul lo// gsad gso bab gcad kyi las byed par dbang bskur
251b5(rnying rgyud): ming ni bdud rnams rol zhes bya ba btags so// chung ma'i lag tu rdo rje gyi na dbang bskur// ming btags pa rdo rje ya byin zhes bya'o// yang mi ser po mig dmar po chung ma dang bcas pas// thams cad gsod kyi 'dug pa 'acom ldan 'das kyis 'di mgyed
251b6(rnying rgyud): byas pas nyan du ma 'dod nas/ sku'i tsham rngams ri rab tsam du byas/ zhal bar snang tsam du gdangs nas gsol bas/ gdod bred nas 'dar zhing mig rig rig tu byas/ gos stag lpags rlon pa 'di yang skra'i sham thabs sra bzhes/ chung ma 'di yang lhor
251b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i yum du bzhis/ bu gnyis bu mo gsum ste lnga yang 'khor du bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' dural pa/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i dbye// gdug nying sdang sems ldan pa rnams// mngon spyod tshul du sgrol bar gyis// hUM kA ra a
252a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas/ khas srog snyeng / ab byo// zhes phul lo// dbang gis mngon spyod tshul du khrol cig par bsgyur ro// ming ni gzung mig dmar du ming ba tags so// chung ma la dbang bslar lag tu byinanas/
252a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje de byin du ming btags so// yang mi dmar por skyes la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pas/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i las byed kyi 'dug/ 'di ma byed byas pas/ po ma 'dod nas/ su'i tsha marda m+ba pu ri rab tsam/ zhal bar sngar sem gdangs nas
252a3(rnying rgyud): gsol bas/ gdod bred nas 'dar zhing mig rig rig byas nas// bdag gi sku mdog dmar po 'di yang bzhes/ zhal g.yon dmar la gdangs par mdzod cig/ bdag gi chung ma yang sbyor yum du bzhes shing // bdag dang 'i tsha yang 'khor du ba zhes
252a4(rnying rgyud): su gsol/ zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dngos grub par chad byed pa'i dge// gdug cing ldang sems ldan pa rnams// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// ha sa yang hrid na gsungs pas/ los srog steng a waH/
252a5(rnying rgyud): zhes phul lo// dam nyams kyi mgon ma byed kyi khas das pazhugs so// 'di btags pa/ brtson gri'i rdo rje rdza ba zhes pa med btags sa// rgyang ma la dbang bsgyur/ rdo rje bas byin du ming btags so// mi spyod pa stsal ba'i mam6na/ chung ma
252a6(rnying rgyud): pas// mngond gtong zhing 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ma byed byas pas/ ma 'dod nas sgra'i tsham rngams/ zhal gsum phyag drug/ zhabs bzhi yur gyi ngor stabs su 'jug/ rdzag g.yas dang po rdo rje rtse dgu bsdams/ g.yon dang pos
252a7(rnying rgyud): me dpung 'bar ba ba rnams/ bar pa gnyis na rdo rje rje sde dpe ba Sh+T+rIHgsum bsdams/ tham gnyis ri rab phreng bu 'di la/ zhal bgrad mche gtsigs/ smin ma dbu thog bzhin 'gyu/ spyan dgu tshun gro/ shangs sbubs drug rlung dag 'tshangs/ spyan
252b1(rnying rgyud): su sa nas/ dun dug na/ sa / sa sa/ smra /
252b2(rnying rgyud): sa ba nga chu brgyad nas bstan pas ga nga bang / 'di yid/ tshig ga gzas nas/ bdag pa snad da pa ma khye' ba nga pags sheg/ 'dug gi slong dgas zhig gi pa sa 'das
252b3(rnying rgyud): zhabs gardib mdzod cig/ rlung ma yang snad yum zhes // rnam pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa// dngos grub par byed byung ba'i bgags/ gsu cing snang sems ldan pa las// thob gdam pa gnyi
252b4(rnying rgyud): awe sha la zhes gsangs pas// khas myog snying nyes blo bral mo// mang dang 'bras ro la tshwa rnyings ma drug ga// dris pas bcol/ ming gyu dngas pa zhes bya ba dgatags so// drang ma'i lag su nga byin nas dbang bskad ming btags pa/ rdo rjebag kyi
252b5(rnying rgyud): bud ma rnams kyis 'gug mtshal gnas bsgralas sam ma khrul ma/ shA1 makyil gnas pas dga'i thig phul mo// danas bcom ldan 'das bka' ma byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das shes paka stsal pa// blarlu
252b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs/ khyed bye ma myo gangs labab// rdzun rtsa dang ltar dras bathas pa'o// mngan khyod zin pas myar dumadad// ma gaspangs pas/ 'brur rnags cig gaslong 'phrul ba/ gnab ste s+yAng smra dbang bram/ dru te
252b7(rnying rgyud): mranam ru 'thajal/ yi rkye gyis/ gtang gtang ba dru'i/ dbyin cis/ yi dzin/ sbyin ces/ abapa dang ba bral/ babartsod gyi/ ma thal/ mabadun dang sring ma pazhis/ nga bye kyi ma byo
253a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol zhus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// jig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon
253a2(rnying rgyud): thig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// ces gsungs pas/ ma bdun gyis sog gi snying po phul ba/ mam ba shaM ku ru/ ma taM nya ka ra i dan/ ces phul lo// sring mo bzhis srog steng / mA ra so na pa mdzan hUM phaT/
253a3(rnying rgyud): ces phul lo// sung ma thams cad kyis/ d+hA ta ma ma karma shrI g+h+ra~M ka rA ya phul lo// ming btags pa/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ rdo rje gsal ba glog 'dzin ma/ rdo rje kun bzung mthu mo rje// rdo rje ye shes chen mo// rdo rje gas chen ngod 'ang
253a4(rnying rgyud): ma/ rdo rje gsung sgrog chen mo/ rdo rje sgrol ma za byed ma/ zhes ming btags so// shar gyi dkar mo rdo rje spyan gcig ma// lho yi ser mo rdo rje ral gcig ma// nub kyi dmar mo rdo rje dbang sde ma// byang gi sngon mo rdo rje las mkhan ma'o// brtul
253a5(rnying rgyud): zhing dbang bskur ming btags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can po ni btul/ mo ni sbyor ba'i yum du byas/ pu rnams ni 'khor du byas/ rgyan cha lugs ni ldan par byas te/ rang la rang ngo mtshar
253a6(rnying rgyud): po'i bstod pa ni// dpa' bo sgeg po 'jigs su rung ba dang // dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par ston pa dang // snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba la sogs pa// skra yi brnyan po shin tu bstan gyur te// zhal g.yas dkar la bzhed pas dgod dgod 'dra// zhal g.yon

254a1(rnying rgyud): bcag labs dpa'// blan dkyis gsu pa'i 'dus dang bya'o// / nga nas ram kyis gsad pa la// ngab nang bsung da dgas pas 'dan// lhag zer bas dadang mkhris pasagasang / rab kyi la dras brkyang
254a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gso ba'i las bstan te// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// smyo 'brog can dregason dang // nad pa tshangs che gso ba dang // sri'u ga mo dang gsum yin no// dang po myo 'bog gsor ni// phur bu'i dgongs par bkra
254a3(rnying rgyud): pas su// sngags grangs mang du bzlas pa yis// blta ba bsar zhing rdzas kyis bajug/ drag po'i las kyis gso ba dang // nad pa tshabs chen gso ba dang // gang gnod pa yi mdos byas la// gta'i ra gtang lug mang du gzhug/ gta' thabs
254a4(rnying rgyud): bco brgyad gzhung bzhin bya'o// sriT gces pa gsob ni// lus srung phur bu bla slongs dang // sngags mdud srung 'khor rab gnas gdugs// chu gtor mang du btang ba dang // tsha tsha gdab dang d+harma gdon// dkar chos gzhung du bya ba dang // des
254a5(rnying rgyud): kyang phan par ma gyur na// rdo rje'i sgrub pa gzhung btsug bya'o// gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas dbab pa'i las bstan te// bdud kyi ser ba ji ltar ba// gzang yi ser ba ji ltar dang ba// btsan ze ser ba ji ltar dbab// bu ye sa ra' ji ltar
254a6(rnying rgyud): dbab// thog dang lhas ngan ji ltar la// de rnams man ngag shes par bya'o// dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gcad pa'i las bstan te// bdud kyi ser ba ji ltar gcad// gza' yi mer ba ji ltar bzlog/ btsan gyi ser ba ji ltar
254a7(rnying rgyud): bzlog/ ma mo'i serab ji ltar bzlog/ mi nad phyug nang ji ltar bzlog/ ltas ngan gling na ji ltar bzlog/ gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas skyo ru gzhug pa'i rdzas// rta dkar thod pa'i nang du bsag/ rngang phro mar dadugar mo

254b2(rnying rgyud): seng ge dkar mo'i snying shun du// dug sna'i tshogs dang khrag sna'i tshogs// dgra yi ming byang bcas pa gzhug/ nyung dkar gling bur ngan sngags bzlas// tri ru ni shag/ mA ra ni rbad/ ra ra se khyud/ ces dag yi khang pa 'am/ ga
254b3(rnying rgyud): dam lus la phog par brdeg go// de nas lhas de na dba' pa ni// zla lo dkar po'i gsob nang du// lhas ngan thong po lnga bsags te// srin bya dang ni gla ba dang / sreg pa dang ni 'ug pa dang / yul gyi thod pa bcas gzhug go// dung ga ldang
254b4(rnying rgyud): nyung dkar sngags la za'// sang sar kyi gyi thal si Sh+Ta/ d+hi d+hi ro d+hi mA ra ya dran ya/ dgra'i khang pa'i 'gram 'og tu sra'o// de ltar byas ni ltas ngan 'ong // de nas lcags su gzhug pa ni// ra dkar gnya' mag srog kyang nang // maM pA 'o/
254b5(rnying rgyud): gsad pa'i lce// g+hi dkar snying dngar dkar snying // ri bong mgo khrag ming byang gnyug/ ngan sngags lcags kyi gling bur bzlas// nyung dkar sngags shing thun blags bra ba/ rbad su zad sra khrag tI nad// nang na rbad smin rmugs// 'gyel ba klor lha

255a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ mtshams su bstan// smyung gar mang la danal par dus// 'dams sa tha dgas lagran// thar thub ga gnyisan// dbar ba thugs zug ya tu god// zug ca zan rtag ga gnang// kyang mar nga
255a2(rnying rgyud): dadamar snying // khrag dang 'brun 'i tshigs kyil// gtor ma chen po byas la dgod// zang gcig cang phrad pas por gang // de nas gleng sla bsgrags la// gsur min sbom kyi drung ba btang // ma dres yab yum bsku na// hU~M mning nags

258a6(rnying rgyud): sgo gzhi t+tA ra Na yis brgyan// dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal po'o// shAng du gang ka dar dgod// hU~M ru gu ma dar dadad// nub tu hU~M la da dgod// byang du sa mun re dgod// rangs chang thod pa'i nang rug tu// da khrag khri b+hag phag zag
258a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs// hom khung thar la gzhag par bya// thang gcig sa menang nang du// gle rtsenag dang snying de chog // de na mchod pa'i rdzas rnams so// zhal du bsgrib pa'i rdzas rnams ni// b+h+ra mASh+Ti na mdag zag cig danon// bsam
258b1(rnying rgyud): can mas cur lta bcu// la bar la bzhi la gtam gyis gdag/ bdag spyod dpal gyiny-i 'don // bas so bgam mug steng dang ba'o// ngas smra ba dmang pa'i spyad las/ dkyil 'bar bca' ba'i 'jug gnyis byas/
258b2(rnying rgyud): wa/ thung gi rgyal po des/ lugs kyu'i phyag rgyab cas nas srog gi snying po nas drangs te/ keng ke de re dza/ ku mA da rang / tsa mun du rung / shupad+ma re dza/ gzugs rnams rab tu ston 'gyur te// las lo 'di skad bsgral bar /
258b3(rnying rgyud): dra ri tsag sIn a nai te/ mA rA ya a~M ku sha du / snying zab tsot+ta ma lar shor la khrag 'thung / kang kang king king / sha la dzI ti hU~M bAT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ ha sa ra na ha tan tu tA na yA/ ma ma sarba bi g+h+nA po hU~M /
258b4(rnying rgyud): be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ shi g+h+raM A na ya shi g+h+raM A na ya hU~M phaT/ dz+wa la ba ya dza la pa ya hUM phaT/ tA thA ya trA tha ya hUM phaT/ bi ta ya bi te ya hUM phaT/ shu le shu la bu la dar dza dza ni/ yo gI shwa ri nI/ badz+ra tsit+ta su/ ki badz+ra ni mA ra
258b5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ bse sbom dmar po'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas khrig 'thung gi rgyal pos/ drag po'i las la gzhug pa 'di gsungs te// zhal du bstab pa'i 'khor lo hri// dbugs len ma ni rbad par
258b6(rnying rgyud): bi da ya yi sngags kyis rtsibs mtshan bskor// hom khung nang du bse mo bskyed// zhal du bstab pa'i rdzas rnams ni// ling+ga cho gsum bcad de lag tu thogs// hom du bstab cing shu la shu la'i ljags bzlas shing // r-I la raM gyis me sbar
258b7(rnying rgyud): ki// bi ti ya nas spel zhing dbu // de nas ling+ga smrab rdzas la// rabs tshad nag pa'i thod pa ru// yi dwags kyi mo'i lus gtums la// thag pa dag po btags la bskor// thal ba nag po rlung la 'phyar// lhag ma khro bor zhabs
259a1(rnying rgyud): 'og mnan// mnan pa'i dus su khri yang bzlas// zla ba nyi ma'i nam phyed gtad// ces gsungs so// mar khu dang zhag dang khrag gsum bdud kyi bu mo la gleng // khrag dang a mr-i tas dam ba dar ro// sbrang rtsi dang mar
259a2(rnying rgyud): dang phud sbyar la srog bdag gi bu mo la gtad do// mi mgo dang bse bor dang / ba men gyi rwa dang mdze ru la bzlas pa'o// bse mo'i sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor ba khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos de skad gsungs so// bse sgom dmar po'i rgyud las/ la
259a3(rnying rgyud): kyi bya thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// rdzogs so// // slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/ lha sras lha ma sring laganang ste bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ka tsa tha rA dza tan+tu/ bod skad du/ shra na dkar nag gi rgyud
259a4(rnying rgyud): dpal rang byung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rang bzhin lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i b+han d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na/ dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor/ phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis
259a5(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'byung gi rgyal po dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad du sprul nas/ mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs pa las/ 'khor lha srin gyi tshogs dang / shA na'i tshogs dang / ce lhung gi tshogs dang /
259a6(rnying rgyud): sbyang gi lor gi tshogs dang / 'bar ma dang / lang ka'i tshog+sas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las 'da' bar byas nas bar snang la rdzu 'phrul gyi sgra bton pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ thugs ka na sa yo ge dza ljang gu
259a7(rnying rgyud): bton nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas mdun du shwa na'i tshogs bkug ste/ sba la rngur khrod kyi chas kyis brgyan/ bskal ba'i mi 'od 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs nas srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i dz+haiM sgra phyung bas/ shwa nang tshogs rab tu brgyal te/
259b1(rnying rgyud): bcwab bsas can/ zag gi myong ba 'dimag thung ga rtul ba la thal// la ma bang/ can sa sang / spa byas dang/ gang nga// suzu nas/ ka u nal gyis thagasas// dunas thag 'drang na
259b2(rnying rgyud): rdul po des cho 'phrul gyi las mdzad do// bran dkar nag gi rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal bdes bran 'dakyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bang rim gsum
259b3(rnying rgyud): brtsegs la// shwa na'i khrag dang khrag chen b+h+yaH// bang rim dang po mthing nag bri// bang rim gnyis pa spug nag \u0f88\u0f90// tha mad mar nag me ris bskor// dbus su grangs kyi phung mo dgod// shar zur lcags kyi khyi mo dgod//
259b4(rnying rgyud): lpags kyi spyang mo dag // byang dru gser gyi 'i bar rab rtse brgyang dgo// bang rim par ma'i mtha' skor lo// shi tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang // snying sna bzhi dang bcas pa dgod// sto gzhug rdzas dang drug gi gtor// sdigs par yungs
259b5(rnying rgyud): kur rgyal po dang // ske tshe lcags kyi zangs kyi dang // shwa na thod pa'i nang du ni// yu nA ga khreg skam thug byas la// rabs chad spa shad dag gis kha bcad la// sha na'i phrar pa'i gzung thag gdags// bdag nyid theg 'drung rgyal por/
259b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom// shin thog gi snying blo nga // da ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur// phrin dkar nag gi rgyud lasadakyil 'khor bskrun pa'i ma ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos srog snying las drang zhing thugs dam
259b7(rnying rgyud): phul ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// sil su la dang / can bral tshwa/ sro 9/ kr-ita mra ba / oM ba~M ba la na ma/ dan srid lam/ pal ga ti ShA// ye tog ma khang+ka/ yangs mdzun
260a1(rnying rgyud): nas pas la gzhag cing zad pa cha yungs kar ltos bsdig par bstis pa gdas cing sngags 'ad badza du// oM par ma gze ba shan+d+he bi sha ne/ dra pi sha na ka rA/ shA d+hA sha R+Sha/ mar kan/ u pra na
260a2(rnying rgyud): tsa ra sha ya/ dza la bi sha ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ de nas shwa na'i sbyin sreg gi sngags 'di gsungs te/ oM ru pa ru pa sha ni ni sha pi sha ni/ ka ta ra shA na bi sha ta ya daM ra dz+wa la pa ya/ bi sha ya bi sha ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces shan
260a3(rnying rgyud): dkar nag gi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas khrag 'thung rgyal po des// las sgor dag ni 'di gsungs so// dgra bgegs dag ni ling+ga'i rgyu// shing shun klog grog mkhar sa// dgra bo'i gzugs byas
260a4(rnying rgyud): ming rus gzhug/ de la bkug cing bstim par bya// shugs pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang // shwa na'i phur pas gdab cing thun gyis brdeg/ ho ma gzugs shwa na'i ngag sngags bzlas// khrag skam dug gi gtor mas brdeg/ smon
260a5(rnying rgyud): la ma btab cing zad sngags bzlas// nyi ma bsreg thal ba gnan pa bya// dpal chen nyid kyis bka' bsgo bas// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gtogs pa bsgral// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// shA na dkar nag gi rgyud las/
260a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi bya thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya/ karma tsakra/ gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa phrin las 'khor lo// gab pa gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ zhe
260a7(rnying rgyud): sdang gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa med par mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bskul te/ bde chen zhi ba
260b1(rnying rgyud): chob kyi mchog/ ston pa rdza rje chos nyid kyis// a ma 'dul bar gyur ma yin// de nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyar bzhengs la// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul du gsol// zhes baphul ba/
260b2(rnying rgyud): bskul ba'i don thugs bu chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po'i skur bzhengs te/ thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan mchog gis mngon par sbas pa'i su des/ 'og min gyi gnas phreng lo can gyi po zang du/ 'a
260b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' dang sems ma rnams la/ dam chos bdud rtsi phrar pa'i chos rnams sru'i sgo nas 'jal bar bstan te/ 'khor ba'i grong sgrib las rnams mngon par langs te/ grol ba'i sa la legs par gnas so// thugs rje'i stobs
260b4(rnying rgyud): gyis phyag na rdo rje mngon par sprul te/ yang snying 'bru dgu'i tshul du thugs kar bstan/ de nas 'khor sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyis 'dod khams pa rnams kyis mthong ba'i lam du ma gyur pa rnams/ de mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ lcag na rdo rje la
260b5(rnying rgyud): bstsal te/ 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu'i gyon par gshegs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su 'jigs byed chen po'i gzhal yas khang du mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid zhe sdang gi bdag po zhal gsum phyag drug par mngon par sprul
260b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams la phe ma phaT ces mngon par spro bsgrags te/ de'i tshe las kyi sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas shing 'khor ba las bsgril bar bya ba'i phyir/ rnal 'byor gyi mgyen du bzhag pa la don mchis
260b7(rnying rgyud): las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang // phyag rgya che la gnas rnams kyis// 'bras bu sru bzhi thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor mchen rim pa'o// sems dpa' chen po gzas/
261a1(rnying rgyud): da na na man hA// / na / ga su / pa
261a2(rnying rgyud): 'dagatan nas par la du bskal pa la/ lam yin lags pa na tsunapa sa/ sinas dpa' can pa rten ci// bsnyen pa ba zlas pa'i yin pag da // brlab pa chen po'i gnas gyi sa pa da// drag sa pal rjeg
261a3(rnying rgyud): 'ang dusheg mchis// sems dpang chen pargyan cig/ dkyim 'bor rnam pa bzhi ste/ bstan pas bzlas pa'i kyil du yir byabs bzung dang/ sgrub pa grags page'i da byi du bya do
261a4(rnying rgyud): kyi bshAr na nga/ des pa gyur ba nyis dus pasad pa 'i dkyil ba nga bgapa// sems nga can pa de 'i dkyil 'bar 'a bye sa pa zhig+sa gis gtu shung ba rdzub sa/
261a5(rnying rgyud): sa/ theg pa chen po'i rigs nan dang / bgro brdung du'i rigs can dang / gang bag rigs byed pa dang / rigs mdzes pa dang / gang zag zhe sdang den rigs tan no// dId ni gang thegan grang rje 'grogs ca rje ba
261a6(rnying rgyud): sams dpa chen pa/ 'a thig ga kyi b+har ma mang skarang lags/ brgyan pa 'jus pa'i lnga 'asabal gyi 'bral ba dang / bsgrub pa das smini pa ba snyi na ma po// dag pa rangs su bla ga dreg cim mo// mA sa ma
261a7(rnying rgyud): na sa su tu gyus /
261b1(rnying rgyud): nas mtshan nyid du / yanan/ thos pa'i dus de ltar lags// bsnyen pa la nyim shar nas na// brlab pa la nas gyun nam so// drag pa la nyin kyad nas so// bsad pa dgangs ka'i dus gyu// dkyil 'bar can pa de nyid du/
261b2(rnying rgyud): bu'i mtshan nyid dgod pa ji ltar lags/ nyon cig las kyi sems dpa'/ bsnyen pa'i dus su rin chen sna lnga'i phur pa sor bcu drug pa bya la dgod/ bsgrub pa'i dus su gdug pa can gyi shing la sor bcu gnyis par byas la dkod/ dra
261b3(rnying rgyud): dus su rkang chen gyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad du byas la dgod/ mA ra ya bsad pa'i dus su lug pA lA las byas pa'i phur ba sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas la dgod/ oM ma ho// sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyur pa lags na/ de'i cha rkyen ji ltar lags
261b4(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa la mchod rdzas dang cho ga rdzogs pa'o// bslab pa la sngags kyi 'khor lo che/ drag po la bde gshegs bka' nyan bsgral ba'o// bsad pa la zangs phye lcags kyi'o// de ni cha rkyen mchog yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rkyen
261b5(rnying rgyud): bshad/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba dang / gzhal yas khang gi le'u ste dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ma ra yas bsad pa la don du mchis bshad du gsol/ oM ma ho// las
261b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyon cig/ mA ra ya bsad pa la dkyil 'khor gsum ste/ me'i dkyil 'khor dang / bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / mA ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang gsum mo// do la me'i dkyil 'khor ni/ shar lho mtshams su
261b7(rnying rgyud): rgyar gru gang zabs su khru phyed do// kha khyer gsum la rgyar sor bzhi pa'o// dpangs su sor bzhi pa'o// de yang ma rdzi chen po'i snying gar bri'o// tshon bri ba ni/ nang du mda' gzhu bkang ba gsum/ zur gsum la za byed kyi zhal gsum/ ngang
262a1(rnying rgyud): rim par ma la mtshon cha lnga mdzes pa'i tshul du ni/ bang rim tha ma la me ri smug nag tu btang bar byu'o// der ga drug pa can gyi shing rnams la// b.ral ma'i sbrus bcings te/ dug shing sna tshogs pa la/ steng dang sgo bas
262a2(rnying rgyud): na pa ni// drag po me yi dkyil 'khor ro// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni byang shar mtshams su'o// dpangs su sor bzhi la/ snying po nr-i tre dang bcas pa'o// der bsrel ba'i leng+ka ni/ ra dang khyi dang mi'i sag pa la bris la marjod pa chen por du
262a3(rnying rgyud): su bstab bo// mA rA ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ lho nub mtshams su ho ma khung rgyar gu gang pa/ zabs su khA do/ logs gsum du mda' gzhu bkang ba gsum bris la/ zur gsum la za byed kyi zhal dang bcas pa dri/ bar rim par
262a4(rnying rgyud): ma la rtsad drug cu rtsa gnyis srin mo 'gros su 'khor bar gzug/ bang rim tha mal mtshon cha lnga dgod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor de ltar lags na/ de bsgral ba'i leng+ga'i rgyu gang lags bshad du gsol/ sems dpa' chen po
262a5(rnying rgyud): nyon cig/ de dri ba legs so// rgyu ni khri dang chu co'i phub ma dang / gangs kyis reg pa'i sa rnams dang // 'byung ba chu yi thal ba dang // til nag po la gzhi blang ste// gzugs ni yang dag rdzogs par bya'o// dug gi chu yi zug pa yis/
262a6(rnying rgyud): ni lkug nag paran// mi shes rten yin te// cha dang drang po spyad pa'o// don 'di' mas/ gas kyi la po 'i ci sbyar d+ha// sems dpon na pas bshid da gsol// sbyin pas kyisems dpa
262a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor la 'god pa ni// dpal bklang rgyas 'khor lo ni// lha rnams bsrungs pa'i 'khor mo sra// mdog nag zla ba bam pa la// lha dang dpral ba'i snying po dgod pa'o// khrag chen 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// smyug gu dang chen mchog gas /
262b1(rnying rgyud): sdug can ma pa ka yi zhabs bya// hAs yarang dgo pa yin// dal skyob pa'i lha dang 'bral// dathun pa ma mgayab// rtswa dang dpral bar bshad pa yin// gzugs la gang po bsgru bar ba shad 'a// l+h+wam khro gas tha'i bu rab rgya
262b2(rnying rgyud): li// rtsa yi dngas ma bzhi gnas te// kun gzhi'i rnam shes rten yin pas// gzugs la dbab pa'i snying po dgod// A be sha yi sngags dgod pas// gzugs la dbab pa'i las ku 'gyur// nya yi dbyings 'dra bzhi po la// dar dkar
262b3(rnying rgyud): spyad pa lnga yod de// dbyibs ni pad+ma rgyas 'dral/ bI zan A na ya yi sngags bkod pas// byang du gzhug pa'i las su 'gyur// dar lce bkug pa'i dbyibs 'dra dang // drin chen pad+ma bzhi po la// spa byed snying po'i mtshan bkod cing //
262b4(rnying rgyud): dz+wa la la yi sngags dgod pas// spro bar gzhug pa'i las su 'gyur// grog gi rdzas pa 'dra ba dang // zangs s+t+rI mo khab 'dra ba dang // zar ma'i me tog dbyibs badz+ra dang // tshes gcig zla ba'i dbyibs 'dral// tA tha ya yi sngags bkod pas/
262b5(rnying rgyud): rdzam rngon pa'i las su 'gyur// rdo rje'i de thabs 'da'i 'khor lo la// byang chub sems kyi rgya srang la// b+hin+da la yi sngags bkod pas// zhal du stob pa'i las su 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po sngags kyi 'khor lo bkod pa de ltar lags
262b6(rnying rgyud): na// gang zag ji lta bu zhig gis bri bar ba gyi// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o// de'i kha dog dang dbyibs ni nag la bla gyen du 'khyil ba/ mig sprin dmar ba/ smin ma'i dbus na khro gnyer gsum yod pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lag pa
262b7(rnying rgyud): chu bya lag tu 'dug pa// theg pa mchog la dad pa/ mngon par shes pa des bri bar bya'o// sngags kyi 'khor lo bri ba'i dus gang lags bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ dus ni gsum ste/ smyug gu btsal ba'i dus dang / phreM
263a1(rnying rgyud): na/ dum dang / skrag ma brgyal ba'i dus dang gsum ma// bre ba'i dus ni nyan ga dmar gyings so// smyug grubatsal ba'i dus ni/ srin drags 'og ca myong ba'i dus so// sdug cha brtul ba'i dus ni/ da 'angab
263a2(rnying rgyud): mdo lI gsang ba'i mkhar 'char ba'i dus so// bcom ldan 'das phyag gra dang 'khor lo de ltar lags na/ 'khor lo chen po bca' ba'i dus gang lags/ dus ni bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'o// las ni sgrub pa'o// rgyan grog 'ashon ste/
263a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i yan lag rdzogs par bri/ mdog ni smug nAg dag tu bya'o// drug po'i las la 'khor lo nag/ dbyibs ni zla ba kham pa la// mdog ni nag po lce bzhir bcas/ dbus su oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ dbus su che ge mo ma ra ya dgod/
263a4(rnying rgyud): bzhir hA sa yar bzhi dgod/ dbus kyi badz+ra kI li kI la ya dang pos ni/ bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por gsal ba'o// kI la ya 'og mas lha tshogs sku gsal lo// che ge mo yis dmigs pa gsal// ha sa yu ra na bzlas pa'i mchod// da
263a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo 'di bskur ro// dbab pa'i 'khor lo'i dbyibs rnams ni// sku ma gzhogs 'dra ba'i zla rab kyad la// steng ma pad+ma 'dab brgyad mangs// 'og ni rin chen zur brgyad do// steng gri pad+ma'i lte ba la// dbus su oM badz+ra hU~M la~M kI la ya che ge mo sA
263a6(rnying rgyud): ya zhes pa 'i// 'khor lo'i 'dab mang chu rnams la/ A pa~M shA ya zhes pa'i snying po bri// gzugs la dbab pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'o// 1yi gzugs 'dra bzhi po la// 'khor long 'dab ma re re la// dbus su oM badz+ra tsA l-i lA~M pa ya r+g+hag ma ma
263a7(rnying rgyud): yazhes paze// nya 'dra bzhi po la/ shIglai A na ma mi snying nga bri/ 'dis ni 'ching par 'gyur bani// byang dru gzug pa'i 'amam lam ma no// der khri'i khrag pa 'dra ba dang // rin chen pad+ma'i lngal po 'drab la// dbus su oM ba ShI
263b1(rnying rgyud): klu sa/ gas lags pad+mo/ maba' marnams na/ dral pa la'i sngags bkod pas// thams kyad rkyos nga smra bu thar// spyo ba'i 'barnams sa ba nas/ dgas / ga/ / blangs s+hom
263b2(rnying rgyud): ngas 'dra dang // rar ma'i matog partseb// zlabacas pa nan pangadra// de rnam pa ma ldabar yin// dbus sra sa b+ha 'i kI la y-i/ chag migs pabri/ lang pong 'dab ma can la/ mi sngag sa rnams pa/
263b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i las su 'gyur ro// rdul du rdzog pa'i 'dzu 'i rim pa'o// rdo rje dbyibs 'dra'i 'dun mol// dbus bu oM bI ma~M g+ni ma ya tshig ma zhes pa bri// 'thokhor ba 'dab na'i cha rnams la/ hrIrna ma yi sdug bkod pa ste// zhal rdzog
263b4(rnying rgyud): pas su 'gyur// 'amadu sgrub pa'ing dze ma 'am pa'o// rgyu ril bsad pa'i 'a'an ma'i dam pa basbyin pa dang / 'kho ma bza' ba'i rim pa'i le'u ste gnyis par/ sems dpe'i chen po ma ma pa dang / ra
263b5(rnying rgyud): kyil di ltar gis na gnas pa po 'jig rten 'di nus pha rol du bskal ba la sngags kyi dan dum chis sems dpang chen po bshud dru gcol/ las kyi sems dpa' legs so lhags 'da' dzi na rtogs par dka' byas thus pa la na sa/ ho pa/
263b6(rnying rgyud): rnas yong bu ni ste/ kI la ya sngags kyi phreng ba dang / kI li nyi la la sngags kyi 'khor modang / k+ko la ma lha'i grwa phyag rgya chen pa'i rim pa dang / sgril mchos nyid la gnas pa'i rim pa'o// sems dpa'i chen pa lags sa meng pa la dan du mya sa/
263b7(rnying rgyud): 'am ba' nyid cig/ ngal gtid te/ 'dren par byed pa dang / thig kyis gnon pa'o// 'dren par byed pa ni/ sems dpa' chen po stegs kyi sems dpa'i thugs kanam sa'in chen za btum de'i ka ba la zag pa med pa'i gzugs
264a1(rnying rgyud): brtan gyur pa 'ardo rje che dgrapa/ de'i lte bar s+t+wa~M/ zur bsdud la kI la ya 'grub kyad/ de'i sngags kyi bdag pos/ oM badz+ra k+ShI la ya \u0f7frtsub hoH// zhes brjod pas/ lcags kyi dang / zhags pa dang / lcags ldan
264a2(rnying rgyud): dang / dril bu bzhi byung ste/ gzas pa po'i gnas mal du/ yaM las rlung gi del du gyur te/ gnas mal dang gzas pa por bcas pa lugs kyus bkug/ zhags pas bcing / lpags sgrog gis bsdam/ dril bus dgyes par byas pa ni/ 'dren
264a3(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i rim pa'o// zil gyis gnon pa'i sngags kyi rim pa ni/ oM laM hUM laM/ zhes brjod pas/ gzas pa po'i klad rgyas su/ ye shes kyi ri rab rtse mo brgyad pa gcig tu gyur te/ staM b+ha ya nan zhes pas gnon pa'o// mo hA b+ha ya ni
264a4(rnying rgyud): ming dang rus su bcas pa'o// hrIHshr-IHwi tri ni thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'o// las kyi sems dpa' de ru khrus lung ji ltar lags/ nyon cig khrus lung gi rim pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ snying po sngags kyi khus lung dang / sru phyag rgya chen
264a5(rnying rgyud): po'i khrus lung ngo // snying po sngags kyi khris lung ni/ las kyi sems dpa'i dbur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ yi ge a yi phreng ba gsang ba'i mgul du btab pa'o// sngags kyi bdag po la yang de ltar ro// spel ba'i sras mchog ste/ thugs
264a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes rtse gcig pa'i rtse mo la a bkod ste/ las kyi sems dpas dril bas/ 'od du zhu ste 'od zer chu rgyun du byung bas/ sgrol ba'i bdag po la thim pas/ slar gzas pa po la thim pas/ kun gzhi la yod pa'i bag chags bsreg pa ni/ snying
264a7(rnying rgyud): po sngags kyi khrus lung ngo // sku phyag rgya chen po'i khrus lung ni/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la gsal bar 'gyur gyi/ phel pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// sems dpa' chen po ngan sngags kyi 'khor lo rang shes par bya ba la/ don
264b1(rnying rgyud): mchis bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ de la rnam pa drug ste// dang po 'khor lo lha dang phral ba dang / 'khor lo gnyis pas gzugs la dbab pa dang / 'khor lo gsum pas byad du bzug pa dang / 'khor la bzhi pas lho ru gzhug
264b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / 'khor lo lnga pas rdul du brlag pa dang / 'khor lo drug pas zhal du bsgrub pa'o// 'di ni ngan sngags su shes pa'i rim pa'o// sems dpa' chen po sgra phyag rgya chen por shes par zla ba la/ don du mchis bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems
264b3(rnying rgyud): dpang nyon cig/ don de rtogs par dka' zhing go bar dka' bas zhu ba legs so// kI la ya lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por shes par bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi dpal be'u las snying po 'bru dgu'i tshul du gnas
264b4(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ sngags kyi sems dpa'o// de las kyi sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum par byung nas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ldan bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas pa la phyogs bcu dus
264b5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lag tu thugs ye shes rtse gcig pa byin nas dbang bskur nas/ e ma ho// las kyi sems dpa' chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus ngan gdul dka' ba'i gang zag gis zhing khams rnams su bskal ba'i don gyis shig/ khyod
264b6(rnying rgyud): ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gdud 'tsho ba pa yin gyis/ gang zhi bas mi 'dul ba de la mngon spyod kyi phrin las byos shig/ sems dpa' chen po khyod ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdung 'tsho ba pa yin no// zhes gnang ba sbyi na pa/
264b7(rnying rgyud): no// snrel lo sgra'i grwa phyag kyi chen por shes pa 'o// sams dpa' chen po lha'i sgra phyag rgya chen por gnas pa sbya lags na/ kIs lachis nyid du gnas pa'i don pa shang drug sol/ sems dpa' rkyen pa nyon pa// chos nyid kya na 'dzin par byod/
265a1(rnying rgyud): bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma gsungs/ mabyon pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnam gyis gsung bar mi 'gyur/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ sems dpa' chen po nga nyid kyis kyang ma
265a2(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'i don de zhu ba lags so// bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul// kun rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor che// don dam snying po sngags kyi gzugs// de la rnam gnyis tshul du gnas// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// ces pa'i tshig
265a3(rnying rgyud): 'dis don dam pa'i bden pa sgyu ma tsam du bzhag pa ni/ chos nyid kyi don to// oM bidz+ra kI li kI la ya zhes brjod pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin med par rtogs nas/ rang bzhin med pa sgyu ma tsam du rtogs pa ni chos nyid kyi don te// mA ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil
265a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor bstan pa dang / sngags kyi 'khor lo bcang gzhi bstan pa dang / ljags kyi phreng ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po mA ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / sngags kyi 'khor lo bca' ba'i don da ltar lags na/
265a5(rnying rgyud): ngan sngags kyi snying po'i don bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cing // ngan sngags kyi snying po 'di/ sngar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma gsungs pa'i ngan sngags kyi 'khor lo 'di/ ngas las kyi sems dpa' khyod kyi don du bshad kyi ton ce
265a6(rnying rgyud): tshe de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das dpung rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas dbu'i 'khor lo'i gtsug nas dpung rnam par 'joms pa'i ngan sngags kyi snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la la che ge mo mA ra ya ha sa ya ra na hA da na ya hA
265a7(rnying rgyud): phaT/ nges pa'i snying po 'di phyung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so// de'i tshe bdud kyi dpung rnams rab tu pham par byas so// de'i tshe snying po 'di'i sngags 'di la lha dang dpral ba'i sngags zhes phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
265b1(rnying rgyud): nams kyis dang bsrung // dbas na snying po 'di ning bral bar byed pa'i sring pa mchag rjes byung // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du dpung rnam par spyad pa zhes bya ba ting 'a dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs kyi dbul bar nas sbyang ba na cag bya /
265b2(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad dbang dusri dacing 'gugs par byed pa'i snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la la chog ma mAr ya A bai sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i snying ze 'di 'arjod pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyi bdud da
265b3(rnying rgyud): m+b+ha stegs la sogs pa'i shes pa rnams rang rang gi gzugs la mi gnas shing / shes pa dbang du bkrus nas lus dro shing bzhin du gyur/ de'i tshe snying po 'di la phyogs babu ngas gsam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'greg zhing dbang du
265b4(rnying rgyud): stong po zhes dbang basbyar ro// debs na skyeng po 'di la 'babs par byed pa'i snying po zhes bshad do// de'i tshe bcom ldan ngas kyi khring kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'angan la snyoms pas zhugs pa/ phyag dang zhabs rnams las ngan rdegs rgya
265b5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid byung // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya che ga mo mA ra ya shrI b+h+rUM A na ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa thams cad lus dra bu thul du bcings par gyur to// de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
265b6(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i snying po zhes dbang bskur ro// de bas na snying po 'di byung du gzhug cing 'ching bar byed pa'i snying po zhes bshad do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i tshe gsung gi
265b7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma la thugs kyi dpal bedz+ra dang ljags kyi rtse mo nas ngan sngags kyi snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya che ge mo mA ra ya dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya d+hi Ta/ ces brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams na gnas pa'i log pa can gyi sems can thams cad ca
266a1(rnying rgyud): smra bar gyur to// nga'i tsho phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis snying po 'di la smra bar byed pa'i snying po zhes dbang bskur ro// de bas na snying po 'di la dz+nyA zhing smra bar byed pa'i snying po zhes bshad
266a2(rnying rgyud): dang thobacom ldan la su kyi tsud pa zhis kyang 'dzin ma su/ dadazugs na sarna/ rmis kyi cig mi sa d+ha ya
266a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdul phra rab tsam du gyur to// de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhig par byed pa'i snying po zhes pa'i dbang bskur ro// de bas na snying po 'di la rdul du brlag pa'i snying po zhes bshad do// de'i mo bcom ldan 'a
266a4(rnying rgyud): zhal bzhad cing mche ba gtsigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de'i tshe gsang ba'i sbubs nas/ ngan sngags kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya che ge mo mA ra ya b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha k+saM phaT/ ces brjod pas sdod bca
266a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal du gsol bar gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jigs par byed pa za bar byed pa'i snying po zhes dbang bskur ro// de bas na snying po 'di ni zhal du stob pa zhes bshad pa yin no// snying po ngan sngags kyi
266a6(rnying rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po snying po ngan sngags kyi 'khor lo de ltar legs na/ gsang ba'i tshig drug po bshad du gsol// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ sngar ma gsung pa'i tshig 'di rnams yin te/ gtogs shig gros
266a7(rnying rgyud): deng bral bar gyis// thob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis/ phreng zhig chings shig rnam par sdoms// rings pa bajug li sbyar tshug cig/ lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du zlog/ badz+ra ye k+Sha kro ta bi dza la khA hi zhes brjod pas/ las kyi sems dpa
266b1(rnying rgyud): cher skrag par gyur tes la 'gyel bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang ba bde bas/ las kyi sems dpa' lags so// don de la skrag par ma byed cig/ sngon gyi dus gsang ba'i cho ga drug po 'di// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
266b2(rnying rgyud): gyis kyang gsungs pas/ 'jig rten cher g.yos shing rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de bas na tshig drug po 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis g.yo bar byed pa yin pas/ don de la ma skrag par don gzhan zhus shig/ de'i tshe las kyi sems dpa' bka' na
266b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du gnas te/ dran pa rnyed nas sems dpa' chen po// sngags kyi 'khor lo'i rdzas sngar ma gsungasapa bshad du gsol/ e ma ho// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ dpral bar gu gu la tshil chen 'bob// ku ku rA tsa'i dri chen shes par bshad/
266b4(rnying rgyud): dbab la nyung dkar rgyal po mkhar na gasrud pa dang / aM ku sha ni dkar nag go// byang du gzhug pa tshon sna snga po dang // pal tshon dru ba dang bcas pa'o// spro ba la dug gtor sdigs sbyar ro// rdul du brlag na nyung dkar rgyal po dang // mtshon cha rnam pa
266b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs dang // skye cho gdab phur nyi shu rtsa gcig/ lugs phye zangs phye shis par bshad// bstab la me yi sbyin bsreg go// las kyi sems dpa' rdzas de rnams ni rang bzhin gyis byin rlabs che ba'o// gnod sbyin rgod ma kha la sogs pas kyang dbang bskur
266b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas so// ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs te/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor po'i rgyu rgyan du bzhig go// sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo'i margyan da ltar lags na/ dmod pa'i rkyen ce sbyar
266b7(rnying rgyud): lags/ las kyi sems dpa nan tshwa// gra bul la sogs pa'i rdzas rdzogs pa/ gtso ba nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams smos te/ cheg mo 'di lce dang brel bar gyis shig/ mkhar nag gi phud pa thogs pa/ dzaH rlung phyag rgya byas te/ dkyi
267a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi lha rnams smos te/ che ge mo 'di gzugs la phob cig ces brjod la/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa thogs la/ byad du chug cig pa dang / dug gi gtor ma thogs la/ skyoru chu gcig pa dang / lugs kyi zangs 'jogs/
267a2(rnying rgyud): la rdul du rlogs shig pa dang me'i dkyil 'khor zhal du bzhes shig pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje'i dmod pa'o// dug gi gtor ma la rma bya'i gdugs dang bcas pa ni las kyi srin mo'i dmod pa'o// gsang ba'i tshig drug pa'o// las
267a3(rnying rgyud): dmod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi 'khor lo zhi bar byed pa'i don bshad du gsol// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ zhi bar byed pa'i don 'di yin te/ gnod
267a4(rnying rgyud): gyi lag pa la shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog gi khu ba nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su byugs la/ ka ra ti ka'i khu bas lha dbang ldan gyi gzugs la 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa mngon par ldan pa bri'o// de'i dbus su dmag gi dpung dam gtan 'pho bar byed pa zhi bar
267a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i ming bris la/ steng gi cha la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ shAn+tiM ha sa ya ra Na ha da na ya hUM phaT/ ces bri'o// 'og gi cha la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya che ge mo b+hi na d+ha ya b+hin d+ha ya hUM phaT/ ces bri'o// 'di phung po zhi bar byed pa'i las kyi mcho
267a6(rnying rgyud): go/ shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi cha la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya che ge mo shIn+tiM A be sha ya A be shA ya hUM phaT/ lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya che ge mo shIn+ti shI g+h+raM A ne ya hUM phaT/ nub phyogs kyi rtsibs la/ oM badz+ra kI laM kI
267a7(rnying rgyud): la che ga mo shI d+hi la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ byang phyogs kyi rtsibs la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya che ge mo shAn+ti tA tha ya trA tha ya hU~M phaT/ rtsibs brgyad la/ rdo rje srin mi rnams kyi snying po dang / gtan 'pho ba'i ming spel ba ni/ zhi ba'i 'khor lo ste/ @
267b1(rnying rgyud): te rA yo ma bral la rdon bu mo'i thagags nas btab pa ra// 'am 'dzag pa'i shing la grwa gra du zlum pa dbyabs su thas pa'i lte ba la sngags kyi'atshar la badrug la/ dmag gi dpung gis brtags pa'i sa lagang zhi bar 'dod pa'i gzugs byas pa/
267b2(rnying rgyud): rtsasmug ni zu kha dog dkar por byas la/ zhi ba'i phu bu snying gar btab la/ ras bal gyi skud pa dkar pos btags la/ kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ ti la la sngags bye ba bdun 'bum du brjod pas grub pa'i tshad ni/ phur bu ldeg pa'am/
267b3(rnying rgyud): 'aper ba byung ba'i tshe/ grub pa'i las drang pa yin te/ mchod pa chen pos zhal bzhad pa'i li dang / phung bu byas la dmag chen po 'du ba'i bar sras dgar 'dra'i gnod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ro// lte ba'i las kyi rim pa ma// gang da
267b4(rnying rgyud): bya bar 'dodun/ bram ze'i pags pa la mi rgod kyi kyus thug la/ mngos ldan ma'i gzugs bris la/ de'i lte bar 'khor lo'i lte ba dazla ga martsibs brgyad dang ldan par bris la/ lte bar gang du bya ba'i med+ha bris twa/ 'khor lo'i b+ha ga ma
267b5(rnying rgyud): du// oM bidza kI li kI la ya che ge mo ba shaM gra mu A~M br-i sha~M ya~M trA~M phaT/ ces pa'aM/ blagam gyi zhabs su/ oM badz+ra kI lo kI la ya chug ma bA raN hA sa ya ra hA sa d+ha ne hUM phaT/ sha phyogs kyi rtsibs la/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya cheg mo ba dz+wa la ba
267b6(rnying rgyud): yang la pa ya hUM phaT/ lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la/ oM badz+ra A~M li kI la sa cheg mo bai sha~M ts+tsha mr-i A na ya hU~M phaT/ nub rtsi bas laM/ oM badz+ra kI la~M hU~M la macig sa bkris r+ya d+ha d+hA ye thA ya dz+riM phaT/ byang gi 'khor lo rtsibs la/ oM badz+rak+ShI li kI la ya
267b7(rnying rgyud): ba shes drazhin ni ye sbyin tu mi b+h+ya ces pazlo'o// 'khor ma rtsibs pa ni la 'i rgya 'i bre'i la la rtse/ mam ta nyis shang pa'i dus srang po'i rjes na kyi shing 'di ba ga zung ba blags du byas la grang pa'i bar 'thir la ba drug la/
