269a1(rnying rgyud): ma'i'is skye drug pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po 'argyang 'di ltung lagasas/ sngar ma gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi yon d+han ste rgyar snang bya'i phur ba zhes gdags pa pang d+ma ma shes/
269a2(rnying rgyud): 'a nyon cig/ don de sngar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma gsungs so// gyis 'ong ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung bar mi 'gyur bas/ las kyi sems dpa' khyod nyid kyi don du ngas bshad par bya'o// bslang pa
269a3(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi phur pa dang / bkod pa lha yi phur pa dang / mngags pa pho nya'i phur ba dang / dbang du sdud pa'i phur pa dang / gdab pa phrin lam kyi phur pa dang / 'dzin cing mi gtang ba'i phur pa dang / gnas bsrung ba'i phur pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad
269a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje phur pa'i don de ltar lags na/ de rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i las la sbyar ba gang lags bshad du gsol/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cher bzhad nas le la 'dzum pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// thugs kyi dpal
269a5(rnying rgyud): be'u nas kyang pa ra bi d+han zhes bya ba zon par gyur to// snyan gyi 'khor lo yas kyang ha na ta na zhes bya ba thon par gyur to// shangs kyi dbyings nas kyang da ha da ha zhes bya bar thon par gyur to// sngags kyi pad+ma las kyang pa tsa pa tsa zhes bya ba zon par gyur//
269a6(rnying rgyud): mgul gyi mgrin pa nas kyang b+han d+ha b+han d+ha zhes bya bar thon par gyur to// phyag gi dpung pa gnyis las kyang gr-i h+Na b+h+r-i d+ha zhes b+ha ba zon to// sru'i lte ba las kyang taSh+Tha tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba zon par gyur to// zhabs kyi mthi la gnyis las kyang tshon d+ha tsha na d+ha zhes bya ba
269a7(rnying rgyud): dngu'i drug tshangs pa'i bug nas kyang sbyin d+ha nyin tu zhes bya bzon par gyur to// kyi pha la gnyis las kyang sarba A na ya hU~M laT tsas za ba thon par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor mche ba can rnams kyis/ srog gi snying po 'di phul
269b1(rnying rgyud): te// su ru su ru badz+ra/ gshog pa can rnams kyis/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ zhes mthong bar phul lo// 'dis ni dpral ba'i las su 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la/ dpal
269b2(rnying rgyud): lha mo nag mo mdun du 'khod par byas so// sems dpa' chen po bdag gi rig pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ zhes phul te/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra zhes phul nas/ bdag gi rig pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o//
269b3(rnying rgyud): zhes phu lA nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas gdug pa can gyi bu mo bzhis kyang srog gi snying po phul te/ ka taM ka ye badz+ra/ dza ye bi dza ye badz+ra/ a dzi te a pa rA dzi te mA rA se nA pra marda na ye hUM phaT/ ces phul nAm mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe khro bo rnams
269b4(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha'i char pa pheb nas/ stobs kyi rgyal pos kyang srog gi snying po phul ba/ mra ma ba sha ku ru ma taM dzA ka ra i dan d+ha ti ma ma shI g+h+ri kA rA ya zhes phul nas/ mi snang bar gyur to/ de'i tshe khro bo drag cing gtum pa'i thugs ka nas snying po 'di thon par
269b5(rnying rgyud): gyur to// kha thaM kha thAM zhes thon par gyur to// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gdab pa'i gnas gang lags/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ dkar nag mtshams dang / rna ba dang / swa dang / lce dang / lto ba dang / mgrin pa dang / dpung pa dang /
269b6(rnying rgyud): po'i gtsug dang / rkang pa'i sathil gyi rtswa rnams so// sems dpa' chen po gdab pa ni de rnams lags na/ snying po'i sngags 'di rnams sems dpa' chen po nyid kyi sngags lags sam/ 'on te 'khor rnams kyi las kyi sngags lags/ las kyi sems
269b7(rnying rgyud): tha ton cig/ 'khor gang yin pa de nga'i yin te/ nga'i gang yin pa de 'khor rnams kyis yin par 'gyur ro// so so ma yin tha mi dang ngo // de bas na snying po'i sngags 'di yang khro bo bcu rnams kyi las kyi sngags yin par 'gyur ro// yon ta
270a1(rnying rgyud): gyi phur bu bdun bstan pa dang / snying po'i sngags bstan pa dang / gdab pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / nus sems dpa' rjen po skar ma gsungs pa'i 'khor lo rnams ni/ la/
270a2(rnying rgyud): kyi gsang ba bkod pa las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs na/ bsregs zil gyis mnan cing dpung gzhom pa'i 'khor lo bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ sngar de bzhin gshegs pa mAr me mdzad kyis kyang ma gsungs/
270a3(rnying rgyud): gsung bar mi 'gyur ro// las kyi sems dpa' de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don zab cing rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro// de bas na khyod zhu ba legs kyi nyon cig/ gang bgegs zil gyis gnon pa'i 'khor lo ni/ rigs kyis ma zin pa'i thod pa la de'i
270a4(rnying rgyud): dpung dang phral ba'i phyir/ dpral bar hA sa ya ra dan la sogs pa bri'o// bgegs chen po mngon par dbab pa'i phyir/ spyi bor A be sha la sogs pa bri'o// bgegs mngon par bcing ba'i phyir// lhag pa ri shI k+Shan A na ya la sogs pa pra'o//
270a5(rnying rgyud): bgegs mngon par skyo ru gzhug pa'i phyir/ yA ra rkan dang kos ko la dz+wa la pa ya la sogs pa bri'o// bgegs mngon par rdul du brlag pa'i phyir/ mig la sogs pa'i dbang po la ta thA ya la sogs pa bri'o// bgegs de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal
270a6(rnying rgyud): du bstab pa'i phyir/ sr-i la b+he da ya la sogs pa bri zhing 'azlas so// sems dpa' chen po sngags kyi 'khor lo de ltar legs na// bca' ba'i dus gang lags bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ dras ni kar ti ka 'dus kyi nyam ba
270a7(rnying rgyud): so// sems pa'i chen pol ba ma bca'adras sa/ khrul dung drug cha gang lags/ bras gyi mar me pa' nyon ci// sramra ni na thongs so// drug tsa 'i mug thabs sa// las kyi mam pa' dag la bri ba 'das kyi
270b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sams dung ldan pas ze bar byam/ gsams dpa' ma pa/ 'khar la bca' bru dang ldag mad ltar lags pa/ gzugs brtan gyi tshul du za ba dkyil 'khor dushigs sa/ lhas kyi sems dpa' nyon mo// gzugs da tu/
270b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gcig ste/ ba'i rnam sde dang / khrag chen las bsres pa 'phang du song bya'i/ dbyibs byar gsum// nyis brtsegs su bya'o// dbus kyi zur rnams la mnga' yis brgyan pa'o// byang drug rnams la yang kyang chen po drug sa rnam
270b3(rnying rgyud): par sbas pa'o// sems dpa' chen po dkyil 'khor de ltar lag stan/ dkyil 'khor gyi cha rkyen du gsungs pa'i rdzas drug po gang lags/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ dpral ma 'dre gsod shes par bshad// dbab pa la
270b4(rnying rgyud): dkar rgyal// bcings la tshon snga lta yis so// sA la jig nyid shis par bshad// rdul du bzlog na phrag mtshan no// brta ba la hom gzur shes par bshad// samam dpa' chen po rdzas drug po de lags na/ gsang ba'i tshig rnams kyi
270b5(rnying rgyud): lags// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ grol cig pa dang / pho ba cig pa dang / chings shig pa dang / snga ru chug cig pa dang / gtogs shig pa dang / rol cig la sogs pa'i tshig rnams so// las kyi sems dpa' gang bgags kyi
270b6(rnying rgyud): dpung rnams gzhom par 'dod pa de/ 'khor lo la gzungs thag nag po btags la drung khrod kyi g.yam pA la/ rdo rje rtsa gram du bris pa'i lte ba nas brta lA nas// gang bgegs kyis zin pa'i rkang pa nas btagasal/ lcags rtse la bstsags shing / bye ba
270b7(rnying rgyud): dzo 'dres du bzlas pa byas nas/ chor ma can gyi shing rnams la mi btang nas/ sngags drug pam sun sreg brgya rtse brgyang byas rnams// bgags kyi dpung rnams 'joms par gyur // dge 'a ba'i 'khor mo'i leT sde brgyad pas/
271a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po dngos grub la bar tshad byed pa'i bgegs zhi bar byed pa'i 'khor lo bshad du gsol// em ho// las kyi sems dpa' nyon ga// bgegs ni bar byed pa'i 'khod pa ni/ brgya rjong pa la kAr
271a2(rnying rgyud): tIkas byugs la dkar por byas la/ bsgrub bya bgegs dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ mtshul par ta sa yA ra bri bar bya'o// bgegs mngon par dbab pa'i phyir/ smin mtshams su A pye shwa ya bri bar bya'o// bgegs mngon du dacing ba
271a3(rnying rgyud): mig lnga sogs pa'i dbang po rnams lA shI m+bi ni bri bar bya'o// bgegs de cher 'gyod pa mthol du gzhug pa'i phyir/ s+ye lA dz+wa la ba ya bri bar bya'o// bgegs de rdul phra rab tu gdul ba'i phyir/ lhag par ta thA ya bi byar bya'o// bgegs pa
271a4(rnying rgyud): po bshigs shing brlag par bya ba'i phyir/ ma mthal la b+hin d+ha ya bri bar bya'o// bgegs de gzhog cing stongs par bya ba'i phyir/ mche ba rnams la khro bo bcu'i snying po bri bar bya'o// 'khor lo 'di'i sbu bu 'di nyi mas 'jigs pa'i so rtsas
271a5(rnying rgyud): bri bar bya'o// stag tsha ni pad+ma'i rak+tas so// bri ba'i tshe 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis so// sems dpa' chen po sngags kyi 'khor lo de ltar lags na/ las kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/
271a6(rnying rgyud): 'di'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// kyar gru grang zabs su bu byed la dbyibs stug gi mche ba ltar byas pa'o// mche ba rnams la gnod par byed pa'i snying po bri'o// 'khor lo de ltar lags na/ de dbye ba'i rdzas rnams ci ltar lags/ dpral
271a7(rnying rgyud): la rgya tshil shis par bshad// dbabal khro yis bya ba'o// 'ching la chus chen gyi skud pas so// sba la pad+ma'i rabyas so// brdung la lcags kye nag pos so// gso ba las kyi 'khor lo bshad// sems dpa' chen po las kyi 'khor lo da ltar lags na/
271b1(rnying rgyud): de'i gsang ba'i chog drug po bshad du gsol/ zhes zhus pas/ ljon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// gasdang ba'i chog ni 'di yin te/ pho ba TIg pa dang // khyu gcig pa dang / zung shig pa dang / chings shig pa dang / rdungs shig pa dang / gta
271b2(rnying rgyud): shrIg pa dang / rengs par sma ru chu ga cig pa dang / mngon par gyis shig pa dang / de'i tshe mngar ba dang ldan pa'i shing bu dang / ku ku rA tsa'i thod pa'i khar hom gyi shing bu brtsigs la/ rak+ta chen po dang bcas pas gang la bar chod byed pa'i lus bskor zhing
271b3(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bgegs de dag gis gtong bar 'gyur ro// gab pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ dbye ba dang mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste dbu pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po gtan 'pho bar byed pa'i 'khor lo bshad du
271b4(rnying rgyud): gsol// las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ 'khor los dbye ba dang mnan pa gnyis te/ de la dbye ba'i 'khor lo ni/ gro ga 'am shing shun la/ bug pa'am pho rog gi gzugs bris la/ pho rog gi snying kar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa gcig bris la/
271b5(rnying rgyud): de'i lte bar 'dod pa'i ming dang rus bris la/ 'ug pa'i snying gar 'khor lo rtsi bas bcu gnyis pa bris la/ sngags drug g.yon skor du bris la/ yungs kar rgyal pos bye ba bdun 'bum hu b+has shing 'ug pa dang po rnyog la gtor na gang dbye bar 'dod pa de dpral bar
271b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'di ni dbye bar byed pa 'khor lo'i rim pa'o// ldanan pa'i 'khor lho'i rim pa ni// rmA sIn gyi pags pA la/ shing ka bi ra'i khu bas ser po byugs la/ rI rab kyi dbyibs su byas la/ ri rab kyi lte bar 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa byis la/
271b7(rnying rgyud): nga'i lte bang gnan par bya ba'i ming dus bris/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la oM li la sogs pa'i snying po ng+ge/ ri rab kyi steg du rje rtsas ma khag dengs pa bril/ 'jim pa las byas pa'i srin pa'i gzugs/ mdog mi sdug pa'i lta bar 'a bar mo
272a1(rnying rgyud): bdun la/ babasnas kyi la bad gtang dmas 'dza pa/ gzugs de sbyi na phrag tu bzhugapa/ dgasus bla gang pa snyam blang bzung drug pa gcog pa la gan / de'i byed du mo rdzogs sod /
272a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi ri rab rtse mo brgyad pa gcig tu gyur/ staM b+ha nan zhes pas gzir/ mo ha b+ha ya zhes pas ming dang rus su bcas pa/ b+ha gA bAn ces pa ni he ru ka'o// d+hIHd+hIHbai kri ni thabs dang shes rab tu bcas pa'o// ye shes kyi ri rab rtse mo brgyad pa dang ba
272a3(rnying rgyud): pa/ dpal he ru kas 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mnan par 'gyur ro// gab pa'i khro bor lo las dbye ba dang bgegs mnan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po phan pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa bshad du gsol// las kyis
272a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' nyon cig/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngags 'di byin gyis brlabs nas gsungs/ oM b+hu hu~M ma hA praNA ya b+hu rtsi b+hu ti bi mAn se A suSh+Ta ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM shi ma go khung ling hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM b+hu khung ho ra te ni
272a5(rnying rgyud): ho ya b+ho/ ra rma khA hi b+hi b+hi mo na yaM mo/ shi mo ku ku lu hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA pra NA d+hu rtsi b+hu Ni bi mA na se u tsuSh+pa kro d+ha sU phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis snying po 'di gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur to// sems dpa' chen po rkyen bzlog pa'i
272a6(rnying rgyud): rdzas gang lags/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ rdzas 'di rnams legs te/ gal te gso bar 'dod na/ gu gul la sngags kyis btab ste/ bsregs nas brgya rtsa brgyad btab na sos par 'gyur ro// ser ba 'od na/ sdigs mdzub kyi phyag
272a7(rnying rgyud): rgyang stan na ser ba chad 'brug bros/ thog chad do// rims na na pa'i bya mo nag mo'i dang du drung btag go// klu'i rten yod na thal ba gtsang ma la sngags btab na/ mi de'i sems mya ngan med par 'gyur ro// mche ba can za pa yod na/ kham zan la sngags
272b1(rnying rgyud): btab la sbyin no// klu pya gzer na gang na pa la phur pa la sngags bta' pa'am/ yang na ku n+yA ma ma mtshan la sngags bta ba nas bya'o// bA lA nA da na ba la phabla zan la bsngags te khu ba btsod la blud do// mig long nad kyis na ba la/ nad pa'i ming shog bul
272b2(rnying rgyud): br-i la/ nad pa'i khri 'og tu bcug la sngags gdab po/ spangs pa la nyin mtshan du gdab bo// pha rol sgra mi shes par bya na/ po'i ming rus khang gzhug go// ra luka la sbyang ki 'o ni/ don po don mo'i mye ru sngags bris la gdags so//
272b3(rnying rgyud): 'di 'bras dang / lhog pa de rnams la/ gu gul bsreg cing bdug go// ling tog la sngags 'dis phus gdab po// chu 'gags na gla ba dang / ba mar la gdab/ spos nas nan/ chang dang khye'u'i dri chu la bsres la gdab bo// de nyid la
272b4(rnying rgyud): bsngags te btang ngo // 'dre gnod chen chu dang nyung dkar la sngags la blud do// nad pa srung bar byed na/ sngags par ma chad par bzlas pas/ gdon mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro// srog ka dag gi dus su nyung dkar la sngags btab na chung rngub par
272b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro/ des zho yang thub par 'gyur ro// lha nye bar byas na/ spos bsreg cing sngags bzlas so// ba lang khong log na nyung dkar la bsngags shing bzlas so// zhing lA 'bu srin za na nyung dkar dang chan bsres te zhing mtha' bskor zhing btab na
272b6(rnying rgyud): ngos gcig tu 'gro'o// so la srin za na bcar te thad kar gdab po// mig la srin zan phu zhing gdab po// bang mdzod la gnod pa byed nA/ tsan+dan nam shug pa'i phur pa sor bcu gnyis pa la sngags la/ thod pa mtshan ngan gyi nang du 'bru nag pos bkang
272b7(rnying rgyud): la dang nag po'i cod pan dang bcas pas/ hUM kA ra 'am rnam par rgyal bar mnga' gsol nas dbus su gzhag par bya'o// phan bya'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po/
273a1(rnying rgyud): b+hunr-i gyi sngags kyi phan yon bcu gcig pa gsungs so// yang dag sngags kyi rgyal po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis b+hur+g+haM gyi sngags 'di gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur to// sems dpa' chen po rgyung 'di gang du snang
273a2(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ rgyud 'dis le gsed kyi gling kang kang pa r+ya snang bar 'gyur ro// las kyi sems dpa'/ rgyud 'di khyod kyis klogs shig nyon cig/ khyod nyid la gtad do// rgyud 'di lta smod pa nges ni/
273a3(rnying rgyud): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spang bar 'gyur ro// las kyi sems dpa' khang bu brtsegs pa'i pa Tar bcug la nyin mtshan du nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du bskor ba gyis shig/ 'di la bskor zhing mchod pas ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi
273a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur ro// de la rgyud 'di ni mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ro// gab pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa
273a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje phur pa'i phrin las 'khor logapa pa gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// // grub pa 'khor lo'i rgyud u rgyan gyi mkhan po rdo rje thong phreng dang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mang yul gyi lce ku ku rA dza dang brang tI dza ya rAk+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
273a6(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dz+wa la gu ya tan+ta/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'bar ba gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og min gyi gnas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa na/ 'khor rnam pa gnyis
273a7(rnying rgyud): kyi nang na/ su mdun dang rgyab med par phyogs bzhir thal le ba/ dus rtag tu ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa ni/ chos kyi sku dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi don la gnas so// sku mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas/ 'khor gyi nang du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
273b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ sngon lam dbang gis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs pa ni/ gzhan gyi don du byung ba ste/ zhub bsgrag pa'i cheng du zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de mi sdang ba las/ lha mo'i dbyangs kyis bskul ba las/ thugs zhi ba'i dang las khro bo 'bar ba'i
273b2(rnying rgyud): skur byung nas 'khor rnams la gsang ba dang gsang chen dang / ye shes kyi snying po dang gsum gsal bar byas nas bzhugs pa las/ 'khor gyi khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya dang / mngag gzhug la sogs pas/ ston pa la zhus pa 'di skad ces/
273b3(rnying rgyud): gsolnga lo// e ma ho ston pa gsang ba'i bdag/ rgyas par bka' stsal chu ba rdzogs// bsdus pa'i man ngag rmad po che// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol 'tshal// zhus pas/ de nas ston pas 'khor rnams la/ gsang ba dang / gsang chen dang /
273b4(rnying rgyud): shes snying po dang ldan par byas nas/ legs so 'khor gyis zhu ba lags// bsdus pa'i man ngag zhu 'dod na// khyed cag nga la gus par lhogs// dbang dang dam tshig ldan byos la// gnas dang grogs dang dus chos dang // rdzas dang yo byad ldan byos
273b5(rnying rgyud): la// ting 'dzin 'di la gtsor rtogs shig/ rten dang dkyil 'khor gsal bris la// bsgrub na dngos grub myur du thob// ces bka' stsal pas/ yang 'khor gyis zhus pa/ sems can sangs rgyas ji ltar sbyin// de rgyu ci dang TI las byung //
273b6(rnying rgyud): sems can spangs rgyas su bya ba// de la thabs ni gang gis bya// zhes pas lan du/ sems can sangs rgyas rgyu gcig ste// yab yum 'dus pa'i sems las byung // dngos po rang gA sems can chu// ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i dkar dmar jig
273b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas smin pa'i rgyu ru 'dod// sems can bla med sgrub 'dod na// rang sems brtag pa thams cad mchog/ ces gsungs so// rang sems brtag ni ji ltar brtag/ sems kyi yul ni gang gis bya// sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu//
274a1(rnying rgyud): sa na / su smra/ na su ma na
274a2(rnying rgyud): du na
274a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin
274a4(rnying rgyud): sa smras
274a5(rnying rgyud): nimi sa sa /
274a6(rnying rgyud): su /
274b1(rnying rgyud): ka// tshangs pa'i rtsenas gsang bar gnas// gnyis suHsa twA che chung nga // btsug pa'i tshul du gnas pa yin// de las rgyu ba'i rnam pa ni// byang chub sems ni de las 'ong // pha ba nas ni mangs d+ha// rlung gi srog rlung skyes bya ba// meno rdo rje/
274b2(rnying rgyud): nang na rtag tu gnas// mtshon pas mi mtshon ma hA'i rlung // chung ngu'i nang na rtag tu gnas// kun gzhi rnam shes rab la rigs// bde chen rtsa la gnas pa yin// a ta pheM gsum pa brtsegs dang 'bral// srid rtsar de ni gnas bcas nas/
274b3(rnying rgyud): dbang po dang bcas gzugs la khyab// g.yas kyi thabs rtsal lan// rna ltag g.yas nas gsang bar gnas// rak+ta rgyu ba'i lam yang yin// yid kyi rnam shes rten bcas nas// dbang po dang bcas gzugs la khyab// de ni rags pa'i
274b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid do// gyen du rgyu ba'i rgyang gnas te// thabs kyi yi ge rnams dang 'brel// g.yon pas shes rab ra sa nA// dri tshu rtag tu de la chu// nyon mongs yid dang rtag tu ldan// thur du rgyu ba'i rlung gnas te// shin tu phra ba'i a ling ldan// zla ba
274b5(rnying rgyud): nyi ma me long gsum// dang po lu gu rgyud du gnas// / shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo'i rtsa'o// sgo lnga'i shes pa'i gnas dang ldan// 'khor lo rnams dang 'brel pa ni// khang pa ka ba'i tshul du gnas// dper na khang rte ra ka ba 'dra// rtse gsu ma ka
274b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul du ste// 'khor lo rnams ni khang po 'dra// 'khor lo dang po ka zhu'i tshul/ bde chen 'khor lo'i rdza ba la// rtse yi 'dus sa rab tu gnas// 'khor lo khAng pa ka med na// rnam shes 'dug pa'i gnas med do// de las bye brag rnam bshad
274b7(rnying rgyud): pa// dang tha'i 'khor lo bdeb che// lha min dag gcing dmyal 'dul// rin chen 'thung ldan pazhugs pa'i gnas// mnyam nyid ye shes skye ba'is// ma mA kI dang rtag tu ldan// ce'uchung rtsa nas sor gnyis na// longs spyod 'khor mo
275a1(rnying rgyud): su na / na / smras/ /
275a2(rnying rgyud): shes gyu g+sa// kye na so na// rten shi / sprul pa'i ma gas / sa sbyi ba nasal so kyi / mi mi migs nyid
275a3(rnying rgyud): gas bya'i dkyi kyi ma lo// srasna pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag pa la// gas ba rdo rnam pa ni// ma zan 'khor lo'i grwa bu'i dkyil// b+haga'i lakhor lor ri k+ta'i dkyim// gsang ba rgyang chu sems pakhyor ro// 'a sa ci
275a4(rnying rgyud): sa kyi rig sa don rtsub nas// ya~M hwags sdig don sgo mye 'gegs// dam tshig sgrol man tan ldan// rtag tu kyod du bsgom pa/ nal 'byor ba zhes tha ba y-in// de dag 'khor rje gang 'thang dgo// mama'i snying po rang sdig pa pa/
275a5(rnying rgyud): spyo ba gi 'i la// rtam na ma bu mam rnam mi nod// mad dkyil 'bongs gang ba'i sum pa ba da ma// dgadung sem tshams nyid de// chog / tshan namams pa
275a6(rnying rgyud): nig pa pa'i gsang pa'o// rang dang 'thor du rigs rna 'bar// dbu 'a rdzogs pa'i rigs mas bsgra // rnams la'abar ba'i sog yang brgyags// gnyis ldan sa dang gsung rdzogs rten// rab mog gi gang shar po'o// depe ni rlung rgya yin/
275a7(rnying rgyud): pad+hA rlung pa gyus// mig dang rnab srA dang rtse// dbang po bzhi la rgyas pa'i nga// rgyab la sogs rlung bshigs// phras lam than stong brag tu// med pa shi rlung yang byeg// rus rigasas chug kyis// rtsa la~M / khams med pa ma//
275b1(rnying rgyud): khyab byed rlung du de yang grags// de ru 'od kyi thig ler// de las gyur pa gsung rdo rje// de ni gsung gi rdo rje 'bar// de las gyur ba rdo rje gnas// de ni thugs kyi rdo rje 'bar// mkhas pas spro bsdu byas pa yis// phar 'phros pas ni dgra bgags 'dul//
275b2(rnying rgyud): sbyar 'dus rang gi bag chags bskyeg/ de ni las kyi rdo rje 'bar// phung po rdo rjes gtim byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgoms// rtag tu de ltar de gnas pa// sku yi rdo rje 'bar ba yin// de la dbang dang byin brlabs pas// yon tan rdo rje 'bang
275b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rig kyi bdag po yab yum dang // de ltar rdzogs pa'i ku ma ra// kun gzhi'i rnam shes nyid du 'dod// de yang rgyu yi hUM lA sna bsgyur// de yul don gyis rgyas 'debs ma// gnyis sgra med pa rtsa ba'i dkyil//
275b4(rnying rgyud): de yi khyad par byin brlabs las// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna dang // sgrib pa lung du ma bstan bzhi// de ltar mi dge bcu pa ni// hUM ring bcu yi sa bon las// so so'i rang sngags rten stobs kyis// brjod pas khro ba
275b5(rnying rgyud): bcu ru gyur// de yi cha 'dzin shes pa bcu// trA~M la brten pa snga ma bzhin// rnam shes lnga dang dbang po lnga// dza la brtan nas gnas bsgyur ba// gsod pa'i za byed pha bcur sprul// yul dang dus kyi cha 'dzin lnga// gsod ma bcu ru snga pa bzhin
275b6(rnying rgyud): khams dang skye mched de ltar ba// phyogs bcu'i khro bo yin pa gsungs// phyag gi mchod pa yang ba A dA pa// rigs lnga yab yum sor mo rnams// byas pa'i bar du phur ba bcug/ gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// de la bstims pas sras gyur pa// phrar ba rdzas su rnam par bca/
275b7(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// 'dzab dang bzlas pa'i don ni gang // dkyil 'khor don ni ji ltar bsdu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal 'tshal// 'dzab bzlas rnam pa du ma yang // gyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// phyi yi bsgrub
276a1(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa dang // nang gi rang sems byung ba dang // gsang ba'i dngos grub blang ba ni// khyad par 'gro ste bsdus pa'i don// de yi bye brag rnam bshad pa// dkyil 'khor gsum la tha dad re// dgug dang
276a2(rnying rgyud): gsang dang gzhom pa'o// kI la ya hU~M phaT bar du// gzhug pa'i snying po tha dad do// dgug pa dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi// ya na dza las gyur pa bya'o// gsad pa mA ra ya gsum las// gzhom zhing brdeg pa a kro Ta// gcig gis gcig bsku la 'od zer
276a3(rnying rgyud): glog 'brug char kyi tshul du'o// de la bsdus pa'i don bshad pa// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus ni// su gsung thugs yon las lngar 'dus// rigs lngar snang ba ye shes dngos// de yi byin badra bas stsal ba ni// ji ltar 'dod
276a4(rnying rgyud): pa yid bzhin tshul// khro bo khro mo rnam sprul yang // gud na med de de las skul// sprul pa rnams ni rgyu las 'dus// chu ni rang bzhin byang chub sems// sems nyid yi ge ar snang ba// a mthong chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong // ma
276a5(rnying rgyud): g.yos lta ba'i rgyas btab nA// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgom pa yin// de skad ces ni bka' stsal pa// khyed la gtad kyis nan tan zud// gzhung dang bcangs dang bstan dang bsgrags// legs par gyis la sems la mnos// zhes gtad
276a6(rnying rgyud): do// de nas 'khor rnams kyis bstod pa// legs so legs so bdag po'i mchog/ legs so legs so don gyi gtso// legs so legs so don dang 'tshal// kun gyi bdag la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ces thams cad dbyings nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//
276a7(rnying rgyud): dpal rdo rje 'bar ba man ngag gi kal+la ba dum bu'i rgyud chung / 'khor la gtad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang / bod kyi mkhas pa chen po bo ro tsA nas bsgyur ba'o// bka' rgyud 'di yi rgyal po ste// rgya cher ba zang chos
276b1(rnying rgyud): gdon// 'di yi gzhung gnas rgyas par 'byung // lam 'gro can dang 'thad na smin// 'di don gab cing sbas par 'byung // rgyu ga skad du/ nA ma badz+ra dz+wA la tAn+ta/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'brang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das
276b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen po de btsun mo'i dkyil na rtag tu bzhugs so// de nas
276b3(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i longs spyod par mdzad pa'i/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i gzugs ka la gsum phyag drug pa/ ser po/ dmar po/ dgar po'i tshul du gnas pa/ 'khor lo la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i cha byad can/ mtshan dang nga
276b4(rnying rgyud): byad du ldan pa di/ 'og min gyi gnas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin rin po che lnga las grub pa tshad dpag tu med pa/ dbyibs dang kha dog dang khyad par dugyur pa/ gru bzhi dang gru ched dang sgo bzhi sgo dang bcas pa/
276b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang / them skas dang bcas pa/ ka ba brgyad kyis rnam par spras pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pas brgyan pa/ lha mo la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis bklubs pa ni/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa
276b6(rnying rgyud): ni 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / dkon mchog dpal dang / tshe dpag tu med pa dang / grub pa gdon mi za ba rnams btsun mo rnams dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang sgeg mo ma
276b7(rnying rgyud): dang / phreng ba ma dang / dbyangs len ma dang / gar sbyar ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / lcags kyu ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / lugs sgrog ma dang / dril bu ma rnams dang / gnyis
277a1(rnying rgyud): su med par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po longs spyod par mdzad du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po yang sdang bar mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang dang po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor nang du
277a2(rnying rgyud): zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de mi snang bar gyur to// kye/ khyod ni snying rje dang ldan 'gro ba'i gnyen mchog ste// byams pas kun pa skyob cing phan mdzad pa// dga' ba'i pad+ma rgyas pa bdag la yod/ bde ba chen po btang snyoms bde ba'i gar mdzod cig
277a3(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po de zhal gsum phyag drug par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod la sogs pas/ dz+nyA pe la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa
277a4(rnying rgyud): dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa dang / me tog ka niSh+ka la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pas yang dgra par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/
277a5(rnying rgyud): sru gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rnams// rab dgyes khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes brjod pas/ nyid kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// oM ma hA shAn+ya d+ha dz+dza/
277a6(rnying rgyud): na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la// bdag dang chos dang rnam rig dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// stong nyid ye nas gnas pa las// shes pas mthong ba'i yul min te// gang gis
277a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes bsrid 'gyur ba// de yis yang dag rnam par mthong // zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos// sems bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// snying rje'i yul ni
277b1(rnying rgyud): rnam bsgom ste// chos gcig po 'di rtsa ba'i phyir// chos rnams kun dang 'dra ba gsungs// de bas shes rab snying rje ni// theg pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o// gzhan gyi don du sems bskyed phyir// byams dang dga' dang btang snyoms son na//
277b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis len par bya// sems can don la dmigs pa dang // chos tsAm+ba lA nI dmyigs pa'o// mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa yis// tshad med bzhi pa bsgom par bya// de nas rgya yi sa bon bsam// b+h+rUM gnas bsdu ba brtsam pa
277b3(rnying rgyud): dang // dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes// de ru yi ge 'bru bsnam mo// yAM raM baM la~M taM b+h+rUM hUM/ de nas dgyes pa chen po de/ su gsung thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nyid sngags kyi bdag po chen por byin gyis brlab
277b4(rnying rgyud): so// parlabs ma thag tu zhal gsum phyag drug par snang bar gyur to// de nas de nyid 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor srul bsdus nas shes rab ma dang dga' bar byas so// de nas yang dkyil 'khor 'byin
277b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM AHd+h+waM/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// btsun mo yum gyi rtag la// rim pa bzhin tu dgod bya ste// gsang ba yum gyi dmatshig rnams// ldan par bya phyir gdon par bya// de nas thugs
277b6(rnying rgyud): rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa rnams/ dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba dang rtsibs dang sgribs mtshan dang / gru ched dang / sgo bzhig rim bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de yang rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / dkon
277b7(rnying rgyud): mchog dpal dang / tshad pag tu med pa dang / grub pa gdon mi za ba rnams dang / dkar po dang / mthing ga dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu'i mdog tu snang ba dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / ra la pra
278a1(rnying rgyud): rnams cag dang pon 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma rnams la 'khyud ba/ badz+rad+d+ha sa dbang bsrung ba/ mtshan dang babyad dru bcas pa/ snyan na dang mthar chu dang / dbyung can dang / mamad
278a2(rnying rgyud): sogs pas mdzes par byas pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu la la sogs rang rang gi mdog dang / lag cha 'dzin pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la 'khod par gyur to// de de'i
278a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi phreng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po de bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba
278a4(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// gnas bsrung ba 'di lta bu gsungs so// dngos po med las dngos po'i tshogs// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur// ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag par// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa'o//
278a5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi khyad par las// rgyu yi dngos po gsal byas te// gnas nas gnas bsrung rnam par brtsam// a yig dang po lnga par ldan// bcu gcig pa yi thig le yis// spyi bo'i gtsug tu brtag par bya'o// grangs las 'khor lo
278a6(rnying rgyud): rtsibs bcu pa// rig pa cung zad ser ba las// nyi ma'i dkyilnga 'khor bsam par bya// steng 'og pad+ma lha chen po// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las bskyed// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus
278a7(rnying rgyud): mthing zha la// phyag gnyis hUM gi rgyang cings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lhag mji ltang 'dod pa min// gang ye shes sems dpa' gnas// hUM/ de les gnod mdzes rgyal zan// thugs kanas ni zung myur te// spyan sngang dka' dod tshul du
278b1(rnying rgyud): g+ha// pa rlabasasasmra// smon pa nas byas / snyoms / pa sa / tu/ sa / na // / tshul na ca /
278b2(rnying rgyud): oM ya mraSh+TA na/ rdodzartsa pa'i ma na// sgra badzad rje 'tshal ba na/ da kyi sbyin zung chub N+DI/ des m+b+ha pa'i mi bzhin rab tu byung// oMn+da d+hi la'i 'dog 'dra// ri sa N+Da ga rnams mAdz+dza// skad da gas
278b3(rnying rgyud): 'di zer rnam pa tsho brlabs me// rdorje phreng kyis des rgyab// bstegs pas sbyin mig yon// mon maHsa man+tak+Sha rA wAg bad+hUdz+dza/ b+h+ya tag+h+nAr+m+ma ye+en+d+haSh+TAH/ sebs hrI la sa than
278b4(rnying rgyud): la la bad+hA ti biswAta b+hA s+yA tI/ sa pa'iSh+Tham/ kA yA thAka tsit+tab kI la badz+ra~M // snying ga'i rgyu gyis ting gzugs las// rje nam ts+tshi nas ni/ tron nr-i gyi gzugs su du ra~M// oM dz+nyA ra tit+t+waT+Ta \u0f7f/ gci ga \u0f7f
278b5(rnying rgyud): bangs tan / a~M sa ta taskr-i t+te/ sh+tsa Sh+TaSh+T+r-i 5/ po/ oMm ta N+DiH// / / datu
278b6(rnying rgyud): bad+h+r-i ta Ar+thA a tsa la r+d+ha/ b+han+d+ha b+han hUM laT oM br-idz+ra kr-i ta a pa r-iHta d+haM/ tiSh+Thatiny+tsa hUM phaT/ au bidz+ra kro ta dzi lo kya bi dz+nya yai b+h+yAM/ b+hir+d+ha d+hir+d+hA hUM paH/ oM badza kro tA maM hA bilbin+ti/ Ta ya s+phod+hi pa d+h+r-i phaT/ mig yAM lta bu'i 'dza
278b7(rnying rgyud): sa ngas gyu sa sadu mas / sa
279a1(rnying rgyud): las sprul pa'i khro bo rnams// yan lag byin gyis bad+ma zlas te// yab um byor ba'i mtshams nAs ni/ rdo rje tshigs la sogs pA sIs// rang rang lag narnam 'thos pas// bang tshang bgags rnams gnyim
279a2(rnying rgyud): dang // gnas bsrung ba ni byas nas kyang // rdo rje la sogs thang du gyur// sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni// ye nas yin phyir phyag rgya'i bdeg// steng du me yI dkyil 'khor dang // chu yis rnam par g.yogs par bsgom// rdo rje la sogs
279a3(rnying rgyud): rnam lha yis// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // nga rgyal phrag dog gcod byed pa'o// su gsung thugs kyi rang bzhid dang // yon tan rmin las rnams kyis brgyan// bgegs rnams rnam par gzhig pa'i phyirarwa// brgyal zhing rab tu
279a4(rnying rgyud): rgyabri bar 'gyur// mos shing rnam par 'gal 'gyur te// tshig cing rnam par 'bros par 'gyur// nam mkha' dngas pa'i rang bzhin las// rdo rje la sogs gyur lnga shar// steng ngog gur dngas gzhi dang // bla re dang ni bA dang // rtsegs par
279a5(rnying rgyud): gyis shing bar mtshams med// mi stag 'phro zhing rnam par dkrig/ mdangs can kha dog lnga dang ldan// yon tan kun gyis rab brgyan pa// thun mong ma yin bka' yi mtshams// thun mong dbyar chen mtshams rnams ni// sa bon yi ge hUM
279a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis// lu gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o// sha nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus dag tu// yi ge b+h+rUM gi khyad par las// a rnams 'thos shing 'dus pa ni// sngon po gzhu dra ba dan phyir// du ba'i 'od kyi phreng
279a7(rnying rgyud): bas bskod// sril sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams// rgyal gnas pa de bzhin // 'bras zil yang gnas bya'i phyig/ rlung gi sted na ldan // rdo rje gnyis dang yeng dag ldan// de steng ra las byung bra la// dmang po sngags mardo rjes mtshan/

280a2(rnying rgyud): ma nga ma / na kyi na

280a6(rnying rgyud): sa du sa mi byi badrin pa das pa ma ma ti donas snying po po tu gnas phyin drigasu sas// 'dod pa'i 'ams marigs papas// drang ba ming kyi
280b1(rnying rgyud): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tsam// de nyid snang ba ma yin pa// yang dag par na rang bzhin med// rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyis// stong pa'i bdag nyid ldan par bya'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bcom// de nyid las ni ma rtogs pa// tha dad ma
280b2(rnying rgyud): yin don gcig min// 'gag pa med pa kye med par// rtag pa ma yin chad pa'ang med// 'ong ba med dang 'gro med pa// de bas rgyu yi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo nyid kyis ma grub pas// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min// bdag dang gzhan yang med
280b3(rnying rgyud): pa ste// ci la'ang mi dmigs mi rtog pa// de nyid rnam par thar pa'i so// rkyen gyis rang spyi bo ni// rgyu ma bub pas mi bsrub rnying // ngo bo nyid kyis ma bskyed pas// mtshan ma med pa'i rnam thar ro// sru dang rjen gyis ma ba skyed cing // 'a
280b4(rnying rgyud): zla nga nyid mi sgribs// smon par bya ba'i nges sprul te// smon par bya ba namathar ro// oM maN+Dash+ye n+yaHd+h+r-i na badz+ra swab+hA thA swAr+m+ma kod+h+r-iH/ dam pa'i don du bsgom pa ni// don dam pa yi sems bskyed la// 'a gro ba'i don du bya ra/
280b5(rnying rgyud): rdzob par yang sems bskyed de// byams dang snying rje ldan pa dang // dga' dang dAtang snyoms sems bskyed de// stong pa rjid kyi rang bzhin lhas// thugs kyis snying rje'i yul dag 'byung // theg pa chen por phyogs pas na// thabs dang @
280b6(rnying rgyud): ci 'brel bapa'o// gdu rnams sdug bsngal nyen pa las// thal byang 'dod pa nyid rje yin// snrums pas phan pa sgrib pa te// klan la skyob cing phan par dga'// dga' ba rab tu dag na du n+d+he// dam pa'i don la 'dun pa'o// chags
280b7(rnying rgyud): sang nyis dang bral ba ni// de ma'i sems dang ldan pas// don sa po yis bting rnams so// khyab par bya 'dun / rigs sa ma yin mtshungs pa byur/ rnam sa kyi// dper 'don gyibang min pa/
281a1(rnying rgyud): rdzob sams bsrung gzugs rnams gnyis// rdon dbyings kyi sogs pa'i gzugs// sang sA rgyas la sogs 'khong sa bsnod// ma tsun pang+gA ba sti ti nge 'dzim// b+h+rUM yig / po'i chad bdalas// thug+sa
281a2(rnying rgyud): dkar po yang bgreng nas// sna tshogs 'od phyogs 'khor sbyar ba// b+ha ga'i rang bzhin rdo rjes mtshan// chos 'byung ye shes rang bzhin ni// dri ma med cing zhi ba'o// de ni ning gi 'khor po nyid// sku tshogs bta rdo rjes brtan// de saM steng du
281a3(rnying rgyud): lnga// rigs mar bcas pA'i sdeng mdzad bskyed// zhalnga gsum pa la phyag drug ste// zhal g.yas nag cing g.yon pa dmar// tsaM zhal dbus ni dkar po'o// phyag gnyis rig ma 'khrud nas ni// g.yas na 'khor lo ra la bI ste// g.yon
281a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen brda'o// gru bzhi pa yi sgo bzhi pa// lte brtsibs dang bcas pa dang // su chad bar khyams rin chen shar// themaskas rta bzla rnams kyis brgyan// sgo khyud bzhi ni mchog tu mdzes// gar dang rin chen pad+ma dang // rin chen pa pus so/
281a5(rnying rgyud): sa byas// drab dra byed byed pa dang // mA tig phreng btar dang // ya phrab rdo rje bcu gcig 'bud// rin chen shar byas phyogs rnams brgyan// tshun 'phangs rnams dang ldan pa dang // dar bu khad kyis rnam par sbas// chos kyi 'khor
281a6(rnying rgyud): re dwags gnyis// rdzogs rnams kun tu mdzes par gnas// gzugs chen gser gyi yub can// gsal 'char mdzes pa'i sor phreng can// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis bklubs// dbyibs dang kha rog khyad par can// tshang rnams dpag tu
281a7(rnying rgyud): gzhal las brtsegs 'di la bsgom// sna tshogs pa de la bsgom// nyi ga brtsegs pa mnan pa ni// sangs rgyas rnam pa rnams kyi gdan// rang gi mtshan dang ldan pa yis// 'dod chags a la sogs yig 'bru// dngu
281b1(rnying rgyud): kyi nyi mra'i gdan la sems// ye shes zla ba brtsegs pa bsgom// dkyil na a dang le nyid de// / kha 'thong thabs kyi yi ge ni// shes rab ye shes rnam par sbas// mtshan dang dpe byud ldan par byed// shes rab sgra yig bcu drug ni// rnam
281b2(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis su gyur ba'o// a A/ i mI/ u A/ oM l-I/ a l-I// aM A/ ran+ta/ ma gr-I/ ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin las// rigs ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni// cho ga lnga yi spo bsku yis// ye shes mngon par
281b3(rnying rgyud): chub pa'o// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// srag sung thugs su yang dag ldan// dbang bskur bya ste bsgrub par bya// thabs mkhas thabs dang ldan pa ste// namya mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
281b4(rnying rgyud): bsgom nas ni// thabs dang shes rab yi ger bcas// snying ga'i pad+ma kha sbyar ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sdang mdzad 'khor lo 'dzin pa gnas// lteng AM kyis mtshan pa la// 'od zer mtshon char ldan pa rnams// byung
281b5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i khams khyab pas// rgya lwa ba'i tsheg drangs slong du gyur// sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la// kha dog lnga yi rang bzhin ni// sku yi rtse mor brtag par bya// bdag nyid chos kyi phyag rgya las// gzugs rna myas mthong bar gyur pa ma/
281b6(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas mu// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor thim gyur nas// snying ga'i rtse mor brtag par bya// gnyis su med par rab sbyor ba// 'od zer lcags kyu rnam 'phros pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor rgyun bzhugs nas// oM gyis 'dzin par byed pa
281b7(rnying rgyud): la// phar gyis 'phangs pas gsang bar 'dus/ ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni// sA yi tsa mo rtag par bya// byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid ni// ye shes 'ong ba'i rang bzhin las// zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas pas// gas ba'i da kyang
282a1(rnying rgyud): sa sasas// yogs thal dang sa nyid na// sbyin gas bang babartags pa/ sang bamadzag ga chog gis/ na dam pa med pa 'chibasad/ dus smin 'chig ma 'byung sadu/ samyo thung ba 'du
282a2(rnying rgyud): por 'gyur// sngags kyi pos brtags pa na// mtshan ma rnams kyang 'gyung 'gyur te// byang chub 'tshang rgya gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gsang ba dam pa mchog gis// 'da' brar mi byed dam tshig yin// thun
282a3(rnying rgyud): po gang zhig 'da' byed pa// de la dngos grub mi 'byung zhing // dug dang mtshon dang nad bgegs kyis// bsdad nas sems can dmyal bar ste// gang gis gsang ba mi shes par// dam pa'i don la 'jug pa ni/ ldangs pas nam mkha'
282a4(rnying rgyud): bsnyeg pa 'dra// rnam par dpan don mi shes par// thos btsam la 'jug byed de// gang dag bsod nams mi byed pa// skyes bu chen po de dag 'arlag/ yang dag don gyi rang bzhin la// gtong ba la sogs rnam brgyan pa// 'gal bar mi
282a5(rnying rgyud): bya dgag pa min// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bya// rnam par dben par bshes nas// gsang ba'i don la 'dug 'gyur te// de yis yang dag rnam par mthong // sgra yi don la 'jug pa min// don dam tshol la dang por ni// dngos po'i
282a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gsungs pa ste// don rnams rtogs shing chags med na// gsang ba dam pa sbyin par bya// dbang bskur gnang ba thob nas ni// nyan dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i// bla ma'i rgyud la gnas pa rnams// spangs shing rtogs par ma byas
282a7(rnying rgyud): na// gzer bu lag pa stong par 'gro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsong ba gsang chen snying po rnams// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// tha ma'i kha nas brtag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lha dang gsung
282b1(rnying rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po dgyes pa chen po de/ 'khor los sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ting pe tshin
282b2(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// rnam par snang mdzad mngon byang chub// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mer ba'i zhal// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // rdo rje
282b3(rnying rgyud): rdzagra ma 'dzin// phyag rgya bzhi dang rab ldan zhing // yan lag bzhi dang gar sbyor bas// cha stod cha slad med pa yi// lha rengs shar ba'i tshon ni// bslab pa chen po brtsam par bya// lha mo klu mom mo rnams// bzhin bzang
282b4(rnying rgyud): gi dkyus ring ba// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brtan pa dang // dkar zhing 'jam la 'dod par dgal// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa dang / nyi shu rtsa lnga pa 'am rung // rigs ldan pa dang yon tan ldan// mdog gzugs nas
282b5(rnying rgyud): pa ni// bde ba dag shegs pa'i sngags 'grub pa// myo na nye bar spyad par bya// rgyal rigs la sogs bu ma la// 'dod pa la sogs pa nyes byas nas// thag chen mchog gi sdong du 'gyur// sme sha can dang gdol ba dang // snyig
282b6(rnying rgyud): mA khan dang shan pa'i rigs// btso blag mkhan gyi bu mo rnams// rnyed nas dor bar mi bya'o// gesal ldan ma yi rang bzhin la// yan lag bachad dang ldan byas te// sngags grub 'dod pa gang yin pas// byin gyis brlab pa rab tu ba
282b7(rnying rgyud): snying ga smin mtshams lte pa dang // gsang ba'i gnas dang rkang pa'i bang // nyi ma dang ni zla bar bcas// rin chen zur brgyad pad+ma brgyad// me yi dkyil 'khor bu gsum la// phyag rgya bzhi dang rab ldan pa'i// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid gamang
283a1(rnying rgyud): smras / na nan na sa / san sa/ mdudun rgyan/
283a2(rnying rgyud): bor bsam// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// ye shes pa ban 'bregrel bar byed// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdag nyid pas// rnal 'byor bas kyang bsgrub par bya'o// 'did chags chen po'i tshul gyisas// ye sa dkyil 'tshar bya
283a3(rnying rgyud): bAkrus te// 'dor rnams thugs la bzhugs pa yis// shes rab ma ni dga' bar bya// oM sarba ta d+ha ga d+ha sa nu ra ga Na dz+nyA n+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ bya chub sems ni byung ba'i tshe// mkhas pas sngags ni phaT ces brjod// @
283a4(rnying rgyud): khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pan+de trata ta oM AHhUM/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa bya// oM sarba tad+h+r-i ga ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan
283a5(rnying rgyud): med de// dkyil 'khor thams cad steng mdzad pa// 'khor rnams sku gsung thugs nyid de// ngo bor bya phyir drim par bya// rgyu yi ngo bo gnas pa rnams// rnam pa gnyis dang yang dag sdad// don dam pa dang kun rdzob po// de nas bcom ldan
283a6(rnying rgyud): 'das dgyes pa chen pos// btsun mo'i mkha' rin po che'i khang par byir gyis brlabs te/ rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par byas nas/ phyi dang 'dra ba nyid du gyur to// de nas la ber sku las bton te/ nyid kyis dkyil 'byor 'phro ba'i ting
283a7(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// shin tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs
283b1(rnying rgyud): pa thams cang gyis// gsung ba'i mchod pas mngon par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad cesu gsol to// e mu ho rgyal ba thams cad kyi// bla na med pa'i byang rgyab sems// srug smyung thugs kyis byin rlobs la// rabya dkyis khyod kyis
283b2(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// zhes brjod pas/ dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ srung nga gsung dang thugs rdo rjer byin gyis btabs so// de nas yang 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin pa
283b3(rnying rgyud): homs par grags nas/ 'kho gas bzlas so// byang chub sems sbyin dan bams/ la tharnams cad bskyed mdzad// yi ge byor lo mtshan can te// pri mi dkyi 'bor rdzogs dzad pa'o// tA bam na Ni b+h+yo ti re// su/
283b4(rnying rgyud): pa tshwa ba~M hoH/ skya gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'bang mchog/ thabs dang shes rab mthon zung // de dza~Mg yi ge 'thung gyur pa// gsum pa su rab rdzogs byed pa// cod pan yig 'brurnams kyis brgyan/ in d+hi le/ nam mkhami khams ngos
283b5(rnying rgyud): gnas sa// mas can rnams nimams pa/ ngas gas kyis rgyangs pagyis// rgyal ba'ims su can nga gyud// gzugs de stong pa mtshan med/ bye rgyam nga shes pa rnams// rtag pa la sogs sangs rgyas la
283b6(rnying rgyud): pa ng+ge yang dag gA ste// rnams 'as rgya ma rjid rnams/ rjen ma sa pa/ rim pa kyi ma pa // seMg nga ba mas // sgeg mal sogs rnam pa // tham yang dzin pang dag ldan
283b7(rnying rgyud): mags pa nas ni// d+ha pe la sogs thags rnams so// rtag po ma yin 'jigs pa// dam pa'i rnaM sring dam pa'i thugs// yul la sogs pa'i dang gis na// thabs dang shes rab rnam 'brel ba// gsu byung
284a1(rnying rgyud): bdu da sa// gsangs nan ga dun pas// di smras marnam sa // 'du ba sa da sa// sa smos // du sa bya//
284a2(rnying rgyud): rab zabs kyi phyag rgya las// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan zhugs nas// rdo rje'i lam byung 'od zer gyis// gsang ba'i dbyings su zhu mdzad do// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// thugs ka na me ni byung gyur te// 'gro ba'i don du rab mdza
284a3(rnying rgyud): phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed// don rnams mdzad nas brtul zhugs kyis// nyid kyi thugs kar thim gyur te// ho oM AHr+g+haM ho/ byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid la// lha mos bskul bas phyag tu gsal// gsang ba
284a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed mdzad nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa la// gsang ba'i don rnams ston par mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'bar rdzog par bskyed nam/ 'di skad ces gsungs te/ byang chub sems
284a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// dkar dmar dang ba'i rang bzhin gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid// mos pa'i dga' ba rin chen 'byung // mtshon mar 'dzin pa 'od dpag med// mngon par 'du byed don yod grub// gsal bar 'dzin pa rnam shes/
284a6(rnying rgyud): gnas// mi bskyod pa yi bdag nyid do// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can// sman la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can// lamra ni sgeg mor bstan pa ste// brda ba phreng ba ma yi bdag/ bsngal ba dbyangs zhes bya ba
284a7(rnying rgyud): 'byod gi mi pan/ kyis na // matog sa na sum// gnas sa khyod gas sa// zhes thag sus / kyang ba 'gas pas/
284b1(rnying rgyud): ga yin te// skra thags pa ni dril bum// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mni rmad du sbyar nas/ rang rang gi sman rgyas par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la/ mgrin macig dang dbyangs pa/
284b2(rnying rgyud): tubastod pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ dkyil 'khor thams cad ston mdzad pa'i// gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba yi// rdo rje'i bu khyod phyag 'tshal lo// nges don kun gyi bdag nyid can// gsang ba'i don rnams sngon mdzad pa// dri med kying
284b3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa yi// rdo rje gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes kun gyi rang bzhin can// tswi yang sa ler mkhyen mdzad pa// mi rtog ye shes dang ldan pa// rdo rje thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
284b4(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen pos khyab par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang tha mi dad par gyur cing / dbyer med pa ni mkha' dang badra ba nyid du mthong ste/ dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med
284b5(rnying rgyud): pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong / gzugs la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid tha mi dad ste/ dngos po thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ ci spyod pa'i bya ba la 'jug par gyur te/ smong lam gyi rnam pa rnams rtag tu sgom par byed do// de ban
284b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung drang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po de/ sku gsung thug sa
284b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin las gnas bzhin du lha'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus dag tu// gzhal yas brtsegs pa bsgom nas ni// zla ba'i dkyil

285b1(rnying rgyud): gtan// nyid khyab kyi spyod dpa kyi choms macan sha myong rdzus thugs// ma' bdus pa gas bzags da// thAg na dan rdzu blang ba don// thams drung na 'am du gyu / sa
285b2(rnying rgyud): kying du ma// pi wang rgyud ni phyag na bsnams// dga' dang stobs kyis don byed rdzing // nub kyi rtsibs mtshan yang dag gnas/ ti ir+tha ljang sa ni// phrag gnyis gang ni bsgyur ba mdzad// btang snyom pa phye she don rje
285b3(rnying rgyud): byang gi rtsibs mtshan dag tu bzhugs// d+ha pe de kar ser sngos phor 'dzin// sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam ldan pas// ser sde 'chal ba'i tshul khri mas rnams// don byed me yi thu la bzhugs// puSh+pe dmar por me tog 'khor// brjod dang btson
285b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras rnam ldan pas// 'khrul dang po lo can rnams kyi// don byed myi ngan bden bral phyogs// A la dmang ldang mar ma ste// bsam gtan pha rol phyin mdzad pas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i don mdzad phyir// rlung gi mtshams su yang dag gnas/
285b5(rnying rgyud): dkar lnga ga N+DI drung phor bsdams// shes rab pa rol phyin mdzad pasdu// gti mug can gyi don mdzad phyir// dbang ldan gra ru rnam par bzhugs// dbu rgyan thams cad rgyan gyis mdzes// thams cad du ni yang dag ldan// gshed mo dkar
285b6(rnying rgyud): mo ljags kyi thogs// ye shes me long ldan pa yis// phung po'i bdud rnams 'joms mdzad de// shab kyi sbyor ni nam par bzhugs// mithub nag mo rdzal zhags 'dzin// mnyam nyid ye shes ldan pas na// nyon mongs rnam par
285b7(rnying rgyud): dem pa zung pathug po// chog nye mang shing rdzogs rgyag rdzo// ye shes 'a gas pas// bdun kyi ngoms pa bye/ mtshugs su ni zugs pa ma // namag ca
286a1(rnying rgyud): 'o// bzlab pa'i ga shes la du// bang rnams ma pa smras pa// zang gi na ni rnam pang bzhugs// 'dugs pa'i gzugs can gas pas / dang ng+ya ga stan
286a2(rnying rgyud): sdug gdub zhabs gdub la sogs rnams// lto 'gro sbrul gyis brgyan cing bzhugs// khrog terare 'bru tshugs 'jigs par bsdu// sbyin ma glang mig kyang ser// zhal gdangs pa la ljags kyang 'jil// mche ba gtsigs shing ha ha bzhad/
286a3(rnying rgyud): dngos po thams cad 'joms mdzad ma// me stag 'phro zhing rnam par bzhugs// oM d+harma d+hArbaswa b+hA wa At+ma kau&trAM/ dkyil 'khor rnams ni thams cad kyang // yan lag bzhi dang rtag tu ldan// sems paskyed pa ni bsnyen pa te// don da
286a4(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob bo// kun rdzob sems bskyed byin brlabs pa// nye bar bsnyen pa zhes bya ste// 'grib mo rdo rje bskul ba'o// grub pa chen po'i mtha' du ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur po'o// gtso dang 'khor gyi rang bzhin ni// ngang rang
286a5(rnying rgyud): paM'i gzugs 'dzin te// byang chub mchog ni sgom par byed// gzugs sogs phung po'i rang bzhin ni// b+h+rUM la sogs pa'i yi ge yis// sangs rgyas lnga ru byin gyis brlabs// spyan la sogs pa'i bdag nyid rnams// lus kyi 'byung ba sa
286a6(rnying rgyud): bskyed// mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni// sa bon rnams kyi gsang ba dang // mchod pa'i lha mo rnam sa sra gsal// lus kyi rtag pa la sogs pa// dam pa'i khro bor byin brlabs pas// nye bar gyur pa zhes bya bar// nying ga mgrin

286b4(rnying rgyud): sa rnams/ de la gis mas zang ba sa// rkyed gyis brnams kyis gnas mdzad// mapata ga tu ldag ma ma na / ngas pa dang da/

286b7(rnying rgyud): rje kyi gzigs// rgyan rnams la gas rje dang // dgas kyi bdag pa rnams kyis // mi ma ma kyang khyo ma tha / yom san rdzun 'ab ma ma/ yomatham ma
287a1(rnying rgyud): !// snyomangs rgyu byung sa!/ sa/ sa su na // sa sa smra su dus pa/ sa ma sa rtags/ da pa 'a
287a2(rnying rgyud): padang nos par bya// sangs rgyas gnas la rdzogs ngas su// dkyil bong yan lag bzhi ldan pas// rnal 'byor ba lngas bsgom nas sra// snying ga'i pad+mo la sbyor ba// rin+da ma mkhang par dmigs nas ste// gas ba'i gnas sa
287a3(rnying rgyud): rje mi wA bsang // rgyagan po yang byung 'dzin pa// bsams nas m+b+ha shes thugs 'di kyis// rgyal ba rnams ni sbal bar byed// shar sgo'is yi lha mo yis// skye mi mdzod pa rgyun mig cid // yang dag ma thong sa rnas par po/
287a4(rnying rgyud): di nyid gang y-ish+thag/ dkris ga kyi b+h+ya// nam dgags pa pa bdag tud pa// mna' byung bus kyi mi dmigs te// med migs pa nyid dmagus pa / gangags pa shes kyis byang ba// de sa sa pa ma pa na
287a5(rnying rgyud): bco// nyis rang 'i gis nga// gags pa pa sa rnams dag thugs/ rdzug na ma mas/
287a6(rnying rgyud): sa dag sa skyes sa sbyong ba dan/ rnas se la gnas par byed/ bas byeshepa rab kyis med pa la/ byang napas ma kyitha bcwabasu bsu// rnal dza kyi ltu mam pa
287a7(rnying rgyud): pa rtsa' ba gyi bu byed// yi dag par brnam pa / dab mthang sa sa rnam pa thom// gang shes rgyas/ rgya chen po dang // ldan par bya tu med migs so// ngal po thebakyims da
287b1(rnying rgyud): slob 'ang dam ni thamasas// nams ldan sa ma byung dang // yad dang ma pa rnam par sa// rnam snas da 'an dudu// dpang ba na // ngan sa pa'o da dudas// byung ba da
287b2(rnying rgyud): yin pas// kun ma khyab pa'i ring bzhin pas// babs kyi rim pa'i khang par gyis// rdzas kyi rim pa lta zang snang // gang rnams dam 'don thapa bya'i// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas te// gsang ba dom la grags gyur ros// sangs rgyas
287b3(rnying rgyud): sa la gnas par 'gyur// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sku yid dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i la'u ste lnga pa'o//
287b4(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad stim/ dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i phyir/ sngags kyi snying po rnams su gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // d+h+waM bi shA shud+d+he/ oM dzi na dzik+Sha/ d+he/ Shar ti/ hU~M badz+raka/ rdza
287b5(rnying rgyud): sh+tsad+hi/ Ur tsA/ mA mo ha d+hi/ oM A m-ig/ hUM rAg+h+ra ti/ hAHka/ dz+ra t+ti/ trai lpAHsa ma b+hiH/ na sa mi mr-i ho// 'i ti2\u0f7f// sa nid+hi d+hagA g+ga maM/ donA~M ba zab / rnaM ma
287b6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ba sug ng+ge/ togan+d+he mo// su badz+rad+hadA mA hA krod+d+hi kA d+hI dz+wa li ni hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na t+tA ra ma hAkro d+hi rI ni dz+wal ni hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra mahA kro tI shwa dI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM ki rbata ra mA \u0f7fmr-i tI shrI d+hI la ni r+g+haM phaT/ bsten pa'i dkyil 'khor
287b7(rnying rgyud): ca rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa kun// tshwa dang bral ba'i gzhal yas nas// rang byung dkyil 'khod spyan drang ngo // bdag nyid thugs kyi 'od ra gyis//
288a1(rnying rgyud): na na

288a3(rnying rgyud): mam/ sma ti sbyin pa rnam pa can te/ dun ci 'byud bya // me hU~M ba d+d+ha byu grags mye sa pa / phyir chu da
