288b6(rnying rgyud): bar+d+ha gnas byang na// b+h+ya'i ga nga banas pas// byang chus sems kyi bdug nyid // dge sa dam pa'i rang bzhi / ni kyi gabus pa bur phyogs // tha med pa'i byang chubs rgyas/ stong ti dam pa
288b7(rnying rgyud): sa
289a1(rnying rgyud): byiphyin nas// bdab chen po rnam par zag// me tog zig la la sogs pa// gang la dmigs par zhi gnas pas// yang dgra mngon du mi 'gyur te// rlung gu 'ad la nong bu bzhan// don dmyi rigs mthun ka
289a2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa// rjes su dpogs pa shes pa ste// yang dag lam du zhugs pa yin// thos bsam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// yang dag lam gyi mthar phyin na// mi rtag ye shes skye bar byed// de yis don dam mngon sum mthong //
289a3(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba'i dbang gis te// 'jig rten tha snyad btags pa ni// mngon sum rjes su dpag pa rnams// bsam pa'i dbang dang dngos po'i dbang // lam dang 'bras bur mi dgos so// rig pa sbyang nas bde chen te// yang dag mtha' la
289a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par gnas// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// yang dag nyid la 'jug palta ba// yang dag bde ba thob par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje 'bar ba'i hud las/ gsung gi dkyil
289a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ldan gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ bro gar dang spyod pa rnams phyag rgya yin par
289a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas/ yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa 'di gsungs so// chos kyi 'byung gnas khyad par las// wA dang lha mo'i ngang nyid du// yan lag thams cad byin brlabs na// bskyod bskul thams cad phyag rgya yin//
289a7(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i rol mo rnam 'gros pas// ngag dang lus kyi yod pa rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya yin par grags// rdo rje rigs dang rin chen rigs// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// gnyis
289b1(rnying rgyud): mang bar spong dun// dang ba 'am bshad pas// ngag nyims na sanang du bsngol// grang mdzub ma sa sa ru dmyas// sams smad man la thung// spyil mdog nag na// lug pang mad+han /
289b2(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi mthe bong bkug nas ni// g.yon gyi mtho bong rtse spang pa// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya yin// sor mo nang du bsnol nas kyang // grang mdzu ba la sogs rtse smad nas// srin lag gzhibs te bskyed pa ni// mi 'iskrod pa yi rtsa
289b3(rnying rgyud): rgya mchog/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol nas kyang // glang basbed rtse spang mthe bong bkug/ mdzub mo ngos la sper ba ni// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin// lagA gnyis sor mo chub tu bsnol// mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang /
289b4(rnying rgyud): sprad pad+ma'i tshul du bya// mtheb bkug tshe dpag med pa'i rgya// leg g.yon khu tshur bcangs nas ni// dkur brten g.yas kyi sor mo rnams// thal mo gyur nas gdengs pa ni// gdon mi za ba'i phyag rgya yin// yum rnams rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// thabs
289b5(rnying rgyud): la'akhyud cing zur gyis blta// 'di sgeg rang rtags tshul 'dzin pa// dril bu dang po snga 'dzin par byed// lag gnyis sor mo chub tu bsnol// gung bsgreng tse mo spang nas ni// phug phug por ni byas nas ni// dril zla 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin//
289b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ni bcangs nas kyang // 'gying bas su ru 'dzin pa la// g.yon du nur mig bstab ni// rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// sor mo rgyab chubaskol nas ni// rta lcag gnyis su bzung na ni// de nyid phreng ba ma y-i
289b7(rnying rgyud): yon gyi khwa drung bcangs nas ni// sor ma thung bde bstsol ba la// kha 'bram bzung nas gangs pa mi// mdzub mo bsrung nas 'byed pa ni// pi phreng tshul 'dzin dbyangs ma'o// lag pa gnyis kyi so mo rnams// g.yas nas g.yon du
290a1(rnying rgyud): snang thabs sbyang ba byung ba ni// klung sbya ma phyag med// 'gru pa gnyis / gnas// khwa da gsag pa'i tshul sa// / sa s+yA da kang bzung ba// bdug sa sgom ma phyag tu ston// nga/
290a2(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// snyim pa'i tshul du byas nas ni// snying ga'i thad kar 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni me tog ma yi rgya// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// sor ma bkug nas gung mo bsring // thugs kar 'dzin pa mar me ma'i// phyag
290a3(rnying rgyud): yin par rnam par grags// lag pa g.yas pa thugs karaR+Sha mnan// g.yon pa dku la brten pa ni// dril bu ma yi phyag rgya zhes// dpa' bo chen pos rnam par bshad// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// mthe bong gnyis ri rab ba
290a4(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bya// gshin rje 'joms ma'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sor mo rnams// sor mo rgyab tu bsnol nas ni// g.yas su gdengs nas 'phen pa'i tshul// byas pa mi thub ma yi rgya// lag gnyis rgyab ni rma
290a5(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // mthe chung gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis// so sor 'khyud nas bsdams pa ni// khro gnyer ma yi phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa bskum nas g.yon pa yis// dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya// ral gcig mA yi phyag rgya zhes// dpa'/
290a6(rnying rgyud): pos rab tu bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen pos/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin pa'i phyir/ nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin spros pa nye bar zhing 'di
290a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// bdag dang sems can skyes bu dang // byed pa po la sogs pa yi// dngos po'i bdag nyid stong nyid ltar// byis pa rdul las dngos por 'dod// chos tsam la ni dmigs par byed// de nyid phyogs chas mi 'grub cing // gcig mi
290b1(rnying rgyud): du mA ma yin no// de nyid phyir na de stong min// de stong ma yin yod med min// mi skye ma yin skye ba'ang med// rtag min chad pa ma yin la// mtshan med smon pa med pa zhes// de la sogs pa rnam par bshad// de bas dam pa'i don nyid ni
290b2(rnying rgyud): rten cing 'brel pa gang byung ba// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' spangs te// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa// de phyir dri za'i grong khyer 'dra// rten 'brel ngo bo ma skyes pas// skye dang 'gag par mi 'grub ste// yang dag don du mi blta bas// sgyu ma padi
290b3(rnying rgyud): du rnam par snang // 'jig chags stongs la sogs pa yi// rgyu nyid rten cing 'brel 'byung bas// de bzhin nyid ni med 'gyur te// nam mkha' dang pa'i rang bzhin te// rten cing 'brel 'byung gang mthong ba// de bzhin nyid las bde bar gshog
290b4(rnying rgyud): kun la khyab par gnas pas na// mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam par 'gyur// dngos po rnams ni stong pa ste// stong pa nyid kyis dngos po la// tha dad ma yin dbyer med pas// gzhan du byas pa ci yang med// srid dang zhi ba'i khyad par ni//
290b5(rnying rgyud): cha shas tsam yang yod pa min// gang la goms pa der snang bas// sbyin la sogs pa rnam mi 'gal// gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams/ kun gyi rang bzhin chos nyid las// gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba na// chos nyid mthong bas
290b6(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs// dam pa'i yul du gyur pa na// rnam kun mkhyen pas ma gzigs te// mthong bar bya ba'i rang bzhin dag/ shes rab can gyis rtogs par gyis// 'ga' yang mthong ba med pa ni// de nyid mthong bas chen por bas// stong
290b7(rnying rgyud): nyid ye shes chen pos ni// yang dag mthong nas rnam par grol// shes pas mthong ba'i yul med de// lam lnga dag tu tshogs bsags shing // sgrib pa rnam par dag byas te// pad+ma spyan du gyur pa ni// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byar
291a1(rnying rgyud): nATA// banatsun gyil gsan// dang byung lags can pan// dan du 'dom pa 'dus bsgom nas// snyoms pas nang gyu// mas sa pa sa byung / des myang du ma
291a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// yang dag don gyi rang bzhin las// brjod par bya ba'i dngos po dag/ rdul chatsam yang med pa'i phyir// ci yang gsung du med pa'o// de ltar shes par byas nas ni// gsang bu'i don la 'jug par bya// gzhal yas brtsegs pa'i
291a3(rnying rgyud): dbus su ni// sku gsung thugs skya bdag skyong bas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// lte ba'i steng du yi g+he A// bsgom nas snying ga'i bad+mang bzhag/ 'od zer sngo bsku'i myor ba yis// de mthag tu bder 'gyur ro// hUM yig tu
291a4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa ni// rdo rje mtshon cha mchog 'od 'bar// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// rgya chenar ba zab mdor bsdus pa'o// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bla na med pa srub byed pa'i// thabs kyi mchog tu gsungs pa ste// bstar ba
291a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su grol bar bya// gsang sngags tshul la mi gnas shing // de bzhin nyid don mi rtogs par// tshig tsam la ni gnas byed de// dad med nyes na phung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba
291a6(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du dbyer med pa'i dgyes pa chen po des/ sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor du bzhengs te/ sgyu 'phrul rnam par
291a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gzhan gyi don du ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bzhed nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ bzhugs pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pas mchod de/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
291b1(rnying rgyud): a ma ho sangs rgyas kyi spangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// grwa yi dkyil 'bang rab tu dag/ dkyil la bar rab dga' bshad du gsol// a ma ha tshas kyi don 'byung ba// tshwa mngon dag pa bdag med pa// gras
291b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dri ma med// dkyil 'khor dag pa dri ma med pa gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ shes bya la sogs sgrib gnyis grol// ye shes rnams kyis don mdzad pa// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// de bzhinag
291b3(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'gro ba dag phyir ri mo yi// dkyil 'khor nyams ni dga' bar bshad// ri bo dben pa ri sul yod// chu klung rnams dang 'bab pa dang // me tog nags tshal rnams kyis
291b4(rnying rgyud): yon tan thams cad ldan pa yi// nyams dga'i gnas su bsam gtan bya// mang du thos shing skyob bzod// brtan zhing dul la blo gros che// bya ba mkhas pa gAyo sku mdo// 'khor dang 'jig dang rnam bral te// sems can kun la mi 'jig
291b5(rnying rgyud): ste// de ni thob dpon yin pa ste// dkyil 'khor pa yI lasu bya'o// yid gsal spro zhing bya ba mkhas// dad dang brtul zhugs brtson 'grus can// yid tshes ser sna rnam stsol te// the tshom mi byed dam tshig ldan// slob ma
291b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dam tshig yin// dang por sa gzhi brtags nas ni// de yi sta gon bkra shis la// tha mar dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// rig pa'i me tog por byas te// sdig pa bshegs pa la sogs bya// go
291b7(rnying rgyud): rgyun mdzes par byas pa yi// blo gros can gyi mkhas pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// khru bzhi pa'am khru brgyad pa// bcu drug nyi shu rtsa lngar byas// sor bzhi pa nas bzung nas ni// ji srid dpag tshad rgyang grags par
292a1(rnying rgyud): na/ sems can pas ma pa'i dbang gis ni// mad rnams bsta par ma gsungs so// gdang ma pas // da pa btu mangs pa mi// rtswa lnga phud 'a mas pagyu// dmas dam
292a2(rnying rgyud): thig gdab po// rang gi rigs kyi sa bon rnams// thig srung ye shes lnga ldan pas// nyi shu rtsa lcang dbye ba nyid// bdag nyid bdag po'i gzugs bsgoms la// dza las nyi ma za ba'i mig/ de yis mtshon char drangs nas ni/
292a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams la thim par bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi dri yis ni// bskus nas de nas btung bar bya// rdo rje las rab ljang gu ni// karma badz+ra ha zhes dpung // thig srung ye shes lnga ldan pa// lte bar khu tshung g.yon gyis mnan// las k+Sha
292a4(rnying rgyud): par bzung nas ni// nam mkhar btab pa rang bzhin dang // ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// gzugs brnyan gsal phyir sa thig gdab// oM badz+ra sa ma yo su tra ma ti kra ma hUM// shar nas nub bltas lho nas byung // gyi yi phyogs
292a5(rnying rgyud): tu gnas// me dang bden bral mtshams gnas shing // k+Sha bzhi'i thig ni rab tu gdab// dbus su phur pa btab byas te// mu khyud zlum por bskor nas kyang // gra bzhi la sogs sgo bzhir ldan// tA ra Na bzhis grub pa'o// phul tshon rnams na
292a6(rnying rgyud): bya// de la rigs rnams sa bon las// lha yi rang bzhin ldan byas te// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs pa rnams// tshon gyi phye ma lnga las thim// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid can// dkyil 'khor nang du 'dug nas kyang // dkar po la
292a7(rnying rgyud): sogs rnam pa lnga// 'dul ba'i cho ga ji bzhin du// dbang ldan phyogs nas bri bar bya// g.yas ga yan mnyam po rgyun mi gcad// tshon gyi phye ma swa lnga yi// dkyil 'khor mag gur bri bar bya// shad du in+d+ra nI la'i steng // lho dang
292b1(rnying rgyud): rdza tu ser dang dmad// byang du ljang gu ldan pa ste// dbus skra dkar po bri bar bya// 'khor lango rje rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri la sogs pa'i// dkyil la bor rnams ni rab tu dmigs// sug sung thugs kyi sa don gyis// tshe dpag med
292b2(rnying rgyud): mi bskyod dang // rigs kyi bye brag shes byas pa// rang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod// dang brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du yin par 'a
292b3(rnying rgyud): bshags skabs su song nas ni// pad+ma'i gdan la me tog gtor// yon phul ye shes spyan phye nas// dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid bstan// rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes chu yis gang ba yi// phyi nang gsang ba bum pa yis
292b4(rnying rgyud): ma bdag podri gzugs su bya// dbu chen rdo rje dril bu sogs// bdag po'i dbang ni bskur nas kyang // rigs rnams kun dang ldan par bya// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri las rnams dbang bskur ro// sha khrag dri chen dbang bsrung ngo // byang
292b5(rnying rgyud): grub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// rnal 'byor pas n+ni spyad par bya// glang po'i shA dang rta yi sha/ sha chen ba lang khyi sha rnams// khams kyi zas su bza' bar bya// ma dang bu mo sring mo las// rtag tu 'dod pa spyad par bya// gtsang ste rdzog+sa pa
292b6(rnying rgyud): dang bral na// de nyid rlig pa'i brtul zhugs yin// 'di la mi rgya ci yang med// bza' bar mi bya ci yang med// de nyid sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bsrung // dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// yongs
292b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor 'byung zhing ngan song myong // ci yang gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// bdud rtsi rnams dang gang ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i gsang ba'i lam phyung nas// slob ma rnam du rnam pa
293a1(rnying rgyud): nanA// de 'di rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dbang bsrung ba yi thabs mchog // gang gis zla med sgrub pa na// d+hA tu 'bral bar mi gyur// shes rab thabs su gang myong bas// gas pa rnams dra
293a2(rnying rgyud): slob ma dbang bsrung chen pa sbyin// dngos grub mchog tu byung pas ni// rang gi bka' las dang mo 'da'// 'di ni sang sa rgyas thams cad kyis// bde bachen po grub pa'i thabs// mnyam meng thong ba da gyur te//
293a3(rnying rgyud): yaM// lam gyi mchog tu gyur pas nA// rang srung ye shes chen po ni// dge nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// dus min 'chi ba mi 'byung zhing // phyi nang nad rnams sel bar byed// 'khrug dang sdug bsngal brjod pa rnams// 'gas pa
293a4(rnying rgyud): med// yams nad 'tsho ba mi 'byung zhing // pha rol dmag tshogs 'jigs par byed// da ltar bde dang phyi ma bde// thams cad kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// rdeg tra spang bar mi bya ste// 'das nad myal bar lung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil
293a5(rnying rgyud): rnams bsgom nas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod de// 'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// sbyin bsreg las rnams rdzogs par bya// gru bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor lo// hom bung khwa gang tshad du bya// zabs su gazlas kha khyer rnams
293a6(rnying rgyud): sor ni bzhi pa'i tshad du bya// rnam po gru bzhi zlag ma gdengs// bu gsum dkang ser dmar dang nag/ me 'od dris la rdo rje kha// rin chen pad+ma thod pa sna brgyan// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // paSh+Ta la thi la sogs pa// khung gi mthil du zhag pa
293a7(rnying rgyud): dgod// shar dri l+li s+t+rai kun s+ho// rlub tub du grugasum byung // shing gi rtse ste mdog dekang la// mchod yon na gyi rgyam mnyas byas 'o// mau la~M gnas gcang pa cu// rgyas par dbang gi sum// drag pa dang bdag laH// 'a
293b1(rnying rgyud): gyi tsan+dan dmar// khrag spos sbyar te bsgru bar bya// bsreg shing khu do lam shing sor // bcu gnyis pa yi tshad du bya// dkar seng dmar dang dag po'o// 'o matsan+dan mngar gyur pa// dug shing tshong ma can la sogs// so so'i mtshan dang
293b2(rnying rgyud): pa yin// dgrang gzang thug gzar so so'i dbyibs// yu ba khru gang tshad du bya// dgang gzar song bzhi sor gnyis zabs// khar na song gcig dkyil rin chen/ ngos la'ang yi ge 'bar ba bsgom// thugs gzar song gnyis sor gcig zabs
293b3(rnying rgyud): kha khyer song gcig dkyil rdo rje// ngos la yi ge rnam bsgom nas// gtun khung rang rang dbyibs dang mdog/ ri rab ri bdun mtsho dang bcas/ dngul phye 'bras chen dkar po dang // gser zangs lcags dang 'bras chen drug/ dung dang
293b4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa yis// so so'i gtor ma mdzes par bya// gser dngul zangs lcags so so'i shing // mgo bo rgya mdung rtse mo rnams// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam zur// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsgom bu kye// mtshan mar bcas pa'i gzugs
293b5(rnying rgyud): brtan la// bkug nas phyar ba btab nas ni// lha yang dung ste brlag par 'gyur// rgyan chas lnga dang ldan pa yis// yo byad bsangs gtor byas nas ni// ku shA bting nas yam shing la// me slar yi ge gsum pos sbyangs// dkyil 'kho sa
293b6(rnying rgyud): du ra pa'i me// sa bon mar gyis byug par bya// zhal gsum gyas ni drug pa ste// dang po rang rtags shes rab 'khyud// g.yas gnyis bzang 'phreng skyabs sbyin la// g.yon sa kun+d+he ri/ 'dzin// de nas ye shes dam pa'i me// bos nas
293b7(rnying rgyud): mchod yul gnyis su med// me lha rnams kyi gzhal yas khang // rnam pa'i 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// las bzhi 'i mchod pa rab tu dbul// mar khu til dang dar ba dang // 'bras dang zho dang ku sha rnams// rim pa daphul te las rnams bstan/
294a1(rnying rgyud): dang brjod pa tshul bzhinas// dbang brdzu ba sna ma dza // phyug sarnams cang da// da ma yin snang bas/ na na nas na bsang ba \u0f7f// bams dpa
294a2(rnying rgyud): mang bar mi n+ya ste/ rdo dri la bu mug rgya yang // nam kyang sang bar mi bya'o// dka'i thub kyis ni mig tu ste// blam banyas par bya min// gang gis ma brnyas byud na// sangs rgyas thams ca ga rtam pa yin// den
294a3(rnying rgyud): dang // gdon baglegs myakha' blo'i 'tsho ba dang // tshogs bdag drag pos bsad nas ni// dmyal ba rnams su ris par bsreg/ de bas rin chen bla ma la// rin chen rnams dang lus kyi bar// rjes su rig pa de la dbul// bdag po d+ha
294a4(rnying rgyud): gragags// dkyil 'khor bzhini brgyad ts+tsha ste// mgrin pa snying ga lnga bgasang// cheng ngo me namus// rim pa bzhin du yang dag ldan// gis mi ni sa byas pas// bang rkye gnas su cu dge 'byung// dana' ba'i ban bye ga /
294a5(rnying rgyud): rim ba zhin du 'i mchod nas kyang // pad+ma la ni pa d+da can// thal ba mthar ni rnam par brtag/ phung po brang shing bsregs nas ni// zla med dam pa'i me srang la// dam pa'i 'khor lo rnams bsku mnas// dkyil por thams cad mchod par du// ra
294a6(rnying rgyud): sa mi tshugs shing // nang rdzog las zang bar byed// mug sung thugs kyi dngos ba kyang // skang du rdzob par gdon mig// ma rnying bzlas pa byed 'did pas// dkyil 'khor ba gyi yi rang bzhin la// a N+Da 'bral bar mthor rtsig
294a7(rnying rgyud): thayis// gang samaldan bya sangs ru su ma cig ces// song ba'i btang btig 'drang// dbyibs dpa badron tshe ldadanga'i// gsang ba'i da byer/
294b1(rnying rgyud): 'byod nas// ya shes bad rtse chu thun gyis// rgyal ba thams cad rtag tu mchod// chalab ma lus thams cad kyis// gru gsung thugs su byin rdzobs shing // sras kyi dam pur da 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das dkris pa nan ngodu
294b2(rnying rgyud): dngos po 'joms shing zad par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas smyung ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// bkra shis pa dang gdul bya dang // zhing du gyur pa'i bdag nyid la// snying gi pad+ma las byung ba// 'od zer 'brang ba'i
294b3(rnying rgyud): sa// rnam par shes pa rngan sa te// de nyid gi sa kyis ma myongs sa/ nyina'i snying du yang dag byug/ d+ha ni ga sul thas sa/ sa rgyas // thugs ga naga' na brisas
294b4(rnying rgyud): gyung ba rnams kyi rnam snang mdzad// dkyil 'khor kun dang bcas pa la// rlung dang nyi zla'i steng du bzhag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang gi// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod byas te// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT gyis 'phangs// de bzhin gshegs pa
294b5(rnying rgyud): sras su byas// de ni de mthag tu yang // las kyi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// bde ba can gyi zhing khams su// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// sras dang sun dgongs dngos grub ster// nyes pa ma lus rnam dag nas// de nyid spangs rgyas
294b6(rnying rgyud): kun+da dang mnyam// go 'phang bla na med pa thob// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dgyes pa chen po nyid dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi don dang / spros pa rnams tha mi dad cing dbyer med pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi ra
294b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni dben pa'o// zhi ba'o// bde ba dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can no// zhing khams rnam par dag pa'o// snang ba ni dam pa'i
295a1(rnying rgyud): yul du ma gyur pas// kun tu brtag pa'o// dam pa'i yul ni de'i rang bzhin pas/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'o// zhes gsungs nas/ de dag gi thabs 'di lta bu gsungs sngo// rig mar bcas pa'i sems
295a2(rnying rgyud): kyis ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes rnams// rgyun zhugs yi ge phaT kyis 'phangs// slar yang phaT kyis ye shes nyid// klad pa'i steng du 'phangs par gyur// tsa na ka dang nas kyi 'bru// phra mo'i ting 'dzin rdzogs par bsgom// de ni bde
295a3(rnying rgyud): ba chen po yi// thabs su rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bla na med pa thob par byed// yang dag don la gang blta ba// yang dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs// de nyid mtshan mar dmigs gyur// / glang ngo /
295a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin rjes tshol 'dra// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan sku gsung thugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / thig le yang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
295a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad kyi de kho na nyid kyi phrin las rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgo
295a6(rnying rgyud): nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// mchod pa bla na med pas mchod// thams cad bdag nyid bde chen sku// yang dag brjod med longs spyod mdzad// mi rtog ye shes 'khor lo bskor// sku gsung che la phyag 'tshal lo// snying gi pa
295a7(rnying rgyud): les byung ba// nam mkha'i khams kyi bud med rnams// gdan dang rkyen rnams sna tshogs dang // sbos por la sogs mtha' yas pa// spyan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la// lha tshogs mdzes pa phul te thim// 'jig rten khams rnams ji
295b1(rnying rgyud): skyed pa// rin chen rnams kyis bkang nas ni// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// sha khrag dri chen rdo rje chu// byang chub sems su bcas pa rnams// d+hA sha khyi sha ba glang sha/ glang chen sha dang sha chen dang // sa tshogs sha rnams thams ca
295b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams rgyun zhugs nas// gsang ba'i pad+mar byung nas ni// shes rab so so'i ba sku nas// lha mo rnams kyi 'od tshogs rnams//
295b3(rnying rgyud): byal ba mnyes mchod de// rgyun zhugs ka niSh+ka ra ste// rdo rje las byung ma lI ka/ u ni ka ni sa bon 'phangs// gsang ba'i pad+hA ra me tog rlan// ka ra bi kha zhes gsungs te// lha mo rnams ni thams cad kyis// mchod pas dngos grupa rab
295b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin pas// byang chub sems kyi nyi zla ste// srin mtheb gnyis kyis blangs nas ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// rdo rje pad+mar rab ldan te// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
295b5(rnying rgyud): lus la// dgyes pa'i ngos ni tshims byed pa// reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// rtag tu rgyal ba mnyes mchod nas// tshogs bsags sgrib pa rnams sbyangs nas// rang byung bla na med pa 'chang // rlung me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bdud
295b6(rnying rgyud): rtse.oM gyis mtshon pa de// sku gsung thugs dang yang dag ldan// dri ma med cing mdangs 'chang ba// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyan rnams// de yis ye shes sems dpa' mchod// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid can// rdo rje gsum du rnam
295b7(rnying rgyud): bsgoms te// kha dang lce yi dam tshig kyang // rdo rje gsum du ldan byas te// bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin la// rdo rje gsum du byin brlabs te// zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// rang bzhin gyi ni sbyor sgrol dang // thal chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang /
296a1(rnying rgyud): dbang po yul dus sgor sgrol dang mngon rgyu byung ba'i spyong grol rnams// rna la byong bas ni snad par bya// stong ba nyid na grol ba hA// sgrol ba nyid na stor bya yin// bza' dang btud dang gos kun dang // tha ra rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams
296a2(rnying rgyud): dang // gdags dang bdun mdzes pa rnams// grong dag thabs bskyod rnams dang // bu tshig sbyin par byas pa yi ste// rgyal ba thams cad mchong bar byed// me tog la sogs mdzes pa yis// mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur/
296a3(rnying rgyud): rin chen bdun lnga sogs pa yis// yon tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lha lI rang bzhin gyis// dri ma lnga po drug gyung nas// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// ta sha dag gi dmatshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por 'a
296a4(rnying rgyud): sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub mchog ni 'grub par byed// bA lang sha yi dam tshig gis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// phung po'i sha ye dmatshig gis// rdo rje'i rigs mchog dam par 'byur// shu chen dag gi dam tshig gis// dza
296a5(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// bud med thams cad mchod pa yis// lha gsung thug kyi dngos grub snyed// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur// reg pa stor ba'i mchod pa yis// thams cad bdag rten
296a6(rnying rgyud): chen por 'gyur// sgra gsung thugs kyi bdud rjes ni// den song spang zhing rnam tog med// a li kA li'i marjod pa yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par byed// bza' btung gos rgyun mchod pa yis// mchog gi dngos gra thob par
296a7(rnying rgyud): gdugs la migs pa'i mchong pa // yid bzhin rin chen ldan padun// thig bapyod pa 'i phyag tu mas/ rnam ga dzum sa gas sa/ chags shing sa thos pa zad// sa mamyed pa yis/
296b1(rnying rgyud): cwa nga ltung cang// pa mnas rdzus// mi 'dum sags dngang tham dang / rnag ga dang chu ba bung / dam sa gsugs su sa rdzo// na ma dzu pa ba tus du nga /
296b2(rnying rgyud): de// rnam par snang mdzad mchog gi pa la// ma mang myi shes dkyil 'khor thur// kA su dang gti mug nam dag pa// darje snga slong phrag 'tshal lo// tshe dpag med pa ba brgya// ya~M shes sa song rtag pa 'ang // 'du shes dong
296b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag/ rdo rje gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo ng+ka mi bskyod mchog gi dbang // skyong nyid ye shes chen po ste// de yi rnam shos zhe sdang 'joms// rdo rje thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen 'ab+h+ring gnas dpal// mainyam ti / sha
296b4(rnying rgyud): thob myed pa// mying deng brtsal dag byed pa// yon tan mye khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gdon mi zab mchog mi dpal// khya ba skyeb pa'i ye shes 'chang // theg rig 'du byed rnam par dag/ phrin las kyi khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dr-in med bzhin nan
296b5(rnying rgyud): padakris parjed pas/ gsang ba sun gyis byab pa'i ti nga 'dzim la snyoms pa zhugs te/ man ngag dam pa 'di gsungs so// nam lnga pa'i dbyis kyi dang sangag // sangs rgyas dkyil 'dor rnam sgo mas das// pha bo'i phyir ba ku
296b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid duste// gsung ba'i rdo rje las myang ba'i// zlu ma pa'i rtse yod rnam par bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa'o// de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang bsung dang thug
296b7(rnying rgyud): 'bang 'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mi mchod pa dang bstong pa'i se'u snye bu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ rnam par rdzing ma dang byis pa cad pa sa
297a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa mangs mardzun la rnams par b+hUs/ nadumasang pa'i don nags gasmras stong nyas gsungs so// brgyad dang ngom par / da sa pa zung
297a2(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i dbyings kyi dbus dgan// sangs rgyas dkyil 'bor rab sgom te// sku ma kyil 'bod ldan thas s+ho// bdag gi nyid sngon po/ kyid kyis brgyud par bye ba dang // 'khod la ba 'i dang lngami me //
297a3(rnying rgyud): bskyab pa// thabs dang shes dbabang banas// byin d+ha na dang blangs// rnam pa brgya ba gnyis su 'gyur// skye/ nga rtsom pasam myong rje// rim pa rlung gi khon// sngags lnga dmyigs pa zhes kyig// gas ti /
297a4(rnying rgyud): gang zhon nyid ni// nam mapa' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa rdzogs bya te// zla brjid kyil khor bzhom pa bya// de yi dbus su rgyal brnams// rim pa gnyis kyis rdzogs bya te// phyag rngubazhing rjon pa la
297a5(rnying rgyud): k+She gas sems dpa' gnas// rang gi bdas pa rjod par tsam// thabs dang shes rab rnam 'breb to// yan lag bzhi ni shin mangs// dpel la byor ba ni ba skyed byas nas// dkyil dbyang bzhi dang 'a phying te// bdag gis
297a6(rnying rgyud): s+yan-i// rlung gi de nyid yang dag 'dug/ drang po rang nyid zin brgyabs nas// dkyil 'bor kun dang ldan pa la// sbyor ba cag las byung ba'i// 'khong po ba'i rnams rab tu dmigs// chos dang longs spyod stsal padzin/ ba pacan pa
297a7(rnying rgyud): ma 'drub drungs chu ga/ sring mig rnams kyis na / sargyas sa / mtsha'i dpabadum gyis ga // bye ba dri ma kyi cing 'gag pa cang na das da cid bdang phra/
297b1(rnying rgyud): bum pa'i dbang du gsungs// lam gyi 'bras bu'i tshul 'chang ba// rigs bzhi'i sa blon phyogs dag tu// ngag gi lam gyi lte bar rdziH// de nyid lam du gsungs pas na// langs spyod mdzad pas longs spyod sa// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang gi /
297b2(rnying rgyud): bden pa bzhi yi rang bzhin dang // thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig pas// lte ba'i steng nA yi geb+h+rU~M// thabs dang shes rab sdud par byed// de nyid rnam pa kun 'byung ba// chos kyi sku yi bdag nyid pas// gsum pa shes rab ye shes so// thun
297b3(rnying rgyud): mchon dang ldan pa yi// rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur bas na// hoHsa mtshams dag gi rigs kyi rnams// 'khon gnyis kyis mtshan mA la sA// lte bar l-I yigA rnam par bsam// sdug bsngal bdag nyid ldan pas na// sprul pa'i don rnams rab
297b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// bzhi pa'i don nyid 'byin pa'i dbang // bden pa bzhi yi bye phrag gis// chos dang ye shes rnam ldan pa'o// yan lag bzhi pa'i rang bzhin dang // snying po phyag rgya sngag rigs pa// cho 'phrul ba zhi dang rnam ldan pas// dgongs don
297b5(rnying rgyud): par ba srub bo// rim pa gnyis dang rab ldan zhing // brjod pa thams cad 'dus pa yin// lus kyi rga ni ji skyed pa// sum bcu drug tu ldan pa la// rnam pa drug tu bstan pa yin// de nyid gsum gyi bdag po ste// thabs dang shes rabab
297b6(rnying rgyud): de kho na nyid gsum du 'dus// bdud rtsi lnga yi bdag nyid pas// bdud rtsi lnga ni 'byung bar byed// de nyid bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ro// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin dang // la dog lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// gyen dang thung du rgyu ba'i byung // srog
297b7(rnying rgyud): ra rtsol ba zhes bya ste// rnam pa bcu pa gnyis su 'gyur// de yis 'byung ba rig pa yis// gsang ba'i gnas ni thams cad de// sngags kyi de nyid yang dag 'jug/ zung 'jug nyid 'dzin gnas 'gyur na// gang du bsrab par mi bya'o// sngags
298a1(rnying rgyud): nga nyid 'di ga sungs pasdu// nal 'byor rnams kyis shes par gyis// gang las sa rgyas gunas snang ba// gsang ba rnyas pa te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin// rdal 'thor rnams kyis da shas/
298a2(rnying rgyud): yang dag don la zhugs pa yin// stong nyid ngo bor gnas pa yin// tshad med bzhi yang zil gyis gnon// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni// ye shes bde ba thob par byed// phyag rgya bzhi dang yan lag bzhi// de ltar chos kyi sku dang ni// thun
298a3(rnying rgyud): mong mchog tu gsungs pa yin// de nyid sa bon bdag nyid pas// phra mo'i thig le gsal bar byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub chen po bla med pas// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// sngags la dmigs bzod
298a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// sngags la dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyis// stong nyid ye shes thob par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ yang sngags bsgom pa 'di gsungs so// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus kyis ni// byang chub sems kyi
298a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dag/ sbyor ba'i lhums su 'phangs pas te// pad+ma zla ba khe sbyar ba// de yi tshangs pa'i bu gnas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni thig le nyid du bzhag/ yang na sngags la dmigs pa yis// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhi
298a6(rnying rgyud): dag/ gsang ba'i gnas su zhu bar byed// 'od zer rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi// byang chub sems ni zhu mdzod de// mi rtog ye shes skye bar byed// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// sngags la dmigs pa'i mtshan ma dag/ 'drar zhing rmugs par
298a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba dang // bar snang dag la gnas par byed// de nyid zhu par gyur pa dang // khams kyi zas dang rnam bral te// mi rgod dbugs ni zhi ba dang // dal bar 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas smig sgyu lta bu dang // du ba srin bu me khyer 'dra// mar
298b1(rnying rgyud): me'i tshul dang nam mkha' bzhin// brtan nas chos sku bde ba che// ye shes su mchog de nyid 'bar// zla ba drug dang bcu gaN+DIs dang // bco brgyad dag gis 'grub par 'gyur// gang tshe des kyang ma grub na// drag shul tshul gyis bsrub par bya// tho
298b2(rnying rgyud): dman rnams kyis bsrubs gyur kyang // tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// bskyed pa'i zhing du rnam par grags// gang gis thos dang klog pa dang // 'chad par byed dang sems pa dang // tshul bzhin sems pa
298b3(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba rnams// ngan song las ni rnam par grol// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang gis 'di la mnyam bzhag na// rnam par shes pa ye shes 'gyur// zab mo'i don la snang 'gyur te// u gsum bde ba mngon byang chub// de bzhi
298b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la// 'di la gshegs pa'i gnas med de// 'das dang da ltar ma byon rnams// chos kyi skul dam mi 'da'// chos kyi sku yi yon tan chen po ni// thams cad du ni snang bar byed// ces brjod pas/ de bzhin
298b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gnas par gyur te/ longs spyod par mdzad cing byang chub par mdzad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gzigs par mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskyod pa med cing mi brjod pa dang /
298b6(rnying rgyud): mi tog pas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa'i gnas med do// dus thams cad du sdang ba'i lam las 'das pa dang / kun lnga khyab pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid du mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
298b7(rnying rgyud): la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
299a1(rnying rgyud): nyid dgyes pa chen pos/ dbyung rnam par bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad do// de ci'i phyir na/ lha dang klu dang lha ma yin dang / na
299a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' rdzing dang / myi'am Ni dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dwags dang / dri za dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / gem byed dang / brjed byed dang / wI byung dang / mkha' 'gro la sogs pa thams cad gti mug 'di dag pas/
299a3(rnying rgyud): 'bras kyi don la ma togs shing / mtshan ma med pa dang rnam par bral te/ mtshan ma la mngon par chags pas/ ngan song gsum du yang bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal zhing mi bde ba nyams su myong nas/ las dang las kyis rim par srin
299a4(rnying rgyud): pa rnams su skyes te/ chu mi mthun pa'i dbang gis shin tu gzings shing sdang ba dang mi sdug pa dang dri nga ba dang / dregs pa can la sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur das/ sems can thams cad la 'tsho bar bgyid/ mdangs 'phrog par bgyid/ ga
299a5(rnying rgyud): par bgyid/ sdug bsngal bar bgyid/ bred skad 'don par bgyid/ yid mi bde bar bgyid/ 'khrug pa dang mya ngan du bgyid/ srog dang bral bar bgyid/ 'doms par bgyid/ de'i slad du/ dregs byed rnams zhi bas phyin par ma
299a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor du rnam par bsgyur ni/ sems can thams cang la pan 'dogs par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni/ zhes khams 'bar ba'i klod na/
299a7(rnying rgyud): dngasu dang rgyas 'das med/ hU~M ba'i spang banamate/ gnyis su me dpa mthugapaso// gzhang mi dpal then tharnam pa / gshi rje gzhing 'dag ma dang/
299b1(rnying rgyud): dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / myi g.yo ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / khams gsum rngam par rgyal ba dang / stobs po che rnams/ dzA rje swa 'byin ma dang / rdo rje skems ma dang / dorje dur zad bdag mo dang / rdo rje gtum mo dang /
299b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje yul byed ma dang / rdo rje ser mo dang / rdo rje gcan khung ma dang / rdo rje mda' snyems ma dang / rdo rje gsod ma dang / rdo rje bskyod ma rnams dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// gzhan yang skul ba'i phra men ma phag gi mgo can dang / stag sa
299b3(rnying rgyud): can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can dang / seng ge'i mgo can dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / gzig gi mgo can dang / spyang ki'i mgo can dang / zed kyi mgo can dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / sdig bu'i mgo can dang /
299b4(rnying rgyud): bya rgod kyi mgo can dang / bug pa'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can dang / khwa yi mgo can dang / zer mo'i mgo can dang / byi ba'i mgo can rnams dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
299b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ khro bo gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de'azhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po nyid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon
299b6(rnying rgyud): par nyudu mdzad nas/ srid pa gsum gyi dregs pa can 'dul ba'i phyir/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa la/ 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid po rdo rje sgrub mdzod cig/ srid pa'i rdo
299b7(rnying rgyud): phung ro'i lha// ye shes khro bo bsgrub par 'dod// nga nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la sa// 'bar ba'i khro ba ma bzad pa// mu yi dbyig tu bdag spyod cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas byin las
300a1(rnying rgyud): ca/ rdzogs brjod nas// dbang dang b+hin+da rlabs 'dir sgrol cig/ ces brjod pas/ skar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa la/ zhing dang smyod yul gyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod de// phyag btsal nas 'ji
300a2(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// rdo rje 'jigs byed gzhon nu'i sku// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// gdug pa chen po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa s+ho// zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon pa med// rtsa zhal dbus nim
300a3(rnying rgyud): nag zhal// rdo rje dgI g+ha rdo rje g.yas// me pung zur ba zhags pa g.yon// glang chen ko rlon la bkor// gdug pa sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan// gcan gzan rtag gi sham thabs can// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom
300a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu nyid zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// dam pa'i don du bsgom pa ni// srid gsum rang bzhin med pa ste// dngos po rnams su rnam par bsgrags// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa
300a5(rnying rgyud): swA hA shu n+ye tA dz+nyAn badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&hUM// phyi dang nang 'dir gnas pa rnams// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pas// kun rdob don du sems bskyed phyir// snying rje yul ni snyoms par byed// rgyu yi sa bon nges pa las// 'di las stsal ba'i
300a6(rnying rgyud): khro byin// rdo rje rigs la sogs pa ste/ khros pas zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgal phrag dog gcod byed pa'o// khro bo rnams ni thams cad kyi// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// hU~Mr+b+hu mr-i hU~M tra~Mn+d+ra hrISh+T+r-iHtrAM// des ni de ma thag tu nga /
300a7(rnying rgyud): mtshon chen rab tu bar ba rnams// phyogs mtshams kun tu rnam par gtams// nam mkha'i khams kyi rdorje sku// baspu bug thams cad nas// rdo rje 'byung ba byung nas ni// phyogs mtshams kun hU~M ngogs der byed // mu stod mo ri 'bar ba dang /
300b1(rnying rgyud): dasmos rnam par g.yos pa dang // chu yis g.yas pa'i nang Te// chos kyi 'byung gnas dri med pa'o// mtshan chas de ma thag tu yang // wA mu gnod sbyin dri za dang // mi drugs 'byung po chags byed rnams// dang shing rab tu brgyal ba dang // rnams
300b2(rnying rgyud): per tshi ga na thos 'gyur te// mod b+hag sdug cing 'gas par byed// phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ne// brgyal zhing rab kyi myos gyur nas// 'byung zhing rub tu sdig par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dekris pa chen pos// ded ga thags cad ba
300b3(rnying rgyud): bsla ba'i phyir// srag sung thugs kyi bdag por zas te/ tshogs mtshams bsring bar byas nas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dbang mnos te/ mna' blong das/ mugasung thugs ni dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / bslang ba dang / zhi ba dang / @
300b4(rnying rgyud): mabyas su gyur pa dang / bka' bsgo banyan par dam brgyas shing mnas bor pa'o// da nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje'i rigs byed chen pos/ btsun mo'i rtag pa/ de ma chog zan po'i dkyil 'khong du rkye gyis brlabs te/ lce bzhi pa la spro bzhi
300b5(rnying rgyud): po stobs brgyad mu khrud banas// bar zhams skyo khung ldan pa la// d+hU babs rnams kyis mdzes par brgyan// har har byed nyiH// dril bu der dbyangs 'phan la sogs// thod srul la sogs brgyan pa la// padz+ra ta mar bcas pa dang /
300b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyang rnams kyang gdun du byas// dkyil 'khor bamam cad paskyed pagyid pa// de yi dbus skabs ma nga / shA na na ldan bzhonas pa// sa rlobs chan gzhad pa bya// gang du rnam par byapab ste// b+h+yo dang thub thug shin
300b7(rnying rgyud): dang / tshon nyid dman pa bar cu// bcu rgya 'thal pa rgya da mtha la phyag pa s+ho// mig la bani ba kyi latsug // nga mtshams gzhan kyis mi sa// khams gas pa rnam par rgyas na// dbang ldan mams
301a1(rnying rgyud): yang dag gnas// rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab pa// sprul ba'i tha men ma rnams ni// g.yas dang gsan gyi phyogs naganas// rnga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang gsung dang / gus durngu 'a bar ba'i drung las/
301a2(rnying rgyud): gzhi yi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u zhe bcuganyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal khrag 'thung rngam pa chen po gze brji dang ldan pa des/ sku gsung thugs ni rje'i ting nge 'dzin le snyoms par rdzogs te/
301a3(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbusas ni// sangs rgyas gnas khang rdzogs byas nas// lte ba'i dbus su nyi ma la// khro bozhi sbeng gnas las skyes// 'jigs byed rdo rje gzhon nu da// zhal gsam
301a4(rnying rgyud): lcag ni drug pa ste// zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// rtswa zhal dbus ni mthing nag zhal// rdo rje dgra sgra rdo rje g.yas// me dpung zhags pa g.yon na bsdams// sku stod glang chen ko rlon dang // sru smad stag gi sham thabs can// dang po'i phyag gnyis shes rab 'khyud//
301a5(rnying rgyud): dbu la zong sam phreng ba dang // zod rlon rnams kyi do shA la byas// mi yi rus brgyan dang bcas// b+hag dang zhabs dang stan la sogs// lto 'gye dag gis rnam par brgyan// dom dred pa gas pas dkris pa dang // mi sdug 'jigs du rung ba dang /
301a6(rnying rgyud): smin ma slar mig kyang song// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags kyang 'dril// bod khrag 'thang zhing hA ha bzhad// zhing la 'bru tshugs bltas nas ni// zhal nas khrag 'bab hi nyi bzhad// zhag gi thig le tshomabur bcas// thal ba rak+tas
301a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // 'jigs pa'i dpung yang 'jigs par byed// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// snying gar ye shes dam tshig gnas// de nas 'dod chags chen po yis// gsang ba'i pad+ma rgyas mdzad nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dang /
301b1(rnying rgyud): gabang ba'i dbus su zin par bya// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag laste// chu bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cang ni// thugs kunas ni ltar gyud te// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor nyid du zhugs// oM badz+rag mA ra muhA kro ta hU phaT/ skye 'jogaHhUM kA TA
301b2(rnying rgyud): dzag// 'du po paT+Ti/ la T+Ta/ ta pa hrI Sh+T+rIH/ b+hAs / u ta ma/
301b3(rnying rgyud): de ny-i da ha~M thA phaT/ AM badz+dza r+tho ta AH A tsu mr-iT+Ta/ b+her+d+hab+hAn+ma hUM phaT/ A~M byAd+ha kro ta a ba ra dzi ti d+h+waM/ tiShI tid+d+ha hUM phaT/ AM badz+ra kro ta two lau N+ya bI dza yA tAM/ d+hir+tha d+hid+ha hU~M phaT/ AM badz+ra kr-i ta maM hU~M ba laM n+tu/ s+pho Ta ya s+san
301b4(rnying rgyud): hU~M phaT/ sar+b+ba me many+dzu sarba ya~M gi nI hU~M ta oM phaT a swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed gzhon nu'i tshul// zhabye gsun phrag ni drug pa ste// dbus kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi// gdon la brgyang bsum tshul gyis bya zhugs// snying
301b5(rnying rgyud): hU~M mdzad ka ra ni// zhal g.yas ser zhing g.yon yid dmar// dbus zhal sru ni dmar po'o// dang po gnyis ni rig mang la khyud// 'khor lo ral gri g.yas pa na// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pa ni// 'og tu stobs chen bzhag pa hA/
301b6(rnying rgyud): gr-I yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus gnag khru// dang po rig mar 'khyud pa dang // g.yas pa tri shUl ral gri 'dzin// g.yon pa rin chen pad+ma'o// rnam par rgyal ba dkar ba ste// g.yas pa na ga cing dmar ba'i mdog/ rang
301b7(rnying rgyud): rig ma dang pos 'khyud// dbyug pa dkar po ral gri g.yas// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pa yin// shar gyi rtsibs su gzhag par bya// lho phyogs gshin rje 'joms pa ni// zhal g.yas gnag cing g.yon pa dpar// rtsa zhal
302a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu na / na/ su// sa na tu gsu na rgyu s+ho// su sa/
302a2(rnying rgyud): sa// pa sa sbyis // ngam nan / kyi makyil dgapa gas/ gsu na / gas pa
302a3(rnying rgyud): pad+ma ga yon pa ste// zung rngu ba cung bskum tshul gyis gnas// me yi tshogs su dbyug ston can// stsal g.yas dkar shing g.yan pa dmyang // sgra khrel dgram dkaril ba // dang po gnyis ni khri ma dakhrung // ka bas pa de theg par
302a4(rnying rgyud): s+ho// ga ni gnyis ba chen pa // mig yo mgon ni bden thal phyogs// gis dkar g.yon mdu dmarangs gal// dang bye ga nyi su ni dag ma 'i ga// 'khor lo la thig las par // ri ched brtag yod pa ni//
302a5(rnying rgyud): ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yas bdakar shing g.yon pa dmang // dmar snang dang pos rig ma 'khyung // rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa g.yon// rin chen parda 'dzin pa ste// rlung gi mdzums su yang dag gdas// da'adu dpa
302a6(rnying rgyud): byug+sa// khams gsum rgyal ba zhal gas m+me pa// zhal g.yas pa yon pa dkar ded dum du// swa dang dbus ni sbed kyu yin// phyag gnyis reg nA re ladzung pa la// lcags zu ral gyi sprin rdzi byung// g.yas dang g.yod kyi zhig tu
302a7(rnying rgyud): ba dag thams cad myong // rgyan bango rje 'jigs kyang 'an// khro mo pas 'i rigs kyi mag de rang lag ci 'don par byed/ bla man rnams kyi mtho sa/ sa byu na gas drag pa// ngo rtsam me pa yidang poni
302b1(rnying rgyud): na // sa// d+has na byags// sa na pa klog/ // stso nan/
302b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa ga/
302b3(rnying rgyud): sa / da
302b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ klu ga / / min ga/
302b5(rnying rgyud): spya / bzhe she sa na /

302b7(rnying rgyud): sa / sa
303a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa/ patog pa/ sa nga la rgyus/ srid pa 'thung bsgrub pa dang // dbang da ngas su bzung pa'i phyi// ses gshegs sa gso// na shags nas kyang // rtags dang saston bstan pa dang //
303a2(rnying rgyud): yidangasatha jom// do zhi da gzigs pa thams cang la// phyi ga deng stan dang rgyan la sogs// mchod pa blan med pas mchod// sangs rgyas dngos su bathob bya'i phyir// rdzam ba thams cad mnyes mchod de// bdag pa po tog mar med du/ bshom dang 'i
303a3(rnying rgyud): rjo/ rlu 'i rnam gyur te// dkyil 'khor kun la dngul bar bya// 'bral bar bdud rtsi rang bzhin dag/ su gsung thug+sasu rab ldan pas// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs te// su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod// oM lA tra~M ma hA sA ma a h+yaM bA
303a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nga ba gnas pas// ga chen pa'i byung bar bye// bdag dang sems ca bathal pa yi// rig pa slong ba ma ma gag na// bdag nyid ma nyis byed nom / phyag tu chen pa'i bdug nyid kyil// sam gyi gsang ba'i ba
303a5(rnying rgyud): nga bzugs kyi rang bzhin las// lha mo rnams su smras nas kyang // dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod par bya// gzugs dang skal sos pa'i// 'ad pa'i yon tan ldarnams kyis// khro ba'i dkyi 'byor mnyes kya nga// nyes byas ma sras nam dganas// rgya mo rnams
303a6(rnying rgyud): byung // dkyil 'bo dngas grub ba patshug sgrub par byed// khro ba 'dakyil la bar dam pa cad// babaganas pa'i sbyin par bya// bdud rtse wa dang ngam tha'// maung dang mtshan mang bas nas ni// bcug nas dang lur pas gang / chog pa byeng/
303a7(rnying rgyud): rmi ba dmyas pa 'or thams cad pa// sna tshogs gnams tshul byas na// dkyil gakhor ma lus mnyam par 'byung // de nas ma ny+dzumatshang par bya// he drug yig nas badz+ra dang // dur rjod can pa'i gnas bcad nas// dpal chen 'dor bas can drang te/
303b1(rnying rgyud): du gsogs 'dos/ nga rjedags tu ting shAs// dmar gyis rgya mam la gyis// mtha' gro'abar ba'i chags pa sa rnams// mangs gagasas gang byasasas sa/ ud par sa tha nams / ngag rgya tang du du
303b2(rnying rgyud): cis rdungs pa rtang pa ni// rmag cing gcer bu byu ni// thal bar k+tazhag gis mtshaH// rgyo ba'i bang tshung brdung ba// gnas zhag dang rdeg 'dzag pa// 'gu bzod jug thogs na ni// ha nyi la gang cing thugs pas gdab// sa so rnams kyi mang bya
303b3(rnying rgyud): ngas na 'ang bskye ba par bya// denas ba spel bya ba 'o// btod pa'i rgyal po 'dis cad do// rlung ba'idu byu ga byings rnas pabyed pa'i cho 'bul / gas dan pa thabs mikhas pa// bdug pa'i dra bying bya stsalapa/
303b4(rnying rgyud): byed te rus pa phrug 'tsha'i 'o// zhes brjod pas dgyes pa chen po de nyid mnyes par gyur te// sngags kyi spong ba'i di gsungs so// ji bzhin gsungs pa'i dbang sogs ldan// byung chub sdod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// byang shubs rjes ni mi spang shing // nga phyog rgyal so
303b5(rnying rgyud): dang // ngang pan chos kyangar mi med ci // nas kyang rung bar mi bye// mi shes byangs rgyun pal// gas ba brtun par bya ba min// bdug nyi mangs sdu ngangs nas ni// dag thub kyis nga gzhir mim// rtag tu sos pa babyung ba ni// bad kyi mdang gzhag// dkon
303b6(rnying rgyud): cog pag gas par bya// gsang pa'i mang 'dod pa spyang// byang chub ma nim byin thang // gas don tan nyid du/ kyor bu'i byu mama'i 'jugs pa// de ljang rimapa pasbyid pabyung // kyis dkyil labar bsgrim na // mjims kyis
303b7(rnying rgyud): la// dngugacing bstim pa cas nas kyang // jo ngo'i dargyal hU~M ba sgom ste// sngags su sri na ga'abar ba yis// tsid+ha phyung na sbyor byas te// mgo bo snying gnye ba dang // gsang ba'i las bzhis so rnams// go rim bzhin du 'dug par bya// gdug pa cad rnams gdul bya'i phyir// nga/
304a1(rnying rgyud): na mdas// u ma nga/ gas na da gsu sa rgyud pa/ nga na sa ga/ na shAg nga gra d+hA/ da na/
304a2(rnying rgyud): nga bapa ca dpos bdag pa nan pa rnal ba / bas dpa gi kyis po mchog kyi 'dzin pa rloms pa thugs te/ zin pa'i sun mtshogs pa 'di smras ngas so// de kyis pa kyi yongs brtag sa nas// bskrad dag tshum pa jog med de/
304a3(rnying rgyud): cho ba dkyil 'khor bsgoms sa ni// srang ba byin gyis brlab pa bcam// do d+hi mAr pa'i thob da/ thugs gnas ni byung gyur te// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// dz+haiM b+ha dzA tre+e l-i kI la yas rba'i g+h+nAn pa hriM hUMphaT/ spyi bo dgagal mi bas ma nas byung // kye+e ma da dkyil lakho sa
304a4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// 'og tu pas pan ba zheg pa ste// rnam par rgyal ba la thogs pa'i// phyogs rnams kun brgyan par gnas// co mangs dang 'acas pal// mchogs rnams ni bzhag pa yin// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin rlobs shing // mi stag 'phro zhing gabyi brjid 'dang // A yi da/
304a5(rnying rgyud): mdzes par nag// byad da/ rgyam pos dag pa dang // su su mtshal rkyen gyis bdun s+ho// mdzod pa rnams kyang da byung // gang 'ad pa rgyas co rtsa la// rang bdun ba zhag pa yin// smyenan yang thar pa // thu rlung bu gsum shod ba
304a6(rnying rgyud): spud drangs te/ mchod pa rdzogs dang bla mi ste// ma dag gtsug gisum pa'i sbyor ba dag/ snying gang ma yid kyil 'khor la// yi ga nga ni gzhag bya ste// 'od zer lhags kyus drangs nas ni// gzugs sa ma'i mor thim par gyi// phyag rgya ga zhi yi rang bzhin gyis// dgug cing sdom dang dbun
304a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// n+du ta// badz+ram ku shre s+yai mdzi ts+tsha hU~M// thab sha hU~M A ba~M ga sa a a/ gzugs bdud rnam zhin tsun gyi// thal ba ma yin tshung // ma sru ma 'o// thab sa thog pa nga sa rnams la// ga ba du kyis rdzas sa // ninan
304b1(rnying rgyud): ming dus gdags// dkyi bar sto du bu chud pa// 'jug khung thug sngam byas nas na// nang du gA byal gzhag par bya// bkug nas 'bas par gyur pa dang // bu zhum chom chen bdug pa dang // rdo byu drug dang phyag las kyang // gtor ma rnam sani na du gzug/ phA len rnam pa
304b2(rnying rgyud): ma rnams// blo sgying za zhing dbang po 'thog/ de ltar nyams par byas nas ni// dastod pa byas nas gnyis med bstim// de nas bzlas pa phyed 'dod na// bdag nyid lus kyi ting 'dzin zhugs// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de nas bzlas pa'i yig 'ju'am// d+hi yig rnam par ba
304b3(rnying rgyud): nas nI// phur pa'i khro bo'i gzugs byung ste// phyogs 'acu dag tu gshegs nas kyang // 'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs byas te// rdo rje phur pa la tham bya// 'bum phrag gcig gam sa ya'am// bye ba bzlas te dbang bskur na// ting 'dzin bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te// gzir mnan gyis la gsad par /
304b4(rnying rgyud): khyen chon pa'i das labab// 'i babyin pa'i dusu ma // zag brtan chen da sa mi ga/ na ldab / bdag nyid rkyen pa'i sa' bab// mnatsha byung ba byingams pa byeng rbab pa gtusams 'i byed // dus gsumachil ba ga ma/
304b5(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin rang sa cag rnams pa ni// gdug zhing sdang pa'i dgra ge k+Sha dang // bdag dang bar du baN+Do nga rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlab kyis// yud tsam gyis nI 'di dang kug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // lus dag rdul dure shig na/ kyang // sdug bsngal nyams bgyod/
304b6(rnying rgyud): mdzod// oM laM hU~M l-I/ s+t+wa~M d+ha nan/ mo hA ga ya b+ha baM wAn/ shrI badz+ra hUM kAr hUM phaT/ badz+re kI li k+Shi ya ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAM/ k+Sha ya wAkatsit+ta/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya hU~M phaT/ A~M badz+ra kr-i ta hU~M kA ra hUM phaT/ hU~M k+She ra hU~M A a a/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ A be shA ya aM/ dngos grub bar du ga
304b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la spre ru chug/ pho btsag rnam par gzang bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas ni// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyi yaM/ hUM
305a1(rnying rgyud): ra bi t+yan hUM phaT/ tshid+d+ha tshid+b+ha hU~M phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+ta hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya tA b+hU ya hUM phaT/ ha sa yAr ha sa ya hi dar+b+ha hUM phaT/ shI g+h+raM a nA ya hUM phaT/ dz+wA la ya dz+wa la ya hU~M phaT/ pra be sha ya drA d+ha
305a2(rnying rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ b+hin+ta ya b+hin+ta ya hUM phaT/ bran dang po ny+tsa bka' nyan tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad khas p+lad+ba dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// ha na hi na badz+ra/ da ha da haM badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ me tha ma tha da
305a3(rnying rgyud): ya badz+ra/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra// ka taM ka ye dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te a par dzi te/ mA ra se na pra marda ni hUM phaT// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klar pa tshal pa brgya ru khos//
305a4(rnying rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren rnams// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// d+hI ma ma pa sho ku ru ma ti nya ka ra i nan/ ta ti me ma karma shI g+h+raM kA ri ya hUM// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar du gcod pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med
305a5(rnying rgyud): par byos// sarba A na ya hUM/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// dam las 'da' byed sdig chen rnams// rdo rje med pal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phra na bzhin du rtogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje cobs
305a6(rnying rgyud): brdung byas nas// lha yang rung ste bskal bar bya'o// la thaM/ rdo rje phur pa gdang bya ba// bdag nyid khros pa'i nga rgyal can// shin tu gsal bar byas nas ni// gzas pa po yang gsal byas te// rdo rje phur pa mchog 'od 'bar// shin tu 'jigs pa gas
305a7(rnying rgyud): byas la// rang gi sngags ni brjod bya ste// thal mo sbyar thabs gsor nas kyang / ting 'dzin khugs par gyur pa dang // snying ga mgo bo lte ba dang // dpung pa gnyis dang brla gnyis pa// phur pa'i khro bo rdzogs byas te// g.yon pas rkenas bzung
305b1(rnying rgyud): nas ni// g.yas pa'i daN+Di'i thobs brdeg/ oM na maHsa maH/ kA y+ya lA ka N+Di d+ha badz+ra nAn/ g+hA g+ha g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya/ sarba dud+h+wa~M phaT/ kI la yak+Shi la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ d+ha~M hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra na ro A dz+ra pA ya ti/ sarba be ThaM/ kA ya s+ya ga
305b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa yin
305b3(rnying rgyud): kyi yul du bstabs nas ni// 'khor lo lnga sogs mtshon cha yos// gzugs brtan me mAr gdab par bya// oMts+tshid+hI pr-i kr-i ta yanan hU~M phaT// thod pa gzhung dang bcas pa yi// hom khung gu gsum b+ha can du// raM zhes bya bas mo sbar te// ye shes
305b4(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // dang dri khyor satho sanas ni// gdug pa na rnams bsreg par \u0f7f// snying rjes bskal ba'i dmatshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin// / phung po do rjes gtas byas nas// rnam par shes parjo ba sgom// oM badz+ra kI l-i
305b5(rnying rgyud): phyir byung nas snga drug ni// g.yas nas grwa yon du zhugs pa lA// bor tshon grang ma rig par// yi ge 'brug sum tshon rebs// hU~M nyid thu ba ya la bimA~M// a nyid oM gyi bdag nyid bu// byang chub sems su gcig pa ni// / bdog gsum gyi rin po
305b6(rnying rgyud): 'od zhir skyob sde'i myor ba yis// zhib nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gsang ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// ris pa min pa ma yid pang // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tung minapa// tshwa bong dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ byang chub gzhos nang sa du
306a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ !/ zas// dad pa 'artson 'grus rab ldan pas/ s+thA nyid nye bar gyur ba la// dam tshig ma nyams brtul thugs can// drag yul sgrub par 'dod pa yi// rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgrub par bya// mA mo'i gnas dang pong gcid
306a2(rnying rgyud): dang / ri bo desul rnams su ni// khros pas bsgrub pa rab tu bya// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom nas ni// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa rnams// gsang ba'i bad+mang bcug nas ni// zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe// drag shul gyis ni bsrub par d+ha/
306a3(rnying rgyud): s+yai yi rus pa las byas pa'i// bcu gnyis pa yi tshang rnams la// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom nas ni// gcig ga ma bcu gcig tu gcig dang // bdag nyid gang sgrub 'dod pa yis// gang la bya ba'i gzugs nyid kyi// mtshams dang dam tshig
306a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'am// bskrun pa tshad nas gdab par bya// rdul du byas pa tshogs pa dbul// badz+ra trI s+'u ny+Ni ts+tsha rtsa gcig dang // rtsa wa dgu dang mar gyi // nom dang nyi mo'i thung rnams la// brtul zhugs can gyis bkru bo ni n+ti// d+ha la gcig gis nges pa du/
306a5(rnying rgyud): 'tshe bar 'gyur ba gan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mu dang gsung dang drug sa rdo rje'i'abor ba'i rgyud las/ zin las phun sum tshogs pa'i ladro snyib sa lnga pa'o// / denas bcom ldan 'das rje 'jigs byed can
306a6(rnying rgyud): po la/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i 'khor 'bum phrag supas mngon par bstod pa/ bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// nyon mongs 'ching bar byed pa'i phyir// dbu sba lam nag gyen du lakyil// mtshan ma thams cad rnam 'joms pas// khro gnyer
306a7(rnying rgyud): srog stong 'gyung ste// yon tan thams cad rgyas mdzad pa'i// sbyin ma spar mig kyang sod// log par blta na'i tshogs rnams la// lde mig btsug nas gtum par mdzad// mtshang zang yag gi gas 'di// byeb nis pa dasong pa'i tshug
306b1(rnying rgyud): 'a gdang mngam pa'i cha grangs kyis// 'bar ba la med mdzad pa'o// sa sgrogs te'i gad rgyangs tsam// gdug pa can rnams nyams par bye// sngags pas 'ab shing g.yang bal// zhal nas bdud dang sman ma sogs// khrag 'a ba nga/
306b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i zhag gis bslus// zhe sdang 'joms mdzad stag lpags can// gdug pa srul gyis rnam brgyad pa// gti mug 'jom sa mdzad grang chedaka rlon gas// 'dod chags zad mdang rig pa 'byung // gdug pa 'jom sa pas mthing nagazhal
306b3(rnying rgyud): mongs mgo sa chags pas dgyes// g.yas g.yod dkar dang du mar bya'i zhal// maM shes lnga dag rdo rje zlog ste// mtshan pasreg mdzad pa dbyung can// zhigs pas mi gting 'ching ba la// rdo rje dge sgras 'joms pa'o// rdo rje ngan mongs
306b4(rnying rgyud): dag 'jig/ phrar pas bdud kun 'joms pa yin// rdo rje rje mchog stabs pa che// 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs pa byud// dga' bachen po mgu ra byed // yon tan thams cad 'byung bar byud// / khros pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba byeng /
306b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun gyi bdag po'o// zhes bstod pas/ khro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas/ thams cad byung gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par gyurate/ bzhugs pa la snying po mtshar rmang du gyur te/ khro rdo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i
306b6(rnying rgyud): wA dragasungs so// gsung ba'i dbyings dbus dag r+b+ha// thos pa'i dkyil 'khor banam \u0f7f ste// gragangs pa dag zam shing rnams la// dgri ba rgya mdzad rtsezung gsum// dus rnams tshe bor rnama'i rnams te// mata ba na g+ha yang nag mdzad pas
306b7(rnying rgyud): gzugasas ma mkhris nas ni// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa la// bkrag nas rdo rje phung bsag suM// de nas gang dbya ba'i gnas// mamo'i gnas dang chu thung dang // lam gyi gni zang shing gcig rgyu// dkyis tshagang rig la mags sa/
307a1(rnying rgyud): rgyam pa'i chu nas// dgusas thugs sa na// dag rgyun dud// na mas ga // /

307a3(rnying rgyud): mi ke r+g+haM las paskyed byas te// rtag tu brtan par gzhug par bya// bdag nyid 'bar ba'i gang la sogs// stang stabs rdzogs nas gro ba rdung rtsi// ngo brjid gnon phyag rgya yis// thang pa rnams ni kyis lan /
307a4(rnying rgyud): bsregs kyis rnam par mig so//

307a9(rnying rgyud): ma ti rnams kyi gzugs
307b1(rnying rgyud): na// dang bamakyang ldan drudungs te// gdan dang khrus pasil ba \u0f7f// la la gzug cing brtan gzugs gso// phyag dang mdzad pa tshul bzhinan/ danas su gags sugs pa dang /

307b6(rnying rgyud): sa// dkyilang bar dmas pa chong padrug/ dzin na pazhigs nam mi ngon// rgyuni dkyis kyi ga num pa gyu// 'dasas rgya mi gas po mas// gnang 'ad ga // phrin su macom
307b7(rnying rgyud): rnams gtam/ ga ga pa dzin mi lci ba gyus da/ da nas pa'i ra/ sa sa ban pa pa ga ni thob 'di la
307b8(rnying rgyud): 'dag do kying 'drun/ ga thas 'azhin gshegs pa pams chod kyi rlung nga gzung da tshigs dadra bar ba chud pas/ dkyi 'bang gyi ba dag pa do ba gi bdu marje
308a1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i rim pa rnams bstan pa'i le'u skye bcu drug pa'o// / de napa bcomasan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / za
308a2(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams la/ sngags kyi tshul po bstan pa'i gzung po 'di ched du brjod do// rtsem sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// blan med pa'i bya chub sems// 'di dka' de bzhin mi shigs pa// 'da' bar mi mdzad de mchog yin/
308a3(rnying rgyud): stsogs bcu ngus bzhi rang bzhin dgra/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid// rang gi rtog pa phra rgyas kyis// so sor sbyin cing sdug bsngal ba// grol bar bya phyir tha med rnams// 'dun phyir rdzogs longs spyod par 'asten// jo/ yin tha med gnas
308a4(rnying rgyud): mchog tu// mgon po bdag nyid chen pongs// rdo rje 'khor lo bskor ba rnams// ljags kyi dbang por bkram nas ni// kun gyi don du gsungs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
308a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams kyis brtan por zung // 'gro ba'i skye bo ji snyed par// yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin pa dang // nyan pa dang ni klog pa dang // 'chad dang kha ton byed pa dang // de sems pa dang sgom pa rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/
308a6(rnying rgyud): med byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba// rgyal ba rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i// yon tan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// sa yi khyad par bgrod ngas ni// bde ba chen por 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas kun
308a7(rnying rgyud): chung sems// sregasung thugs kyi gas pa rnams// rtogs shing 'dzin par byed pa dang // rtag tu 'chang bgang med pa/ nyid nga 'drabs na// sku gsung thugs kyi la rnams dang // gsang ba'i dod ni bstar pa yid/
308b1(rnying rgyud): sa kyid mchog sang / mtha ga sa nas rtogs klas sri/ dam pa rnams dam pa sa ga/ drug tud duganas pa bstan sa/ thol thu la sna ngu 'bor ba rnams/ demyar das ngas pang du/
308b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin pas// de la de bzhin gnas mi bya// gang gis de bzhin gnas gyur na// de bzhin mthong bas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid kyi kyis nyid la//
308b3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i btsal sems te// dmigs pa med pa'i dmigs pa dang // sgom du med pa'i sgom pa yis// shes rab gsum gyi bdag nyid can// sa rnams ye shes bskyed 'gyur bas// yang dag mthong nas ldan gyis zung // dang
308b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pas rab bsngags pas// 'phags dang byis pa'i skye bo dang // rang dang gzhan gyi skye bo rnams// gang shig 'di la dad 'gyur na// dam pa 'di dag gnas pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de na
308b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis mgrin gcig dang dbyangs gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// gru gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ spyan ras dri med 'od mdzad pa// bdag cag kun gyis mthong bas na// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag
308b6(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// yang dag rtogs shing 'dzin pa la/ rab tu mos pas dus gsum du// dpa' bo chen po bzhin phyag 'tshal// byang chub 'phags dang gzhan rnams kyis//
308b7(rnying rgyud): don 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / rtogs nas smra bar byed pa la/ ston pa bzhin du bdag 'tshal lo// gang gis ming tsam 'dzin pa yi// don 'di sgrub par byed par// g.yo rgyu med cing gus ldan pas// da

309a9(rnying rgyud): ba chu mdzugs // ga kyi ma gi dang / kyi rjes chen pa pos pa/ ci gtan pa rab ba gas /
